De Isɑɑk wɑ̈de ɑ́pyëje kinni, “Lɑ̈y ɑ́jwɑn yi yïn kɑ yodø kidï kɑ nɑ̈g yi yïn?”
Alöggi Yɑgob kinni, “Jwøgí, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j yɑ ɑ́kønye ki yodii.”
Codhe, ɑköbbi Yɑgob yi Isɑɑk kinni, “Bïí butɑ o yï nywɑl yi yɑn wɑ̈dɑ, o yodɑ cyee mɑ bëëd yï bɑ Isøø wɑ̈dɑ kidyër.”
Codhe, kɑ Yɑgob kedh-ɑ buti Isɑɑk wïye. Kɑ nywɑl yi Isɑɑk, ɑkööbe kinni, “Cwɑggí nɑ cwɑggi Yɑgob. De cinggí dɑ yëyy ni cinggi Isøø.”
Nuti ngijø yi Isɑɑk kinni bɑ Yɑgob, mɑ́ cingge dɑ yëyy ni cinggi Isøø, cem e lɑ̈mm-ɑ gyëdh yi Isɑɑk,
ɑcigii pyëjø yi Isɑɑk kinni, “Yï bɑ Isøø wɑ̈dɑ kidyër?”
Alöggi Yɑgob kinni, “Ngee, bɑ yɑn.”
Codhe, kɑ Isɑɑk okööbø kinni, “Mëggí yɑn gïncɑmɑni, o cɑm yi yɑn, o yï lɑ̈mmɑ gyëdh.” Codhe, ɑmëggii gïncɑmɑni yi Yɑgob, ɑcyɑ̈me. Kɑ nëngi ki møgi oløg yi Yɑgob kɑ ómɑ̈dhø.
Aköbbii yi Isɑɑk wïye kinni, “Nyïngí butɑ, kɑ yɑ nuum kì pïnɑ wɑ̈dɑ.”
Kɑ kedh-ɑ bute, ɑnuume gøn. Kɑ yømi ógudhe ngwɑ̈j yi wïye kɑ gø kwënge, kinni, “Arøwøø, yømi wɑ̈dɑ ngwɑ̈ɑ̈j nɑ yømi pwödhø men-ɑ ógyëdhø yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j.
Jwøgɑ yï ónënge ki kødh me gïïr, kɑ yï nënge ki piny me døøj, o yï óbëëd yïí dɑ byel mø gïïr geki møgi oløg me nyɑ̈n.
Yï ógöggi yi jurrì bënn. Kɑ ji ri gen bøødh gen bølí. Yï óbëëd yï teg kibøli nyiimyëw. Wɑ̈ddi meyí, ri gen óbødh yi gen kì bøli. Ngɑn-ɑ ólɑ̈mmi yïn cyën ócyen, o ngɑn-ɑ ólɑ̈mmi yïn gyëdh ógyëdh.”
Ri bëëni Yɑgob wɑ̈g ceth kì buti Isɑɑk wïye, kɑ ɑ́rume lɑ̈mmi gyëdh, bøli kenyɑni ceth ɑ ɑ́dwöög Isøø kì wɑg kun-ɑ ɑ́kedhe be dwɑr.
Isøø thyew ɑ́tɑ̈ɑ̈d ki gïncɑm me døøj cɑrø. Kɑ gø muuje wïye. Kɑ wïye köbbe kinni, “Dhwöödh wïyø, o yï cyɑ̈ɑ̈m ki rïngi lɑ̈y-ɑ ɑ́dwɑr yi wɑ̈dí, o yɑ lɑ̈mmí gyëdh, ki medi pyëwí.”
Apëjji Isɑɑk kinni, “Yï bɑ men?”
Alögge kinni, “Yɑ wɑ̈dí, wɑ̈n-ɑ kɑyø, yɑ Isøø.”
Kɑ Isɑɑk dële okïrrø ki menteg, ɑkööbe kinni, “Dɑ́ men ɑ ɑ́dwɑ̈rri yɑn lɑ̈yɑni, kɑ yɑ muuje ki gïncɑm, yï nuti bëënø? Ácɑm yi yɑn kɑ lɑ̈mmɑ gyëdh. O bɑ men cög ki gyëdhhɑni ceth.”
Isøø keny-ɑ ɑ́lïnge kwøbbi wïye, kɑ óryeerø ki rɑ̈ɑ̈m pyëwe. Aköbbe wïye kinni, “Lɑ̈mmí yɑn gyëdh thyew wïyø!”
De wïye ɑ́kööb kinni, “Ómyëw ɑ́bï, kɑ yɑ wëny yi en. Gyëdh ɑ́rum ki kɑ̈ɑ̈lø yi en.”
Alöggi Isɑɑk kinni, “Yɑ ɑ́muuj ki tegø me bëëd Yɑgob bɑ jɑgø kì kömí. O nyiimen bënn óbëëd gɑ bɑ̈ngge. Kɑ gwøgɑ e teg kì ri mïdhi byel geki møng-ɑ nyɑ̈n. Bong gïjø mɑ ɑ́döng me mëggɑ yïn wɑ̈dɑ.”
“Yï óbëëdø yï lɑ̈wi ki piny-ɑ pëddi døøjø.
Yï óbëëdø yïí pɑ wɑ̈dhi yi kødh.
O yï óbëëdø yï bɑ bɑ̈ng kì yï ómyëw.
De keny-ɑ ónyɑɑg rií,
yï óbï wɑ̈g kì cinge.”
Kɑ Yɑgob mɑɑn yi Isøø ki mendwøng kì bɑng gyënh-ɑ ɑ́gyëdhii yi Isɑɑk wïye. Kɑ ree köbbe kinni, “Wïyɑ ɑ́cyɑ̈ngi ki thøø, Yɑgob ómïɑ ónɑ̈g yi yɑn keny-ɑ óthøw wïyɑ.”
Kɑ kwøbbi dwɑddi Yɑgob nɑ̈gø yi Isøø lïngi yi Rebekɑ̀. Codhe, kɑ öd-ɑ yï Yɑgob kinni, “Isøø ómyëw pyëwe mɑg yi en kɑ kinni o yï ónɑ̈g yi en keny-ɑ óthøw wïyí.
De yïn, wɑ̈dɑ, gwøg gïn-ɑ köbbɑ yïn. Lɑbɑn ómïɑ nud kì Arɑn. Kedhí yïe ɑnɑn ceth!
Kɑ yï kɑl bëëdø kì bute gïti keny-ɑ ólɑ̈ɑ̈ny liny ómyëw.
Keny-ɑ ókwööj linye, kɑ wïje owïlø ki gïn-ɑ ɑ́göggií, yɑ óödi yïí ki bɑ̈ng men-ɑ ódwöög yïn. Yɑ pɑ dwɑddi kinni o wɑ̈ddɑ ryeet lɑ̈ɑ̈ny gen kì bølɑ cyɑ̈ng ɑ́kyel.”
Codhe, ɑköbbi Isɑɑk yi Rebekɑ̀ kinni, “Köörɑ ɑ́buudh yi nyigi Kit. Keløg Yɑgob ónyömø kì kelli nyigi Kit kì pönhï, yɑ óbëëdø yɑ onëënø kɑ per ngø?”
Kɑ Yɑgob cwøl yi Isɑɑk kɑ gø kwënge, ɑköbbe gøn kinni, “Yï ko nyömi ki dhɑjø kì kelli nyigi Kɑnɑɑn.
Dhwöödh, kedhí Töör Arɑm gøl Bethuel wïyi meyí, kɑ yï nyömí kì kelli nyigi Lɑbɑn ómï meyí.
Yï ógyëdh yi Jwøk Áyïmø, kɑ yï nënge ki nywøl mø ngenyø, møg-ɑ ógöögø ki jurrì mø gïïr.
Kɑ gyëdhhi Abrɑhɑm mëgge yïn, wuki nyigí. Piny-ɑ bëëd yi yïn ɑnɑn yï bɑ wëdh, ólɑg yi yïn, eni piny-ɑ ɑ́mëggi Abrɑhɑm yi Jwøk.”
Aör Yɑgob yi Isɑɑk, kɑ kedh-ɑ Töör Arɑm kun-ɑ bëëd yi Lɑbɑn wɑ̈d Bethuel ómï Rebekɑ̀, meyi Yɑgob geki Isøø.
Kɑ yod yi Isøø kinni Isɑɑk Yɑgob ɑ́gyëdhe kɑ gø öre Töör Arɑm be nyömø ki dhɑjø. Áyod yi en thyew kinni Yɑgob ɑ́cege kinni ko nyömi kì kelli nyigi Kɑnɑɑn.
Áyode thyew kinni Yɑgob kwøbbi wïye geki meye lïng en kɑ kedh-ɑ Töör Arɑm.
Codhe, ɑyode gøn kinni Isɑɑk wïye pɑ dwɑddi kinni o wɑ̈dde nyömi gen ki nyigi Kɑnɑɑn.
Codhe, kɑ Isøø kedh-ɑ yï Icmɑil, ɑnywøme nyimï Nebɑyoth, nyɑn-ɑ cwøl ɑ́ Mɑlɑɑth nyɑɑr Icmɑil wɑ̈d Abrɑhɑm, e gø nywøøme’ kömi mɑ̈nn-ɑ yïe.
Kɑ Yɑgob odhwödhø kì Bircebɑ̀ e kedh-ɑ Arɑn.
Keny-ɑ ɑ́wɑ̈dhe keny megø ɑbudde, mɑ́ cɑ̈ng ɑ́kedhi piny. Kɑ ókɑ̈bbø ki tungi kït me thɑ̈ɑ̈nhe wïje, ɑnene.
Kɑ Yɑgob ólɑ̈gø, e lidh-ɑ yïdhi men-ɑ ócwöödh piny, wïje nywɑ̈ddø ki mɑl, ɑlidhe wëywöddi Jwøk ge nyi yedh-ɑ mɑl kɑ ge nyi yïnh-ɑ piny kì wïj yïnhɑni.
Aliidh Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j yi Yɑgob e ócungø kì wïj yïdhi, ɑkööbe kinni, “Bene yɑn Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, Yɑ Jwøøg Abrɑhɑm kweyí, o bene yɑn Jwøøg Isɑɑk. Yï ómëggɑ piny-ɑ buud yi yïn èn, wuki kwɑrrí.
Kwɑrrí ógöögø ge nɑ tør kɑ wɑ̈thi tùngi piny bënn pɑ̈ng yi gen. Kɑ jurri kömi piny bënn óyïddø ki gyëdh kì bɑngí wuki kwɑrrí.
Yɑ ócyɑ̈dhi ki yïn kì kɑ̈jj-ɑ kedhi yi yïn bënn, kɑ yï dwöögɑ piny men. Yï pɑ pɑ̈nyɑ’ wiyø gïti keny-ɑ ógwøgɑ gïg-ɑ ɑ́köbbɑ yïn bënn.”
Codhe, kɑ Yɑgob ócyëwø, ɑkööbe kinni, “Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j nud kì keny kidyër, de yɑ bëëdø yɑ kwïj wøw.”
Kɑ obwøgø, ɑkööbe kinni, “Yɑ óböggø yi keny! Bɑ ød Jwøk kidyër, o men bɑ dhø yuu mɑl.”
Kɑ Yɑgob jwɑn-ɑ dhwödhø kì mwøl, kɑ tungi kïn-ɑ ɑ́thɑ̈ɑ̈nhe wïje kwɑnye, kɑ gø cwöödhe piny, ɑkunye köme ki møw.
Kenyɑni ɑ́bëëd e cwøl ɑ́ Ludh, de ɑ́døøg ki cɑgø yi Yɑgob ɑ́ Betiil (ød Jwøk).
Kɑ Yɑgob óköngø kinni, “Keløg Jwøk ócyɑ̈dhi ki yɑn, kɑ yɑ kor yi en ki yuu-ɑ cyɑ̈dhi yi yɑn èn, kɑ yɑ thödhe ki gïncɑm men cɑm yi yɑn, ki ógudh møg rug yi yɑn,
kɑ yɑ dwööge gøl wïyɑ ki tɑrø, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j óbëëd ɑ́ Jwøgɑ ceth.
Kït men-ɑ ɑ́cwöödhɑ piny èn, óbëëd ɑ́ ød Jwøk. Pyɑ̈ri wɑ̈thi jɑmmɑ bënn møg-ɑ ómëggi yɑn yi Jwøk, ójwödhɑ en.”
Codhe, kɑ Yɑgob ódøøgø wɑ̈di yöö, kɑ wɑ̈dh-ɑ Töör Arɑm.
Atïnge wïje, kɑ ólïdhø ki yith me wïje di dɑggi dyëg ɑ́dɑ̈g ge obuddø kì piny, mɑ́ ge nyi mɑ̈ɑ̈dh ɑ yij yiinhɑni ki pï. Kït me dwøng ócïb dhø yith.
Tyëng-ɑ kwɑ̈yø ki dyëg ɑ́bëëd ge nyi ceg-ɑ cugø bënn, o kït ngyel yi gen kì dhø yith, o dyëg tömmi ki pï. Codhe, o kït nyi dwøøg keje kì dhø yith.
Kɑ kwɑ̈yyi dyëg pyëj yi Yɑgob kinni, “Nyiimïɑ, wu kɑ̈ɑ̈l-ɑ keny?”
Kɑ ge ólöggø kinni, “Wø kɑ̈ɑ̈l-ɑ Arɑn.”
Apëjje kinni, “Lɑbɑn kwɑɑr Nɑor ngɑ̈nyi yi wun?”
Akööb gen kinni, “Ngɑ̈nyi yi wøn.”
Kɑ Yɑgob okööbø kinni, “Dële yööd?”
Akööb gen kinni, “Dële yööd. Lidh, Rebekɑ̀ nyɑre ɑ bï ɑcinee ki dyëg.”
Akööb Yɑgob kinni, “De cɑ̈ng ce nudd e dwøng. Pɑth ki bøli keny-ɑ nyi køøl dyëg pɑc. Tömmu gen ki pï, kɑ wiy ge døøg gen be cɑm.”
Kɑ ge okööbø kinni, “Pɑth, wø ceg-ɑ yïd gïti keny-ɑ ókööl dyëg bënn, o kït ngyel kì dhø yith, o dyëg tömmi ki pï cyee.”
Kɑ̈ng-ɑ ɑ́kööb Yɑgob geki kwɑ̈yyi dyëg, ɑwɑ̈nhi Rɑceel ki dyëgi wïye, mɑ́ en ɑ ɑ́bëëd e kwɑy-ɑ dyëg.
Yɑgob keny-ɑ ɑ́lidhe Rɑceel nyɑɑr Lɑbɑn geki dyëgi Lɑbɑn, ɑkedhe wïj yith, kɑ kït ngyëële wɑ̈g kì dhø yith, kɑ dyëgi Lɑbɑn tömme ki pï. Lɑbɑn bɑ ómï Rebekɑ̀ meyi Yɑgob.
Codhe, kɑ Rɑceel nuum yi Yɑgob, kɑ Yɑgob ceg-ɑ ì túl ki ywøg.
Aköbbe nyɑnɑni kinni ge bɑ wɑdd, o bɑ wɑ̈d Rebekɑ̀.
Codhe, ɑrengi Rɑceel pɑc, kɑ wïye köbbe.
Lɑbɑn keny-ɑ ɑ́lïnge wööni Yɑgob wɑ̈d nyimen, ɑrenge be pɑɑrii, kɑ dööb kɑ̈w yi Lɑbɑn, kɑ gø nuume, kɑ gø kïdhe gøle. Aköbbii yi Yɑgob ki gïg-ɑ ɑ́cwöb bënn.
Akööb Lɑbɑn kinni, “Wɑ bɑ remø ɑ́kyel.” Kɑ Yɑgob obëëdø kì kunɑni ki dwɑ̈y.
Codhe, ɑköbbi Yɑgob yi Lɑbɑn kinni, “Yï bɑ wɑɑd wøn kidyër, de pɑ døøj kiperí kinni o yï göög e bong köögi men mëggɑ yïn. Köbbí yɑn, yï køøg kɑ ngø?”
Lɑbɑn ɑ́bëëd yïe dɑ nyige, womɑ̈nn ɑ́ryew. Nyɑn-ɑ dwøng cwøl ɑ́ Leɑ̀, o nyɑn-ɑ thinh cwøl ɑ́ Rɑceel.
Leɑ̀ ɑ́bëëd bøle myëër, de Rɑceel ɑ́bëëd ɑ́ ɑ́ywinyø, o myëër cɑrø.
Rɑceel mɑɑr yi Yɑgob. Codhe, ɑköbbe Lɑbɑn kinni, “Yï ógöggɑ ki runn ɑ́bïryew, othumi gen, o yɑ mëggí nyɑrí Rɑceel ɑ́ dhɑjø.”
Kɑ Lɑbɑn okööbø kinni, “Lɑ̈w kipere ke nywømii yi yïn kibøli ke di nywømii yi jɑlø megø. Bëëd kì butɑ keny.”
Codhe, kɑ Yɑgob obëëdø e göög ɑ cingi Lɑbɑn ki runn ɑ́bïryew kipe kinni o ómëggi Rɑceel keny-ɑ óthumi runnɑni. Gï nenne ge nɑ cyɑ̈ng mø nøg yøw, yi kɑ mɑɑre Rɑceel ki mendwøng.
Kì bɑng runn ɑ́bïryew, ɑköbbi Lɑbɑn yi Yɑgob kinni, “Mëggí yɑn Rɑceel, o nywøm yi yɑn. Runni gwøg møg-ɑ ɑ́nywɑg yi wɑ ɑ́thumi.”
Codhe, kɑ tyëng myërrɑni ryej yi Lɑbɑn.
Keny-ɑ ɑ́yuudh wøw kɑ Lɑbɑn yöd e muuj-ɑ Leɑ̀ nyɑre, kɑ gø kïdhe ød geki Yɑgob.
Kɑ Lɑbɑn nyɑbɑ̈nge Dhilpɑ̀ mëgge Leɑ̀ nyɑre ɑ́ bɑ̈ng.
Kì mwøl keny-ɑ ɑ́yodii yi Yɑgob kinni ge buddø kɑ Leɑ̀, ɑköbbe Lɑbɑn kinni, “Á ngø ɑ göggí yɑn kinnï! Yɑ ɑ́göög ki gwøng teg ki runn ɑ́bïryew kɑ per kinni, o yɑ nywømɑ Rɑceel! Yïde ɑ wëëny yɑn?”
Kɑ Lɑbɑn okööbø kinni, “Kì pödhi wøn, nyɑnthinh pɑ nyi wëggi nywømø kì bøli nyimen nyɑndwøng.
De tyëgu cyɑ̈ng ɑ́bïryew kì ød wuki Leɑ̀, o yï mëggɑ Rɑceel, o nywøm yi yïn thyew. De yï ceg-ɑ døøgø gwøg ki runn ɑ́bïryew møøgø.”
Kɑ møgɑni yïëy yi Yɑgob. Keny-ɑ ɑ́thumi cyɑ̈ng ɑ́bïryew e ying-ɑ ød geki Leɑ̀, kɑ Lɑbɑn Rebekɑ̀ nyɑre mëgge Yɑgob ɑ́ dhɑjø.
(Kɑ Lɑbɑn bɑ̈nge Bilɑ̀ mëgge Rɑceel nyɑre ɑ́ bɑ̈ng.)
Codhe, kɑ Yɑgob kedh-ɑ ød geki Rɑceel thyew, kɑ Rɑceel mɑɑr yi Yɑgob kidøøj kibøli Leɑ̀. Kɑ Yɑgob ogöögø kì cingi Lɑbɑn ki runn ɑ́bïryew møøgø.
Keny-ɑ ɑ́lidhii yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kinni Rɑceel mɑɑr kidøøj yi Yɑgob kibøli Leɑ̀, ɑgöjje Leɑ̀ nywølø, kɑ Rebekɑ̀ göjje bøøjø.
Leɑ̀ ɑ́yɑɑj kɑ onywølø ki wɑ̈d. Kɑ gø cɑge ɑ́ Ruben,
Leɑ̀ ɑ́cigi yɑɑjø kɑ onywølø ki wɑ̈d megø. Kɑ gø cɑge ɑ́ Cimeøn,
Leɑ̀ ɑ́cigi yɑɑjø, kɑ onywølø ki wɑ̈d megø. Kɑ gø cɑge ɑ́ Leebì,
Codhe, kɑ Leɑ̀ onywølø ki wɑ̈d megø. Kɑ gø cɑge ɑ́ Yeudɑ̀,
Keny-ɑ ɑ́yodii yi Rɑceel kinni bɑ bwøj, kɑ mɑg yi tyiel ki Leɑ̀ nyimen, ɑköbbe Yɑgob kinni, “Nëngí yɑn ki nywøl, ke pɑ nywølɑ yɑ othøø.”
Kɑ Yɑgob mɑg yi liny ki en, ɑkööbe kinni, “Gïn-ɑ nyi gwøg yi Jwøk kete, olwɑ̈ngø yi yɑn ki gwøgø? En ɑ ɑ́mɑ̈ɑ̈n yïn nywølø.”
Akööb Rɑceel kinni, “Bɑ̈ngɑ Bilɑ̀ ɑnɑn. Kedhu ød ki en, o yɑ nyödde ki nywøl. O gølɑ tïng yi en.”
Codhe, kɑ Rɑceel bɑ̈nge Bilɑ̀ mëgge Yɑgob ɑ́ dhɑjø, kɑ kedh-ɑ ød ki gøn.
Ayɑɑj Bilɑ̀, kɑ Yɑgob nyödde ki wɑ̈d.
Kɑ Rɑceel okööbø kinni, “Álidh yi Jwøk kinni yïɑ bɑ̈r. Kwɑ̈jjɑ ɑ́lïnge, kɑ yɑ nënge ki wɑ̈d.” Acɑge gøn ɑ́ Dɑn.
Bilɑ̀ ɑ́cigi yɑɑjø, kɑ onywølø ki ryeew wɑ̈dde.
Akööb Rɑceel kinni, “Wø ɑ́byëddi ki nyimïɑ ki byëddø me teg, kɑ tyɑm yi yɑn.” Codhe, ɑcɑge gøn ɑ́ Nɑptɑlì.
Keny-ɑ ɑ́yodii yi Leɑ̀ kinni nyöde ɑ́cungi, ɑmëgge bɑ̈nge Dhilpɑ̀ Yɑgob ɑ́ dhɑjø.
Keny-ɑ ɑ́nywøl Dhilpɑ̀ ki wɑ̈d,
ɑkööb Leɑ̀ kinni, “Yïɑ dɑ dhwɑ̈ng.” Codhe, ɑcɑge gøn ɑ́ Gɑd.
Yɑgob ɑ́nyöddi yi Dhilpɑ̀ ki wɑ̈d megø,
kɑ Leɑ̀ okööbø kinni, “Pyëwɑ med cɑrø! Anɑn yɑ ócwølli yi tyëng-ɑ mɑ̈nn yɑn ɑ́ ngɑn pyëwe med.” Acɑge gøn ɑ́ Aceer.
Kɑ Ruben kedh-ɑ yethi pwödh cyɑ̈ng ɑ́kyel, ji onyɑ̈rø kí gemè, kɑ óyïddø ki dödɑyim,
Alöggi Leɑ̀ kinni, “Jɑlgølɑ ɑ́rum ki kɑ̈ɑ̈lø yi yïn, o ɑnɑn yï dwɑddí kwɑnyi dödɑyim mø wɑ̈dɑ?”
De Rɑceel ɑ́löggi kinni, “Keløg yɑ onëngø yi yïn ki dödɑyim mø wɑ̈dí, wu ócuggø buddø wuki Yɑgob tïn kì wɑ̈r.”

Keny-ɑ ɑ́dwöög Yɑgob kì pwödhø kì böörø, ɑkedhi Leɑ̀ be pɑɑrii. Kɑ okööbø kinni, “Yï buddi kɑ yɑn tïn kì wɑ̈r, mɑ́ yï ɑ́rum ki kïrø yi yɑn ki dödɑyim mø wɑ̈dɑ.” Codhe, kɑ Yɑgob óbuddø ki en kì wɑ̈rɑni.
Codhe, kɑ kwɑ̈jji Leɑ̀ lïngi yi Jwøk, kɑ óyɑɑjø këti. Anyödde Yɑgob ki bïïj wɑ̈dde.
Kɑ okööbø kinni, “Yɑ ɑ́nëngi yi Jwøk ki köögi, mɑ́ bɑ̈ngɑ ɑ́mëggɑ jɑlgølɑ.” Codhe, kɑ Leɑ̀ wɑ̈de cɑge ɑ́ Isɑkɑr.
Leɑ̀ ɑ́cigi yɑɑjø, kɑ Yɑgob nyödde ki bïkyeel wɑ̈dde.
Kɑ okööbø kinni, “Jwøk yɑ ɑ́mëgge gïn-ɑ nyi tyer yi pyëw. Yɑgob óyïëy bëëdø ki yɑn ɑnɑn cyee, mɑ́ e ɑ́nyöddɑ ki wɑ̈dd ɑ́bïkyel.” Codhe, ɑcɑge gøn ɑ́ Dhebulun.
Kɑ Leɑ̀ onywølø kì cyɑ̈ɑ̈n piny ki nyɑndhɑjø, ɑcɑge gøn ɑ́ Dïnɑ̀.
Codhe, ɑpɑɑr Rɑceel yi Jwøk, kɑ kwɑ̈jje lïngi yi en, kɑ nyöde yiebe.
Kɑ óyɑɑjø, ɑnywøle ki wɑ̈d, ɑkööbe kinni, “Ayɑ̈rɑ ɑ́kɑ̈ɑ̈l wɑ̈g yi Jwøk kì kömɑ.”
Kɑ gø cɑge ɑ́ Yosep.
Kì bɑng kɑ ɑ́rum Yosep ki nywølø, ɑköbbi Lɑbɑn yi Yɑgob kinni, “Wiy yɑn, o yɑ døøgɑ pödhi wøn.
Mëggí yɑn mɑ̈nnɑ geki nyigɑ, kɑ wiy yɑ kedhɑ. Yɑ ɑ́ceg-ɑ gwøg kiper gen, o ngɑ̈nyi yi yïn kidøøj eni gwøng-ɑ ɑ́göggɑ yïn.”
Aköbbii yi Lɑbɑn kinni, “Keløg pyëwí med ki yɑn, yɑ kwɑjj-ɑ yïn bëëd. Ngɑ̈nyi yi yɑn kinni yɑ ɑ́gyëdh yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kɑ perí.
Köbbí yɑn gïn-ɑ dwɑddi yi yïn, o culɑ yïn.”
Alöggi Yɑgob kinni, “Ngɑ̈nyi yi yïn kidøøj kinni yï ɑ́göggɑ kɑ gwøg me teg, kɑ dyëgí óngënyø kɑ ɑ́korrɑ gen.
Keny-ɑ ɑ́bëënɑ, yïí ɑ́dɑ mø nøg, de ɑnɑn yïí dɑ mø ngenyø. Kenyi di gïí me gwøg yi yɑn ceth, yï nyi ceg kɑ gyëdhø yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j. Dɑ́ ki wën ɑ ólunyɑ ki gwøg yɑ gögg-ɑ gølɑ?”
Apyëëj Yɑgob yi Lɑbɑn kinni, “Mëggɑ yïn ngø?”
Aløøg møge yi Yɑgob kinni, “Ko di gïn mëggí yɑn. Göggí yɑn gïn kete yøw; wiy yɑ kedhɑ be kwɑyi dyëgí kí dhögí, o ge korri yi yɑn.

Kɑ wiy yɑ kɑ̈llɑ kelli dyëgí bënn tïn, o møg-ɑ ógeddø, ki møg-ɑ ri gen di kïddì kì kelli gen køjɑ wɑ̈yi gen geki órömm-ɑ lojø bënn. Kí dyëg ɑ́tegg geki dhög-ɑ ri gen di kïddì, o møgɑni bëëd gen gɑ kööngɑ.

O ólidh yi yïn dhuki megø mɑ bëëdɑ yɑ pɑth ki wëny. Keny-ɑ óbëën be lidhi dyëgɑ, keløg yï ólïdhi ki dyel ɑ́tegø me pɑth ki ɑgid wɑlɑ̀ ree bong kïddì, wɑlɑ̀ órömø me pɑth ki dïtɑ̈ng, óbëëd ɑ́ ɑkwɑl yi yɑn.”
Alöggi Lɑbɑn kinni, “Yɑ ɑ́yïëy! Wiy bëëde ni kɑ ɑ́kwøbií.”
De kì dicyɑ̈ngɑni ceth, Lɑbɑn dyëg ɑ́tegg-ɑ ri gen di kïddì kí møg-ɑ ógeddø, kí møg-ɑ ógwelø ki kïdd-ɑ tɑr, kí dyëg-ɑ lojø bënn gï ɑ́køje wɑ̈yi gen, o wɑ̈dde nenni gen dyëgɑni.
Kɑ dyëgɑni køøle kun me lɑ̈wi ki Yɑgob, kunɑni cɑɑdh kɑ cyɑ̈ng ɑ́dɑ̈g. Dyëg-ɑ ɑ́döng ɑ́korri yi Yɑgob.
Kɑ Yɑgob ókɑ̈bbø ki bɑ̈ddi yenh odɑɑrø, kí ɑkemel, kí ɑ́cøngø, kɑ gï celle, kɑ gï gwede e gööb-ɑ pɑ̈ddi gen wɑ̈g, o kɑ̈jji gen döng gen ge tɑr.
Kɑ lødh møgɑni cwöödhe kɑ̈jj-ɑ nyi mɑ̈ɑ̈dh yi dyëg geki dhög ki pï. Dyëg kí dhög nyi tïg ɑ kenyi bëën gen be mɑdh ki pï.
Codhe, kɑ dyëg nyii tïgø kì bøli lødhɑni. Kɑ møg-ɑ nyi nywøl yi gen nyi nywøl ri gen dɑ kïddì, ge ógeddø.
Kɑ dyëg-ɑ thønhø geki røjj-ɑ thønhø møgɑni køj wɑ̈yi gen yi Yɑgob kì ri møg-ɑ kyeelø, ɑ løg dyëgi Lɑbɑn.
Kenyi tïg møg-ɑ teg (møg-ɑ dëlli gen døøj), kɑ lødh nyi cwöödh bøli gen yi Yɑgob, o gï nenni gen kɑ̀ tïg gen.
De kenyi tïg møg-ɑ nyødh (møg-ɑ dëlli gen rijjø), lødh pɑ nyi cwöödh bøli gen yi Yɑgob. Codhe, kɑ møg-ɑ nywøl yi dhög geki dyëg-ɑ rijjø løg-ɑ mø Lɑbɑn, o møg-ɑ nywøl yi møg-ɑ teg bɑ mø Yɑgob.
Yɑgob ɑ́göög ɑ́ jɑlkɑ̈r kì bɑng gwøng ni menɑni. Kɑ óyïddø ki dhyɑng kí dyel bëne. Kɑ jɑmme óngënyø, yïe dɑ bɑ̈ngg-ɑ mɑ̈nn kí bɑ̈ngg-ɑ cwøw, kí ɑmɑl, kí ɑderr.
Cyɑ̈ng ɑ́kyel kɑ wɑ̈ddi Lɑbɑn lïngi ge okööbø yi Yɑgob. Ge ɑ́kööb kinni, “Yɑgob jɑmmi wïyee ɑ́kwɑnye bënn, bene ɑ bɑnge kɑ̈re.”
Kɑ yod yi Yɑgob kinni Lɑbɑn bëëde ɑ́kedh e órënyø ki en.
Kɑ Yɑgob köbbi yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kinni, “Døøg piny kweyyi wun, yɑ ócyɑ̈dhi ki yïn.”
Codhe, kɑ Rɑceel geki Leɑ̀ cwøøl yethi pwödh yi Yɑgob, kun-ɑ ɑ́ködde ki kɑɑle.
Aköbbe gïn kinni, “Álidh yi yɑn kinni wïyi wun bëëde ɑ́kedh e órënyø ki yɑn, pɑ pɑ̈r ki bëëdi cøn. De Jwøøg wïyɑ yɑ ɑ́korre.
Ngɑ̈nyi yi wun ryeet, kinni yɑ ɑ́göög kì cingi wïyi wun ki gwøg me teg,
de yɑ ɑ́ruj yi en, kɑ kööngɑ wile ki tyel pyɑ̈rø. De Jwøk wïyi wun nuti wiyø yi en, o yɑ gögge ki gïnrɑj.
Keny-ɑ ɑ́kööb Lɑbɑn kinni, ‘Yï ócuggø kwɑnyi dyëg-ɑ ri gen di kïddì bënn gɑ kööngí.’ Kɑ dyëg nywøl-ɑ møg mø ri gen di kïddì.
Menɑni wɑng-ɑ kinni dyëg ɑ́kwɑny yi Jwøk kì yï wïyi wun, kɑ gï mëgge yɑn.
“Yɑ ɑ́lɑ̈gi kì bøli kej tïïg dyëg geki dhög. Yɑ ɑ́lidh-ɑ ónyögg-ɑ tïgø gɑ ɑgid, kí ɑgwel, kí møg-ɑ ócwinyø ki kïddì keti gen ɑ tïgø.
Wëywöni Jwøk ɑ́kööb ki yɑn kì yethi lɑ̈ggɑni, ɑkööbe kinni, ‘Yɑgob!’ Ayïëyɑ kinni, ‘Wööy!’
Kɑ wëywönɑni okööbø kinni, ‘Lïdhí, ónyögg-ɑ bɑ ɑgwel ki møg-ɑ ógeddø geki møg-ɑ ócwinyø ki kïddì, bɑ ge keti gen ɑ tïgø. Gïn ni men gwøg yi yɑn kɑ per kɑ ɑ́lidhɑ gïg-ɑ göggi yïn yi Lɑbɑn bënn.

Bene yɑn Jwøng-ɑ ɑ́cwöb kì bølí kì Betiil, kun-ɑ ɑ́kunyí kömi tungi kïn-ɑ ɑ́cwöödh yi yïn piny ki møw, kɑ yï óköngø kì bølɑ. Anɑn yɑ dwɑdd-ɑ yïn, dhwöödh kì keny, kɑ yï døøg piny-ɑ́ yije ɑ́nywøøl yïn.’ ”
Kɑ Leɑ̀ geki Rɑceel ólöggø kinni, “Bong gïjø men-ɑ ólɑg yi wøn kì bɑng wïyi wøn keny-ɑ óthøwe.
Wø ɑ́mïdhi yi en wø nɑ tyëngpɑth. Wø ɑ́ngëwwe yïn, kɑ ngyëny møg-ɑ ɑ́muuj yi yïn cɑme.
Jwøk jɑmm-ɑ ɑ́kwɑnye bënn kì yï wïyi wøn, bɑ mø wøn, wøki nyigi wøn. De gwøg gïn-ɑ ɑ́köbbi yïn yi Jwøk kinni gwøøg.”
Codhe, kɑ Yɑgob nyige kí mɑ̈nne cïbe kömi ɑmɑl.
Kɑ ge ócɑ̈gø ki døøg yï wïye Isɑɑk kì piny Kɑnɑɑn. Jɑmmi Yɑgob bënn kwøl ɑ bøli gen. Jɑmm-ɑ ɑ́lem yi en bënn kì Töör Arɑm ɑ́kɑ̈l yi en.
Kɑ ngïjji jwöggi gøl Lɑbɑn kwɑl yi Rɑceel, e Lɑbɑn ying-ɑ be teb ki yëyyi dyëge.
Yɑgob, Lɑbɑn jɑl Arɑm ɑ́wënye; nuti köbbø yi en kinni ceg-ɑ dɑ̈ɑ̈g.
Yɑgob ɑ́jwɑn dhwödhø geki tyëng gøle, kɑ Nɑm Porɑt bɑ̈ɑ̈n gen, kɑ ge ókedhø ge töng-ɑ kuni myërri kïtti Gilyɑd.
Kɑ Lɑbɑn olïngø kì bɑng cyɑ̈ng ɑ́dɑ̈g kinni, i Yɑgob pɑ̈ɑ̈rø.
Codhe, kɑ wɑddi gen cønge, kɑ ge reng-ɑ bɑnge. Bɑng cyɑ̈ng ɑ́bïryew, ɑpïïdii kelli kïtti Gilyɑd yi Lɑbɑn.
Kɑ Jwøk bï-ɑ yï Lɑbɑn jɑl Arɑm kì wɑ̈rɑni, ɑkööbe kinni, “Køkødh! Ko di gïjø me köbbí Yɑgob, cɑgg ɑ́ gïndøj wɑlɑ̀ gïnrɑj.”
Yɑgob ɑ́pïïd yi Lɑbɑn, ɑ́pïïd yi en e rum gur ki kɑɑle kì kelli kïttì, codhe kɑ Lɑbɑn geki jøg-ɑ cyɑ̈dhi ki en pëgg-ɑ kelli kïtti Gilyɑd.
Kɑ Yɑgob köbbi yi Lɑbɑn kinni, “Á ngø ɑ ɑ́kedhi wïjí ɑ kɑ̈ɑ̈l nyigɑ de ge ce mɑɑg yïn ɑ yij liny?
Yïde ɑ kwɑɑl rií, kɑ yɑ wëny yi yïn? Yɑde ɑ bɑɑny yɑn ki köbbø? Yï di lwøøg yöö ki dhwɑ̈ng e bullì opwödø, o kɑ̈ngì okodhø.
Yɑ nuti wëggi yïn mɑ̈dhi nyigɑ geki kwɑrrɑ, keny-ɑ ɑ́dhwödh gen. Gïn ni menɑni ɑ́gwøg yi yïn kɑ nøgi wïjí!
Yï di cuggi göggø yi yɑn ki gïnrɑj. De ɑ́wɑ̈ɑ̈r, Jwøøg wïyi wøn yɑ ɑ́kyëdde kinni, i yï ko köbbɑ ki kwøb ying gɑ møg døj wɑlɑ̀ mø rijjø.
Ngɑ̈nyi yi yɑn yï dwɑdd-ɑ døøg pödhi wun, dɑ́ per ngø ɑ kwɑɑl ngïjji jwöggi gølɑ?”
Alöggi Yɑgob kinni, “Yɑ ɑ́ceg-ɑ riɑ ki kwɑlø, mɑ́ yɑ ɑ́bögg-ɑ kinni nyigí ókwɑny yi yïn kì yïɑ.

Keløg e dɑ ngɑn-ɑ óyod yi yïn kì keny, e ngïjji jwöggi gølí kwɑɑny en, ngɑnɑni ceg kɑ nɑ̈gø! Yɑ kööb ɑ bøli wɑddi wun ɑnɑn, dhøgɑ ómïdhɑ. Yɑ̈ɑ̈b ki jɑmm-ɑ bɑ møgí, kɑ jɑmmí kwɑɑny.” Kwïj yi Yɑgob kinni ge ókwɑɑl-ɑ yi Rɑceel.
Kɑ Lɑbɑn oyɑ̈bø kì yij kemi Yɑgob, kì yij kemi Leɑ̀. Kí yij kem-ɑ bëëd yi bɑ̈ngg, de ngïjji jwöggi gøle nuti yood en. Kɑ kedh-ɑ yij kemi Rɑceel e kɑ̈ɑ̈l-ɑ kemi Leɑ̀.
Rɑceel ngïjji jwöggɑni kɑɑn en kelli jɑmmi kömi ɑmɑlø, o bëëd ɑ kömi gïn. Yij kemɑ̀ ɑ́yɑb bëne yi Lɑbɑn, de ge ɑ́cög gï pɑ yode.
Rɑceel wïye ɑ́köbbe kinni, “Wïyø, yï ko mɑg yi liny ki yɑn. Yɑ pɑ cuggi dhwödhi mɑl kì bølí, kipe riɑ dɑ thɑ̈nggɑ.” Codhe, ɑyɑ̈ɑ̈b Lɑbɑn kì yij kemɑ̀ bëne, de ngïjji jwöggi gøle ɑ́cög gï pɑ yode.
Codhe, kɑ Yɑgob mɑg yi liny ki menteg, ɑkööbe kinni, “Á gïn ɑ ɑ́bɑj yi yɑn? Á cigg mɑ ngø ɑ ɑ́pyemɑ, ɑ rïngí kì bɑngɑ?

Jɑmm-ɑ yïɑ bënn yethi gen ɑ́rum ki yɑbø yi yïn, de bong gïjø mɑ mií, mɑ ɑ́yod yi yïn. Keløg e dɑ gïn yood yïn, nyudhí ji bënn kì keny. Cïb bøli wɑddi wun geki wɑddi wøn, kɑ wiy ge kwøb gen ngɑn-ɑ yïe di dyër kì kɑɑmee.
Yɑ ɑ́göög kì cingí ki runn pyɑ̈r ɑ́ryew ɑnɑn. Kì kɑɑmɑni bëne, bong dyel wɑlɑ̀ nyɑɑr dyel me thinh mɑ ɑ́thøw e ceg kɑ nywølø, o bong órömø mɑ ɑ́cɑm yi yɑn kì kelli römmí.
Kenyi di dyel me cɑm yi lɑ̈ɑ̈y pɑ̈l, pɑ nyi muujɑ yïn, de keje nyi col-ɑ yi yɑn kiriɑ, keje nyi kwɑny yi yïn ɑ yïɑ, ying e cɑm-ɑ wɑ̈r wɑlɑ̀ dicɑ̈ng.
Yɑ nyi ceg kɑ nɑ̈gø yi cɑ̈ng kì dicɑ̈ng, o yɑ nyi ceg-ɑ tödø yi yømø kì wɑ̈r kɑ yɑ nyii dhɑ̈lø’ nenø.
Yɑ ɑ́göög yɑ nɑ bɑ̈ng kì yïí ki runn pyɑ̈r ɑ́ryew, runn pyɑ̈rø wïdɑ́ngwen kipe nywømi nyigi ryeet, o runn ɑ́bïkyel møg-ɑ kyeelø kipe yïddø ki dyëgí. Kì kɑɑmɑni bëne köggɑ ɑ́wil yi yïn ki tyel pyɑ̈rø.

De Jwøøg wïyɑ, Jwøøg Abrɑhɑm geki Isɑɑk ɑ́ying-ɑ kömɑ. Keløg e di bëëd e lɑ̈wi ki yɑn, yɑ di ör pödhi wøn yi yïn kɑ cinggɑ. De orɑngɑ ɑ́lidh yi en, ki gwøng teg men-ɑ ɑ́gwøg yi yɑn, ɑkyëdde yïn kì wɑ̈r-ɑ ɑ́wɑ̈ɑ̈.”

Kɑ Yɑgob köbbi yi Lɑbɑn kinni, “Womɑ̈nn møg bɑ nyigɑ. Nyigi gen bɑ møgɑ, o dyëg møg bɑ møgɑ. Jɑmm-ɑ nenni yi yïn kì keny bënn bɑ møgɑ, dɑ́ ngø ɑ ógwøg yi yɑn ɑnɑn kipe nyigɑ geki othønh-ɑ ɑ́nywøl yi gen?
Ceg wɑ lwöbø, kɑ wɑ rööri wɑ piny ki kïttì møg nyi pɑr wɑ lwömɑni.”
Codhe, kɑ Yɑgob ókɑ̈bbø ki kït me dwøng, kɑ gø cwöödhe piny.
Kɑ Yɑgob wɑdde köbbe kinni cung gen ki tuggi kïttì, ɑkwɑny gen tuggi kïttɑni, kɑ gï röör gen piny ge myeer-ɑ mɑl gɑ lwøbb.
Kenyɑni ɑ́cɑg yi Lɑbɑn ɑ́ Yegɑr Sɑdutɑ̀, ɑ wɑngi kïtti lwöbø. De ɑ́cɑg yi Yɑgob ɑ́ Gilyɑd, nyingɑni wɑng-ɑ gïjø ɑ́kyel.
Kɑ Yɑgob köbbi yi Lɑbɑn kinni, “Lwøøb tuggi kïttì møg, bɑ møg nyi pɑ̈ddi wɑ ki lwöm-ɑ kɑɑmee.” Bene ɑ bɑnge cwøllii ɑ́ Gilyɑd.
Kenyɑni nyii cwøllø thyew ɑ́ Midhpɑ̀, mɑ́ e ɑ́kööb thyew kinni, “Wɑ ónenni yi Jwøk kɑ̀ dɑ̈ɑ̈ng wɑ.
Ngɑ̈nyí wøw kinni wɑ kööb ɑ bøli Jwøk, cɑgg e di bëëd e bong ji mø lïngø. Óbëëd e ngɑ̈nyi yi en, ke göggí nyigɑ yi yïn ki gïnrɑj, wɑlɑ̀ ke nyömmí kömi gen ki mɑ̈nn møøgø.
Lwøøb tuggi kïttì men-ɑ ɑ́röör yi yɑn piny èn, bɑ men nyi pɑ̈ddi wɑ ki lwöm-ɑ kɑɑmee.

Lwøøb tuggi kïttì møg geki tungi kïn-ɑ ócwöödh piny èn, bɑ møg nyi pɑ̈ddi wɑ ki lwömee. Lwøøb tuggi kïttì men pɑ cuggi kɑdhø yi yɑn, o yɑ kedhɑ be göggi yïn ki gïnrɑj. Kɑ yï ko bï løøng-ɑ di yɑn be göggi yɑn ki gïnrɑj.
Jwøøg Abrɑhɑm, ɑ bɑ Jwøøg Nɑor, kɑ en ɑ bɑ Jwøøg wëëg gen, wiy e ócɑɑye ngɑn-ɑ ópɑ̈d lwömɑni kì kɑɑmee.” Codhe, kɑ Yɑgob óköngø ki nyingi Jwøng-ɑ nyi mɑlli yi wïye Isɑɑk.
Kɑ Yɑgob ongɑ̈dø ki gëëdhi kì kelli kïttɑni, kɑ wɑddi gen cwøle, o ge cyɑ̈ɑ̈m gen. Acyɑ̈ɑ̈m gen kɑ ge óbuddø kì kelli kïttɑni.
Kì mwøl, ɑdhwödh Lɑbɑn kɑ kwɑrre mɑ̈dhe geki nyige ryeet, kɑ gï kwënge, ɑkedhe kɑ døøg-ɑ pödhi gen.
Keny-ɑ ɑ́lunyi Yɑgob ki kedhø ki yuue, ɑrøøm gen ki wëywöddi Jwøk.
Keny-ɑ ɑ́lidhe gïn, ɑkööbe kinni, “Men bene kɑɑl Jwøk.” Codhe, kɑ kenyɑni cɑge ɑ́ Mɑɑ̈nɑim.
Isøø ómï Yɑgob ɑ́bëëd e ying-ɑ Edöm, ɑ cwøl ɑ́ Seir. Yɑgob ɑ́ödi yï Isøø ki ji,
kɑ gï köbbe kinni, “Köbbu wöödø men Isøø wɑ̈ɑ kinni, ‘Bene møg-ɑ ɑ́kwøb yi Yɑgob bɑ̈ngí ek: Yɑ ɑ́bëëd ɑ buti Lɑbɑn gïti bøli keny-ɑ dwöögɑ èn.
Yïɑ dɑ dhög, kí ɑderr, kí dyel bëne, kí bɑ̈ngg-ɑ mɑ̈nn kí bɑ̈ngg-ɑ cwøw. Wöödø men örɑ’ yïn kɑ per kinni, o wø yïëy yi yïn ki bëënø.”
Kɑ jøg-ɑ ɑ́ör dwöög-ɑ yï Yɑgob ge okööbø kinni, “Wø ɑ́kedhi yï ómyëw Isøø. Bï-ɑ be pɑ̈ɑ̈ri yïn, cyɑ̈dhi kɑ jøg mø kwɑnni gen bɑ miy ɑ́ngwen.”
Kɑ Yɑgob obwøgø, kɑ pyëwe ceg-ɑ olïng. Kɑ ji møg-ɑ cyɑ̈dhi ki en pɑ̈nge gɑ kɑ̈jj ɑ́ryew. Kɑ dyëg kí dhög kí ɑmɑl pɑ̈nge kì dyëri gen thyew. Gï ɑ́pɑ̈nge gɑ kɑ̈dd ɑ́ryew.
Yɑgob ɑ́rømm-ɑ kinni, ke bëën Isøø, kɑ töng-ɑ be nɑ̈gi kɑɑl ɑ́kyel, kɑɑl-ɑ kyeelø órengi kɑ obødhø.
Kɑ Yɑgob okööbø kinni, “Yïn ɑ Jwøøg kweyɑ Abrɑhɑm, kɑ yï løg-ɑ Jwøøg wïyɑ Isɑɑk, Yïn ɑ Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, yɑ ɑ́köbbi yi yïn kinni døøgɑ gøl wøn kì pödhi wøn. Yï ɑ́kööb kinni yɑ ókorri yi yïn kidøøj.

Yɑ ɑ́göggi yi yïn ki gïgdøj mø lod møg-ɑ rømmɑ, kɑ yɑ kor yi yïn kidøøj; keny-ɑ ɑ́bɑ̈ɑ̈nɑ Nɑm Urdun yɑ ceg-ɑ kedhø, ɑ́bɑ̈ɑ̈n yi yɑn yɑ kɑ̈ll-ɑ lodh kete. De ɑnɑn, yɑ nuti nëngi yi yïn ki jɑmmì mø gïïr, mø bɑ kɑ̈dd ɑ́ryew?
Yɑ kwɑjj-ɑ yïn, yiel yɑn ki ómïɑ Isøø. Yɑ óböggø kinni óbï, kɑ wø nɑ̈ge bënn, kí tyëng-ɑ mɑ̈nn geki nyigi gen.
Yɑ ɑ́köbbí kinni, yɑ ókorri yi yïn kidøøj kɑ nyigɑ gwøøg ge gïïr ni ɑyejø kì thɑ̈ngi nɑɑm omelø; ge dhɑ̈li kwɑnø.”
Yɑgob ɑ́nin kì kenyɑni, kɑ okujø ki jɑmmi møg mëggi Isøø kì ri jɑmm-ɑ nud kì yïe.
Ákuj ki dyëg ɑ́tegg gɑ miy ɑ́ryew, kí ónyögg pyɑ̈r ɑ́ryew, kí römm miy ɑ́ryew, kí órömm pyɑ̈r ɑ́ryew.
Kí ɑmɑll-ɑ mɑ̈nn pyɑ̈r ɑ́dɑ̈g kí thönhh pyɑ̈rø, kí ɑderr-ɑ mɑ̈nn pyɑ̈r ɑ́ryew kí thönhh pyɑ̈rø.
Kɑ ɑkud ɑ́kyel köme nyi cïbi ki bɑ̈ng yi Yɑgob, kɑ gï köbbe kinni, “Kedhu mɑl bølɑ, kɑ kɑɑm jɑmmì mïdhi wun ge lɑ̈wi ki møg-ɑ kyeelø.”
Kɑ ge ceg yi Yɑgob ki gïn-ɑ ókwøb yi gen. Bɑ̈ng-ɑ kwølli jɑmm-ɑ mɑl ɑ́köbbe kinni, “Orøøm wun ki ómïɑ Isøø kɑ yï pyëj yi en kinni, ‘Yï bɑ bɑ̈ng men? Yï kedh-ɑ keny? O ɑ́ jɑmmi men ek?’
Codhe, kɑ yï löggí kinni, ‘Ge bɑ mø Yɑgob bɑ̈ngí. Gï ɑ́öre gï mëgge’ yïn, yïn ɑ wɑ̈ɑ Isøø, Yɑgob obëënø thyew kì bɑng wøn.’ ”
Kɑ ryeew bɑ̈ngg ceg yi Yɑgob kinøw, kí dɑ̈ɑ̈g bɑ̈ngg, kí bɑ̈ngg-ɑ kyeelø bënn, gï ɑ́cege kinøw bënn kinni, “Köbbu Isøø gïjø ɑ́kyel wu bënn, keny-ɑ órøøm wun ki en.

Kööb wun kinni, ‘Bɑ̈ngí, Yɑgob obëënø kì bɑng wøn.’ ” Yɑgob ɑ́rum kinni, keløg jɑmm-ɑ muuj yi yɑn örɑ’ bølɑ, Isøø pyëwe ólɑ̈ɑ̈m ki yɑn mɑwɑnø. Codhe, o keny-ɑ óyïddi wøn ki en, o yɑ óyïëye yɑn ɑ́ wɑd.
Codhe, kɑ Yɑgob jɑmm-ɑ ɑ́muuje öre yï Isøø, de en kiree, ɑ́nin kì kenyɑni, kì wɑ̈rɑni.
Kì wɑ̈rɑni kɑ Nɑm Yɑbok bɑ̈ɑ̈n yi Yɑgob geki mɑ̈nne ryeet, kí bɑ̈ngg-ɑ mɑ̈nn ryeet, ki wɑ̈dde gɑ pyɑ̈rø wïdɑ́kyel.
Gøle kí jɑmme bënn ɑ́kïdhe løøg nɑm.
Kɑ Yɑgob odöngø kete.
Kɑ jɑl megø obëënø, kɑ óbyëddø ki Yɑgob, gïti kɑ ɑ́tuul cɑ̈ng ge óbyëddø.
Keny-ɑ ɑ́lidhii yi jɑlɑni kinni Yɑgob dhɑ̈li ki tyɑmø yi en, ɑgøje ɑ́cwiig Yɑgob kɑ orunyø.
Aköbbe Yɑgob kinni, “Wiy yɑ kedhɑ. Cɑ̈ng bï-ɑ mɑl.”
De Yɑgob ɑ́kööb kinni, “Yï ówiy yi yɑn o yï kedh keløg yɑ ókwëng yi yïn.”
Apyëjii yi jɑlɑni kinni, “Nyingí ɑ́ men?”
Alögge kinni, “Yɑgob.”
Kɑ jɑlɑni okööbø kinni, “Á kipe ngø ɑ pyëëj nyingɑ?” Codhe, kɑ Yɑgob kwënge kì kenyɑni.
Codhe, ɑcɑɑg kenyɑni yi Yɑgob ɑ́ Peniel, mɑ́ e ɑ́kööb kinni, “Jwøk ɑ́lidh yi yɑn, de yɑ nudd yɑ onëënø.”
Kɑ cɑ̈ng wɑ̈nh-ɑ mɑl kedh Yɑgob ókedhø kì kenyɑni. Yɑgob ɑ́cyɑ̈dhi e ókwömø yi ɑ́cwige.
Gïti ɑnɑn, tyëng Isrɑil pɑ nyi cyɑ̈mø’ rɑ̈ri ɑ́cwig, mɑ́ Yɑgob ɑ́gøj ɑ kenyɑni.
Kɑ Yɑgob wïje tïnge, ɑlidhe Isøø e obëënø, e cyɑ̈dhi kɑ jøg mø bɑ miy ɑ́ngwen. Codhe, kɑ Yɑgob nyige pɑ̈nge kì kɑɑm Leɑ̀, kí Rɑceel, kí bɑ̈ngg-ɑ mɑ̈nn ryeet.
Kɑ bɑ̈nggɑni geki nyigi gen cïb mɑl yi Yɑgob. Kɑ Leɑ̀ geki nyige cïbe bɑng gïn. Kɑ Rɑceel geki Yosep cïbe cyɑ̈n.
Kɑ Yɑgob kiree kedh-ɑ bøli gen mɑl, kɑ ree bøødhe piny tyel ɑ́bïryew kɑ̈ng-ɑ ɑ́kedhe, e kedh-ɑ yï ómen.
De Isøø ɑ́yöd e reng-ɑ yï Yɑgob, kɑ gø dööbe kööre. Codhe, kɑ nuum kì pïne yi Isøø, kɑ ge óywöngø ryeet.
Isøø keny-ɑ ɑ́tïnge wïje kɑ tyëng-ɑ mɑ̈nn lidhe geki othønhø, ɑpëjje kinni, “Tyëng-ɑ cyɑ̈dhi ki yïn ek bɑ møg?”
Alöggi Yɑgob kinni, “Bene gen nyig-ɑ ɑ́mëggi yɑn yi Jwøk. Yɑ ɑ́göggi yi Jwøk ki gïgdøj, yɑn ɑ bɑ̈ngí.”
Codhe, kɑ bɑ̈nggɑni ryeet kedh-ɑ bøli Isøø geki nyigi gen, kɑ ri gen bøødh gen piny kì bøle.
Kɑ Leɑ̀ geki nyige ólunyø’ kedhø, kɑ ri gen bøødh gen piny kì bøle. Alunyi Rɑceel geki Yosep ki kedhi bøle kì cyɑ̈ɑ̈n gen bënn, kɑ ri gen bøødh gen piny thyew kì bøle.
Apëjji Isøø kinni, “Kɑ ɑ́bëën wø keny, wø ɑ́røøm ki jɑmmì mø gïïr ge okwøllø. Menɑni wɑng-ɑ ngø?”
Alöggi Yɑgob kinni, “Bɑ kipe kinni o pyëw wɑ̈ɑ lɑ̈ɑ̈me ki yɑn.”
Akööb Isøø kinni, “Yïɑ dɑ jɑmmì mø gïïr, ómïɑ. Mïdhí møg-ɑ yïí.”
Kɑ Yɑgob okööbø kinni, “Pɑth! Yɑ kwɑjj-ɑ yïn! Keløg pyëwí mïnø ki yɑn, yïëy gïg-ɑ ɑ́mëggɑ yïn. Pyëwɑ med cɑrø kɑ ɑ́lidhɑ yïn këti, nɑ men-ɑ́ lidhi Jwøk, kipe kɑ ɑ́yïëëy yɑn.
Yɑ kwɑjj-ɑ yïn, kwɑny jɑmm-ɑ ɑ́mëggɑ yïn. Yɑ ɑ́køny yi Jwøk ki mendwøng, o yïɑ dɑ gïïpiny bëne.” Kɑ Isøø oyïëyø ki kwɑnyi jɑmmì kì bɑng kɑ ɑ́kwɑjjii yi Yɑgob.
Codhe, ɑkööb Isøø kinni, “Kedh wɑ, yɑ ócyɑ̈dhi ki wun.”

De ɑ́kyëddi yi Yɑgob kinni, “Wuö, ngɑ̈nyi yi yïn kinni othønhø nyøødh, o kwï jɑmmɑ bɑ ɑ́nyödd nywøli gen thønhø, keløg ge ocirø yi yɑn o ge cyɑ̈dhi gen ki kɑɑm me lɑɑj cyɑ̈ng ɑ́kyel, jɑmmì bɑ møg thøw bënn.
De kedh, møøl bølɑ wuö, bɑ̈ngí óbï bɑngí. Yɑ óbï bɑngí mɑ̈ɑ̈dh, yɑ ócyɑ̈dhi mɑ̈ɑ̈dh kì bɑng dyëg geki othønhø. Wɑ óyïddi kì Seir, wuö.”
Codhe, ɑkööb Isøø kinni, “Keløg ɑ́ kinøw, wiy yï wïyɑ ki kwï jiɑ.”
Kɑ Yɑgob okööbø kinni, “Pɑth! Pɑth! Ge ódwɑddi yi yɑn kɑ per ngø? Gïn-ɑ dwɑddi yi yɑn yøw, bɑ kinni o pyëw wɑ̈ɑ mede ki yɑn.”
Codhe, kɑ Isøø ócɑ̈gø’ døøg Seir kì cyɑ̈ngɑni.
De Yɑgob ɑ́kedhi Suköth. Kɑ ree gëdde ki ød kì kunɑni, kɑ ogëdø ki ɑkɑnnì kipe dhöge geki dyëge. Bene ɑ bɑnge cwølli kenyɑni ɑ́ Suköth, Suköth wɑng-ɑ ɑkɑnnì.
Kɑ Yɑgob wɑ̈dh-ɑ Cekïm kì piny Kɑnɑɑn, ki bëën-ɑ ɑ́bëëne e kɑ̈ɑ̈l-ɑ Töör Arɑm, kɑ pëgg-ɑ buti kɑɑlɑni.
Kɑ piny-ɑ́ yije ɑ́pëgge ngewe kì yï kwɑɑr Amör, wïyi Cekïm ki ngyëny ɑ́tegg miyø.
Kɑ ogëdø ki këli lɑm kì kenyɑni, kɑ gø cɑge ɑ́ Iil, Jwøøg Isrɑil.
Cyɑ̈ng ɑ́kyel, kɑ Dïnɑ̀ nyɑɑr Yɑgob, ɑ meye cwøl ɑ́ Leɑ̀, kedh-ɑ be lidhi nyigi pönhɑni.
Keny-ɑ ɑ́lidhii yi Cekïm wɑ̈d Amör jɑngi pönhɑni, ɑmɑge gøn, kɑ gø ciire be buddø ki en.
De Dïnɑ̀ ɑ́bëëd e myëër cɑrø, ɑmɑɑrii yi Cekïm kɑ gø kwɑjje ki kwøb mø døøj.
Kɑ Amör wïye köbbe kinni, “Nyömmí yɑn nyɑɑn.”
Yɑgob ɑ́lïng ki kër-ɑ ómød nyɑre yi Cekïm, de ɑ́cög e okudø, mɑ́ wɑ̈dde ɑ́bëëd ge tøøk, ge ying-ɑ kɑɑl-ɑ ɑ́köddi yi gen ki dhög.
Kɑ̈ng-ɑ ɑ́yïde bëëni wɑ̈dde, ɑbëën Amör wïyi Cekïm be kwøb ki Yɑgob.

Wɑ̈ddi Yɑgob keny-ɑ ɑ́lïng gen ki gïn-ɑ ɑ́cwöb, ɑdwöög gen kì pɑ̈l-ɑ ɑ́köddi yi gen. Ge ɑ́bëëd pëthi gen rijjø ki mendwøng kì bɑng kɑ ɑ́göggi Isrɑil ki gïnrɑj ni menɑni yi Cekïm. Ábɑ̈jji kɑ ɑ́budde ki nyɑɑr Yɑgob, o bɑ gïjø me bɑ ɑkerø.
De Amör ɑ́lwööb geki nyiimï Dïnɑ̀, ɑkööbe kinni, “Dïnɑ̀ mɑɑr yi wɑ̈dɑ Cekïm ki mendwøng. Yɑ kwɑjj-ɑ wun, wiy gø nywøm yi en.
Wɑ ócuggø nywømi riee, mëggu wøn nyigi wun, o ge nywøm yi wøn, kɑ wu nyömi wun ki nyigi wøn.
Wu óbëëdø kì piny wøn. Piny ɑnɑn, gëëd wun, kɑ wu kwɑ̈ɑ̈y wun, kɑ wu pur wun kì yije.”
Cekïm ɑ́lwööb thyew ki nyiimï Dïnɑ̀ geki wïyi gen, ɑkööbe kinni, “Yïëyu kwɑ̈jjɑ, wu ómëggɑ gïn-ɑ cwøl yi wun.
Cwöddi wun ki gïn-ɑ dwɑddi yi wun ɑ́ kɑ̈ny, o mëggɑ wun. Kɑ wiy yɑ nywømɑ Dïnɑ̀ kete yøw.”
Kwøbbi Cekïm geki wïye ɑ́løøg yi wɑ̈ddi Yɑgob kɑ wëënyø, kipe kɑ ɑ́rënyi Dïnɑ̀ nyimï gen yi Cekïm.
Akööb nyiimëëgɑni kinni, “Nyimï wøn pɑ wëggi wøn nywømø yi wun, mɑ́ wu nuti ngølø. Menɑni bɑ gïnrɑj kì yï wøn.
De wø óyïëy ki nywööm wun keløg wu ógöögø ni wøn, kɑ jøg-ɑ cwøw bënn ngøl kì kɑɑl wun.
Orum wun ki ngølø cyee, o wu nyömi wun ki nyigi wøn. Wø ónyömi thyew ki nyigi wun, kɑ wɑ obëëdø kì pödhø ɑ́kyel, kɑ wɑ ogöögø ki jur ɑ́kyel.
Keløg wu óbɑ̈nyø’ ngølø, Dïnɑ̀ ókwɑny yi wøn kɑ wø ókedhø.”
Møg-ɑ ɑ́kwøb yi gen ɑ́nënni ge døøj kì yï Amör geki Cekïm.
Codhe, kɑ Cekïm jwɑn-ɑ be ngølø, mɑ́ nyɑɑr Yɑgob mɑɑr yi en. Cekïm ɑ́bëëd ɑ́ en ɑ ceg ki wørø ki mendwøng kì gøl gen.
Codhe, kɑ Amör geki Cekïm kedh-ɑ kej burø kì dhø döri kɑɑl gen be kwøb ki jø kɑɑlɑni, ge ɑ́kööb kinni,
“Tyëngɑni dwɑdd-ɑ bëëdø gɑ wɑdd ki wɑ. Wiy ge bëëd gen kì pinyee, kɑ ge göög gen ki jɑmmi gen. Piny lɑɑj. Nyömi wɑ ki nyigi gen, kɑ wiy ge nyömi gen ki nywølee.
De wɑ ceg-ɑ yïëyø ki gïjø ɑ́kyel, Jøg-ɑ cwøw ceg kɑ ngølø bënn kì kɑɑlee ni tyëngɑni. Codhe, o ge yïëy gen ki bëëdø kì pinyee, wɑ ógöögø ki jur ɑ́kyel.
Dhögi gen kí dyëgi gen kí jɑmm-ɑ kyeelø bënn ceg-ɑ gwøg ki møgee, keløg møg-ɑ kømmi yi gen oyïëyø yi wɑ, kɑ ge obëëdø ki wɑ kì pinyee. Gwøg wɑ gïn-ɑ kømmi yi gen.”
Kwøbbɑni ɑ́lïngi yi tyëng-ɑ ɑ́bëëd ge nud kì kenyɑni bënn. Kɑ kwøbbi Amör geki Cekïm yïëy yi gen, kɑ jøg-ɑ cwøw ngøl bënn.
Kɑ cyɑ̈ng ɑ́dɑ̈g opödhø e kɑ̈jj-ɑ ɑ́ngøl nuti nøggø. Abëën wɑ̈ddi Yɑgob ɑ́ryew, Cimeøn geki Leebì, nyiimï Dïnɑ̀, e cinggi gen dɑ pil, kɑ ge pödh-ɑ kɑɑlɑni, kɑ jøg-ɑ cwøw nɑ̈g gen bënn.
Amör ɑ́nɑ̈g yi gen geki wɑ̈de Cekïm, kɑ Dïnɑ̀ kwɑny gen kì gøl Cekïm, kɑ ge ókedhø.
Codhe, kɑ wɑ̈ddi Yɑgob kedh-ɑ kömi kɑɑl-ɑ ɑ́nɑ̈g, kɑ jɑmme kwɑny gen gɑ møg cool kej gïn-ɑ ɑ́göggi nyimï gen yi Cekïm.
Codhe, kɑ nyiimëëgɑni dhög, kí dyëg, kí ɑderr, kí jɑmm-ɑ kɑɑl, kí jɑmm-ɑ yethi pwödh bënn kwɑny yi gen.
Jɑmmi kɑɑlɑni møg-ɑ døj ɑ́kwɑny yi gen bënn, cɑgg ɑ́ jɑmm-ɑ yethi ud, ki tyëng-ɑ mɑ̈nn geki othønhø ɑ́kɑ̈l yi gen bënn.

Kɑ Cimeøn geki Leebì köbbi yi Yɑgob kinni, “Yɑ ɑ́muuj yi wun ki göj. Anɑn, yɑ ómɑɑn yi tyëng Kɑnɑɑn geki tyëng Perïdh, ɑ løg tyëngpiny men. O kwɑnnee nøg ni men, keløg ge órëbø, kɑ ge pɑ̈ɑ̈r-ɑ kömee, yɑ bɑ men nɑ̈g yi gen wøki jiɑ bënn.”
Kɑ ge ólöggø kinni, “Dɑ́ kinni o nyimï wøn gwøge ɑ́ ngɑn nyi tuug yi cwøw?”
Codhe, kɑ Yɑgob tyëng gøle geki tyëng-ɑ bute bënn köbbe kinni, “Weddu ngïjji jwögg-ɑ pɑth møg-ɑ yï wun, kɑ wu lwøggi wun, o wun dhïwi wun, kɑ ógudhi wun wil wun.
Wɑ ceg-ɑ dhwödhø kì keny, wɑ kedh-ɑ Betiil. Jwøng-ɑ ɑ́køny yɑn kì bøli keny-ɑ ɑ́bëëdɑ yɑ orɑngø, ógëddɑ ki këli lɑm kì kunɑni. Ábëëd e cyɑ̈dhi kɑ yɑn kì kɑ̈jj-ɑ ɑ́cyɑ̈dhɑ bënn.”
Codhe, kɑ ngïjji jwögg-ɑ pɑth møg-ɑ yï gen, geki gwell-ɑ yïthhi gen bënn mëggi gen Yɑgob. Kɑ ge koony thɑ óthur-ɑ dwøng kì buti Cekïm yi Yɑgob.
Codhe, kɑ Yɑgob odhwödhø geki wɑ̈dde kì kenyɑni. De tyëng myërr-ɑ cyɑ̈gi ɑ́göjji wɑ̈ɑ̈rø yi Jwøk, kɑ ge ocögø ge pɑ løg bɑng gen.
Kɑ Yɑgob geki tyëng-ɑ cyɑ̈dhi ki en bënn kedh-ɑ Ludh, kɑɑl-ɑ cwølli ɑnɑn ɑ́ Betiil, kì piny Kɑnɑɑn.
Kɑ Yɑgob ogëdø ki këli lɑm kì kunɑni, ɑcɑge gøn ɑ́ Betiil, ɑ wɑngi ød Jwøk, mɑ́ Jwøk ɑ́cwöb kì bøle kì kenyɑni wɑɑng-ɑ ɑ́pɑ̈ɑ̈re, e bwøg-ɑ ómen.
Kɑ Debörɑ̀ 'mïdhi nyigi Rebekɑ̀ othøø, kɑ koony thɑ óthur-ɑ Betiil, kɑ kenyɑni cɑg gen ɑ́ “Óthuri Ywøg.”
Keny-ɑ ɑ́dwöög Yɑgob kì Töör Arɑm, Jwøk ɑ́cwöb kì bøle kɑ gyëdhe.
Kɑ köbbi yi Jwøk kinni, “Nyingí cwøl ɑ́ Yɑgob, de yï pɑ cigi cwøllø yïn ɑ́ Yɑgob, nyingí ócwøl ɑ́ Isrɑil.” Codhe, ɑcɑge gøn ɑ́ Isrɑil.
Aköbbii yi Jwøk kinni, “Yɑ bene Jwøk Áyïmø. Nywøøl kɑ yï ngënyí, kɑ yï göög yïn ɑ́ pödhø. Yï ógöögø ki kweyi jurrì mø gïïr, kɑ yï løg-ɑ kweyi rɑ̈nhì.
Piny-ɑ ɑ́mëggɑ Abrɑhɑm geki Isɑɑk ómëggɑ yïn, wuki kwɑrrí.”
Akedhi Jwøk mɑl, kɑ gø wiye keny-ɑ ɑ́di gen.
Kɑ Yɑgob cwödh-ɑ piny ki kït kì keny-ɑ ɑ́kööb gen ki Jwøk, kɑ kömi kïnɑni kunye ki møgi oløg geki møw møg thyëye gøn Jwøk.
Keny-ɑ ɑ́kööb yi Yɑgob geki Jwøk gø ɑ́cɑge ɑ́ Betiil.
Kɑ ge odɑ̈gø kì Betiil. Kɑ Rɑceel pïïd yi pɑ̈dhi piny ge nuti wɑ̈nhi Eprɑtɑ̀ ki kɑɑm me lɑɑj,
de ɑ́bëëd ɑ́ pɑ̈dhi piny me rɑɑj. Kɑ̈ng-ɑ bëëde e orɑngø kinøw, ɑköbbii yi gɑ̈ɑ̈mi kinni, “Yï ko böggi Rɑceel. Yï nywøl-ɑ wɑ̈d megø.”
Wɑ̈nɑni ɑ́nywøl yi Rɑceel, de Rɑceel kiree ɑ́thøw. Wɑ̈nɑni ɑ́cɑge ɑ́ Ben Onì,
Athøw Rɑceel. Kɑ koony kö yuu Eprɑtɑ̀, kɑɑl-ɑ cwøl ɑ́ Betleem ɑnɑn.
Kɑ Yɑgob cwödh-ɑ piny ki kït kì wïj röre, ɑ́ kïn-ɑ nyi pɑɑr Rɑceel, gïti dicyɑ̈ngtïn, nud kì kenyɑni.
Codhe, kɑ Yɑgob ódøøgø wɑ̈di yöö, kɑ gudd-ɑ buti ønbɑ̈r kì Eder.
Yɑgob yïe ɑ́dɑ wɑ̈dd pyɑ̈rø wïdɑ́ryew.
Wɑ̈ddi Leɑ̀ cï Yɑgob nyɑn-ɑ dwøng bɑ ɑ́bïkyel: Ruben, wɑ̈n-ɑ kɑyø, kí Cimeøn, kí Leebì, kí Yeudɑ̀, kí Isɑkɑr, kí Dhebulun.
Ányöddi ki wɑ̈dd ɑ́ryew yi Rɑceel: Yosep kí Ben Yɑmïn.
Ányöddi ki wɑ̈dd ɑ́ryew yi Bilɑ̀ bɑ̈ng Rɑceel: Dɑn kí Nɑptɑlì.
Kɑ nyöddi ki wɑ̈dd ɑ́ryew yi Dhilpɑ̀ bɑ̈ng Leɑ̀, Gɑd kí Aceer. Bene gen wɑ̈ddi Yɑgob ɑgɑk, møg-ɑ ɑ́nywøl kì Töör Arɑm.
Isɑɑk ɑ́bëëd ki runn miyø kí pyɑ̈r ɑ́bïdɑ̈g.
Athøw Isɑɑk kì cyɑ̈ɑ̈n piny cyee, e rum yöø ki mendwøng. Kɑ kony yi Isøø geki Yɑgob wɑ̈dde.
Men bɑ gøl Isøø, ɑ løg Edöm.
Isøø ɑ́nyömi ki nyigi piny Kɑnɑɑn; Adɑ̀ nyɑɑr Elön kwɑɑr Kit. Kí Olibɑmɑ̀ nyɑɑr Anɑ̀ wɑ̈d Dhibeon kwɑɑr Kit,
kí Bɑsemɑth nyɑɑr Icmɑil, nyimï Nibɑyoth.
Kɑ Adɑ̀ Isøø nyödde ki wɑ̈d me cwøl ɑ́ Elipɑdh. Kɑ Bɑsemɑth nywøl-ɑ Reuel.
Kɑ Olibɑmɑ̀ nywøl-ɑ Yeuc, kí Yɑlɑm, kí Körɑ̀. Bene gen wɑ̈ddi Isøø ɑgɑk, møg-ɑ ɑ́nywøl kì piny Kɑnɑɑn.
Codhe, kɑ Isøø mɑ̈nne, kí wɑ̈dde, kí nyige womɑ̈nn, kí tyëng-ɑ gøle bënn, kí dhöge, kí dyëge, kí jɑmme bënn kwɑnye, kɑ dɑ̈g-ɑ piny megø me lɑ̈wi ki keny-ɑ bëëd yi ómen Yɑgob.
Jɑmmi Isøø geki jɑmmi Yɑgob ɑ́kedh ge óngënyø, kɑ piny ódhïngø yi gen. Piny-ɑ́ yije ɑ́di gen ɑ́dhïngi kɑ ge ódhɑ̈lø bëëdø kì yije, mɑ́ dhög kí dyëg ɑ́ngënyi ki mendwøng.
Codhe, kɑ Isøø dɑ̈g-ɑ kelli Kïti Seir (nyingi Isøø cwøl ɑ́ Edöm thyew).
Bene lwömi gøl Isøø ɑnɑn. En ɑ bɑ kweyi tyëng Edöm, møg-ɑ bëëdø kì kelli kïttì Seir.

Isøø ɑ́nyöddi ki wɑ̈d me cwøl ɑ́ Elipɑdh yi Adɑ̀ cyëge. Kɑ Elipɑdh onywølø ki wɑ̈dd ɑ́bïj: Temɑn, kí Omɑr, kí Dhepö, kí Gɑtɑm, kí Kenɑdh. Kɑ nyöddi yi cyëge me cwøl ɑ́ Timnɑ̀, ki wɑ̈d me cwøl ɑ́ Amɑlek.
Isøø ɑ́nyöddi yi cyëge Bɑsemɑth ki wɑ̈d me cwøl ɑ́ Reuel, kɑ Reuel onywølø ki wɑ̈dd ɑ́ngwen: Nɑɑ̈th, kí Dherɑ̀, kí Cɑmɑ̀, kí Mïdhɑ̀.
Dɑ̈ɑ̈g mɑ̈nni Isøø bɑ Olibɑmɑ̀ nyɑɑr Anɑ̀. Anɑ̀ bɑ wɑ̈d Dhibeon. Isøø geki Olibɑmɑ̀ ɑ́nywøl-ɑ Yeuc, kí Yɑlɑm, kí Körɑ̀.
Bene jø wïj gøl Isøø ɑgɑk, wɑ̈d Isøø nyel-ɑ dwøng bɑ Elipɑdh. En ɑ ree ɑ́kɑ̈ɑ̈l yi pëjjì møg: Temɑn, Omɑr, Dhepö, Kenɑdh,
Körɑ̀, Gɑtɑm kí Amɑlek. Bene gen pëjji gøl Elipɑdh kì piny Edöm. Ge bɑ kwɑrri Adɑ̀.
Reuel wɑ̈d Isøø ɑ bɑ wïyi pëjjì møg: Nɑɑ̈th, Dherɑ̀, Cɑmɑ̀, kí Mïdhɑ̀. Bene gen pëjji gøl Reuel kì piny Edöm. Ge bɑ kwɑrri Bɑsemɑth cï Isøø.
Olibɑmɑ̀ cï Isøø ɑ́nywøl-ɑ pëjjì møg: Yeuc, Yɑlɑm, kí Körɑ̀. Bene gen pëjjì møg-ɑ kɑ̈ɑ̈l ri cï Isøø, Olibɑmɑ̀ nyɑɑr Anɑ̀.
Bene gen wɑ̈ddi Isøø. Isøø ɑ cwøl ɑ́ Edöm. O møgɑk bene gen pëjji gen.
Møg bɑ wɑ̈ddi Seir kwɑɑr Orït ɑ ɑ́bëëd kì piny Edöm, Lötɑn, Cöbɑl, Dhibeon kí Anɑ̀,
Dïcön, Edher kí Dïcɑn. Bene gen wɑ̈ddi Seir jɑl Orït, møgɑni ɑ́bëëd gɑ pëjjì kì Edöm.
Wɑ̈ddi Lötɑn bɑ Örì, kí Ëmɑm. (Timnɑ̀ bɑ nyimï Lötɑn.)
Wɑ̈ddi Cöbɑl bɑ Albɑn, Mɑnɑɑth, Ebɑl, Cepì, kí Onɑm.
Wɑ̈ddi Dhibeon bɑ Aiyɑ̀, kí Anɑ̀. Anɑ̀ bene jɑl-ɑ ɑ́yod wɑɑng pïg-ɑ lyëdh kì yij ryɑng, e kwɑy-ɑ ɑderr kì wɑ̈ye.
Anɑ̀ bɑ wïyi Dïcön, ɑ løg kweyi Olibɑmɑ̀ nyɑɑr Anɑ̀.
Wɑ̈ddi Dïcön bɑ Ëmdɑn, Ecbɑn, Ithrɑn, kí Kerɑn. Yïe ɑ́dɑ nyɑre me cwøl ɑ́ Olibɑmɑ̀.
Wɑ̈ddi Edher bɑ Bilɑɑn, Dhɑbɑn, kí Akɑn.
Wɑ̈ddi Dïcɑn bɑ Udh kí Arɑn.
Bene nyingi pëjji Orït ek: Lötɑn, Cöbɑl, Dhibeon, Anɑ̀,
Dïcön, Edher kí Dïcɑn. Jøgɑni bene gen pëjji kɑ̈lli Orït møg-ɑ ɑ́bëëd kì piny Edöm.
Møg bene gen rɑ̈nhh-ɑ ɑ́jyɑ̈ɑ̈g kì piny Edöm, e tyëng Isrɑil nudd yï gen bong rɑ̈dh,
Belɑ̀ wɑ̈d Beor, nyingi pɑɑre cwøl ɑ́ Dinɑbɑ̀.
Yöbɑb wɑ̈d Dherɑ̀, pɑɑre bɑ Bodhrɑ̀.
Ucɑm kì Temɑn.
Adɑd wɑ̈d Bedɑd, kì Abith. (En ɑ ɑ́tyɑm Midyɑn kí Moɑb.)
Sɑlmɑ̀ ɑ pɑɑre cwøl ɑ́ Mɑsrekɑ̀.
Cɑul ɑ pɑɑre cwøl ɑ́ Reöböth kì kömi Nɑm Porɑt.
Bɑɑl Anɑn wɑ̈d Akbör
Adɑd jɑl Pɑu, (cyëge cwøl ɑ́ Meëtɑbel nyɑɑr Mɑtred wɑ̈d Medhɑɑb.)

Pëjji Edöm møg-ɑ bɑ ɑgwed kì kɑ̈lli gen, kí myërri gen, ge bɑ kwɑrri Isøø. Nyingi gen bɑ: Timnɑ̀, Albɑ̀, Yetheth, Olibɑmɑ̀, Elɑ̀, Pïnön, Kenɑdh, Temɑn, Mibdhɑr, Mɑgdiel kí Irɑm. Bene gen ɑ ɑ́bëëd gɑ pëjji Edöm. Isøø ɑ bɑ kweyi tyëng Edöm. Keny-ɑ́ yije ɑ́bëëd yi kɑl kì kelli kɑ̈llɑni nyi cöll-ɑ nyingi gølɑni.
Yɑgob ɑ́bëëd ɑ piny Kɑnɑɑn, keny-ɑ ɑ́bëëd yi wïye kɑ̈ge dööng.
O men bɑ lwöbø kì ri bëëdi gøl Yɑgob, ɑ løg Yosep geki nyiiwɑ̈n.
Yosep e runne bɑ pyɑ̈rø wïdɑ́bïryew, ɑ́kwɑy-ɑ dyëg, e nyi køny-ɑ nyiiwɑ̈n, wɑ̈ddi Bilɑ̀ kí Dhilpɑ̀ mɑ̈nni wïye Yɑgob. Kɑ gïgrijjø møg-ɑ nyi gwøg yi nyiiwɑ̈n nyi köbbe wïye Yɑgob.
Kɑ Yosep mɑɑr yi Yɑgob ki mendwøng kibøli wɑ̈dde bënn, kipe kɑ̀ bëëde ɑ́ nyelthinh me døøj, o wïje pel, kɑ gø gögge ki ógødh me kïdde myëër.
Keny-ɑ ɑ́lidhii yi nyiiwɑ̈n kinni Yosep mɑɑr kibøli gen yi wïyi gen, ɑmɑɑn ge gøn ki mendwøng, kɑ ge ówïyø kwøb ki en.
Kɑ Yosep ólɑ̈gø kì wɑ̈r. Keny-ɑ ɑ́köbbe lɑ̈ggɑni nyiiwɑ̈n, kɑ ceg-ɑ pëddø ki mɑɑnø yi gen.
Gï ɑ́köbbe kinni, “Lïngu lɑ̈g møg-ɑ ɑ́lɑ̈gi yi yɑn,
Wɑ ying-ɑ pwödhø, wɑ bënn, wɑ otöjø ki thyɑng. Kɑ thyɑngg-ɑ ɑ́twöj yi yɑn ócungø ri gen cwöödh gen piny. Kɑ wɑ̈thi thyɑnggi wun obëënø, kɑ thyɑnggɑ wen gen dïdyër, ɑbøødh gen ri gen piny.”
Kɑ pyëj yi nyiiwɑ̈n kinni, “Yï rømm-ɑ kinni yï ógöögø ki rɑ̈dh, kɑ wø jɑɑg yi yïn?” Kɑ pëthi gen ti-ɑ rënyø ki gøn kì bɑng lɑ̈gge, ki kipe kenyi kööbe thyew e nɑ ngɑn pere teg.
Yosep ɑ́cigi lɑ̈gø, ɑköbbe nyiiwɑ̈n kinni, “Yɑ ɑ́lɑ̈gi këti, kì yethi lɑ̈ggɑni, yɑ ɑ́lidh-ɑ cɑ̈ng kí dwɑ̈y, kí kyell pyɑ̈rø wïdɑ́kyel, ri gen bøødh gen piny kì bølɑ.”
Lɑ̈ggɑni ɑ́köbbe wïye thyew, kɑ cɑ̈wwi yi wïye kinni, “Á lɑ̈g mø ngø ɑ bëëdø kinøw? Yï rømm-ɑ kinni meyí kí nyiimyëw, kí yɑn, wø bɑ møg-ɑ óbï, kɑ ri wøn bøødh wøn piny kì bølí?”
Kɑ nyiiwɑ̈n yethi gen mɑg yi tyiel, de wïye møgɑni mïdhe’ mïdhø kì pyëwe.
Cyɑ̈ng ɑ́kyel, e nyiiwï Yosep wɑ̈dhi Cekïm be kwɑ̈yø ki jɑmmi wïyi gen,
ɑ ɑ́köbbi Yosep yi Yɑgob kinni, “Yɑ dwɑdd-ɑ öri yïn Cekïm kun-ɑ ɑ́kwɑ̈yyi yi nyiiwöw.”
Alöggi Yosep kinni, “Døj, yɑ ókedh.”
Kɑ wïye okööbø kinni, “Kedh, lidh nyiiwöw mɑ yöd dëlli gen, kí dyëg mɑ nud gen. Kɑ yï dwöög be köbbi yɑn.” Codhe, ɑöre gøn kì Töör Kibrön.
Kɑ Yosep wɑ̈dh-ɑ Cekïm,
ɑlidhii e wɑ̈dh-ɑ wïïnø yi jɑl megø. Apyëje gøn kinni, “Á ngø ɑ yɑb yi yïn?”
Alögge kinni, “Yɑ yɑb-ɑ nyiimïɑ, köbbí yɑn, ge kwɑ̈ɑ̈y ɑ keny?”
Jɑlɑni ɑ́kööb kinni, “Ge ɑ́kedh kì keny, ge ɑ́lïngi yi yɑn ge okööbø kinni, ‘Kedhi wɑ Döthɑn.’ ” Kɑ Yosep kedh-ɑ bɑng nyiiwɑ̈n, ɑyode gïn kì Döthɑn.
Álidh yi gen e nudd e lɑ̈wi, kɑ ge okööbø ki ri gen, e nuti wɑ̈nhi buti gen kinni, ge dwɑdd-ɑ nɑ̈gii.
Akööb gen kinni, “Jɑɑl lɑ̈g ɑ́bï!
Nɑ̈g wɑ en, kɑ leeng wɑ yij yith ɑ́kyel kì kelli yïïth-ɑ thwøwø ek. Wɑ ókööbø kinni, ɑ́cɑm yi lɑ̈ɑ̈y pɑ̈l. O lidh yi wɑ mɑ løge’ ngø ɑ ónywøl yi lɑ̈gge!”
Keny-ɑ ɑ́lïngi møgɑni yi Ruben, kɑ ree pɑ̈nye ki yieli Yosep, ɑkööbe kinni, “Ko nɑ̈g wɑ,
wɑ̈dhi wɑ en ki leeng yij yith kì pɑ̈l keny. De ko nyïɑ̈g wɑ.” Møgɑni ɑ́kwøbe ceth, e orumø kinni dwɑdd-ɑ yieli Yosep. O gø dögge wïye.
Keny-ɑ ɑ́wɑ̈nhi Yosep buti gen, ɑmɑg ge gøn, kɑ ógønh-ɑ rug yi en, luny gen wɑ̈g, eni ógønh-ɑ kïdde myëër.
Kɑ Yosep kɑ̈l gen, ɑleeng ge gøn yij yith me thwøwø.

Keny-ɑ ɑ́rum Yosep ki leeng yij yith, ɑcɑ̈gi gen ki cɑm, kedh Ruben kedh-ɑ be lyeewi dyëg kun-ɑ ɑ́cɑ̈mmi yi gen. Kɑ̈ng-ɑ́ nudd ge ocyɑ̈mø, ɑ́lidh gen kwɑrri Icmɑil møg-ɑ nyi ngyëwi ge kɑ̈ɑ̈l-ɑ Gilyɑd, o ge kedh-ɑ Rïp. Kömi ɑmɑlli gen dɑ gïg-ɑ yømi gen med, møg-ɑ nyi kïdhi ri mulø, ni cumɑ̈r ki pïlpïl.
Kɑ Yeudɑ̀ nyiimen köbbe kinni, “Á ngø ɑ óyod yi wɑ, ke nɑ̈g wɑ ómïee, kɑ kɑn yi wɑ?
Ngëwwi wɑ en tyëngngyëwø, o cöge e pɑ nyïɑ̈g yi wɑ, mɑ́ e ceg bëëdø e bɑ ómïee, ki reme geki dële.” Ayïëy nyiimen.

Keny-ɑ ɑ́wɑ̈nhi jøngyew møgɑni buti gen, kɑ nyiimëëgɑni Yosep mïïd gen wɑ̈g kì yij yith. Kɑ gø ngëwwi gen tyëngɑni ki ngyëny ɑ́tegg pyɑ̈r ɑ́ryew. Kɑ kïdhi Rïp yi tyëng-ɑ ɑ́ngewii, gen ɑ kwɑrri Icmɑil mø kɑ̈ɑ̈l Midyɑn.
Keny-ɑ ɑ́døøg Ruben wïj yith, ɑyode Yosep e tøøk, kɑ ógødhe kɑge yi rɑ̈ɑ̈m pyëwe.
Adwööge yï nyiimen, ɑkööbe kinni, “Nyelthinh tøøk, o yɑ göög ɑ dï cyee?”
Codhe, ɑkwɑny gen ógødh kïdø mi Yosep, kɑ ge ngɑ̈dø ki ónywøg me thiinh, kɑ ógønhɑni jwɑ̈ɑ̈g gen yij remø.
Kɑ ógødh kïdø menɑni muuj gen wïyi gen, ɑkööb gen kinni, “Lidh gïn-ɑ ɑ́yod yi wøn. Ngij, bɑ ógødh wɑ̈dí?”
Kɑ gø ngije, ɑkööbe kinni, “Ngee, bɑ mee! Ácɑm yi lɑ̈y me rɑj. Wɑ̈dɑ Yosep ɑ́cɑm yi lɑ̈ɑ̈y pɑ̈l!”
Kɑ Yɑgob ógødhe kɑge, kɑ ree töjje ki kwɑ̈llì, kɑ ocögø e ywøg-ɑ wɑ̈de ki cyɑ̈ng mø gïïr.
Wɑ̈dde kí nyige womɑ̈nn bënn ɑ́bï be lugii, de ɑ́dhɑ̈li lugø. Kɑ okööbø kinni, “Yɑ ópïïd yi thøø, yɑ nudd yɑ óywöngø ki wɑ̈dɑ.” Codhe, kɑ tyëg-ɑ piny e óywöngø ki wɑ̈de Yosep.
Kì Rïp, Yosep ɑ́ngëwwi Pøtipɑr yi kwɑrri Icmɑil. Pøtipɑr ɑ́bëëd ɑ́ jɑngi ɑlɑthkerr møg-ɑ nyi kor gøl rɑ̈dh.
Kì bɑng kenyɑni, kɑ Yeudɑ̀ odhwödhø kì buti nyiimen, kɑ dɑ̈g-ɑ buti jɑl kɑɑl Adulɑm me cwøl ɑ́ Kirɑ̀.
Kɑ nyɑn mɑ nyɑɑr Kɑnɑɑn me nyingi wïye cwøl ɑ́ Cuɑ̀, lidhe kì kunɑni, kɑ gø nywøme.
Kɑ nyɑnɑni óyɑɑjø, ɑnywøle ki wɑ̈d, kɑ gø cɑge ɑ́ Er.
Kɑ cig-ɑ yɑɑjø, ɑnywøle ki wɑ̈d megø, kɑ gø cɑge ɑ́ Onɑ̈n.
Kɑ cig-ɑ yɑɑjø këti, ɑpɑ̈dhe piny kì Akdhïb ki wɑ̈d kɑ gø cɑge ɑ́ Celɑ̀.
Kɑ Yeudɑ̀ wɑ̈de, Er nyel-ɑ kɑyø, nyöme ki dhɑjø me cwøl ɑ́ Tɑmɑr.
O kì bɑng kɑ ɑ́bëëd Er kɑyi Yeudɑ̀ orøngø, kɑ nɑ̈g yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j.
Kɑ Onɑ̈n köbbi yi Yeudɑ̀ kinni, “Kedhu ød wuki cï ómyëw, o ómyëw nyöddi yi yïn ki wïj.”
Kɑ yod yi Onɑ̈n kinni nywøl koo bëëdø gɑ møge. Kɑ tyew nyi kønye piny kenyi budde ki cï ómen, kipe kinni o wïj ómen cöge gø pɑ nywøl yi en.
Kɑ cɑy yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kipe gïn-ɑ ɑ́gwøg yi en, ɑnɑ̈ge gøn thyew.

Kɑ Yeudɑ̀ kwɑre Tɑmɑr köbbe kinni, “Kedh bëëd kì gøl wïyí, mɑ́ yïí bong jɑlø. Bëëd kì kunɑni gïti keny-ɑ ódøngi Celɑ̀ wɑ̈dɑ.” Mɑ́ e ɑ́rum kinni, óthøw thyew ni nyiimen. Codhe, kɑ Tɑmɑr kedh-ɑ be bëëdø kì gøl wïye.
Kì bɑng keny me bɑ̈ɑ̈r, kɑ cï Yeudɑ̀ othøø. Keny-ɑ ɑ́rume ywøgi cyëge, kɑ kedh-ɑ Timnɑ̀ kun-ɑ teb yëyyi dyëge, geki mɑ̈dhe Kirɑ̀ jɑl Adulɑm.
Kɑ Tɑmɑr köbbi kinni, “Kweyí obëënø e kedh-ɑ be tebi yëyyi dyëge.”

Kɑ thøll-ɑ ywøøge jɑlgøle lunye wɑ̈g, kɑ wïje kume ki thɑrɑ̀, ɑkode ree ki ógudh, kɑ pëgg-ɑ tøg yuu Enɑim kì kö yuu Timnɑ̀. Mɑ́ gø ngɑ̈nyi yi en kinni, Celɑ̀ wɑ̈d Yeudɑ̀ ɑ́rum ki døngø, o ɑ́cög ge nuti kïdhi ød ki en.
Keny-ɑ ɑ́lidhii yi Yeudɑ̀, ɑrume kinni bɑ ngɑn nyi niin ki köögi, mɑ́ wïje bɑ ɑkum.
Kɑ kedh-ɑ yïe kì tøg yöö, ɑkööbe kinni, “Døj, yï nyi køøg kɑ ngyëny ɑ́dï?” Ábëëd gø kwïje kinni bɑ cï wɑ̈de.
Akööb nyɑnɑni kinni, “Ngø? Yɑ culí ngyëny kɑ̀ buddi wɑ?”
Kɑ Yeudɑ̀ okööbø kinni “Yï óödi yi yɑn ki dyel nyibwøng kì kelli dyëgɑ.”
De nyɑnɑni ɑ́löggi kinni, “Yɑ ceg-ɑ mɑ̈gø ki gïïpiny kì yïí. Ódöggɑ yïn keny-ɑ ókɑ̈ɑ̈l dyel.”
Kɑ Yeudɑ̀ okööbø kinni, “Á gïjø mɑ ngø, ɑ dwɑddi yi yïn o mëggɑ yïn?”
Kɑ nyɑnɑni ólöggø kinni, “Kitimí geki thøle, kí lodhí.” Codhe, kɑ gï mëgge gøn. Kɑ ge óbuddø, kɑ nyɑnɑni yɑɑj yi en.
Codhe, kɑ nyɑnɑni ókedhø’ wɑ̈ye. Kɑ thɑr-ɑ ɑ́kume wïje kɑ̈ɑ̈le wɑ̈g, kɑ thøll-ɑ ywøøge jɑlgøle dwøøge ree.
Dyel ɑ́muuj yi Yeudɑ̀ kɑ kɑ̈l yi mɑ̈dhe, jɑl Adulɑm, o pɑ̈ɑ̈de jɑmm-ɑ ɑ́mɑg yi ngɑnɑni, de ngɑnɑni nuti yood en.
Kɑ tyëng kɑɑlɑni pyëje kinni, “Ngɑn nyi niin ki köögi men-ɑ ɑ́bëëd kì tøg yöö ying-ɑ keny?”
De ge ɑ́kyëëd kinni, “Bong ngɑn nyi niin ki köögi mɑ ɑ́bëëd e ying-ɑ keny.”
Codhe, ɑdøøge yï Yeudɑ̀, kɑ okööbø kinni, “Ngɑnɑni nuti yood yɑn, o tyëng kɑɑlɑni ɑ́kyëëd thyew kinni i bong ngɑn nyi niin ki köögi mɑ ɑ́ying kenyɑni.”
Kɑ Yeudɑ̀ okööbø kinni, “Wiy mïdhe gïn kipe wɑ ógöögø ki møg ngedhi yi teedø. Ádwɑddɑ’ mëggi dyel men, de ɑ́cög e pɑ yod yi yïn.”
Kì bɑng dwɑ̈tt ɑ́dɑ̈g, kɑ Yeudɑ̀ köbbi kinni, “Tɑmɑr cï wɑ̈dí ɑ́göög ɑ́ ngɑn nyi niin ki köögi, men-ɑ́ yije dɑ dhɑnhø me yood en ki cwøw-ɑ yɑb yi en.”
Kɑ Yeudɑ̀ okööbø kinni, “Kïdhu en be rɑ̈bø.”
Keny-ɑ ɑ́kɑ̈ɑ̈lii e kïdh-ɑ be rɑ̈bø, ɑöde yï kweye kinni, “Jɑl-ɑ ɑ́yɑj yɑn, en ɑ bɑ wïi jɑmmì møg.” Kɑ cig-ɑ kwøb kinni, “Bɑ mø men eni loonh geki kitim?”
Ge ɑ́ngij yi Yeudɑ̀, ɑkööbe kinni, “Nyɑnɑni tir kibølɑ, mɑ́ e ɑ́cög e nuti kïdhi ød yi yɑn geki Celɑ̀ wɑ̈dɑ.” Kɑ ocögø e pɑ buddi geki nyɑnɑni këti.
Keny-ɑ ɑ́bëën kej pɑ̈dhe piny, ɑ́yod yije dɑ ɑcwegg!
Kɑ̈ng-ɑ́ nudd e ceg kɑ gɑmø, kɑ ɑ́kyel kì kelli ɑcweggɑni cinge cude wɑ̈g. Kɑ cingɑni töjji ki korø me kwɑrø yi gɑ̈ɑ̈mi ɑ́ men ngijii kinni bɑ en ɑ ɑ́kwöngi ki bëën wɑ̈g.
De kɑ ɑ́rum korø ki twöjø, kɑ cinge dwøøge, kɑ ómen bï-ɑ wɑ̈g. Kɑ gɑ̈ɑ̈mi okööbø kinni, “Yïde ɑ cɑɑg pönhø ki pönhi dwøng?” Acɑɑg nyinge ɑ́ Peredh.
Alunyi ómen nyel-ɑ cinge di korø ki bëën wɑ̈g, kɑ cɑg ɑ́ Dherɑ̀.
Kwɑrri Icmɑil, keny-ɑ ɑ́kïdhi Yosep Rïp yi gen, gø ɑ́ngëwwi gen Pøtipɑr, jɑl ɑ́kyel kì kelli jyɑ̈ggi tøg buri rɑ̈ɑ̈dh Rïp. En ɑ ɑ́bëëd ɑ́ jɑngi ɑlɑthkerr.
Yosep ɑ́køny yi Jwøk kɑ jɑmm-ɑ nyi gøggi yi en bënn nyi pɑ̈dh-ɑ kɑ̈jji gen. Ábëëd ɑ gøl jɑl-ɑ ɑ́ngewii, jɑl Rïp.
Kɑ yod yi jɑlɑni kinni, Yosep mɑɑr yi Jwøk, kɑ gwøng-ɑ nyi mëggii nyi gwøge kidøøj.
Pøtipɑr pyëwe ɑ́bëëd e med ki Yosep. Kɑ gø cïbe ɑ́ jɑgø kì kömi gøle. Kɑ jɑmme bënn cïbe cingi Yosep.
Kɑ gøl jɑl Rïp gyëdh yi Jwøk kipe Yosep. Kɑ jɑmme óngënyø.
Pøtipɑr jɑmme ɑ́cïbe cingi Yosep ge bënn, bong gïjø me rømme den-ɑ́ gïn-ɑ cɑm yi en kete, ɑ nyi pëjje jɑlthɑl.
Yosep ɑ́bëëd dële døøj, o bøle myëër.
Kì bɑng keny megø, kɑ Yosep tyer yi cï jɑlkɑl. Kɑ gø kwɑjje kinni, “Bïí ødɑ, o wɑ buddi wɑ.”
Kɑ óbɑ̈nyø, ɑkööbe kinni, “Lidh, jɑmmì bënn ɑ́cïb cingɑ yi jɑldwøng, yɑn ɑ mïdhi jɑmme bënn.
Yïɑ dɑ tegø kì kɑl keny ni jɑlɑni ceth. Dɑ́ yïn, yï ketí ɑ nuti cïb cingɑ yi en, mɑ́ yï bɑ cyëge. Yɑ göög ɑ dï cyee ki gïnrɑj ni men, o bɑ orøg kì bøli Jwøk?”
Cɑgg ɑ́ kɑ ɑ́pëggi ngɑnɑni be kwɑjji Yosep yethi cyɑ̈ng bënn, Yosep ɑ́kyëddi wɑ̈g, kɑ døøg-ɑ be këëji ngɑnɑni.
De cyɑ̈ng ɑ́kyel Yosep ɑ́kedhi øndwøng be yɑ̈bbø ki gïjø megø. O ɑ́bëëd e bong dhɑnhø ki tung-ɑ di ønɑni. Ayood Yosep kunɑni yi ngɑnɑni, kɑ jwɑn-ɑ yïe,
kɑ gø mɑge kì ri ógødhe, ɑkööbe kinni, “Bïí o wɑ buddi wɑ.” De Yosep ɑ́bodh kɑ reng-ɑ wɑ̈g lɑwe wiye’ cingi ngɑnɑni.
Keny-ɑ ɑ́lidhii yi ngɑnɑni kinni ógødhe ɑ́wiye kɑ órengø,
kɑ bɑ̈ngge cwøle, ɑkööbe kinni, “Lïdhi wun! Wɑ̈d jur men-ɑ ɑ́kɑ̈ɑ̈l keny yi jɑldwøng, yɑ ɑ́dhɑ̈ɑ̈l yi en. Ábï ødɑ kɑ yɑ dwɑdde mødø. De yɑ ɑ́ryeer ki ryeeri dwøng.
Keny-ɑ ɑ́kïïwɑ, ɑrenge wɑ̈g ógødhe wiye’ butɑ.”
Kɑ ógødhe mïdhi yi ngɑnɑni gïti kɑ ɑ́bëën jɑlgøle.
Kɑ gø löbbe mø ni møg-ɑ ɑ́köbbe bɑ̈ngg ɑ́tïni, ɑ́kööb kinni, “Ójur men, bɑ̈ng-ɑ ɑ́kɑ̈ɑ̈l yi yïn keny, ɑ́bï ødɑ kɑ yɑ dhɑ̈ɑ̈le.
De keny-ɑ ɑ́kïïwɑ, ɑrenge wɑ̈g ógødhe wiye’ butɑ.”
Kɑ wïi Yosep dële okïrrø yi liny keny-ɑ ɑ́lïnge kinni, i cyëge ódwɑddi mødø yi bɑ̈ng.
Kɑ Yosep kwɑnye kɑ gø leenge ød mɑg, men-ɑ yije nyi kïdhi ɑmɑggi rɑ̈dh. Kɑ Yosep obëëdø kì ød mɑg.
De Yosep ɑ́køny yi Jwøk, kɑ gø gyëdhe. Kɑ jɑngi ød mɑg pyëwe løg-ɑ me med ki en.
Kɑ Yosep kwɑnye ɑ́ jɑngi ɑmɑgg. Kɑ jɑmm-ɑ gøggi bënn kì ød mɑg cïbe cingi Yosep.
Jɑngi ød mɑg pyëwe nuti pɑ̈nyi olïng kipe jɑmm-ɑ ɑ́cïbe cingi Yosep, mɑ́ Yosep bɑ dhɑnhi Jwøk, o jɑmm-ɑ nyi gwøg yi en bënn, nyi pɑ̈dh-ɑ kɑ̈jji gen ceth.
Kì bɑng keny megø, kɑ jɑngi kɑ̈ddø ki cɑ̈wwì geki jɑngi thɑl møg-ɑ gøl rɑ̈ɑ̈dh Rïp, ogöögø ki bɑ̈jjø mɑ ɑ́rënyi pyëw rɑ̈dh, wïi gen.
Rɑ̈dh pyëwe ɑ́rënyi ki jøgɑni ryeet, ɑ løg jɑngi cɑ̈wwì geki jɑngi thɑl,
kɑ gï kïdhe ød mɑg men-ɑ ying gøl jɑngi ɑlɑthkerr, kì keny-ɑ ɑ́mɑɑg Yosep.
Kɑ Yosep kwɑny yi jɑngi ød mɑg ɑ́ ngɑn kɑ̈lli gen. Kɑ ge kɑl-ɑ bëëdø ki cyɑ̈ng kì ød mɑg.
Kɑ jøgɑni ryeet, ɑ løg jɑngi kɑ̈ddø ki cɑ̈wwì geki jɑngi tyëngthɑl, ólɑ̈gø kì ød mɑg kì wɑ̈r ɑ́kyel. Ngɑɑn ɑ́lɑ̈gi kì wɑ̈ye, gïn-ɑ wɑngi yi lɑ̈ggɑni bɑ̈ɑ̈n.
Keny-ɑ ɑ́bëën Yosep be lidhi gen kì mwøl, ɑyuude gïn ge okïïmø.
Kɑ ge pyëj yi Yosep kinni, “Wude ɑ nënni wun pëthi wun rijjø dicyɑ̈ngtïn?”
Akööb gen kinni, “Wø ɑ́lɑ̈gi ɑ́wɑ̈ɑ̈r, de bong ngɑn nyudhi wøn gïn-ɑ wɑngi yi lɑ̈ggɑni.”
Kɑ mø gen løøg yi Yosep kinni, “Bɑ Jwøk ɑ nyi nyudhø ki lɑ̈g. Köbbu yɑn lɑ̈ggi wun.”
Kɑ jɑngi tyëng kɑ̈ddø ki cɑ̈wwì lɑ̈gge köbbe Yosep. Gø ɑ́köbbe kinni, “Kì yethi lɑ̈ggɑ, yɑ ɑ́lidh-ɑ byëlø kì bølɑ.
Wïj byëlɑni dɑ ɑ́kɑrr ɑ́dɑ̈g, kɑ ge odhɑ̈yø, ɑbug gen ki búr, kɑ ge ómɑ̈rø, ɑcyeg gen.
Óthɑ̈ngi rɑ̈dh ɑ́ying-ɑ cingɑ. Kɑ byellɑni jwɑnɑ ki kɑjø, kɑ ge jwɑnɑ’ gwøøg møgø. Kɑ bijɑ. Kɑ kïdhɑ yij óthɑ̈ngi rɑ̈dh, kɑ óthɑ̈ngɑni cïbɑ cingi rɑ̈dh.”
Aköbbii yi Yosep kinni, “Gïn-ɑ wɑngi yi lɑ̈ggí èn: ɑ́kɑrr ɑ́dɑ̈g, bɑ cyɑ̈ng ɑ́dɑ̈g.
Kì dɑ̈ɑ̈g cyɑ̈ng, rɑ̈dh pyëwe ólɑ̈ɑ̈m ki yïn, kɑ yï dwøøge kej gwøgí, óthɑ̈ngi rɑ̈dh ócïb yi yïn cinge ceth ni kenyi göög cøn, ɑ́ yïn ɑ kɑ̈llii.
De pɑ̈ddí rɑ̈dh kiperɑ. Kɑ yɑ køny ki bëën wɑ̈g kì ød mɑg keny-ɑ ódøøg kejí këti.
Thyew, yɑ ɑ́ceg kɑ kwɑ̈ɑ̈lø kì pödhø me lɑ̈wi, me ying løøg nɑm. De gïn-ɑ pëddi rɑ̈jø, bɑ kɑ ɑ́wɑ̈dhi yɑn ki myenø yøw, kɑ yɑ leeng ød mɑg keny, ngö bong gïjø mɑ ɑ́rënyɑ.”
Keny-ɑ ɑ́yodii yi jɑngi thɑl kinni lɑ̈ggi jɑl-ɑ kyeelø ɑ́løøg yi Yosep kidøøj, ɑköbbe lɑ̈gge Yosep kinni, “Yɑn thyew, yɑ ɑ́lɑ̈gi yɑ tyëdd-ɑ ɑ́ridhh ɑ́dɑ̈g kì wïjɑ, ge myeer yɑn mɑl.
Men-ɑ mɑl yije dɑ gïgcɑmm møg-ɑ ɑbul bënn, de ge ocɑmø yi winy kì yij ɑ́ridh kì wïjɑ.”
Alöggi Yosep kinni, “Gïn-ɑ wɑngi yi lɑ̈ggɑni èn: dhöng ɑ́dɑ̈g bɑ cyɑ̈ng ɑ́dɑ̈g.
Kì dɑ̈ɑ̈g cyɑ̈ng, wïjí ókïb wɑ̈g yi rɑ̈dh, kɑ yï ngɑɑb wïj lööj yɑdh, kɑ yï cɑm yi winy.”
Kɑ jɑggi Rïp ryej yi rɑ̈dh kì dɑ̈ɑ̈g cyɑ̈ng, kipe pɑri cyɑ̈ng-ɑ́ yije ɑ́nywøølii. Kɑ jɑngi jøkɑ̈ddø ki cɑ̈wwì geki jɑngi tyëngthɑl kɑ̈ɑ̈l wɑ̈g kì ød mɑg, kɑ ge kïdhi bøli jyɑ̈ggi rɑ̈dh.
Kɑ jɑngi jøkɑ̈ddø ki cɑ̈wwì dwøøg kej gwøge. Kɑ kedh-ɑ be kɑ̈lli rɑ̈dh.
Kɑ jɑngi tyëngthɑl nɑ̈g ni kɑ ɑ́kwøbii yi Yosep ceth.
De jɑngi tyëngkɑ̈ddø ki cɑ̈wwì nuti rumø kì ri Yosep, wïje ɑ́wïl ki en.
Bɑng runn ɑ́ryew, kɑ rɑ̈dh ólɑ̈gø e cung-ɑ́ɑ̀ kömi Kiir,
ɑ́lidh-ɑ dhög ɑ́bïryew mø cwiy, o ge lwiy, ge bï-ɑ wɑ̈g kì nɑm, kɑ ge ócɑ̈gø cɑm ki lum.
Kɑ dhög ɑ́bïryew møøgø mø pɑ nëënø yi rɑ̈jø, o ge gwɑ̈lø gwɑ̈lø, bï-ɑ wɑ̈g kì nɑm, kɑ ge ócungø kì buti dhögi tyeli mɑl.
Kɑ dhög-ɑ cwiy cɑm yi dhög-ɑ gwɑ̈lø kinni tweet. Kɑ rɑ̈dh ócyëwø.
Acige nenø kɑ ólɑ̈gø, ɑ́lidh-ɑ wɑ̈thi byel ɑ́bïryew, kì wïj thyɑngø ɑ́kyel, ri gen pɑ̈ng yi nyingi byel mø myëër.
Kɑ byel ɑ́bïryew møøgø otwïyø kì buti gen, welli gen lewø lewø, o bong byel kì wɑ̈thi gen.
Kɑ well-ɑ wɑ̈thi gen pɑ̈ng yi nyingi byel mwøøny yi møg-ɑ lewø. Codhe, kɑ rɑ̈dh ócyëwø. Ce ying-ɑ lɑ̈g!

Adhwödh rɑ̈dh kì mwøl wïje cungø yi møgɑni. Kɑ öd-ɑ yij Rïp bëne, kɑ ɑ́jwöggì geki tyëng-ɑ wɑ̈thi gen pel cwööl bënn. Kɑ rɑ̈dh lɑ̈gge löbbe gïn. De bong dhɑnhø mɑ ɑ́cuggi köbbi rɑ̈dh gïn-ɑ wɑngi yi lɑ̈ggɑni.
Kɑ jɑngi tyëngkɑ̈ddø ki cɑ̈wwì rɑ̈dh köbbe kinni, “Wuö, bɑ̈jjɑ ɑ́pɑr yi yɑn dicyɑ̈ngtïn.
Tyelø ɑ́kyel ówëni, rɑ̈dh pyëwe ɑ́rënyi ki bɑ̈ngge. Kɑ yɑ kïdhe ød mɑg men-ɑ gøl jɑngi ɑlɑthkerr, kyeel ki jɑngi tyëngthɑl.
Kɑ wø ólɑ̈gø kì wɑ̈r ɑ́kyel ki lɑ̈g mø bɑ̈ɑ̈n.
Kɑ gïn-ɑ wɑngi yi lɑ̈ggɑni köbbi wøn yi nyel megø men-ɑ ókɑ̈ɑ̈lø kì løøg nɑm, o bɑ bɑ̈ng jɑngi ɑlɑthkerr, keny-ɑ ɑ́wɑ̈jjii lɑ̈ggɑni yi wøn ceth.
Kɑ møgɑni pɑ̈dh-ɑ kɑ̈jji gen ceth ni kɑ ɑ́kwøbe gïn. Yɑ ɑ́gøny, kɑ yɑ dwöög kej gwøgɑ, kɑ jɑngi tyëngthɑl nɑ̈g.”
Codhe, kɑ rɑ̈dh öd-ɑ ød mɑg. Kɑ Yosep jwɑn ki gööny wɑ̈g, kɑ wïje lyel, kɑ ógudhe wil. Akïdhii bøli rɑ̈dh.
Kɑ Yosep köbbi yi rɑ̈dh kinni, “Yɑ ɑ́lɑ̈gi, de bong ngɑn mɑ ɑ́nyudhi yɑn gïn-ɑ wɑngi yi lɑ̈ggɑni. De yɑ ɑ́köbbi, i yïn kenyi lïngí lɑ̈g, gïn-ɑ wɑngi yi gen nyii cuggø nyodhø yi yïn.”
Alöggi Yosep kinni, “Pɑ lwɑ̈ng yi yɑn wuö, de Jwøk rɑ̈dh ónyudhe.”
Codhe, ɑköbbi Yosep yi rɑ̈dh kinni, “Yɑ ɑ́lɑ̈gi yɑ cung-ɑ́ɑ̀ kömi Kiir.
Kɑ dhög ɑ́bïryew mø cwiy, dëlli gen lwiy, bï-ɑ wɑ̈g kì nɑm. Kɑ ge ocyɑ̈mø’ lum kì gɑ̈d.
Kɑ dhög ɑ́bïryew møøgø mø gwɑ̈lø gwɑ̈lø ólunyø bëën wɑ̈g kì nɑm. Bong dhög mɑ ɑ́lidh yi yɑn ge gwɑ̈lø ni gen kì Rïp keny!
Kɑ dhög-ɑ cwiy gɑ ɑ́bïryew mø tyeli mɑl, cɑm yi dhög-ɑ gwɑ̈lø.
De bong ngɑn cuggi ngïjø kinni dhög-ɑ cwiy ɑ́cɑm-ɑ yi gen, mɑ́ ge nudd ge gwɑ̈lø ceth. Kɑ yɑ ócyëwø.
Kì yethi lɑ̈ggɑ møg-ɑ kyeelø, yɑ ɑ́lidh-ɑ byëlø, wïje dɑ wɑ̈thi byel ɑ́bïryew, byell-ɑ wïje myëër cɑrø, o nyingi gen gïïr.
Kɑ byel ɑ́bïryew møøgø otwïyø kì buti gen, welli gen lewø lewø, ge órɑ̈bø yi mel.
Kɑ wɑ̈thi byell-ɑ døj mwøøny yi møg-ɑ rijjø. Ájwöggì ɑ́köbbɑ lɑ̈ggɑni, de bong ngɑn mɑ ɑ́nyudhi yɑn gïn-ɑ wɑngi yi gen.”
Kɑ rɑ̈dh köbbi yi Yosep kinni, “Lɑ̈ggi rɑ̈dh wɑng-ɑ gïjø ɑ́kyel. Rɑ̈dh ɑ köbbi yi Jwøk ki gïn-ɑ dwɑdde gwøgø.
Dhög ɑ́bïryew møg-ɑ døj bɑ runn ɑ́bïryew. O wɑ̈thi byel ɑ́bïryew møg-ɑ døj bɑ runn ɑ́bïryew. Bɑ lɑ̈g ɑ́kyel.
Dhög-ɑ gwɑ̈lø gɑ ɑ́bïryew møg-ɑ ɑ́bï wɑ̈g kì cyɑ̈n, bɑ runn ɑ́bïryew, geki wɑ̈thi byel ɑ́bïryew møg-ɑ lewø. Ge bɑ runni kɑ̈j ɑ́bïryew.
Nɑ kɑ ɑ́köbbɑ rɑ̈dh ceth. Jwøk nyudh-ɑ rɑ̈dh ki gïn-ɑ dwɑdde gwøgø.
Runn ɑ́bïryew mø yɑ̈ɑ̈ngø obëënø. Rïp óyɑ̈ng bëne.
Bɑng gen óbëën yi runn ɑ́bïryew mø kɑ̈j. Kɑ yɑ̈ng-ɑ ɑ́bëëd ji ge yɑ̈ngø kì piny Rïp bëne owïlø. Mɑ́ Rïp órënyi yi kɑ̈j bëne.
Kɑ̈r-ɑ ɑ́ying yij pödhø ówïl kì wɑ̈thi ji, mɑ́ kɑ̈ny-ɑ óbï kì bɑnge óbëëd e teg ki mendwøng.
Gïn-ɑ pere jøli lɑ̈ggɑni tyel ɑ́ryew, bɑ kinni, Jwøk møgɑni gwøge’ gwøgø ceth kì bɑng nyɑ keny me thiinh.
“Anɑn yɑ̈ɑ̈b rɑ̈dh ki dhɑnhø me døj, o wïje pel, kɑ gø cïbe kömi pödhø bëne.
Kɑ rɑ̈dh kɑ̈bbe thyew ki ji-ɑ ónenni gwøngɑni kì yij pödhø bëne, kì yethi runni yɑ̈ɑ̈ngø gɑ ɑ́bïryew.
Kɑ byel nyi pɑ̈ngi gɑ bud ɑ́bïj, o budø ɑ́kyel nyi cïb piny kì yethi runni yɑ̈ɑ̈ngø gɑ ɑ́bïryew. Köbbí gen o byel cøng yi gen kì yethi runn-ɑ døj bënn, ki nyingi rɑ̈dh.
Kɑ byellɑni kor yi gen kidøøj. Mïdhi byellɑni gɑ møg-ɑ óyieel ji kì yethi runni kɑ̈j, o Rïp cöge, e pɑ nɑ̈g yi kɑ̈j.”
Kɑ kwøbbi Yosep pwøj yi rɑ̈dh geki jɑggi bure.
Kɑ jɑggɑni köbbi yi rɑ̈dh kinni, “Bong dhɑnhø men-ɑ óyod yi wɑ, me lod Yosep, ngɑn-ɑ ree di wëyi Jwøk.”
Kɑ Yosep köbbi yi rɑ̈dh kinni, “Mɑ́ e bɑ yïn ɑ ɑ́nyudhi yi Jwøk ki møgɑni bënn, menɑni wɑng-ɑ kinni bɑ yïn ɑ wïjí pel, o yijí dɑ rummì kibøli ji bënn.
Pödhɑ bëne cïbɑ’ cingí. O jiɑ bënn ólïng-ɑ kwøbbí, bong dhɑnhø men-ɑ óying mɑl kibølí den-ɑ́ yɑn, yɑ ketɑ.”
Codhe, ɑköbbi Yosep yi rɑ̈dh kinni, “Anɑn yï rønyɑ’ rønyø yïn ɑ́ jɑgø kì kömi Rïp bëne.”
Kɑ gwelø men-ɑ köme ógweed nyingi rɑ̈dh kɑ̈ɑ̈le wɑ̈g kì lwede, kɑ gø bødhe lwedi Yosep. Aruuge gøn ki ógødh men-ɑ ócwɑ̈jø ki kor-ɑ yöm. Kɑ yedhe lunyi ki ɑ́cwecwelli dhɑb.

Kɑ mëggi ryeew yɑ̈thi gøl rɑ̈dh, møg-ɑ nyi pyejji yi kyënyì, o kɑ̈lli kì yij yɑ̈yɑni bøle orïngø yi ɑlɑthkerr, ge óryeerø kinni, “Wëggu yöö! Wëggu yöö! Rum wun cøngi wun piny kì bøle!” Kinøw, Yosep ɑ́røny ɑ́ jɑngi Rïp bëne.
Kɑ Yosep köbbi yi rɑ̈dh kinni, “Yɑ bene rɑ̈dh, o bong dhɑnhø men-ɑ ódi gïn gwøge kì Rïp bëne, yï kwïj wøw.”
Kɑ Yosep cɑge ɑ́ Dhɑpenɑdh Pɑniyɑ̀. Kɑ gø nënge ki dhɑjø me cwøl ɑ́ Asenɑth nyɑɑr jɑl me cwøl ɑ́ Pøtiperɑ̀ ókwëri On. Kɑ Yosep pere lïngi kì yij Rïp bëne.
Yosep runne ɑ́bëëd gɑ pyɑ̈r ɑ́dɑ̈g keny-ɑ ɑ́cɑ̈ge’ göggi rɑ̈dh, ɑkedhe e owïïnø kì yij Rïp bëne.
Byel ɑ́cyeg kidyër kì yethi runni yɑ̈ɑ̈ngø gɑ ɑ́bïryew, møg-ɑ ɑ́kwøb yi Yosep ceth.
Kɑ byel congi kì yethi myërri Rïp bënn kì yethi runni yɑ̈ɑ̈ngø gɑ ɑ́bïryew.
Byel ɑ́bëëd ge gïïr cɑrø ki mendwøng. Kɑ Yosep ówïyø rømi gen, mɑ́ byëlø nɑ tør.
Kɑ Yosep nyöddi ki wɑ̈dd ɑ́ryew yi Asenɑth, kɑ̈ng-ɑ ɑ́bëëd runni kɑ̈j nuti bëënø.
Kɑ wɑ̈de nyel-ɑ kɑyø cɑge ɑ́ Mɑnɑsè, mɑ́ e ɑ́kööb kinni, “Jwøk wïjɑ ɑ́wëgge wïlø ki orɑngɑ, geki gøl wïyɑ bëne.”
Acɑge ryeew wɑ̈dde ɑ́ Eprɑim, mɑ́ e ɑ́kööb kinni, “Jwøk yɑ ɑ́nënge ki nywøl yɑn ɑ́ wëdh.”
Kɑ runni kɑ̈j møg-ɑ ɑ́kømmi yi Yosep gɑ ɑ́bïryew ócɑ̈gø bëënø. Pödhh-ɑ kyeelø ɑ́bëëd yethi gen dɑ kɑ̈j, de ɑ́dɑ gïncɑm kì yij Rïp bëne.
Keny-ɑ ɑ́tëngi kɑ̈j, kɑ ji ywøøg-ɑ yï rɑ̈dh kipe gïncɑm. Kɑ tyëng Rïp bënn köbbi yi rɑ̈dh kinni, “Kedhu yï Yosep. Kɑ gïn-ɑ ókwøb yi en gwøg wun ceth.”
Kɑ kɑ̈j ótëngø ki mendwøng kì yij pödhø bëne, ɑyieeb kɑ̈jj-ɑ ɑ́mïdhi byel yi Yosep. Kɑ ócɑ̈gø ki ngëwwi tyëng Rïp bënn.
Kɑ kömi piny bëne bï-ɑ Rïp yï Yosep be ngyew ki byel, mɑ́ piny bëne ɑ́mɑg yi kɑ̈j me teeg.
Kɑ̈j ɑ́bëëd e teeg cɑrø kì Kɑnɑɑn, e Yɑgob wïyi Yosep nudd e onëënø. Keny-ɑ ɑ́yodii yi Yɑgob kinni dɑ byel kì Rïp, ɑköbbe wɑ̈dde kinni, “Wude ɑ pɑ nyɑg wun ri wun?
Yɑ olïngø i dɑ byel kì Rïp. Kedhu kunɑni, kɑ wu ngëëw wun ki byel kipe wɑ óywɑj yi kɑ̈j.”
Codhe, ɑkedh nyiiwï Yosep gɑ pyɑ̈rø, be ngyew ki byel kì Rïp.
De Ben Yɑmïn ómï Yosep, ɑ́mɑ̈ɑ̈n kedhø yi wïyi gen, mɑ́ e ɑ́bwøg kinni nyelthinh ódi gïn-ɑ ókedhi ree.
Wɑ̈ddi Yɑgob ɑ́bï Rïp, geki ji møøgø be ngyew ki byel, mɑ́ kɑ̈j teeg kì piny Kɑnɑɑn.

Yosep jɑngi Rïp, en ɑ yïe nyi kedhi yi tyëng-ɑ kɑ̈ɑ̈l pödhhi kömi piny bënn, o yïëye kinni thödhi gen ki byel. Kɑ nyiiwï Yosep kedh-ɑ yïe. Kɑ wɑ̈thi gen kuul gen piny kì bøle, gïti kɑ ɑ́nywɑ̈ddi wɑ̈thi gen ki piny.
Yosep keny-ɑ ɑ́lidhe nyiiwɑ̈n, gï ɑ́ngije ceth, de ree nuti nyudh en gïn. Kɑ gï pyëje ki cwɑg mø teeg kinni, “Wu kɑ̈ɑ̈l-ɑ keny?”
Alöggi gen kinni, “Wø kɑ̈ɑ̈l-ɑ Kɑnɑɑn. Wø ɑ́bï-ɑ be ngyew ki byel.”
Yosep nuti pɑ̈nyø’ ngijø yi gen, ngö ge ɑ́ngij yi Yosep.
Kɑ lɑ̈gg-ɑ ɑ́lɑ̈ge kɑ̈ge dööng pɑɑre. Kɑ nyiiwɑ̈n köbbe kinni, “Wu bɑ yïthhi piny. Wu ɑ́bï-ɑ be lidhi tung-ɑ nyødh pödhø.”
Kɑ ge okööbø kinni, “Pɑth wuö! Bɑ̈nggí yɑb-ɑ gïncɑm yøw.
Wø bɑ nyiimëëg bënn, wø pɑth ki yïthhi piny wuö, wø bɑ ji mø døøj.”
Aköbbi gen yi Yosep kinni, “Pɑth, wu ɑ́bï-ɑ be lidhi tung-ɑ nyødh pödhi wøn, o liny tëër wun.”
Akööb gen kinni, “Wø ɑ́bëëd wø bɑ nyiimëëg pyɑ̈rø wïdɑ́ryew, wøn ɑ́ wɑ̈ddi jɑl ɑ́kyel, ómï wøn ɑ́kyel ɑ́thøw. O nyel-ɑ thinh ɑ́döngi pɑc geki wïyi wøn.”
Kɑ Yosep okööbø kinni, “Nɑ kɑ ɑ́kööbɑ ceth! Wu bɑ yïthhi piny.
Wu órɑng kinni, yɑ ɑ́köngi ki nyingi rɑ̈dh kinni, wu pɑ kedh ɑnɑn, den-ɑ́ keny-ɑ óbëën ómï wun nyel-ɑ thinh keny, ɑ ókedh wun.
Wiy dhɑnhø ɑ́kyel kì kelli wun kedhe be dwɑɑyii. Tyëng-ɑ döng ókor gïti keny-ɑ óyood kwøbbi wun kinni ge bɑ dyër, o ke pɑth gen ki dyër, rɑ̈dh ɑ kwömø, wu bɑ yïthhi piny.”
Kɑ gï mɑge ki cyɑ̈ng ɑ́dɑ̈g.
Kɑ ge cwööl wɑ̈g yi Yosep kì dɑ̈ɑ̈g cyɑ̈ng. Kɑ gï köbbe kinni, “Yɑ bɑ dhɑnhø me böggi Jwøk. Wu pɑ nɑ̈g keløg kwøbbi wun bɑ dyër. Wu ówiy yi yɑn kɑ per gïjø ɑ́kyel.
Kipe nyodhi kinni wu bɑ ji mø døøj, ɑ́kyel kì kelli wun óbëëdø kì ød mɑg keny-ɑ ɑ́mïdhi wun, kɑ møg-ɑ kyeelø bënn kedhi gen be kɑ̈li byel, o ge yiel gen kɑ̈lli wun møg-ɑ ywɑj yi kɑ̈j.
De muuj wun ómï wun nyel-ɑ thinh yɑn ceth, bene keny-ɑ óyïëyɑ kinni wu kømm-ɑ dyër, o wu cög wun wu pɑ nɑ̈g yi yɑn.”
Kɑ ge oyïëyø.

Kɑ ge okööbø kì ri gen keti gen kinni, “Ngee, ɑnɑn wɑ rɑng ɑ bɑng gïnrɑj men-ɑ ɑ́göggi ómïee yi wɑ, cɑni wɑnge ɑ́lidh yi wɑ keny-ɑ ɑ́kwɑjje wɑ kinni wiy, de wɑ nuti lïngø. Bene ɑ bɑnge pɑ̈dhi yi wɑ yij orɑng men ɑnɑn. Wɑ ɑ́cyen yi ómïee.”
Kwøbb-ɑ kømmi yi gen olïngø yi Yosep bënn, de kwïj yi gen kinni ge di lïngø yi en, mɑ́ ge 'kööb-ɑ dhøg gen, o kwøbb-ɑ kwøb yi gen nyi løg-ɑ yi dhumi. O Yosep 'kööb-ɑ dhøg tyëng Rïp.

Keny-ɑ ɑ́lidhii yi Yosep kinni bɑ men ywöngi kì bøli gen, ɑkedhe wɑ̈ye kun ywönge, e pɑ nenni. Keny-ɑ ɑ́døøg opɑ̈we piny, ɑdwööge yï gen. Akwɑnye Cimeøn kɑ ɑlɑthkerr köbbe kinni, “Twöj wun cingge.” Kɑ cingge twöj kì bøli gen.
Kɑ jɑngi jøgwøg köbbi yi Yosep kinni, “Pɑ̈ng wun jɑmmi gen ki byel, kɑ ge thödhi ki gïn cɑɑm gen yöö.” Kɑ møgɑni órumø ki gwøgø.
Kɑ nyiimëëgɑni jɑmmi gen cïb gen kömi ɑderri gen. Kɑ ge ókedhø.
Kɑ nyel ɑ́kyel dhø kidhe pɑ̈de kipe kinni o thödhe ɑdere ki byel kì keny-ɑ ɑ́nïni yi gen kì kö yöö. Kɑ ngyënye yode kì wɑ̈thi byel.
Kɑ óryeerø kinni, “Ngyënyyɑ ódöggi yɑn. Gen ɑ yij kidhø èn.” Kɑ dëlli gen ójuurø, kɑ ge okööbø ge óböggø kinni, “Á ngø ɑ göggi wɑ yi Jwøk ni men?”
Keny-ɑ ɑ́wɑ̈dhi gen yï wïyi gen kì Kɑnɑɑn, ɑlwøb gen gïg-ɑ ɑ́cwöb bënn kinni,
“Jɑngi Rïp ɑ́kööb ki wøn ki kwøb mø rijjø, kɑ wø myene kinni i wø bɑ yïthhi piny møg lyewwi pödhe.
De wø ɑ́kyëëd kinni wø pɑth ki yïthhi piny, wø bɑ ji mø døøj.
Wø ɑ́bëëd wø bɑ nyiimëëg pyɑ̈rø wïdɑ́ryew, wɑ̈ddi jɑl ɑ́kyel.”
Kɑ jɑlɑni ólöggø kinni, “Bene yuu-ɑ óyodɑ wun èn, keløg wu bɑ ji mø døøj kidyër, ɑ́kyel kì kelli wun ódöng kì butɑ keny. Møgɑk bënn ókedhi be muuji byel kɑ̈lli wun møg-ɑ ywɑj yi kɑ̈j.
Muuju yɑn ómï wun nyel-ɑ thinh. Bene keny-ɑ óyodɑ kinni wu pɑth ki yïthhi piny, de wu bɑ tyëngdøj. Ómï wun ódöggɑ wun, kɑ wu wiy o wu nyi ngëëw wun kì pönhï.”
Keny-ɑ ɑ́kuny byel wɑ̈g kì yethi kidhhì, ɑyood ngyënyyi gen bënn, kɑ ge obwøgø geki wïyi gen bënn, keny-ɑ ɑ́lidh gen ngyëny.
Aköbbi gen yi wïyi gen kinni, “Wu dwɑdd-ɑ lɑ̈ɑ̈nyi nyigɑ bënn? Yosep ɑ́lɑ̈ɑ̈ny, Cimeøn ɑ́lɑ̈ɑ̈ny, o ɑnɑn wu dwɑdd-ɑ kɑ̈li Ben Yɑmïn? Yɑ bɑ men nɑ̈g yi ywøg!”
Kɑ Ruben wïye köbbe kinni, “Keløg Ben Yɑmïn pɑ döggɑ yïn, wɑ̈ddɑ gɑ ɑ́ryew ócuggø nɑ̈gø yi yïn. Cïb cingɑ, ódwöög yi yɑn.”
De Yɑgob ɑ́kyëëd kinni, “Wɑ̈dɑ pɑ kedh ki wun. Ómen ɑ́thøw, o bɑ e kete ɑ ɑ́döng. O keløg e dɑ gïn kedhi ree kì yuu-ɑ kïdhu en, yɑ bɑ yu ni men, yɑ ceg kɑ nɑ̈gø yi rummì ki gööj wun.”
Kɑ̈j ɑ́tëngi ki mendwøng kì Kɑnɑɑn.
Keny-ɑ ɑ́thumi byel møg-ɑ ɑ́kɑ̈ɑ̈l kì Rïp kì gøl Yɑgob, kɑ Yɑgob wɑ̈dde köbbe kinni, “Døøg wun be ngëwø ki byel møg cɑm yi wɑ.”
Aköbbii yi Yeudɑ̀ kinni, “Jɑlɑni ɑ́kyëëd ki menteg kinni, i wø koo wɑ̈dhi bøle, keløg ómï wøn pɑ kɑ̈l.
Keløg e oörø yi yïn, wø ókedhi be ngëwwi yïn ki byel.
De ke pɑ dwɑddií, wø pɑ kedh, mɑ́ jɑlɑni ɑ́kööb kinni i wø ko wɑ̈dhi bute, ke pɑ kɑ̈l wøn nyelthinh.”
Kɑ Yɑgob okööbø kinni, “Yɑde ɑ muuju yɑn ki göj? Ede ɑ ɑ́köbbu en kinni dɑ ómï wun megø?”

Alöggi gen kinni, “Jɑlɑni ɑ́pëggi be pyënyi wøn ki bëëdi gøl wøn kinni, ‘Wïyi wun nudd e onëënø? Dɑ ómï wun megø?’ O pyëjje ɑ́dwɑdd-ɑ løøgø ceth. Di bëëd e ngɑ̈nyi yi wøn kidï kinni ókööbø i kɑ̈ɑ̈l ómï wøn?”
Kɑ Yeudɑ̀ wïye köbbe kinni, “Ör nyelthinh ki wøn, o wø jwɑn wøn dhwödhø. O cöge e bong ngɑn thøw yi kɑ̈j.
Wëyɑ ómuujɑ kipe nyelthinh, ke di gïn cwöb. Yɑ ócungi kì kömi dhøgɑ ceth. Ke pɑ döggɑ en yïn ki tɑrø, kɑ yï ywøøg riɑ.
Lidh, keløg wɑ pɑ di bëëd ki keny me bɑ̈ɑ̈r, ti wø rum kɑ̈nø ki byel tyel ɑ́ryew ɑnɑn.”
Akööb wïyi gen kinni, “Keløg ɑ́ kinøw, muuj wun jɑlɑni ki jɑmmì møg pwøj wun en, yɑ̈bbu en ki nywøli oløg møg thwøwø, kí nyɑ møøw kïc, kí tugø geki benø, kí jɑmm-ɑ nyi kïdhi ri mulø.
Kɑ ngyënyyi tyeli mɑl dwøøg wun. Kɑ wu kɑ̈ɑ̈d wun ki møg ni gen, mɑ́ wɑ kwïj wøw ki gïn-ɑ bɑ̈jjø.
Kɑ̈l wun ómï wun, dhwödh wun ɑnɑn ceth.
Jɑlɑni pyëwe ódwöög yi Jwøk Áyïmø, kɑ pyëwe ólɑ̈ɑ̈mø ki wun, kɑ wu dögge Ben Yɑmïn, geki ómï wun nyel-ɑ kyeelø. Keløg ɑ́ perɑ yøw, cɑgg nyigɑ thumi, ɑ́ ngø ɑ gwøgɑ?”
Codhe, kɑ nyiimëëgɑni jɑmmi gen kwɑny gen, ɑ løg ngyënyyi tyeli mɑl, kí møg-ɑ kïdhi be ngyew, kí jɑmmi pwøj møg-ɑ muuj. Akedh gen geki Ben Yɑmïn. Keny-ɑ ɑ́wɑ̈dhi gen Rïp, ɑkïdhi gen bøli Yosep.

Keny-ɑ ɑ́liidh Ben Yɑmïn kì kelli gen yi Yosep, ɑköbbe bɑ̈ng-ɑ mïdhi gøle kinni, “Kïdhí jøg gølɑ. Ge ócyɑ̈ɑ̈m ɑ kej ɑ́kyel ki yɑn dicyɑ̈ngtïn. Köbbí jɑlthɑl kinni tɑ̈ɑ̈de ki rïngø me gïïr. Yɑ óbï kì dicɑ̈ng.”
Akɑ̈ɑ̈l gen yi jɑlɑni. Kɑ jɑlthɑl köbbe møg-ɑ ɑ́kwøb yi Yosep.

Ge ɑ́kïdhi kɑl ge óböggø, ge okööbø ki pëthi gen kinni, “Wɑ kɑ̈ɑ̈l kɑ per ngyëny møg-ɑ ɑ́døøg kì yethi kidhhee cyɑ̈ng-ɑcɑ̀. Ge bɑ møg-ɑ ópɑ̈ɑ̈r kömee, kɑ ɑderree kwɑny gen. Kɑ wɑ gwøøg bɑ̈ngg yi jɑlɑni.”
Kì ɑ́dyëddi kɑl, ɑköbbi gen jɑl-ɑ kɑ̈lli gen kinni,
“Lïng jɑldwøng, wø ɑ́kwöngi ki bëën be ngyew ki gïncɑm cyɑ̈ng-ɑcinee.
Kɑ kidhhi wøn yieb wøn kì kö yöö keny-ɑ ɑ́nïni yi wøn, kɑ ngɑɑn ngyënyye yode kì wɑ̈thi byelle; gen ceth ki kwɑnni gen, bong gïn tøøk kinni tek. Ngyënyyɑni ɑ́dwöög yi wøn.
Wø ɑ́kɑ̈ni thyew ki ngyëny møg-ɑ óngëëw yi wøn ki gïncɑm. Ngɑn-ɑ dwøøg ngyënyyi wøn yethi kidhhì, kwïj yi wøn.”

Kɑ bɑ̈ngɑni okööbø kinni, “Pëthi wun ko lïngi. Wu ko böggi. Jwøøg wun, jwøøg gøl wun, óbëëd ɑ́ en ɑ dwøøg ngyënyyi wun yethi kidhhi wun. Ngyënyyi wun ɑ́rum ki kwɑnyø yi yɑn.” Codhe, ɑkɑ̈ɑ̈le Cimeøn yï gen.
Akïdhi nyiimëëgɑni ød yi bɑ̈ngɑni. Kɑ ge muuj ki pï møg lwøg gen tyelli gen. Kɑ ɑderri gen thödhi ki gïjø me cɑm yi gen.
Kɑ jɑmm-ɑ ɑ́muuj gen Yosep, mɑ̈ɑ̈g gen ki pyëlø, o gï ómëggii keny-ɑ óbëëne kì dicɑ̈ng, mɑ́ ge ɑ́rum ki köbbø kinni ge ócyɑ̈mø kɑ en.
Keny-ɑ ɑ́wɑ̈nhi Yosep kɑl, ɑkïdhi gen jɑmmɑni ød yïe. Kɑ wɑ̈thi gen kuul gen piny ki mendwøng kì bøle.
Apyëje gïn mɑ yöd dëlli gen. Kɑ okööbø kinni, “Yɑ ɑ́köbbi yi wun i dɑ wïyi wun me bɑ yu, bëëd ɑ dï? Nudd e onëënø, o dële yööd?”
Kɑ ge ólöggø kinni, “Bɑ̈ngí; wïyi wøn, nudd e onëënø.” Kɑ cøngi gen rum gen piny, ɑkuul gen wɑ̈thi gen piny kì bøle.
Kɑ Yosep lïïdh-ɑ yï Ben Yɑmïn ɑkööbe kinni, “O nyel, bene en ómï wun, nyelthinh men-ɑ ɑ́kømmi yi wun? Yï ómïdhi yi Jwøk nyɑrɑ.”
Kɑ Yosep ree gwɑre kì buti gen, kɑ jwɑn-ɑ øde be ywøg, mɑ́ yije ɑ́røy kɑ̀ nenne nyiimen. Kɑ óywöngø yi medi pyëwe.
Keny-ɑ ɑ́rume ywøg, ɑlwøge nyinge, kɑ dwöög-ɑ keny-ɑ di gen. Acwøle gïncɑm.
Yosep ɑ́cyɑ̈ɑ̈m ɑ wïj pɑ̈me kì wɑ̈ye, o nyiimen ying-ɑ wïj pɑ̈m-ɑ kyeelø. Tyëng Rïp møg-ɑ ɑ́ying ød ɑ́nëng ɑ wɑ̈yi gen, mɑ́ e bɑ ɑkerø, ge pɑ nyi cyɑ̈mø geki tyëng løøg nɑm.
Nyiimëëgɑni, pɑ̈ɑ̈m gen ɑ́cïb e rwöm ki Yosep. Kɑ yɑɑgɑni cïb ge ówɑdø ki kö pɑ̈m, cɑg kì ri nyel-ɑ dwøng gïti ri nyel-ɑ thinh kì cyɑ̈n. Keny-ɑ ɑ́lidh gen pyël-ɑ ópyëël gen, kɑ ge ongɑ̈ngø yi møgɑni.

Gïncɑm ɑ́ying-ɑ kömi pɑ̈m-ɑ di Yosep, o nyi kɑ̈ɑ̈l e ocïmmø kì bøli gen. Ben Yɑmïn bøle nyi cïb-ɑ gïncɑm me dwøng kibøli mø yɑɑg-ɑ kyeelø. Ge ɑ́cyɑ̈ɑ̈m kɑ ge omɑ̈dhø geki Yosep gïti kɑ ɑ́wïïn wɑ̈thi gen yi møgi oløg.
Yosep jɑngi jøgwøg ɑ́köbbe kinni, “Kïdhí yethi jɑmm-ɑ ɑ́kɑ̈ɑ̈l yi jøgɑni ki byel møg-ɑ cuggi lwɑ̈ngø ki tyëddø yi ɑderri gen. Kɑ ngyënyyi gen cïb wɑ̈thi byel.
Kɑ óthɑ̈ngɑ, óthɑ̈ng-ɑ bɑ ɑ́tegø kïdhí yij kidhi nyel-ɑ thinh geki ngyëny møge.” Kɑ møgɑni gwøg ni kɑ ɑ́kwøøb gen yi Yosep.
Kì mwøl ceth, ɑwiy nyiimëëgɑni kedh gen ki ɑderri gen.
Keny-ɑ ɑ́kɑl gen lɑ̈wø ki kɑɑldwøng, kɑ Yosep bɑ̈ng-ɑ mïdhi gøle köbbe kinni, “Rengí bɑng jøgɑni, opïïd gen kɑ ge pyëëj kinni, ‘Wude ɑ col wun gïndøj ki gïnrɑj?
Á kipe ngø ɑ kwɑl wun óthɑ̈ngi ɑ́tegø mi wɑ̈ɑ? Bene gøn ɑ yije nyi mɑ̈ɑ̈dh yi en. En ɑ bɑ mi kwër kì yïe. Wu ɑ́göög ki orøg! Wu ócɑy ki cɑ́y mø døngø.’ ”
Keny-ɑ ɑ́pïïd gen yi bɑ̈ngɑni, ɑkwøbe møgɑni.
Alöggi gen kinni, “Yï kɑ̈n-ɑ́ɑ̀ keny ki kwøbb-ɑ ni møg? Yï wɑng-ɑ ngø jɑldwøng? Yïde ɑ kööb kinøw? Wø ceg-ɑ köngø kinni wø nuti göögø ki gïn ni menɑni.
Yï ngɑ̈ny wøw kinni ngyënyy-ɑ ɑ́yod yi wøn kì wɑ̈thi byel ɑ́dögi wun yi wøn, ge ɑ́dwöög yi wøn kì piny Kɑnɑɑn. Dɑ́ per ngø cyee, ɑ kwɑ̈ddi wøn ki ɑ́tegø wɑlɑ̀ dhɑɑb gøl wöw?
Lïng jɑldwøng, ngɑn-ɑ yïe óyoodií kì kelli wøn, ceg kɑ nɑ̈gø, o møg-ɑ kyeelø göög gen gɑ bɑ̈nggi wun.”
Kɑ bɑ̈ngɑni okööbø kinni, “Yɑ ɑ́yïëy, de bɑ ngɑn-ɑ yïe óyodɑ óthɑ̈gi, ɑ ókwɑny yi yɑn ɑ́ bɑ̈ngɑ. Møg-ɑ kyeelø pɑ mɑg.”
Codhe, kɑ jɑmmi gen jwɑn gen ki tïng piny kì kömi ɑderr. Kɑ dhøggi kidhhi gen jwɑn gen ki pɑ̈dø.
Kɑ bɑ̈ng Yosep ócɑ̈gø ki yɑb mɑ̈ɑ̈dh. Ácɑ̈gi kɑ jɑmmi nyel-ɑ dwøng gïti ri jɑmmi nyel-ɑ thinh. Kɑ óthɑ̈gi yode kì yij kidhi Ben Yɑmïn.
Kɑ nyiimëëgɑni obwøgø ki mendwøng, kɑ ógudhi gen pyëëd gen yi rɑ̈ji pëthi gen. Adwøøg gen jɑmmi gen kömi ɑderr, kɑ ge døøg-ɑ kɑɑldwøng.
Keny-ɑ ɑ́wɑ̈dhi Yeudɑ̀ gøl Yosep geki nyiimen, Yosep ɑ́yuud yi gen e nudd e ying-ɑ kɑl. Kɑ wɑ̈thi gen kuul gen piny kì bøle.
Kɑ Yosep okööbø kinni, “Á kipe ngø ɑ kwɑl wun óthɑ̈ngɑ? Kwïj yi wun kinni yïɑ dɑ tegø men yodɑ jɑmm-ɑ bɑ ɑkɑnn?”
Kɑ Yeudɑ̀ ólöggø kinni, “Á ngø ɑ kwøb yi wøn wuö? Wø ópëm ɑ dï? Ri wøn óyiel yi wøn kidï? Bɑ̈jji wøn ɑ́nyodh yi Jwøk. Wø bɑ bɑ̈nggí bënn, pɑth ki nyel-ɑ́ yïe ɑ́yood óthɑ̈gi kete.”
Yosep ɑ́kööb kinni, “Pöy! Pɑ cuggi, yɑ pɑ dwɑddi wun wu bënn! Ngɑn-ɑ yïe ɑ́yood óthɑ̈gi kete, en ɑ mɑg yi yɑn ɑ́ bɑ̈ng.”
Kɑ Yeudɑ̀ kɑl-ɑ nyegi buti Yosep, ɑkööbe kinni, “Yɑ kwɑjj-ɑ yïn wuö, wiy yɑ kwøbɑ møg-ɑ pyëwɑ. Pyëwí ko rënyi ki yɑn, yï pɑ̈r ki rɑ̈dh ceth.
Wuö, wø ɑ́pyëj yi yïn cøn, kinni, dɑ wïyi wun wɑlɑ̀ ómï wun megø?
Kɑ wø okööbø kinni, wïyi wøn nud de bɑ yu, ki ómï wøn me thiinh, ɑ́nywøl e wïyi wøn rum yöø. Ómï nyelɑni ɑ́thøw, o bɑ e kete ɑ nud kì yij meye. Mɑɑr yi wïye ki mendwøng.
Kɑ wø köbbí wuö kinni, ‘Kɑ̈ɑ̈l wun en keny o lidhɑ.’
Alöggi wøn kinni, ‘Nyelthinh wïye pɑ cuggi wiyø yi en, ke wiye gøn, bɑ men thøw.’
Kɑ yï okööbø kinni, ‘Wu pɑ wɑ̈nhi bølɑ këti, keløg nyelthinh pɑ bï ki wun.’
“Keny-ɑ ɑ́døøg wøn yï wïyi wøn, kɑ löbbi wøn møg-ɑ ɑ́kwøb yi yïn.
Codhe, keny-ɑ ɑ́thumi byel, ɑköbbe wøn i dwɑ̈nni wøn ki byel.
Akööb wøn kinni, ‘Wø pɑ kedh, kipe wø pɑ cuggi yïëyø o wø kedhi wøn bøli jɑlɑni, keløg ómï wøn nyelthinh pɑ kedh thyew.’
Kɑ wïyi wøn okööbø kinni, ‘Ngɑ̈nyi yi wun kinni cyëgɑ Rɑceel, yɑ ɑ́nyölle’ wɑ̈dd ɑ́ryew keti gen.
Yɑ ɑ́rum ki wiy piny yi ɑ́kyel, ɑ́cɑm yi lɑ̈ɑ̈y pɑ̈l, mɑ́ e nuti liidh yɑn kër-ɑ ɑ́kedhe.
Keløg men okɑ̈ɑ̈lø yi wun ɑnɑn, kɑ dɑ gïn kedhi ree, yɑ bɑ yu ni men, yɑ ceg kɑ nɑ̈gø yi rummì.”

Kɑ Yeudɑ̀ okööbø kinni, “Anɑn wuö, ke døøgɑ yï wïyɑ, kɑ nyelthinh odöngø, wïyɑ ceg-ɑ mɑ̈ɑ̈gø thøø keny-ɑ ólidhe nyelthinh e tøøk kì kelli wøn, mɑ́ wëye ɑ́cïbe kömi nyelthinh, o ɑ́nyönhi yi döng ki nyönhø me cugge’ nɑ̈gø yi rummì.
Reb ki kinni yɑ ɑ́böyi kinni wëyɑ ómuujɑ kipe nyelthinh ke di gïn cwöb, wïyɑ ɑ́köbbɑ kinni, ‘Keløg nyelthinh pɑ döggɑ yïn ki tɑrø, kɑ yï ywøøg riɑ.’
Anɑn wuö, yɑ óbëëdø kì keny yɑn ɑ́ kej nyelthinh, kɑ wiy kedhe yï wïye geki nyiimen.
Yɑ ókedhi yï wïyɑ kidï, keløg nyelthinh pɑ døg? Pyëwɑ pɑ løg me med ki bëëni gïnrɑj ni men kömi wïyɑ!”
Aywönge kɑ genge lïngi yi tyëng Rïp kì wɑ̈g, kɑ wöödø wɑ̈dh-ɑ gøldwøng.
Yosep nyiimen ɑ́köbbe kinni, “Bene yɑn Yosep. Wïyee nudd e onëënø?” De keny-ɑ ɑ́lïngi møgɑni yi nyiiwɑ̈n, ge ɑ́ceg bwøgø ki mendwøng, kɑ ge ódhɑ̈lø löggø.
Aköbbi gen yi Yosep kinni, “Yɑ kwɑjj-ɑ wun, kɑlu nyïngi keny.” Kɑ ge nyeg-ɑ bute. Kɑ okööbø kinni, “Bene yɑn Yosep, ómï wun, nyel-ɑ ɑ́ngëwwu tyëng-ɑ ɑ́kɑ̈ɑ̈lii Rïp.
Anɑn pëthi wun ko rɑ̈ɑ̈m. Ri wun ko cɑyyi wun kipe kɑ ɑ́ngeew wun yɑn. Bɑ Jwøk kidyër ɑ ɑ́ör yɑn bøli wun be yieli ji.
Men bɑ ryeew runni kɑ̈j kì pönhï, runn ɑ́bïj møøgø nudd ge obëënø, runn-ɑ óbong byel møg-ɑ ócyeg kì yethi gen.
Yɑ ɑ́ör bøli wun yi Jwøk ki yuu-ɑ dhɑ̈li gɑmø yi wɑ̈thee èn, kɑ per kinni o wu bødh wun, wuki nyigi wun.
Kɑ̀ bëëde kinøw, pɑth ki wun, de bɑ Jwøk ɑ ɑ́kɑ̈ɑ̈l yɑn pönhï. Kɑ yɑ cïbe mɑl kibøli jyɑ̈ggi rɑ̈dh bënn, bene yɑn jɑngi Rïp bëne.
Wu ócuggø bëëdø kì myërri Göcen, keny-ɑ cuggi wun ki bëëdø wu cyɑ̈gi ki yɑn, wuki nyigí, kí kwɑrrí, kí dyëgi wun, kí dhögi wun, kí jɑmmi wun møg-ɑ kyeelø bënn.
Keny-ɑ óying wun Göcen, wu ócuggø korø yi yɑn. Nudd e dɑ runn ɑ́bïj mø kɑ̈j, o yɑ pɑ dwɑddi kinni o wu thøw wun yi kɑ̈j, wuki kɑ̈lli wun kí dhögi wun bënn.’ ”
Kɑ Yosep okööbø kinni, “Anɑn wu bënn, kí yïn thyew Ben Yɑmïn, ɑ́lidh yi wun kinni yɑ bɑ Yosep.
Köbbu wïyɑ, kinni ɑ́ tegø me ni ngø ɑ yïɑ kì Rïp keny! Kɑ köbbu jɑmm-ɑ ɑ́lidh yi wun bënn.”
Kɑ ómen Ben Yɑmïn dööbe kööre e óywöngø. Ben Yɑmïn ɑ́ywöngi thyew keny-ɑ ɑ́dööbii kɑ̈w yi ómen.
Codhe, e pïi nyinge nuti pooj en, ɑcɑ̈ge ki döbbi nyiiwɑ̈n, kɑ gï nuume bënn. Codhe cyee, ɑcɑ̈gi nyiiwɑ̈n ki kwøb ki en.
Keny-ɑ ɑ́wɑ̈dhi wöödø gøldwøng, kinni i nyiimï Yosep bëënø, kɑ rɑ̈dh pyëwe ómïnø ki mendwøng geki jøg-ɑ jɑgg.
Kɑ Yosep köbbi yi rɑ̈dh kinni, “Köbbí nyiimyëw cïb gen jɑmmi gen kömi ɑderr, kɑ ge døøg gen piny Kɑnɑɑn.
Kɑ̈ɑ̈l gen wïyi gen geki kɑ̈lli gen, kɑ ge dwöög gen keny. Ge ómëggɑ piny men-ɑ pëddi døøjø kì Rïp. O ge óyïddi ki gïgcɑmm mø gïïr.
Köbbí gen kɑ̈ɑ̈d gen ki yɑ̈ɑ̈th møg-ɑ ókɑ̈ɑ̈l mɑ̈nni gen kí nyigi gen møg-ɑ thønhø kí wïyi gen.
Pëthi gen ko lïngi kipe jɑmmi gen møg-ɑ ódhɑ̈li wɑ̈nhø, mɑ́ jɑmm-ɑ døj bënn kì Rïp óbëëdø gɑ mø gen.”
Wɑ̈ddi Yɑgob ɑ́göög ni kɑ ɑ́köbbi gen ceth. Ge ɑ́nëngi ki yɑ̈ɑ̈th yi Yosep ni kɑ ɑ́kööb rɑ̈dh, kɑ ge thödhi ki gïg cɑɑm gen yöö.
Kɑ ge nëngi yi en ki ógudh møg-ɑ ówil gen ógudh-ɑ rug yi gen kì kö yöö. De Ben Yɑmïn ɑ́mëgge’ ógudh ɑ́bïj, kí ngyëny ɑ́tegg miy ɑ́dɑ̈g.
Kɑ wïye öde ki ɑderr pyɑ̈rø, møg pyëjji ki yɑ̈ɑ̈th, kömi gen dɑ jɑmm-ɑ døj mø Rïp. Kí pyɑ̈rø møøgø møg kömi gen di ɑ́bwög, kí ópùni ɑ́bwög, kí gïg møøgø møg-ɑ ócɑɑm yöö.
Aöre nyiimen yöö, kɑ gï köbbe kinni, “Wu ko wër kì kö yöö.”
Kɑ ge odhwödhø kì Rïp, ge døøg-ɑ yï wïyi gen kì piny Kɑnɑɑn. Kɑ ge wɑ̈dh-ɑ kɑɑl gen.
Aköbbi gen wïyi gen kinni, “Yosep nudd e onëënø! En ɑ bɑ jɑngi Rïp bëne!” Kɑ Yɑgob ongɑ̈ngø, kɑ ódhɑ̈lø yïëyi kwøbbi gen.
De keny-ɑ ɑ́köbbii kwøbb-ɑ ɑ́köbbi gen yi Yosep bënn, kí kɑ ɑ́lidhe yɑ̈th-ɑ pyejji yi ɑderr møg-ɑ ɑ́ör yi Yosep gɑ møg kïdhii Rïp, ɑdwöög pyëwe cyee.
Kɑ okööbø kinni, “Ngøø, de wɑ̈dɑ Yosep nud e onëënø! Yɑ kedh-ɑ be lidhii kɑ̈ng-ɑ nuti thøw yɑn.”
Isrɑil jɑmme ɑ́cønge bënn kɑ kedh-ɑ Bircebɑ̀. Kɑ Jwøøg wïye Isɑɑk mɑlle kì kunɑni, ɑngɑ̈ɑ̈de ki dhög gɑ gëdhhì.
Aköbbi Isrɑil yi Jwøk kì yethi lɑ̈g kì wɑ̈r kinni, “Yɑgob, Yɑgob.”
Kɑ ólöggø kinni, “Yɑn èn.”
Akööb Jwøk kinni, “Yɑ bɑ Jwøøg wïyí, kedhí Rïp. Kwɑrrí ókuun yi yɑn kì kunɑni, kɑ ge ogöögø ki pödhø me dwøng.
Wɑ ókedhi Rïp kyeel. Kwɑrrí ódwöögɑ piny men. Yosep óbëëd e ying-ɑ butí keny-ɑ óthøw.”
Kɑ Yɑgob odhwödhø kì Bircebɑ̀, en, kí othønhø, kí tyëng-ɑ mɑ̈nn. Ge ɑ́cïb yethi yɑ̈ɑ̈th møg-ɑ ɑ́ör yi rɑ̈ɑ̈dh Rïp gɑ møg-ɑ ókɑ̈l gen.
Dhög kí dyëg, kí jɑmm-ɑ ɑ́lem yi gen kì piny Kɑnɑɑn, ɑ́kïdhi Rïp yi gen. Yɑgob ɑ́kedhi Rïp geki gøle bëne,
Wɑ̈dde, kí kwɑrre, kí nyige møg-ɑ cwøw, kí kwɑrre møg-ɑ mɑ̈nn, ge ɑ́kedh bënn.
Tyëng gøl Isrɑil møg-ɑ ɑ́kedhi Rïp ki en bɑ, wɑ̈de nyel-ɑ dwøng, ɑ løg Ruben,
kí wɑ̈ddi Ruben, Aɑnök, Pɑlu, Ëdhrön kí Kɑrmì.
Cimeøn kí wɑ̈dde, Yɑmuel, Yɑmïn, Oɑ̈ɑ̈d, Yɑkin, Dhoɑr, kí Cɑul wɑ̈d nyɑɑr Kɑnɑɑn.
Leebì kí wɑ̈dde, Gercön, Kɑ̈ɑ̈th kí Merɑrì.
Kí wɑ̈ddi Yeudɑ̀, Celɑ̀, Peredh kí Dherɑ̀. Wɑ̈ddi Yeudɑ̀ ɑ́ryew, ɑ løg Er kí Onɑ̈n, ge ɑ́thøw kì piny Kɑnɑɑn. Wɑ̈ddi Peredh bɑ Ëdhrön kí Amul.
Kí wɑ̈ddi Isɑkɑr, Tölɑ̀, Puɑ̀, Yɑcub kí Cimrön.
Kí wɑ̈ddi Dhebulun, Sered, Elön kí Yɑliil.
Møgɑk bɑ wɑ̈dd-ɑ ɑ́nyölli Yɑgob yi Leɑ̀ kì Töör Arɑm, kɑ onywølø ki nyɑre thyew me cwøl ɑ́ Dïnɑ̀. Kwɑrri Yɑgob møg-ɑ kɑ̈ɑ̈l ri Leɑ̀, kwɑnni gen bënn bɑ pyɑ̈r ɑ́dɑ̈g wïdɑ́dɑ̈g
Kí wɑ̈ddi Gɑd, Dhepön, Agì, Cunì, Idhbön, Erì, Aröd, kí Arelì.
Kí wɑ̈ddi Aceer, Imnɑ̀, Icbɑ̀, Icbì, Beriyɑ̀ kí nyimï gen Serɑ̀. Wɑ̈ddi Beriyɑ̀ bɑ Keber kí Mɑlkiel.
Pyɑ̈rø wïdɑ́bïkyel møgɑk bɑ kwɑrri Yɑgob møg-ɑ kɑ̈ɑ̈l ri Dhilpɑ̀, bɑ̈ng-ɑ dhɑjø men-ɑ ɑ́muuj yi Lɑbɑn e nëng-ɑ nyɑre Leɑ̀.
Wɑ̈ddi Rɑceel bɑ ɑ́ryew, Yosep kí Ben Yɑmïn.
Kɑ Yosep nyöddi ki wɑ̈dd ɑ́ryew, Mɑnɑsè kí Eprɑim, yi Asenɑth nyɑɑr Pøtiperɑ̀, ókwëri On.
Kí wɑ̈ddi Ben Yɑmïn bɑ Belɑ̀, Becer, Acbel, Gerɑ̀, Nɑɑmɑn, Ekì, Röc, Mupïm, Upïm kí Ard.
Pyɑ̈rø wïdɑ́ngwen møgɑk, bɑ kwɑrri Yɑgob møg-ɑ kɑ̈ɑ̈l ri Rɑceel.
Dɑn kí wɑ̈de Ucim.
Kí wɑ̈ddi Nɑptɑlì, Yɑdhiil, Gunì, Yedher, kí Cilem.
Ábïryew møgɑk bɑ kwɑrri Yɑgob møg-ɑ kɑ̈ɑ̈l ri Bilɑ̀, bɑ̈ng-ɑ dhɑjø men-ɑ ɑ́muuj yi Lɑbɑn e nëng-ɑ nyɑre Rɑceel.
Kwɑnni møg-ɑ ceg bëëdø gɑ kwɑrri Yɑgob, møg-ɑ ɑ́kedhi Rïp, bɑ pyɑ̈r ɑ́bïkyel wïdɑ́bïkyel. Mɑ̈nni wɑ̈dde pɑth ki ɑkwɑn.
Wɑ̈dd ɑ́ryew ɑ ɑ́nywøl yi Yosep kì Rïp. Gøl Yɑgob kɑ̀ rëbe bëne, kì bøli keny-ɑ ɑ́dɑ̈ggi gen Rïp, gwøg-ɑ pyɑ̈r ɑ́bïryew.
Kɑ Yɑgob Yeudɑ̀ öre bøle be cwøli Yosep, o bëe be yïddø ki gen keny-ɑ ɑ́wɑ̈nhi gen Göcen.

Kɑ Yosep pëgg-ɑ yij yɑ̈ye men-ɑ nyi pyejji yi kyënyì. Kɑ kedh-ɑ Göcen be yïddø ki wïye. Keny-ɑ ɑ́cyɑ̈nge ki wïye, ɑpɑ̈ɑ̈re piny kì yij yɑ̈y, kɑ reng-ɑ yïe, kɑ cingge myeene mune, kɑ óywöngø ki keny me bɑ̈ɑ̈r.
Kɑ Yɑgob Yosep köbbe kinni, “Cɑgg yɑ thøw ɑnɑn, pyëwɑ med kɑ ɑ́rumɑ ki lidhi yïn. Kɑ yod yi yɑn kinni yï nudd yï onëënø.”
Kɑ Yosep nyiimen geki gøl wïye bëne köbbe kinni, “Yɑ dwɑdd-ɑ kedhø, o rɑ̈dh köbbi yi yɑn kinni, nyiimïɑ geki gøl wïyɑ bëne møg-ɑ ɑ́bëëd kì Kɑnɑɑn, ge ɑ́bï yïɑ bënn.
Óköbbi yi yɑn kinni wu bɑ tyëngkwɑ̈yø, wu ɑ́bï wu kwøll-ɑ dhögi wun ki dyëgi wun.
Keny-ɑ ócwøøl wun yi rɑ̈dh, kɑ wu pyëj yi en kinni gwøøg wun bɑ ngø?

Köbbu en ceth kinni gwøøg wøn bɑ kwɑ̈yø ki dyëg geki dhög kër-ɑ ɑ́pïïdh wøn, ni kɑ ɑ́bëëd kweyyi wun ceth. Keløg e óköbbi yi wun kinøw, wu ówiy yi en, o wu bëëd wun kì Göcen.” Møgɑni ɑ́kwøb yi Yosep e ngɑ̈ny wøw kinni tyëng Rïp pɑ nyi dwɑddi bëëdø kì kej ɑ́kyel ki tyëngkwɑ̈yø.
Codhe, kɑ Yosep ókɑ̈bbø ki ɑ́bïj kì kelli nyiimen, ɑkïdhe gïn bøli rɑ̈dh, ɑkööbe kinni, “Wïyɑ geki nyiimïɑ ge ɑ́bï kì piny Kɑnɑɑn, kí dhögi gen kí dyëgi gen, kí jɑmmi gen bënn. Ge ying-ɑ Göcen ɑnɑn.”
Anyudhe nyiimen rɑ̈dh.
Apyëëj gen yi rɑ̈dh kinni, “Gwøøg wun bɑ ngø?”

Kɑ ge okööbø kinni “Wø bɑ tyëngkwɑ̈yø wuö, ni kɑ ɑ́bëëd kweyyi wøn. Wø ɑ́bï-ɑ be bëëdø kì pönhï, mɑ́ kɑ̈j rɑɑj kì piny Kɑnɑɑn. Dhögi wøn ki dyëgi wøn ɑ́jɑd thyew ki lum men cɑm yi gen. Wø kwɑjj-ɑ yïn, wiy wø bëëd wøn kì Göcen.”
Aköbbi Yosep yi rɑ̈dh kinni, “Anɑn kɑ ɑ́wɑ̈nhi wïyí geki nyiimyëw,
piny Rïp bɑ mi gen. Wiy ge bëëd gen kì Göcen. Bene en keny-ɑ døøj kì yij pödhø. Kɑ keløg e dɑ ji mø ngɑ̈ny mïdhø kidøøj kì kelli gen, cïb dhögɑ cinggi gen.”
Codhe, kɑ Yosep wïye kɑ̈ɑ̈le, ɑkïdhe gøn bøli rɑ̈dh. Kɑ rɑ̈dh kwëng yi Yɑgob.
Kɑ pyëj yi rɑ̈dh kinni, “Runní bɑ ɑ́dï?”
Alöggi Yɑgob kinni, “Yïɑ dɑ runn miyø kí pyɑ̈r ɑ́dɑ̈g, yɑ owïïnø ki dhögɑ geki dyëgɑ, runnɑ ceggø, o yɑ ɑ́rɑngi kì yethi gen. Pɑ pɑ̈r ki runn-ɑ́ nyi tyëg yi kweyyɑ.”
Kɑ rɑ̈dh cigi kwëngø yi Yɑgob, codhe kɑ ókedhø.
Kɑ Yosep wïye geki nyiimen cïbe piny kì Rïp. Gï ɑ́thödhe ki jɑmm-ɑ døj bënn. Kɑ ge ogudø ki kɑɑl kì Rɑmsis, ni kɑ ɑ́kwøbii yi rɑ̈dh.
Yosep nyiimen ɑ́thödhe ki gïgcɑmm geki kɑ̈lli gen, kí ji-ɑ ɑ́kɑ̈lli yi gen bënn, kí møg-ɑ thønhø, bong ngɑn di gïjø mɑ ɑ́jɑ̈ddii.
Kɑ̈j ɑ́bëëd e teeg, bong gïncɑm me nud kì keny megø. Kɑ tyëng Rïp geki tyëng Kɑnɑɑn ónyönhø yi kɑ̈j.
Kenyi bëën ji be ngyew ki byel, ngyënyy-ɑ ngëëw yi gen nyi ceg kɑ cøngø yi Yosep bënn, kɑ gï nyi kïdhe gøldwøng.
Keny-ɑ ɑ́thumi ngyëny kì piny Rïp geki Kɑnɑɑn, ɑbëën tyëng Rïp yï Yosep, kɑ ge okööbø kinni, “Thödhí wøn ki gïncɑm, wø ko wëggí thøø. Yiel wøn! Ngyënyyi wøn ɑ́thumi.”
Alöggi Yosep kinni, “Kɑ̈ɑ̈l wun dhögi wun, ge ówil yi yɑn ki byel, keløg ngyënyyi wun thumø.”
Codhe, kɑ dhögi gen muuj gen Yosep. Møøgø ɑ́kɑ̈ɑ̈l-ɑ kyënyì, kí dyëg ɑ́tegg kí römm, kí ɑderr. Runɑni ɑ́tyëg yi gen ge cɑm-ɑ byell-ɑ ɑ́wiil jɑmmi gen.

Keny-ɑ ɑ́thumi runɑni, ɑbëën gen yïe kì run-ɑ kyeelø, ɑkööb gen kinni, “Bong gïn kɑ̈nni yïn yi wøn wuö, ngyënyyi wøn ɑ́thumi, o dhög kí lɑ̈yy-ɑ kyeelø bɑ møgí bënn. Bong gïjø mɑ ɑ́döng me cuggi mëggi yïn, den-ɑ́ wøn ki dëlli wøn, kí pwödhhi wøn.

Wø ko wëggí thøø. Yiel wøn! Pwödhhi wøn ko wëggi döngi piny. Ngew wøn, wøki pwödhhi wøn. Wø óbëëdø wø bɑ bɑ̈nggi rɑ̈dh. O pwödhhi wøn óbëëdø gɑ møge. Thödhí wøn ki byel møg cɑm, ki köödh møg kɑ̈g yi wøn, kì yethi pwödhhi wøn.”
Kɑ Yosep piny Rïp bëne ngewe, kɑ ogöögø ki mi rɑ̈dh.
Yosep ji bënn ɑ́gwøge gɑ bɑ̈nggi rɑ̈dh, cɑg kì tuung gïti tung-ɑ kyeelø kì piny Rïp.
Pìnyi ókwër ɑ ɑ́cög ge nuti kwɑɑny en keti gen, mɑ́ ókwër ɑ́bëëd ge nyii thödhø ki gïncɑm yi rɑ̈dh, bene ɑ cög pìnyi gen nuti ngeew gen.
Kɑ ji köbbi yi Yosep kinni, “Álidh yi wun? Wu ɑ́ngëwwɑ rɑ̈dh, wuki pìnyi wun bënn. Kwɑnyu köödh møg, kɑ pwödhhi wun kɑ̈g wun.
Kì bøli keny-ɑ ókɑɑj byel, pɑ̈ngu gen gɑ bud ɑ́bïj, kɑ budø ɑ́kyel nyi mëggi rɑ̈dh. Møg-ɑ döng ógwøøg köödh kí gïncɑm yi kɑ̈lli wun.”
Kɑ ge okööbø kinni, “Wëyi wøn ɑ́yiel yi yïn, wø ɑ́mïdhi yi yïn kidøøj wuö. Wø ɑ́yïëy, wø bɑ bɑ̈nggi rɑ̈dh.”
Kɑ cïb ɑ́ cigg yi Yosep kinni, nyi mëggi bïïj buddi byel rɑ̈dh. Ciggɑni nudd ge ogöögø dicyɑ̈ngtïn. Pwödhhi ókwër keti gen ɑ ɑ́döng ge pɑth ki mø rɑ̈dh.
Gøl Isrɑil ɑ́bëëd kì Göcen kì Rïp. Ge ɑ́kɑ̈ri kì kunɑni, kɑ kwɑnni gen óngënyø ki mendwøng.
Yɑgob ɑ́bëëd kì Rïp ki runn pyɑ̈rø wïdɑ́bïryew, gïti kɑ ɑ́göög runne gɑ miyø kí pyɑ̈r ɑ́ngwen wïdɑ́bïryew.
Keny-ɑ ɑ́cyɑ̈ngi kej thøwe, ɑcwøle wɑ̈de Yosep, kɑ gø köbbe kinni, “Cïb cingí thɑ rɑ̈mɑ, kɑ yï köngí ki mendwøng kinni, yɑ pɑ kony yi yïn kì Rïp.
Yɑ dwɑdd-ɑ koony keny-ɑ ɑ́koony wëëgɑ. Kïdhí yɑn wɑ̈g kì pönhï, kɑ yɑ koony kun-ɑ ɑ́koony gen.”
Kɑ Yosep okööbø kinni, “Møg-ɑ ɑ́kwøb yi yïn ógwøg yi yɑn.”
Kɑ okööbø kinni, “Köngí kì bølɑ.” Kɑ Yosep óköngø kì bøle. Kɑ Yɑgob Jwøk mɑlle, e obuddø kì wïj pyëne.
Kɑ Yosep muuj wöödø cyɑ̈ng megø, kì cyɑ̈ɑ̈n piny kinni, “Wïyí ɑ́cöög piny ki rɑ̈ɑ̈m dële.” Kɑ wɑ̈dde, Eprɑim geki Mɑnɑsè kwɑnye, kɑ ge kedh-ɑ be këëmi Yɑgob.
Keny-ɑ ɑ́köbbi Yɑgob kinni wɑ̈de Yosep bëën be lidhii, kɑ ree nyɑge, ɑdhwödhe mɑl kì yij pyën.
Kɑ Yosep köbbi yi Yɑgob kinni, “Jwøk Áyïmø, ɑ́bï yïɑ kì yethi lɑ̈g, keny-ɑ ɑ́yingɑ Ludh kì piny Kɑnɑɑn, kɑ yɑ gyëdhe.
Yɑ ɑ́köbbe kinni, ‘Yï ónëngi yi yɑn ki nywøl mø gïïr, o kwɑrrí göög gen ki pödhh mø gïïr, piny men ómëggɑ kwɑrrí gïti ɑtheer.’
“Yosep, wɑ̈ddí ryeet møg-ɑ ɑ́nywøl kì Rïp, yɑ nuti wɑ̈nhi keny, bɑ møgɑ, ɑ løg Mɑnɑsè geki Eprɑim, ge bɑ wɑ̈ddɑ ceth ni Ruben geki Cimeøn.
Ke di wɑ̈ddí møøgø, ge pɑ cölli yɑn, ge pɑ lɑ̈gi ki gïïpiny kì yïɑ, de ge óyïd-ɑ́ɑ̀ bɑng Eprɑim geki Mɑnɑsè.

Yɑ göögø kinøw kɑ per meyí Rɑceel. Yɑ ɑ́ywöngi ki ywøng teg keny-ɑ ɑ́thøwe kì piny Kɑnɑɑn, kì buti Eprɑtɑ̀, yɑ dwöög ɑ Misøpøtɑmiyɑ̀. Kɑ konyɑ kì kenyɑni, kì tøg yuu-ɑ kedhi Eprɑtɑ̀.” (Eprɑtɑ̀ cwølli ɑnɑn ɑ́ Betleem.)
Yɑgob keny-ɑ ɑ́lidhe wɑ̈ddi Yosep, ɑpëjje kinni, “Á møg ek?”
Alöggi Yosep kinni, “Ge bɑ wɑ̈ddɑ møg-ɑ ɑ́gëdhhi yɑn yi Jwøk kì piny Rïp keny.”
