Kɑ Yɑgob okööbø kinni, “Kɑ̈ɑ̈l gen butɑ, o ge mëggɑ gyëdh.”
Yɑgob nyinge pɑ nëënø kidøøj yi döng, nyinge ceg-ɑ dhïïdhø. Kɑ yɑnythønhø nyiig bute yi Yosep. Kɑ gï dööbe kööre, ɑnuume gïn.
Aköbbi Yosep yi Isrɑil kinni, “Yɑ ɑ́rømm-ɑ kinni yï rum thøø, o yï pɑ lidhɑ këti. Lidh, ɑnɑn Jwøk yɑ ɑ́nyudhe nyigí.”
Kɑ ge kɑl ki nyiig cyɑ̈n yi Yosep kì ri Yɑgob. Kɑ wïje kuule piny kì bøli wïye, gïti kɑ ɑ́nywɑ̈ddi wïje ki piny.
Yosep Eprɑim ɑ́cïbe wïj cɑɑm Yɑgob, kɑ Mɑnɑsè cïbe wïj kyëje.
De Yɑgob cingge ɑ́bɑ̈ɑ̈ne, kɑ cingi kyëje cïbe wïj Eprɑim, ngö e bɑ en ɑ thinh. Kɑ cingi cɑɑme cïbe wïj Mɑnɑsè, en ɑ nyeldwøng.
Akwënge Yosep geki wɑ̈dde kinni,
“Yɑnythønhø møg ógyëdh yi Jwøng-ɑ́ bøle ɑ́cyɑ̈dhi yi wëëgɑ,
Abrɑhɑm geki Isɑɑk.
Ge ógyëdh yi Jwøng-ɑ ɑ́kor yɑn kër-ɑ ɑ́wönɑ yɑ thiinh gïti ɑnɑn.
Wiy wëywön-ɑ ɑ́yiel yɑn kì yethi rɑj bënn, kore gen.
Wiy nyingɑ kí nyingi wëëgɑ, Abrɑhɑm kí Isɑɑk cungi gen kì kömi gen.
Wiy ge yïddi gen ki wɑ̈dd, kí kwɑrr mø gïïr.”
Yosep pyëwe ɑ́rënyi keny-ɑ ɑ́lidhe wïye, e cingi kyëje cïb en wïj Eprɑim. Kɑ cingi wïye mɑɑge, gø cïbe’ wïj Mɑnɑsè.
Aköbbe wïye kinni, “Pɑth, dwöög cingí tuung wïyø, nyeldwøng èn, cïb cingi kyëjí wïje.”
Kɑ wïye óbɑ̈nyø ɑkööbe kinni, “Ngɑ̈nyi yi yɑn; ngɑ̈nyi yi yɑn wɑ̈dɑ. Kwɑrri Mɑnɑsè ógöögø ki pödhø me dwøng. De gøl ómen nyelthinh ógöögø ki pödhh mø døngø, óbëëd e dwøng kibøle.”
Kɑ Yosep köbbi yi Yɑgob kinni, “Ni kɑ̀ nëën, yɑ ɑ́cyɑ̈ngi ki thøø, de yï ókøny yi Jwøk, kɑ yï dwøøge piny kweyyi wun.
Bɑ yïn, pɑth ki nyiimyëw ɑ ɑ́mëggɑ Cekïm, piny-ɑ lɑ̈be med, ɑ ɑ́kɑb yi yɑn kì yï Amör, ki pilø geki weth.”
Kɑ Yɑgob wɑ̈dde cwøle, ɑkööbe kinni, “Nyïngu butɑ, o wu köbbɑ gïn-ɑ ócwöb dhuki megø.
Bïu cung wun ri wun, kɑ wu lïng wun, wɑ̈ddi Yɑgob.
Lïngu kwøbbi Isrɑil wïyi wun.”
“Ruben, kɑyɑ, bene yïn tegɑ.
Bene yïn ɑ ɑ́nywøl yi yɑn, yɑ bɑ wøb.
Yï bɑ jɑlngöönø, nyel-ɑ teg kì kelli wɑ̈ddɑ bënn.
Yï nɑ muud me dhøge di ɑpɑgø.
De pɑth ki yïn ɑ óbëëdø perí teg,
mɑ́ ɑkwɑnyɑ ɑ́niin yi yïn,
Pënni wïyí nuti wøør yïn.”
“Cimeøn geki Leebì bɑ nyiimëëg,
tøngg kɑ̈lli yi gen gɑ møg mud ki ji.
Yɑ pɑ kedhi yethi kwøbb-ɑ kømmi yi gen kì wɑ̈yi gen.
Wɑlɑ̀ yɑ pɑ kedhi yij buri gen,
mɑ́ ge nyi ceg-ɑ nɑ̈ggø kenyi rënyi pëthi gen.
Kenyi med pëthi gen, rɑ̈rri tyelli wɑdh nyii kebbø yi gen,
o dhɑ̈le’ cyɑ̈dhø.
Keji pëthi gen bɑ mi cyën,
mɑ́ e pëddi rɑ̈jø.
Ge ókedhhi yi yɑn kì yij piny Isrɑil,
kì bɑng rɑ̈ji pëthi gen.
“Yeudɑ̀, yï ópøjji yi nyiimyëw.
Cinggí óying muddi tyëngmɑ̈ɑ̈nø.
Wɑ̈ddi wïyí ri gen óbødhhi yi gen kì bølí.
nyi nɑ̈ggi e døøg-ɑ øde,
kɑ óbuddø ree rïïj en,
bong ngɑn pɑ̈nyii ki nywɑlø.
Yeudɑ̀ ɑ ómïdhi kwøøm rɑ̈ɑ̈dhø.
Kwɑrre ójyɑ̈ɑ̈gø ceth.
Pödhh bënn óyömmi yïe.
Kwøbbe ólïngi yi jurrì bënn.
Adere mɑɑge’ ri oløg men-ɑ pëddi døøjø.
Nyɑɑr ɑdere ying-ɑ ri bɑng-ɑ døøj.
Ógudhe nyi lwøg en kɑ møgi oløg men kwɑrø ni remø.
Nyinge kwɑ̈rrø yi møgi oløg.
Legge tɑr yi mɑdh ki cɑg.
“Dhebulun óbëëdø kì tøg nɑɑm omelø.
Dhøøwɑ̈dhhe bɑ kɑ̈jj-ɑ mɑ̈ɑ̈g yi yɑ̈ɑ̈th.
Dhøg pinye ówɑ̈dhi Sïdön.
“Isɑkɑr pɑ̈r ki ɑderø me cungi ree ther en
köme dɑ jɑmme.
Kɑ̀ lïdhe kinni piny døøj,
o lɑ̈bø med kì pödhø,
kɑ pyëwe nyi göjje gwøg,
kɑ ogöögø e nɑ bɑ̈ng.
“Dɑn óbëëd ɑ́ jɑgø kì kömi jie.
Ge óni kɑ̈lli Isrɑil møg-ɑ kyeelø.
Dɑn óbëëd ɑ́ thwöl kì tøg yöö;
thwöl mɑ nɑ̈ɑ̈g kì tøg yöö,
me nyi kɑj tyeli kyeny.
O ngɑn-ɑ köme leenge piny.
“Yɑ ngɑ̈dh-ɑ bëëni yïëdø mií, Yïn ɑ Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j!
“Gɑd köme ópɑ̈ɑ̈r yi kurrì.
De ree óluge gïn, kɑ gï cyedde.
“Piny Aceer yije ócyeeg yi jɑmmì mø døj.
En ɑ yïe ódi gïgcɑmm møg-ɑ døøj cɑrø, møg-ɑ nyi tyer yi rɑ̈nhì.
“Nɑptɑlì bɑ ɑ́køny me rïngi wïje tɑ̈dø,
o nyige óbëëd ge myëër ceth.
“Yosep nɑ odyerø kenyi cunge kì tøg nɑm.
Nɑ wɑ̈d kyeny kì kelli kïttì.
Köme opɑ̈ɑ̈rø yi tyëngmɑ̈ɑ̈nø ki menrɑj
kɑ cyeddi yi gen ki wethhi gen.
De wethe mïdhe’ mïdhø ki tegø.
Cingge ócwedø ge teeg
yi Jwøøg Yɑgob, Jwøng Teg,
ɑ yïe kɑ̈ɑ̈l yi tegi Isrɑil.
Bɑ Jwøøg wïyí ɑ korri yïn,
Áyïmø ɑ gyëdh yïn
ki kønh-ɑ kɑ̈ɑ̈l mɑl.
Kí pïg-ɑ thɑ piny.
Yï ógëdhe dhög kí nywøl.
Yï ógëdhe ɑ́bwög kí okøgg
yï ógëdhe kïtt-ɑ weenø.
Yï ógëdhe gïg mø pëddi døøjø ge kɑ̈ɑ̈l-ɑ ri kïtt-ɑ weenø.
Wiy gyëdhhɑni bï gen kömí Yosep,
yï ngɑn-ɑ ɑ́yieny kì kelli nyiimyëw.
“Ben Yɑmïn nɑ thwøønh gøøl.
Nyii nɑ̈ggø kì mwøl kí böörø, kɑ gëe nyi cɑme.”
Møgɑk bene gen wɑ̈thi kɑ̈lli Isrɑil gɑ pyɑ̈rø wïdɑ́ryew. O bene gen møg-ɑ ɑ́kwøb yi wïyi gen ɑgɑk, keny-ɑ ɑ́cyɑ̈nge ki thøø.
Kɑ Yɑgob wɑ̈dde cege kinni, “Anɑn yɑ kedh-ɑ kun-ɑ di kweyyɑ, yɑ othøø. Koony yɑn buti wëëgɑ, kì yij órøngi kït men-ɑ bɑɑg Eprön kwɑɑr Kit,
kì Mɑkpïlɑ̀, tung-ɑ røøm ki Mɑmɑrɑ̀, kì piny Kɑnɑɑn. Órøngi kïnɑni ɑ́ngew-ɑ yi Abrɑhɑm kì yï Eprön ɑ́ men yije nyi koony tyëngthøø.
Kenyɑni ɑ ɑ́koony Abrɑhɑm geki Sɑrɑ̀ cyëge, kenyɑni ɑ ɑ́koony Isɑɑk geki Rebekɑ̀ cyëge, o kenyɑni ɑ ɑ́koonyɑ Leɑ̀.
Bɑg menɑni geki órøngi kït, ɑ́ngew-ɑ yï kwɑrri Kit. Koony wun yɑn kunɑni.”
Yɑgob keny-ɑ ɑ́rume cegi wɑ̈dde, ɑdøøge ki buddø, kɑ wɑnge mije.
Kɑ Yosep ree leenge kömi wïye, e óywöngø, e numm-ɑ gøn.
Acwödde ki ji mø gïny wïye ki møw men-ɑ nyi mɑ̈ɑ̈n dhɑnhø kwɑ̈gø.
Kɑ tyëg-ɑ cyɑ̈ng pyɑ̈r ɑ́ngwen, e ogïnyyø ki møwɑni. Bene gen cyɑ̈ngg-ɑ nyi tyëg yi gwøngɑni, ɑ nyi thwøw dhɑnhø e pɑ kwɑ̈g. Kɑ Yɑgob ywøg yi tyëng Rïp ki cyɑ̈ng pyɑ̈r ɑ́bïryew.
Keny-ɑ ɑ́thumi cyɑ̈nggi ywøg, kɑ jyɑ̈ggi buri rɑ̈dh köbbi yi Yosep kinni, “Yɑ kwɑjj-ɑ wun, muuj wun wöödø men rɑ̈dh.
Keny-ɑ ɑ́cyɑ̈ngi wïyɑ ki thøø, yɑ ɑ́köbbe köngø kinni ókïdhɑ be koony yij rörø men-ɑ ɑ́wöd yi en kì yij kït, kì piny Kɑnɑɑn. Yɑ kwɑjj-ɑ yïn, wiy yɑ kedhɑ be konyi wïyɑ, o rume’ konyø, yɑ ódwöög.”
Kɑ rɑ̈dh ólöggø kinni, “Kedh, kony wïyí ni kɑ ɑ́köngí.”
Codhe, ɑkedhi Yosep be konyi wïye. Jyɑ̈ggì bënn, kí jøgdøngi burø, kí pëjji Rïp, ge ɑ́kedh bënn geki Yosep.
Gøle kí nyiimen, kí ji mø gïïr cɑrø, kí gøl wïye, ge ɑ́kedh ki en. Bɑ othønhø, kí dyëg, kí dhög ɑ ɑ́döng kì Göcen.
Cwøw møøgø cyɑ̈dh-ɑ́ɑ̀ kömi kyënyì, møøgø ying-ɑ yethi yɑ̈th-ɑ pyejji yi kyënyì. Ábëëd ɑ́ yɑy me dwøng cɑrø.

Keny-ɑ ɑ́wɑ̈dhi gen buti rɑri pwödhi Atɑd, kì kömi Nɑm Urdun kì wɑɑng cyɑ̈ɑ̈ng mwøl, ɑgud gen kì kenyɑni, kɑ ge óywöngø ki ywøg me dwøng, ki keny me bɑ̈ɑ̈r. Yosep wïye ɑ́ywøge ki cyɑ̈ng ɑ́bïryew kì kenyɑni.
Tyëng Kɑnɑɑn ɑ́ngɑ̈ng keny-ɑ ɑ́lidh gen ywøøg gen kì rɑri Atɑd, kɑ ge okööbø kinni, “Á ywøøg ngø ɑ ywøg yi tyëng Rïp kinøw?” Bene ɑ bɑnge cɑɑg kenyɑni ɑ́ Abel Misrɑim.
Kɑ wɑ̈ddi Yɑgob møg-ɑ ɑ́ceg yi wïyi gen, gwøg yi gen ceth.
Ákɑ̈l yi gen, kɑ gø koony gen yij órøngi kït kì Mɑkpïlɑ̀, kì tung-ɑ døøg kuni Mɑmɑrɑ̀, kì yij bɑng-ɑ ɑ́ngew yi Abrɑhɑm kì yï Eprön kwɑɑr Kit ɑ́ keny nyi koony tyëngthøø.
Keny-ɑ ɑ́rum Yosep ki konyi wïye, ɑdøøge Rïp, geki nyiimen, kí ji-ɑ ɑ́lwøøgii bënn.
Nyiiwï Yosep keny-ɑ ɑ́rum wïyi gen ki konyø, ge ɑ́kööb ki ri gen kinni, “Wɑ göög ɑ dï, keløg Yosep pyëwe nudd e rɑɑj ki wɑ, kipe gïnrɑj men-ɑ ɑ́göggii yi wɑ, kɑ keje dwɑdde colø?”
Aödi gen yï Yosep kinni, “Keny-ɑ́ nuti thøw wïyee,

ɑ́kööb i kwɑjji wøn yïn kinni, ‘Lɑ̈ɑ̈m pyëwí ki nyiimyëw kipe gïnrɑj men-ɑ ɑ́göggi yïn yi gen.’ Anɑn wø kwɑjj-ɑ yïn, lɑ̈ɑ̈m pyëwí ki wøn kipe gïnrɑj men-ɑ göggi yïn yi wøn, mɑ́ wø bɑ bɑ̈nggi Jwøøg wïyí.” Yosep ɑ́ywöngi keny-ɑ ɑ́lïnge møgɑni.
Kɑ nyiiwɑ̈n obëënø cyee, kɑ ri gen bøødh gen piny kì bøle, ɑkööb gen kinni, “Wøn ɑ bølí èn, wø bɑ bɑ̈nggí.”
Kɑ gï köbbe kinni, “Wu ko böggi. Yɑ pɑ cuggi cïbi riɑ kej Jwøk.
Wu ɑ́dwɑdd-ɑ göggi yɑn gïnrɑj, de ɑ́løg gïndøj yi Jwøk, kipe mïdhi wëyi ji møg-ɑ nudd ge onëënø ɑnɑn dicyɑ̈ngtïn, kì bɑng kɑ̀ yingɑ keny.
Bong gïn böggi yi wun, wu ókorri yi yɑn wuki nyigi wun bënn.” Kɑ pëthi gen dwöög yi en ki kwøb mø døøj.
Kɑ Yosep obëëdø kì Rïp geki gøl wïye. Runne ɑ́bëëd gɑ miyø kí pyɑ̈rø keny-ɑ ɑ́thøwe.
Ábëëd kɑ wɑ̈ddi Eprɑim, kɑ kwɑrre lidhe. Thyew keny-ɑ ɑ́yïddi Mɑkir wɑ̈d Mɑnɑsè kí wɑ̈dde, Yosep ɑ́bëëd e nudd e onëënø.
Kɑ nyiimen köbbe kinni, “Yɑ ɑ́cyɑ̈ngi ki thøø. De wu ókorri yi Jwøk, kɑ wu dwøøge piny-ɑ ɑ́mëgge Abrɑhɑm, kí Isɑɑk, kí Yɑgob.”
Kɑ Yosep tyëng gøl gen köbbe köngi gen, ɑ́kööb kinni, “Köngi wun kì bølɑ kinni, keny-ɑ ópeej wun pinyɑni yi Jwøk, yɑ ókɑ̈l yi wun.”
Codhe, ɑthøw Yosep kì Rïp, e runne bɑ miyø kí pyɑ̈rø. Kɑ gïny ki møw men-ɑ nyi mɑ̈ɑ̈n dhɑnhø kwɑ̈gø. Kɑ kïdhi yij Sɑndug.
Ruben, Cimeøn, Leebì, Yeudɑ̀,
Isɑkɑr, Dhebulun, Ben Yɑmïn,
Dɑn, Nɑptɑlì, Gɑd, kí Aceer.
Kwɑnni gøl Yɑgob, ɑ løg wɑ̈dde geki kwɑrre ɑ́bëëd gɑ pyɑ̈r ɑ́bïryew. Yosep ɑ́ying-ɑ Rïp.
Codhe, kɑ Yosep othøø geki nyiimen ki rïnyɑni bëne.
De kwɑrri gen, tyëng Isrɑil ɑ́nywøl kɑ kwɑnni gen óngënyø kɑ ge ótëngø ki mendwøng, kɑ piny opɑ̈ngø yi gen.
Kɑ rɑ̈nhɑni jie köbbe kinni, “Lidhu tyëng Isrɑil, ge ɑ́ceg ngënyø kɑ ge ótëngø kibølee.
Ke di liny me bï, ge ócuggø rëbø ki tyëngmɑ̈ɑ̈nø, kɑ ge ónyïɑ̈ggø ki wɑ, codhe, kɑ ge odhwödhø kì pödhee. Yɑ̈ɑ̈b wɑ ki yöö men mɑ̈ɑ̈n wɑ gen ngënyø.”
Codhe, kɑ tyëng Isrɑil cïb cinggi jɑggi gwøg møg cir gen, o köthi gen buudh ki gwøng teg. Kɑ kɑ̈dd ɑ́ryew, ɑ løg Pithöm kí Rɑmsis ger yi gen gɑ møg mïdhi jɑmmi rɑ̈dh.
De tyëng Isrɑil ɑ́yöd ge ceg-ɑ ngënyø keny-ɑ ɑ́pëddi köthi gen ki buudhø, kɑ tyëng Rïp ti-ɑ bwøgø yi gen.
Kɑ yethi tyëng Isrɑil ti ki pɑ̈dø ki gwøng teg.
Yethi gen ɑ́pɑ̈d ki tïj; ge ɑ́cïri gwøøg gyer kí pur kì yethi pwödh, o pëthi tyëng Rïp pɑ nyi lɑ̈ɑ̈m ki gen.
Kɑ rɑ̈ɑ̈dh Rïp gɑ̈mmi mɑ̈nni Isrɑil ryeet, ɑ løg Ciprɑ̀ geki Puɑ̀ köbbe kinni,
“Kenyi gɑm wun ngeti Isrɑil e pɑ̈dh-ɑ piny, nyi nɑ̈gu men-ɑ nywøl keløg ɑ́ jɑlø, de wiy bëëde keløg ɑ́ dhɑjø.”
De gɑ̈mmɑni ryeet ɑ́bëëd gɑ ji mø böggi Jwøk, kɑ kwøbbi rɑ̈ɑ̈dh Rïp pyem yi gen, cwøw ɑ́yöd ge ceg kɑ wiyø yi gen.
Kɑ gɑ̈mmɑni cwøl yi rɑ̈ɑ̈dh Rïp, kɑ gï pyëje kinni, “Wude, ɑ göög wun kinnï? Ede møg-ɑ nywøl gɑ cwøw ɑ nyi wiyu gen ge pɑ nɑ̈g yi wun?”
Kɑ ge ólöggø kinni, “Mɑ̈nni tyëng Ibru pɑ pɑ̈r ki mɑ̈nni Rïp, pɑ̈dhi gen piny yööd, ge nyi pɑ̈dhi piny e gɑ̈ɑ̈mi nuti wɑ̈dhi yï gen.”
Kɑ gɑ̈mmɑni korri yi Jwøk kidøøj. Kɑ tyëng Isrɑil óngënyø ki mendwøng.
Kɑ kɑ̈lli gɑ̈mmɑni tyeny yi Jwøk, mɑ́ ge bɑ ji mø böggi Jwøk.
Kɑ rɑ̈dh tyëng pödhe köbbe kinni, “Kwɑny wun wɑ̈ddi tyëng Ibru møg-ɑ ócer nywølø, kɑ ge leengu Kiir, de wiy møg-ɑ bɑ mɑ̈nn bëëd gen.”
Kɑ jɑl megø kì gøl Leebì ókedhø, kɑ ónyömø ki nyɑɑr gøl Leebì ni en.
Kɑ nyɑnɑni óyɑɑjø, ɑpɑ̈dhe piny ki wɑ̈d, kɑ gø lidhe e myëër, ɑkɑnne gøn ki dwɑ̈tt ɑ́dɑ̈g.
Keny-ɑ ɑ́dhɑ̈le kɑnnø, kɑ gø cwɑ̈jje ki dyëëny ókut, ɑmwøne gøn ki dök kí lɑ̈bø. Kɑ nyelthinh pyëële yije, ɑcïbe gøn tøg Kiir kì nɑm kelli lum.
Kɑ nyimen ócungø e lɑ̈wi, e nenn-ɑ gïn-ɑ ócwöb.
Kɑ nyɑɑr rɑ̈dh bï-ɑ gɑ̈d be lwøggø e cyɑ̈dhi kɑ bɑ̈ngge, bɑ̈ngg-ɑ mɑ̈nn, ɑlidhe dyënyɑni kì kelli lum kì nɑm, kɑ bɑ̈nge ɑ́kyel öre be dwɑɑyii.
Keny-ɑ ɑ́yɑle gøn, ɑyode gøn ɑ́ nyɑgïnthinh, e óywöngø. Kɑ yij nyɑɑr rɑ̈dh óywöngø kipere, ɑkööbe kinni, “Men óceg bëëdø ɑ́ nyɑɑr tyëng Ibru.”
Codhe, ɑköbbi nyɑɑr rɑ̈dh yi nyimï nyɑgïnɑni kinni, “Kedhɑ be cwöd ki ngeti Ibru me dhwødhii?”
Alöggi nyɑɑr rɑ̈dh kinni, “Kedh kɑ̈ní.” Codhe, kɑ ókedhø, ɑcwööl meyi nyɑgïnthinh.
Aköbbi ngɑnɑni yi nyɑɑr rɑ̈dh kinni, “Kwɑny nyelthinh men, kɑ dhwøødh. Pïdhí yɑn, kööngí ómëggɑ yïn.” Codhe, ɑkwɑɑny nyɑgïnɑni yi ngɑnɑni kɑ gø pidhe.
Kɑ nyelthinh ódøngø, ɑmuujii nyɑɑr rɑ̈dh yi ngɑnɑni. Kɑ cɑg yi nyɑɑr rɑ̈dh ɑ́ Mosɑ̀, mɑ́ e ɑ́kööb kinni, “Ákɑ̈ɑ̈l ɑ nɑm.”
Kɑ Mosɑ̀ lïïdh-ɑ tuung kí tuung, kɑ bong-ɑ dhɑnhø me lidhe, ɑgøje jɑl Rïp kɑ gø nɑ̈ge. Kɑ gø gööle thɑ ɑyejø.
Acige kedhø dhuki, kɑ wɑ̈ddi Ibru ɑ́ryew yuude ge ónyïɑ̈ggø. Kɑ jɑl-ɑ ɑ́bɑ̈jji pyëje kinni, “Ede wɑɑd wun ɑ pwöödií?”
Alöggi jɑlɑni kinni, “Á men ɑ ɑ́gwøg yïn, yïn ɑ́ jɑgø me nenni gønyyi wøn? Yï dwɑdd-ɑ nɑ̈gi yɑn ni wɑ̈d Rïp?” Kɑ Mosɑ̀ okööbø kinni, “Ngøø kwøbbɑni óyodø!”
Kɑ kwøbbɑni lïngi yi rɑ̈dh. Kɑ Mosɑ̀ yɑbe o gø di nɑ̈ge, ɑpɑ̈ɑ̈r Mosɑ̀ Midyɑn.
Keny-ɑ ɑ́wɑ̈dhi Mosɑ̀ kunɑni, ɑpëgge wïj yith.
Yethrø, ókwëri Midyɑn ɑ́bëëd yïe dɑ nyige womɑ̈nn ɑ́bïryew. Kɑ ge bï-ɑ wïj yith be pɑ̈ngi ɑwöl-ɑ yije nyi mɑ̈ɑ̈dh yi dyëgi wïyi gen ki pï.
De kwɑ̈yyi dyëg møøgø ɑ́bï, kɑ womɑ̈nn møgɑni cyeddi yi gen. Adhwödh Mosɑ̀, kɑ gï cwɑge, ɑtömme dyëgi gen ki pï.
Keny-ɑ ɑ́døøg gen yï wïyi gen, ɑpyëje gïn kinni, “Wude ɑ jwɑn wun dwöögø dicyɑ̈ɑ̈ng?”
Kɑ ge okööbø kinni, “Jɑl Rïp megø, wø ɑ́yiele kì cinggi kwɑ̈yyi dyëg. Kɑ wø tömme ki pï thyew, ɑmɑ̈ɑ̈dh dyëg.”
Kɑ nyige köbbe kinni, “De jɑlɑni ying-ɑ keny? Ede ɑ wiyu en? Cwöölu en o cyɑ̈me ki gïncɑm.”
Kɑ Mosɑ̀ oyïëyø ki bëëdø kì buti jɑlɑni. Kɑ jɑlɑni nyɑre Dhiporɑ̀ mëgge Mosɑ̀ ɑ́ dhɑjø.
Kɑ pɑ̈dh-ɑ piny ki wɑ̈d, kɑ gø cɑge ɑ́ Gercöm
Kì bɑng keny me bɑ̈ɑ̈r, kɑ rɑ̈ɑ̈dh Rïp othøø. Kɑ tyëng Isrɑil nyingi gen ti ki guudø yi tyëng Rïp. Kɑ ge ywøøg-ɑ kö Jwøk.
Kɑ ywøøg gen lïngi yi Jwøk, Jwøk ɑ́bëëd e nudd e mïdh-ɑ lwöm-ɑ kɑɑm gen kí Abrɑhɑm, kí Isɑɑk, kí Yɑgob.
Kɑ orɑɑng tyëng Isrɑil lidh yi Jwøk, ɑywöngi yije kipe gïn.
Mosɑ̀ ɑ́bëëd e kwɑy-ɑ dyëgi Yethrø øre, ókwëri Midyɑn, kɑ dyëg køøle løøg ryɑng tung-ɑ kyeelø, kɑ wɑ̈dh-ɑ wïj Kïti Sinɑy, Kïti Jwøk.
Kɑ wëywöni Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j ocwöbø kì bøle kì kunɑni kì yij mɑc kì ri nyɑ kïrø, nyɑ kïrɑni ɑ́lidhe e olyelø, de pɑ rɑ̈bbi.
Kɑ Mosɑ̀ okööbø kinni, “Wiy yɑ töng-ɑ be lïdhø ki gïn-ɑ bëëdø kinni, ede nyɑ kïrø ɑ lyele e pɑ rɑ̈bbi?”
Keny-ɑ ɑ́lidhii yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kinni ɑ́töngi be lïdhø, ɑcwøle gøn cwɑgge kɑ̈ɑ̈l-ɑ yij nyɑ kïrø, kinni, “Mosɑ̀! Mosɑ̀!”
Alöggi Mosɑ̀ kinni, “Yɑn èn.”
Kɑ okööbø kinni, “Yï ko nyïngi keny, kɑ̈ɑ̈l wɑrrí wɑ̈g kì tyellí, kipe keny-ɑ di yïn èn bɑ ɑkwër.”
Codhe, ɑkööbe kinni, “Yɑ bɑ Jwøøg kweyyí, Jwøøg Abrɑhɑm, kí Isɑɑk, kí Yɑgob.” Kɑ Mosɑ̀ nyinge kume, mɑ́ e ɑ́bwøg ki nenni yï Jwøk.
Codhe, ɑkööb Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kinni, “Orɑng men-ɑ rɑngi yi jiɑ kì Rïp ɑ́lidh yi yɑn, kɑ ywøøg gen wɑ̈nh-ɑ yïɑ, guun-ɑ guud nyingi gen ngɑ̈nyi yi yɑn.

Abëënɑ piny be yieli gen kì cinggi tyëng Rïp, o ge kɑ̈ɑ̈lɑ wɑ̈g kì pinyɑni, o ge kïdhɑ piny me døj, o lɑɑj, piny me yije mulli yi cɑg geki møøw kïc, keny-ɑ bëëd yi tyëng Kɑnɑɑn, kí tyëng Kit, kí tyëng Amör, kí tyëng Perïdh, kí tyëng Kib, kí tyëng Yebus.
Anɑn ywøøg tyëng Isrɑil ɑ́wɑ̈nhi yïɑ, o guun-ɑ guud nyingi gen yi tyëng Rïp, ɑ́lidh yi yɑn.
Anɑn yï örɑ’ yï rɑ̈ɑ̈dh Rïp, o jiɑ kɑ̈ɑ̈l yi yïn wɑ̈g kì pinye.”
Kɑ Jwøk köbbi yi Mosɑ̀ kinni, “Yɑn ɑ́ men, ɑ kedhɑ yï rɑ̈dh, kɑ tyëng Isrɑil kɑ̈ɑ̈lɑ wɑ̈g kì Rïp?”
Alöggi Jwøk kinni, “Yɑ ócyɑ̈dhi ki yïn, o keny-ɑ ókɑ̈ɑ̈l jiɑni wɑ̈g kì Rïp, yɑ ómɑlli yi wun kì wïj kït men. Menɑni óbëëd ɑ́ ngïji kinni yɑn ɑ ɑ́ör yïn be kɑ̈ɑ̈li gen wɑ̈g kì Rïp.”

Kɑ Mosɑ̀ cigi köbbø yi Jwøk kinni, “Bene gen møg-ɑ óköbbí kwɑrri Isrɑil ɑgɑk, kinni, ‘Jwøøg kweyyi wun, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, ɑ bɑ Jwøøg Abrɑhɑm, kí Isɑɑk, kí Yɑgob, en ɑ ɑ́ör yɑn yï wun, bene nyinge møg-ɑ ópɑɑrii ɑnɑn, kì ri rïny kí rïny, gïti ɑtheer.’

Kedh kɑ jøgdøngi Isrɑil cøng, kɑ ge köbbí kinni, ‘Jwøøg kweyyi wun, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j ɑ́cwöb kì bølɑ, eni Jwøøg Abrɑhɑm, Jwøøg Isɑɑk, Jwøøg Yɑgob. Kɑ okööbø cem e bëën-ɑ be këëmi wun, o orɑɑng wun kì Rïp ɑ́lidh yi en.’

Kɑ okööbø kinni, ‘Wu ókɑ̈ɑ̈lɑ wɑ̈g kì yij orɑng-ɑ rɑngi yi wun kì Rïp, o wu kïdhɑ piny tyëng Kɑnɑɑn, kí piny tyëng Kit, kí piny tyëng Amör, kí piny tyëng Perïdh, kí piny tyëng Kib, kí piny tyëng Yebus; wu ókïdhɑ piny me yije mulli yi cɑg geki møøw kïc.’

“Kwøbbí ólïngi yi jøgdøngi Isrɑil. Kɑ wu kedhu yï rɑ̈ɑ̈dh Rïp wuki jøgdøngi Isrɑil, kɑ köbbu kinni, ‘Jwøøg tyëng Ibru, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, ɑ́bï be këëmi wøn, kɑ wø cwøle kinni kedhi wøn yij pɑ̈l keny me cɑɑdh ki cyɑ̈ng ɑ́dɑ̈g, o ngɑ̈ddi yi wøn ki gëdhhì kì kunɑni.’
De ngɑ̈nyi yi yɑn kinni rɑ̈ɑ̈dh Rïp pɑ yïëy ki kedhi wun, de óceg kɑ cïrri møgɑni.
De cingɑ ócïbɑ ri Rïp, ógøj yi yɑn, kɑ göggɑ ki gïïngɑ̈ngø, o wu ógøny yi en cyee.

Tyëng-ɑ mɑ̈nni Isrɑil ókedhi yï mɑ̈nni Rïp møg-ɑ bɑ tyëng byëëg gen, geki møg-ɑ kɑ̈lli gïn bëëd yi gen, kɑ ge ócwöddø ki yëlli dhɑb kí yëlli ɑ́tegg, kí ógudh møg ruug wun nyigi wun, geki wɑ̈ddi wun, o jɑmmi Rïp kɑ̈l yi wun.”
Kɑ kwøbbi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j løøg yi Mosɑ̀ kinni, “De keløg tyëng Isrɑil óbɑ̈nyi ki yïëyø, kɑ ge ódhɑ̈lø lïngi kwøbb-ɑ óköbbɑ gen, göögɑ kidï, keløg ge ókööbø kinni yï nuti cwöbø kì bølɑ.”
Apyëjii yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kinni, “Á ngø ɑ cingí ɑnɑn?”
Kɑ Mosɑ̀ okööbø kinni, “Lodh.”
Kɑ Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j okööbø kinni, “Leeng piny.” Kɑ gø leenge piny. Kɑ ree løge thwöl, kɑ Mosɑ̀ reng-ɑ cyɑ̈n.
Kɑ Mosɑ̀ köbbi yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kinni, “Rïj cingí kɑ mɑɑg kì yëbe.” Kɑ cinge rïïje, ɑmɑge gøn, kɑ ree løge lodh kì cinge.
Kɑ Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j okööbø kinni, “Gwøg møgɑni kipe kinni o ge yïëy gen kinni, bɑ Jwøøg kweyyi gen; Jwøøg Abrɑhɑm, kí Isɑɑk, kí Yɑgob ɑ ɑ́cwöb kì bølí.”
Kɑ köbbi yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j këti kinni, “Cød cingí thɑ ógødhí.” Kɑ cinge cøde, kɑ gø dwööge wɑ̈g e tɑr nɑ ɑ́piy.
Aköbbe gøn kinni, “Dwøøg cingí thɑ ógødhí.” Adwøøge gøn, kɑ gø dwööge wɑ̈g e pɑ̈ɑ̈rø ki dële.
Kɑ Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j okööbø kinni, “Keløg ge pɑ yïëy ki kwøbbí, wɑlɑ̀ ge pɑ yïëy ki ngïji tyeli mɑl, ge óyïëy ki ngïny-ɑ kyeelø.
Ocög ge pɑ yïëy ki ngïjjɑni ryeet, kɑ yï kɑ̈bbí ki pïi Kiir, kɑ ge køny piny keny-ɑ thwøwø. Pïgɑni ceg-ɑ gwøg gɑ remø.”
Kɑ Mosɑ̀, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j köbbe kinni, “Wuö, yɑ kwïj kwøb kër-ɑ ɑ́pïïdhɑ gïti kɑ̀ kööb wɑ ɑnɑn, mɑ́ dhøgɑ peeg geki lebɑ.”

Aköbbii yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kinni, “Á men ɑ ɑ́göggi dhɑnhø ki dhøg? O bɑ men ɑ nyi løg dhɑnhø ming, wɑlɑ̀ ɑ nyi wëggii dhɑ̈lø ki kwøb; ɑ nyi løg dhɑnhø ngɑn nëënø wɑlɑ̀ cwør, pɑth ki yɑn, yɑ Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j?
Anɑn kedh, dhøgí ókøny yi yɑn ki kwøb, o yï ópwönyi yi yɑn ki møg-ɑ ókømmi yi yïn.”
Kɑ Mosɑ̀ okööbø kinni, “Yɑ kwɑjj-ɑ yïn Wuö, öd ki ngɑn megø.”
Kɑ Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j mɑg yi liny ki Mosɑ̀. Kɑ okööbø kinni, “Aɑron pɑth ki ómyëw? Ngɑ̈nyi yi yɑn kinni nyii kööbø kidøøj. Bï-ɑ be yïddø ki yïn ɑnɑn, o pyëwe ómïni keny-ɑ ólidhe yïn.
Wu ókööbø ki en, kɑ köbbí møg-ɑ ókwøbe, wu ókøny yi yɑn ki kwøb, o gïg-ɑ ógwøg yi wun, óköbbɑ wun.
En ɑ ókööbø ki ji ɑ́ kej dhøgí, o yï óbëëdø yï bɑ kej Jwøk kì yïe.
Kɑ lodh men kɑ̈llí kì cingí, en ɑ ógöög yi yïn ki gïïngɑ̈ngø.”
Kɑ Mosɑ̀ ókedhø, kɑ døøg-ɑ yï Yethrø øre, kɑ gø köbbe kinni, “Yɑ kwɑjj-ɑ yïn, wiy yɑ døøgɑ yï wɑddi wøn møg-ɑ Rïp, o ge lidh yi yɑn mɑ nudd ge onëënø.” Kɑ Mosɑ̀ köbbi yi Yethrø kinni, “Kedh ki mër.”
Kɑ Mosɑ̀ köbbi yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kì Midyɑn kinni, “Kedh, døøg Rïp, tyëng-ɑ ɑ́dwɑddi nɑ̈gi yïn ɑ́thøw bënn.”
Kɑ Mosɑ̀ cyëge kwɑnye geki wɑ̈dde, kɑ gï cïbe kömi ɑderø, codhe, kɑ døøg-ɑ piny Rïp, loodh Jwøk okɑ̈llø yi en kì cinge.
Kɑ Mosɑ̀ köbbi yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kinni, “Kedhí Rïp, gwøg gïïngɑ̈ngø møg-ɑ ɑ́cïbɑ cingí kì bøli rɑ̈dh, de pyëwe ógwøgɑ e teeg, o ji cög gï pɑ wëgge kedhø.
Kɑ rɑ̈dh köbbí kinni, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j ɑ́kööb kinni, ‘Isrɑil bɑ wɑ̈dɑ, wɑ̈n-ɑ kɑyø.
Yï ɑ́köbbɑ kinni, gøny wɑ̈dɑ o yɑ mɑlle, kɑ yï óbɑ̈nyø ki gønyii, kì bɑng menɑni, wɑ̈dí wɑ̈n-ɑ kɑyø nɑ̈gɑ’ nɑ̈gø.’ ”
Kì keny-ɑ ɑ́nïni yi gen ge kedh-ɑ Rïp, ɑrøøm Mosɑ̀ geki Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, kɑ Mosɑ̀ gø dwɑdde nɑ̈gø.

Kɑ Dhiporɑ̀ ókɑ̈bbø ki óbɑyi kït me thiinh, kɑ gø ngøle wɑ̈de, kɑ dël-ɑ ɑ́ngule wɑ̈g gɑ̈ɑ̈je ri tyelli Mosɑ̀, kipe kwööng ngøl. Akööb Dhiporɑ̀ kinni, “Yï bɑ jɑlnywööm remø kì yïɑ.” Codhe kɑ Mosɑ̀ wiy yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j.
Kɑ Aɑron köbbi yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kinni, “Kedhí be pɑɑri Mosɑ̀ yij pɑ̈l.” Kɑ ókedhø, ɑyode gøn kì Kïti Jwøk. Kɑ gø mɑ̈dhe, gø nuume’ nuumø.
Kɑ Aɑron köbbi yi Mosɑ̀ møg-ɑ ɑ́kwøb yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, kí gïg-ɑ per gen ɑ́örii, kí gïïngɑ̈ngø møg-ɑ ɑ́köbbii kinni gwøge gïn.
Kɑ Mosɑ̀ ókedhø geki Aɑron, kɑ jøgdøngi Isrɑil cøng yi gen.
Kɑ kwøbb-ɑ ɑ́köbbi Mosɑ̀ yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j lwøb yi Aɑron bënn, kɑ gïïngɑ̈ngø møgɑni gwøge kì bøli jøgɑni.
Kɑ teedø oyïëyø. Keny-ɑ ɑ́lïng gen kinni Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j ɑ́bï yï gen, kɑ guun-ɑ guud nyingi gen lidh yi en, ɑbøødh gen ri gen piny, kɑ mɑl yi gen.
Codhe, kɑ Mosɑ̀ geki Aɑron kedh-ɑ yï rɑ̈dh. Kɑ rɑ̈dh köbbi gen kinni, “Jwøøg Isrɑil, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j okööbø kinni, ‘Wiy jiɑ kedh gen, o yɑ wøw yi gen kì yij pɑ̈l.’ ”
Kɑ rɑ̈dh okööbø kinni, “Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j bɑ men, ɑ lïngɑ kwøbbe, ɑ pere gønyɑ Isrɑil? Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kwïj yi yɑn, o Isrɑil pɑ wiy yi yɑn o kedhe thyew.”

Kɑ ge okööbø kinni, “Wø ɑ́cwøl-ɑ yi Jwøøg tyëng Ibru. Wiy wø kedhi wøn keny me cɑɑdh ki cyɑ̈ng ɑ́dɑ̈g, kì yij pɑ̈l, o Jwøøg wøn, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j ngɑ̈ddi yi wøn ki gëdhhì, kipe wø ónɑ̈g yi en ki rɑ̈ɑ̈m dëllì, wɑlɑ̀ ki liny.”
Kɑ ge köbbi yi rɑ̈ɑ̈dh Rïp kinni, “Mosɑ̀ wuki Aɑron, ɑ́ kipe ngø ɑ mɑ̈ɑ̈nu ji gwøgi gwøøg gen? Kedhu be tïïj wun.”
Kɑ rɑ̈dh okööbø kinni, “Tyëngpiny ɑ́ngënyi ɑnɑn, o ge gögg-ɑ yi wun ki gwøøg gen.”
Kɑ jøg-ɑ nenni gwøg geki jɑggi Isrɑil ceg yi rɑ̈dh kinni,
“Jiɑni ko cigi wun muujø ki nor men-ɑ nyi göög ki thob këti, ni kenyi muuj wun gen cøn. Wiy ge kedhi gen be yɑb ki nor keti gen.
Kɑ wu ko kɑ̈ni wɑ̈g kì ri kwɑnni thob møg-ɑ nyi gwøg yi gen cøn, ko di thob ɑ́kyel me tøøk. Gwøøg gen ceg-ɑ nøg, bene ɑ kööb gen kinni, ‘Wiy wø kedhi wøn be ngɑ̈ddi Jwøøg wøn ki gëdhhì.’
Thödhu jøgɑni ki gwøg me teeg, o ge jɑ̈ddi gen ki keny lïng gen ki kwøbbi pyed.”
Codhe, kɑ jøg-ɑ nyi cïrø ki gwøg geki jɑgg-ɑ nenni gwøg ókedhø, kɑ jiɑni köbbi gen kinni, “Rɑ̈dh okööbø kinni, i wu ko thödhi ki nor.
Kedh wun, yɑ̈ɑ̈b wun ki nor kì keny-ɑ óyïddi wun, de bong gïjø me kɑ̈ɑ̈l wɑ̈g kì ri kwɑnni thob.”
Codhe, kɑ teenɑni tɑɑy-ɑ yij piny Rïp be yɑb ki wél møg gwøg ɑ́ nor.
Kɑ ge cir yi jɑggi gwøg kinni, “Nyi tyëgu gwøøg wun ceth, gwøøg cyɑ̈ɑ̈ng kí cyɑ̈ɑ̈ng, ni kɑ ɑ́bëëd wu nyii thödhø ki nor.”

Kɑ jɑggi tyëng Isrɑil møg-ɑ ɑ́cïb kömi gwøg pwöd yi jɑggi Rïp møg-ɑ cïrø ki gwøg, ge ɑ́kööb kinni, “Ede kwɑnni thob møg-ɑ dwɑddi, ɑ bɑnyu gen ki tyëgø gwøgø, ɑ́wɑ̈ɑ̈ ki dicyɑ̈ɑ̈ng ni kenyi göög wun cøn?”
Kɑ jɑggi tyëng Isrɑil ókedhø, kɑ ge ywøøg-ɑ kö rɑ̈dh, ge ɑ́kööb kinni, “Ede bɑ̈nggí ɑ göggí gen ki gïn ni men?
Bong nor mɑ ɑ́mëggi wøn, o wø yöd wø ceg kɑ cirø kinni, ‘Gwøgu thob!’ Wø ceg kɑ pwödø, o bɑ̈jjø bɑ mi jií.”
Alögge kinni, “Wu bɑ rɑjj, bene ɑ kööb wun kinni, ‘Wiy wø kedhi wøn be ngɑ̈ddi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j ki gëdhhì!’
Dhwödh wun, kedhu be tïj! O wu pɑ thödhi ki nor, de gwøg wun kwɑnni thob men-ɑ dwɑddi kì yï wun ceth!”
Kɑ jɑggi tyëng Isrɑil wɑ̈thi gen ócungø yi cigg-ɑ ɑ́köbbi gen kinni, i kwɑnni thob møg-ɑ nyi gwøg ki cyɑ̈ɑ̈ng ko dwöög cyɑ̈n kinni tek.
Kɑ Mosɑ̀ geki Aɑron yuud yi gen ge ócungø kì yöö keny-ɑ ɑ́kedh gen kì buti rɑ̈dh.
Kɑ gï köbbi gen kinni, “Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j ree óluge wun kɑ wu cɑy yi en, kipe kɑ ɑ́løgu wøn tyëngrijjø kì bøli rɑ̈dh geki jɑgge, kɑ cinggi gen cïbi yi wun ki pilø men nɑ̈g gen wøn.”
Codhe, kɑ Mosɑ̀ døøg-ɑ yï Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, ɑkööbe kinni, “Wuö, ede jií ɑ göggí gen ki gïnrɑj ni men? Á kipe ngø ɑ ɑ́ör yɑn?
Kër-ɑ ɑ́bëënɑ be kwøb wøki rɑ̈dh ki nyingí, ji ceg kɑ göggø yi en ki gïnrɑj, o jií nuti yielø yi yïn kinni tek.”
Kɑ Mosɑ̀ köbbi yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kinni, “Gïn-ɑ ógöggɑ rɑ̈ɑ̈dh Rïp ólidh yi yïn ɑnɑn, ge ócyeddi yi en ki tegø, gï óryeeme wɑ̈g kì pinye ki tegø.”
Yɑ ɑ́cwöb kì bøli Abrɑhɑm, kɑ yɑ ocwöbø kì bøli Isɑɑk, kí bøli Yɑgob. Yɑ ɑ́cwølli yi gen yɑn ɑ́ Jwøk Áyïmø, de nyingɑ kinni Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j nuti nyudhi gen yi yɑn.
Kɑ kɑɑm wøn cïbɑ ki lwöbø wøki gen thyew, kinni ge ómëggɑ piny Kɑnɑɑn, piny-ɑ́ yije ɑ́bëëd yi gen gɑ wëdhh.
Ywøøg tyëng Isrɑil ɑ́rum ki lïngø yi yɑn, yi gööj bɑ̈ɑ̈ngø men-ɑ ɑ́cïb kömi gen yi tyëng Rïp. O köngɑ ɑ́pɑr yi yɑn.

Köbbí tyëng Isrɑil kinni, Bene yɑn Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, wu ókɑ̈ɑ̈l yi yɑn wɑ̈g kì yij tïny-ɑ ɑ́cïb kömi wun yi ji-ɑ ɑ́cïb kömi wun yi tyëng Rïp, wu ókɑ̈ɑ̈lɑ wɑ̈g kì yij bɑ̈ɑ̈ngø. O wu óyiel yi yɑn ki tegø geki cɑ́y mø døngø.
Wu ókwɑny yi yɑn wu bɑ jiɑ, o yɑ óbëëdø yɑ bɑ Jwøøg wun. O yod yi wun kinni yɑn, yɑ Jwøøg wun, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, ɑ kɑ̈ɑ̈l wun wɑ̈g kì yij piny Rïp.
Wu ókïdhɑ piny-ɑ́ pere ɑ́köngɑ kinni ómëggɑ Abrɑhɑm, kí Isɑɑk, kí Yɑgob. O ómuuj yi yɑn ceth, yɑ Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, o lɑg yi wun ceth.”
Kɑ møgɑni köbbi tyëng Isrɑil yi Mosɑ̀, de ge ɑ́dhɑ̈li lïngi kwøbbi Mosɑ̀, mɑ́ köthi gen buudhø yi bɑ̈ɑ̈ngø.
Kɑ Mosɑ̀ köbbi yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kinni,
“Bïí kedh köbbí rɑ̈ɑ̈dh Rïp, o tyëng Isrɑil öre wɑ̈g kì piny Rïp.”
Kɑ Mosɑ̀ okööbø kì bøli Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kinni, “Lidh tyëng Isrɑil, kwøbbɑ nuti lïngø yi gen, de rɑ̈dh ólïng ɑ dï, yɑ bɑ ngɑn nyi dhɑ̈li kwøb!”
Kɑ Mosɑ̀ geki Aɑron, köbbi yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kinni, “Köbbu tyëng Isrɑil geki rɑ̈ɑ̈dh Rïp kinni, bɑ yɑn ɑ ɑ́köbbi wun kinni peej wun tyëng Isrɑil wɑ̈g kì Rïp.”
Møg bene gen wɑ̈thi kɑ̈lli gen: Wɑ̈ddi Ruben, kɑyi Yɑgob, Aɑnök kí Pɑlu, Ëdhrön kí Kɑrmì, bene gen kɑ̈lli Ruben ɑgɑk.
Wɑ̈ddi Cimeøn, Yemuel kí Yɑmïn, kí Oɑ̈ɑ̈d, kí Yɑkin, kí Dhoɑr, kí Cɑul wɑ̈d nyɑɑr Kɑnɑɑn, kɑ̈llɑni cöll-ɑ nyingi kweyyi gen.
Møg bene gen nyingi wɑ̈thi kɑ̈lli Leebì: Gercön, kí Kɑ̈ɑ̈th, kí Merɑrì. Leebì ɑ́bëëd kɑ runn miyø kí pyɑ̈r ɑ́dɑ̈g wïdɑ́bïryew.
Wɑ̈ddi Gercön. Libnì kí Cimeì.
Wɑ̈ddi Kɑ̈ɑ̈th bɑ Amrɑm, kí Idhɑr, kí Kibrön, kí Udhiel. Kɑ̈ɑ̈th ɑ́bëëd kɑ runn miyø kí pyɑ̈r ɑ́dɑ̈g wïdɑ́dɑ̈g.
Wɑ̈ddi Merɑrì bɑ Mɑklì, kí Mucì. Møgɑni bene gen wɑ̈thi kɑ̈lli Leebì ɑgɑk kɑ̀ lwøøb gen.
Kɑ Amrɑm, Yökebed wønye nywøm yi en, ɑnywøle Aɑron geki Mosɑ̀. Amrɑm ɑ́bëëd kɑ runn miyø kí pyɑ̈r ɑ́dɑ̈g wïdɑ́bïryew.
Wɑ̈ddi Idhɑr bɑ Körɑ̀, kí Nepeg, kí Dhikrì.
Wɑ̈ddi Udhiel bɑ Micɑil, kí Eldhɑpɑn, kí Sïthrì.
Kɑ Alicebɑ̀ nyɑɑr Aminɑdɑb, ɑ bɑ nyimï Nɑɑ̈cön, nywøm yi Aɑron. Anyölle gøn Nɑdɑb, kí Abiu, kí Eliɑdhɑr, kí Ithɑmɑr.
O wɑ̈ddi Körɑ̀ bɑ Asïïr, kí Elkɑnɑ̀, kí Abiyɑsɑp. Bene gen wɑ̈thi kɑ̈lli Körɑ̀ ɑgɑk.
Kɑ Eliɑdhɑr wɑ̈d Aɑron ónyömø ki dhɑjø kì kelli nyigi Putiel, ɑnyölle gøn Pineɑs. Møgɑni bene wɑ̈thi kɑ̈lli Leebì.
Aɑron geki Mosɑ̀, bɑ gen ɑ ɑ́köbbi yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kinni, “Kɑ̈ɑ̈lu kɑ̈lli Isrɑil wɑ̈g kì Rïp.”
Gen ɑ ɑ́kööb ki rɑ̈ɑ̈dh Rïp, o kɑ̈ɑ̈le tyëng Isrɑil wɑ̈g kì cinggi tyëng Rïp, bene gen Mosɑ̀, geki Aɑron kì ri gen.
Keny-ɑ ɑ́kööb Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j geki Mosɑ̀ kì piny Rïp,
Mosɑ̀ ɑ́köbbe kinni, “Yɑn, yɑ Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j ɑ kööbø, köbbí rɑ̈ɑ̈dh Rïp ki møg-ɑ óköbbɑ yïn bënn.”
Kɑ Mosɑ̀ okööbø kì bøli Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kinni, “Dhøgɑ nyii dhɑ̈lø ki kwøb, o kwøbbɑ ólïngi yi rɑ̈dh kidï!”
Kɑ Mosɑ̀ köbbi yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kinni, “Yï ɑ́gwøg yi yɑn yï nɑ Jwøk kì yï rɑ̈dh, o Aɑron ómyëw bëëde ɑ́ jɑltöngí.
Nyi kwøb møg-ɑ cïgɑ yïn bënn, o Aɑron ómyëw nyi köbbe rɑ̈dh kipe kinni, o tyëng Isrɑil wiye kedh gen kì pinye.
De pyëw rɑ̈ɑ̈dh Rïp ógwøgɑ e teeg, o ngïjjì geki gïïngɑ̈ngø møgɑ gwøgɑ ge gïïr kì piny Rïp.
Keny-ɑ ódhɑ̈li rɑ̈dh ki lïngi kwøbbi wun, cingɑ ócïbɑ ri Rïp, kɑ yɑyɑ, ɑ løg jiɑ, tyëng Isrɑil kɑ̈ɑ̈lɑ wɑ̈g kì piny Rïp ki cɑ́y mø teg.
O óyod yi tyëng Rïp kinni yɑ bɑ Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, keny-ɑ ócïbɑ cingɑ ri Rïp, kɑ tyëng Isrɑil kɑ̈ɑ̈lɑ wɑ̈g kì kelli gen.”
Møgɑni ɑ́gwøg yi Mosɑ̀ geki Aɑron, møg-ɑ ɑ́cïgi gen yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j ceth, ɑ ɑ́gwøg yi gen.
Mosɑ̀ runne ɑ́bëëd gɑ pyɑ̈r ɑ́bïdɑ̈g, o Aɑron runne bɑ pyɑ̈r ɑ́bïdɑ̈g wïdɑ́dɑ̈g keny-ɑ ɑ́kööb gen ki rɑ̈dh.
Kɑ Mosɑ̀ geki Aɑron köbbi yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kinni,
“Keny-ɑ ókööb rɑ̈dh ki wun, kɑ okööbø kinni, ‘Nyodh wun ngïjji wun!’ Köbbí Aɑron kinni, ‘Kwɑny lodhí, kɑ leeng piny kì bøli rɑ̈dh.’ Ree órøje thwöl.”
Kɑ Mosɑ̀ geki Aɑron kedh-ɑ bøli rɑ̈dh, kɑ ge ogöögø ni kɑ ɑ́kööb Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j. Kɑ Aɑron lodhe leenge piny kì bøli rɑ̈dh geki jyɑ̈gge, kɑ ree løge thwöl.
Kɑ rɑ̈ɑ̈dh Rïp tyëdde geki ɑ́jwögge cwööle, kɑ ge ogöögø kinøw ki yɑɑdh gen.
Kɑ ɑ́jwöggì lødhi gen leeng gen piny, kɑ ri gen løg gen thöllì. Kɑ lødhi gen mwøøny yi loodh Aɑron.
De pyëw rɑ̈dh ɑ́yöd e ceg-ɑ tëngø, kɑ ódhɑ̈lø lïngi kwøbbi gen ni kɑ ɑ́kööb Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j.
Kɑ Mosɑ̀ köbbi yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kinni, “Rɑ̈dh wïje teeg, ji ɑ́mɑ̈ɑ̈ne kedhø.
Kedhí yï rɑ̈dh dhuki kì mwøl keny-ɑ ókedhe gɑ̈d, kɑ yï cungí kì bøle kì gɑ̈d, e lonh-ɑ ɑ́røj ree ɑ́ thwöl okɑ̈llø yi yïn kì cingí.”
Kɑ köbbí kinni, “Jwøøg tyëng Ibru, yɑ ɑ́öre yïí be kwøb kinni, ‘Wiy jiɑ kedh gen, o yɑ mɑlli yi gen kì yij pɑ̈l.’ De yï ɑ́dhɑ̈li lïngø gïti ɑnɑn.”
Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j ɑ́kööb kinni, i óyod yi yïn kì ri møg ki mɑ løge’ men. Lidh, pïi nɑm ógøj yi yɑn ki lodh men-ɑ cingɑ èn, o pï ri gen løg gen remø.
O rij thøw gen kì Kiir. Kiir ópënni, kɑ tyëng Rïp ódhɑ̈lø mɑdh ki pïi Kiir.”

Kɑ Mosɑ̀ köbbi yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kinni, “Köbbí Aɑron kinni, ‘Kwɑny lodhí kɑ bɑdí rïïj kömi nɑ̈mmi Rïp, kí ɑgɑlle, kí luyyi pï, o pï ri gen løg gen remø. Pï ógöögø’ remø kì Rïp, cɑgg ɑ́ møg ying yethi ɑ́tɑ̈yyi ɑ́bwödd, wɑlɑ̀ yethi ɑ́tɑ̈yyi kïttì.”
Kɑ Mosɑ̀ geki Aɑron ogöögø ni kɑ ɑ́cïg Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j. Kɑ Aɑron lodh tïnge, kɑ pïg-ɑ nɑm gøje e onennø yi rɑ̈dh geki bɑ̈ngge, kɑ pïi nɑm bënn ogöögø ki remø.
Kɑ rij othøø kì Kiir. Nɑm ɑ́pëni, kɑ tyëng Rïp ódhɑ̈lø mɑdh kì Kiir. Kɑ pïngø bëne ogöögø ki remø kì piny Rïp.
Kɑ ɑ́jwöggi Rïp ogöögø ni menɑni ki yɑɑdh gen. Kɑ pyëw rɑ̈dh ótëngø, kɑ ódhɑ̈lø lïngi kwøbbi gen ni kɑ ɑ́kööb Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j.
Kɑ rɑ̈dh kedh-ɑ gøle kì wɑ̈ye e gïgɑni wøye’ wøyø.
Kɑ tyëng Rïp ceg-ɑ kony ki pïg mɑ̈ɑ̈dh kì tøggi nɑm, mɑ́ ge pɑ cuggi mɑdh ki pïi Kiir.
Kɑ cyɑ̈ng ɑ́bïryew opödhø kì bɑng gøji nɑm yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j.
Aköbbi Mosɑ̀ yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kinni, “Kedhí yï rɑ̈dh kɑ köbbí kinni, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j okööbø kinni, ‘Ör jiɑ, o yɑ mɑlli yi gen.
Keløg yï óbɑ̈nyi ki öri gen, myërrí bënn göjjɑ’ ógwɑ̈llì.

Nɑm óngøg ki ógwɑ̈llì, kɑ ógwɑ̈llì turr-ɑ gølí, kɑ ge kedh-ɑ øn-ɑ nyi buud yi yïn. Kɑ ge pɑ̈ɑ̈r-ɑ wïj pyëní, kɑ ge kedh-ɑ kɑ̈lli jø tøg burí, kí kɑ̈lli tyëng pödhí, kí yethi udd-ɑ nyi bul ópùn, kí ɑ́tɑ̈yy-ɑ yethi gen nyi nyööm ɑwɑ̈jj.
Ógwɑ̈llì ópɑ̈rri kì kömí, kí kömi jií, kí kömi jø tøg burí bënn.’ ”
Kɑ Mosɑ̀ köbbi yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kinni, “Köbbí Aɑron kinni, ‘Rïj bɑdí ki lodhí kì cingí; rïïj kömi nɑ̈mmì kí ɑgɑll, kí luyyì, kɑ ógwɑ̈llì kɑ̈ɑ̈l kömi piny Rïp.’ ”
Kɑ Aɑron bɑde rïïje kömi pïi Rïp, kɑ ógwɑ̈llì bï-ɑ wɑ̈g, kɑ piny Rïp opɑ̈ngø yi gen, de lɑ̈bø pɑ nënni.
Kɑ ɑ́jwöggì ogöögø kinøw ki yɑɑdh gen, kɑ ge kɑ̈n-ɑ piny Rïp ki ógwɑ̈llì.

Kɑ Mosɑ̀ geki Aɑron cwøl yi rɑ̈dh, ɑköbbi gen yi rɑ̈dh kinni, “Kwɑjju Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j o ógwɑ̈llì nyiig yi en kì riɑ, kí ri jiɑ, codhe, o wu ör yi yɑn wuki jii wun, o wu kedhu be ngɑ̈ddi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j ki gëdhhì.”

Kɑ rɑ̈dh köbbi yi Mosɑ̀ kinni, “Köbbí yɑn bøli keny-ɑ dwɑddi yi yïn, o Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kwɑjji yi yɑn kiperí, kí per jø tøg burí, kí jií, o ógwɑ̈llì nɑ̈g kì gølí, kí kɑ̈lli jø tøg burí geki kɑ̈lli jií, o dönge ɑ́ møg-ɑ ying Kiir?”
Kɑ rɑ̈dh okööbø kinni, “Dhuki!”
Kɑ Mosɑ̀ okööbø kinni, “Nɑ kɑ ɑ́kwøbií, o yod yi yïn kinni bong ngɑn pɑ̈r ki Jwøøg wøn, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j.
Ógwɑ̈llì ókedh kì butí kí kɑ̈llí, kí kɑ̈lli jø tøg burí, kí kɑ̈lli jií; møg-ɑ Kiir keti gen ɑ ódöng.”
Akedh Mosɑ̀ geki Aɑron kì buti rɑ̈dh, kɑ Mosɑ̀ ywøøg-ɑ kö Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kipe kwøbbi ógwɑ̈llì møg-ɑ ɑ́göjje rɑ̈ɑ̈dh Rïp.
Kɑ Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j oyïëyø’ kwøbbi Mosɑ̀, ɑthøw ógwɑ̈llì kì yethi ud, kí yethi kɑ̈llì, kí yethi pwödh.
Kɑ ge congi gɑ börr, kɑ piny ceg-ɑ pënnø yi gen.
De keny-ɑ ɑ́lidhii yi rɑ̈dh kinni ryɑ̈ngɑni ɑ́lɑ̈ɑ̈ny, kɑ wïje ótëngø, kɑ ódhɑ̈lø lïngi kwøbbi gen ni kɑ ɑ́kööb Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j.
Kɑ Mosɑ̀ köbbi yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kinni, “Köbbí Aɑron kinni, ‘Rïj bɑdí kí lodhí kì cingí, kɑ tør kì piny gøøj, o ree løge bɑ̈y kì piny Rïp bëne.’ ”
Agöög Aɑron kinøw, kɑ bɑde rïje ki lodhe kì cinge, kɑ tør gøje ki lodhe, kɑ bɑ̈yø ceg-ɑ ì thoodh kì kelli ji geki kelli lɑ̈yy. Tør ree ɑ́løge bɑ̈y kì piny Rïp bëne.
Kɑ ɑ́jwöggì ri gen pɑ̈nyi gen ki gwøg kinøw ki yɑɑdh gen, de ge ɑ́dhɑ̈li gwøg ki bɑ̈y kì ri tør, kɑ bɑ̈y tɑɑy-ɑ kömi ji geki lɑ̈yy.
Aköbbi rɑ̈dh yi ɑ́jwöggì kinni, “Men bɑ gwøøg Jwøk!” De pyëw rɑ̈dh nudd e teeg, kɑ ódhɑ̈lø lïngi kwøbbi gen ni kɑ ɑ́kööb Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j.
Kɑ Mosɑ̀ köbbi yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kinni, “Møøl yï rɑ̈dh dhuki kì mwøl, keny-ɑ óbëëne gɑ̈d, kɑ köbbí kinni, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j okööbø kinni, ‘Wiy jiɑ kedh gen, o yɑ wøw yi gen.
Mɑ́ keløg jiɑ ómɑ̈ɑ̈n kedhø yi yïn, yï ógöjjɑ lwɑngì wuki jø tøg burí, kí jií, kí uddí, kí uddi Rïp bënn, men-ɑ́ keny-ɑ ódi gen ópɑ̈ng yi lwɑngø bëne.
De myërri Göcen, kun-ɑ bëëd yi jiɑ, ógeedɑ wɑ̈ye, o óbëëd e bong lwɑngì møg-ɑ óying kunɑni, o yod yi yïn kinni, Yɑn yɑ Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, yɑ nud kì piny keny.
O kɑɑm jiɑ geki jií ócïbɑ ki kew. Ngïji menɑni ócwöb dhuki.’ ”
Kɑ møgɑni gwøg yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, lwɑngì ɑ́ceg ì buk kì gøl rɑ̈dh, kí kɑ̈lli jø tøg bure, kí piny Rïp bëne, kɑ piny órënyø yi lwɑngì.
Kɑ Mosɑ̀ geki Aɑron cwøl yi rɑ̈dh kɑ gï köbbe kinni, “Kedh wun, ngɑ̈ddu Jwøøg wun kì pönhï.”

Akööb Mosɑ̀ kinni, “Pɑth ki dyër eni gwøgi gïn ni menɑni, mɑ́ gïn-ɑ óngɑ̈lli wøn Jwøøg wøn ɑ́ gëëdhi, pɑ cuggi nywɑlø yi tyëng Rïp. Keløg wø ongɑ̈dø ki gïjø me pɑ cuggi nywɑlø yi tyëng Rïp kì bøli gen, wø pɑ bɑ̈lli yi gen ki tuggi kïttì!
Wø ceg-ɑ kedhi yij pɑ̈l kɑɑm me cɑɑdh ki cyɑ̈ng ɑ́dɑ̈g, o Jwøøg wøn, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, ngɑ̈ddi yi wøn ki gëdhhì kì kunɑni ni kɑ ɑ́cege wøn.”
Kɑ rɑ̈dh okööbø kinni, “Wu ówiy yi yɑn o wu kedhu yij pɑ̈l be ngɑ̈ddi Jwøøg wun, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j ki gëdhhì. De wu ko kedhi kun me lɑ̈wi cɑrø. Kɑ wu kwɑ̈jji wun kiperɑ cyee!”

Kɑ Mosɑ̀ okööbø kinni, “Yɑn ɑ kedh kì bølí èn, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j ókwɑjji yi yɑn kipe kinni o lwɑngì kedh gen kì gølí geki kɑ̈lli jø tøg burí, kí kɑ̈lli jií dhuki. De wø ko cigí wënyø këti, ji ko mɑ̈ɑ̈n kedhi be ngɑ̈ddi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j ki gëdhhì.”
Kɑ Mosɑ̀ ókedhø kì buti rɑ̈dh, ɑkwɑjje Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j.
Kɑ møg-ɑ ɑ́kwɑjji yi Mosɑ̀ yïëy yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j. Akedh lwɑngì kì gøl rɑ̈dh, kí kɑ̈lli jø tøg bure, kí kɑ̈lli jie. Bong ɑ́kyel mɑ ɑ́döng.
De rɑ̈dh wïje ɑ́tëngi thyew këti, kɑ ji mɑ̈ɑ̈ne kedhø.
Kɑ Mosɑ̀ köbbi yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kinni, “Kedhí yï rɑ̈dh kɑ köbbí kinni, ‘Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j Jwøøg tyëng Ibru okööbø kinni, Ör jiɑ, o ge kedhi gen be wøwi yɑn.
De keløg yï óbɑ̈nyi këti ki öri gen,
jɑmmí ógøj yi yɑn, dhögí, kí kyënyí, kí ɑderrí, kí ɑmɑllí, kí dyëgí ge óthøw, óbëëd ɑ́ ryɑ̈g me dwøng.
O kɑɑm jɑmmi tyëng Isrɑil geki jɑmmi tyëng Rïp ócïbɑ ki kew, bong gïjø men-ɑ óthøw kì kelli jɑmmi tyëng Isrɑil.
Kɑ bøli kenyɑni cïb yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, ɑ́kööb kinni, ‘Gïnɑni ógwøg yi yɑn dhuki kì pönhï.’ ”
Kɑ møgɑni gwøg yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j dhuki, kɑ jɑmmi tyëng Rïp othøø, de bong gïjø ɑ́kyel mɑ ɑ́thøw kì ri jɑmmi tyëng Isrɑil.
Kɑ rɑ̈dh oödø kinni liidh jɑmmi tyëng Isrɑil mɑ thøw gen, kɑ yod e bong ɑ́kyel me thøø kì kelli jɑmmi tyëng Isrɑil. Kɑ pyëw rɑ̈dh ótëngø, ɑmɑ̈ɑ̈ne tyëng Isrɑil kedhø.
Kɑ Mosɑ̀ geki Aɑron köbbi yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kinni, “Kɑ̈bbi wun ki búr cinggi wun pɑ̈ng kì yij purun, kɑ wiiw mɑl yi Mosɑ̀ kì bøli rɑ̈dh.
Ógöögø ki tør me tɑɑy yij piny rɑ̈ɑ̈dh Rïp bëne, dëlli ji kí dëlli lɑ̈yy ómɑg yi børi búrɑni, kɑ kɑ̈jj-ɑ bɑ bør ópyëdø ge ololø ki túd.”
Codhe, kɑ ge ókɑ̈bbø ki búr kì yij purun, ɑcungi gen kì bøli rɑ̈dh, kɑ búrɑni kwøør mɑl yi Mosɑ̀, kɑ ogöögø ki bør, ge ololø ki túd kì ri ji geki lɑ̈yy.
Ájwöggì ɑ́dhɑ̈li gwøg ki gwøng ni menɑni, mɑ́ gen kì ri gen dëlli gen ɑ́mɑg yi bør kyeel ki tyëng Rïp møg-ɑ kyeelø.
De pyëw rɑ̈dh ɑ́gwøg e teeg yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, kɑ ódhɑ̈lø lïngi kwøbbi gen ni kɑ ɑ́kööb Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j.
Kɑ Mosɑ̀ köbbi yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kinni, “Møøl yï rɑ̈dh kì mwøl, kɑ köbbí kinni, Jwøøg tyëng Ibru, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j okööbø kinni, ‘Wiy jiɑ kedhi gen be mɑlli yɑn.
Mɑ́ kì bøli keny ɑnɑn, ryɑ̈gɑ tööngɑ’ kömí, wuki jø tøg burí, kí jií bënn, o yod yi yïn kinni bong ngɑn pɑ̈r ki yɑn kì piny bëne.
Mɑ́ ɑnɑn cingɑ di rïïjɑ kɑ yï nɑ̈g yi yɑn wuki jií bënn, kɑ wɑ̈thi wun di pɑ̈ɑ̈dh kì pönhï.
De yï ɑ́wiy yi yɑn kɑ per kinni, o yï nyudhɑ tegɑ, thyew o nyingɑ geki perɑ yod kì kömi piny bëne.
Anɑn yï nudd yï gengg-ɑ jiɑ, ge mɑ̈ɑ̈ní kedhø!
Dhuki piny nɑ men, yɑ óöni ki yømi ɑ́piy me dwøng cɑrø, yømi ɑ́piy me ni menɑni nuti pɑ̈nyi könø kì Rïp kër-ɑ ɑ́cöbii gïti ɑnɑn.
Öd kinni kïdhi dhögí kí jɑmmí bënn yethi lwɑ̈gg, kɑ ji kedhi gen yethi ud. Møg-ɑ ópïïd yij pwödhø yi ɑ́piy ceg-ɑ thøø.’ ”
Tyëng-ɑ ɑ́bwøg yi kwøbbi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kì kelli jø rɑ̈dh, ge ɑ́rengi yethi ud, gen ki bɑ̈nggi gen ki jɑmmi gen.
De tyëng-ɑ ɑ́pëëm, bɑ̈nggi gen geki jɑmmi gen ɑ́wiy wɑ̈g yi gen.
Kɑ Mosɑ̀ köbbi yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kinni, “Rïïj cingí mɑl, o ɑtuni ɑ́piy pɑ̈dhe kömi Rïp bëne, o ködde kömi dhɑnhø kí lɑ̈y bëne, kí luum pɑ̈l kì piny Rïp bëne.”
Kɑ Mosɑ̀ lodhe nyoodhe mɑl. Kɑ Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j ɑ́piy gööje piny, kɑ mɑl opödø kɑ piny rɑ̈be, kɑ yømø me lïb gøøj yij piny Rïp yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j.
Kɑ ji othøø yi kööjø e mɑl ceg-ɑ pöd, o mɑc cem-ɑ rɑ̈d, o ɑ́piy odyëmø. Atunø me ni menɑni nuti pɑ̈nyø lidhø kì piny Rïp kër-ɑ ɑ́cööb pönhɑni.
Kɑ ji geki lɑ̈yy møg-ɑ ɑ́yuud wɑ̈g yi ɑtuni ɑ́piy menɑni othøø bënn. Kɑ jɑmm-ɑ twïyø kì yethi pwödh órënyø bënn, kɑ yenh ótørrø bënn.
De bong ɑtuni ɑ́piy mɑ ɑ́bëëd e nud kì piny Göcen, kun-ɑ bëëd yi tyëng Isrɑil.
Kɑ rɑ̈dh oödø, ɑcwööl Mosɑ̀ geki Aɑron kɑ gï köbbe kinni, “Yɑ ɑ́bɑ̈jji ɑnɑn këti. Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j bɑ ngɑntir, dɑ́ wøn ɑ rijjø wøki jiɑ.
Kwɑjju Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, o pööd mɑl geki ɑtuni ɑ́piy cungi gen. Wu ówiy yi yɑn o wu kedh wun. Wu koo nudd wu bëëd ɑ keny këti.”
Aköbbii yi Mosɑ̀ kinni, “Keny-ɑ ókedhɑ wɑ̈g kì kɑɑl, yɑ ókedh kɑ cinggɑ thɑ̈ngɑ Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, o mɑl wïye ki pöd, o ɑ́piy cöge e pɑ cigi dyëmø. O yod yi yïn kinni, piny bɑ mi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j.
De ngɑ̈nyi yi yɑn kinni, Jwøk, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j nudd e pɑ böggi yi wun, wuki jø tøg burí.”
Kitɑn geki ceir ɑ́rënyi, mɑ́ ceir ɑ́yuud e rum dhɑ̈yø, o kitɑn rum køøg.
De gemè geki gɑthɑnì nuti rënyø mɑ́ ge nyi cyeg-ɑ cyɑ̈n.
Kɑ Mosɑ̀ ókedhø kì buti rɑ̈dh kì kɑɑl e cingge thɑ̈ng en Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j. Kɑ pööd mɑl ócungø geki yømø, kɑ kødh ówïyø dyëëm piny.
Keny-ɑ ɑ́lidhii yi rɑ̈dh kinni kødh ɑ́cög, kɑ pööd mɑl ócungø geki ɑ́piy, ɑdøøge ki bɑ̈jjø, kɑ pyëwe cwede geki bɑ̈ngge.
Kɑ pyëw rɑ̈dh ótëngø, kɑ tyëng Isrɑil ocögø gï pɑ wëgge kedhø, ni kɑ ɑ́kööb Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kì ri Mosɑ̀.
Codhe, kɑ Mosɑ̀ köbbi yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kinni, “Kedhí yï rɑ̈dh, mɑ́ pyëwe ɑ́wëggɑ tëngø geki jø tøg bure, kɑ per kinni o yɑ nyodhɑ ngïjjì møgɑ.
Thyew kiper kinni o møgɑni óköbbí wɑ̈ddí, kí wɑ̈ddi wɑ̈ddí, gen ɑ gïg-ɑ ɑ́göggɑ tyëng Rïp, tyëng-ɑ dhëgg, geki ngïjjì møg-ɑ ɑ́nyodh yi yɑn kì kelli gen, o óyod yi wun kinni yɑ bene Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j.”

Kɑ Mosɑ̀ geki Aɑron kedh-ɑ yï rɑ̈dh, ɑköbbii yi gen kinni, “Jwøøg tyëng Ibru, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j okööbø kinni, ‘Yï gït-ɑ wɑɑng yï bɑ̈nyi ki dwöögi wïjí piny kì bølɑ? Wiy jiɑ kedh gen, o yɑ mɑlli yi gen.
Mɑ́ keløg yï óbɑ̈nyi ki wiyi jiɑ, myërrí ómuuj yi yɑn ki bɑ̈nyø dhuki.
Piny ókum yi bɑ̈nyø. Kɑ piny ódhɑ̈lø nënnø yi ngenyi bɑ̈nyø. O jɑmm-ɑ ɑ́döng kì yï wun kì bɑng ɑtuni ɑ́piy cɑm yi en, o yenh-ɑ twïyø kì yethi bɑ̈gg cɑm yi en.

Kɑ̈llí ópɑ̈ng yi bɑ̈nyø, kí kɑ̈lli jø tøg burí geki kɑ̈lli tyëng Rïp bënn, gïjø me nuti pɑ̈nyø lidhø yi wëëg wun, kí wëëg wëëg wun ki kër-ɑ ɑ́bëëd gen kì kömi piny, gïti dicyɑ̈ngtïn.’ ” Kɑ Mosɑ̀ ókedhø kì buti rɑ̈dh.
Kɑ rɑ̈dh köbbi yi jø tøg bure kinni, “Jɑɑl, gït-ɑ wɑɑng e muuj-ɑ wɑ ki ryɑ̈g! Kwïj yi yïn kinni Rïp ɑ́rënyi? Wiy tyëng Isrɑil kedhi gen be mɑlli Jwøøg gen, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j.”
Codhe, kɑ Mosɑ̀ geki Aɑron dwöög bøli rɑ̈dh. Aköbbi gen yi rɑ̈dh kinni, “Kedhu be mɑlli Jwøøg wun, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j. De köbbu yɑn mɑ yinge’ men ki men ɑ kedh?”
Kɑ Mosɑ̀ okööbø kinni, “Wøkí yɑɑg-ɑ wøbb kí jøgdøngi wøn ɑ kedh, kí wɑ̈ddi wøn geki nyigi wøn, kí dyëgi wøn geki dhögi wøn, mɑ́ wø kedh-ɑ be wøwi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j.”
Kɑ rɑ̈dh okööbø kinni, “Bɑ Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j ɑ ókøny wun ke wiyɑ wun, o wu kedh wun, wuki nyigi wun kì Rïp. Nënni wu dwɑdd-ɑ gwøg ki gïnrɑj.
Pɑth! Jøg-ɑ cwøw keti gen ɑ kedhi be mɑlli Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, o bene gïn-ɑ kwɑjji yi wun.” Codhe, kɑ Mosɑ̀ ryeem wɑ̈g yi rɑ̈dh geki Aɑron kì gøle.
Kɑ Mosɑ̀ köbbi yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kinni, “Tïng cingí mɑl kì kömi piny Rïp, o bɑ̈nyø bëe. Bɑ̈nyø ótɑɑy yij piny Rïp bëne, o lum geki yenh-ɑ ɑ́döng kì bɑng ɑtuni ɑ́piy cɑm yi en.”

Kɑ Mosɑ̀ lodhe tïnge mɑl kì kömi piny Rïp, kɑ Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j ókönø ki yømø kì kuni wɑɑng cyɑ̈ɑ̈ng mwøl, kɑ cɑ̈ng tyëge e ókwöddø kì pönhɑni kì cyɑ̈ngɑni, kɑ wɑ̈r tyëge. Keny-ɑ ɑ́bëën mwøl, yømɑni rum kɑ̈nø ki bɑ̈nyø.
Kɑ bɑ̈nyø pɑ̈ɑ̈r-ɑ kömi piny Rïp bëne, kɑ ceg-ɑ ì nɑb kì yethi myërri Rïp bënn ɑ́ thïgø thïgø, bong bɑ̈nyø mɑ ɑ́pɑ̈nyi bëënø e nɑ menɑni, wɑlɑ̀ bong men-ɑ óbï kì bɑnge e pɑ̈r ki en.

Piny ɑ́dhɑ̈li nennø yi bɑ̈nyø. Kɑ piny ólunyø yi bɑ̈nyø. Kɑ lum geki yenh cɑm yi en kinni tweet, kí yenhi nywøl møg-ɑ ɑ́döng kì bɑng ɑtuni ɑ́piy. Bong gïjø mɑ ɑ́döng e mɑr kì ri lùm geki yenh kì yethi pwödh, kì piny Rïp bëne.
Kɑ Mosɑ̀ geki Aɑron jwɑn ki cwølø yi rɑ̈dh, ɑköbbe gïn kinni, “Yɑ ɑ́bɑ̈jji kì bøli Jwøøg wun, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, kí bøli wun.
Anɑn lɑ̈ɑ̈m pëthi wun ki yɑn, kɑ Jwøøg wun, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, kwɑjji wun kiperɑ, o gïn-ɑ bɑ nɑ̈ɑ̈g ni men kɑ̈l yi en kì butɑ.”
Codhe, ɑkedh Mosɑ̀ kì buti rɑ̈dh, kɑ Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kwɑjje.
Kɑ yømø me teeg cɑrø lug yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kì kuni wɑɑng cyɑ̈ɑ̈ng böörø, kɑ bɑ̈nyø wøøje, kɑ gø cuure Nɑɑm Omeli Kwɑrø. Bong bɑ̈nyø ɑ́kyel mɑ ɑ́döng kì myërri Rïp bënn.
Kɑ pyëw rɑ̈dh wëggi tëngø yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, ɑcöge tyëng Isrɑil pɑ wëgge kedhø.
Kɑ Mosɑ̀ köbbi yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kinni, “Tïng cingí mɑl kì kömi piny Rïp, o piny gööge ki muudhø, me yije cɑɑg wɑ̈rrø.”
Kɑ Mosɑ̀ bɑde rïïje mɑl, kɑ muudhø me dwøng bï-ɑ kömi piny Rïp bëne ki cyɑ̈ng ɑ́dɑ̈g.
Bong dhɑnhø mɑ ɑ́lidh wɑɑd gen; bong dhɑnhø mɑ ɑ́dhwödh kì keje ki cyɑ̈ng ɑ́dɑ̈g. De kɑ̈jj-ɑ bëëd yi tyëng Isrɑil ɑ́bëëd e dɑ cɑr.
Kɑ Mosɑ̀ cwøl yi rɑ̈dh, ɑköbbe gøn kinni, “Kedh wun kɑ Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j mɑlli wun, kɑ dhögi wun geki dyëgi wun wiy, de mɑ̈nni wun geki nyigi wun ócuggø kedhø kí wun.”
Kɑ Mosɑ̀ ólöggø kinni, “De yïn thyew, muuj ki gëdhhì møg-ɑ óngɑ̈lli wøn Jwøøg wøn, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j.

Jɑmmi wøn thyew ceg-ɑ kedhø kí wøn, bong dɑdø me döng, mɑ́ gen ɑ ri gen ókɑ̈bbi yi wøn ki møg-ɑ wøw wøn Jwøøg wøn, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j. Kwïj yi wøn eni gïn-ɑ ówøw wøn Jwøøg wøn, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, gïti keny-ɑ ówɑ̈dhi wøn kunɑni.”
De pyëw rɑ̈dh ɑ́wëggi tëngø yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, kɑ óbɑ̈nyø ki wëggi gen kedhø.
Aköbbi Mosɑ̀ yi rɑ̈dh kinni, “Kedhí wɑ̈g kì keny, kɑ yï ko dwöög këti. Odwöög yïɑ, yï ceg-ɑ thøø!”
Codhe, ɑköbbi rɑ̈dh yi Mosɑ̀ kinni, “Gen ɑgɑk, ɑ́kwøb yi yïn, yɑ pɑ dwöög be lidhi yïn këti.”
Kɑ Mosɑ̀ köbbi yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kinni, “Ádöng ɑ́ ryɑ̈g ɑ́kyel ɑ ókɑ̈ɑ̈lɑ kömi Rïp, codhe o wu ör wɑ̈g yi rɑ̈dh, wu bënn, wu ócire ki cïïr dwøng.
Köbbí jøg-ɑ cwøw geki mɑ̈nni Isrɑil kinni, cwöddi gen ki jɑmm-ɑ bɑ dhɑb kí ɑ́tegø kì yï mɑ̈dhhi gen.”
Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j tyëng Isrɑil ɑ́wëgge wørø yi tyëng Rïp. Mosɑ̀ thyew mïdhi ɑ́ jɑl me pere teeg cɑrø yi rɑ̈dh geki jø tøg bure, kí ji bënn.
Codhe, kɑ rɑ̈dh köbbi yi Mosɑ̀ kinni, “Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j okööbø kinni, ‘Tïn kì dïwɑ̈r, yɑ kedh-ɑ kelli Rïp,
wɑ̈n-ɑ kɑyø bëne ceg-ɑ thøø kì piny Rïp, cɑg kì ri kɑyi rɑ̈dh ngɑn-ɑ bëëdø kì wïj kwøm, gïti ri kɑyi bɑ̈ng-ɑ dhɑjø men-ɑ rɑ̈ɑ̈gø ki byel. Cɑgg ɑ́ kɑyyi lɑ̈yy thyew, ge ceg-ɑ thøø.
Ywøg me dwøng óbëëd e nud kì piny Rïp bëne. Bong mɑ ɑ́bëëd e nɑ menɑni, o bong men-ɑ ókɑ̈ɑ̈l bɑnge e nɑ en.
De bong gwög men-ɑ ógwɑ̈y tyëng Isrɑil, dhɑnhø kí lɑ̈y pɑ gwɑ̈y yi en, o yod yi wun kinni yɑ ɑ́cïb ki kew kì kɑɑm Rïp geki Isrɑil.’ ”
Kɑ Mosɑ̀ okööbø kinni, “Jø tøg burí bënn óbï yïɑ, kɑ ri gen bøødh gen piny kì bølɑ, ge okööbø kinni, ‘Kedh kɑ jií kɑ̈ɑ̈l bënn.’ Codhe o yɑ kedhɑ cyee.” Kɑ Mosɑ̀ ókedhø kì buti rɑ̈dh pyëwe rɑɑj cɑrø.
Aköbbi Mosɑ̀ yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kinni, “Kwøbbi wun pɑ lïngi yi rɑ̈dh gïti keny-ɑ óngënyi ngïjjì møgɑ kì piny Rïp.”
Ngïjjì møgɑni bënn ɑ́gwøg yi Mosɑ̀ geki Aɑron kì bøli rɑ̈dh, kɑ pyëw rɑ̈dh wëggi tëngø yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, ɑcöge tyëng Isrɑil pɑ wëgge kedhø kì pinye.
“Dwɑ̈y men bene dwɑ̈n-ɑ mɑl kì yï wun kibøli dwɑ̈tt bënn. Bene en dwɑ̈n-ɑ mɑl kì yij run.
Köbbu tyëng Isrɑil bënn kinni, yɑ̈ɑ̈b dhɑnhø ki órömø kipe tyëng gøle, keny-ɑ ógöög cyɑ̈nggi dwɑ̈y men ki pyɑ̈rø.
Keløg e bong ji mø gïïr kì kɑl møg cuggi tyëgi órömɑni, nywɑg ge gøn ki gøl-ɑ bute, e røøm ki kwɑnni ji. Kwɑn ceth ɑ́ kɑ̈jji dhøggi jiɑni, eni órömø.
Yɑb ɑ́ órömø me bong gïnrɑj kì ree, rune ɑ́kyel. Dyelɑni ócuggø bëëdø ɑ́ órömø wɑlɑ̀ ónywøg.
Kɑ ge mïdhi wun gïti keny-ɑ ógöög cyɑ̈nggi dwɑ̈y men ki pyɑ̈rø wïdɑ́ngwen. Ngɑɑl gen yi kɑ̈lli Isrɑil bënn kì böörø kì cyɑ̈ngɑni, e piny nuti lunyø.
Kɑ ge kɑ̈bbi gen kì ri remø, kɑ gɑ̈ɑ̈j ri bɑ̈lli ud geki bøli tëdd kì mɑl, kì kɑ̈ll-ɑ yethi gen cɑɑm dyelɑni.
Kɑ dyelɑni bul ki mɑc kì wɑ̈rɑni. Kɑ cɑm ki lùm mø keej geki ópun me bɑ ɑbul ɑ́ ɑwɑj me bɑ olwëny.
Ko di gïjø me cɑm kì ree e nuti cyegø, wɑlɑ̀ ko di me thɑl ki pï, de ceg ki bulø ki mɑc, kí wïje geki tyelle, kí cïnne.
Kɑ ko di men wiy yi wun kì ree gïti mwøl, keløg e dɑ men wɑ̈dhi mwøl, rɑ̈b wun en ki mɑc.
Cɑmu en, e wënnì ween wun yethi wun, o wɑrri wun ying-ɑ tyelli wun, o lødhi wun ying-ɑ cinggi wun, bene kër-ɑ ócɑm wun en ɑnɑn, mɑ́ e bɑ Ákɑɑdh mi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j.
“Yɑ ókɑ̈lli yij piny Rïp bëne kì wɑ̈rɑni, o kɑyyì bënn nɑ̈g yi yɑn, cɑg kì ri kɑyi dhɑnhø, gïti ri kɑyi lɑ̈y. O jwöggi Rïp bënn ócɑy yi yɑn, bene yɑn Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j.
O remø óbëëd ɑ́ ngïjji kɑ̈ll-ɑ di wun. Gøl-ɑ ree lidhɑ remø, ókɑɑdh yi yɑn. Bong gïn-ɑ ónywɑl wun keny-ɑ ócɑyɑ piny Rïp.
Nyi pɑru cyɑ̈ngɑni ceth, kɑ wu nyi tuug wun kì yije wu wøw-ɑ yɑn. Rïjji Isrɑil bënn, wør gen yɑn ki wööwø cyɑ̈ngɑni, cɑg ɑnɑn gïti ɑtheer.

“Cyɑ̈nggi wööwø menɑni bɑ ɑ́bïryew, wu cɑm-ɑ olwëny kì yethi cyɑ̈nggɑni. Kɑ̈ɑ̈l wun ówɑj wɑ̈g kì yethi kɑ̈lli wun kì cyɑ̈ng-ɑ mɑl. De ngɑn-ɑ ócyɑ̈mø ki ówɑj kì yethi cyɑ̈nggɑni, cɑg kì cyɑ̈ng-ɑ mɑl gïti bïryeew cyɑ̈nggɑni, ngɑnɑni kɑ̈ɑ̈l-ɑ wɑ̈g kì kelli Isrɑil.
Nyi cugi wun ki cyɑ̈ng-ɑ mɑl geki bïryeew cyɑ̈ng; ge bɑ cyɑ̈nggi kwër kì yï wun. Bong gïjø me gwøg kì cyɑ̈nggɑni den-ɑ́ gïn-ɑ cɑm kete ɑ cuggi gwøgø yi wun.
Mïdhu kwëër olwëny, mɑ́ e bɑ cyɑ̈ngɑni ɑ ɑ́kɑ̈ɑ̈lɑ wun wɑ̈g kì piny Rïp. Mïdhu menɑni ɑ́ cyɑ̈ɑ̈ng kwër kì yethi rïjj bënn gïti ɑtheer.
Cɑ̈gi wun ki cɑmi olwëny kì dwɑ̈n-ɑ mɑl kì cyɑ̈nggi dwɑ̈y pyɑ̈rø wïdɑ́ngwen kì thyënhø, gïti keny-ɑ ógöög cyɑ̈nggi dwɑ̈yɑni ki pyɑ̈r ɑ́ryew wïdɑ́kyel kì thyënhø.
Ko di ówɑj me nud kì kɑ̈lli wun ki cyɑ̈ng ɑ́bïryew. De ngɑn-ɑ ócyɑ̈mø ki ówɑj kì kelli tyëng Isrɑil cɑgg ɑ́ wëdh, ngøl ngɑn ni menɑni wɑ̈ye.
Wu ko cyɑ̈ɑ̈m ki gïjø me wɑj kì yethi kɑ̈lli wun bënn, cɑm wun olwëny kì yethi cyɑ̈nggi kwërɑni.”
Codhe, kɑ jøgdøngi Isrɑil bënn cwøl yi Mosɑ̀, ɑköbbe gïn kinni, “Kedh wun, kɑ kɑl kɑ̈bbe ki órömø wɑlɑ̀ wɑ̈dtegø kɑ ge ngɑl wun, o kɑ̈lli wun göög gen ki Kwëër Ákɑɑdh.

Kɑ wu kɑ̈bbi wun ki yelø, kɑ jwɑ̈ɑ̈g wun yij tɑm-ɑ di remø, kɑ remɑni gɑ̈ɑ̈j wun bɑ̈lli uddi wun geki wɑ̈thi tëdd kì mɑl. Kɑ ko di dhɑnhø kì kelli wun men bɑ̈ɑ̈n ɑ́dyëddi kɑl e bï-ɑ wɑ̈g, gïti keny-ɑ óru wøw.
Keny-ɑ óbëën Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j be gøji Rïp, kɑ remø lidh yi en kì bɑ̈lli ød geki wïj tëd kì mɑl, gø ókɑɑdhe, kɑ ngɑn-ɑ nɑ̈gø mɑ̈ɑ̈ne kedhi yethi kɑ̈lli wun be nɑ̈ggø.
Kɑ møgɑni mïdhi wun gɑ cigg kiper wun, wuki wɑ̈ddi wun gïti ɑtheer.
O keny-ɑ ókedhu piny-ɑ ɑ́kwøb yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kinni gø ómëgge wun, mïdhu guöngɑni ceth kidøøj.
O keny-ɑ ópëjji wɑ̈ddi wun kinni, ‘Guöng bɑ ngø kì yï wun?’
Kɑ wu kööb wun kì bøli kenyɑni kinni, ‘Bɑ gëëdhi, Ákɑɑdh mi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, ngɑn-ɑ ɑ́kɑɑdh kɑ̈lli tyëng Isrɑil kì Rïp, keny-ɑ ɑ́gøje Rïp, de kɑ̈llee ɑ́yiele.’ ”
Kɑ ji ri gen bøødh gen piny, kɑ Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j mɑl yi gen.
Kɑ tyëng Isrɑil ókedhø, ɑgwøg gen møg-ɑ ɑ́cïgi Mosɑ̀ geki Aɑron yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j. Møgɑni ɑ́gwøg yi gen ceth.
Kɑ rɑ̈dh ócyëwø kì wɑ̈rɑni geki jø tøg bure bënn, kí tyëng Rïp bënn. Ádɑ ywøg me dwøng kì Rïp bëne, bong kɑl me yije jɑdø ki ngɑnthøø.
Kɑ Mosɑ̀ geki Aɑron cwøle kì wɑ̈rɑni kɑ gï köbbe kinni, “Dhwödh wun, kedhu wɑ̈g kì kelli jiɑ, wuki tyëng Isrɑil. Kɑ wu kedhu be mɑlli Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j ni kɑ ɑ́kööb wun.
Kɑ dhögi wun geki dyëgi wun kwɑny wun thyew ni kɑ ɑ́kööb wun, kɑ wu kedh wun. Kwɑ̈jji wun ki gyëdh kiperɑ thyew.”
Kɑ Isrɑil jwɑn yi tyëng Rïp ki kwøbbi dhwödhø, ge okööbø kinni, “Jwɑnu kedhø kipe wø óthøw bënn.”
Codhe, kɑ teedø tɑ̈mmi ɑwɑ̈jji gen pɑ̈ng gen ki ɑwɑj olwëny. Kɑ tɑ̈mmi ɑwɑ̈jj bɑɑn gen yethi ógudh, kɑ gï byel gen.
Tyëng Isrɑil ɑ́göög ni kɑ ɑ́köbbi gen yi Mosɑ̀ ceth. Kɑ ge ócwöddø kì yï tyëng Rïp ki jɑmm-ɑ bɑ dhɑb kí ɑ́tegg, kí ógudhi dhwɑ̈ng.
Kɑ pëthi tyëng Rïp yïëbbi Isrɑil yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, ɑmuuj gen jɑmm-ɑ ɑ́kwɑjji kì yï gen bënn. Kɑ kɑ̈ɑ̈r Rïp kɑ̈l yi tyëng Isrɑil.
Tyëng Isrɑil ɑ́dhwödh ki tyelli gen kì Rɑmsis ge kedh-ɑ Suköth. Kwɑnni jøg-ɑ cwøw bɑ ɑ́lïp miy ɑ́bïkyel, tyëng-ɑ mɑ̈nn geki othønhø pɑth ki ɑkwɑn.
Ji møøgø mø kwɑnni gen ngenyø thyew ɑ́kedh ki gen, kɑ ge oköödø ki dhög kí dyëg ɑ́tegg kí römm mø gïïr.
Tyëng Isrɑil ɑ́bud ki ópun ki ɑwɑny-ɑ olwëny men-ɑ ɑ́kɑ̈ɑ̈l yi gen kì Rïp. Awɑnyɑni ɑ́kɑ̈l yi gen e nuti wɑ̈nyyø, mɑ́ ge ɑ́ceg kɑ cyeed wɑ̈g kì Rïp, kɑ ge ójɑ̈ddø ki keny göög gen ki gïn cɑɑm yöö.
Keny-ɑ ɑ́thumi runnɑni gɑ miy ɑ́ngwen kí pyɑ̈r ɑ́dɑ̈g, ɑbëën yɑɑy Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j wɑ̈g kì piny Rïp, kí wɑ̈thi kɑ̈lle bënn.
Bɑ wɑ̈r men mïdhi ɑ́ mi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, wɑ̈r-ɑ ɑ́kɑ̈ɑ̈le gïn wɑ̈g kì Rïp, mïdhi yi tyëng Isrɑil, rïny kí rïny, gïti ɑtheer.
Kɑ Mosɑ̀ geki Aɑron köbbi yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kinni, “Bene Kwëër Ákɑɑdh ɑnɑn. Bong wëdh me cyɑ̈mø ki gïi Kwëër Ákɑɑdh.
De bɑ̈ng-ɑ jɑlø men bɑ ɑngew ki ngyëny ócuggø cɑm, ke rum en ki ngølø.
Wëlø geki ngɑn-ɑ bɑ ɑkïr, pɑ cyɑ̈mø kì ree.
Cɑm kì kɑl, ko di rïnge me kïdhi wɑ̈g kì gølɑni, kɑ ko di cögø me tor yi wun kì ri cue.
Nyi gwøøg kwërɑni ceth yi wɑ̈thi kɑ̈lli Isrɑil bënn.
Ngɑnpɑth men-ɑ bëëdø kì butí ócuggø gwøg ki Ákɑɑdh mi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j. De ngølu møg-ɑ bɑ cwøw bënn; ngɑn-ɑ ɑ́rum ki ngølø, ócuggø gwøg mɑ́ e ɑ́göög e nɑ ngɑn-ɑ ónywølø kì pönhï.
Cigg ɑ́kyel ɑ dwɑddi kinni o ge mïdhi yi tyëng Isrɑil geki tyëngpɑth møg-ɑ bëëdø kì kelli gen.”
Tyëng Isrɑil ɑ́yïëy bënn ki møg-ɑ ɑ́cïgi Mosɑ̀ geki Aɑron yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, kɑ gïgɑni nyi gwøg yi gen ceth.
Wɑ̈thi kɑ̈lli Isrɑil bënn ɑ́kɑ̈ɑ̈l wɑ̈g yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kì piny Rïp kì cyɑ̈ngɑni.
Kɑ Mosɑ̀ köbbi yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kinni,
“Thyëyí yɑn kɑyy-ɑ cwøw bënn kì Isrɑil, ying-ɑ́ dhɑnhø wɑlɑ̀ lɑ̈y, bɑ miɑ.”
Kɑ teedø köbbi yi Mosɑ̀ kinni, “Pɑrri wun cyɑ̈ng-ɑ ɑ́bëën wun wɑ̈g kì Rïp. Cyɑ̈ng-ɑ ɑ́bëën wun wɑ̈g kì yij bɑ̈ɑ̈ngø. Mɑ́ wu ɑ́kɑ̈ɑ̈l wɑ̈g yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kɑ tegø me dwøng.
Wu ɑ́bï wɑ̈g kì cyɑ̈ɑ̈ng kì dwɑ̈n-ɑ mɑl.

Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j wu ókïdhe piny tyëng Kɑnɑɑn, geki piny tyëng Kit, kí piny tyëng Amör, kí piny tyëng Kib, kí piny tyëng Yebus. Bene piny men-ɑ ɑ́könge kweyyi wun kinni gø ómëgge wun, eni piny-ɑ yije mulli yi cɑg geki møøw kïc, nyi gwøgu kwër menɑni kì dwɑ̈ɑ̈n.
Cyɑ̈ng ɑ́bïryew wu cɑm-ɑ olwëny, o bïryeew cyɑ̈nggɑni bɑ cyɑ̈ng-ɑ wøøw Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j.
Cyɑ̈ng ɑ́bïryew wu cɑm-ɑ olwëny, ko di ówɑj wɑlɑ̀ gïjø me wɑj kì yethi kɑ̈lli wun.
Köbbu wɑ̈ddi wun kì cyɑ̈ngɑni kinni, ‘Wööwø men gwøg yi wɑ kɑ per gïn-ɑ ɑ́gwøg yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kì cyɑ̈ng-ɑ ɑ́bëën wɑ wɑ̈g kì Rïp.
O kwërɑni bëëde e bɑ ngïji kì cinggi wun, e nɑ gïn nyi pɑ̈ddi yïn kì bølí, o Ciggi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j ying gen dhøgí, mɑ́ yï ɑ́kɑ̈ɑ̈l wɑ̈g yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kì Rïp kɑ tegø me dwøng.
Kɑ ciggɑni mïdhí, yï nyi gwøg-ɑ kwërɑni kì bøli keje ceth kì yethi runn bënn.
“O keny-ɑ ókïdhi wun piny Kɑnɑɑn yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j ni kɑ ɑ́köbbe wun, wuki wëëg wun,
kɑ kɑyy-ɑ cwøw, ying gɑ ji wɑlɑ̀ lɑ̈yy, thyeey gen gɑ mø Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j.
De nyi pɑ̈ɑ̈d kɑyi ɑderø ki órömø. O keløg e pɑ pɑ̈d yi yïn, tor mune. O kɑyi dhɑnhø ócuggø pɑ̈dø, pɑ̈d kɑyyì møg-ɑ bɑ wɑ̈ddí ceth.
Opyëëj yïn dhuki megø yi wɑ̈dí kinni, ‘Men bɑ ngø?’ Kɑ köbbí kinni, ‘Wɑ ɑ́kɑ̈ɑ̈l wɑ̈g yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kì Rïp, kì yij bɑ̈ɑ̈ngø kɑ tegø me dwøng.

Rɑ̈ɑ̈dh Rïp ɑ́bëëd wïje teeg, kɑ wɑ mɑ̈ɑ̈ne bëën wɑ̈g. Kɑ kɑyyì bënn møg-ɑ bɑ cwøw, ji ki lɑ̈yy nɑ̈g yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kì yij piny Rïp bëne. Bene ɑ bɑnge nyi thyëyi wɑ wɑ̈n-ɑ kɑyø Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j ɑ́ gëëdhi, o nyi pɑ̈ɑ̈d-ɑ wɑ̈g.
Wööwø men pɑ̈r ki gïjø men-ɑ ótwööj cingí, o pɑ̈r ki gïjø men-ɑ ótwööj bølí ɑ́ men nyi pɑ̈ddi yïn kinni, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j wɑ ɑ́kɑ̈ɑ̈le wɑ̈g kì Rïp kɑ tegø me dwøng.’ ”

Keny-ɑ ɑ́ryeem tyëng Isrɑil yi rɑ̈ɑ̈dh Rïp, ge nuti wiyø yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j o ge kɑ̈l gen yuu piny Pelistiyɑ̀, ngö ɑ́ en ɑ cyɑ̈gi. Mɑ́ Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j ɑ́kööb kinni, yɑ pɑ dwɑddi kinni o ji ópɑ̈di gen, keny-ɑ óyod gen liny, kɑ ge døøg-ɑ Rïp.
Kɑ ji wen yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j ki yuu yij pɑ̈l, gï töönge’ Nɑɑm Omeli Kwɑrø. Yɑɑy Isrɑil ɑ́bï wɑ̈g kì Rïp e rum duudø.
Akedh gen kì Suköth kɑ ge oywömø kì Ethɑm kì tøg ryɑng.
Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j nyi cyɑ̈dh-ɑ́ɑ̀ bøli gen ɑ́ lööj pøølø kì dicɑ̈ng, o nyudhe gen yöö, o bɑ lööj mɑc kì wɑ̈r, o menye yuu gen. Kipe kinni o ge cuggi gen ki cyɑ̈dhø kì dicɑ̈ng kí wɑ̈r.
Lööj pøølø nuti pɑ̈nyi nyegø kì bøli gen kì dicɑ̈ng, o lööj mɑc nuti nyegø kì wɑ̈r.
Kɑ Mosɑ̀ köbbi yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kinni,
“Köbbí tyëng Isrɑil o ge døøg gen ngɑ̈thi gen, kɑ ge gud gen kì bøli Pi Akiröth, kɑɑm Migdöl geki Nɑɑm Omeli Kwɑrø kì buti Bɑɑl Dhepön.
O rɑ̈dh rume kinni i tyëng Isrɑil lɑ̈ɑ̈nyø, de ge wɑ̈dh-ɑ wïïnø kì yij pɑ̈l.
Codhe, o pyëw rɑ̈dh cwed yi yɑn, o renge bɑng gen. O yɑ yïddɑ ki dhwɑ̈ng kì bɑng rɑ̈dh geki yɑye, o yod yi tyëng Rïp kinni yɑ bene Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j.” Kɑ møgɑni gwøg yi gen ceth.
Keny-ɑ ɑ́köbbi rɑ̈ɑ̈dh Rïp kinni, i tyëng Isrɑil kedhø, kɑ rumme wile geki bɑ̈ngge, kɑ ge okööbø kinni, “Á ngø ɑ ɑ́gwøg yi wɑ kinnï, ɑ wëggi tyëng Isrɑil kedhø yi wɑ? Bɑ̈nggee ɑ́kedh!”
Kɑ yɑ̈ye cwøle, kɑ jølinye kwɑnye.
Kɑ oyïënyø kì kelli yɑ̈the ki yɑ̈ɑ̈th miy ɑ́bïkyel. Kɑ yɑ̈thi liny mø Rïp bënn ki pëjji liny kì yethi gen odhwödhø.
Pyëw rɑ̈ɑ̈dh Rïp ɑ́cwed yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, kɑ reng-ɑ bɑng tyëng Isrɑil, ge ɑ́kedh pëthi gen pɑ lïngø.
Kɑ bɑng gen rengi yi tyëng Rïp. Kɑ ge pïïd yi kyënyì geki yɑ̈thi rɑ̈dh, kí jøg-ɑ kömi kyënyì; ge ɑ́pïïd yi liny rɑ̈dh ge guddø kì kömi Nɑɑm Omeli Kwɑrø kì buti Pi Akiröth, kì bøli Bɑɑl Dhepön.
Keny-ɑ ɑ́cyɑ̈ngi rɑ̈dh geki linye, ɑliidh tyëng Rïp yi tyëng Isrɑil ge bï-ɑ kömi gen. Kɑ ge obwøgø ki mendwøng. Kɑ tyëng Isrɑil ywøøg-ɑ kö Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j.
Aköbbi Mosɑ̀ yi gen kinni, “Á ngø ɑ göggí wøn kinnï? Yïde ɑ kɑ̈ɑ̈l wøn wɑ̈g kì Rïp o wø thøw wøn kì yij pɑ̈l? Wø di jɑ̈ddi ki kɑ̈jj møg koony wøn kì Rïp?
Pɑth ki gïn-ɑ ɑ́köbbi yïn yi wøn kì Rïp, kinni, wiy wøn, o wø göggi wøn tyëng Rïp. Mɑ́ göggi tyëng Rïp lɑ̈w kibøli ke thøw wøn kì yij pɑ̈l?”

Kɑ ji köbbi yi Mosɑ̀ kinni, “Wu ko böggi! Cungi wun kɑ wu nëën wun ki yiel-ɑ óyieel wun yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j dicyɑ̈ɑ̈ng. Tyëng Rïp møg-ɑ nenni yi wun ek dicyɑ̈ɑ̈ng, ge pɑ cigi lidhø yi wun gïti ɑtheer.
Per wun ónyɑg yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j. Pëthi wun ko lïngi.”
Codhe, ɑköbbi Mosɑ̀ yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kinni, “Yïde ɑ ywöög köörɑ? Köbbí tyëng Isrɑil kinni cɑ̈gi gen ki kedhø.
De yïn, kwɑny lodhí kɑ bɑdí rïïj kömi nɑm, o pyëde, o tyëng Isrɑil kedhi gen yije e thwøwø.
O pyëw rɑ̈ɑ̈dh Rïp ócwed yi yɑn, o kedhe bɑng gen, o yɑ yïddɑ ki dhwɑ̈ng kì bɑng rɑ̈ɑ̈dh Rïp geki yɑye, kí yɑ̈the, kí kyënye.
Wiy yod yi tyëng Rïp kinni bene yɑn Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, keny-ɑ óyïddɑ ki dhwɑ̈ng kì bɑng rɑ̈ɑ̈dh Rïp geki yɑye, kí yɑ̈the, kí kyënye.”
Kɑ wëywöni Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j men-ɑ ɑ́bëëd e cyɑ̈dh-ɑ́ɑ̀ bøli kɑɑl Isrɑil ócyɑ̈gø, kɑ døøg-ɑ ngɑ̈thi gen. Kɑ lööj pøølø ócyɑ̈gø kì bøli gen, kɑ døøg-ɑ ngɑ̈thi gen.
Kɑ pëgg-ɑ kɑɑm yɑɑy Rïp geki yɑɑy Isrɑil. Kɑ tung-ɑ di tyëng Rïp gwøge ɑ́ muudhø, de tuung Isrɑil dɑ cɑr kì wɑ̈rɑni, kɑ yɑɑy ocögø e pɑ cyɑ̈ngi ki yɑɑy.
Codhe, kɑ Mosɑ̀ cinge tïnge, ɑgööj yømø yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kì kuni wɑɑng cyɑ̈ɑ̈ng mwøl, kɑ tyëg-ɑ wɑ̈r e ókwöddø, kɑ pï pyëëde, nɑm ree ɑ́løge keny thwøwø.
Akedh tyëng Isrɑil ge kɑ̈ll-ɑ yij nɑm kì piny me thwøwø, e pï nɑ dör ɑ́ryew, ɑ́kyel kì wɑ̈thi këjji gen, kí ɑ́kyel kì wɑ̈thi cyɑ̈mmi gen.
Kɑ tyëng Rïp kedh-ɑ nɑm bɑng gen, kí yɑ̈thi gen geki kyënyi gen bënn.
Keny-ɑ ɑ́ru wøw, kɑ Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j lïïdh-ɑ kömi yɑɑy Rïp kì yij lööj yïrø geki mɑc, kɑ yɑɑy Rïp omyëlø yi wɑ̈ɑ̈rø.
Kɑ tyelli yɑ̈thi gen dije, kɑ ge døøg-ɑ be cyɑ̈dhø ge ywɑjj-ɑ ri gen, kɑ tyëng Rïp okööbø kinni, “Rengi wɑ, mɑ́ Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j nyïɑ̈ggi ki Rïp kɑ per gen.”
Aköbbi Mosɑ̀ yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kinni, “Tïng cingí kì kömi nɑm, o pï døøg gen kömi tyëng Rïp, geki yɑ̈thi gen, kí jø gen møg-ɑ kömi kyënyì.”
Kɑ Mosɑ̀ cinge rïïje kömi nɑm, kɑ nɑm døøg-ɑ keje kì ri ru wøw. Kɑ tyëng Rïp órengø yi pï, kɑ ge wøøj nɑm yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j.
Pï ɑ́dwöög kɑ yɑ̈ɑ̈th geki jøg-ɑ kömi kyënyì mud yi gen, eni yɑɑy Rïp men-ɑ ɑ́kedhi nɑm bɑng gen bëne, bong ɑ́kyel mɑ ɑ́döng.
De tyëng Isrɑil ɑ́kedh ge bɑ̈ɑ̈n-ɑ nɑm, e pï bɑ dörø kì wɑ̈thi këjji gen, kí wɑ̈thi cyɑ̈mmi gen.
Bene kër-ɑ ɑ́yieel tyëng Isrɑil yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kì cinggi tyëng Rïp ɑnɑn, kì cyɑ̈ngɑni. Kɑ tyëng Rïp lidh yi Isrɑil ge buud ge thøø kì tøggi nɑm.
Kɑ tyëng Isrɑil obwøgø yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, keny-ɑ ɑ́lidh gen gïn-ɑ ɑ́gögge Rïp. Kɑ Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j wør yi gen geki Mosɑ̀ bɑ̈nge.
“Yɑ owörø kì bøli Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j,
mɑ́ mɑ̈re ɑ́døngi ki mendwøng.
Kyeny geki ngɑn-ɑ köme ɑ́leenge nɑɑm omelø.
Bene en ɑ ɑ́yiel yɑn.
Bɑ Jwøgɑ; ólejji yi yɑn
Jwøøg kweyyɑ, yɑ ówör yɑ lejj-ɑ dönge.
Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j bɑ jɑl-liny.
Nyinge bɑ “Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j.
“Yɑ̈thi rɑ̈ɑ̈dh Rïp geki kyënye ɑ́leenge nɑm,
pëjji liny geki jödde ɑ́leenge Nɑɑm Omeli Kwɑrø.
Ge ɑ́kum piny yi ɑpɑgø.
Ge ɑ́ludhi tyeli nɑm ni kït.
“Yïn ɑ Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, cingi kyëjí pëddi tegø;
ngetimɑ̈ɑ̈nø nyi ngølle’ ngøllø ɑ́ thullì.
Kì yij tyɑ̈m-ɑ dwøng men-ɑ ɑ́tyɑɑm tyëngmɑ̈ɑ̈nø,
pyëwí ɑ́rënyi, kɑ ge rɑ̈ɑ̈b ni lum.
Pï ri gen ɑ́röör gen mɑl yi yøm-ɑ kɑ̈ɑ̈l órømmí;
pïg-ɑ ɑ́bëëd ge ócyɑ̈dhø, ge ɑ́cungi ni dörø;
pïi keny-ɑ pɑ̈ng ɑ́göög ge teeg kì dïnɑm.
Ngetimɑ̈ɑ̈nø ɑ́kööb kinni, ‘Yɑ órengi bɑng gen, kɑ ge mɑgɑ;
jɑmmi gen ópɑ̈ngi yi yɑn, kɑ møg-ɑ dwɑddɑ kwɑnyɑ bënn.
Pilɑ ówöödhɑ wɑ̈g, kɑ ge nɑ̈gɑ ki cingɑ.’
De yï ɑ́yëggi kömi gen, kɑ ge kum piny yi pïi nɑm.
Ge ɑ́biil piny ni ɑ́yömø, kɑ ɑpɑgø ceg-ɑ ì bɑɑw kì kömi gen.
“Yïn ɑ Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, dɑ jwøg me ni yïn?
Yï bɑ Kwërø, bong ngɑn pɑ̈r ki yïn.
Bong ngɑn pɑ̈r ki yïn kì ri gwøg ki gïïngɑ̈ngø.
Cingi kyëjí ɑ́rïj yi yïn,
kɑ ge mwøøny yi lɑ̈bø.
Ji-ɑ ɑ́yiel yi yïn ópyejji yi yïn ki mɑ̈ɑ̈dø mií.
Ge ókøøl yi yïn kej bëëdí kwërø ki tegí.
Pödhh bënn ɑ́lïng kɑ dëlli gen ceg-ɑ okïr,
tyëng-ɑ bëëdø kì Pelistiyɑ̀ ɑ́moom piny.
Pëjji Edöm ɑ́bwøg ki menteg.
Yɑɑg-ɑ teg kì Moɑb dëlli gen ɑ́kïïr.
tyëng Kɑnɑɑn ɑ́thøw yi wɑ̈ɑ̈rø.
Wɑ̈ɑ̈rø ɑ́pɑ̈dhi kömi gen,
keny-ɑ ɑ́lidh gen tegí, yïn ɑ Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j.
Ge ɑ́cungi kì kɑ̈jji gen ni kïttì,
gïti kɑ ɑ́pöödh jií,
gen ɑ ji-ɑ ɑ́kwɑny yi yïn gɑ møgí.
Jií ópej yi yïn, kɑ ge cïb wïj kït men-ɑ bɑ mií,
keny-ɑ ɑ́gwøg yi yïn, Yïn ɑ Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, ɑ́ kej bëëdí;
eni Keng-ɑ ɑ́ger yi yïn kirií
Yïn ɑ Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, yï óbëëdø yïn ɑ́ rɑ̈dh gïti ɑtheer.”

Kɑ tyëng Isrɑil nɑɑm omelø bɑ̈ɑ̈n gen ge cyɑ̈dh-ɑ tyelli gen, kì keny thwøwø. De keny-ɑ ɑ́kedhi yɑ̈thi Rïp møg-ɑ pyejji yi kyënyì kí tyëng-ɑ kwølli gen nɑm, kɑ pïi nɑɑm omelø gøøj kömi gen yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, kɑ ge omudø.
Kì bøli kenyɑni, kɑ Miryɑm ngetitöng, nyimï Aɑron ókɑ̈bbø ki nyɑ bul. Kɑ gø pwöde ki cinge, kɑ bɑnge kedhi yi tyëng-ɑ mɑ̈nn ge opödø ki bullì mø ni menɑni, ge ocöngø.
Kɑ ge köbbi yi Miryɑm kinni,
“Wör wun kì bøli Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j,
mɑ́ e myëër ki wørø ki mendwøng,
kyeny geki ngɑn-ɑ köme ɑ́leenge nɑɑm omelø.”
Codhe, kɑ Mosɑ̀ tyëng Isrɑil peeje kì kömi Nɑɑm Omeli Kwɑrø, gï peeje’ yij pɑ̈ɑ̈l Cur. Ge ɑ́cyɑ̈dhi ki cyɑ̈ng ɑ́dɑ̈g kì yij pɑ̈l, de bong pï mɑ ɑ́yod yi gen.
Codhe, ɑwɑ̈dhi gen Mɑrɑ̀, kɑ ge óyïddø ki pï kì kunɑni, de pïgɑni ɑ́dhɑ̈li mɑdhø yi gen, mɑ́ ge keej cɑrø (Bene ɑ bɑnge ɑ cɑɑg kenyɑni ɑ́ Mɑrɑ̀, ɑ wɑngi kinni keej).
Kɑ ji göny-ɑ yï Mosɑ̀ ge okööbø kinni, “Wø mɑdh-ɑ ngø?”
Codhe, kɑ Mosɑ̀ ywøøg-ɑ kö Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, kɑ nyudhi yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j ki yɑdh megø. Keny-ɑ ɑ́leeng yɑnhɑni yethi pï yi Mosɑ̀, kɑ pïgɑni yïëy-ɑ mɑdhø.
Kunɑni ɑ ɑ́thödhi jiɑni ki cigg geki kwöng men köme bëëd. Kunɑni thyew ɑ ɑ́rɑnge bëëdi tyëngɑni mɑ mïdhi gen cigge.

Ákööb kinni, “Lïngí kwøbbɑ, kɑ gïn-ɑ kwøb yi yɑn nyi gwøøg ceth. Keløg kwøbbɑ geki ciggɑ ómïdhi yi yïn, bong gïjø ɑ́kyel kì kelli gïgrijjø møg-ɑ ɑ́göggɑ tyëng Rïp men-ɑ ógöggɑ yïn. Yɑ bene Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, ngɑn-ɑ tuur yïn.”
Codhe, kɑ tyëngɑni kedh-ɑ Elïm. Kunɑni ɑ́dɑ nying mø rïngi yi pï gɑ ɑ́bïryew, kí yenh benø gɑ pyɑ̈r ɑ́bïryew. Codhe, kɑ ge ogudø kì kenyɑni kì buti pï.
Codhe, kɑ tyëng Isrɑil odhwödhø bënn kì Elïm, kɑ ge kɑ̈l-ɑ yij ryɑng-ɑ kɑɑm Elïm geki Sinɑy. Ge ɑ́dhwödh ɑ cyɑ̈nggi dwɑ̈y pyɑ̈rø wïdɑ́bïj kì ryeew dwɑ̈tt, kì bɑng dhwödhi gen kì Rïp.
Kɑ tyëng Isrɑil göny-ɑ yï Mosɑ̀ geki Aɑron kì yij pɑ̈l.

Gï ɑ́köbbi gen kinni, “Di bëëd e lɑ̈w ke di nɑ̈ɑ̈g wøn yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kì piny Rïp. Ádɑ rïngø me nyi cɑm yi wøn, gïg-ɑ dwɑddi cɑmø yi wøn bënn nyii yodø yi wøn. De wu ɑ́kɑ̈ɑ̈l-ɑ wøn yij pɑ̈l keny kipe kinni, o wø thøw wøn yi kɑ̈j kì yije.”
Kì bïkyeel cyɑ̈nggi osboo, gwëën ji ki mi cyɑ̈ng ɑ́ryew. Gwëni gen yethi gïg-ɑ nyi gwëni yi gen kì cyɑ̈ɑ̈ng, e yethe bɑ ɑ́ryew.”
Codhe, kɑ tyëng Isrɑil bënn köbbi yi Mosɑ̀ geki Aɑron kinni, “Óyod yi wun tïn kì böörø kinni bɑ Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j ɑ ɑ́kɑ̈ɑ̈l wun wɑ̈g kì Rïp.
Dhuki kì mwøl mɑ̈ɑ̈r Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j ólidh yi wun, mɑ́ wu ɑ́lïngi yi en wu oköörø kì ree, wu nuti köör ɑ ri wøn, den-ɑ́ ri Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j ɑ ɑ́köör yi wun, mɑ́ wø nyi gwøg-ɑ gïn-ɑ nyi kwøb yi en.”

Kɑ Mosɑ̀ okööbø kinni, “Wu óthödhi yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j ki rïngø men cɑm yi wun, kì böörø yethi cyɑ̈ng. O kì mwøl yethi cyɑ̈ng, wu óthödhi yi en ki gïncɑm men-ɑ dwɑddi yi wun. Mɑ́ wu ɑ́lïngi yi en keny-ɑ ɑ́köör wun kì ree. Wu nuti köör ɑ riɑ wøki Aɑron, mɑ́ per wøn bogøn, wu ɑ́köör ɑ ri Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j.”
Codhe, ɑköbbi Aɑron yi Mosɑ̀ kinni, “Köbbí tyëng Isrɑil bënn kinni, ‘Cøng wun ri wun kì bøli Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, mɑ́ køør wun ɑ́lïngi yi en.’ ”
Kɑ̈ng-ɑ́ nudd Aɑron e okööbø ki gen, kɑ mɑ̈ɑ̈r Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j lidh yi gen kì yij pøølø.
Kɑ Mosɑ̀ köbbi yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kinni,

“Køør tyëng Isrɑil ɑ́lïngi yi yɑn; de köbbí gen kinni, kì böörø wu ócyɑ̈mø ki rïngø, o kì mwøl wu ócyɑ̈mø ki gïncɑm kì yethi cyɑ̈ng bënn. O yod yi wun kì bɑng møgɑni kinni bene yɑn Jwøøg wun, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j.”
Kɑ ɑkɑrø obëënø kì böörø, kɑ kɑɑl opɑ̈ngø yi en. O kì mwøl, kɑ tøggi kɑɑl dɑ thöjj kì piny.
Keny-ɑ ɑ́thwøw thöjj, ɑliidh piny e ókumø yi gïjø me ni kwɑ́j.
Keny-ɑ ɑ́lidhii yi tyëng Isrɑil, kɑ ri gen pyënyi gen kinni, “Bɑ ngø?” Kipe kɑ̀ kwïjjii yi gen mɑ bëëde ɑ́ ngø.
Codhe, ɑköbbi gen yi Mosɑ̀ kinni, “Men bene gïncɑm men-ɑ ɑ́mëggi wun yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j ɑ́ men cɑm yi wun.
Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j ɑ́cïg kinni, i dhɑnhø gwene men-ɑ dwɑddi yi en ki cɑmø, røthøl ɑ́ngwen kipe dhɑnhø ɑ́kyel, kɑ kwɑny ɑ́ kwɑnni ji kì kɑl.”
Codhe, kɑ møgɑni gwøg yi tyëng Isrɑil, kwï ji ɑ́gwëën ki mø gïïr, møøgø ɑ́gwëën ki mø nøg.
Codhe, kɑ gø røm gen. Ngɑn-ɑ ɑ́gwen mø gïïr møge nuti løg mø ngenyø, o ngɑn-ɑ ɑ́gwen mø nøg, møge nuti jɑdø, kɑ yod yi gen kinni dhɑnhø gween-ɑ kej dhøge ceth.
Kɑ ge köbbi yi Mosɑ̀ kinni, “Wu ko wïyi kì ree ki men cɑɑm dhuki.”
De kwï gen ɑ́pëëm ki kwøbbi Mosɑ̀, kɑ ge owïyø ki men cɑɑm dhuki. Menɑni ɑ́mɑg yi kunnì kɑ yøme ópënnø. Kɑ Mosɑ̀ mɑg yi liny ki tyëngɑni ki mendwøng.
Yethi cyɑ̈ng kì mwøl, ngɑn nyi gwen-ɑ men-ɑ dwɑdde cɑmø, de kenyi lënhi cɑ̈ng, men-ɑ piny nyi ceg-ɑ nøyø.
O kì bïkyeel cyɑ̈nggi osboo, kɑ ge gwen-ɑ gïncɑm mi cyɑ̈ng ɑ́ryew. Árøm ɑ́ røthøl ɑ́bïdɑ̈g ɑ bɑ mø dhɑnhø ɑ́kyel. Keny-ɑ ɑ́bëën pëjji Isrɑil be köbbi møgɑni Mosɑ̀,

kɑ Mosɑ̀ okööbø kinni, “Bene gen møg-ɑ ɑ́ceg yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j ɑgɑk, kipe dhuki bɑ Sɑbɑth, cyɑ̈ng-ɑ ɑ́kwër yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, bɑ cyɑ̈ɑ̈ng ywömø. Kyel wun møg-ɑ dwɑddu kyelø, kɑ møg-ɑ dwɑddu bɑ̈gø bɑ̈g wun dicyɑ̈ɑ̈ng. Kɑ kwï gïncɑm mïdhi yi wun gïti dhuki.”
Codhe, kɑ ji owïyø ki men wɑ̈dhi dhuki, ni kɑ ɑ́cïg Mosɑ̀, o bong men mɑ ɑ́pëni kì ree, wɑlɑ̀ bong men mɑ ree ɑ́kedhi yi kunnì.
Kɑ ji köbbi yi Mosɑ̀ kinni, “Cɑm wun gïncɑm-ɑ ɑ́gwen yi wun ɑ́wɑ̈ɑ̈, cyɑ̈ɑ̈ng bɑ cyɑ̈ɑ̈ng Sɑbɑth, cyɑ̈ɑ̈ng ywömø men-ɑ ɑ́cïb yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, wu pɑ yïddi kì cyɑ̈ngɑni.
Gwëën wun ki gïncɑm ki cyɑ̈ng ɑ́bïkyel, de bïryeew cyɑ̈ng bɑ cyɑ̈ɑ̈ng Sɑbɑth. Kì cyɑ̈ngɑni, bong gïncɑm me nud kì piny.”
Kɑ kwï ji kedh-ɑ be gwen kì bïryeew cyɑ̈ng, kɑ ge ocögø ge pɑ yïddi.
Kɑ Mosɑ̀ köbbi yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kinni, “Wu wɑ̈dh-ɑ wɑɑng wu opëmø, wu dhɑ̈li mïdhi ciggɑ geki pwönyɑ?

Adɑ́ lïng wun, Sɑbɑth ɑ́gwøg yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j ɑ́ cyɑ̈ɑ̈ng ywömø me ywöm wun ri wun. O kì bïkyeel cyɑ̈ng, wu óthödhi yi en ki gïncɑɑm cyɑ̈ng ɑ́ryew. De kì bïryeew cyɑ̈ng, bëëd dhɑnhø kì gøle, ko di keny kedhe.”
Codhe, kɑ ji oywömø kì bïryeew cyɑ̈ng.

Codhe, kɑ Mosɑ̀ okööbø kinni, “Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j ɑ́kööb kinni, i cïbi wɑ piny ki mɑnɑ̀ men-ɑ ólidh yi kwɑrree. O gïncɑm men-ɑ ɑ́mëggi wɑ ɑ́ men cɑm yi wɑ, lidh yi gen, eni gïncɑm-ɑ ɑ́cɑm yi wɑ kì yij pɑ̈l keny-ɑ ɑ́kɑ̈ɑ̈le wɑ wɑ̈g kì piny Rïp.”
Kɑ Aɑron köbbi yi Mosɑ̀ kinni, “Kɑ̈bbí ki pug kɑ yije kïdhi ki røthøl ɑ́ngwen mø mɑnɑ̀, kɑ cïb bøli Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, kɑ mïdhi kiper kwɑrri wun.”
Codhe, kɑ møg-ɑ ɑ́köbbi Mosɑ̀ yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j gwøg yi Aɑron. Pugi mɑnɑ̀ ɑ́cïbe bøli Sɑnduug Cigg, kinni o mïdhi.
Tyëng Isrɑil ɑ́cyɑ̈ɑ̈m ki mɑnɑ̀ ki runn pyɑ̈r ɑ́ngwen, gïti kɑ ɑ́wɑ̈dhi gen keny-ɑ ɑ́pëggi gen piny, ge ɑ́cyɑ̈ɑ̈m ki mɑnɑ̀ gïti keny-ɑ ɑ́wɑ̈dhi gen wïj tuung piny Kɑnɑɑn.
(Rumi men-ɑ ɑ́rum, yije nyi røm-ɑ yi røthøl pyɑ̈r ɑ́ngwen).
Kɑ tyëng Isrɑil odhwödhø bënn kì pɑ̈ɑ̈l Sin, ge cyɑ̈dhi ge nyii ywömø ni kɑ ɑ́kööb Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j. Ge ɑ́gud kì Repïdïm, kɑ bong-ɑ pï mø mɑdh yi ji.
Codhe, ɑwër gen ki Mosɑ̀, kɑ ge okööbø kinni, “Nëngí wøn ki pïg mɑdh.”
Alöggi Mosɑ̀ kinni, “Wude ɑ wër wun ki yɑn? Wude ɑ pɑ̈nyi wun Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j?”
De ji ɑ́bëëd ri gen dɑ röödhø ki mendwøng, kɑ ge pëgg-ɑ be køør kì ri Mosɑ̀. Ge ɑ́kööb kinni, “Yïde ɑ ɑ́kɑ̈ɑ̈l wøn wɑ̈g kì Rïp? Bɑ kipe kinni o wø nɑ̈g yi yïn ki röödhø wøki nyigi wøn kí dhögi wøn?”
Kɑ Mosɑ̀ ywøøg-ɑ kö Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, kinni, “Á ngø ɑ göggɑ ji møg? Yɑ óbɑ̈lli yi gen ki kïttì, kì bɑng nyɑ keny me thiinh, o yɑ thøwɑ.”
Kɑ Mosɑ̀ köbbi yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kinni, “Kɑ̈bbí ki kwï jøgdøngi Isrɑil, kɑ wu pödhu mɑl bøli ji ki gen. Kɑ lodhí men-ɑ ɑ́gøøj Kiir, kɑ̈ɑ̈l kì cingí.
Yɑ ócungi kì bølí kì wïj nyɑ kït, kì buti Kïti Sinɑy. Kɑ kït gøøj, o pï mulli gen wɑ̈g kì yije, o ji mɑ̈ɑ̈dh gen.” Kɑ møgɑni gwøg yi Mosɑ̀ e onennø yi jøgdøngi Isrɑil.

Kenyɑni ɑ́cɑg ɑ́ Mɑɑsɑ̀ kí Merïbɑ̀ (Pɑ̈nyø ki Wëërø), mɑ́ tyëng Isrɑil ɑ́wër ki Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j. Kɑ Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j pɑ̈nyi yi gen ge ɑ́kööb kinni, “Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j nud kì kellee kidyër wɑlɑ̀ tøøk?”
Abëën kwɑrri Amɑlek kɑ ge ónyïɑ̈ggø ki Isrɑil kì Repïdïm.
Kɑ Jöcwø köbbi yi Mosɑ̀ kinni, “Kɑ̈bbí ki kwï jøg-ɑ cwøw, kɑ wu kedhu be nyïɑ̈ggi ki kwɑrri Amɑlek dhuki. Yɑ ócungi kì wïj nyɑ kït ki loodh Jwøk kì cingɑ.”
Kɑ møg-ɑ ɑ́köbbi Jöcwø yi Mosɑ̀ gwøge ceth, kɑ ge ónyïɑ̈ggø ki kwɑrri Amɑlek. O Mosɑ̀ geki Aɑron kí Ur ɑ́ying-ɑ wïj nyɑ kït.
Isrɑil nyi ceg-ɑ tyɑ̈mø kɑ̈ng-ɑ bëëd cinggi Mosɑ̀ gɑ ɑtïng kì mɑl. De kenyi dwöög Mosɑ̀ cingge piny, kɑ kwɑrri Amɑlek nyii tyɑ̈mø.

Keny-ɑ ɑ́pïd bɑ̈ddi Mosɑ̀, kɑ ge ókɑ̈bbø ki ɑ́tungi kït, kɑ gø cïb gen piny, kɑ Mosɑ̀ pëgg-ɑ köme. O Aɑron geki Ur mïdhi gen cingge kì mɑl, ngɑɑn kì tuung, ngɑɑn kì tuung. Kɑ orïïjø kinøw, cingge ying-ɑ mɑl gïti kɑ ɑ́buddi cɑ̈ng.
Kɑ kwɑrri Amɑlek tyɑm yi Jöcwø kì yij linyɑni.
Kɑ Mosɑ̀ ogëdø ki këli lɑm, kɑ gø cɑge ɑ́ “Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j Bɑ Berɑ.”
Kɑ okööbø kinni, “Tïngu beer Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j mɑl! Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, ócög e ónyïɑ̈ggø ki kwɑrri Amɑlek gïti ɑtheer!”
Kɑ Yethrø ókwëri Midyɑn, øri Mosɑ̀ olïngø ki jɑmm-ɑ ɑ́göggi Mosɑ̀ geki jie yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j bënn, kí kër-ɑ ɑ́kɑ̈ɑ̈l Isrɑil wɑ̈g yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kì Rïp.
Kɑ Yethrø øri Mosɑ̀, Dhiporɑ̀ cï Mosɑ̀ kɑ̈ɑ̈le yï Mosɑ̀, mɑ́ gø ɑ́öre yïe,
kí wɑ̈dde ryeet, Gercöm kí Eliedher. Mosɑ̀ ɑ́ceg-ɑ kwøb kinni, “Yɑ ɑ́bëëd yɑ bɑ wëdh kì piny me pɑth.” Acɑge wɑ̈de ɑ́ Gercöm.
O nyingi nyel-ɑ kyeelø bɑ Eliedher, mɑ́ keny-ɑ ɑ́nywølii, Mosɑ̀ ɑ́kööb kinni, “Jwøøg wïyɑ bene en ɑ ɑ́køny yɑn. Yɑ ɑ́yiel yi en kì cingi rɑ̈ɑ̈dh Rïp.”
Yethrø øri Mosɑ̀, wɑ̈ddi Mosɑ̀ geki cï Mosɑ̀ ɑ́kɑ̈ɑ̈le yij pɑ̈l, kun-ɑ ɑ́gudde ki kɑɑl kì thɑ kïti kwër.
Aöde yï Mosɑ̀ kinni, “Yɑn, yɑ ørí Yethrø, yɑ bï-ɑ yïí wøki cyëgí kí wɑ̈dde ryeet.”
Kɑ Mosɑ̀ kedh-ɑ be pɑɑri øre, kɑ wïje kuule piny kì bøle, kɑ gø nuume, ɑmɑ̈dh gen ri gen, kɑ ge kedh-ɑ yij kemi Mosɑ̀.
Kɑ Mosɑ̀ øre löbbe gïg-ɑ ɑ́göggi rɑ̈ɑ̈dh Rïp geki tyëng Rïp yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kiper tyëng Isrɑil. Kí orɑng-ɑ ɑ́rɑngi gen kì kö yöö, ki kër-ɑ ɑ́yieel gen yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j.
Kɑ Yethrø pyëwe ómïnø kipe gïgdøj møg-ɑ ɑ́göggi Isrɑil yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, kɑ ɑ́yiele gïn kì cinggi tyëng Rïp.
Kɑ okööbø kinni, “Pwøj wɑ ngɑn-ɑ ɑ́yiel wun kì cingi rɑ̈ɑ̈dh Rïp geki yɑye, eni Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j ngɑn-ɑ ɑ́yiel jie kì yij bɑ̈ɑ̈ngø!
Áyod yi yɑn ɑnɑn kinni Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j dwøng ɑ́ en kibøli jwögg bënn, kipe gïg-ɑ ɑ́nyodhe møg-ɑ ɑ́gøøje kömi Rïp.”
Codhe, kɑ Yethrø øri Mosɑ̀ omuujø ki gënh-ɑ nyi rɑ̈b bëne, kí gëdhhì møøgø mø ngɑ̈lli Jwøk. Kɑ Aɑron geki jøgdøngi Isrɑil bënn bï-ɑ be cɑm geki øri Mosɑ̀ kì bøli Jwøk.
Dhuki ɑpëggi Mosɑ̀ piny be lidhi gønyyi ji, kɑ ji orïïjø ge ócungø kì kömi Mosɑ̀, cɑg kì mwøl gïti böörø.
Kɑ gïg-ɑ gwøg yi Mosɑ̀ bënn, lidh yi øre, gen ɑ gïg-ɑ gögge ji. Akööbe kinni, “Á ngø ɑ göggí ji kinnï? Á kipe ngø ɑ bëëd kì piny yï ketí, o ji cungi gen kì kömí, cɑg kì mwøl gïti böörø?”
Kɑ Mosɑ̀ ólöggø kinni, “Kipe kenyi bëën ji yïɑ be pyëji Jwøk, ki kër-ɑ liidh gønyyi gen.
Mɑ́ kenyi di gøny kì kɑɑm dhɑnhø geki wɑɑd gen, ge nyi bï-ɑ yïɑ, o ngɑn-ɑ bɑ̈jjø nyi nyodh yi yɑn, o ge nyi nyudhɑ Ciggi Jwøk geki pwönye.”
De Mosɑ̀ ɑ́köbbi yi øre kinni, “Gïn-ɑ gwøg yi yïn pɑ døøj.
Yï pïd-ɑ rií, o ji ceg-ɑ pïdø thyew, mɑ́ gwøngɑni peeg kiperí, pɑ cuggi gwøgø yi yïn, yï ketí.
Anɑn lïngí kwøbbɑ, yï óköbbɑ gïn-ɑ dwɑddi yi yɑn o gwøg yi yïn, yï ókøny yi Jwøk. Yɑ dwɑdd-ɑ kinni, bëëd kì bøli Jwøk, kɑ gønyyi ji nyi thërri Jwøk.
Nyi pɑ̈ddí gen ki cigg geki pwönyi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j. Kɑ ge pwönyí ki yuu bëëdø men-ɑ døj, ki gïn-ɑ dwɑddi kinni o gwøg yi gen.

Kɑ̈bbí kì kelli ji ki jøg mø tir, ji mø böggi Jwøk. Jøg-ɑ dyër, yɑɑg-ɑ mɑɑn ngewø. Cïb gen gɑ jɑgg kì kömi ji, møøgø jɑɑg gen ji ɑ́lïp, møøgø jɑɑg-ɑ miy, o møøgø jɑɑg-ɑ pyɑ̈r ɑ́bïjj, o møøgø jɑɑg-ɑ pyɑ̈r.
Kɑ wiy jøgɑni nyi lidh gen gønyyi ji kì bøli keny-ɑ di gøny. O kwøbb-ɑ peeg nyi muuj yïn yi gen, o møg-ɑ yööd bënn nyi løøg yi gen. O gwøg yöne kì kömí, mɑ́ gwøg ceg kɑ pɑ̈ngø yi yïn, wuki gen.
Ke gwøøg møgɑni ni kɑ ɑ́ceg yïn yi Jwøk, bene keny-ɑ ólwɑ̈ɑ̈ng gwøgí, kɑ ji bënn nyi døøg-ɑ kɑ̈lli gen, e gønyyi gen rumø ki lidhø.”
Kɑ Mosɑ̀ kwøbb-ɑ ɑ́kwøb yi øre yïëye bënn. Kɑ møg-ɑ ɑ́kwøbe bënn gwøg yi en.
Ákɑ̈bbi ki yɑɑg tir kì kelli tyëng Isrɑil, kɑ gï gwøge gɑ jɑgg kì kömi ji, kwï gen jɑɑg-ɑ ji ɑ́lïp, møøgø jɑɑg-ɑ miy, møøgø jɑɑg-ɑ pyɑ̈r ɑ́bïjj, møøgø jɑɑg-ɑ pyɑ̈r.
Kɑ jøgɑni pëgg-ɑ be nenni gønyyi ji. Kɑ gønyy-ɑ teeg nyi muuj gen Mosɑ̀, de gønyy-ɑ yöd nyi lidh-ɑ yi gen keti gen.
Codhe, kɑ Mosɑ̀ øre lwøøge yöö, kɑ Yethrø døøg-ɑ pɑɑre.
Kì ri thumi dwɑ̈tt ɑ́dɑ̈g ceth, kì bɑng dhwödhi tyëng Isrɑil kì piny Rïp, ɑ ɑ́wɑ̈dhi gen Sinɑy.
Ge ɑ́dhwödh kì Repïdïm, kɑ ge kedh-ɑ yij pɑ̈ɑ̈l Sinɑy. Kɑ Isrɑil ogudø kì pɑ̈lɑni ge rwöm ki kït.
Kɑ Mosɑ̀ kedh-ɑ mɑl yï Jwøk.
Kɑ Mosɑ̀ cwøl yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kì ri kït kinni, “Köbbí gøl Yɑgob, kɑ Isrɑil tönggí kwøb kinni,
Gïn-ɑ ɑ́göggɑ Rïp ɑ́lidh yi wun; ɑ́lidh yi wun keny-ɑ ɑ́kɑ̈ɑ̈lɑ wun wɑ̈g kì Rïp kì kömi obërri cor. Kɑ wu kɑ̈ɑ̈l-ɑ yïɑ keny.
O ɑnɑn ke lïngu kwøbbɑ, kɑ ciggɑ mïdhi yi wun, wu obëëdø wu bɑ jiɑ, møg-ɑ ɑ́yïëënyɑ wɑ̈g kì kelli jurrì, mɑ́ piny bëne bɑ miɑ.
Wu ógöögø ki pödhɑ; pödhi kwër møg göggi yɑn.”
Kɑ Mosɑ̀ obëënø, kɑ jøgdøngi Isrɑil cwööle, ɑthëre gïn møg-ɑ ɑ́ceg yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j bënn.
Kɑ ji ólöggø bënn wïj ɑ́kyel kinni, “Møg-ɑ ɑ́kwøb yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j bënn ógwøg yi wøn.” Kɑ kwøbbi jiɑni döggi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j yi Mosɑ̀.
Kɑ Mosɑ̀ köbbi yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kinni, “Yɑn ɑ bï yïí èn kì yij pøølø me looj, kipe kinni o yɑ lïngi yi ji yɑ okööbø ki yïn, o ge yïëy gen ki yïn thyew gïti ɑtheer.”
Kɑ møg-ɑ ɑ́kwøb yi ji, köbbi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j yi Mosɑ̀.
Kɑ Mosɑ̀ köbbi yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kinni, “Kedhí yï ji, kɑ ri wun kwër wun dicyɑ̈ɑ̈ng kí dhuki, kɑ ógudhi wun lwøg wun.
Kɑ ri gen gwir gen kipe dɑ̈ɑ̈g cyɑ̈ng, mɑ́ kì dɑ̈ɑ̈g cyɑ̈ng, Yɑ óbï piny, o Yɑ lidh yi ji bënn kì wïj Kïti Sinɑy.
De göög ki kew me wen kït. Kɑ ko di dhɑnhø me bɑ̈ɑ̈n kewɑni.” Kɑ okööbø kinni, “Ko di ngɑn yedhi wïj kït. Kɑ ko di ngɑn nywɑl tøg kït, ngɑn nywɑl kïnɑni ceg-ɑ thøø ceth.

Ko nywɑl ki cingø; ngɑn nywɑlii, bɑ̈lli ki kïttì o thøwe; wɑlɑ̀ pwöd ki weth, cɑgg ɑ́ dhɑnhø wɑlɑ̀ lɑ̈y, ko wiy, nɑ̈g ceth. Keny-ɑ óywöngi tuung órömø e pɑ jwɑn kudø, ge ócuggø yedhi mɑl wïj kït cyee.”
Codhe, kɑ Mosɑ̀ yïnh-ɑ piny kì wïj kït kɑ ji kwënge, kɑ ógudhi gen lwøg gen.
Kɑ ji köbbe kinni, “Bëëd wun ri wun gwiir wun kipe dɑ̈ɑ̈g cyɑ̈ng, ko di ngɑn kedhi ri ngɑndhɑjø.”
Kɑ ji-ɑ ɑ́kɑ̈ɑ̈l wɑ̈g yi Mosɑ̀ kì kɑɑl, o ge yïddi gen ki Jwøk, ócungø kì thɑ kït.
Wïj Kïti Sinɑy ɑ́bëëd e ócyëgø bëne yi yïrø. Mɑ́ Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j ɑ́bï köme kì yij mɑc. Kɑ yïrø ceg-ɑ ì dut ni yïri bwörø me dwøng, kɑ kït onhɑ̈nhø ki menteg.
Kɑ cwɑggi kɑng ókedhø ge ótëngø ki mendwøng. Mosɑ̀ okööbø, o møge nyi løøg yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kì yij omɑ̈ɑ̈r mɑl.
Kɑ Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j bï-ɑ piny wïj Kïti Sinɑy, kɑ Mosɑ̀ cwøøle wïj kït, kɑ Mosɑ̀ yedh-ɑ mɑl.
Kɑ Mosɑ̀ köbbi yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kinni, “Kedhí piny kyëddí ji, kipe ge ópönhi wïj kït ge bï-ɑ be lïdhø, keløg ge ólïdhø, mø gïïr kì kelli gen ceg-ɑ thøø.
Cɑgg gɑ ókwër, møg cuggi bëën butɑ, kwër gen ri gen. Keløg ri gen pɑ kwër yi gen, ge ócɑy yi yɑn, Yɑ Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j.”
Kɑ Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j köbbi yi Mosɑ̀ kinni, “Ji pɑ cuggi bëën mɑl wïj Kïti Sinɑy, mɑ́ yɑ ɑ́köbbi yi yïn kinni, ‘Wen kït ki kew, kɑ kwëër.’ ”
Kɑ köbbi yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kinni, “Kedh, yedhí piny, kɑ Aɑron kɑ̈ɑ̈l mɑl. De ókwër geki ji, ri gen ko pɑ̈nyi gen ki bëën mɑl yïɑ, keløg kew óbɑ̈ɑ̈n yi gen, ge cɑyɑ’ cɑyø.”
Codhe kɑ Mosɑ̀ yïnh-ɑ piny yï ji, kɑ gï köbbe møgɑni.
Møg-ɑ ɑ́kwøb yi Jwøk ek bënn:
“Yɑ bɑ Jwøgí, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, ɑ ɑ́kɑ̈ɑ̈l yïn wɑ̈g kì piny Rïp, kì yij bɑ̈ɑ̈ngø.
“Yïí ko di Jwögg møøgø den-ɑ́ yɑ ketɑ.
Rií ko bøødh bøli gen, kɑ ge ko mɑllí, kipe yɑn yɑ Jwøgí, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, yɑ bɑ Jwøk me rɑj ki tyiel, körri orøøg wëëg nyi piirɑ’ yï wɑ̈ddi tyëng-ɑ mɑɑn yɑn, kí kwɑrri gen, kí kwɑrri kwɑrri gen.
De døøjɑ nyi nyudhɑ’ rïjj mø ngenyø, gen ɑ ji møg-ɑ mɑɑr yɑn, o ciggɑ omïdhø yi gen.
Yïí dɑ cyɑ̈ng ɑ́bïkyel møg yethi gen gwøøg gwøgí.
De bïryeew cyɑ̈ng, bɑ Sɑbɑth mi Jwøgí, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j. Ko di gwøg me tïj yi yïn, wuki wɑ̈dí ki nyɑrí, kí bɑ̈ngí ying-ɑ́ jɑlø wɑlɑ̀ dhɑjø, kí dhií, kí wëlø men-ɑ bëëdø kì butí.
Mɑ́ mɑl kí piny, kí jɑmm-ɑ yethi gen bënn ɑ́cwɑ̈j yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kɑ cyɑ̈ng ɑ́bïkyel. Kɑ oywömø kì bïryeew cyɑ̈ng, bene ɑ bɑnge gyëëdh cyɑ̈ɑ̈ng Sɑbɑth yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kɑ gø kwëre.
Codhe, ɑköbbi Mosɑ̀ yi gen kinni, “Kööb ɑ́ yïn ki wøn, wø ólïngø. De Jwøk ko kööb ki wøn kipe wø óthøw.”
Kɑ ge köbbi yi Mosɑ̀ kinni, “Wu ko böggi, mɑ́ Jwøk ɑ́bï-ɑ be pɑ̈nyi wun, o böögø mee bëëde e nud kì pëthi wun, o wu cög wun, wu pɑ røngi.”
Ji ɑ́cungi ge lɑ̈wi ki kït, de Mosɑ̀ ɑ́kedhi buti pøøl-ɑ looj, keny-ɑ di Jwøk.
Codhe, kɑ Mosɑ̀ köbbi yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kinni, köbbe tyëng Isrɑil kinni, “Álidh yi wun kì ri wun, keny-ɑ ɑ́kööbɑ kì mɑl ki wun.
Wu ko göög ki ngïji gïïpiny ki dhɑb wɑlɑ̀ ki ɑ́tegø møg göggu ri wun gɑ jwögg, gïgɑni ko mɑlli yi wun kyeel ki yɑn.
Gëddí yɑn ki këlli lɑm ki lɑ̈bø, o wïje ómuuj gëdhh-ɑ rɑ̈bbí yɑn, geki gëdhhi mër kì ri dyëgí kí dhögí. Mɑllí yɑn kì keny-ɑ ómyeg yi yɑn, o yɑ bïɑ, o yï gyëdh yi yɑn.
Keløg këli lɑm gërí yɑn ki ɑ́tuggi kïttì, kïtt-ɑ tøggi gen bɑ ɑtweg ki ged ko gëëd yi yïn, otweg gen ki ged, ge ceg yi yïn kɑ bwölø ki ged menɑni.
Yï ko yedhi wïj këlɑ ki yïdhi, kipe thɑrí ónënni kì köme.
“Mëggí tyëng Isrɑil cigg møg:
Keløg yï ongëwø ki bɑ̈ng me bɑ ngeti Ibru, gögge yïn ki runn ɑ́bïkyel. Kɑ gøøny kì bïryeew runn, o kedhe kì wɑ̈ye e bong gïn col.
Keløg e bëënø ɑ́ ɑ́kyel, kedhe e bɑ ɑ́kyel. Keløg e dɑ cyëge me bëënø ki en, kedhe ki en.
De keløg e ónëng-ɑ yi wɑ̈n ki dhɑjø, kɑ nyöddi yi nyɑnɑni ki wɑ̈dd wɑlɑ̀ womɑ̈nn, dhɑjø menɑni bɑ mi wɑ̈n, nyɑnɑni ki nyige bënn bɑ mø wɑ̈n, o nyelɑni kete ɑ kedh.
De keløg bɑ̈ngɑni kiree okööbø kinni, ‘Wɑ̈ɑ mɑɑr yi yɑn, geki cyëgɑ kí nyigɑ, yɑ pɑ dwɑddi gønyø o yɑ kedhɑ.’
Kɑ cïb bøli Jwøk kì ɑ́dyëddi ød yi wɑ̈n, kɑ yïthe twïy ki gïjø me bedh. Codhe cyee, o bɑ̈ngɑni cöge e gögg-ɑ wɑ̈n gïti ɑtheer.
“Keløg e dɑ jɑl me ngeew nyɑre wɑ̈g ɑ́ bɑ̈ng. Pɑ gøny ki gønyi bɑ̈ngg-ɑ cwøw.
Ke yodii e pɑ døøj yi wɑ̈n ngö gø ɑ́dwɑddi yi en ɑ́ dhɑjø, døøg ki ngëwwi wɑddi gen, ko ngëwwi tyëngpɑth yi en, mɑ́ gø ɑ́ceg yi en kɑ bɑnyø yøw, e rum yïëyø kì tyeli mɑl.
Keløg e dɑ jɑl me ngëwwi wɑ̈de ki bɑ̈ng ɑ́ dhɑjø, pɑ̈ɑ̈re nyɑnɑni ki nyɑre.
Keløg jɑlø ónyömø ki ryeew mɑ̈nne, ko di gïjø me nungi kì ri ógudh kí gïgcɑmm-ɑ́ nyi mëggi nyɑn-ɑ́ köme ɑ́nyömmi, kɑ ko wïyi ki buddø’ en.
O keløg e óbɑ̈nyø ki muuji gïjø ɑ́kyel kì kelli møgɑk gɑ ɑ́dɑ̈g, tɑ̈nge gøn, kɑ ko di jɑmme møg dwɑdde kì bɑnge.
De keløg e ceg-ɑ gwɑ̈nyø, e nuti dwɑddi nɑ̈gii, yɑ̈bbe ki keny me yömme.
De keløg ngɑnɑni gø cɑɑg en kɑ lebbø, kɑ gø nɑ̈ge, cɑgg e yömmi ri këli lɑmɑ, dwɑɑy kɑ nɑ̈g.
“Ngɑn gøj wïye wɑlɑ̀ meye, nɑ̈g.
“Keløg jøg ɑ́ryew ónyïɑ̈ggø kɑ ngɑɑn gøj yi ngɑn-ɑ kyeelø, wɑlɑ̀ kɑ gø bɑ̈le ki tuug, keløg e nuti thøø, de ɑ́buud ki kenɑni,
codhe, kɑ kemø kwɑnye kɑ ócyɑ̈dhø, wiy ngɑn-ɑ ɑ́göjji, de ngɑn-ɑ ɑ́buud ceg kɑ cudø yi en ki wïj kɑɑm-ɑ ɑ́buude kì piny, o ngyënyy-ɑ ɑ́tuurii col yi en.
“Keløg dhɑnhø bɑ̈nge, bɑ̈ng-ɑ jɑlø wɑlɑ̀ dhɑjø ogøjø yi en ki lodh kɑ othøø, kej gøn ceg kɑ colø.
De ke mɑ̈ge ki cyɑ̈ng ɑ́kyel wɑlɑ̀ cyɑ̈ng ɑ́ryew e onëënø, keje pɑ col, mɑ́ e ngew yi jɑlɑni kɑ ngyëny.
“Keløg jøg-ɑ cwøw ónyïɑ̈ggø kɑ ngɑn mɑ ɑ́yɑjø gum yi gen, kɑ dhɑnhø bï-ɑ wɑ̈g kì yije, e bong kedø kì ri ngɑnɑni, cud ngɑn-ɑ ɑ́gumii ki kwör men-ɑ cwøl yi jɑldhɑjø keløg e oyïëyø yi jɑgg.
De ke di kedø men kedhi ri ngɑndhɑjø menɑni, wëy col kɑ wëy,
Wɑng ki wɑng, lëjø ki lëjø, cingø ki cingø, o tyelø ki tyelø.
Cwɑ̈ɑ̈yø’ mɑc ki cwɑ̈ɑ̈yø’ mɑc, kedø ki kedø, bwödhø ki bwödhø.
“O keløg dhɑnhø bɑ̈nge, bɑ̈ng-ɑ jɑlø wɑlɑ̀ dhɑjø ogøjø yi en kì wɑnge, kɑ wɑnge otøyø, gønye gøn o kedhe kì wɑ̈ye, ɑ́ coli kej wɑnge.
O keløg dhɑnhø bɑ̈nge, bɑ̈ng-ɑ jɑlø wɑlɑ̀ dhɑjø ogøjø yi en, kɑ lëje bï-ɑ wɑ̈g, gønye gøn o kedhe kì wɑ̈ye, ɑ́ coli kej lëje.
“Keløg dhɑnhø, jɑlø wɑlɑ̀ dhɑjø ocwøbø yi wɑdh, kɑ othøø, bɑ̈lli wɑnhɑni o thøwe, kɑ rïnge ko cɑm, de wïi wɑdh pɑ cɑy.
De keløg wɑnhɑni bëëdø e nyii cööbø, o wɑ̈n óköbbø, de wɑdhe ɑ́dhɑ̈li korø yi en, kɑ ónɑ̈ggø ki dhɑnhø, ying-ɑ́ jɑlø wɑlɑ̀ dhɑjø, bɑ̈lli wɑnhɑni geki wɑ̈n thyew, o ge thøw gen ryeet.
Keløg ɑ́ kwör ɑ ócïb köme, cole kwörɑni ceth, kipe yieli wëye.
Thyew keløg e cwøb-ɑ nyelthinh, wɑlɑ̀ nyɑnthinh, bɑ cigg mø ni møgɑni ɑ kömi gen göggi.
O keløg wɑdh cwøb-ɑ bɑ̈ng, ying-ɑ́ jɑlø wɑlɑ̀ dhɑjø, cud wïi wɑnhɑni ki ngyëny ɑ́tegg pyɑ̈r ɑ́dɑ̈g, gɑ mø culi wïi bɑ̈ng, kɑ wɑnhɑni bɑ̈lli o thøwe.
“Keløg dhɑnhø wïj yithe owiyø yi en gø nuti kum en, kɑ dhyɑng wɑlɑ̀ ɑderø pɑ̈dh-ɑ yije,
jɑl yiinhɑni cude ki ngyëny møg mëgge wïi gïnɑni, o gïn-ɑ ɑ́pɑ̈dhi yij yith kɑ othøø, bɑ mi jɑl yith.
Keløg wɑɑdh dhɑnhø ócöbbø ki wɑɑdh ngɑn megø, kɑ othøø, ngeew wɑnh-ɑ nëënø wɑ̈g, kɑ ngyënyye pɑ̈ngi yi jøgɑni ryeet. Kɑ rïngi wɑnh-ɑ thøø pɑ̈ngi yi gen thyew.
De keløg e ngɑ̈nyi kinni wɑnhɑni nyii cööbø, de ɑ́dhɑ̈li mɑgø yi wɑ̈n, cole wɑdh men-ɑ ɑ́cwøb yi wɑdhe. O wɑnh-ɑ thøø bɑ mi jɑl wɑnh-ɑ ɑ́cöbbi.
“Keløg dhɑnhø ókwɑ̈ddø ki wɑdh, wɑlɑ̀ órömø kɑ gø ngɑle, wɑlɑ̀ kɑ gø ngeewe wɑ̈g, cole wɑnhɑni ki dhög ɑ́bïj, o órömø col kɑ dyëg ɑ́ngwen.

Cole gïn-ɑ ɑ́kwɑle ceth. De keløg e bong gïn nud kì yïe, ngeew wɑ̈g ɑ́ bɑ̈ng, o ngyënyyɑni cool gïn-ɑ ɑ́kwɑl yi en. Keløg gïg-ɑ ɑ́kwɑl yi en oyodø kì cinge, ying-ɑ́ wɑdh wɑlɑ̀ ɑderø, wɑlɑ̀ órömø ge onëënø, kej gïjø ɑ́kyel col kɑ ɑ́ryew.
“Keløg kur kedh-ɑ kɑl megø kì wɑ̈r, kɑ mɑg e ókwɑ̈ddø kɑ nɑ̈g, bong cönge kì cwɑggi ngɑn-ɑ ɑ́nɑ̈gii. De keløg møgɑni cwöb ɑ dicɑ̈ng, cwɑgge dɑ cögø.
“Keløg dhɑnhø jɑmme køøle pwödhe be cɑm, kɑ jɑmme kedh-ɑ pwödhi ngɑn megø, cud jɑl dhög kì ri jɑmm-ɑ døøj kì pwödhe wɑlɑ̀ kì bɑge.
“Keløg dhɑnhø orɑ̈bø ki mɑc kì pwödhe, kɑ mɑnyɑni ködd-ɑ yij pwödhi ngɑn megø kɑ byel rɑ̈be, ying ge nudd ge ócungø wɑlɑ̀ ge ying-ɑ wïj pëm, byellɑni ceg kɑ colø yi ngɑn-ɑ ɑ́cwiny mɑc.
“Keløg dhɑnhø wɑɑd gen kɑ̈nne’ ngyëny, kɑ ngyënyyɑni kwɑl kì gøl ngɑn-ɑ ɑ́kɑ̈nni, keløg kur óyod, col yi kurɑni gɑ kɑ̈jj ɑ́ryew.
De keløg kur pɑ yod, kïdhi jɑlkɑl bøli Jwøk be köngø kinni, jɑmmi wɑɑd gen nuti kwɑl-ɑ yi en.

“Keløg ji ɑ́ryew opëmø kì kömi gïïpiny, ngɑn okööbø ce gø bɑ mee, ying-ɑ́ kömi dhyɑng, ɑderø, dyel, ógudh, wɑlɑ̀ gïjø megø me wɑ̈ɑ̈nyø, kïdhi gen ryeet bøli Jwøk. Ngɑn-ɑ ókwøb yi Jwøk kinni bɑ en ɑ bɑ̈jjø, gïnɑni col en ɑ́ kɑ̈jj ɑ́ryew.

“Keløg dhɑnhø kɑ̈nn-ɑ yï wɑɑd gen ki ɑderø, wɑlɑ̀ dhyɑng, wɑlɑ̀ dyel, kí lɑ̈yy-ɑ kyeelø bënn kinni o mɑ̈ggii, kɑ gïnɑni othøø, wɑlɑ̀ otorø, wɑlɑ̀ okɑ̈ɑ̈lø yi ngɑn me nuti lidhø, gïnɑni pɑ col yi ngɑn-ɑ ɑ́kɑ̈nni.
Ngɑn-ɑ ɑ́kɑ̈nni ceg-ɑ köngø kì bøli Jwøk kinni gïn-ɑ ɑ́kɑ̈nnii yi wɑɑd gen nuti kwɑɑny en, kɑ ngeti gïnɑni yïëye ceth, ki köngi wɑɑd gen møg-ɑ ɑ́kwönge kì bøli Jwøk. O gïnɑni pɑ col.
De keløg gïnɑni ocɑɑg kɑ kwɑlø kì yïe, gø ceg yi en kɑ culi wɑ̈n.
De keløg e ócɑɑm-ɑ yi lɑ̈ɑ̈y pɑ̈l, kɑ̈ni jɑl-ɑ ɑ́kɑ̈nni ki thulli gïn-ɑ ɑ́cɑm, o gïn-ɑ ɑ́cɑm yi lɑ̈ɑ̈y pɑ̈l pɑ col.
“Keløg dhɑnhø ówïdhø ki gïïpiny kì yï wɑɑd gen, kɑ dɑ gïn kedhi ree, wɑlɑ̀ othøø e wɑ̈n tøøk, ngeti gïnɑni ceg kɑ cudø yi ngɑn-ɑ ɑ́wïdhi.
De keløg wïi lɑ̈yɑni nud kì bute, kì bøli kenyɑni, jɑl-ɑ ɑ́wïdhi pɑ cudø. Keløg lɑ̈yɑni ceg kɑ kïrø, ngyënyy-ɑ ɑ́kïrii ɑ cyëëg keje.
De keløg wïyi nyɑnɑni óbɑ̈nyi ki nyömmii en, ngɑnɑni nudd e ceg-ɑ muujø ceth ki kɑ̈ɑ̈ny nyɑnɑjur.
Thwöm wɑlɑ̀ kïj, ko göggí ki gïnrɑj.
Keløg e ógöggi yi yïn ki gïnrɑj, kɑ ywöög-ɑ köörɑ, ywøge lïngɑ’ lïngø,
kɑ pyëwɑ órënyø ki wun, kɑ wu nɑ̈gɑ ki pilø, o mɑ̈nni wun döng gen gɑ thwömm, o wɑ̈ddi wun göög gen ki kïj.
Keløg lɑni wɑɑd wun omɑgø yi yïn kipe kwör me ying cwɑgge, döggií keny-ɑ óbuddi cɑ̈ng.
Mɑ́ bene ógønhɑni ɑ nyi kume ree, ke pɑ döggií en, ree ókum yi en kɑ ngø? Keløg e ódi ywöög köörɑ, cwɑgge lïngɑ’ lïngø, mɑ́ pyëwɑ nyii lɑ̈ɑ̈mø.
“Yɑ ko mɑ̈ɑ̈n ki gëëdhi kì ri mwölli byellí geki møgi oløg.
“Kɑ wɑ̈dí, wɑ̈n-ɑ kɑyø mëggí yɑn.
Mëggí yɑn kɑyyi dyëgí geki kɑyyi dhögí. Wiy kɑy-ɑ jɑlø bëëde ki meye ki cyɑ̈ng ɑ́bïryew, kɑ muuj yɑn kì bïdɑ̈ɑ̈g cyɑ̈ng.
