Gïn-ɑ ócwöb dhuki megø onennø yi yɑn.
O pödhi Isrɑil onennø yi yɑn.
Rɑ̈dh me ni kyelø me tɑr ócwöb kì pönhɑni
Óbëëdø e nɑ kyel-ɑ nyi cør yij mɑl.
Jɑggi Moɑb ópwööde piny.
Kwɑrri Ceeth ótyëge bënn.
Tyëng-ɑ mɑɑnii ótyɑme kì Edöm
Kɑ piny gen gwøge ɑ́ mee.
Kedh Isrɑil ceg-ɑ pëddø tyɑ̈mø.
Ge ónyøn yi pödhi Isrɑil.
Ngɑn pɑ̈r kì kɑɑl nɑ̈ge’ nɑ̈gø ceth.”
Acɑ̈rrii kwɑrri Amɑlek, kɑ møg tönge kinni,
“Amɑlek ɑ mɑl kibøli pödhh bënn.
De bɑ men wïje pɑ̈ɑ̈dh gïti ɑtheer.”
Acɑ̈rrii kwɑrri Ken, kɑ møg tönge kinni,
“Keny-ɑ bëëd yi yïn døøj bong gïn böggí,
nɑ ød winyø men-ɑ ógeer wïj yɑdh me bɑ̈r
De men-ɑ́ wun, wu tyëng Ken,
wu óryɑ̈g, kɑ wu køøl wu bɑ ɑmɑgg yi tyëng Acuur.”
Kɑ møg tönge kinni,
“Tyëng-ɑ congi ri gen kì kuni wɑɑng wuudø bɑ møg?
Dɑ ji mø bï be mɑ̈nyø ge kɑ̈ɑ̈l-ɑ Kobros.
Acuur ómɑg yi gen gïti Eber.
De ge ólony ki tɑ̈ɑ̈y piny, o ge pɑ dhwödh gïti ɑtheer.”
Codhe, ɑdhwödh Bɑlɑɑm, kɑ døøg-ɑ pödhi gen. Kɑ Bɑlɑk ókedhø kì wɑ̈ye.
Keny-ɑ ɑ́bëëd tyëng Isrɑil ge ying-ɑ Töör Álwiy, jø Isrɑil ɑ́kedhi ri nyigi Moɑb.
Kɑ ge cwøøl be mɑlli jwøøg Moɑb. Jwøngɑni ɑ́kwɑjji yi gen, kɑ ge ocyɑ̈mø ki jɑmm-ɑ mëggi jwøngɑni,
ɑ løg Bɑɑl Peor. Kɑ pyëw Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j órënyø ki gen,
ɑ köbbe Mosɑ̀ kinni, “Kwɑny jɑggi Isrɑil bënn, kɑ ge ngɑɑb kì bøli teedø bëne. Gwøg møg-ɑ ɑ́köbbɑ yïn, o pyëwɑ lɑ̈ɑ̈me ki tyëng Isrɑil.”
Kɑ jɑgg köbbi yi Mosɑ̀ kinni, “Nɑ̈gu tyëng-ɑ ɑ́kedhi be mɑlli Bɑɑl Peor. Nyi nɑ̈g ngɑn tyëng-ɑ bɑ tyëng gøl gen.”
Kɑ wɑ̈d Isrɑil megø obëënø ge ócyɑ̈dhø ki nyɑɑr Midyɑn, kɑ gø kïdhe yij kemɑ̀ mee e onennø yi teedø bëne, e teenɑni óywöngø kì dhø Kemi Kwëër Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j.
Adhwödh Pineɑs wɑ̈d Eliɑdhɑr, wɑ̈d ókwërø Aɑron, kɑ ókɑ̈bbø ki tøng,
kɑ kedh-ɑ bɑng jɑlɑni geki nyɑnɑni kì yij kem-ɑ ɑ́kedhi yi gen, ɑcööbe gïn. Codhe, ɑcungi yømø nɑ̈ɑ̈g kɑ ówïyø nɑ̈g ki ji.
Yømɑni ɑ́cungi e rum nɑ̈g ki ji ɑ́lïp pyɑ̈r ɑ́ryew wïdɑ́ngwen.
Aköbbi Mosɑ̀ yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kinni,
“Pyëwɑ ɑ́dwöög kì bɑng gïn-ɑ ɑ́gwøg yi Pineɑs wɑ̈d Eliɑdhɑr, wɑ̈d ókwërø Aɑron, wɑ̈ddi Isrɑil bɑ møg di tyëg yi yɑn ki nɑ̈gø, mɑ́ yɑ ɑ́mɑg yi tyiel.
Köbbí Pineɑs kinni wø reb-ɑ kwøb ki en, kwøb møg-ɑ ócög gɑ kwööng mër gïti ɑtheer.
En geki wɑ̈dde kí kwɑrre, ge ócög gɑ ókwër gïti ɑtheer. Mɑ́ e ɑ́mɑg yi tyiel kiperɑ, kɑ bøli Isrɑil gøøme, ɑlɑ̈ɑ̈m pyëwɑ ki gen.”
Nyingi wɑ̈d Isrɑil men-ɑ ɑ́nɑ̈g geki nyɑɑr Midyɑn cwøl ɑ́ Dhimrì wɑ̈d Sɑlu, o bɑ jɑngi gøl gen, kì wïj gøl Cimeøn.
O nyɑɑr Midyɑn men-ɑ ɑ́nɑ̈g kyeel ki en nyinge cwøl ɑ́ Kosbì nyɑɑr Dhur, o Dhur ɑ́bëëd ɑ́ jɑngi wïj kɑl kì Midyɑn.
Aköbbi Mosɑ̀ yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kinni,
“Pɑ̈ɑ̈r kömi tyëng Midyɑn, kɑ ge nɑ̈ɑ̈g,
Kipe gïnrɑj men-ɑ ɑ́göggi wun yi gen, ɑ wëny gen wun kì Peor, o kipe Kosbì nyɑn-ɑ ɑ́nɑ̈g kì cyɑ̈ɑ̈ng yømø nɑ̈ɑ̈g kì Peor.”
“Kwɑnu tyëng Isrɑil gɑ wɑ̈thi kɑ̈llì, gweed jøg-ɑ cwøw bënn, cɑg kì ri tyëng-ɑ runni gen bɑ pyɑ̈r ɑ́ryew gïti mɑl, ɑ́ ngɑn cuggi kedhi be liny.”
Acwøøl teedø thwøri Moɑb kì kömi Nɑm Urdun kì bøli Yerikö yi Mosɑ̀ geki Eliɑdhɑr, kɑ ge okööbø kinni,
“Kwɑɑn ji, cɑg kì ri ngɑn runne bɑ pyɑ̈r ɑ́ryew gïti mɑl ni kɑ ɑ́kwøbii yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j.”
Møg bene gen tyëng Isrɑil møg-ɑ ɑ́bï wɑ̈g kì Rïp:
Wïj gøl Ruben: Ruben ɑ bɑ kɑyi Yɑgob. Gøl Aɑnök ki Pɑlu,
Ëdhrön kí Kɑrmì.
Kɑ̈llɑni kwɑnni jø gen bɑ ɑ́lïp pyɑ̈r ɑ́ngwen wïdɑ́dɑ̈g kí miy ɑ́bïryew kí pyɑ̈r ɑ́dɑ̈g.
Gøl Pɑlu bɑ Eliɑb
geki wɑ̈dde Nemuel, kí Dɑthɑn, kí Abirɑm. Bene gen Dɑthɑn geki Abirɑm møg-ɑ ɑ́kwɑny yi teedø. Gen ɑ ɑ́bɑny jyɑ̈gi Mosɑ̀ geki Aɑron, ɑrëbi gen ki jø Körɑ̀ ge bɑny-ɑ Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j.
Ayieb piny ree kɑ gï mwønye, ɑthøw gen geki Körɑ̀ kí jie, keny-ɑ ɑ́rɑ̈ɑ̈b ji miy ɑ́ryew kí pyɑ̈r ɑ́bïj yi mɑc, kɑ ge ogöögø ki ngïji kipe teedø.
De wɑ̈ddi Körɑ̀ nuti thøø.
Wïj gøl Cimeøn: Gøl Cimeøn dɑ Nemuel, kí Yɑmïn, kí Yɑkin,
Dherɑ̀, ki Cɑul.
Kɑ̈llɑni kwɑnni jø gen bɑ ɑ́lïp pyɑ̈r ɑ́ryew wïdɑ́ryew kí miy ɑ́ryew.
Gøl Gɑd: Gøl Gɑd ɑ di Dhepön, kí Agì, kí Cunì,
Odhnì, Erì,
Aröd kí Arelì.
Kɑ̈llɑni kwɑnni jø gen bɑ ɑ́lïp pyɑ̈r ɑ́ngwen kí miy ɑ́bïj.
Wïj gøl Yeudɑ̀: Gøl Yeudɑ̀ ɑ di Celɑ̀, Peredh, Dherɑ̀. Ëdhrön kí Amul. Wɑ̈ddi Yeudɑ̀ ɑ́ryew ɑ løg Er ki Onɑ̈n ge ɑ́thøw kì piny Kɑnɑɑn.
Kɑ̈llɑni kwɑnni jø gen bɑ ɑ́lïp pyɑ̈r ɑ́bïryew wïdɑ́bïkyel kí miy ɑ́bïj.
Wïj gøl Isɑkɑr: Gøl Isɑkɑr ɑ di Tölɑ̀, Puɑ̀,
Yɑcub kí Cimrön,
Kɑ̈llɑni kwɑnni jø gen bɑ ɑ́lïp pyɑ̈r ɑ́bïkyel wïdɑ́ngwen kí miy ɑ́dɑ̈g.
Wïj gøl Dhebulun: Gøl Dhebulun ɑ di Sered, Elön, kí Yɑliil.
Kɑ̈llɑni kwɑnni jø gen bɑ ɑ́lïp pyɑ̈r ɑ́bïkyel kí miy ɑ́bïj.
Wïj gøl Yosep: Yosep yïe dɑ wɑ̈dd ɑ́ryew. Mɑnɑsè ki Eprɑim.
Mɑkir wɑ̈d Mɑnɑsè ɑ bɑ wïyi Gilyɑd, o gøl Gilyɑd ɑ di
Iedher, Keleg,
Asriel, Cekïm,
Cemïdɑ̀, kí Eper,
Dhelopekɑd wɑ̈d Eper yïe bong wɑ̈dd, de ɑ́nywøl-ɑ mɑ̈nn, nyingi gen bɑ Mɑklɑ̀, Nöö, Oglɑ̀, Milkɑ̀ ki Tirdhɑ̀.
Kɑ̈llɑni kwɑnni jø gen bɑ ɑ́lïp pyɑ̈r ɑ́bïj wïdɑ́ryew, kí miy ɑ́bïryew.
Wïj gøl Eprɑim: Gøl Eprɑim ɑ di Cuthelɑ̀, kí Becer, kí Tɑɑn.
Cuthelɑ̀ ɑ ree kɑ̈ɑ̈l yi gøl Erɑn.
Kɑ̈llɑni kwɑnni jø gen bɑ ɑ́lïp pyɑ̈r ɑ́dɑ̈g wïdɑ́ryew kí miy ɑ́bïj.
Bene gen kɑ̈ll-ɑ kɑ̈ɑ̈l ri Yosep ɑgɑk.
Wïj gøl Ben Yɑmïn: Gøl Ben Yɑmïn ɑ di Belɑ̀, Acbel, Akirɑm,
Cepupɑm kí Upɑm.
Gøl Ard kí gøl Nɑɑmɑn kɑ̈ɑ̈l-ɑ ri gøl Belɑ̀.
Kɑ̈llɑni kwɑnni jø gen bɑ ɑ́lïp pyɑ̈r ɑ́ngwen wïdɑ́bïj kí miy ɑ́bïkyel.
Wïj gøl Dɑn: Gøl Dɑn ɑ bɑ gøl Cuɑm.
Kwɑnni jø gølɑni bɑ ɑ́lïp pyɑ̈r ɑ́bïkyel wïdɑ́ngwen, kí miy ɑ́ngwen.
Wïj gøl Aceer: Gøl Aceer ɑ di Imnɑ̀, Icbì, Beriyɑ̀.
Keber geki Mɑlkiel kɑ̈ɑ̈l-ɑ ri gøl Beriyɑ̀.
Aceer yïe ɑ́dɑ nyɑre me cwøl ɑ Serɑ̀.
Kɑ̈llɑni kwɑnni jø gen bɑ ɑ́lïp pyɑ̈r ɑ́bïj wïdɑ́dɑ̈g, kí miy ɑ́ngwen.
Wïj gøl Nɑptɑlì: Gøl Nɑptɑlì ɑ di Yɑkdhil, Gunì,
Yedher, kí Cilem.
Kɑ̈llɑni kwɑnni jø gen bɑ ɑ́lïp pyɑ̈r ɑ́ngwen wïdɑ́bïj, kí miy ɑ́ngwen.
Jø Isrɑil bënn, kwɑnni gen bɑ ɑ́lïp miy ɑ́bïkyel kí ɑ́kyel, kí miy ɑ́bïryew kí pyɑ̈r ɑ́dɑ̈g.
“Pɑ̈ngí piny kì kelli kɑ̈llì, nëngí wïj gøl ki men røøm ki kwɑnne.
Gøl-ɑ dwøng nyi mëggí piny me dwøng, kɑ gøl-ɑ thinh nyi mëggí piny me thinh, mëggí wïj kɑl piny-ɑ røøm kí kwɑnne.
De piny pɑ̈ngi e ceg kɑ lengø ki wél, e cungi ɑ́ nyingi kwɑyy,
e kɑ̈ll-ɑ døngø wéli gen ying-ɑ wɑ̈yi gen, o kɑ̈ll-ɑ thønhø wéli gen ying-ɑ wɑ̈yi gen.”
Wïj gøl Leebì ɑ di kɑ̈llì møg: Gercön, Kɑ̈ɑ̈th kí Merɑrì.
Gølɑni ɑ ree kɑ̈ɑ̈l yi kɑ̈ll-ɑ thønhø møg: Libnì, Kibrön, Mɑklì, Mucì, kí Körɑ̀. Kɑ̈ɑ̈th ɑ bɑ wïyi Amrɑm,
jɑl-ɑ ɑ́nywøm nyɑɑr Leebì nyɑn-ɑ cwøl ɑ́ Yökebed, nyɑn-ɑ ɑ́nywøl kì Rïp. Ányöddi yi Yökebed ki wɑ̈dd ɑ́ryew, ɑ løg Aɑron kí Mosɑ̀, kí Miryɑm nyimï gen.
Aɑron yïe ɑ́dɑ wɑ̈dd ɑ́ngwen: Nɑdɑb, Abiu, Eliɑdhɑr kí Ithɑmɑr.
Nɑdɑb ɑ́thøw geki Abiu kipe kɑ ɑ́kïdhi gen bøli Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j ki mɑc me pɑth ki ɑkwër.

Kwɑnni cwøw kì gøl Leebì, cɑg kì ri men-ɑ ónywølø e yïe dɑ dwɑ̈y ɑ́kyel gïti mɑl, ɑ́bëëd gɑ ɑ́lïp pyɑ̈r ɑ́ryew wïdɑ́dɑ̈g. Ge ɑ́gweed-ɑ wɑ̈yi gen, ge nuti gweed kelli jø Isrɑil, mɑ́ e bong piny mɑ ɑ́mëggi gen kì Isrɑil.
Kɑ wɑ̈thi kɑ̈llɑni órumø ki gwedø bënn yi Mosɑ̀ geki Eliɑdhɑr, keny-ɑ ɑ́kwɑn gen teedø kì kömi Nɑm Urdun kì bøli Yerikö.
Bong dhɑnhø ɑ́kyel mɑ nudd e onëënø kì kelli jøg-ɑ ɑ́ying mø nud keny-ɑ ɑ́kwøøng ji ki gwedø yi Mosɑ̀ geki Aɑron kì yij Ryɑɑng Sinɑy.
Ákwøb yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j ceth kinni ge ceg-ɑ thøø bënn kì yij ryɑng, rïnyɑni ɑ́thøw bëne den-ɑ́ Kɑlib wɑ̈d Yepunɑ̀ geki Jöcwø wɑ̈d Nun ɑ ɑ́döng ge nuti thøø.
Kɑ nyigi Dhelopekɑd wɑ̈d Eper, wɑ̈d Gilyɑd, wɑ̈d Mɑkir, wɑ̈d Mɑnɑsè wɑ̈d Yosep obëënø. Nyingi woɑni bɑ Mɑklɑ̀, Nöö, Oglɑ̀, Milkɑ̀ ki Tirdhɑ̀.
Kɑ ge ócungø kì bøli Mosɑ̀ geki ókwërø Eliɑdhɑr, e pëjji pödhø nud geki teedø bëne kì dhø Kemi Kwër, kɑ ge okööbø kinni,
“Wïyi wøn ɑ́thøw kì yij pɑ̈l, e bong wɑ̈de. Nuti’ ying-ɑ kelli jø Körɑ̀, jøg-ɑ ɑ́köör kì ri Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, ɑ́thøw kɑ per orøge kì wɑ̈ye.
Mɑ́ wïyi wøn yïe bong wɑ̈dde, bene ɑ pere lɑ̈ɑ̈ny nyinge kì Isrɑil? Nëngi wøn ki piny kì kelli wɑddi wïyi wøn.”
Akïdhi gøøny gen bøli Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j yi Mosɑ̀.
Aköbbi Mosɑ̀ yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kinni,
“Nyigi Dhelopekɑd, kømm-ɑ dyër, nëngí gen ki piny kì kelli wɑddi wïyi gen. Wiy piny wïyi gen lɑg yi gen.
Köbbí tyëng Isrɑil kinni, othøw dhɑnhø e bong wɑ̈d me wiy yi en, lɑɑg jɑmme yi nyɑre.
Ke bong yïe nyɑre, lɑɑg jɑmme yi nyiimen yɑɑg-ɑ cwøw.
Keløg yïe bong nyiimen yɑɑg-ɑ cwøw, lɑɑg jɑmme yi nyiimï wïye yɑɑg-ɑ cwøw.

O keløg e bong nyiimï wïye yɑɑg-ɑ cwøw, lɑɑg jɑmme yi wɑɑd gen, wɑn-ɑ cyɑ̈gi ki en, kɑ jɑmmɑni mïdhi yi ngɑnɑni gɑ møge. Mïdhi møgɑni yi tyëng Isrɑil gɑ kwöng. Ciggɑ møg, mïdhi gen ceth yi tyëng Isrɑil.”
Orume ki lidhø yi yïn, o yï kedhí bɑng jií ni Aɑron ómyëw,
mɑ́ ciggɑ ɑ́pyem-ɑ yi wun ryeet kì yij pɑ̈ɑ̈l Dhin. Keny-ɑ ɑ́köör teedø kì riɑ kì Merïbɑ̀, wu ɑ́bɑ̈nyi nyodhi tegɑ kwërø kì ri pï kì bøli teedø.” (Merïbɑ̀ bɑ wɑɑng pï kì Gɑdic kì yij pɑ̈ɑ̈l Dhin).
Akwɑjji Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j yi Mosɑ̀ kinni,
“Yïn ɑ Jwøk, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, bɑ yïn ɑ yïí nyi kɑ̈ɑ̈l yi wëy bënn, yɑ kwɑjj-ɑ yïn, kɑ̈bbí ki dhɑnhø men-ɑ ópyejji ji,
ɑ ópyejji gen kì yij liny, o yɑyí cöge e pɑ göögø ni dyëg møg bong ngɑn kwɑy gen.”
Kɑ cuung kì bøli ókwërø Eliɑdhɑr, geki teedø bëne, kɑ kwøøb kì kenyɑni kinni bɑ en ɑ kwɑny kejí.
Kɑ nëngí kì ri mɑ̈rí, o ówør yi tyëng Isrɑil bënn.
Ókøny yi ókwërø Eliɑdhɑr. Eliɑdhɑr ónyudhɑ ki gïn-ɑ dwɑddɑ kì ri Urïm geki Thumïm.
Kɑ Mosɑ̀ møg-ɑ ɑ́köbbii yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j gwøge bënn. Kɑ Jöcwø cuunge kì bøli Eliɑdhɑr geki teedø bëne.
Kɑ Mosɑ̀ cingge thɑɑnye wïj Jöcwø, ɑkwøbe gøn kinni bɑ en ɑ kwɑny keje. Møgɑni ɑ́gwøg yi Mosɑ̀ ceth ni kɑ ɑ́köbbii yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j.
Kɑ Mosɑ̀ köbbi yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kinni,

i cege tyëng Isrɑil kinni, jwödhø mi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j gënh-ɑ nyi muuj ki mɑc ɑ́ men yømi tole mïni pyëw Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, nyi muuj wun en kì bøli keje ceth. Kɑ ge köbbe kinni, møg bene gen jɑmmi jwödhø møg-ɑ nyi mëggi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j:
Nyi muuj órömm ɑ́ryew runi gen ɑ́kyel gɑ gënh-ɑ nyi rɑ̈b bëne yethi cyɑ̈ng ceth.
Muuj wun órömø ɑ́kyel kì mwøl, kɑ men-ɑ kyeelø muuj kì böörø,
ɑ́kyel muuj kyeel kɑ gïncɑm, kïlø ɑ́kyel møng-ɑ búr me bɑ ɑnyöm ki røthøl ɑ́ryew mø møøw dhetun.
Bene jwödhø mi yethi cyɑ̈ng ɑnɑn, men-ɑ nyi rɑ̈b bëne, ɑ́ jwödhø men-ɑ ɑ́gwøg kì Kïti Sinɑy ɑ́ men yømi tole mïni pyëw Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j.
Kɑ wïj këli lɑm kunyi ki røthøl ɑ́ryew mø møgi oløg ɑ́ kunyi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j.
Kɑ óröm-ɑ kyeelø muuj kì böörø, gwøg ni mi mwøl ceth, kyeel ki kunyi møgi oløge, bɑ gënh-ɑ nyi rɑ̈b bëne me yømi tole mïni pyëw Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j.
Nyi muuj wun ki órömm ɑ́ryew mø bong gïnrɑj kì ri gen kì cyɑ̈ɑ̈ng Sɑbɑth, kyeel ki kïllì ɑ́ryew møng-ɑ búr me bɑ ɑnyöm ki møøw dhetun, geki kunyi møgi oløg.
Nyi muuj gënhi Sɑbɑth kì cyɑ̈nggi Sɑbɑth bënn kyeel ki gëdhhi yethi cyɑ̈ng.
Nyi muuj wun ki gënh-ɑ nyi rɑ̈b bëne kì ri cɑ̈gi dwɑ̈tt bënn, bɑ wɑ̈dhh ɑ́ryew, ki órömø ɑ́kyel me dwøng, ki órömm ɑ́bïryew mø thønhø runi gen ɑ́kyel ge bong gïnrɑj kì ri gen.
Wɑdh ɑ́kyel kɑ̈ɑ̈l kɑ gïncɑm møng-ɑ búr me bɑ ɑnyöm ki møøw dhetun, ki møng-ɑ búr me bɑ kïllì ɑ́ryew.
O órömm-ɑ thønhø, ɑ́kyel kɑ̈ɑ̈l kɑ møng-ɑ búr kïlø ɑ́kyel. Jɑmmi jwödhø møgɑni bɑ gënh-ɑ nyi rɑ̈b bëne me yømi tole mïni pyëw Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j.

Kunyi møgi oløg bɑ røthøl ɑ́ngwen, ɑ kedh ki wɑdh ɑ́kyel, o bɑ røthøl ɑ́dɑ̈g ɑ kedh ki óröm-ɑ dwøng, o óröm-ɑ thinh ɑ́kyel kedh kɑ røthøl ɑ́ryew. Møgɑni bene gen ciggi gënh-ɑ nyi rɑ̈b bëne men-ɑ nyi muuj kì cyɑ̈ng-ɑ mɑl kì yethi dwɑ̈tt bënn kì yij run.
Kì yethi cyɑ̈ng bënn, nyi muuj ónywøg wɑ̈dtegø ɑ́ gënhi orøg kyeel geki møg-ɑ kyeelø, kí kunye.
Kwërɑni cɑ̈g-ɑ́ɑ̀ cyɑ̈nggi dwɑ̈y pyɑ̈rø wïdɑ́bïj, o tyëg-ɑ cyɑ̈ng ɑ́bïryew teedø cɑm-ɑ olwëny.
Bong tïj me tïj kì cyɑ̈ng-ɑ mɑl, de cugi wun be mɑ̈ddø.
Kɑ wu muuj wun ki gënh-ɑ nyi rɑ̈b bëne. Wɑ̈dhh ɑ́ryew, kí órömø ɑ́kyel me dwøng, ki órömm ɑ́bïryew mø thønhø runi gen ɑ́kyel ge bong gïnrɑj kì ri gen.
Kɑ wu muuj wun ki møng-ɑ búr me bɑ ɑnyöm ki møøw dhetun, e bɑ kïllì ɑ́dɑ̈g ɑ kedh ki óröm-ɑ dwøng,
o kïlø ɑ́kyel ɑ kedh ki óröm-ɑ thinh ɑ́kyel.
Muuj wun thyew ki ónywøg wɑ̈dtegø ɑ́ gënhi orøg, me gøøm bøli orøøg wun.
Jɑmmi kwër møgɑni muuj kyeel kɑ jwödhø mi mwøl kì yethi cyɑ̈ng bënn.
Nyi muuj wun kinøw ceth ki gënh-ɑ nyi rɑ̈b bëne kì cyɑ̈ngɑni gɑ ɑ́bïryew bënn. Reb ki gënh-ɑ nyi rɑ̈b bëne mi yethi cyɑ̈ng bënn, geki kunyi møgi oløg.
Kɑ wu cugi wun be mɑ̈ddø kì bïryeew cyɑ̈nggɑni. Bong tïj thyew ki bïryeew cyɑ̈ng.

Kɑ wu muuj wun ki gënh-ɑ nyi rɑ̈b bëne, me yømi tole mïni pyëw Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j. Muuj wun ki wɑ̈dhh ɑ́ryew, kí órömø ɑ́kyel me dwøng, kí órömm ɑ́bïryew mø thønhø runi gen ɑ́kyel, ge bong gïnrɑj kì ri gen.
Kɑ wu muuj wun ki byëlø; møng-ɑ búr me bɑ ɑnyöm ki møøw dhetun, wɑdh ɑ́kyel kɑ̈l kɑ kïllì ɑ́dɑ̈g, o óröm-ɑ dwøng kɑ̈l kɑ kïllì ɑ́ryew.
O órömm-ɑ thønhø, ɑ́kyel kɑ̈l kɑ kïlø ɑ́kyel.
Muuj wun thyew ki ónywøg wɑ̈dtegø ɑ́ gënhi orøg, men gøøm bøli ji.
Muuj wun gen geki kunyi møgi oløg men-ɑ kedh ki gen. Kí gënh-ɑ nyi rɑ̈b bëne mi yethi cyɑ̈ng geki byëli Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j. Bëëd jɑmmɑni ge bong gïnrɑj kì ri gen.
Kyeel cyɑ̈nggi bïryeew dwɑ̈tt bɑ cyɑ̈ng kwër, cøng wun ri wun be mɑ̈ddø kì cyɑ̈ngɑni, kɑ ko di tïj me tïj. Kɑ kɑ̈ngì kodh kì cyɑ̈ngɑni.
Muuj wun ki gënh-ɑ nyi rɑ̈b bëne kì cyɑ̈ngɑni ɑ́ men yømi tole mïni pyëw Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, muuj ɑ́ wɑdh ówöb, kí órömø me dwøng, kí órömm ɑ́bïryew mø thønhø runi gen ɑ́kyel, mø bong gïnrɑj kì ri gen.
Kí byëlø, møng-ɑ búr me bɑ ɑnyöm ki møøw dhetun, kïllì ɑ́dɑ̈g ɑ kɑ̈ɑ̈l wɑdh, o kïllì ɑ́ryew ɑ kɑ̈ɑ̈l óröm-ɑ dwøng.
O órömm-ɑ thønhø, ɑ́kyel kɑ̈l kɑ kïlø ɑ́kyel.
Kɑ wu muuj wun ki ónywøg wɑ̈dtegø ɑ́ gënhi orøg, me gøøm bøli ji,
reb ki gënh-ɑ nyi rɑ̈b bëne mi yethi cyɑ̈ng, kí byële, kí kunyi møgi oløg. Møgɑni bɑ keni Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j men yømi tool gen mïni pyëw Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j.
Muuj wun ki gënh-ɑ nyi rɑ̈b bëne kì cyɑ̈ngɑni ɑ́ men yømi tole mïni pyëw Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, muuj ɑ́ wɑdh ówöb, ki órömø me dwøng, kí órömm ɑ́bïryew mø thønhø runi gen ɑ́kyel, ge bong gïnrɑj kì ri gen.
Kí byëli gen, møng-ɑ búr me bɑ ɑnyöm ki møøw dhetun. Kïllì ɑ́dɑ̈g ɑ kɑ̈ɑ̈l wɑdh, o kïllì ɑ́ryew ɑ kɑ̈ɑ̈l óröm-ɑ dwøng.
O órömm-ɑ thønhø, ɑ́kyel kɑ̈l kɑ kïlø ɑ́kyel.
Kɑ wu muuj wun ki ónywøg wɑ̈dtegø ɑ́ gënhi orøg, me gøøm bøli ji. Reb ki gënh-ɑ nyi rɑ̈b bëne mi yethi cyɑ̈ng, kí byële, kí kunyi møgi oløg.
Cøngu ri wun be mɑ̈ddø kì pyɑ̈rø wïdɑ́bïïj cyɑ̈nggi bïryeew dwɑ̈tt. Kwërɑni gwøg yi wun ɑ́ men wør wun Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, ki cyɑ̈ng ɑ́bïryew. Kɑ ko di tïj me tïj kì yethi cyɑ̈nggɑni.

Muuj wun ki gënh-ɑ nyi rɑ̈b bëne kì kyeel cyɑ̈nggɑni ɑ́ men yømi tole mïni pyëw Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, muuj ɑ́ wɑ̈dhh ówöbb gɑ pyɑ̈rø wïdɑ́dɑ̈g, ki órömm ɑ́ryew mø døngø, kí órömm mø thønhø runi gen ɑ́kyel, ge bong gïnrɑj kì ri gen, gɑ pyɑ̈rø wïdɑ́ngwen.
Kí byëli gen, møng-ɑ búr me bɑ ɑnyöm ki møøw dhetun. Kïllì ɑ́dɑ̈g ɑ kɑ̈ɑ̈l wɑdh ɑ́kyel, o kïllì ɑ́ryew ɑ kɑ̈ɑ̈l óröm-ɑ dwøng ɑ́kyel.
O órömm-ɑ thønhø, ɑ́kyel kɑ̈l kɑ kïlø ɑ́kyel.
Kɑ wu muuj wun ki ónywøg wɑ̈dtegø ɑ́ gënhi orøg. Reb ki gënh-ɑ nyi rɑ̈b bëne mi yethi cyɑ̈ng, kí byële, kí kunyi møgi oløg.
Muuj wun kì ryeew cyɑ̈ng ki wɑ̈dhh ówöbb pyɑ̈rø wïdɑ́ryew, kí órömm ɑ́ryew mø døngø, kí órömm-ɑ thønhø runi gen ɑ́kyel, gɑ pyɑ̈rø wïdɑ́ngwen, ge bong gïnrɑj kì ri gen.
Kí byëli gen, kí kunyi gen, gɑ kwɑnn-ɑ nyi kɑ̈ɑ̈l gen ceth.
Kí ónywøg wɑ̈dtegø ɑ́ gënhi orøg mi yethi cyɑ̈ng, kí byële, kí kunyi møgi oløg.
Muuj wun kì dɑ̈ɑ̈g cyɑ̈ng ki wɑ̈dhh ówöbb pyɑ̈rø wïdɑ́kyel, kí órömm ɑ́ryew mø døngø, kí órömm mø thønhø gɑ pyɑ̈rø wïdɑ́ngwen, ge bong gïnrɑj kì ri gen.
Kí byëli gen, kí kunyi gen, gɑ kwɑnn-ɑ nyi kɑ̈ɑ̈l gen ceth.
Kí ónywøg wɑ̈dtegø ɑ́ gënhi orøg men gøøm bøli ji. Reb ki gënh-ɑ nyi rɑ̈b bëne mi yethi cyɑ̈ng, kí kunyi møgi oløg.
Muuj wun kì ngween cyɑ̈ng ki wɑ̈dhh ówöbb pyɑ̈rø, kí órömm ɑ́ryew mø døngø, kí órömm mø thønhø gɑ pyɑ̈rø wïdɑ́ngwen, ge bong gïnrɑj kì ri gen.
Kí byëli gen, kí kunyi gen, gɑ kwɑnn-ɑ nyi kɑ̈ɑ̈l gen ceth.
Kí ónywøg wɑ̈dtegø ɑ́ gënhi orøg men gøøm bøli ji. Reb ki gënh-ɑ nyi rɑ̈b bëne mi yethi cyɑ̈ng, kí byële, kí kunyi møgi oløg.
Muuj wun kì bïïj cyɑ̈ng ki wɑ̈dhh ówöbb ɑ́bïngwen, kí órömm ɑ́ryew mø døngø, kí órömm mø thønhø gɑ pyɑ̈rø wïdɑ́ngwen, runi gen ɑ́kyel, ge bong gïnrɑj kì ri gen.
Kí byëli gen, kí kunyi gen, gɑ kwɑnn-ɑ nyi kɑ̈ɑ̈l gen ceth.
Kí ónywøg wɑ̈dtegø ɑ́ gënhi orøg men gøøm bøli ji. Reb ki gënh-ɑ nyi rɑ̈b bëne mi yethi cyɑ̈ng, kí byële, kí kunyi møgi oløg.
Muuj wun kì bïkyeel cyɑ̈ng ki wɑ̈dhh ówöbb ɑ́bïdɑ̈g, kí órömm-ɑ døngø ɑ́ryew, kí órömm thønhø gɑ pyɑ̈rø wïdɑ́ngwen, runi gen ɑ́kyel, ge bong gïnrɑj kì ri gen.
Kí byëli gen, kí kunyi gen, gɑ kwɑnn-ɑ nyi kɑ̈ɑ̈l gen ceth.
Kí ónywøg wɑ̈dtegø ɑ́ gënhi orøg men gøøm bøli ji. Reb ki gënh-ɑ nyi rɑ̈b bëne mi yethi cyɑ̈ng, kí byële, kí kunyi møgi oløg.
Muuj wun kì bïryeew cyɑ̈ng ki wɑ̈dhh ówöbb ɑ́bïryew, kí órömm ɑ́ryew mø døngø,
kí órömm mø thønhø gɑ pyɑ̈rø wïdɑ́ngwen, runi gen ɑ́kyel, ge bong gïnrɑj kì ri gen.
Kí ónywøg wɑ̈dtegø ɑ́ gënhi orøg men gøøm bøli ji. Reb ki gënh-ɑ nyi rɑ̈b bëne mi yethi cyɑ̈ng, kí byële, kí kunyi møgi oløg.
Cøng wun ri wun be mɑ̈ddø kì bïdɑ̈ɑ̈g cyɑ̈ng, kɑ ko di tïj me tïj yi wun.

Kɑ wu muuj wun ki gënh-ɑ nyi rɑ̈b bëne kì cyɑ̈ngɑni ɑ́ men yømi tole mïni pyëw Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j. Muuj ɑ́ wɑdh ówöb, ki órömø ɑ́kyel me dwøng, ki órömm ɑ́bïryew mø thønhø, runi gen ɑ́kyel, ge bong gïnrɑj kì ri gen bënn.
Kí byëli gen, kí kunyi gen, gɑ kwɑnn-ɑ nyi kɑ̈ɑ̈l gen ceth.
Kí ónywøg wɑ̈dtegø ɑ́ gënhi orøg men gøøm bøli ji. Reb ki gënh-ɑ nyi rɑ̈b bëne mi yethi cyɑ̈ng, kí byële, kí kunyi møgi oløg.
Møgɑk bene gen cigg kiper gënh-ɑ nyi rɑ̈b bëne, kí byële, kí kunyi møgi oløg, kí gëdhhi mër møg-ɑ nyi muuj kì bøli kej kwëër gen. Gëdhhi wïj köngø, ki jwödhø kedh-ɑ kömi gen.
Møg-ɑ ɑ́ceg yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j bënn, ɑ́köbbi tyëng Isrɑil yi Mosɑ̀.
Kɑ jɑggi Isrɑil mëggi cigg møg yi Mosɑ̀ kinni:
Kenyi köngi dhɑnhø kinni gïïpiny ómëgge Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, wɑlɑ̀ köngø kinni, pɑ cyɑ̈mø ki gïïpiny, könge ko pɑ̈d yi en, de gwøge gïn-ɑ ɑ́kwöng yi en kinni gø ógwøge ceth.
Kenyi köngi nyɑnɑjur, me nudd e ying-ɑ gøl wïye, kinni gïïpiny ómëgge Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, wɑlɑ̀ köngø kinni pɑ cyɑ̈mø ki gïïpiny,
gwøge møg-ɑ ɑ́kwönge, wɑlɑ̀ gïn-ɑ ɑ́kyere, keløg wïye pɑ bɑ̈nyi keny-ɑ ólïnge møgɑni.
De keløg wïye olïngø kɑ gø mɑ̈ɑ̈ne gwøgi gïn-ɑ ɑ́kwönge, nyɑnɑni pɑth ki ɑcerø ki mïdhi köngɑni.
Keløg ngɑndhɑjø me pɑth ki ɑnywøm óköngø e ceg yi en kɑ tøønyø, wɑlɑ̀ dhøge ceg-ɑ bodhø, kinni yɑ ómuujø ki gïn-ɑni, wɑlɑ̀ kinni riɑ ótwönɑ gïn-ɑni, codhe kɑ nywøm,
gwøge gïn-ɑ ɑ́kwöng yi en ceth, keløg jɑlgøle pɑ kyëdø keny-ɑ ólïnge møgɑni.
De keløg jɑlgøle okyëdø keny-ɑ ólïnge møgɑni, pɑth ki ɑcerø ki mïdhi köngø menɑni, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j pyëwe ólɑ̈ɑ̈m ki en.
Ngɑn jɑlgøle thøø, wɑlɑ̀ ngɑn bɑ ɑtɑ̈ng keløg e óköngø kinni ómuujø ki gïïpiny, wɑlɑ̀ ree ótwöne ki gïïpiny, gwøge møg-ɑ ɑ́kwöng yi en ceth.
Ngɑndhɑjø ɑnywøm e jɑlgøle nud, keløg e óköngø ki gïïpiny,
gwøge møg-ɑ ɑ́kwönge bënn ceth keløg jɑlgøle pɑ kyëdø keny-ɑ ólïnge møgɑni.
De keløg jɑlgøle okyëdø keny-ɑ ólïnge møgɑni, pɑth ki ɑcerø ki mïdhi kwöngɑni, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j pyëwe ólɑ̈ɑ̈m ki en mɑ́ e bɑ jɑlgøle ɑ ɑ́kyëëd.
Jɑlgøle yïe dɑ dyër ke yïëye wɑlɑ̀ ke bɑ̈nye ki könge keny-ɑ ólïnge.
Keløg könge ólïnge, kɑ ocögø e bong gïn kwøbe, cungi ngɑnɑni kì kömi köng-ɑ ɑ́könge ceth, mɑ́ jɑlgøle nuti löggø kì bøli keny-ɑ ɑ́lïnge ceth.
De keløg köngɑni ókyer yi en e piny kɑ̈ɑ̈l kun, bɑ en ɑ köme di cɑ́yi cögi gïn-ɑ ɑ́kwöng e pɑ gwøg.
Bene gen cigg-ɑ ɑ́mëggi Mosɑ̀ yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j ɑgɑk, kì ri kwööng mɑ̈nn-ɑ kɑ̈lli wëëg gen, kí møg-ɑ bɑ ɑnywøm.
Kɑ Mosɑ̀ köbbi yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kinni,
“Col gøøli tyëng Isrɑil ki tyëng Midyɑn, o rume o yï kedhí kun-ɑ di kweyyí.”
Codhe, ɑköbbi teedø yi Mosɑ̀ kinni, “Kɑ̈bbi wun ki jøg mø kedhi be pɑ̈ɑ̈r kömi tyëng Midyɑn, o ge nɑ̈g kipe gïnrɑj men-ɑ ɑ́göggi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j yi gen.
Kɑ̈bbi kɑl ɑ́kyel ki jøg mø kwɑnni gen bɑ ɑ́lïp, møg kedhi be liny.”
Codhe, ɑmyeeg ɑ́lïp kì gøl kí gøl, kɑ kwɑnni jøliny ogöögø ki ɑ́lïp pyɑ̈rø wïdɑ́ryew, gen ɑ jø kɑ̈llɑni gɑ pyɑ̈rø wïdɑ́ryew.
Aör gen be liny yi Mosɑ̀ ge pyejj-ɑ yi Pineɑs wɑ̈d ókwërø Eliɑdhɑr, e ókɑ̈ddø ki jɑmmi kwër geki kɑng.
Kɑ ge pɑ̈ɑ̈r-ɑ kömi tyëng Midyɑn, ɑnɑ̈g gen cwøw bënn,
kí rɑ̈nhi Midyɑn gɑ ɑ́bïj. Ebì, Rekem, Dhur, Ur kí Tebɑ̀. Kɑ Bɑlɑɑm wɑ̈d Beor nɑ̈g yi gen thyew.
Kɑ mɑ̈nni Midyɑn ki nyigi gen mɑg yi Isrɑil, kɑ dhögi gen kwɑny, kɑ kɑ̈ɑ̈r gen yɑy bëne,
kɑ myërri gen rɑ̈b geki kɑ̈ddi gen.
Kɑ gïg-ɑ ɑ́mɑg bënn kɑ̈ɑ̈l gen, kí ji geki dyëg kí dhög,
ge muuj-ɑ Mosɑ̀ geki Eliɑdhɑr, kí teedø bëne kì kɑɑl thwøri Moɑb kì kömi Nɑm Urdun kì bøli Yerikö.
Kɑ liny pɑɑr ngɑ̈ɑ̈j kɑɑl yi Mosɑ̀ geki Eliɑdhɑr, kí jɑgg geki teedø bëne.
Mosɑ̀ ɑ́bëëd pyëwe rɑɑj ki pëjji liny, ɑ løg pëjji ɑ́lïp geki pëjji miy, møg-ɑ ɑ́kɑ̈ɑ̈l be liny.
Kɑ ge pyëje kinni, “Gede tyëng-ɑ mɑ̈nn bënn ɑ wiyu gen ge onëënø?

Wɑ̈thi wun ɑ́ceg-ɑ wïlø kinni bɑ tyëng-ɑ mɑ̈nn ɑ ɑ́lïngi kwøbbi Bɑlɑɑm kì Peor, ɑthɑ̈bbi gen ji orøg kì bøli Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j? Pɑth ki gööj gen ɑ ɑ́kɑ̈ɑ̈l yømø nɑ̈ɑ̈g men-ɑ ɑ́nɑ̈g jii Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j?
Nɑ̈gu yɑɑg thønhø bënn geki tyëng-ɑ mɑ̈nn møg-ɑ rumø niin yi cwøw.
Kɑ womɑ̈nn geki wojur møg-ɑ nuti niin yi cwøw kwɑny wun.

Kɑ wun, wu tyëng-ɑ ɑ́nɑ̈ɑ̈g ki ji, wɑlɑ̀ ɑ ɑ́nywɑ̈ddi ki ngɑnthøø, bëëd wun kì ngɑ̈ɑ̈j kɑɑl ki cyɑ̈ng ɑ́bïryew. Kɑ ri wun lɑw wun ki dɑ̈ɑ̈g cyɑ̈ng geki bïryeew cyɑ̈ng, o wu dhïwi wun, wuki mɑ̈nn-ɑ ɑ́mɑg yi wun.
Lɑw wun ógudhi wun bënn, ki gïg-ɑ ócwɑ̈jø ki yëyyi dyëg geki møg-ɑ ótyengø gɑ yɑdh.”
Kɑ jøg-ɑ ɑ́dwöög kì be liny köbbi yi ókwërø Eliɑdhɑr kinni, “Møg bene gen cigg-ɑ ɑ́mëggi Mosɑ̀ yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j:
Gïg-ɑ pɑ nyi rɑ̈bbi yi mɑc ni dhɑb, kí ɑ́tegø, kí dilɑl, kí ngyënyø dødø, kí dhïngkì, kí ɑ́yömø, kɑ̈ɑ̈l-ɑ yij mɑc o dhïwe. O gïg-ɑ nyi rɑ̈b yi mɑc lɑw kɑ pïi dhïwø.
Lwøg wun ógudhi wun kì bïryeew cyɑ̈ng, kɑ wu lwøggi wun, o wu dhïwi wun, codhe o wu kedhu kɑɑl cyee.”
Kɑ Mosɑ̀ köbbi yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kinni,
“Kwɑn jɑmm-ɑ ɑ́mɑ̈ɑ̈g bënn; ji kí dhög, kí dyëg, kí ɑderr. Kwɑnu gen wuki ókwërø Eliɑdhɑr kí jɑgg-ɑ kyeelø,
kɑ ge pɑ̈ngi wun gɑ bud ɑ́ryew mø pɑ̈r, budø ɑ́kyel mi jøg-ɑ ɑ́kedhi be liny, o bun-ɑ kyeelø mi teedø.
Kɑ yï kɑ̈bbí ki gwɑ̈ɑ̈j Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kì ri budø mi jøg-ɑ ɑ́kedhi be liny, nyi kɑ̈bbí ki ɑ́kyel kì ri miy ɑ́bïj møg-ɑ bɑ ji, kí dhög, kí ɑderr kí dyëg.
Kɑ ge mëggí ókwërø Eliɑdhɑr gɑ jwödhø mi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j.
Kɑ̈bbí thyew kì ri bun-ɑ bɑ mi teedø ki ɑ́kyel kì ri pyɑ̈r ɑ́bïj møg-ɑ bɑ ji, kí dhög, kí ɑderr, kí dyëg. Kɑ ge mëggí Kwɑrri Leebì jøg-ɑ korri Kemi Kwëër Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j.”
Kɑ møg-ɑ ɑ́cïgi Mosɑ̀ yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, gwøg ceth yi Mosɑ̀ geki Eliɑdhɑr.

Møg bene gen kwɑnni gïg-ɑ ɑ́mɑg bënn yi jøliny: dyëg römm geki ɑ́tegg bɑ ɑ́lïp miy ɑ́bïkyel kí pyɑ̈r ɑ́bïryew wïdɑ́bïj, kí dhög ɑ́lïp pyɑ̈r ɑ́bïryew wïdɑ́ryew, kí ɑderr ɑ́lïp pyɑ̈r ɑ́bïkyel wïdɑ́kyel, kí womɑ̈nn ɑ́lïp pyɑ̈r ɑ́dɑ̈g wïdɑ́ryew.

Bun-ɑ bɑ mi jøg-ɑ ɑ́kedhi be liny bɑ ɑ́lïp miy ɑ́dɑ̈g kí pyɑ̈r ɑ́dɑ̈g wïdɑ́bïryew, kí miy ɑ́bïj dyëg ɑ́tegg kí römm, ri gen ɑ́kwɑɑny-ɑ miy ɑ́bïkyel ki pyɑ̈r ɑ́bïryew wïdɑ́bïj gɑ gwɑ̈ɑ̈j Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j. Kí dhög ɑ́lïp pyɑ̈r ɑ́dɑ̈g wïdɑ́bïkyel, ri gen ɑ́kwɑɑny-ɑ pyɑ̈r ɑ́bïryew wïdɑ́ryew gɑ gwɑ̈ɑ̈j Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, kí ɑderr ɑ́lïp pyɑ̈r ɑ́dɑ̈g kí miy ɑ́bïj, ri gen ɑ́kwɑɑny-ɑ pyɑ̈r ɑ́bïkyel wïdɑ́kyel gɑ gwɑ̈ɑ̈j Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, kí womɑ̈nn ɑ́lïp pyɑ̈rø wïdɑ́bïkyel, ri gen ɑ́kwɑɑny-ɑ pyɑ̈r ɑ́dɑ̈g wïdɑ́ryew gɑ gwɑ̈ɑ̈j Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j.
Codhe, ɑmëggi gwɑ̈nyɑni Eliɑdhɑr yi Mosɑ̀ ɑ́ jwödhø mi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, ni møg-ɑ ɑ́cïgi Mosɑ̀ yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j.

Bun-ɑ bɑ mi teedø pɑ̈r ki bun-ɑ bɑ mi jøg-ɑ ɑ́kedhi be liny: dyëg römm kí ɑ́tegg bɑ ɑ́lïp miy ɑ́dɑ̈g kí pyɑ̈r ɑ́dɑ̈g wïdɑ́bïryew, kí miy ɑ́bïj; dhög bɑ ɑ́lïp pyɑ̈r ɑ́dɑ̈g wïdɑ́bïkyel; ɑderr bɑ ɑ́lïp pyɑ̈r ɑ́dɑ̈g; o womɑ̈nn bɑ ɑ́lïp pyɑ̈rø wïdɑ́bïkyel.

Ri gen ɑ́kɑ̈bbi yi Mosɑ̀ ki ɑ́kyel kì ri pyɑ̈r ɑ́bïj møg-ɑ bɑ ji, kí dhög, kí ɑderr, kí dyëg, kɑ gï mëgge Kwɑrri Leebì møg-ɑ ɑ́korri Kemi Kwëër Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, ni møg-ɑ ɑ́cïgi Mosɑ̀ yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j.
Kɑ pëjjì møg-ɑ ɑ́pej liny kedh-ɑ yï Mosɑ̀,
ɑköbbi ge gøn kinni, “Jɑldwøng, jøg-ɑ ɑ́peej yi wøn be liny ɑ́kwɑn yi wøn, bong dhɑnhø ɑ́kyel me tøøk.

Bene ɑ bɑnge kɑ̈ɑ̈l wøn dhɑb men-ɑ bɑ yëll, kí gyell, kí gwelli lwedd, kí gwelli yïthh, kí ɑ́cwecwelli yedh møg-ɑ ɑ́kɑ̈ɑ̈l yi wøn, ge muuj wø’ Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, gɑ møg-ɑ ɑ́gøøm bøli wëyi wøn, o wø ókorri yi en ceth.”
Akwɑɑny jɑmmi dhɑb møgɑni yi Mosɑ̀ geki Eliɑdhɑr.
Jɑmmɑni ɑ́røm gɑ gïn ni kïllì miy ɑ́ryew, gen ɑ møg-ɑ ɑ́kɑ̈ɑ̈l yi pëjji liny.
De jøg-ɑ pɑth ki pëjjì, jɑmmi dhɑb møg-ɑ ɑ́kɑ̈ɑ̈l yi gen nuti muujø yi gen.
Kɑ dhɑmɑni kïdhi Kemi Kwër yi Mosɑ̀ geki Eliɑdhɑr, kipe kinni o tyëng Isrɑil korri yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j.
Gøl Ruben kí gøl Gɑd yï gen ɑ́dɑ dhög mø gïïr, kɑ lidh yi gen kinni piny Yɑdher geki piny Gilyɑd bɑ kɑ̈jj mø døøj kipe jɑmmì.
Akedhi gen yï Mosɑ̀ geki Eliɑdhɑr kí jɑggi Isrɑil møg-ɑ kyeelø, kɑ ge okööbø kinni,

“Piny-ɑ ɑ́køny tyëng Isrɑil yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j ki mɑge, kɑ gø mɑg gen, piny myërri Atɑröth, Dïbön, Yɑdher, Nimrɑ̀, Kicbön, Eleɑlè, Sibmɑ̀, Nebö kí Beön; bɑ piny me døøj kipe jɑmmì, o yï wøn dɑ jɑmmì.
Wø kwɑjj-ɑ yïn, mëggí wøn pinyɑni ɑ́ mi wøn, wø ko wëggí kedhi løøg Nɑm Urdun.”
Alöggi Mosɑ̀ kinni, “Wu dwɑdd-ɑ dööngø kì keny, o wɑddi wun kedhi gen be liny?
Wude ɑ dwɑddu wëggi pëthi tyëng Isrɑil nyönhø, o ge bwøg gen ki kedhi piny-ɑ ɑ́mëggi gen yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j?
Bene gïn-ɑ ɑ́gwøg yi wëëg wun ɑnɑn keny-ɑ ɑ́örɑ gen be lyewwi piny, teedø ying-ɑ Gɑdic Berniyɑ̀.
Akedh gen kɑ ge wɑ̈dh-ɑ Töör Acköl, ɑdwöög gen kɑ teedø pɑng yi gen ki kwøbbi pyed, ɑdhɑ̈li ji ki kedhi piny-ɑ ɑ́mëggi gen yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j.
Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j pyëwe ɑ́ceg rënyø kì cyɑ̈ngɑni, ɑkööbe kinni,

“Yɑ ɑ́köngi kinni bong dhɑnhø men-ɑ ókedhi pinyɑni, ngɑn runne bɑ pyɑ̈r ɑ́ryew gïti mɑl, ɑ løg tyëng-ɑ ɑ́kɑ̈ɑ̈l Rïp, ge pɑ kedhi piny-ɑ ɑ́mëggɑ Abrɑhɑm, kí Isɑɑk, kí Yɑgob, mɑ́ ge ɑ́bɑ̈nyi lïngi kwøbbɑ.”
Kɑ döng ɑ́ Kɑlib wɑ̈d Yepunɑ̀ geki Jöcwø wɑ̈d Nun, mɑ́ gen ɑ ɑ́mïdhi kwøbbi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j.
Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j pyëwe ɑ́ceg-ɑ rënyø ki ji, ɑkölle ji twɑ̈lø kì yij ryɑng ki runn pyɑ̈r ɑ́ngwen, gïti kɑ ɑ́thumi jøgɑni ki thøø bënn.
Anɑn wu dwɑdd-ɑ døøg kej wëëg wun, wun ɑ́ rïj me rɑj, men cigi kɑ̈ni kömi Isrɑil ki ryɑ̈g, keny-ɑ órënyi pyëw Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j?
Keløg wu óbɑ̈nyø ki lugø kì bɑng Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, wu gøl Ruben kí gøl Gɑd, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j pyëwe ceg-ɑ rënyø ki ji møg bënn, kɑ gï wiye piny kì yij ryɑng men, ji thuw-ɑ gööj wun.”
Alöggi gen kinni, “Wiy dyëgi wøn gëddi yi wøn ki kyell, o wø gëëd wøn ki kɑ̈ddi dör kipe mɑ̈nni wøn geki nyigi wøn kì keny.

Codhe o wø kedhi wøn be liny wøki wɑddi wøn, tyëng Isrɑil gïti keny-ɑ óthumi piny-ɑ bɑ mi gen ki mɑgø. O keny-ɑ óying wøn kej liny, pëthi wøn ócög ge pɑ lïngø kipe jɑmmi wøn geki nyigi wøn, mɑ́ ge ɑ́gëddi ki kɑ̈jj-ɑ pɑ yood gen yi tyëng pönhï.
Wø pɑ dwöög pɑc gïti keny-ɑ órum tyëng Isrɑil møg-ɑ kyeelø ki mɑgi kɑ̈jji gen.
Wø pɑ kɑ̈bbi ki piny kì løøg Nɑm Urdun, mɑ́ wø ɑ́rum ki kɑ̈bbø kì løøng-ɑ wɑɑng cyɑ̈ɑ̈ng mwøl èn.”
Alöggi Mosɑ̀ kinni, “Keløg wu kømm-ɑ dyër, gwir wun ri wun kipe liny ɑnɑn kì bøli Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j.
Bɑ̈ɑ̈n wun Nɑm Urdun wuki jøliny wun, kɑ wu nyïɑ̈ggi wun ki tyëngmɑ̈ɑ̈nø gïti keny-ɑ ótyɑɑm tyëngɑni yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j,

Kɑ pinyɑni kwɑnye. Orume, o wu dwöög wun, e kwöör wun løøgø kì bøli Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, kí bøli tyëng Isrɑil. Codhe o Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j yïëye kinni piny-ɑ løøg Nɑm Urdun kì wɑɑng cyɑ̈ɑ̈ng mwøl bɑ mi wun.
De yɑ köbb-ɑ wun kinni keløg wu koo cungi kì kömi dhøggi wun, ngɑ̈ny wun wøw kinni wu ɑ́røngi kì bøli Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j. O wu pɑ bødh ki cɑyø yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kipe orøngɑni.
Gëddu nyigi wun ki kɑ̈dd, kɑ dyëgi wun gëddi wun ki kyell, kɑ wu cungi wun kì kömi dhøggi wun ceth!”
Kɑ gøl Gɑd geki gøl Ruben okööbø kinni, “Møg-ɑ ɑ́kwøb yi yïn ógwøg yi wøn, jɑldwøng!
Mɑ̈nni wøn kí nyigi wøn kí dhögi wøn, ge ódöng kì myërri Gilyɑd keny.
De wø kedh-ɑ be liny Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, Nɑm Urdun óbɑ̈ɑ̈n yi wøn, wø kedh-ɑ be nyɑɑg ni men-ɑ ɑ́kwøb yi yïn.”
“Keløg jø gøl Gɑd kí gøl Ruben Nɑm Urdun óbɑ̈ɑ̈n yi gen, kɑ ge kedh-ɑ be nyɑɑg ni møg-ɑ ɑ́ceg yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, kɑ wu køny yi gen ki mɑgi pinyɑni, mëggu gen piny Gilyɑd ɑ́ mi gen.
De keløg ge pɑ nyïɑ̈ggi kyeel ki wun, ge ónëng ɑ Kɑnɑɑn ki piny ni wun.”
Alöggi jø gøl Gɑd geki gøl Ruben kinni, “Møg-ɑ ɑ́kwøb yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j ógwøg yi wøn, jɑldwøng.
Nɑm Urdun óbɑ̈ɑ̈n yi wøn, kɑ wø kedh-ɑ piny Kɑnɑɑn be nyɑɑg ki liny Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, de piny wøn ying-ɑ løøg Nɑm Urdun løøng.”
Codhe, kɑ Mosɑ̀ piny Rɑ̈dh Sïön rɑ̈ɑ̈dh tyëng Amör, geki piny Og rɑ̈ɑ̈dh Bɑcɑn kí kɑ̈ddi gen, kí myërri gen mëgge gøl Gɑd kí gøl Ruben geki budi gøl Mɑnɑsè wɑ̈d Yosep.
Kɑ kɑ̈ddi dör, ɑ løg Dïbön, kí Atɑröth kí Aröeer, kí Atröth Cöpɑn, kí Yɑdher, kí Yogbeɑ̀. Kí Bet Nimrɑ̀, kí Bet Arɑn døøg ki gerø yi gøl Gɑd.
Kɑ Kicbön, kí Eleɑlè, kí Kiriɑtɑim, kí Nebö, kí Bɑɑl Meon (nyingɑni ɑ́wil), kí Sibmɑ̀, ge døøg ki gerø yi gøl Ruben. Kɑ̈dd-ɑ ɑ́døøg ki gerø yi gen, ɑ́cɑ̈ggi yi gen ki nying mø nyɑ̈n.
Kɑ gøl Mɑkir wɑ̈d Mɑnɑsè Gilyɑd mɑnye, kɑ tyëng Amör møg-ɑ ɑ́ying yije cyedde, kɑ pëgg-ɑ yije.
Codhe, ɑmëggi gøl Mɑkir Gilyɑd yi Mosɑ̀, kɑ gølɑni pëgg-ɑ yije.
Akedh Yɑir wɑ̈d Mɑnɑsè, kɑ ómɑ̈gø kí myërr møøgø, ɑcɑge myërrɑni gɑ “Myërri Yɑir.”
Kɑ Nöbɑ̀ ókedhø, ɑpɑ̈ɑ̈re kömi kɑɑl Kenɑth kɑ gø mɑge. Acɑge gøn ɑ́ Nöbɑ̀ ni nyinge.
Møg-ɑ bï ek bɑ nyingi kɑ̈jj-ɑ ɑ́guddi yi Isrɑil kì yij wɑ̈nh-ɑ ɑ́cyɑ̈dhi gen ge pyejj-ɑ yi Mosɑ̀ geki Aɑron, keny-ɑ ɑ́bëën gen wɑ̈g kì Rïp.
Mosɑ̀ ɑ́ceg kɑ köbbø yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kinni i nyi gwede nyingi keny-ɑ nyi guddi yi gen, codhe ɑ nyi gwede gøn.
Tyëng Isrɑil ɑ́dhwödh kì Rɑmsis kì pyɑ̈rø wïdɑ́bïïj cyɑ̈nggi kyeel dwɑ̈tt kì yij run. Ge ɑ́dhwödh-ɑ cyɑ̈ng-ɑ bɑng Kwëër Ákɑɑdh mi tyeli mɑl, e pëthi gen pɑ lïngø ngö ge onennø yi tyëng Rïp.
Tyëng Rïp ɑ́bëëd ge kony-ɑ kɑyyi gen møg-ɑ ɑ́nɑ̈g yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, be nyodhi kinni Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j teg kibøli jwöggi Rïp.
Tyëng Isrɑil ɑ́dhwödh kì Rɑmsis kɑ ge gudd-ɑ Suköth.
Adhwödh gen kì Suköth kɑ ge gudd-ɑ Ethɑm kì tøg ryɑng.
Adhwödh gen kì Ethɑm ge døøg-ɑ Pi Akiröth, ɑ bøli Bɑɑl Dhepön, kɑ ge gudd-ɑ buti Migdöl.
Adhwödh gen kì Pi Akiröth, kɑ Nɑɑm Omeli Kwɑrø bɑ̈ɑ̈n gen ge töng-ɑ Ryɑɑng Cur, kɑ ge ócyɑ̈dhø ki cyɑ̈ng ɑ́dɑ̈g, ɑgud gen kì Mɑrɑ̀,
Kɑ ge odhwödhø kì Mɑrɑ̀, ɑguddi gen Elïm, mɑ́ kenyɑni ɑ́dɑ nyingi pï pyɑ̈rø wïdɑ́ryew kí yenh benø pyɑ̈r ɑ́bïryew.
Adhwödh gen kì Elïm, kɑ ge gudd-ɑ buti Gøøli Sowes.
Adhwödh gen kì kenyɑni kɑ ge gudd-ɑ Ryɑɑng Sin.
Adhwödh gen kì Ryɑɑng Sin kɑ ge gudd-ɑ Döpkɑ̀,
ɑdhwödh gen kì Döpkɑ̀ kɑ ge gudd-ɑ Aluc.
Adhwödh gen kì Aluc, kɑ ge gudd-ɑ Repïdïm, kɑ ji ojɑdø kì kenyɑni ki pï møg mɑdh yi gen.
Adhwödh gen kì Repïdïm, kɑ gudd-ɑ Ryɑɑng Sinɑy,
Adhwödh gen kì Ryɑɑng Sinɑy, kɑ ge gudd-ɑ Kibröt Tɑɑbɑ̀.
Adhwödh gen kì Kibröt Tɑɑbɑ̀, kɑ ge gudd-ɑ Adheröth.
Adhwödh gen kì Adheröth, kɑ ge gudd-ɑ Ritmɑ̀.
Adhwödh gen kì Ritmɑ̀, kɑ ge gudd-ɑ Rimön Peredh.
Adhwödh gen kì Rimön Peredh, kɑ ge gudd-ɑ Libnɑ̀.
Adhwödh gen kì Libnɑ̀, kɑ ge gudd-ɑ Risɑ̀.
Adhwödh gen kì Risɑ̀, kɑ ge gudd-ɑ Kelɑtɑ̀.
Adhwödh gen kì Kelɑtɑ̀, kɑ ge gudd-ɑ Kïti Cɑper.
Adhwödh gen kì Kïti Cɑper, kɑ ge gudd-ɑ Kɑrɑdɑ̀.
Adhwödh gen kì Kɑrɑdɑ̀, kɑ ge gudd-ɑ Mɑkelöt.
Adhwödh gen kì Mɑkelöt, kɑ ge gudd-ɑ Tɑɑt.
Adhwödh gen kì Tɑɑt, kɑ ge gudd-ɑ Terɑ̀.
Adhwödh gen kì Terɑ̀, kɑ ge gudd-ɑ Mitkɑ̀.
Adhwödh gen kì Mitkɑ̀, kɑ ge gudd-ɑ Acmönɑ̀.
Adhwödh gen kì Acmönɑ̀, kɑ ge gudd-ɑ Moseröt.
Adhwödh gen kì Moseröt, kɑ ge gudd-ɑ Beni Yɑɑkɑn.
Adhwödh gen kì Beni Yɑɑkɑn, kɑ ge gudd-ɑ Agidgɑd.
Adhwödh gen kì Agidgɑd, kɑ ge gudd-ɑ Yotbɑthɑ̀.
Adhwödh gen kì Yotbɑthɑ̀, kɑ ge gudd-ɑ Abrönɑ̀.
Adhwödh gen kì Abrönɑ̀, kɑ ge gudd-ɑ Edhïön Geber.
Adhwödh gen kì Edhïön Geber, kɑ ge gudd-ɑ yij pɑ̈ɑ̈l Dhin, ɑ cwøl ɑ́ Kɑdic.
Adhwödh gen kì Gɑdic, kɑ ge gudd-ɑ Kïti Ör, kì tøg piny Edöm.
Kɑ ókwërø Aɑron yedh-ɑ wïj Kïti Ör ni kɑ ɑ́kwøbii yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, kɑ thøw-ɑ kunɑni kì pyɑ̈r ɑ́ngween runni bëëni tyëng Isrɑil wɑ̈g kì Rïp, kì kyeel cyɑ̈nggi bïïj dwɑ̈tt.
Aɑron ɑ́thøw kì wïj Kïti Ör e runne bɑ miyø kí pyɑ̈r ɑ́ryew wïdɑ́dɑ̈g.
Adhwödh tyëng Isrɑil kì Kïti Ör, kɑ ge gudd-ɑ Dhɑlmönɑ̀,
Adhwödh gen kì Dhɑlmönɑ̀, kɑ ge gudd-ɑ Punön.
Adhwödh gen kì Punön, kɑ ge gudd-ɑ Oböth.
Adhwödh gen kì Oböth, kɑ ge gudd-ɑ Wïj Abɑrïm kì myërri Moɑb.
Adhwödh gen kì wïj Abɑrïm, kɑ ge gudd-ɑ Dïbön Gɑd.
Adhwödh gen kì Dïbön Gɑd, kɑ ge gudd-ɑ Almön Diblɑtɑim.
Adhwödh gen kì Almön Diblɑtɑim, kɑ ge gudd-ɑ Kïti Abɑrïm kì buti Kïti Nebö.
Adhwödh gen kì Kïti Abɑrïm, kɑ ge gudd-ɑ thwøri Moɑb, kì kömi Nɑm Urdun, kì bøli Yerikö.
Kɑɑl gen ɑ́gur yi gen e bɑ ɑmyer kì kömi Nɑm Urdun, cɑg kì Bet Yecimöth gïti Abel Cithïm kì Thwøri Moɑb.
Kɑ Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j okööbø geki Mosɑ̀ kì Thwøri Moɑb kì kömi Nɑm Urdun, Mosɑ̀ ɑ́köbbe kinni,
“Köbbí tyëng Isrɑil kinni, keny-ɑ óbɑ̈ɑ̈n wun Nɑm Urdun, wu kedh-ɑ piny Kɑnɑɑn,
cyeddi wun tyëng-ɑ bëëdø kì pinyɑni. Kɑ ngïjji jwöggi gen møg-ɑ ótwegø gɑ kïttì, kí møg-ɑ ókønyø gɑ ngyëny tørri wun, kɑ yïkki gen geki kenggi gen cøør wun piny.
Kwɑnyu pinyɑni kɑ wu pëggu yije, mɑ́ pinyɑni ɑ́mëggɑ wun ɑ́ mi wun.
Pɑ̈ngi piny e leng kɑ wél, pɑ̈ngi ɑ́ wɑ̈thi kɑ̈llì; wïj gøl-ɑ dwøng nyi mëggi piny me dwøng, kɑ wïj gøl-ɑ thinh nyi mëggi piny me thinh.
De keløg tyëng-ɑ bëëdø kì pinyɑni pɑ cyeddi yi wun, møg-ɑ ówiy yi wun kì kelli gen óni wél kì nyingi wun, kɑ ge nɑ koodh kì nyingi ngëddi wun, wu ójud yi gen ki liny.
Keløg ge pɑ cyeddi yi wun, wu óryɑ̈g yi yɑn ni kɑ ɑ́dwɑddɑ ryɑ̈gi gen.”
Kɑ Mosɑ̀ köbbi yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kinni,
“Ceg tyëng Isrɑil; köbbí gen kinni keny-ɑ ókedhu Kɑnɑɑn, piny-ɑ mëggɑ wun, piny Kɑnɑɑn bëne,
Kew kì kuni wɑɑng wurlwɑl cɑ̈g-ɑ́ɑ̀ pɑ̈ɑ̈l Dhin e kɑ̈ll-ɑ tøg piny Edöm, keew wun kì kuni wɑɑng wurlwɑl cɑ̈g-ɑ́ɑ̀ tøg Luuy Omelø kì wɑɑng cyɑ̈ɑ̈ng mwøl.
Codhe, o kewɑni pödhe wɑɑng cyɑ̈ɑ̈ng mwøl e kedh-ɑ Ókømi Akrɑbïm,
o ree løge kì Adhmön kì keew Rïp, o thøwe Nɑɑm Omeli Tɑr.
“Kew men-ɑ wɑɑng cyɑ̈ɑ̈ng böörø bɑ Nɑɑm Omeli Tɑr.
“Kew men-ɑ wɑɑng wuudø cɑ̈g-ɑ́ɑ̀ Nɑɑm Omeli Tɑr gïti Kïti Ör.
O cɑ̈ge kì kenyɑni gïti Yuu-ɑ töngi Amɑth e pödh-ɑ Dhedɑd,
gïti Dhiprön, o thøwe kì Adhɑr Einɑn.
“Kew kì wɑɑng cyɑ̈ɑ̈ng mwøl cɑ̈g-ɑ́ɑ̀ Adhɑr Einɑn gïti Cepɑm.
Kewɑni cɑ̈g-ɑ́ɑ̀ Arbel kì bøli Ain kì wɑɑng cyɑ̈ɑ̈ng mwøl, e pödh-ɑ kelli kïtt-ɑ thønhø kì kömi Tɑɑy Gɑlelì kì wɑɑng cyɑ̈ɑ̈ng mwøl,
codhe o tönge kuni wɑɑng wurlwɑl gïti Nɑm Urdun e pödh-ɑ Luuy Omelø.
“Møgɑk bene gen keww ɑ́ngwen mø piny wun.”
Gøl Ruben kí gøl Gɑd geki budi gøl Mɑnɑsè ɑ́rum ki mëggi piny gen, ɑ́pɑ̈ngi e røøm ki kɑ̈lli wëëg gen,
kì løøg Nɑm Urdun kì wɑɑng cyɑ̈ɑ̈ng mwøl kì bøli Yerikö.”
Kɑ Mosɑ̀ köbbi yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kinni,
“Piny ópɑ̈ngi kì kelli ji yi ókwërø Eliɑdhɑr geki Jöcwø wɑ̈d Nun.
Kɑ yï kɑ̈bbí thyew ki dhɑnhø me køny gen kì wɑ̈thi kɑ̈llì; dhɑnhø ɑ́kyel kì wïj kɑl.”
Bene gen jøg-ɑ ɑ́kwɑny yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j ek:
Yeudɑ̀
Kɑlib wɑ̈d Yepunɑ̀
Cimeøn
Celumeil wɑ̈d Amiud
Ben Yɑmïn
Elidɑd wɑ̈d Kislön
Dɑn
Bukì wɑ̈d Yoglì
Mɑnɑsè
Aniel wɑ̈d Epöd
Eprɑim
Kemuel wɑ̈d Ciptɑn
Dhebulun
Elidhɑpɑn wɑ̈d Pɑrnɑk
Isɑkɑr
Pɑltiel wɑ̈d Adhɑn
Aceer
Akiud wɑ̈d Celömì
Nɑptɑlì
Pedɑel wɑ̈d Amiud
Bene gen jøg-ɑ ɑ́kwɑny yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, o ge pɑ̈ngi gen piny kì kelli tyëng Isrɑil ɑgɑk, kì yij piny Kɑnɑɑn.
“Ceg tyëng Isrɑil kinni, nëngi gen Kwɑrri Leebì ki kɑ̈dd kì piny-ɑ ópɑ̈dhi ki gen, kɑ ge nëngi thyew ki cɑ̈mmi dhög kì bɑdhhi kɑ̈ddɑni.
Kɑ̈ddɑni óbëëdø gɑ mø Kwɑrri Leebì, o bene yethi gïn ɑ óbëëd yi gen. O cɑ̈mmi dhög ócyɑ̈ɑ̈m-ɑ yi dhögi gen geki jɑmmi gen møg-ɑ kyeelø.
Piny-ɑ wiy ɑ́ cɑ̈mmi dhög kì bɑdhhi kɑɑl kì ngɑ̈ɑ̈j dörø, cöddi cyɑ̈n kɑ mïtïr miy ɑ́ngwen kí pyɑ̈r ɑ́bïj, kì wɑ̈thi tùng bënn,
o bëëd e dɑ piny me bɑ ɑ́bɑ̈rø, lɑ̈je bɑ mïtïr miy ɑ́bïngwen kì wɑ̈thi tùng bënn, kí kɑɑl kì dyëre.
Kɑ Kwɑrri Leebì nëngi wun ki kɑ̈dd ɑ́bïkyel møg yethi gen nyi yömmi yi ngɑn nɑ̈g dhɑnhø e ceg-ɑ gwɑ̈nyø. Kɑ ge nëngu thyew ki kɑ̈dd pyɑ̈r ɑ́ngwen wïdɑ́ryew møøgø,
kí cɑ̈mmi dhög mø gen, o kwɑnni kɑ̈ddɑni bënn göög gen ki pyɑ̈r ɑ́ngwen wïdɑ́bïdɑ̈g.
Kwɑnni kɑ̈dd-ɑ mëggi Kwɑrri Leebì yi wïj kɑl ɑ́kyel, kwɑɑn-ɑ ri döngi piny gølɑni.”
Kɑ Mosɑ̀ köbbi yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, i köbbe tyëng Isrɑil kinni,
“Keny-ɑ óbɑ̈ɑ̈n wun Nɑm Urdun, kɑ wu kedh-ɑ piny Kɑnɑɑn,
kɑ wu kɑ̈bbi wun ki kɑ̈ddi yömmø, møg yethi gen nyi pɑ̈ɑ̈r yi ngɑn nɑ̈g dhɑnhø, e ceg-ɑ gwɑ̈nyø.
Bëëde kì kunɑni e lɑ̈wi ki wɑddi ngɑn-ɑ ɑ́nɑ̈g yi en, møg dwɑddi nɑ̈ɑ̈gii kej wɑɑd gen. Ko di ngɑn nɑ̈g dhɑnhø e gønye nuti lidhø kì bøli teedø.
Kɑ̈bbi wun ki kɑ̈dd ɑ́bïkyel;
ɑ́dɑ̈g kì løøg Nɑm Urdun kì wɑɑng cyɑ̈ɑ̈ng mwøl, kí ɑ́dɑ̈g kì piny Kɑnɑɑn.
Møgɑni óbëëdø gɑ kɑ̈ddi yömmø yi tyëng Isrɑil geki tyëngpɑth møg-ɑ bëëdø kì Isrɑil. Ngɑn nɑ̈gi ki dhɑnhø e ceg-ɑ gwɑ̈nyø, renge yij kɑɑl ɑ́kyel kì kelli kɑ̈ddɑni.
“Ngɑn gøj dhɑnhø ki gïjø me bɑ ngyënyø dødø, kɑ ngɑn-ɑ ɑ́gøj othøø, nɑ̈ɑ̈g ngɑn-ɑ ɑ́göjji.
Ngɑn gøj dhɑnhø ki gïjø me bɑ kït, kɑ ngɑn-ɑ ɑ́gøj othøø, nɑ̈ɑ̈g ngɑn-ɑ ɑ́göjji.
Nɑ ngɑn gøj dhɑnhø kí lodh, kɑ ngɑn-ɑ ɑ́gøj othøø, nɑ̈ɑ̈g ngɑn-ɑ ɑ́göjji.
Nɑ̈ɑ̈g ngɑn-ɑ ɑ́nɑ̈g dhɑnhø yi ngɑn-ɑ́ wɑɑd gen ɑ́nɑ̈g. Nɑ̈ge gøn ceth keny-ɑ óyode gøn.
“Keløg dhɑnhø mɑɑn-ɑ ngɑn megø, kɑ ngɑn-ɑ mɑɑn yi en cøøre piny, wɑlɑ̀ köme leenge’ gïjø megø kɑ othøø,
wɑlɑ̀ gø gøj en kɑ cinge kipe kɑ̀ mɑɑne gøn, kɑ ngɑnɑni othøø, nɑ̈ɑ̈g ngɑn-ɑ ɑ́nɑ̈g dhɑnhø. Nɑ̈ɑ̈g ngɑn-ɑ ɑ́nɑ̈g dhɑnhø yi ngɑn-ɑ́ wɑɑd gen ɑ́nɑ̈g. Nɑ̈ge gøn ceth keny-ɑ óyode gøn.
“De ngɑn nɑ̈g dhɑnhø e ceg-ɑ gwɑ̈nyø, o bong mɑ̈ɑ̈nø me ying kɑɑm gen, ying gø cøør en piny, wɑlɑ̀ köme pɑ̈dh-ɑ yi gïjø megø,
wɑlɑ̀ kït ɑ bodh kɑ pɑ̈dh-ɑ köme kɑ ókɑ̈nø ki thøø,
liidh møgɑni yi burø, e cwɑɑg-ɑ́ ngɑn-ɑ ɑ́nɑ̈g dhɑnhø, de pɑth ki wɑɑd ngɑn-ɑ ɑ́thøw.

Koor ngɑn-ɑ ɑ́nɑ̈g dhɑnhø yi teedø; ko wëggi nɑ̈gø yi ngɑn-ɑ́ wɑɑd gen ɑ́nɑ̈g. Kɑ wiy døøge be bëëdø kì kɑɑl-ɑ́ yije ɑ́yömme. Bëëde kì kunɑni gïti keny-ɑ óthøw Ókwër-ɑ Dwøng, codhe, o dwööge pinye cyee.
Keløg ngɑn-ɑ ɑ́nɑ̈g dhɑnhø bï-ɑ wɑ̈g kì kɑɑl-ɑ́ yije ɑ́yömme,
kɑ yod yi wɑɑd ngɑn-ɑ ɑ́nɑ̈g yi en, nɑ̈g yi wɑɑd ngɑn-ɑ ɑ́nɑ̈ge, cönge pɑ col.
Bëëd ngɑn-ɑ ɑ́nɑ̈gi ki dhɑnhø kì kɑɑl-ɑ́ yije ɑ́yömme ceth, bëëde kì kunɑni gïti keny-ɑ óthøw Ókwër-ɑ Dwøng men-ɑ́ ree ɑ́cwöb møgɑni, othøw ókwërɑni, codhe o dwööge pinye cyee.
Møg bɑ ciggi gøny, mïdhu gen ceth wuki kwɑrri wun kì keny-ɑ bëëd yi wun.
Nɑ̈ɑ̈g ngɑn-ɑ tir dhɑnhø ki nɑ̈gø. Ngɑn-ɑ ɑ́nɑ̈g yi en ko col kipe kinni o ngɑn-ɑ ɑ́nɑ̈gii wiy; nɑ̈g ceth.
Keløg dhɑnhø reng-ɑ kɑɑl me yömme, ko wëggi wun col ki gïïpiny kipe kinni o dwööge pinye, e Ókwër-ɑ Dwøng nuti thøø.
Ke gwøg wun gïn ni menɑni, wu bwöl-ɑ piny-ɑ yije bëëd yi wun. Piny nyii bwölø yi nɑ̈gi dhɑnhø, bong guög me cuggi gwøgø kipe kinni o dhïwe, eni keny-ɑ ɑ́nɑ̈ɑ̈g dhɑnhø.
Piny-ɑ bëëd yi wun ko bwöl wun, mɑ́ yɑn, Yɑ Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, yɑ bëëd ɑ kelli tyëng Isrɑil.”
Jø gøl Gilyɑd wɑ̈d Mɑkir wɑ̈d Mɑnɑsè, wɑ̈d Yosep, ge ɑ́kedhi yï Mosɑ̀ geki jɑgg-ɑ kyeelø,
kɑ ge okööbø kinni, “Yï ɑ́köbbi yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kinni i pɑ̈ngí piny kì kelli tyëng Isrɑil, e leng kɑ wél. Yï ɑ́köbbe thyew kinni i mëggí nyigi Dhelopekɑd ówï wøn piny wïyi gen.
De lidh, keløg ge onywømø kì kɑl megø, pinyɑni ceg-ɑ gwøg ki mi gøl-ɑ ɑ́nyömi, kɑ piny-ɑ ɑ́mëggi wøn ónungø.
Keny-ɑ óbëën Runi Dwöggø, piny Dhelopekɑd kedh-ɑ yï gøl-ɑ nywøm nyige, o pɑ yod yi wøn këti.”
Codhe ɑmuuj cigg møg yi Mosɑ̀ ge kɑ̈ɑ̈l-ɑ yï Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kinni, “Møg-ɑ kømmi yi gøl Mɑnɑsè bɑ dyër,
bene ɑ pere kööb Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kinni, nyigi Dhelopekɑd ócuggø nywømø yi cwøw-ɑ dwɑddi yi gen, de nywøøm gen yi kwɑrri Mɑnɑsè kweyi gen.
Piny-ɑ muuj ɑ́ mi wïj kɑl kì Isrɑil cög ɑ́ mi gølɑni ceth.
Nyɑndhɑjø men lɑ̈gi ki piny kì Isrɑil nywøm yi wïj gøl gen ceth, keny-ɑ ógwøøgii kinøw, ji ólɑg piny-ɑ bɑ mi kweyi gen kì Isrɑil,
o piny kɑl nyi cöge ɑ́ mee ceth.”
Kɑ møg-ɑ ɑ́köbbi Mosɑ̀ yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j gwøg ceth yi nyigi Dhelopekɑd,
Kɑ woɑni Mɑklɑ̀, Tirdhɑ̀, kí Oglɑ̀, kí Milkɑ̀ kí Nöö nywøm yi nyiiwï gen.
Ge ɑ́nywøm yi kwɑrri Mɑnɑsè wɑ̈d Yosep, kɑ piny gen ocögø ɑ́ mi wïj gøl gen.
Møgɑk bene gen cigg geki kwöng møg-ɑ ɑ́cïgi tyëng Isrɑil yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j ki dhø Mosɑ̀, kì thwøri Moɑb, kì kömi Nɑm Urdun, kì bøli Yerikö.

Møg-ɑ yij wɑ̈nyø men, bɑ kwøbb-ɑ ɑ́köbbi tyëng Isrɑil bënn yi Mosɑ̀, keny-ɑ ɑ́ying gen yij pɑ̈l kì kömi Nɑm Urdun kì wɑɑng cyɑ̈ɑ̈ng mwøl. Ge ɑ́ying-ɑ Töör Urdun kì buti Sup, kɑɑm Pɑrɑn kì tuung, geki kɑ̈ddi Töpel, Lɑbɑn, Kɑdheröt, kí Didhɑɑb kì tung-ɑ kyeelø.
(Bɑ cyɑ̈ng pyɑ̈rø wïdɑ́kyel ɑ nyi tyëg dhɑnhø ócyɑ̈dhø, e dhwödh ɑ Kïti Sinɑy e kedh-ɑ Kɑdic Berniyɑ̀ ki yuu myërri kïtti Edöm).
Kì cyɑ̈ng-ɑ mɑl, kì pyɑ̈rø wïdɑ́kyeel dwɑ̈tt, kì pyɑ̈r ɑ́ngween runni bëëni tyëng Isrɑil wɑ̈g kì Rïp, ɑ ɑ́köbbi tyëng Isrɑil bënn yi Mosɑ̀ ki møg-ɑ ɑ́ceg yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j bënn i köbbe gï gen,
kì bɑng keny-ɑ ɑ́rume ki tyɑmi Rɑ̈dh Sïön rɑ̈ɑ̈dh tyëng Amör, ɑ bëëdø kì Kicbön geki Og rɑ̈ɑ̈dh Bɑcɑn, ɑ ɑ́jyɑ̈ɑ̈g kì kɑ̈ddi Actɑröth kí Edrey.
Bɑ løøg Nɑm Urdun kì wɑɑng cyɑ̈ɑ̈ng mwøl kì piny Moɑb, ɑ ɑ́lwøøb Ciggi Jwøk yi Mosɑ̀ kidøøj, gï kwene kwenø, geki møg-ɑ pwönyi yi ciggɑni bënn.
Ákööb kinni,
“Keny-ɑ ɑ́ying wɑ Kïti Sinɑy, wɑ ɑ́köbbi yi Jwøgee, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kinni, ‘Wu ɑ́bëëd ki keny me bɑ̈ɑ̈r kì buti kït men.

Puth wun kɑɑl, kɑ wu kedhu bøli wun. Kedhu myërri kïtti Amör kì Töör Urdun, kí myërri kelli kïttì geki myërri thwørø, kí myërr-ɑ wɑɑng wurlwɑl geki myërri kömi Nɑɑm Omeli Tɑr. Kedhu piny Kɑnɑɑn geki myërri ngɑ̈thi kïtti Lubnɑn. Kɑ wu kedh wun gïti kömi Nɑm Porɑt.
Pinyɑni bëne, bene en piny-ɑ ɑ́kwøb yi yɑn cøn, yɑ Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kinni ómëggɑ kweyyi wun, Abrɑhɑm, kí Isɑɑk, kí Yɑgob geki kwɑrri gen. Kedh wun, kwɑny wun en.’ ”
“Kɑ wu köbbɑ keny-ɑ́ nudd wɑ ying-ɑ Ryɑɑng Sinɑy kinni, ‘Wu pɑ lwɑ̈ng yi yɑn ki jɑɑgø yɑ ketɑ.
Jwøøg wun, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, wu ɑ́gwøge wu ngenyø ni kyelli mɑl.
Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, ɑ bɑ Jwøøg kweyyi wun, kwɑnni wun ómed yi en ki tyel ɑ́lïp, kɑ kej wun gwøge o dönye ceth, ni kɑ ɑ́kwøbe gøn!
De men-ɑ́ yɑn, yɑ ketɑ, gønyyi wun ólwɑ̈ng yi yɑn kidï ki lidhø?
Kɑ̈bbi wun ki jøg mø wɑ̈thi gen pel, ge ngɑ̈ny kwøb o ge dïdø, nyi kwɑɑny dhɑnhø ɑ́kyel kì wïj kɑl, o ge gwøgɑ gɑ jɑggi wun.’
Kɑ wu oyïëyø kinni møgɑni døøj.

Codhe, ɑkwɑnyɑ jøg-ɑ wɑ̈thi gen pel, ɑ ngɑ̈ny kwøb, jøg-ɑ ɑ́yieny yi wun, kɑ ge gwøgɑ gɑ jɑggi wun. Kwï gen jɑɑg-ɑ ji ɑ́lïp, møøgø jɑɑg-ɑ ji miyø, møøgø jɑɑg-ɑ pyɑ̈r ɑ́bïj, møøgø jɑɑg-ɑ ji pyɑ̈rø, kɑ yɑ ókɑ̈bbø thyew ki jyɑ̈ggi wɑ̈thi kɑ̈lli wun.
“Ge ɑ́köbbɑ kì bøli kenyɑni kinni, ‘Nyi lïngi wun gønyyi jii wun, kɑ kwøbbɑni nyi løøg wun. Nyi løøg wun gøny kidøøj, ying dhɑnhø gönyø kɑ wɑɑd gen, wɑlɑ̀ geki wëdh ɑ gönyø.

Nyi løøgu kwøb yethi wun bong geny, mïdhu ji ge pɑ̈r, cɑgg ge løg møg wɑlɑ̀ møg. Ko di dhɑnhø me böggi yi wun, mɑ́ lögg-ɑ løøg yi wun kɑ̈ɑ̈l-ɑ yï Jwøk. Ke di gøny me teeg, e dhɑl-ɑ wun, muuju en yɑn, óløøg yi yɑn.’
Wu ɑ́cegɑ thyew kipe gïg-ɑ kyeelø møg-ɑ ɑ́gøggi yi wun.
“Aköbbi wɑ yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kinni i dhwödh wɑ. Kɑ wɑ odhwödhø kì buti Kïti Sinɑy, wɑ bɑ̈ɑ̈n-ɑ ryɑng-ɑ dwøng, ryɑng-ɑ ceg ki böggø, wɑ kedh-ɑ myërri kïtti tyëng Amör. Kɑ wɑ wɑ̈dh-ɑ Kɑdic Berniyɑ̀,

ɑköbbɑ wun kinni, ‘Anɑn wu ɑ́wɑ̈nhi myërri kïtti tyëng Amör, piny-ɑ ɑ́mëggi wɑ yi Jwøgee, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, ɑ bɑ Jwøøg kweyyee. Kedh wun, kwɑny wun en ni kɑ ɑ́kööb Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, wu ko lyebbi wɑlɑ̀ wu ko böggi.’
“De yɑ ɑ́köbbi yi wun kinni, ‘Wiy wɑ öd wɑ ki ji møg lyeew pinyɑni møti, o wɑ ónyudhi yi gen ki yuu-ɑ ókɑ̈ɑ̈l yi wɑ, o kɑ̈ddi gen lidh, mɑ bëëd gen kidï.’
“Kwøbbɑni ɑ́nënni ge døøj, ɑkɑ̈bbɑ ki jøg-ɑ cwøw pyɑ̈rø wïdɑ́ryew kì wɑ̈thi kɑ̈lli wun bënn, wïj gøl ki dhɑnhø.
Kɑ ge kedh-ɑ myërri kelli kïttì, gïti kɑ ɑ́wɑ̈dhi gen Töör Acköl, kɑ yije yɑb yi gen.
Kɑ ge ódwöögø ge ókɑ̈ddø ki nywøli yenhi pinyɑni, ge okööbø kinni, ‘Piny-ɑ mëggi wɑ yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, bɑ piny me lɑ̈be med cɑrø.’
Wu ɑ́yöd wu ceg-ɑ gøny keti wun kinni ‘Wɑ mɑɑn yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j! Wɑ ɑ́kɑ̈ɑ̈le wɑ̈g kì Rïp kɑ per kinni, o wɑ cïbe cinggi tyëng Amör, o wɑ nɑ̈g yi gen.

Wɑ kedhi kunɑni kɑ per ngø, e wɑ óböggø?’ Kɑ jøg-ɑ ɑ́ör yi wɑ okööbø kinni i tyëng pönhɑni teg, o ge bɑ̈rrø kibølee, i kɑ̈ddi gen bɑ ɑger ki dör mø wɑ̈dhi mɑl, o tyëng pönhɑni bɑ kwɑrri Anɑk, ge ceg bëëdø gɑ jödd bënn!’
“De wu ɑ́köbbɑ kinni, ‘Wu ko böggi yi jiɑni.
Jwøøg wun, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j ɑ cyɑ̈dhi kì bøli wun, ónyïɑ̈ggi kiper wun, ni kɑ ɑ́nyïɑ̈gge kiper wun kì Rïp, kɑ lidh yi wun ki nyingi wun.
Kɑ lidh yi wun ki kër-ɑ ɑ́kɑ̈lle wun kì yij pɑ̈l, wu kwɑgge’ kwɑggø ni wɑ̈d, gïti kɑ ɑ́wɑ̈nhi wun keny.’
De Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j nuti gɑ̈nø yi wun, ngö møgɑni ngɑ̈nyi yi wun ge bënn,
e men-ɑ́ en, nyi cyɑ̈dh-ɑ́ɑ̀ bøli wun, o wu yɑ̈bbe ki keny guddi yi wun ki kɑɑl. Nyi cyɑ̈dhi kì bøli wun ɑ́ lööj mɑc kì wɑ̈r, o bɑ lööj pøølø kì dicɑ̈ng e nyodh-ɑ yöö.
‘Bong dhɑnhø ɑ́kyel kì kelli wun, wu rïny-ɑ rɑj èn, men-ɑ ókedhi pinyɑni, piny-ɑ lɑ̈be med, piny-ɑ ɑ́kwøbɑ cøn kinni ómëggɑ kweyyi wun.
Dɑ́ Kɑlib wɑ̈d Yepunɑ̀ kete ɑ ókedhi pinyɑni. En ɑ ɑ́mïdhi kwøbbɑ, o piny-ɑ ɑ́lyeewe ómëggɑ en geki wɑ̈dde.’
O ki gööj wun thyew, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j pyëwe ɑ́rënyi ki yɑn, ɑkööbe kinni, ‘Cɑgg ɑ́ yïn thyew Mosɑ̀, yï pɑ kedhi pinyɑni.
De cïj Jöcwø wɑ̈d Nun, nyel-ɑ nyi køny yïn, bɑ en ɑ ópeej Isrɑil be kwɑnyi pinyɑni.’

“Codhe, ɑköbbi wɑ bënn yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kinni, ‘Nyigi wun møg-ɑ nudd ge thønhø, ɑ kwïj gïnrɑj kí gïndøj, gen ɑ ókedhi pinyɑni; gen ɑ nywøl-ɑ ɑ́kwøb yi wun kinni i ge ómɑg yi tyëngmɑ̈ɑ̈nø. Pinyɑni ómëggɑ gen, o ókwɑny yi gen ceth.
De wun, løg wun ri wun, kɑ wu kedhu yij pɑ̈l, wu døøg-ɑ kuni Gøøli Agɑbɑ̀.’

“Kɑ wu ólöggø kinni, ‘Mosɑ̀, wø ɑ́røngi kì bøli Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j. De ɑnɑn wø kedh-ɑ be nyɑɑg ni kɑ ɑ́kööb Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j.’ Akwɑny wun jɑmmi liny, wu orumø kinni i mɑgi myërri kelli kïttì óbëëd e yööd.
“De Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j yɑ ɑ́köbbe kinni, ‘Kyëddí gen, ge ko kedhi be nyɑɑg, mɑ́ yɑ koo ying me nud kì kelli gen, keløg ge ókedh, ge pɑ tyɑ̈mø.’
Møg-ɑ ɑ́kwøb yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j ɑ́köbbɑ wun ceth, de wu nuti lïngø. Dhøg Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j ɑ́pyem wun, kɑ wu kedh-ɑ myërri kelli kïttì wu ótøllø.
Codhe, kɑ tyëng Amör møg-ɑ bëëdø kì kelli kïttɑni wøøw-ɑ kelli wun ni kïc. Kɑ wu cyeddi yi gen, cɑg kì Seir gïti Órmɑ̀, wu pwööd ge’ piny.
Codhe, ɑywøøg wun kö Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, o wu køny yi en, de kwøbbi wun nuti lïngø yi en.
“Kɑ wɑ obëëdø kì Kɑdic ki keny me bɑ̈ɑ̈r.
“Codhe, ɑköbbi yɑn yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kinni,
‘Wu ɑ́tyëg-ɑ keny me bɑ̈ɑ̈r wu wen-ɑ kït men, løg wun wɑ̈thi wun wɑɑng wuudø.
Kɑ teedø köbbí kinni, ɑnɑn wu ɑ́cyɑ̈ngi ki kɑ̈li yethi myërri nyiimï wun, wɑ̈ddi Isøø. Ge óbwøg yi wun,
de wu ko nyïɑ̈ggi ki gen, mɑ́ wu pɑ nëngi yi yɑn kì ri piny gen, cɑgg ɑ́ men-ɑ́ keny cïb tyelø yøw. Pinyɑni ɑ́rum ki mëggi kwɑrri Isøø yi yɑn.
Ceg wun ngyew ki gïncɑm geki pï kì yï gen.’

“Nyi pɑrru kër-ɑ ɑ́gyëëdh wun yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, kì ri gïg-ɑ gøggi yi wun bënn. Wu ɑ́korre kì kɑɑm-ɑ ɑ́wïïn wun kì yij pɑ̈l-ɑ lɑɑj èn. Wu ɑ́konge ki runn pyɑ̈r ɑ́ngwen, kɑ bong-ɑ gïjø mɑ ɑ́jɑ̈ddi wun.
“Codhe ɑdhwödh wɑ, wɑ kyëj-ɑ nyiimïee kwɑrri Isøø, wɑ bɑ̈ɑ̈n-ɑ yuu-ɑ kedhi Luuy Omelø, e pödh-ɑ Elɑth geki Edhïön Geber, ɑløg wɑ wɑ̈thee wɑɑng wuudø kì kuni wɑɑng cyɑ̈ɑ̈ng mwøl, wɑ kedh-ɑ Moɑb.
Kɑ yɑ köbbi yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kinni, ‘Tyëng Moɑb kwɑrri Lot ko nywɑl wun, wɑlɑ̀ wu ko nyïɑ̈ggi ki gen, mɑ́ wu pɑ nëngi yi yɑn kì ri piny gen, ge ɑ́mëggɑ Kɑɑl Aɑr.’ ”
(Ádɑ ji mø bɑ jödd mø cwølli gɑ Emïm, ge ɑ́bëëd ɑ Aɑr, ge ɑ́bëëd ge bɑ̈rrø ni kwɑrri Anɑk.
Ge ɑ́cwølli gɑ Repɑim ni kwɑrri Anɑk, de ge nyi cwølli gɑ Emïm yi tyëng Moɑb.
Tyëng Kör ɑ́bëëd ɑ Edöm (Seir) de ge ɑ́cyeddi yi kwɑrri Isøø, kɑ kwɑrri Isøø pëgg-ɑ pinyɑni, ni tyëng Isrɑil kɑ ɑ́lony gen tyëngmɑ̈ɑ̈nø ki cyeddø, kɑ ge pëgg-ɑ piny gen.)
“Codhe, ɑbɑ̈ɑ̈n wɑ Dhøg Dhered ni kɑ ɑ́köbbi wɑ yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j.

Bɑ runn pyɑ̈r ɑ́dɑ̈g wïdɑ́bïdɑ̈g ɑ ɑ́pöödh, kër-ɑ ɑ́dhwödh wɑ kì Kɑdic Berniyɑ̀, gïti kɑ ɑ́bɑ̈ɑ̈n wɑ Dhøg Dhered. Kì bøli kenyɑni rïny-ɑ ɑ́bëëd gɑ jøliny rum thumø ki thøø bënn, ni kɑ ɑ́kööb Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j.
Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j ɑ́bëëd e cɑyy-ɑ gen ceth, gïti kɑ ɑ́tyëge gïn ki nɑ̈gø bënn.
“Keny-ɑ ɑ́rum gen ki thøø bënn,
ɑköbbi wɑ yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kinni,
‘Bɑ̈ɑ̈n wun piny Moɑb dicyɑ̈ngtïn wu kɑ̈l-ɑ yuu Aɑr.
Wu ócyɑ̈ngi ki kwɑrri Amön, ɑ løg Kwɑrri Lot. Ge ko nywɑl wun, wɑlɑ̀ wu ko nyïɑ̈ggi ki gen, kipe wu pɑ nëngi yi yɑn kì ri piny-ɑ ɑ́mëggɑ gen.’ ”
(Repɑim, bene nying-ɑ ɑ́bëëd ge nyi cwøl-ɑ tyëng-ɑ ɑ́bëëd kì pinyɑni, o ge cwølli yi tyëng Amön gɑ Dhɑmdhumïm.
Ge ɑ́bëëd ge bɑ̈rrø bënn ni kwɑrri Anɑk. Ge ɑ́bëëd ge gïïr, o ge bɑ jur me teeg cɑrø. De ge ɑ́ryɑ̈g yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kipe kinni, o pinyɑni kwɑny yi tyëng Amön, o ge pëggi gen yije.

Gïn ni menɑni ɑ ɑ́gwøg yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kipe tyëng Edöm, kwɑrri Isøø ɑ ɑ́bëëd kì Seir; tyëng Kör ɑ́ryɑ̈ge kipe kinni o piny gen kwɑny yi tyëng Edöm, kwɑrri Isøø, o ge pëggi gen yije, ɑ nudd ge bëëd ɑ kenyɑni ɑnɑn.
Piny-ɑ kömi Nɑɑm Omeli Tɑr, ɑ́bëëd-ɑ yi ji mɑ ɑ́kɑ̈ɑ̈l muji Kirit. Kɑ tyëng-ɑ ɑ́ying pinyɑni, ɑ løg tyëng Abɑ̀ nɑ̈g yi gen, ɑkwɑny gen piny gen bëne gïti Gɑdhɑ̀ kì wɑɑng wurlwɑl.)

“Kì bɑng kɑ ɑ́rum wɑ ki bɑ̈ɑ̈ni piny Moɑb, ɑköbbi wɑ yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kinni, ‘Anɑn, kedh wun, kɑ Nɑm Arnön bɑ̈ɑ̈n wun. Sïön rɑ̈ɑ̈dh tyëng Amör, ɑ jyɑ̈gø kì Kicbön, cïbɑ’ cinggi wun, geki pinye. Pɑ̈ɑ̈r wun köme, kɑ pinye kwɑny wun.
Cɑg dicyɑ̈ngtïn ceth, dhɑnhø bëne óløgɑ me böggi yi wun. Dhɑnhø bëne dële óceg okïr kenyi lïng gen kinni wu cyɑ̈ngø ki gen.’
“Codhe, ɑödɑ ki ji kì Kedemöth, yɑ öd-ɑ yï Rɑ̈dh Sïön kì Kicbön, yɑ kwɑjj-ɑ en kipe mër kinni,
‘Wiy wø kedh wøn wø bɑ̈ɑ̈n-ɑ pinyí. Wø ókedh wø bødh-ɑ yöö ceth.
Wø óceg ngyew ki gïncɑm geki pï kì yï wun. Wø dwɑdd-ɑ bɑ̈ɑ̈ni pinyí kete yøw,

gïti keny-ɑ óbɑ̈ɑ̈n wøn Nɑm Urdun, wø kedh-ɑ piny-ɑ ɑ́mëggi wøn yi Jwøøg wøn, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j. Kwɑrri Isøø møg-ɑ bëëdø kì Edöm, geki tyëng Moɑb møg-ɑ bëëdø kì Aɑr ɑ́rum ki yïëyø, kɑ piny gen bɑ̈ɑ̈n yi wøn.’
“De Rɑ̈dh Sïön wɑ ɑ́mɑ̈ɑ̈ne kɑ̈l yij pödhe. Ágöjji tegi wïj geki pëëmø yi Jwøøg wun, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, kipe kinni, o ótyɑm yi wɑ kɑ pinye kwɑny wɑ, ni kɑ̀ nudd e bëëd-ɑ yi wɑ ɑnɑn.
“Codhe, ɑköbbi yɑn yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kinni, ‘Wu ókøny yi yɑn ki tyɑmi Rɑ̈dh Sïön geki pödhe. Dhwödh wun, kedhu be kwɑnyi pinyɑni.’
Kɑ Sïön bï-ɑ be nyɑɑg ki wɑ geki yɑye bëne, kì buti Yɑɑ̈dh,
de ɑ́cïb cinggee yi Jwøgee, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, kɑ nɑ̈g yi wɑ geki wɑ̈dde kí jøge bënn.
Amɑg wɑ kɑ̈dde bënn, kɑ ge rënyi yi wɑ, kɑ dhɑnhø bëne nɑ̈g wɑ, mɑ̈nn, kí cwøw kí othønhø. Bong dhɑnhø mɑ ɑ́döng e onëënø.
Dhög ɑ́kwɑny yi wɑ, kɑ kɑ̈dd yɑg yi wɑ.
Cɑg kì Aröeer, kì tøg töör Arnön, kí kɑɑl-ɑ dïtörɑni gïti Gilyɑd. Bong kɑɑl dörø mɑ ɑ́döng e nuti cïb cinggee yi Jwøgee, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j.

De wɑ ɑ́cög wɑ nuti kedhi myërri kwɑrri Amön, o wɑ nuti wɑ̈dhi kömi Nɑm Yɑbok, kí myërri kelli kïttì, wɑlɑ̀ wɑ nuti kedhi kɑ̈jj-ɑ ɑ́kyëddi wɑ yi Jwøgee, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kinni i wɑ ko kedhi yethi gen.
“Codhe ɑkedh wɑ, wɑ kedh-ɑ kuni myërri Bɑcɑn, kɑ Rɑ̈dh Og bï-ɑ be nyɑɑg ki wɑ, ki men-ɑ́ yɑye bëne, kì buti Edrey.
De yɑ ɑ́köbbi yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kinni, ‘Yï ko böggi yi en, cïbɑ’ cingí, en kí jøge geki kɑ̈dde bënn. Göggí gïn-ɑ ɑ́göggí Rɑ̈dh Sïön rɑ̈ɑ̈dh tyëng Amör, ɑ ɑ́jyɑ̈ɑ̈g kì Kicbön.’
“Codhe, ɑcïb Rɑ̈dh Og kí jøge geki kɑ̈dde cinggee yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j. Kɑ ge nɑ̈g wɑ bënn.
Kɑ kɑ̈dde bënn yɑg yi wɑ. Bong kɑɑl ɑ́kyel mɑ ɑ́döng e nuti mɑɑg wɑ, wɑ ɑ́mɑg-ɑ kɑ̈dd pyɑ̈r ɑ́bïkyel kì myërri Argöb møg-ɑ ɑ́jɑɑg yi Rɑ̈dh Og, rɑ̈ɑ̈dh Bɑcɑn.
Kɑ̈ddɑni bënn ɑ́bëëd gɑ ɑwen ki dör mø wɑ̈dhi mɑl, dhøggi dörrɑni, dɑ thïg mø bɑ ɑgɑ̈r. O kɑ̈dd-ɑ thønhø ɑ nuti gëddø ki dör pɑ kwɑn.
Kɑ̈ddɑni ɑ́rënyi yi wɑ, kɑ jøg-ɑ cwøw nɑ̈g yi wɑ geki mɑ̈nn kí othønhø, ni men-ɑ ɑ́göggi wɑ kɑ̈ddi Sïön rɑ̈ɑ̈dh Kicbön.
Dhög ɑ́kwɑny yi wɑ, kɑ kɑ̈ddɑni yɑg yi wɑ.
“Kì bøli kenyɑni, piny-ɑ løøg Nɑm Urdun kì wɑɑng cyɑ̈ɑ̈ng mwøl, cɑg kì kömi Nɑm Arnön gïti Kïti Kermön ɑ́kwɑny yi wɑ kì yï rɑ̈nhi tyëng Amör ryeet.
(Kïti Kermön cwøl ɑ́ Sïrïön yi tyëng Sïdön, o cwøl ɑ́ Senïr yi tyëng Amör.)
Myërri Og rɑ̈ɑ̈dh Bɑcɑn ɑ́kwɑny yi wɑ, ɑ løg myërr-ɑ kwøømø, kí myërri Gilyɑd, kí Bɑcɑn gïti kɑ̈ddi Cɑlicɑ̀ geki Edrey kì kuni wɑɑng cyɑ̈ɑ̈ng mwøl.”
(Rɑ̈dh Og kete ɑ dööngø kì bɑng tyëng Repɑim kɑ ɑ́thumi gen. Sɑrire men-ɑ ógwøgø ɑ́ ngyënyø dødø, bɑ̈re bɑ mïtïr ɑ́ngwen, o lɑ̈je bɑ mïtïr ɑ́ryew, nudd e nud kì Rɑbɑ̀, kɑɑl tyëng Amön.)
“Pinyɑni ɑ́mɑg yi wɑ kì bøli kenyɑni, e dhøge cɑ̈g-ɑ́ɑ̀ kɑɑl Aröeer kì kömi Nɑm Arnön, kí budi myërri kïtti Gilyɑd, geki kɑ̈ddi gen bënn, kɑ mëggɑ gøl Ruben geki gøl Gɑd.
Kɑ budi Gøl Mɑnɑsè mëggɑ bun-ɑ ɑ́döng kì ri Gilyɑd, kí Bɑcɑn bëne, piny-ɑ ɑ́jɑɑg yi Og, ɑ løg myërri Argöb bënn.”
(Bɑcɑn ɑ́bëëd e cwøl ɑ́ piny Repɑim.
Myërri Argöb bënn, ɑ løg Bɑcɑn gïti keew Gecur geki Mɑɑkɑ̀, ɑ́kwɑny yi Yɑir wɑ̈d Mɑnɑsè. Myërrɑni ɑ́cɑge ki nyinge, ge nudd ge cwølli gɑ myërri Yɑir gïti dicyɑ̈ngtïn.)
“Gilyɑd ɑ́mëggɑ gøl Mɑkir wɑ̈d Mɑnɑsè.
Kɑ wïj gøl Ruben geki wïj gøl Gɑd mëggɑ myërr-ɑ cɑ̈gi kì Gilyɑd gïti kömi Nɑm Arnön. Keew gen kì wɑɑng wurlwɑl ying-ɑ dïnɑmɑni. O keew gen kì wɑɑng wuudø bɑ Nɑm Yɑbok, kwëe ɑ bɑ keew Amön.
Keew gen kì wɑɑng cyɑ̈ɑ̈ng böörø, wɑ̈dh-ɑ kömi Nɑm Urdun, o cɑ̈g-ɑ́ɑ̀ Tɑɑy Gɑlelì gïti Luuy Omelø kì wɑɑng wuudø, kɑ gït-ɑ thɑ Kïti Pisgɑ̀ kì wɑɑng cyɑ̈ɑ̈ng mwøl.
Mɑ̈nni wun geki othønhø kí dhögi wun bene gen ɑ ódöng kì kɑ̈dd-ɑ ɑ́mëggɑ wun, o ngɑ̈nyi yi yɑn kinni yï wun dɑ dhög mø gïïr.

Køny wun wɑddi wun, tyëng Isrɑil gïti keny-ɑ ócïb gen piny yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j ni wun kì piny-ɑ ɑ́mëgge gïn, kì løøg Nɑm Urdun kì wɑɑng cyɑ̈ɑ̈ng böörø. O rume cyee, o wu døg wun, ngɑn kedh-ɑ piny-ɑ ɑ́mëggɑ en.’
“Codhe, ɑcegɑ Jöcwø kinni, ‘Álidh yi yïn ki wɑngí, eni gïn-ɑ ɑ́göggi Rɑ̈dh Sïön geki Rɑ̈dh Og yi Jwøgí, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, gïn ni menɑni ɑ ógögge rɑ̈nh-ɑ pinye köme ópɑ̈ɑ̈r yi wun.
Wu ko böggi yi gen, mɑ́ Jwøøg wun, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, ónyïɑ̈ggø kiper wun.’
‘Wuö, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, ngɑ̈nyi yi yɑn kinni yɑ ɑ́nyudhí’ mø nøg yøw kì ri gïgdøngø møg-ɑ ógwøg yi yïn ki tegí. Bong jwøg megø kì mɑl wɑlɑ̀ kì piny, me cuggi gwøg ki gïg ni møgɑni!
Yïn ɑ Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, wiy yɑ kedhɑ løøg Nɑm Urdun, o piny-ɑ lɑ̈be med kì løøngɑni lidhɑ, piny-ɑ bɑ kwøømø, geki myërri kïtti Lubnɑn.
“De Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j ɑ́bëëd pyëwe dɑ liny ki yɑn, kì bɑng gööj wun. Kɑ yɑ köbbe kinni, ‘Árum, yɑ pɑ dwɑddi lïngø ki møgɑni këti!

Yedhí oledh Kïti Pisgɑ̀, kɑ yï lïïdh wɑɑng wuudø kí wɑɑng wurlwɑl, kɑ yï lïïdh wɑɑng cyɑ̈ɑ̈ng mwøl kí wɑɑng cyɑ̈ɑ̈ng böörø. Gïg-ɑ ólidh yi yïn, ti gen ki nennø kidøøj, mɑ́ yï pɑ pɑ̈nyi kedhi løøg Nɑm Urdun.
Ceg Jöcwø, kɑ cïïj o pyëwe tënge, kipe bɑ en ɑ ópeej ji pinyɑni, o gï mëgge piny-ɑ ɑ́lidh yi yïn.’
“Codhe, ɑ pëggi wɑ yij tör-ɑ rwööm ki Betpeor.”
Codhe, ɑköbbi teedø yi Mosɑ̀ kinni, “Lïngu cigg-ɑ pwönyɑ wun bënn, o wu ónëën wun, kɑ wu kedh-ɑ yij piny-ɑ mëggi wun yi Jwøøg kweyyi wun, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j.
Ko di gïn kïdhi yi wun kömi møg-ɑ ɑ́cïgɑ wun, kɑ ko di gïn kɑ̈ɑ̈l yi wun wɑ̈g kì ri gen. Mïdhu ciggi Jwøøg wun Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, cigg-ɑ cïgɑ wun èn.
Gïn-ɑ ɑ́gwøg yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kì Bɑɑl Peor ɑ́lidh yi wun. Tyëng-ɑ ɑ́kwɑjji Bɑɑl ɑ́nɑ̈ge bënn kì kunɑni,
de wun, wu tyëng-ɑ ɑ́mɑ̈gi kì ri Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, wu nudd wu onëënø dicyɑ̈ngtïn.
“Wu ɑ́pwönyɑ ki cigg bënn, ni kɑ ɑ́köbbi yɑn yi Jwøgɑ, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j. Mïdhu gen ceth kì piny-ɑ yije kedhi yi wun, ɑ́ men kwɑny yi wun.
Mïdhu ciggɑni, kɑ wu göög wun kì ri gen, o yod yi pödhh-ɑ kyeelø kinni wɑ̈thi wun pel. Keny-ɑ ólïngi gen ciggɑni, ge ókööbø kinni, ‘Á peli wïj geki dïdø me bëëdø kidï, ɑ yï pönh-ɑ dwøng ni men!’
“Bong pödhø me nud, cɑgg e dwøng ni ngø, me yïe di jwøg me cyɑ̈gi ki en, kenyi cwøl ge gøn; bong jwøg me pɑ̈ɑ̈r ki Jwøgee, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, ɑ nyi jwɑn löggø kenyi cwøl wɑ en.
Bong pödhø me nud, cɑgg e di bëëd e dwøng ni ngø, me yïe di cigg mø døøj ni cigg-ɑ ɑ́pwönyɑ wun dicyɑ̈ngtïn.
Bëëd wun nyingi wun yieeb wun! Wɑ̈thi wun ko wëggu wïlø ki gïg-ɑ ɑ́lidh yi wun kí nyingi wun, ki kɑɑm ni kɑɑm-ɑ óbëëd wun kì kömi piny. Köbbi wun nyingi wun geki kwɑrri wun,

ki gïg-ɑ ɑ́cwöb kì cyɑ̈ng-ɑ ɑ́cungi wun kì bøli Jwøøg wun, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, kì thɑ Kïti Sinɑy, kí kɑ ɑ́köbbe yɑn kinni, ‘Cwøl teedø, o ge lïngi gen gïn-ɑ dwɑddɑ kwøbø, o ge dïd gen ki mïdhi ciggɑ, ki cyɑ̈ng-ɑ óbëëd gen kì kömi piny, o nyigi gen ólony ki pwönyø yi gen.’
Köbbu gen ki kër-ɑ ɑ́kööb Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j ki wun, e kööb ɑ yij mɑc, kí kɑ ɑ́lïngii yi wun e okööbø, de pɑ nenni yi wun, wu lïng-ɑ cwɑg keti gen.
Kɑ wu nyudhe kinni mïdhu lwöbø men-ɑ kɑɑm wuki en, kí Cigg-ɑ Pyɑ̈rø møg-ɑ ɑ́gweede kömi ópɑ̈nni kït ɑ́ryew.
Yɑ ɑ́köbbi yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kinni pwönyɑ wun ki cigg bënn møg-ɑ ómïdhi yi wun kì piny-ɑ yije kedhi yi wun, ɑ́ men kwɑny yi wun.
“Keny-ɑ ɑ́kööb Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j ki wun kì Kïti Sinɑy, kì yij mɑc, nuti liidh wun mɑ bëëde kidï. Menɑni bɑ kiper wun, ɑdɑ́ cyee,
wu ko røngi kɑ ri wun göggi wun ki ngïji jwøg me pɑth kinni tek, cɑgg e gwøg ɑ́ jɑlø wɑlɑ̀ dhɑjø,
lɑ̈y wɑlɑ̀ winyø,
gïn mulli kì piny wɑlɑ̀ rëjø.
Ri wun ko wëggu thɑbø, kɑ wu døøg-ɑ be kwɑjji gïg-ɑ nenni yi wun kì mɑl, ɑ løg cɑ̈ng, kí dwɑ̈y, kí kyell. Gïgɑni ɑ́mëgg-ɑ pödhh-ɑ kyeelø yi Jwøøg wun, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, o gï mɑlli gen.
De wun, wu ɑ́kwɑny yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, kɑ wu kɑ̈ɑ̈le wɑ̈g kì yij mɑc, kì Rïp, wu ɑ́kɑ̈ɑ̈l yi en kɑ per kinni o wu gwøge wun ɑ́ jie ni kɑ̀ bëëd wun dicyɑ̈ngtïn.
Jwøøg wun, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, pyëwe ɑ́rënyi ki yɑn, kɑ yɑ mɑ̈ɑ̈ne bɑ̈ɑ̈ni Nɑm Urdun. Yɑ ɑ́mɑ̈ɑ̈ne kedhi piny-ɑ mëgge wun, piny-ɑ lɑ̈be med kì bɑng gööj wun.
Yɑ óthøw kì piny men, nɑm pɑ bɑ̈ɑ̈nɑ, de wu ókedh, kɑ wu pëgg-ɑ pinyɑni, piny-ɑ lɑ̈be med.
Wɑ̈thi wun ko wïl cyee ki mïdhi lwöbø men-ɑ kɑɑm wun ki Jwøøg wun, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j. Mïdhu cigge, kɑ ri wun ko göggi wun ki ngïji jwøng mɑlli yi wun,
mɑ́ Jwøøg wun, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j nɑ mɑc me ceg rɑ̈b, o bɑ Jwøk me rɑj ki tyiel.

“Cɑgg ɑ́ keny-ɑ ópëggi wun pinyɑni, kɑ wu onywølø ki nyigi wun, kɑ wu óyïddø ki kwɑrri wun, ri wun ko göggi wun ki ngïjji jwögg mø pɑth kinni tek. Menɑni bɑ gïnrɑj kì yï Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, o pyëwe bɑ men rënyi.

Anɑn wu ɑ́cyɑ̈ngi ki bɑ̈ɑ̈ni Nɑm Urdun, de yɑ cwööl-ɑ mɑl kí piny, o ge lïngi gen møg-ɑ köbbɑ wun, o wu ócɑy yi gen keny-ɑ ópyem wun møg-ɑ köbbɑ wun, ke pyem wun dhøgɑ, wu bɑ møg jwɑn lɑ̈ɑ̈nyø kì pinyɑni, wu pɑ mɑ̈gi ki keny me bɑ̈ɑ̈r.
Wu ókedhhi yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kì kelli ji møøgø, o bɑ mø nøg ɑ óbødh kì kelli wun kì kunɑni.
Kì kunɑni, wu ókwɑjji jwögg møg-ɑ ógwøgø ki cingi dhɑnhø; jwögg-ɑ ógwøgø ki yɑdh geki kït, jwögg-ɑ pɑ nëënø, ɑ pɑ lïngø, ɑ pɑ cyɑ̈mø wɑlɑ̀ ɑ pɑ ngwɑ̈jø.
Kì kunɑni, Jwøøg wun, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, óyɑb yi wun, o óyod yi wun, keløg e óyɑb yi wun ki pëthi wun bënn.
Keny-ɑ ópɑ̈dhi wun yethi ɑkørr, kɑ gïgɑni bënn bï-ɑ kömi wun, wu ódøøg kö Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, kɑ kwøbbe lïngi yi wun.
Wu pɑ wiye piny, wɑlɑ̀ wu pɑ ryɑ̈g yi en, o wïje pɑ wïl ki lwöbø men-ɑ ɑ́lwøb yi en kiree geki kweyyi wun, mɑ́ e bɑ Jwøng lɑ̈mpyëwe pɑ nyi thumi.
“Yɑ̈ɑ̈b wun ki tyelli kwøb, cɑg kì kër-ɑ ɑ́cwɑ̈ɑ̈j dhɑnhø yi Jwøk kì kömi piny. Yɑ̈ɑ̈b wun kì yij piny bëne. Dɑ gïjø me dwøng ni men, mɑ ɑ́cwöb cøn? Dɑ dhɑnhø mɑ ɑ́pɑ̈nyi lïngø ki gïn ni menɑni?
Dɑ ji mɑ ɑ́cög ge nuti thøø keny-ɑ ɑ́lïngi gen Jwøk e okööbø kì yij mɑc ni wun?

Dɑ jwøg mɑ ɑ́pɑ̈nyi kedhø, kɑ okööbø ki ji kì pödhø megø, kɑ gï gwøge gɑ jie, ni Jwøøg wun, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, ɑ ɑ́kɑ̈ɑ̈l wun kì Rïp? Tege ɑ́nyodhe kì bøli wun, ɑ́bï ki ryɑ̈g geki liny, kɑ ogöögø ki gïïngɑ̈ngø, kɑ gïg mø böggi yi ji göjje cwöbø.
Gïgɑni ɑ́gwøg yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kɑ per kinni, o yod yi wun kinni, e kete ɑ bɑ Jwøk, bong jwøg megø.
Wu ɑ́wëgge lïngi cwɑgge, e cwɑgge kɑ̈ɑ̈l-ɑ mɑl, kipe kinni, o cugge cegi wun, kɑ mɑc mee Kwërø wëgge lidhø yi wun kì piny keny.
Wu ɑ́myege, mɑ́ kweyyi wun mɑɑr yi en, kɑ wu kɑ̈ɑ̈le wɑ̈g kì Rïp ki tege, teng-ɑ dwøng.
Ácyɑ̈dhi kì bøli wun kɑ pödhh mø døngø kibøli wun cyedde. Kipe kinni, o wu kïdhe piny-ɑ bɑ mi wun.
Pɑ̈ddi wun dicyɑ̈ngtïn, kɑ cïb wun pëthi wun kinni, Jwøøg wun, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, bɑ Jwøk kì mɑl kí piny. Bong jwøg megø këti.

Mïdhu cigge bënn, cigg-ɑ mëggɑ wun dicyɑ̈ngtïn, o wu óbëëd wun ki tɑrø wuki nyingi wun, kí kwɑrri wun, kì piny-ɑ mëggi wun yi Jwøøg wun, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, o runni wun óbëëd ge ngenyø, o pinyɑni cöge ɑ́ mi wun gïti ɑtheer.”

gɑ kɑ̈dd møg nyi yömmi yi ngɑn nɑ̈g dhɑnhø, e yieel-ɑ wëye kunɑni, keløg dhɑnhø ceg-ɑ gwɑ̈nyø kì cinge, e bong mɑ̈ɑ̈nø mɑ ɑ́ying kɑɑm gen ki wɑɑd gen menɑni. Yömme yij kɑɑl ɑ́kyel kì kelli kɑ̈ddɑni, o cöge e pɑ nɑ̈g.
Gøl Ruben nyi yömme Bedher, kɑɑl-ɑ yij thwørø, o gøl Gɑd nyi yömme Rɑmöth kì Gilyɑd, o gøl Mɑnɑsè nyi yömme Gölɑn kì myërri Bɑcɑn.
Ciggi Jwøk geki pwönye ɑ́mëggi tyëng Isrɑil yi Mosɑ̀.

Ge ɑ́bëëd ge rum bëën wɑ̈g kì Rïp, o ge bëëd ɑ yij tör kì kömi Nɑm Urdun kì wɑɑng cyɑ̈ɑ̈ng mwøl, kì bøli Betpeor. Kenyɑni ɑ ɑ́muuje ciggɑni. Pinyɑni ɑ́bëëd ɑ́ mi Rɑ̈dh Sïön, rɑ̈ɑ̈dh tyëng Amör, ɑ ɑ́jyɑ̈ɑ̈g kì Kicbön. Áceg kɑ tyɑmø yi Mosɑ̀ geki tyëng Isrɑil keny-ɑ ɑ́bëën gen ge kɑ̈ɑ̈l-ɑ Rïp.
Kɑ pinye kwɑny yi gen geki piny Rɑ̈dh Og, rɑ̈ɑ̈dh Bɑcɑn, rɑ̈ɑ̈dh tyëng Amör, rɑ̈nh-ɑ kyeelø, ɑ ɑ́ying løøg Nɑm Urdun kì wɑɑng cyɑ̈ɑ̈ng mwøl.
Pinyɑni kön-ɑ́ɑ̀ kɑɑl Aröeer kì tøg töör Arnön e gït-ɑ Kïti Sïrïön, ɑ løg Kïti Kermön.
Arëbi thyew ki piny-ɑ løøg Nɑm Urdun kì wɑɑng cyɑ̈ɑ̈ng mwøl, e töng-ɑ wɑɑng wurlwɑl, kì kömi Luuy Omelø, gïti thɑ Kïti Pisgɑ̀ kì wɑɑng cyɑ̈ɑ̈ng mwøl.
Kɑ tyëng Isrɑil bënn cwøøl kej ɑ́kyel yi Mosɑ̀, ɑköbbe gïn kinni, “Wun ɑ tyëng Isrɑil, lïngu cigg-ɑ köbbɑ wun dicyɑ̈ngtïn. Dïd wun ciggɑni kɑ ge mïdhi wun.
Jwøgee, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, ɑ́nywɑ̈ɑ̈g ki kwøb kí wɑ kì Kïti Sinɑy.
Kwøbbɑni nuti nywɑɑg en kɑ wëëgee, dɑ́ kí wɑ, wɑ ɑ nud èn bënn wɑ onëënø.
Jwøk ɑ́kööb ɑ bøli wun, e kööb ɑ wïj kït kì yij mɑc.
Yɑ ɑ́bëëd yɑ ócungø kì kɑɑm wun, wuki Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, o wu nyi dwöggɑ møg-ɑ kwøb yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, mɑ́ wu ɑ́bwøg yi mɑc, kɑ wu ocögø wu pɑ yedhi wïj kït.
“Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j ɑ́kööb kinni,
‘Bene yɑn, Jwøgí, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, ɑ ɑ́kɑ̈ɑ̈l yïn wɑ̈g kì Rïp, kej bɑ̈ɑ̈ngø.
“ ‘Ko di jwøg me mɑlli yi yïn den-ɑ́ yɑ ketɑ.
Rií ko bøødh bøli ngïji jwøg me pɑth, ko mɑɑl, mɑ́ yɑn yɑ Jwøgí, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, yɑ pëddi tyiel. Tyëng-ɑ mɑɑn yɑn nyi cɑyɑ’ cɑyø geki kwɑrri gen gïti ngween rïjj.
De døøjɑ nyi nyudhɑ’ rïjj ɑ́lïp mø kwɑnni gen ngenyø, ɑ løg ji-ɑ mɑɑr yɑn, o ciggɑ omïdhø yi gen.
Yïí dɑ cyɑ̈ng ɑ́bïkyel møg yethi gen göög yi yïn ki gwøgí,

de bïryeew cyɑ̈ng bɑ cyɑ̈ɑ̈ng ywömø, bɑ ɑthyey ɑ́ miɑ. Bong dhɑnhø me göögø kì cyɑ̈ngɑni, ko di gïn gwøg yi yïn, wuki nyigí, kí bɑ̈nggí, kí ɑderrí, kí tyëngpɑth møg-ɑ bëëdø kì butí. Ywööm bɑ̈ngí ceth ni yïn.
Nyi pɑr kinni, yï ɑ́bëëd yï bɑ bɑ̈ng kì Rïp, o bɑ yɑn, yɑ Jwøgí, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, ɑ ɑ́yiel yïn ki tegɑ, teng-ɑ dwøng. Bene ɑ bɑnge cegɑ yïn kinni, kwër cyɑ̈ɑ̈ng Sɑbɑth.
“Keny-ɑ ɑ́lïngi wun cwɑggɑni ge kɑ̈ɑ̈l-ɑ yij muudhø, e kït ceg-ɑ lyelø, ɑbëën jɑggi wɑ̈thi kɑ̈lli wun yïɑ.

Kɑ ge okööbø kinni, ‘Jwøgee, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, wø ɑ́nyudhe dönge geki mɑ̈re keny-ɑ ɑ́kööbe kì yij mɑc, e olïngø yi wøn! Áyod yi wøn dicyɑ̈ngtïn kinni dhɑnhø ócuggø cöögø e pɑ thøw, cɑgg Jwøk kööbø ki en.
Dɑ́ kipe ngø ɑ bøy wøn thøø këti? Wø pɑ nɑ̈g yi mɑc menɑni? Ngɑ̈nyi yi wøn, wø ceg-ɑ thøø ke lïngi wøn Jwøøg wøn, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, e okööbø këti.
Á dhɑnhø mɑ ngø ɑ ɑ́lïngi Jwøng-ɑ Nëënø e okööbø kì yij mɑc, kɑ ocögø e pɑ thøw?
Mosɑ̀, Døøg, kɑ møg-ɑ ókwøb yi Jwøgee, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j lïngí. Kɑ yï dwöög be köbbi wøn møg-ɑ óköbbe yïn, møgɑni ólïngi yi wøn, kɑ gïn-ɑ dwɑdde gwøg wøn.’
“Keny-ɑ ɑ́lïngi møgɑni yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, ɑköbbe yɑn kinni ‘Møg-ɑ ɑ́kwøb yi jiɑni ɑ́lïngɑ, o kwøbbi gen bɑ dyër.
Ge ce di cög ge rum ɑ nï! Ke wør gen yɑn, kɑ gïn-ɑ köbbɑ gen nyi gwøg yi gen, bong gïn jɑ̈ddi gen geki kwɑrri gen gïti ɑtheer.
Kedh köbbí gen døøg gen yethi kemmi gen.
De yïn, Mosɑ̀, bëëd kì butɑ keny, o yï mëggɑ ciggɑ geki kwöngɑ. Pwönyi gen teedø, o gï ómïdhi gen kì piny-ɑ mëggɑ gen.’
“Wu tyëng Isrɑil, nyi gwøg wun møg-ɑ ɑ́cïgi wun yi Jwøøg wun, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j. Ko di ɑ́kyel me pyem yi wun kì ri cigge.
Mïdhu cigge bënn, o bëëde e bong gïn jɑ̈ddi wun, o wu óbëëd wun ki døøjø kì piny-ɑ óbëëd ɑ́ mi wun.
“Møg bene gen cigg geki kwöng, møg-ɑ ɑ́köbbi yɑn yi Jwøgí, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, i pwönyɑ gen yïn. Mïdhí ciggɑni kì piny-ɑ óbëëd ɑ́ mi wun.
Mïdhí ciggɑni wuki kwɑrrí kidøøj. Kɑ Jwøgí, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j wøør, kɑ kwøbbe lïngí. Kɑ cigge mïdhí ki runn-ɑ nud kì kömi piny bënn, o yï óbëëd kì pinyɑni ki keny me bɑ̈ɑ̈r.

Lïngu gen, wu tyëng Isrɑil, kɑ ge mïdhi wun! O óbëëd e bong gïn jɑ̈ddi wun, o wu ógöög wun ki pödhø me dwøng, me kɑ̈rø kì yij piny-ɑ mulli yi cɑg geki møøw kïc, ni kɑ ɑ́kööb Jwøøg kweyyi wun, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j.
Mɑɑr Jwøgí, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j ki pyëwí bëne, kí wëyí bëne, kí tegí bëne.
Wïjí ko pɑ̈nyi wïlø ki cigg-ɑ mëggɑ yïn dicyɑ̈ngtïn.
Pwönyí gen nyigí. Nyi cigí gen kwøbø kenyi ying wun kɑl, kí kenyi ying wun wɑ̈g; kenyi bëëd wu ywöm-ɑ ri wun, kí kenyi bëëd wun wu ogöögø.
Twööju gen bɑ̈ddi wun, kɑ ge rug wun kì bøli wun, gɑ møg nyi pɑ̈ddi wun.
Gweedu gen ɑ́dyëddi uddi wun, kí dhøggi dörri kɑ̈ddi wun.

Ud óbëëd ge pɑ̈ng yi jɑmmì mø nuti kïdh-ɑ yi wun yethi gen. Kunɑni dɑ yïïth mø nuti kony-ɑ yi wun, kí bɑ̈ggi yenh mø nuti pidh-ɑ yi wun. Keny-ɑ ókïdhi wun pinyɑni yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, kɑ gïg-ɑ dwɑddu cɑmø bënn yood wun kunɑni,
wɑ̈thi wun ko wïl ki Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, ɑ ɑ́yïëël wun wɑ̈g kì Rïp, kun-ɑ ɑ́bëëd wun, wu bɑ bɑ̈ngg.
Wør Jwøgí, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, kɑ mɑllí e kete kete, kɑ yï nyi köngí ki nyinge kete.
Yï ko mɑ̈ddi ki jwögg møøgø, kì kelli jwöggi ji-ɑ bëëdø kì bɑdhhi wun.
Keløg wu ókwɑ̈jji ki jwögg møøgø, Jwøøg wun, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j pyëwe órënyi ki wun, kɑ wu nɑ̈ge kì pinyɑni, mɑ́ Jwøøg wun, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, ɑ bëëdø kì kelli wun, pëddi tyiel.
Mïdhu ciggi Jwøøg wun, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j ceth.
Nyi gwøgu gïn-ɑ kwøb yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kinni døøj ki gwøgø, o bëëd e bong gïn jɑ̈ddi wun, o wu ócuggi wun ki kwɑnyi piny-ɑ døøj, ɑ ɑ́köbbe kweyyi wun,
kɑ ji mø mɑ̈n ki wun cyeddi yi wun ni kɑ ɑ́kööb Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j.
“Keny-ɑ ópyëëj yïn yi nyigí dhuki megø kinni, ‘Á cigg mɑ ngø ɑ ɑ́mëggi wun yi Jwøgee, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j?’
Kɑ ge köbbí kinni, ‘Wɑ ɑ́bëëd wɑ bɑ bɑ̈nggi rɑ̈ɑ̈dh Rïp, de wɑ ɑ́yïëël wɑ̈g yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j ki tegø.
Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j ɑ́göög ki gïïngɑ̈ngø, wø onëënø ki nyingi wøn. Möy! Bɑ gïgrijjø mø ni ngø ɑ ɑ́gögge Rïp geki rɑ̈dhe, kí gøl rɑ̈dh geki jyɑ̈gge bënn!
Wɑ ɑ́göönye wɑ̈g kì yij bɑ̈ɑ̈ngø kì Rïp, ɑkɑ̈ɑ̈le wɑ piny men, ni kɑ ɑ́köbbe kweyyee cøn kinni pinyɑni ómëgge wɑ.
Codhe ɑköbbi wɑ yi Jwøgee, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kinni i mïdhi wɑ cigg møgɑni bënn, kɑ Jwøgee wør yi wɑ, o wɑ kor yi en, o wɑ óbëëd wɑ ki døøjø e bong gïjø me cɑ̈nni wɑ, ni kɑ̀ bëëd wɑ dicyɑ̈ngtïn.
O bëëdø men-ɑ døøj kì yïee wɑng-ɑ mïdhi kwöngɑni geki gøggi møg-ɑ ɑ́cïgi wɑ yi Jwøgee, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j.’
Keny-ɑ ócïb jurrɑni bënn cingí yi Jwøgí, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, nɑ̈g gen bënn. Wu ko lwööb kí gen, pyëwí ko lɑ̈ɑ̈m kí gen.
Rií ko wëggí nyömø ki nyɑɑr gen, kɑ wɑ̈ddí ko nyömi ki nyigi gen, wɑlɑ̀ nyɑrí ko nywøm yi gen,
kipe nyigi wun óthɑɑb yi gen be mɑlli jwögg-ɑ pɑth ki dyër, kɑ pyëw Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j órënyø, kɑ wu jwɑne ki nɑ̈gø.
Keny-ɑ ómɑg wun pinyɑni, cøør wun këlli lɑm mø gen piny, kɑ yïkki gen pyeed wun piny, kɑ löjji Aceerɑ̀ tørri wun, kɑ ngïjji jwöggi gen rɑ̈b wun ki mɑc.
Gwøgu møgɑni, mɑ́ wu bɑ jii Jwøøg wun, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j. Wun ɑ ɑ́yieny yi en kì kelli jurri kömi piny bënn, o wu bëëd wun, wun ɑ́ jie.
“Pɑth kiper ngenyi kwɑnni wun kibøli jurr-ɑ kyeelø, ɑ ɑ́mɑɑr wun yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, kɑ wu yienye wun ɑ́ møge, kwɑnni wun nøg kibøli pödhh-ɑ kyeelø kì kömi piny.
De Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j wu ɑ́mɑɑre, kɑ lwöm-ɑ ɑ́ying kɑɑme kí kweyyi wun mïdhe. Bene ɑ bɑnge yiele wun kì cingi rɑ̈ɑ̈dh Rïp, kì yij bɑ̈ɑ̈ngø, kɑ wu kɑ̈ɑ̈le wɑ̈g ki tegø.

Wɑ̈thi wun ko wïl kinni Jwøøg wun, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, en ɑ bɑ Jwøk, ɑ nyi mïdhi kwøbbe geki lwöm-ɑ ɑ́lwøbe. Lwöbø nyi mïdhe’ mïdhø, o mɑ̈ɑ̈dø mee nyi nyudhe’ ji-ɑ mɑɑrii, ɑ mïdhi cigge kì yethi rïjj ɑ́lïp,
de tyëng-ɑ mɑɑnii nyi cɑye’ cɑyø.
Anɑn mïdhu møg-ɑ ɑ́pwönyi wun, mïdhu cigg-ɑ ɑ́mëggɑ wun bënn dicyɑ̈ngtïn.

Wu ómɑɑre kɑ wu gyëdhe, o wu óbëëd wun kì piny-ɑ lɑ̈be med, yï wun dɑ nywøl, kɑ kwɑnni wun óngënyø. Pwödhhi wun ógyëdhe, o wu óbëëd wun yï wun dɑ byel, kí møgi oløg, ki møøw dhetun. Kɑ wu gëdhhe dhög ki dyëg mø ngenyø. Gyëdhhɑni bënn ómëgge wun, kì yij piny-ɑ ɑ́köbbe kweyyi wun, kinni gø ómëgge wun.
Bong pödhø megø kì kömi piny men-ɑ ógyëdh ni wun. Bong bwøj men-ɑ óying me nud kì kelli wun, o bong ɑ́ror men-ɑ óløg me nud kì kelli jɑmmi wun.
Wu ókorri yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j ki rɑ̈ɑ̈m dëllì, wu koo göjje rɑ̈ɑ̈m dëll-ɑ rijjø møg-ɑ ɑ́lidh yi wun kì Rïp, de gïgɑni ógöjje tyëngmɑ̈ɑ̈nø bënn.
Rënyu pödhh-ɑ ócïb cinggi wun yi Jwøøg wun, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, nɑ̈gu gen kɑ pëthi wun ko lɑ̈ɑ̈m kí gen. Jwöggi gen ko kwɑjji wun kipe ge ógöögø ki ɑ́kɑ̈lli thøø kì cwɑggi wun.
“Wu ko kööb kinni jurrì møgɑni døngø kibøli wun, o ge pɑ lwɑ̈ng yi wun ki tyɑmø.
Wu ko böggi yi gen, nyi pɑrru gïg-ɑ ɑ́göggi rɑ̈ɑ̈dh Rïp geki tyëng pödhe bënn yi Jwøøg wun, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j.

Nyi pɑrru ryɑ̈g men-ɑ ɑ́lidh yi wun kí nyingi wun, kí gïïngɑ̈ngø, kí ngïjjì møg teg, geki teng-ɑ dwøng men-ɑ ɑ́yieel wun yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j. Rëny-ɑ ɑ́rënye Rïp, en ɑ órënye jurr-ɑ böggi yi wun ɑnɑn bënn.
Ge ógöjji ryɑ̈g yi Jwøøg wun, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, kɑ møg-ɑ ópɑ̈nni kì kelli gen nɑ̈ge.
Wu ko böggi yi gen, mɑ́ Jwøøg wun, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j ying-ɑ kelli wun, o bɑ Jwøk me dwøng me böggi kiree.
Jurrɑni ónyiige kì bøli wun ceth. De gï koo cyedde wïj ɑ́kyel, kipe kwɑnni lɑ̈yyi pɑ̈l óngënyi kibøli kwɑnni wun, kɑ wu óböggø yi gen.
Ge ócïb cinggi wun yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j ceth, mɑ́ gï ógöjje böggø yi wun. Ge ótyɑm yi wun kɑ ge nɑ̈g yi wun.
Rɑ̈nhi gen ówëgge tyɑmø yi wun. Ge ónɑ̈g yi wun kɑ ge owïlø kì wɑ̈ɑ̈th. Bong dhɑnhø men-ɑ ócungi kì bøli wun gïti keny-ɑ ónɑ̈g wun gen bënn.
Rɑ̈bu ngïjji jwöggi gen, kɑ dhɑb kí ɑ́teng-ɑ ri gen ko kwɑny wun, mɑ́ ge mɑɑn yi Jwøøg wun, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, o ge bɑ møg-ɑ ógöögø ki ɑ́kɑ̈lli thøø kì cwɑggi wun.
O gïg-ɑ mɑɑn yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j ko kɑ̈ɑ̈l wun yethi kɑ̈lli wun, kipe wu óyïddi ki göj kì bɑng gen. Bɑnyu ngïjji jwöggɑni kɑ ge mɑɑn wun, kipe cyënni gen óbï kömi wun, mɑ́ ge bɑ mø cyën.
“Mïdhu cigg-ɑ ɑ́mëggɑ wun bënn dicyɑ̈ngtïn, o wu ónëën wun, o kwɑnni wun óngënyi gen, o wu ókwɑnyu piny men-ɑ ɑ́kwøb yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kinni gø ómëgge kweyyi wun.

Nyi pɑrru kër-ɑ ɑ́pëëj wun wɑ̈g yi Jwøøg wun, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, kì yij wɑ̈nh-ɑ ɑ́bëën wun kì Rïp, wu bɑ̈ɑ̈n-ɑ ryɑng ki runn pyɑ̈r ɑ́ngwen. Kɑ wu nyi rɑnge ki gïg teg, o gø yode mɑ mïdhi wun cigge ceth.

Wu ɑ́göjje kɑ̈j, kɑ wu cɑɑme ki mɑnɑ̀, gïncɑm-ɑ nuti pɑ̈nyø cɑmø yi wun, wuki kweyyi wun cøn. Møgɑni ɑ́gwøg yi en kɑ per pwönyi wun kinni, pɑth ki gïncɑm kete ɑ nyi mïdhi dhɑnhø e onëënø, den-ɑ́ gïn-ɑ kwøb yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j.
Kì yethi runn pyɑ̈r ɑ́ngwen møgɑni, ógudhi wun nuti pyëdø, o tyelli wun nuti kwödø yi wɑ̈dh.
Ngɑ̈nyi wun wøw kinni wu ceg yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j nɑ dhɑnhø kenyi cege nyige, kɑ gï nyi pwöde.
Nyi gwøgu møg-ɑ ɑ́cïgi wun yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, kɑ ge mïdhi wun, kɑ Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j wør wun.
Wu kïdh-ɑ piny me lɑ̈be med yi Jwøøg wun, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, piny me yije di nɑ̈mm-ɑ rïngi kí nyingi pï, kí pïg töngi wɑ̈g kì piny ge mödd-ɑ yij tör, kí kwøømø.
Piny me yije cyeg gemè, kí ceir, kí oløg, kí ólɑm kí romɑn, kí dhetun, kí møøw kïc.
Wu koo pɑ̈nyi ki mɑgø yi kɑ̈j kì kunɑni, wɑlɑ̀ bong gïjø men-ɑ ócɑ̈nni wun. Yethi kïtte dɑ ngyënyø dødø, o wu ócuggø kony ki dilɑl kì wɑ̈thi kwøømme.
Wu ócyɑ̈mø kɑ wu oyɑ̈ngø, kɑ Jwøøg wun, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j pwøj yi wun kipe piny-ɑ lɑ̈be med, ɑ ɑ́mëgge wun.
Keny-ɑ óyɑ̈ng wun kɑ wu ogëdø ki ud mø døngø, kɑ wu pëgg-ɑ piny,
kɑ dhögi wun óngënyø geki dyëgi wun, kɑ dhɑb, kí ɑ́tegø óngënyø kì yï wun, kɑ jɑmmi wun óngënyø bënn,
wɑ̈thi wun ko wëggu tɑ̈dø kí Jwøøg wun, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, ɑ ɑ́yïëël wun wɑ̈g kì Rïp kun-ɑ ɑ́bëëd wun, wu bɑ bɑ̈ngg.
Wu ɑ́pyejje wu bɑ̈ɑ̈n-ɑ ryɑng-ɑ dwøng, ɑ pëddi rɑ̈jø; eni piny-ɑ thwøwø ɑ yije bong pï, kí thölle geki ïïdhe møg-ɑ bɑ nɑ̈ɑ̈g. Kɑ wu thödhe ki pï kì yij kït mɑ gïwi.
Wu ɑ́mëgge mɑnɑ̀ kì yij pɑ̈l, o cɑm yi wun, eni gïn nuti pɑ̈nyø cɑmø yi kweyyi wun. Kɑ wu göjje orɑng møti e pɑ̈ny-ɑ wun, kipe kinni o wu ógëdhe gïgdøj cyee.
Kɑ wu ko rum cyee kinni wu ɑ́kɑ̈ri kɑ tegi wun.
Wɑ̈thi wun ko nyi wïl kinni bɑ Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, Jwøøg wun, ɑ ɑ́thödhi wun ki tegø men-ɑ bɑnge kɑ̈ri wun, mɑ́ e nudd e mïdh-ɑ møg-ɑ ɑ́nywɑge kí kweyyi wun cøn, ni kɑ̀ bëëde dicyɑ̈ngtïn.
De keløg wɑ̈thi wun ówïl ki Jwøøg wun, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, kɑ wu kedh-ɑ be mɑlli jwögg møøgø, wɑ̈thi wun ópɑ̈ɑ̈dh. Wu ɑ́rum ki kyëddø yi yɑn dicyɑ̈ngtïn.
Keløg kwøbbi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j pɑ lïngi yi wun, wu ónɑ̈g yi en ni jurr-ɑ dwɑdde nɑ̈gø ɑnɑn, kì bøli wun.
“Lïng wun, wun ɑ tyëng Isrɑil! Dicyɑ̈ngtïn Nɑm Urdun obɑ̈ɑ̈nø yi wun, wu kedh-ɑ be kwɑnyi pìnyi jurrì mø døngø, mø teg kibøli wun, pödhø me yije di kɑ̈dd mø døngø, gɑ ɑwen ki dör mø wɑ̈dhi mɑl.
Tyëngpinyɑni, kwɑrri Anɑk, ngëddi gen døngø, o ge bɑ̈rrø, per gen ɑ́lïngi yi wun kinni bong ji mø cuggi cung kì bøli gen.
De ólidh yi wun dicyɑ̈ngtïn kinni Jwøøg wun, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j cyɑ̈dh-ɑ́ɑ̀ bøli wun, e opɑ̈mmø ni mɑc. Gï ótyɑme, kɑ ge cyeddi yi wun, ge ójwɑn ki nɑ̈gø yi wun ni kɑ ɑ́kööb Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j.
“Keny-ɑ órum gen ki cyeddø yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kiper wun, kɑ wu ko rum kinni pinyɑni ɑ́mëggi wun kɑ per døøji wun, dɑ́ kipe rɑ̈ji tyëngɑni.

Pɑth kiper bëëdi wun wu tir, o wu gøgg-ɑ dyër ɑ wëggi wun kwɑnyi piny gen yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j. Gï cyeede wɑ̈g kɑ per rɑ̈ji gen, geki kɑ̀ dwɑdde mïdhi lwöbø men-ɑ ɑ́lwøb yi en geki kweyyi wun: Abrɑhɑm, kí Isɑɑk, kí Yɑgob.
Ngɑ̈nyu wøw kinni piny-ɑ døj ni menɑni nuti mëggi wun yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kɑ per kɑ̀ myër wun kí pinyɑni. Wu ceg bëëdø wu bɑ ji mø muddi wun teeg.
“Wɑ̈thi wun ko wïl ki kɑ ɑ́wëggu pyëw Jwøøg wun, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j rënyø kì yij pɑ̈l. Wu ɑ́cɑ̈gi pëmø kì cyɑ̈ng-ɑ ɑ́dhwödh wun kì Rïp gïti dicyɑ̈ngtïn wu pemm-ɑ dhøg Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j.
Cɑgg ɑ́ kì Kïti Sinɑy, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j pyëwe ɑ́wëggi rënyø yi wun ki mendwøng, me di nɑ̈ge wun.
Yɑ ɑ́yedhi wïj kït be dwɑɑyi ópɑ̈nni kït ɑ́ryew, ópɑ̈nn-ɑ kömi gen ógweed Cigg, kɑ yɑ obëëdø kì wïj kït ki cyɑ̈ng pyɑ̈r ɑ́ngwen yɑ pɑ cyɑ̈mø, o bong pï mɑ ɑ́mɑdhɑ.
Codhe, ɑmëggi yɑn ópɑ̈nni kït møgɑni ryeet, gen ɑ kïtt-ɑ kömi gen ɑ́gweede møg-ɑ ɑ́köbbe wun, e kööb ɑ yij mɑc. Gï ɑ́gwede ki cinge, gen ɑ møg-ɑ ɑ́köbbe wun, wu ócungø kì thɑ kït.
Kì bɑng cyɑ̈ng pyɑ̈r ɑ́ngwen kí wɑ̈rr pyɑ̈r ɑ́ngwen, ɑ ɑ́mëggi yɑn kïttɑni ryeet, kïtt-ɑ kömi gen ógweed Cigg.

“Codhe, ɑköbbi yɑn yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kinni, ‘Jwɑn kedhi piny thɑ kït, kipe jií møg-ɑ ɑ́kɑ̈ɑ̈l yi yïn kì Rïp ɑ́rënyi, kɑ ge ogöögø ki gïnrɑj. Møg-ɑ ɑ́cïgɑ gen ɑ́jwɑn gen ki wiyø, ri gen ɑ́göggi gen ki ngïji.’
“Yɑ ɑ́köbbi thyew yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kinni, ‘Jiɑni ngɑ̈nyi yi yɑn kinni muddi gen teeg.
Yɑ ko pɑ̈nyí jogø, wiy ge nɑ̈gɑ bënn, o nyingi gen lɑ̈ɑ̈nyɑ kì kömi piny, o yï gwøgɑ yïn ɑ́ pödhø me dwøng kibøli gen.’
“Codhe, ɑløgɑ riɑ kɑ yɑ yïnh-ɑ piny kì wïj kït, yɑ kɑ̈ll-ɑ ópɑ̈nni kït ɑ́ryew møg-ɑ kömi gen ógweed Cigg. Kït ɑ́bëëd e ceg-ɑ lyelø ɑ́ mɑc.
Kɑ yodɑ ceth kinni Ciggi Jwøøg wun Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j pyeem wun, kɑ ri wun göggi wun ki røjø mɑ dhɑb, ɑ́ ngïji jwøg, wu ɑ́jwɑn pɑ̈dø kì ri Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j.
Aleengɑ ópɑ̈nni kït møgɑni ryeet piny kì bøli wun, kɑ ri gen mød gen.
Abøødhɑ riɑ bøli Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j ki cyɑ̈ng pyɑ̈r ɑ́ngwen, kí wɑ̈rr pyɑ̈r ɑ́ngwen ni tyeli mɑl, yɑ nuti cyɑ̈mø, o bong pï mɑ ɑ́mɑdhɑ, ki gööj orøng-ɑ ɑ́gwøg yi wun, ɑ ɑ́rënyi pyëw Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j.
Yɑ ɑ́bëëd yɑ óböggø yi rɑ̈ji pyëw Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, mɑ́ pyëwe ɑ́rënyi ki mendwøng, ki me di nɑ̈ge wun, de kwɑ̈jjɑ ɑ́cigi lïngø yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j.
Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j ɑ́bëëd thyew pyëwe rɑɑj ki Aɑron, ki men di nɑ̈ge gøn, de yɑ ɑ́kwɑ̈jji kipere kì bøli kenyɑni.
Kɑ gïi orøg men-ɑ ɑ́gwøg yi wun, ɑ løg rønyi dhɑb kwɑnyɑ, kɑ leengɑ mɑc. Kɑ tørrɑ, ɑgurɑ en, kɑ ogöögø ɑ́ búr, kɑ búrɑni pwöögɑ nɑm-ɑ rïngi piny kì wïj kït.
Keny-ɑ ɑ́öre wun kì Kɑdic Berniyɑ̀, kinni kedhu be kwɑnyi piny-ɑ mëgge wun. Jwøøg wun, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j dhøge ɑ́pyem yi wun, kɑ ocögø e pɑ gɑ̈n yi wun.
Wu ɑ́bëëd wu nyi pemm-ɑ dhøg Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j ceth, ki kër-ɑ ɑ́ngɑ̈nyɑ wun.
“Codhe, ɑbuudɑ yijɑ rum yɑn piny kì bøli Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j ki cyɑ̈ng pyɑ̈r ɑ́ngwen, kí wɑ̈rr pyɑ̈r ɑ́ngwen, mɑ́ e ɑ́yodɑ kinni dwɑdd-ɑ nɑ̈gi wun.
Kɑ Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kwɑjjɑ kinni, “Wuö, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, jií ko nɑ̈ɑ̈g, gen ɑ ji-ɑ ɑ́yiel yi yïn, kɑ ge kɑ̈ɑ̈l yi yïn wɑ̈g kì Rïp, ki tegí.
Wïjí ko wïl ki bɑ̈nggí: Abrɑhɑm, kí Isɑɑk, kí Yɑgob, kɑ yï ko nenni rɑ̈ji ji møg geki tegi muddi gen, kí orøøg gen.

Mɑ́ ke nɑ̈ɑ̈g gen, tyëng Rïp okööbø kinni, i yï ódhɑlø yi kïdhi jií yij piny-ɑ ɑ́kwøb yi yïn kinni ge ókïdhí yije, bene ɑ bɑnge nɑ̈ɑ̈g gen yi yïn kì yij pɑ̈l. Ge okööbø kinni i jií kïdhi yïn yij pɑ̈l be nɑ̈gø, mɑ́ ge mɑɑn yi yïn.
O bene gen ji-ɑ ɑ́myeg yi yïn gɑ jií, ji-ɑ ɑ́kɑ̈ɑ̈l yi yïn wɑ̈g kì Rïp ki tegí, teng-ɑ dwøng cɑrø.’
“Codhe, ɑköbbi yɑn yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kinni, ‘Twïg ki ópɑ̈nni kït ɑ́ryew ni mø tyeli mɑl, kɑ yï göög ki sɑndug mɑ yɑdh men yije cïb gen. Kɑ yï bï yïɑ mɑl wïj kït,
o kwøbb-ɑ ɑ́ying kömi ópɑ̈nni møg-ɑ ɑ́mød ri gen kɑ ɑ́leeng gen piny, gweedɑ kömi møg-ɑ kɑ̈ɑ̈l yi yïn, codhe o ge kïdhi yi yïn yij Sɑndug.’
“Codhe, ɑgöögɑ ki Sɑndug ki yɑdh ɑ́lwiy, kɑ yɑ otwïgø ki ópɑ̈nni kït ɑ́ryew ni mø tyeli mɑl, kɑ ge kïdhɑ mɑl wïj kït.

Codhe, kɑ Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j møg-ɑ ɑ́kwønge ki gwedø kì kömi kïtti tyeli mɑl, gweede kömi mø cyɑ̈n, ɑ løg Cigg-ɑ Pyɑ̈rø møg-ɑ ɑ́mëgge wun, wu ying-ɑ thɑ kït, e kööb ɑ yij mɑc, cyɑ̈ng-ɑ ɑ́cugi wun. Ge ɑ́mëggi yɑn yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, gen ɑ ópɑ̈nni kït møgɑni ryeet,
ɑløgɑ riɑ, kɑ yɑ dwöög-ɑ piny thɑ kït. Kɑ ge cïbɑ yij sɑndung-ɑ ɑ́gwøg yi yɑn, ɑbëëd gen kì kenyɑni ni kɑ ɑ́köbbi yɑn yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j.”
Adhwödh gen kì kenyɑni, kɑ ge kedh-ɑ Gudgɑdɑ̀, kɑ ge odhwödhø këti, kɑ ge kedh-ɑ Yotbɑthɑ̀ kun-ɑ ngeeny pï.
Kenyɑni ɑ ɑ́kwɑɑny gøl Leebì yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j gɑ tyëng kɑ̈lli Sɑnduug Cigg, o ge nyi cungi gen kì bøle ge gögg-ɑ en gɑ ókwër, o ge nyi kwëëng gen ki nyinge. A nudd ɑ́ gwøøg gen gïti dicyɑ̈ngtïn.
Bene ɑ ɑ́cög gøl Leebì nuti nëngø ki piny ni kɑ̈ll-ɑ kyeelø, lɑ̈ng-ɑ ɑ́mëggi gen bɑ bëëdi gen gɑ ókwërri Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, ni kɑ ɑ́kwøbii ceth yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j Jwøøg wun.)
Codhe, ɑköbbe yɑn i peejɑ wun be kwɑnyi piny-ɑ ɑ́köbbe kweyyi wun kinni gø ómëgge gïn.
“Anɑn wun ɑ tyëng Isrɑil, lïngu gïn-ɑ dwɑddi yi Jwøøg wun, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kì yï wun, Mɑllu Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, kɑ møg-ɑ nyi kwøbe bënn nyi gwøg wun. Mɑɑr wun en, kɑ göggi wun ki pëthi wun bënn.
Kɑ Cigge bënn mïdhi wun. Ciggɑni bënn mëggɑ’ wun dicyɑ̈ngtïn kɑ per kinni, o wu yïddi wun ki døøjø.
Cɑgg ɑ́ mɑl ɑ lɑ̈wi, bɑ mi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j. Piny bɑ mee thyew geki jɑmm-ɑ yije bënn.
De kweyyi wun mɑɑr yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j ki mendwøng kibøli tyëng-ɑ kyeelø, ɑmyege wun, wun ɑ́ jie gïti dicyɑ̈ngtïn.
Kɑ ɑ́rum bëëde kinøw, mïdhu kwøbbi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, kɑ wu ko pëëm këti.
Jwøøg wun, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, bɑ Jwøk me dwøng kibøli jwögg bënn, bong tegø me pɑ̈r ki tege. Dwøng o ceg kɑ böggø. Pɑ nyi gënyø o pɑ nyi yïëy kwɑjjø ki gïïpiny.
Pɑ nyi dwɑddi kinni, o kïj geki thwöm ruj, tyëngpɑth møg-ɑ bëëdø kì kellee mɑɑr yi en, kɑ gï nyi thödhe ki gïncɑm kí ógudh.
Kɑ̀ bëëde kinøw, mɑɑr wun tyëngpɑth møg-ɑ bëëdø kì kelli wun, mɑ́ wu ɑ́bëëd wu bɑ wëdhh kì Rïp.
Lïngí kwøbbi Jwøgí, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, kɑ mɑllí, e kete kete. Mïdhí cigge, kɑ yï nyi köngí ki nyinge kete.
Lenhí, bɑ Jwøgí. O men-ɑ́ gïïngɑ̈ngø møg-ɑ døngø, møg-ɑ ɑ́gwøge kiper wun ɑ́lidh yi yïn ki wɑngí.
Keny-ɑ ɑ́kedhi kweyyi wun Rïp, kwɑnni gen ɑ́bëëd gɑ pyɑ̈r ɑ́bïryew codhi gen. De ɑnɑn kwɑnni wun nuti gwøgø yi Jwøøg wun, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, ge gïïr ni kyell kì mɑl?
“Mɑɑru Jwøøg wun, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, kɑ cigge bënn mïdhi wun ceth.
Dicyɑ̈ngtïn, pɑr wun møg-ɑ ɑ́dïd yi wun kì yï Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j. Pɑth ki nyigi wun ɑ ɑ́lidh møgɑni, dɑ́ men-ɑ́ wun kì ri wun. Álidh yi wun eni döngi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j geki tege,
kí gïïngɑ̈ngø møg-ɑ ɑ́gwøge. Gïg-ɑ ɑ́gögge rɑ̈ɑ̈dh Rïp geki pödhe bëne ɑ́lidh yi wun.
Álidh yi wun kër-ɑ ɑ́nɑ̈ge yɑɑy Rïp bëne kí kyënye geki yɑ̈the, keny-ɑ ɑ́rïngi gen bɑng wun, kɑ gï mudde Nɑɑm Omeli Kwɑrø.
Gïg-ɑ ɑ́gwøg yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kì yij pɑ̈l kiper wun, gïti kɑ ɑ́wɑ̈nhi wun keny, ɑ́lidh yi wun.
Pɑru gïn-ɑ ɑ́gögge Dɑthɑn geki Abirɑm wɑ̈ddi Eliɑb kì gøl Ruben. A ɑ́yieb piny ree e onennø yi dhɑnhø bëne, kɑ gï mwønye geki kɑ̈lli gen, kí kemmi gen, kí bɑ̈nggi gen geki dhögi gen.
Wun kiri wun ceth, ɑ ɑ́lidh gïgdøngø møg-ɑ ɑ́gwøg yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j.
“Mïdhu cigg-ɑ ɑ́mëggɑ wun bënn dicyɑ̈ngtïn, o wu ócuggi wun ki bɑ̈ɑ̈ni nɑm, wu kedh-ɑ be kwɑnyi pinyɑni.
O wu óbëëd wun ki keny me bɑ̈ɑ̈r kì piny kɑ̈r, piny-ɑ yije mulli yi cɑg geki møøw kïc, piny-ɑ ɑ́köbbi kweyyi wun yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kinni gø ómëgge kwɑrri gen.
Piny-ɑ ókwɑny yi wun ɑ́ mi wun, pɑ pɑ̈r ki piny Rïp, kun-ɑ ɑ́bëëd wun kɑ̈ge dööng. Kenyi kɑ̈ɑ̈g wun kì kunɑni, jɑmm-ɑ kɑ̈g nyi ceg kɑ cɑwwø, o bɑ gwøg me teeg,
de piny-ɑ kedhi yi wun bɑ piny me yije di kïttì, kí törr; piny me yije nyi mɑ̈gi yi kødh.
Pinyɑni kor-ɑ yi Jwøøg wun, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kì yij run bëne.
Keny-ɑ ógwøg wun møgɑni, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j ókɑ̈ni piny ki kødh kì bøli keny-ɑ dwɑddii, o bëëd e bong mel, o bëëd e dɑ byel, kí møgi oløg, kí møøw dhetun kì yï wun,
kí lum men cɑm yi dhögi wun. O wu óyɑ̈ng wun.
Ri wun ko wëggu thɑbø, kɑ Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j wiyu piny, kɑ wu kedh-ɑ be mɑlli jwögg møøgø, kɑ ri wun bøødh wun bøli gen.
Ogöög wun ki gïn ni menɑni, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j pyëwe órënyi ki wun, kɑ kødh mɑ̈ɑ̈ne, kɑ wu ojɑdø ki byel. Codhe, kɑ wu jwɑn-ɑ thøø kì kunɑni, cɑgg ɑ́ kɑ̀ bëëd pinyɑni ɑ́ piny me døj.
“Cïbu ciggɑni pëthi wun. Twööj wun gen bɑ̈ddi wun, kɑ ge rug wun gɑ ɑcwɑddì kì wɑ̈thi wun, gɑ møg nyi pɑ̈ddi wun.
Pwönyu gen nyigi wun. Nyi kööb wun kì ri gen kenyi ying wun pɑc, wɑlɑ̀ wu ying-ɑ pɑ̈l, wɑlɑ̀ wu ceg-ɑ ywömø, wɑlɑ̀ wu ogöögø.
Kɑ ge gweed wun ɑ́dyëddi uddi wun kí dhøggi kɑ̈lli wun.
O wu óbëëd wun, wuki nyigi wun ki keny me bɑ̈ɑ̈r kì piny-ɑ ɑ́kwøb yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kinni, gø ómëgge kweyyi wun. Wu óbëëdø kì pinyɑni ki kɑɑm me bɑ̈ɑ̈r ni kɑɑm-ɑ nud mɑl kì kömi piny.
“Cigg-ɑ ɑ́mëggɑ wun, mïdhu gen kidøøj. Mɑɑru Jwøøg wun, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, nyi gwøgu gïn-ɑ ɑ́cïgɑ wun, kɑ yïëyø mi wun mïdhi wun.
Codhe o jurr-ɑ kyeelø bënn cyedde kì bøli wun, o pödhh-ɑ ɑ́bëëd ge teg, o ge døngø kibøli wun kwɑny yi wun.
