Piny-ɑ ókedhi yi wun, kɑ tyelli wun këël wun yije, ceg-ɑ gwøg ɑ́ mi wun. Piny wun cɑ̈g-ɑ́ɑ̀ yij pɑ̈l kì wɑɑng wurlwɑl gïti kïtti Lubnɑn kì wɑɑng wuudø, o cɑ̈ge kì kömi Nɑm Porɑt kì wɑɑng cyɑ̈ɑ̈ng mwøl, gïti kömi Nɑɑm Omeli Tɑr kì wɑɑng cyɑ̈ɑ̈ng böörø.
Ji ógöjji bwøgø yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kì keny-ɑ kedhi yi wun kì yij pinyɑni, ni kɑ ɑ́kööbe ceth, o bong dhɑnhø men-ɑ ólwɑ̈ng wun ki jogø.
“Yɑ cïb-ɑ gyëdh geki cyën bøli wun dicyɑ̈ngtïn;
bɑ gyëdh ke mïdhu ciggi Jwøøg wun, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, cigg-ɑ ɑ́mëggɑ wun dicyɑ̈ngtïn.
De bɑ cyën ke pɑ mïdhi ciggɑni yi wun, kɑ wu kedh-ɑ be mɑlli jwögg møøgø, mø nuti pɑ̈nyø mɑllø yi wun cøn.
Keny-ɑ ókïdhi wun piny-ɑ ókwɑny yi wun ɑ́ mi wun yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, wøw wun gyëdh kì Kïti Geridhïm, kɑ cyën wøw wun kì Kïti Ebɑl.
(Kïttɑni ryeet ying-ɑ løøg Nɑm Urdun kì wɑɑng cyɑ̈ɑ̈ng böörø kì piny tyëng Kɑnɑɑn møg-ɑ bëëdø kì Töör Urdun. Ge ying-ɑ wɑɑng cyɑ̈ɑ̈ng böörø, o ge cyɑ̈gi ki yenhi kwër kì Moriyɑ̀ kì buti Gilgɑl).
Wu bɑ̈ɑ̈n-ɑ Nɑm Urdun, wu kedh-ɑ be kwɑnyi pönh-ɑ ɑ́mëggi wun yi Jwøøg wun, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, ókwɑny yi wun ceth, kɑ wu obëëdø kì yije.
De wu di dwɑddø o wu mïdhu cigg geki kwöng-ɑ ɑ́mëggɑ wun dicyɑ̈ngtïn, mïdhu gen ceth.
“Bene cigg-ɑ ómïdhi yi wun ek, ki runn-ɑ óbëëd wun kì piny-ɑ mëggi wun yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, ɑ bɑ Jwøøg kweyyi wun ɑ́ men kwɑny yi wun gïti ɑtheer. Mïdhu ciggɑni kidøøj, kɑ wu göög wun kì bɑng gen.
Kɑ̈jj-ɑ ɑ́bëëd ge nyii mɑ̈ddø yi jurr-ɑ ɑ́ying pinyɑni, cøøru gen piny, kɑ kɑ̈jj-ɑ nyi mɑlli jwögg møgɑni kì wɑ̈thi ótøng cøør wun piny, kí møg-ɑ thɑ̈thi yenh-ɑ mɑr.
Cøøru këlli lɑm mø gen piny, kɑ yïkki gen kedhhi wun. Rɑ̈bu ngïjji Aceerɑ̀ jwøøg gen, jwøng-ɑ dhɑjø, kɑ ngïji jwögg tørri wun, o ge cög gen ge pɑ cigi mɑllø kì kɑ̈jjɑni.
“Jwøøg wun, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, ko mɑlli wun ki yëth-ɑ mɑlli jwögg-ɑ kyeelø yi jii gen.
Jwøøg wun, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j ókɑ̈bbi kì kelli pìnyi wɑ̈thi kɑ̈lli wun, ki kej ɑ́kyel me nyi kedhi yi teedø bëne be mɑllii.
Kenyɑni ɑ kïdhi wun gëdhhi wun, gëdhh-ɑ rɑ̈b geki gëdhh-ɑ kyeelø, kí ɑ́kyeel pyɑ̈rri jɑmmi wun, kí jwödhø, kí wïj köngi wun, kí kɑyyi dhögi wun geki dyëgi wun.
Kenyɑni kì bøli Jwøøg wun, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, ɑ ógyëëdh wun, kenyɑni ɑ ócyɑ̈ɑ̈m wun, wuki kɑ̈lli wun, o pëthi wun med gen kɑ̀ cɑmu jɑmm-ɑ ɑ́gwøg yi wun ki kwɑ̈ɑ̈g wun.
“Keny-ɑ óbëën bøli kenyɑni, wu koo göögø ki gwøøg cøn, ɑ ɑ́göög dhɑnhø wïje. Gïti ɑnɑn, wu kwɑ̈jj-ɑ yëth-ɑ dwɑddi yi wun,
kipe kɑ̀ nuti kedhu piny-ɑ mëggi wun yi Jwøøg wun Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, piny-ɑ yije óbëëd yi wun ki mër.
Keny-ɑ óbɑ̈ɑ̈n wun Nɑm Urdun, wu ówëggi bëëdø kì pinyɑni yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, wu ókorri yi en kipe tyëngmɑ̈ɑ̈nø bënn, wu óbëëdø ki mër.

Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j ómëggi ki kej ɑ́kyel ɑ́ keny nyi mɑllii, kɑ jɑmm-ɑ ɑ́cïge wun bënn nyi kïdhu kunɑni, ɑ løg gëdhhì mø wun møg-ɑ rɑ̈b geki gëdhh-ɑ kyeelø, kí ɑ́kyeel pyɑ̈rri jɑmmi wun geki jwödhø, kí wïj köngi wun møg-ɑ ɑ́köbbu Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kinni ge ómuuj yi wun.

Bëëd wun pëthi wun omedø kì bøli Jwøøg wun, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j wuki nyigi wun, kí bɑ̈nggi wun, kí Kwɑrri Leebì møg-ɑ bëëdø kì kɑ̈ddi wun, mɑ́ yï gen bong piny mɑ ɑ́mëggi gen ɑ́ mi gen, ni wɑ̈thi kɑ̈ll-ɑ kyeelø.
Wu ko nyi wɑ̈dhi ngɑl ki gëëdhi kì keny-ɑ dwɑddi yi wun,

nyi ngɑl wun gen kì keny-ɑ ómyeg yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kì yij piny kɑl ɑ́kyel kì kelli kɑ̈ddi wɑ̈thi kɑ̈lli wun. Kenyɑni ɑ ómuuj wun ki gëdhh-ɑ rɑ̈b, yije thyew ɑ ógwøøg jɑmm-ɑ kyeelø bënn møg-ɑ ɑ́cïgɑ wun.

“De wu ócuggø cɑm ki rïnggi jɑmmi wun kì keny-ɑ bëëd wun. Wu ócuggø cɑm ki jɑmm-ɑ ɑ́mëggi wun yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j bënn, ni kɑ̀ dwɑddu en. Wu ceg-ɑ cɑm ki gen cɑgg wu ywëdhø, wɑlɑ̀ wu dhïw, ni ke di cɑm wun rïngi tɑ̈ng wɑlɑ̀ rïngi ɑ́køny.
De remmi gen ko cɑm wun, kønyu remmi gen piny ni pï.

Jɑmm-ɑ mëggu Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j ko cɑm kì keny megø, cɑgg ɑ́ ɑ́kyeel pyɑ̈ri byelli wun, wɑlɑ̀ møgi oløg, wɑlɑ̀ møøw dhetun, kí kɑyyi dyëgi wun geki dhögi wun, kí wïj köngi wun, kí jwödhø, wɑlɑ̀ gëdhh-ɑ kyeelø.

Cɑmu jɑmmɑni kì keny-ɑ ómyeg yi Jwøøg wun, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, cɑɑm gen kì bøli Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j yi wun, wuki nyigi wun, kí bɑ̈nggi wun, kí Kwɑrri Leebì møg-ɑ bëëdø kì kɑɑl wun, kɑ wu bëëd wun pëthi wun omedø kipe gïn-ɑ gwøg yi wun.
Jɑmm-ɑ nyi mëggi Kwɑrri Leebì ko nyi wiy ki muujø kì cyɑ̈ngg-ɑ óbëëd wun bënn kì pinyɑni, piny wun.
“Keny-ɑ ólɑɑny piny wun yi Jwøøg wun, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j ni kɑ ɑ́kööbe, wu ócyɑ̈mø ki rïngø ni kɑ̀ dwɑddii yi wun.

Mɑ́ keny-ɑ ómyeg yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j ógöögø ki me lɑ̈wi ki wun, dhɑnhø ócuggø ngɑl ki dyel wɑlɑ̀ dhyɑng me cɑm yi en, kì keny-ɑ bëëde, kì ri jɑmm-ɑ ɑ́mëggi wun yi Jwøøg wun, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, kɑ wu ocyɑ̈mø ki rïngø ni kɑ̀ dwɑddii yi wun, kì kɑɑl wun ni kɑ ɑ́köbbɑ wun.
Ngɑn dhïw wɑlɑ̀ ywëdhø ócuggø cɑm ki rïngɑni, ni ke di cɑm wun rïngi tɑ̈ng wɑlɑ̀ rïngi ɑ́køny.
De rïngø ko cɑm wun ki remø kì ree, remø bɑ wëy, ko cɑm wun kyeel ki rïngø.
Remø ko cɑm wun, nyi køny wu en piny ni pï.
Keløg ciggɑni ómïdhi yi wun, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j pyëwe óbëëd e med, kɑ bong-ɑ gïn cɑ̈nni wun, wuki kwɑrri wun.
Jwödhø geki wïj köngø bënn, nyi kïdhu gen kej mɑ̈ddø men-ɑ ómyeg yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j.
Muuj wun kì kenyɑni kì wïj këli lɑm mi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j ki gënh-ɑ nyi rɑ̈b bëne, nyi ngɑ̈ɑ̈d wun kì kenyɑni ki gëdhh-ɑ kyeelø thyew, gɑ møg cɑm yi wun, kɑ remmi gen nyi køny wïj këli lɑm.
Mïdhu møg-ɑ ɑ́cïgɑ wun bënn, o bëëd e bong gïn cɑ̈nni wun, wuki kwɑrri wun gïti ɑtheer, mɑ́ wu gwøg-ɑ dyër, gïn-ɑ mïni pyëw Jwøøg wun, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j.
“Pödhh-ɑ kyeelø ónɑ̈g yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, Jwøøg wun keny-ɑ ókedh wun, wu mɑɑg-ɑ piny gen, kɑ pinyɑni kwɑny yi wun, kɑ wu pëgg-ɑ yije.
Keny-ɑ órum jurrɑni ki nɑ̈gø yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, wu ko ngöyi ki yëth-ɑ nyi kwɑjji gen jwöggi gen, mɑ́ menɑni óbëëd ɑ́ gïn kɑ̈ni ki thøø.

Jwøøg wun, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j ko kwɑjji wun ki yëth-ɑ nyi kwɑjji jurrɑni jwöggi gen, mɑ́ kenyi kwɑjji gen jwöggi gen, ge nyi gøgg-ɑ gïgrijjø mø mɑɑn yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j. Men-ɑ́ nyigi gen nyi rɑ̈bbi ge’ jwöggi gen kì wɑ̈thi këlli lɑm, gɑ gëdhhì.
“Jøtöng wɑlɑ̀ tyëng-ɑ nyi bɑ̈gø ki lɑ̈g ócuggø kwøb ce ge ogöögø ki gïïngɑ̈ngø,
kipe kinni o wu cɑ̈gi wun ki kwɑjji jwögg mø nuti pɑ̈nyø kwɑjjø yi wun cøn. De cɑgg møg-ɑ kwøb yi gen bï gɑ dyër,
kwøbbi gen ko lïngi wun. Ge bɑ møg rɑɑng wun yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, kipe kinni o yod mɑ́ mɑɑr wun Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j ki pëthi wun bënn.
Lugi wun kì bɑng Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kɑ wør wun, lïngu kwøbbe kɑ cigge mïdhi wun, nyi mɑllu en kɑ yïëyø mi wun mïdhi wun.

De nyi nɑ̈g wun tyëngbɑg ki lɑ̈g, geki tyëngtöng møg-ɑ köbbi wun bɑnyi kwøbbi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, ɑ ɑ́yïëël wun wɑ̈g kì Rïp kun-ɑ ɑ́bëëd wun, wu bɑ bɑ̈ngg. Ji-ɑ ni møgɑni rijjø, ge dwɑdd-ɑ kɑ̈ɑ̈li wun wɑ̈g kì yij bëëdø men-ɑ ɑ́cïgi wun yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j. Nɑ̈ɑ̈g gen ceth, o ri wun yiel wun ki rɑjjɑni.

“Cɑgg ɑ́ ómyëw, wɑlɑ̀ wɑ̈dí, wɑlɑ̀ nyɑrí, wɑlɑ̀ cyëgí men-ɑ mɑɑr yi yïn, wɑlɑ̀ mɑ̈dhí mɑ̈nh-ɑ pere teg, yï ócuggø pɑngø yi en kì gød, kɑ yï thɑɑbe be kwɑjji jwögg-ɑ pɑth, jwögg-ɑ ɑ́bëëd ge kwïj yi kweyyi wun.
Ódi ɑ́kyel kì kelli gen me thɑɑb yïn be mɑlli jwöggi tyëng-ɑ bëëdø kì keny, wɑlɑ̀ jwöggi tyëng-ɑ bëëdø kì kun lɑ̈wi.
Rií ko wëggí thɑbø yi gen, yï ko pɑ̈nyi lïngø ki kwøbbi gen. Pyëwí ko lɑ̈ɑ̈m ki gen, wɑlɑ̀ yijí ko ywöngi kipere, kɑ ge ko korrí.
Nɑ̈g gen! Wiy bëëde ɑ́ yïn ɑ kwöngi ki bɑ̈ddø, kɑ ge bɑ̈lli yi ji bënn.
Bɑ̈lli gen ki tuggi kïttì o ge thøw gen! Mɑ́ ge dwɑdd-ɑ peeji wun yïnø. O Jwøøg wun, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j wiy yi wun, eni ngɑn-ɑ ɑ́yiel wun kì cingi Rïp kun-ɑ ɑ́bëëd wun, wu bɑ bɑ̈ngg.
Keny-ɑ ólïngi gïn-ɑ ɑ́cwöb yi tyëng Isrɑil, ge óbwøg, kɑ bong-ɑ dhɑnhø me göögø ki orøng ni menɑni këti.
“Keny-ɑ ópëggu kɑ̈dd-ɑ mëggi wun yi Jwøøg wun, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, wu ólïngø kinni,
i dɑ ji mø rijjø kì kelli tyëng pödhi wun, mø thɑɑb tyëng kɑɑl gen be mɑlli jwögg mø nuti mɑllø yi wun cøn.
Keløg wu olïngø ki gïg ni møgɑni, yɑbu thɑ́ kwøbbɑni kidøøj, mɑ bëëd gɑ dyër, kinni gïn ni menɑni cwöbø. Keløg ɑ́ dyër,
kɑ tyëng kɑɑlɑni nɑ̈g wun bënn geki dhögi gen kí dyëgi gen thyew. Rënyu kɑɑlɑni bëne ceth, ko di gïn döng.
Cøngu jɑmmi kɑɑlɑni bënn dïkɑɑl, kɑ ge rɑ̈bbu Jwøøg wun, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j gɑ gëëdhi, kɑ kɑɑlɑni wiy bëëde e rënyø gïti ɑtheer, ko cigi gerø këti.
Ko di gïjø me kwɑny yi wun kì ri jɑmm-ɑ ɑ́kwøb kinni rënyi gen kinni tek, o liny Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kwöje, o pyëwe lɑ̈ɑ̈me ki wun; pyëwe ólɑ̈ɑ̈m ki wun, kɑ wu óngënyø ni kɑ ɑ́köbbe kweyyi wun cøn,
keløg cigge bënn møg-ɑ ɑ́mëggɑ wun dicyɑ̈ngtïn ómïdhi yi wun, kɑ gïg-ɑ dwɑddi yi en nyi gwøg yi wun.
Wu bɑ jii Jwøøg wun, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, wu ɑ́yieny yi en kì kelli jurri kömi piny bëne, o wu gwøge wun ɑ́ møge.
“Wu ko pɑ̈nyi cɑm ki gïn-ɑ ɑ́kwøb yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kinni ywëdhø.
Wu ócuggø cɑm ki dhög, kí dyëg ɑ́tegg geki römm,
kí nger, kí tenø, kí tɑ̈ng,
geki lɑ̈yy-ɑ yï gen di dɑdd, ɑ nyi dwöögø ki lum.
De lɑ̈yy-ɑ yï gen bong dɑdd, ɑ pɑ nyi dwöögø ki lum, ko pɑ̈nyi ki cɑmø yi wun: Amɑlø, kí ɑ́pwøjø, kí kunikït ge ko cɑm wun, ge ywëdhø, mɑ́ ge odwöögø de yï gen bong dɑdd.
Wu ko cyɑ̈ɑ̈m ki kundhøngø. Kundhøngø ywëdhø, mɑ́ yïe dɑ dɑdd, de pɑ dwöögø ki lum. Lɑ̈yyɑni ko pɑ̈nyi wun ki cɑmø, wɑlɑ̀ ko pɑ̈nyi wun ki nywɑlø ge thøø.
“Wu ócuggø cɑm ki rijj-ɑ ri gen di kwɑ́j, o ri gen dɑ ótùn,
de wu ko cyɑ̈ɑ̈m ki gïg-ɑ nɑm, ɑ ri gen bong kwɑ́j kí ótùn, ge ywëdhø.
“Wu ócuggø cɑm ki winyy-ɑ dhïw.
De wu bɑ ɑkerø ki cɑmi winy møg: ótïngø, tulø, ólidh, kïïr, ójulø, cor, ɑ́gɑg, wudø, ɑ́bɑmɑc, ówɑngø, ogwørø, bøngø, ɑ́lebø, tögɑcwig kí ɑlïlït.
“Twöngg-ɑ ri gen di obërr bënn ywëdhø, ge ko cɑm wun.
Wu ócuggø cɑm ki twöngg-ɑ dhïw.
“Nyɑɑr dyel rømø wɑlɑ̀ ɑ́tegø ko thɑl wun ki cɑɑg meye.

Codhe, kɑ wu kedhu keny-ɑ ómyeg yi Jwøøg wun, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j ɑ́ keny mɑllii, kɑ ɑ́kyeel pyɑ̈rri jɑmmi wun cɑm kì kenyɑni, kì bøle, cɑɑm gen kì bøli Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j ceth, eni byëlø, kí møgi oløg, kí møøw dhetun, kí kɑyyi dhögi wun geki dyëgi wun. Nyi gwøg wun gïn ni menɑni ceth, o wu dïd wun ki wøri Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j.
Keløg kej mɑ̈ddø lɑ̈wi ki pɑɑ wun, o jɑmmɑni pɑ cuggi tërø, ngeew ɑ́kyeel pyɑ̈rri jɑmm-ɑ ɑ́gëdhhi wun yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j wɑ̈g, kɑ ngyënyyɑni kïdhu kej mɑ̈ddø,
Kɑ ge ngëëw wun ki gïg-ɑ dwɑddi yi wun, ying-ɑ́ dhyɑng, wɑlɑ̀ dyel, wɑlɑ̀ møgi oløg, wɑlɑ̀ møgi byel, kɑ jɑmmɑni cɑm wun kì bøli Jwøøg wun, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kì kunɑni wuki kɑ̈lli wun, ki medi pëëth.
“Kɑ Kwɑrri Leebì møg-ɑ bëëdø kì kelli wun ko twöön wun, mɑ́ yï gen bong jɑmmì mø bɑ mø gen.
Nyi cøng wun ɑ́kyeel pyɑ̈rri jɑmmi wun bënn kej ɑ́kyel kì kɑ̈ddi wun, kì ri thumi dɑ̈ɑ̈g runn.

Gïncɑm menɑni bɑ mi Kwɑrri Leebì, mɑ́ yï gen bong jɑmmì, gï nywɑg yi gen kɑ wëdhh, kí kïjj, kí thwömm møg-ɑ kɑ̈ddi wun. Nyi dwɑ̈ni gen ki gïg-ɑ dwɑddi yi gen bënn. Nyi gwøgu møgɑni ceth, o jɑmm-ɑ gøggi yi wun bënn gyëdh yi Jwøøg wun, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j.
“Kì ri thumi bïryeew runn, kɑ ngyënyyi wun møg-ɑ cwɑggi ji wïyu gen, ge pɑ col këti.
Kinni ngɑn wïdhi wɑɑd gen ngeti Isrɑil ki ngyëny, wïye kwör ngɑnɑni, ngyënyyɑni ko col këti, kwörɑni ɑ́kyer-ɑ yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kiree kinni ko pir.
Ngyënyyí møg-ɑ cwɑggi ngɑnpɑth ócuggø pirø yi yïn, de wɑɑd wun ngeti Isrɑil, wïyí kwör-ɑ cwɑgge, ko piir.
“Yï ógyëdh yi Jwøgí, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kì piny-ɑ mëgge yïn. Bong dhɑnhø kì kelli jii wun men-ɑ óbëëdø wɑnge cɑn,
keløg kwøbbi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j ólïngi yi yïn kɑ møg-ɑ ɑ́cïgɑ wun dicyɑ̈ngtïn mïdhi yi wun kidøøj.
Wu ógyëdh yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j ceth ni kɑ ɑ́kööbe, pödhh mø gïïr ówïdhi kì yï wun, de wu pɑ wïdhi kì yï gen, pödhh mø gïïr ójɑɑg yi wun, de wu pɑ jɑɑg yi gen.
Nyi wïdhu en ki gïn-ɑ dwɑddi yi en ceth.
Kɑ ko mɑ̈ɑ̈n wun, kipe kinni runi wiyi körr cyɑ̈ngø. Rumm-ɑ rijjø ni møgɑni ko wëggu bëën wɑ̈thi wun. Keløg e mɑ̈ɑ̈nu wïdhø, ywøøg-ɑ kö Jwøk, kɑ wu óyïddø ki ker.
Thödhí wɑɑd wun yijí bong ɑ́dud, o jɑmmì bënn møg-ɑ gøggi yi yïn gyëdh yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j.
Ódi tyëng Isrɑil mø nyingi gen cɑn, ge jɑdø ceth, yɑ ceg-ɑ wun cyee, ge ko nyi twöön wun.
Keny-ɑ ógønyí, ko wëggí kedhø ki cingge,
nëngí kì ri jɑmm-ɑ ɑ́gëdhhi yïn yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j; ɑ løg dyëg, kí byel, kí møgi oløg.
Pɑrru kinni wu ɑ́bëëd wu bɑ bɑ̈ngg kì Rïp, ɑgøøny wun yi Jwøøg wun, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kì yij bɑ̈ɑ̈ngø, bene ɑ bɑnge cïgɑ wun møg dicyɑ̈ngtïn.
“De keløg bɑ̈ngí óbɑ̈nyø’ kedhø, ócuggø bëëdø, mɑ́ yï mɑɑr yi en wuki gølí, o pyëwe tyer-ɑ bëëdø ki wun.
Cïb ɑ́dyëddi ødí, kɑ yïthe twïy, ceg-ɑ gwøg ki bɑ̈ngí ki runn-ɑ ónëëne bënn. Gwøg bɑ̈ngg-ɑ mɑ̈nn kinøw thyew.
Yï ko bëëd yijí teeg ki gønyi bɑ̈ng, mɑ́ yï ɑ́göggi yi en kɑ budi köögi mi ngɑn di kïr, ki runn ɑ́bïkyel. Ogønyií, gïg-ɑ gøggi yi yïn bënn ógyëdh yi Jwøgí, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j.
Nyi cɑmu gen wuki kɑ̈lli wun kì bøli Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, kì keny-ɑ bɑ kej mɑ̈ddø, kì yethi runn bënn.
De ke di gïjø me rɑj kì ree, ying-ɑ́ ngwøl, wɑlɑ̀ cwør, wɑlɑ̀ dɑ gïjø megø me rɑj kì ree, ko pɑ̈nyi ki ngɑ̈lli Jwøøg wun, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j.
Cɑmu møgɑni kì kɑɑl wun, cɑɑm gen yi tyëng-ɑ dhïw geki tyëng-ɑ ywëdhø bënn, ni rïngi ɑ́køny wɑlɑ̀ rïngi tɑ̈ng.
De remmi gen ko cɑm wun, nyi køny piny ni pï.
Kedhí keny-ɑ nyi mɑ̈ddi, kɑ yï ngɑ̈ɑ̈d kì kenyɑni ki órömø, wɑlɑ̀ wɑdh kì kelli jɑmmí, men cɑm ɑ́ Ákɑɑdh men wøøw Jwøgí, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j.

Cɑm ki ópuun olwëny, cɑm wun olwëny, ɑ cwøl ɑ́ ópuun orɑng, ki cyɑ̈ng ɑ́bïryew, wu pɑr-ɑ cyɑ̈ng-ɑ ɑ́bëën wun wɑ̈g kì Rïp wu ójwɑnø, cyɑ̈ngɑni ko pɑ̈nyi wïlø kì wɑ̈thi wun ki cyɑ̈ngg-ɑ ónëën wun kì kömi piny.
Ko di kɑl me yije di ówɑj kì piny wun ki cyɑ̈ng ɑ́bïryew møgɑni, kɑ rïngi dyel wɑlɑ̀ rïngi dhyɑng men-ɑ ónɑ̈g kì cyɑ̈ng-ɑ mɑl cɑm bëne kì wɑ̈rɑni ceth, ko di men wɑ̈dhi dhuki.

“Ngɑɑl gïi Ákɑɑdh kì keny-ɑ ómyeg yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j ɑ́ kej mɑ̈ddø, ko ngɑl kì keny megø, kì yij piny-ɑ mëggi wun yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j. Ngɑl cɑ̈ng kedh-ɑ piny, ɑ løg bøli keny-ɑ ɑ́bëën wun wɑ̈g kì Rïp.
Thɑɑl rïngø kɑ cɑm kì kej mɑ̈ddø, kɑ yï døøg pɑɑrí dhuki kì mwøl.
Kɑ wu tyëg wun cyɑ̈ng ɑ́bïkyel wu cɑm-ɑ olwëny, kɑ ri wun cøng wun be mɑlli Jwøøg wun, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kì bïryeew cyɑ̈ng. Kɑ ko di gwøg kì cyɑ̈ngɑni.
Codhe, kɑ Kwëër Kɑj gwøøg yï wør-ɑ Jwøgí, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j. Kɑ yï muuj ki jwödhø me kyëëw ki jɑmm-ɑ ɑ́gëdhhi yïn yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j.
Kɑ yï bëëd pyëwí med kì bøli Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, wuki nyigí, kí bɑ̈nggí, kí Kwɑrri Leebì, kí wëdhh, kí kïjj geki thwömm møg-ɑ bëëdø kì kɑɑl wun.
Mïdhu ciggɑni ceth, kɑ wɑ̈thi wun ko wïl kinni wu ɑ́bëëd wu bɑ bɑ̈ngg kì Rïp.
Tug wun kì yethi cyɑ̈nggɑni wuki nyigí, kí bɑ̈nggí, kí Kwɑrri Leebì, kí wëdhh, kí kïjj geki thwömm møg-ɑ bëëdø kì kɑɑl wun.

Wør wun Jwøøg wun, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j ki kwërɑni ki cyɑ̈ng ɑ́bïryew, kì keny-ɑ ómyeg yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j ɑ́ kej mɑ̈ddø. Med pëthi wun mɑ́ gïg-ɑ ɑ́gøggi yi wun bënn ɑ́gëdhhi wun yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, kɑ kɑj órumø.

“Jøg-ɑ cwøw bënn kì pödhø, nyi cugi gen kì keny-ɑ ómyeg yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j ɑ́ kej mɑ̈ddø, tyel ɑ́dɑ̈g kì yij run, ɑ løg cyɑ̈nggi Kwëër Ákɑɑdh, kí Kwëër Kɑj, kí Kwëër Akɑnnì. Kɑ dhɑnhø nyi kɑ̈ne ki jwödhø,
men-ɑ cuggi yodø yi en, e kyëëw ki jɑmm-ɑ ɑ́gëdhhii yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j.
“Kɑ wu rööny wun ki jɑggi burø geki jɑgg-ɑ kyeelø kì piny-ɑ mëggi wun yi Jwøøg wun, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j. Jøgɑni jɑɑg gen ji yethi gen bong geny.
Ge ko bëëd gɑ tyëngruj wɑlɑ̀ tyëng-ɑ nyi gënyø, kɑ ge ko nyi yïëy ki kwɑjjø ki gïïpiny, mɑ́ nyingi dhɑnhø nyii cøørø yi gïg-ɑ mëggii, kɑ gøny rënye, cɑgg e ceg bëëdø ɑ́ ngɑntir.
Bëëd wun wu pɑ gënyø, wu gøgg-ɑ dyër, o wu ókwɑny wun piny-ɑ mëggi wun yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, o wu ócög wun wu obëëdø kì yije.
Kɑ wu ko cwödhi piny ki löj mɑ kït, gïgɑni mɑɑn yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j.
“Jwøøg wun, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, ko nyi ngɑ̈ddi wun ki dhyɑng wɑlɑ̀ dyel me ree di gïnrɑj, menɑni mɑɑn yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j.
“Wu ólïngø kinni i dɑ dhɑnhø ying-ɑ́ jɑlø wɑlɑ̀ dhɑjø, me røngø kɑ Ciggi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j pyeme.
Kɑ kedh-ɑ be mɑlli jwögg møøgø, wɑlɑ̀ cɑ̈ng, wɑlɑ̀ dwɑ̈y wɑlɑ̀ kyell, gïg-ɑ ɑ́kyer yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j.
Keny-ɑ ólïngu møgɑni, yɑbu thɑ́ gen kidøøj, keløg ɑ́ dyër kinni gïnrɑj ni menɑni cwöbø kì Isrɑil,
kwɑnyu dhɑnhø menɑni, kɑ kïdhu ngɑ̈ɑ̈j kɑɑl, kɑ bɑ̈lli wun ki tuggi kïttì, o thøwe.
Nɑ̈ɑ̈g-ɑ kömi dhøggi ji-ɑ́ buti gen ɑ́gwøøg bɑ̈jjø menɑni gɑ ɑ́ryew wɑlɑ̀ ge ngenyø, de ko nɑ̈g keløg ɑ́ dhɑnhø ɑ́kyel ɑ köngi ce lïdhø.
Tyëng-ɑ köngi ce bɑ̈jjø menɑni liidh gen, gen ɑ kwöngi ki bɑ̈ddø ki tuggi kïttì, o teedø lunye’ bɑ̈l kì bɑng gen, bene yuu-ɑ ólɑ̈ɑ̈ny rɑjjɑni kì kelli wun.

“Keløg e dɑ gøny me teeg me dhɑ̈li løøgø yi jɑggi wun, me bɑ gøøny jɑmmì wɑlɑ̀ kedø, wɑlɑ̀ keløg e dhɑ̈lø’ yodø kinni ngɑn-ɑ nɑ̈ɑ̈g dhɑnhø nɑ̈ggø e ceg-ɑ gwɑ̈nyø, wɑlɑ̀ gø cɑɑg en kɑ tøønyø ki nɑ̈gø, kïdhu gøny-ɑ ni menɑni keny-ɑ ómyeg yi Jwøøg wun, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j ɑ́ kej mɑ̈ddø.
Kɑ gønyɑni thërri wun ókwër Kwɑrri Leebì, geki jɑngi burø men-ɑ ójyɑ̈ɑ̈gø kì bøli kenyɑni. Kɑ wiy gønyɑni løøg yi gen.
Gïn-ɑ ókwøb yi gen, en ɑ gwøg yi wun ceth.
Yïëy wun löggi gen, kɑ møg-ɑ ókwøb yi gen gwøg wun ceth, ko di gïn wiyu wɑ̈g kì ri gen.
Nɑ̈ɑ̈g ngɑn pyem dhøg ókwërø, wɑlɑ̀ dhøg jɑngi burø, bene yuu-ɑ ólɑ̈ɑ̈ny rɑjjɑni kì Isrɑil.
Codhe, o óbëëd e bong ngɑn göögø’ nøw këti.
Røny wun ngɑn-ɑ ómyeg yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kì kelli wɑddi wun, wu ko rööny ki ngɑnpɑth, ɑ́ rɑ̈dh me jɑɑg wun.
Rɑ̈dh ko bëëd yïe dɑ kyënyi liny mø gïïr, wɑlɑ̀ ko ödi Rïp ki jøg dwɑ̈ddi ki kyënyì, mɑ́ Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j ɑ́kyëëd kinni jie ko døøg pönhɑni këti.
Rɑ̈dh ko bëëd yïe dɑ mɑ̈nn mø gïïr kipe pyëwe ókedhi wɑ̈ye kì ri Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, wɑlɑ̀ yïe ko di dhɑb kí ɑ́tegø mø ngenyø ki mendwøng.
Keny-ɑ ópëgge wïj kwøøm rɑ̈ɑ̈dhø ceth, bëëde yïe dɑ wɑ̈nyi Ciggi Jwøk, gwed e kwɑny-ɑ ri men-ɑ yï Kwɑrri Leebì ókwër.
Bëëd wɑ̈nyɑni kì bute ceth, o nyi rɑ̈nge kì yije kì yethi cyɑ̈ngg-ɑ ónëëne kì kömi piny, o dïde ki wøri Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, o mïdhe møg-ɑ ɑ́ceg yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j bënn.

O mɑ̈ɑ̈n rumø yi bëëdi wɑ̈nyɑni kì bute, kinni pere teg kibøli tyëng Isrɑil møg-ɑ kyeelø, o Ciggi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j cög gï pɑ pɑ̈nye ki pyemø. Bene keny-ɑ ójyɑ̈ɑ̈ge ki runn mø gïïr, kɑ Isrɑil jɑɑg yi kwɑrre ki rïjj mø gïïr.
“Ókwër, ɑ løg Kwɑrri Leebì, bong piny me mëggi gen kì Isrɑil, de ge cɑm-ɑ jwödhø geki gëdhh-ɑ kyeelø møg-ɑ nyi mëggi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j.
Bong piny men-ɑ óbëëd ɑ́ mi gen ni kɑ̈ll-ɑ kyeelø. Lɑ̈gø mi gen, bɑ bëëdi gen gɑ ókwërri Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, ni kɑ ɑ́kööb Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j ceth.
“Kenyi ngɑɑl dhyɑng wɑlɑ̀ dyel ɑ́ gëëdhi, nyi mëggi ókwër bɑd, kí lëmø, kí ɑkwej.
Nyi nëngi gen kì ri mwölli byel ceth, geki mwölli møgi oløg, kí møøw dhetun, kí yëyyi dyëg.
Gøl Leebì ɑ ɑ́myeg kì kelli kɑ̈lli wun bënn yi Jwøøg wun, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j ɑ́ men göggii gɑ ókwër, gïti ɑtheer.
“Ke dhwödh Kwɑɑr Leebì kì kɑɑl-ɑ bëëde kì kelli kɑ̈ddi wun, kɑ dɑ̈g-ɑ keny-ɑ tyer yi pyëwe,
wiy gööge ki nyingi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j ni wɑddi gen møg-ɑ göögø kì kɑɑl-ɑ ɑ́dɑ̈gge.
Nyi thödhi ceth ki gïncɑm me pɑ̈r ki men-ɑ mëggi ókwërr-ɑ kyeelø, o ke di gïn mëggii yi gøl gen kì kun-ɑ ɑ́kɑ̈ɑ̈le, bɑ mee.
“Keny-ɑ ókedhu yij piny-ɑ ɑ́mëggi wun yi Jwøøg wun, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, wu ko ngöyi ki gïgrijjø møg-ɑ gøggi yi jurr-ɑ bëëdø kì kenyɑni.
Nyigi wun ko rɑ̈b wun gɑ gëdhhì, kɑ ko di ngɑn thëdhø, wɑlɑ̀ rɑ̈ngø ki ɑjwøgø, wɑlɑ̀ kedhi yï tyëdd,
wɑlɑ̀ tyëng wëyrijjø, kɑ ko di ngɑn kedhi be pëjjø ki yɑdh.
Tyëng-ɑ nyi göögø ki gïgrijjø ni møgɑni mɑɑn yi Jwøgí, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, o bene ɑ bɑnge cyeede jurrɑni wɑ̈g, kɑ̀ kedh wu kedh-ɑ pinyɑni.
Mïdhu yïëyø mi wun ki Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j ceth.”

Codhe, ɑkööb Mosɑ̀ kinni, “Kì piny-ɑ yije kedhi yi wun, ji nyi kedh-ɑ yï ɑ́jwöggì be thyëdh, o ge nyi kedh-ɑ be pëjjø ki yɑdh. De wu bɑ ɑkerø yi Jwøøg wun, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j ki gwøg ki gwøng ni menɑni.
De wu óöde ki jɑltöng ni yɑn, men-ɑ ókwɑny yi en kì kelli wun; kɑ kwøbbe ólïngi wun ceth.
“Cyɑ̈ng-ɑ ɑ́cugi wun kì Kïti Sinɑy, wu ɑ́kwɑ̈jji kinni cwɑggi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j pɑ lïngi wun e okööbø këti, wɑlɑ̀ kinni mɑc men-ɑ yije nude pɑ lidh yi wun këti, mɑ́ wu ɑ́bwøg kinni wu óthøw.
Aköbbi yɑn yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kinni, ‘Ge ɑ́kwøb gïjø me døøj.
Ge óödɑ ki jɑltöng ni yïn, kì kelli jii gen. Óköbbɑ gïn-ɑ ókwøbe, o ji ólonye’ köbbi møg-ɑ cïgɑ en bënn.
Ókööbø kɑ nyingɑ, o ngɑn pɑ lïngi dhøge cɑyɑ’ cɑyø.
De keløg jɑltöng ókööbø ki nyingɑ ki wöödø me nuti köbbii yi yɑn, ceg-ɑ thøø kipe møgɑni. Jɑltöng men-ɑ ókööbø ki nyingi jwögg møøgø, ceg-ɑ thøø thyew.’
“Keløg wu órumø ki pëthi wun kinni óyod yi wun kidï kinni wöödø men pɑ kɑ̈ɑ̈l-ɑ yï Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j,
ke 'kööb jɑltöng ki nyingi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, kɑ møg-ɑ ɑ́kwøbe ocögø ge pɑ pɑ̈dhi kɑ̈jji gen, wöönɑni nuti kɑ̈ɑ̈l-ɑ yï Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, jɑltöngɑni 'kööb-ɑ cwɑgge, kɑ ko böggi wun.
“Keny-ɑ órum tyëng-ɑ piny gen mëggi wun ki nɑ̈gø yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, kɑ kɑ̈ddi gen kí uddi gen kwɑny yi wun, kɑ wu pëgg-ɑ yethi gen,
pɑ̈ngu pinyɑni ɑ́ bud ɑ́dɑ̈g, e bunï dɑ kɑɑl me yije cuggi jwɑnø ki wɑ̈dhø yi dhɑnhø. Codhe, o ngɑn nɑ̈g dhɑnhø e ceg-ɑ gwɑ̈nyø, ócugge’ yömmi yij ɑ́kyel kì kelli kɑ̈ddɑni e yieel-ɑ wëye kɑɑlɑni.
Ngɑn cinge gwɑ̈ɑ̈ny yi dhɑnhø, e ɑ́bëëd e bong mɑ̈ɑ̈nø kì kɑɑm gen, yömme kɑɑl ɑ́kyel kì kelli kɑ̈ddɑni.

Nimi keløg ji ɑ́ryew kedh-ɑ wɑg be ngøl ki yenh, kɑ nget ɑ́kyel ongudø ki yɑdh, kɑ dørø pɑ̈ɑ̈r-ɑ wɑ̈g kì ri böle, kɑ nyel-ɑ kyeelø nɑ̈g yi en, ngɑn-ɑ́ cinge ɑ́gwɑ̈ɑ̈ny yi dhɑnhø, yömme kɑɑl ɑ́kyel kì kelli kɑ̈ddɑni.

Ke bëëde ɑ́ kɑɑl ɑ́kyel ɑ nyi yömmi, ócuggø bëëdø e lɑ̈wi, kɑ ngɑn-ɑ́ cinge ɑ́gwɑ̈ɑ̈ny yi dhɑnhø ódhɑ̈lø jwɑn wɑ̈dhi yije, kɑ pïïd yi ngɑn-ɑ́ wɑɑd gen ɑ́nɑ̈g, kɑ gø nɑ̈ge ki rɑ̈ji pyëwe, ngö dhɑnhø ɑ́ceg-ɑ gwɑ̈nyø yøw kì cingi wɑɑd gen.
Bene ɑ bɑnge kööbɑ kinni kɑ̈bbi wun ki kɑ̈dd ɑ́dɑ̈g.
“Keny-ɑ ólɑɑny piny wun yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, ni kɑ ɑ́köbbe kweyyi wun, kɑ piny-ɑ ɑ́kwøbe kinni gø ómëgge wun bëne muuje,

kɑ wu kɑ̈bbi wun ki kɑ̈dd ɑ́dɑ̈g. Wu ómëggi pinyɑni yi Jwøøg wun, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, keløg møg-ɑ cïgɑ wun dicyɑ̈ngtïn ómïdhi yi wun kidøøj, kɑ Jwøøg wun, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j mɑɑr yi wun, kɑ wu obëëdø wu mïdh-ɑ cigge geki pwönye.
Gwøgu møgɑni o óbëëd e bong ngɑn yïe bɑ̈r me nɑ̈g kì piny-ɑ mëggi wun yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, kipe wu óyïddi ki cyën kì bɑng kɑ̀ nɑ̈g wun ngɑn yïe bɑ̈r, kì piny-ɑ mëggi wun yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j.
“De keløg dhɑnhø mɑ̈n ki wɑɑd gen, kɑ gø libe, kɑ gø nɑ̈ge, kɑ reng-ɑ kɑɑl ɑ́kyel kì kelli kɑ̈ddɑni,
öd jøgdøngi kɑɑlɑni, kɑ ngɑnɑni dwöög, kɑ wiy nɑ̈ɑ̈g kej cögø yi wɑddi ngɑn-ɑ ɑ́nɑ̈g yi en.
Pëthi wun ko lɑ̈ɑ̈m ki ngɑn tir dhɑnhø ki nɑ̈gø; ko bëëd kì Isrɑil, o óbëëd e bong rɑj kì kömi wun.
Keløg e dɑ ngɑn mënni kömi dhɑnhø ki kwøb kipe kinni o yïdde ki gïnrɑj,
kedhi gen yï ókwër geki jɑggi burø kì kej mɑ̈ddø, o gøøny gen lidh kì kunɑni.
Thɑ́ kwøbbɑni óyɑb yi jɑggi burø kidøøj, o keløg e óyod kinni ngɑnɑni mënn-ɑ kömi wɑ̈d Isrɑil ki kwøb mø pɑth ki dyër,
cɑɑy ngɑnɑni ki cɑ́y-ɑ di cɑɑy ngɑn-ɑ köme ɑ́mënni yi en. Bene yuu-ɑ ólɑ̈ɑ̈ny wun rɑjj-ɑ ni møgɑni.
Keny-ɑ ólïngi gïn-ɑ ɑ́cwöb yi teedø, ge óbwøg, kɑ bong-ɑ dhɑnhø me göögø ki orøng ni menɑni këti.
Pëthi wun ko nyi lɑ̈ɑ̈m ki møgɑni, cɑ́y bɑ kinni ceth, wëy col kɑ wëy, wɑng col kɑ wɑng, lëjø col kɑ lëjø, cingø col kɑ cingø, tyelø col kɑ tyelø.

“Keny-ɑ ókedhu be nyɑɑg ki tyëngmɑ̈ɑ̈nø, kɑ wu ólïdhø ki yɑ̈ɑ̈th, kí kyënyì geki yɑy me dwøng, me lod yɑɑy wun, wu ko bwøg yi gen. Jwøøg wun, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, ɑ ɑ́yïëël wun wɑ̈g kì Rïp, óying tuung wun.
Kedhi ókwërø bøli yɑy, e liny nuti tuumø kɑ kööbe kinni,
‘Wun ɑ jø Isrɑil, lïng wun! Wu kedh-ɑ be nyɑɑg dicyɑ̈ngtïn. Wu ko bwøg yi tyëngmɑ̈ɑ̈nø, wɑlɑ̀ pëthi wun ko nyönhi, wɑlɑ̀ wu ko myël.
Jwøøg wun, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j cyɑ̈dhi kɑ wun, o wu ówëgge tyɑ̈mø.’
“Codhe, o jɑngi liny köbbe yɑy kinni, “Dɑ ngɑn mɑ ɑ́cer gyer ki ød kì keny, de gø nuti thyeey en? Ke di ngɑn nuti thyeey øde, døøge pɑc, kipe keløg e ónɑ̈g kì yij liny, øde thyey-ɑ yi ngɑn megø.
Dɑ ngɑn cer pïdhø ki bɑg kì keny? Ke di ngɑn pïdhø ki bɑɑg oløg, de nywøli oløg nuti pɑ̈nyø’ lemø yi en, døøge pɑc, kipe keløg e ónɑ̈g kì yij liny, bɑ ngɑn megø ɑ ókwøng møgi oløge ki belø.
Dɑ ngɑn nyömi kì keny? Ke di ngɑn nyömi døøge pɑc, kipe keløg e ónɑ̈g kì yij liny, nyɑn-ɑ nywøm yi en, ónywøm-ɑ yi ngɑn megø.’
“Pyëëj yɑy thyew yi pëjji liny kinni, ‘Dɑ ngɑn mɑ ɑ́bwøg kɑ pyëwe ónyönhø? Døøg ngɑnɑni pɑc kipe yɑy pyëwe ónyönhi kì bɑnge.’
Keny-ɑ órum pëjji liny ki löggi yɑy, ngølli yɑy, kɑ wïj ɑkud nyi cïbi ki pëëji.
“Kenyi kedhu be pɑ̈ɑ̈r kömi kɑɑl, nyi köbbu tyëng kɑɑlɑni kinni yömmi gen.
Keløg dhø döri kɑɑl óyieb yi gen, kɑ ge óyömmø, teen-ɑ kɑɑlɑni bëne ceg-ɑ gwøg ki bɑ̈ngg møg göggi wun.
De keløg kɑɑlɑni óbɑ̈nyø ki yömmø, de ge dwɑdd-ɑ nyɑɑg, tyeg wun kɑɑlɑni.
Keny-ɑ ówëggi wun mɑgi kɑɑlɑni yi Jwøøg wun, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, nɑ̈gu jøg-ɑ cwøw bënn.
De tyëng-ɑ mɑ̈nn geki othønhø, kí dhög geki jɑmm-ɑ kyeelø bënn ócuggø kwɑnyø yi wun. Kwɑny wun jɑmmi tyëngmɑ̈ɑ̈nø møg-ɑ ɑ́cïb cinggi wun yi Jwøøg wun, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j.
Bene kër-ɑ ógwøg wun pödhh-ɑ lɑ̈wi ki piny-ɑ óbëëd yi wun ɑnɑn.
“De keny-ɑ ómɑg wun kɑ̈dd-ɑ piny-ɑ mëggi wun yi Jwøøg wun, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, nɑ̈gu ji bënn.
Nɑ̈gu jiɑni bënn, ɑ løg tyëng Kit, kí tyëng Amör, kí tyëng Kɑnɑɑn, kí tyëng Perïdh, kí tyëng Kib, kí tyëng Yebus, nɑ̈gu gen bënn ceth, ni kɑ ɑ́ceg wun yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j.
Nɑ̈gu gen, o wu cög wu pɑ kölli gen orøg kì bøli Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, yi keny-ɑ ópwönyi gen wun ki gïgrijjø møg-ɑ gøggi yi gen kenyi mɑlli gen jwöggi gen.
“Keny-ɑ ótyeg wun kɑɑl, wu dwɑdd-ɑ mɑgii, yenhi nywøl ko ngøl wun piny, cɑgg tyëg mɑg keny me bɑ̈ɑ̈r, cɑm wun nywøli yenhɑni, kɑ ge ko ngøl piny, mɑ́ yenh pɑth ki ji mø nyïɑ̈ggi ki wun.
De wu ócuggø ngøl ki yenh-ɑ kyeelø gɑ møg yïdhhi gïti keny-ɑ ómɑg wun kɑɑl.
“Keløg dhɑnhø oyodø e ónɑ̈gø kì piny-ɑ mëggi wun yi Jwøøg wun, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, o ngɑn-ɑ nɑ̈ɑ̈gii kwïj,
kedh jøgdøngø, kɑ kɑɑm keny-ɑ ɑ́yood dhɑnhø røm ki kɑ̈dd-ɑ cyɑ̈gi.
Kɑ jøgdøngi kɑɑl-ɑ cyɑ̈gi ki keny-ɑ ɑ́yood dhɑnhø, kɑ̈bbi gen ki røjø me nuti pɑ̈nyi køøg ki pwödhø.
Kɑ gø kïdhi gen tøg nɑm me pɑ nyi dwön, kì keny me nuti pɑ̈nyø purø. Kɑ mune tor gen.
Bëëd Kwɑrri Leebì ge nud kì kenyɑni thyew, mɑ́ gen ɑ cinggi gen di gøny, gen ɑ ɑ́yieny yi Jwøøg wun, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, o ge göggi gen en, o ge nyi kwëng gen ji ki nyinge.
Codhe, kɑ jøgdøngi kɑɑl-ɑ cyɑ̈gi ki keny-ɑ ɑ́yood dhɑnhø e ónɑ̈gø, cinggi gen lwøøg gen kömi rønyɑni,
kɑ ge kööb gen kinni ‘Dhɑnhø nuti nɑ̈g-ɑ yi wøn, o ngɑn-ɑ nɑ̈ɑ̈gii kwïj.
Yïn ɑ Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, lɑ̈ɑ̈m pyëwí ki Isrɑil, jií møg-ɑ ɑ́yïëël yi yïn wɑ̈g kì Rïp. Lɑ̈ɑ̈m pyëwí ki wøn, kɑ wø ko kwɑ̈nni cyënni ngɑn yïe bɑ̈r.’
Bene kër-ɑ ókɑ̈ɑ̈l wun cyënni ngɑn yïe bɑ̈r wɑ̈g kì kömi wun, keny-ɑ ógwøg wun gïndøj kì bøli Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j.
“Keny-ɑ ówëggi wun tyɑ̈mø yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kì yij liny, kɑ wu ómɑ̈gø ki ji,
kɑ yï ólïdhø ki ngɑndhɑjø me myëër, kɑ dwɑddí ki kwɑnyø ɑ́ dhɑjø,
kïdhí pɑc, kɑ yëyyi wïje lyel, kɑ könggi lwedde teb,
kɑ ógudhe wil. Kɑ wiy bëëde kì gølí ki dwɑ̈y e ywøg-ɑ wɑdde, codhe kɑ kïdhí ød, o gööge ki cyëgí.
Keny-ɑ ógööge e pɑ dwɑddi yi pyëwí, tɑ̈ɑ̈ng, kɑ wiy kedhe, ko ngeew wɑ̈g ɑ́ bɑ̈ng, mɑ́ e ɑ́rum ki gwøøg dhɑjø yi yïn.
“Keløg dhɑnhø yïe dɑ mɑ̈nn ɑ́ryew, kɑ ge okɑyø ki wɑ̈dd ryeet, de nyel-ɑ dwøng pɑth ki wɑ̈d cyëge men-ɑ mɑɑr yi en,
wɑ̈d nyɑn-ɑ mɑɑr yi en ócuggø kwɑnyø yi en ɑ́ wïj kɑl, kì cyɑ̈ng-ɑ ópɑ̈nge jɑmme møg-ɑ ólɑg.
De nyel-ɑ dwøng, ɑ løg wɑ̈d ɑ́lɑni ceg kɑ mëggi budi jɑmme bënn yi en, mɑ́ en ɑ bɑ kɑyi legge kidyër. Jɑmmì møge cïb gɑ møg di mëggi ji ɑ́ryew, mɑ́ kɑyø ceth ɑ bɑ wïj kɑl.
“Keløg dhɑnhø yïe dɑ wɑ̈de me pëmø, mune teeg, o pɑ lïngø’ kwøbbi wïye geki meye, cɑgg gø ceg yi gen,
kɑ̈l yi meye geki wïye, kɑ cïb bøli jøgdøngi kɑɑl-ɑ bëëd yi gen. Kɑ gønye lidh.
Kɑ jøgdøngø köbbi gen kinni, ‘Wɑ̈d wøn ceg-ɑ pëmø, o pɑ lïngø ki kwøbbi wøn, rëny-ɑ jɑmmì, o bɑ mɑ̈dhi møgø.’
Codhe kɑ nyelɑni bɑ̈lli ki tuggi kïttì yi jø kɑɑlɑni o thøwe, o rɑjj-ɑ ni møgɑni kɑ̈ɑ̈l wun wɑ̈g kì kelli wun, o Isrɑil lïnge, o bwøge.
“Keløg dhɑnhø onɑ̈gø kipe gïn bɑɑj en, kɑ ngɑɑb ri lööj yɑdh,
ko wëggi nïnni ri yɑnhɑni; kony kì cyɑ̈ngɑni ceth, mɑ́ dhɑnhø men-ɑ ryërri kì ri yɑdh köme dɑ cyënni Jwøk. Kony ceth, kipe piny-ɑ mëggi wun yi Jwøøg wun, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j óbwöl yi wun.
De keløg wɑ̈n bëëd ɑ keny me lɑ̈wi, wɑlɑ̀ ying wɑ̈n kwïj yi yïn, wiy bëëde kì yïí. Keny-ɑ óbëën wɑ̈n e oyɑ̈bø ki gøn, kɑ mëggií.
Gïi wɑɑd wun, ngeti Isrɑil keny-ɑ óyodií, döggií ceth, ying-ɑ́ ɑderø, wɑlɑ̀ ógødh, wɑlɑ̀ gïjø megø yøw.
“Ke pɑ̈ɑ̈dh dhii ngeti Isrɑil wɑlɑ̀ ɑdere, ko wøøy; køny wɑɑd wun ki tïngii kömi tyelle.
“Tyëng-ɑ mɑ̈nn ko rug ki ógudhi cwøw, kɑ cwøw ko rug ki ógudhi mɑ̈nn, ngɑn gwøg gïn ni menɑni mɑɑn yi Jwøøg wun, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j.
“Keløg winyø oyodø yi yïn e buud-ɑ kömi nywøle kì wïj yɑdh, wɑlɑ̀ kì piny, ying nywølɑni rumø’ tøgø wɑlɑ̀ ge nuti, meyi gen ko kwɑɑny geki nyige bënn.
Kwɑny nywøl, kɑ wiy meyi gen kedhe, o yï óbëëd kì kömi piny ki tɑrø ki keny me bɑ̈ɑ̈r.
“Keny-ɑ ógëëd ki ød me nyɑ̈n, gëddí tøgge kì wïje mɑl ki gël, e bɑ ɑwen bëne yi gëlɑni. O yï ócöög yï pɑ cɑy keløg e dɑ dhɑnhø me pɑ̈ɑ̈dh kì wïj ønɑni kɑ othøø.
“Wɑdh ko twööj ri gïjø ɑ́kyel men-ɑ köög ki pwödhø geki ɑderø.
“Yï ko rug ki ógødh men-ɑ ócwɑ̈jø ki yëyy geki korø, gɑ ɑreb.
“Ke nyömi jɑlø ki dhɑjø, kɑ ge kedh-ɑ ød, kɑ gø bɑnye kì cyɑ̈ɑ̈n piny,
ce gø yood en e ree ókedhø yi jɑlø megø, kɑ gø løge nyɑnrɑj, o kööbe kinni, ‘Nyɑɑn ɑ́nywømɑ kidyër, de keny-ɑ ɑ́kedhɑ ød wøki en, ɑ́yodɑ ree ókedhø yi jɑlø megø.’
“Keløg gïn ni menɑni ocwöbø, kedhi wïyi nyɑnɑni burø geki meye, ge kɑ̈ll-ɑ ógønh-ɑ ɑ́kïdhi nyɑɑr gen ød, kɑ gø nyudhi gen jɑgg.
Kɑ jɑggɑni köbbi yi wïyi nyɑnɑni kinni, ‘Nyɑrɑ ɑ́mëggɑ jɑɑl ɑ́ dhɑjø, o ɑnɑn gø ɑ́bɑnye,
köme ɑ́mënne ki kwøb, ce gø yood en ree ókedhø yi jɑlø megø, keny-ɑ ɑ́kïdhi gen ød. De lidh wun ógønh-ɑ ɑ́kïdhii ød èn ki remø kì ree!’
Pwööd nyelɑni yi jɑggi kɑɑl.
Kɑ köbbi gen cude ki ngyëny ɑ́tegg miyø, kɑ ge mëggi wïyi nyɑnɑni, gɑ møg geedh nyɑre, men-ɑ́ nyɑɑr Isrɑil. O nyɑnɑni ceg-ɑ cögø ɑ́ cyëge, ko pɑ̈nye tɑ̈ngø ki cyɑ̈ng-ɑ óbëëde bënn kì kömi piny.
“De keløg gønyɑni bɑ dyër kinni, nyɑnɑni ree ókedhø yi jɑlø megø, e nuti nywømø,

kïdhi nyɑnɑni dhøg gøl wïye, kɑ bɑ̈lli ki tuggi kïttì yi jø kɑɑlɑni, o thøwe. Nyɑnɑni ɑ́gwøg-ɑ gïnrɑj kì Isrɑil, kɑ ɑ́yɑ̈ɑ̈be ki cwøw e nuti nywømø; nɑ̈g ceth, o rɑjj-ɑ ni møgɑni kɑ̈ɑ̈l wun wɑ̈g kì kelli wun.
“Ke mɑɑg jɑlø e niin-ɑ cï jɑlø megø, nɑ̈ɑ̈g jɑlɑni geki ngɑn-ɑ ɑ́niine, o rɑjj-ɑ ni møgɑni kɑ̈ɑ̈l wun wɑ̈g kì kelli wun.
“Ke mɑɑg jɑlø e niin-ɑ dhɑjø me ceg ki nywømø, ge mɑg-ɑ kɑɑl,

kïdhu gen ryeet dhø pöör, kɑ ge bɑ̈lli wun ki tuggi kïttì, o ge thøw gen. Nyɑndhɑjø thøw kɑ per kɑ̀ nuti kïïw en keny-ɑ ɑ́mødii, ngö e ying-ɑ kɑɑl. O jɑlø thøw kɑ per kɑ ɑ́møde cï wɑɑd gen. Nɑ̈ɑ̈g gen ceth, o rɑjj-ɑ ni møgɑni kɑ̈ɑ̈l wun wɑ̈g kì kelli wun.
“De keløg nyɑndhɑjø men-ɑ nywøm mød-ɑ pɑ̈l yi jɑlɑni, bɑ jɑlø kete ɑ nɑ̈g.
Kɑ ko di gïn göggu nyɑndhɑjø, mɑ́ e bong gïn-ɑ ɑ́bɑje. Menɑni pɑ̈r ki ngɑn pɑ̈ɑ̈r kömi dhɑnhø kɑ gø nɑ̈ge.
Nyɑn-ɑ nywøm ɑ́mød-ɑ pɑ̈l yi jɑlɑni, ɑ́kïïw ceth de bong dhɑnhø mɑ ɑ́lïngi cwɑgge, mɑ́ kenyɑni bɑ yij pɑ̈l.
mëgge wïyi nyɑnɑni kɑ̈ny ceth, cole ngyëny ɑ́tegg pyɑ̈r ɑ́bïj, kɑ nyɑnɑni gööge ɑ́ cyëge ceth, mɑ́ gø ɑ́ceg yi en kɑ mødø. Ko pɑ̈nye ki tɑ̈ngø ki cyɑ̈ngg-ɑ ónëëne bënn kì kömi piny.
“Ngɑn bɑ órøj, wɑlɑ̀ cule óngul wɑ̈g, ko kwɑɑn kelli jii Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j.
“Wɑ̈n-ɑ kɑ̈ɑ̈l kì wɑ̈g, cɑgg ɑ́ kwɑrre gïti ri rïjj pyɑ̈rø, ko kwɑɑn kelli jii Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j.
Kipe kɑ ɑ́bɑ̈nyi gen ki thödhi wun ki pï geki gïncɑm keny-ɑ ɑ́bëën wun wu kɑ̈ɑ̈l-ɑ Rïp. Kɑ Bɑlɑɑm wɑ̈d Beor jɑl Pethör kì Arɑm kïr yi gen, o wu lɑ̈mme cyën.
De kwøbbi Bɑlɑɑm ɑ́bɑny yi Jwøøg wun, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, kɑ cyën løge gyëdh, mɑ́ wu mɑɑr yi en.
Pödhhɑni ko køny wun, o ge dönyi gen kinni tek.
“Tyëng Edöm ko bɑny wun, ge bɑ wɑddi wun. Kɑ tyëng Rïp ko bɑny wun mɑ́ wu ɑ́bëëd ɑ piny gen cøn.
Kwɑrri gen cɑg kì ri dɑ̈ɑ̈g rïjj, ócuggø kedhi kelli jii Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j.
“Keny-ɑ óbëëd wun wu ying-ɑ kɑɑl-ɑ gur ɑ́ kɑɑl liny, këëj wun gïg-ɑ cuggi ywëdhi wun.
Ke di jɑl me lɑ̈gø kì wɑ̈r, kɑ oywëdhø yi kɑ ɑ́kedhi ree yi tyew, rïïje e ying-ɑ ngɑ̈ɑ̈j kɑɑl.
Kɑ lwøgge kì böörø, codhe o dwööge kɑɑl cɑ̈ng óbuddø.
“Kɑ wu cïb wun ki keny me nyi meej tyel kì ngɑ̈ɑ̈j kɑɑl.
Kɑ dhɑnhø kɑ̈dde ki lodh me nyi konye kej cyëdhe, o gø nyi rïge ki lɑ̈bø kenyi rume ki mɑɑgi ree piny.
Mɑ́ Jwøøg wun, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j ócyɑ̈dhø kì kɑɑl wun, e køny-ɑ wun, o wu tyɑm wun tyëngmɑ̈ɑ̈nø. Mïdhu kɑɑl wun e dhïw, kipe Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j ólïdhi ki gïn ywëdhø, kɑ ngɑ̈je luge wun.
“Keløg bɑ̈ng opɑ̈ɑ̈rø kì yï wɑ̈n, kɑ yömm-ɑ yï wun, ko döggi wɑ̈n.
Wiy bëëde kì kɑɑl-ɑ dwɑddi yi en kì kelli kɑ̈ddi wun, kɑ wu bëëd wun mɑ̈ɑ̈dh ki en.
Thyew ngyëny møg-ɑ yod kì bɑng gïn ni menɑni, ko kïdhi ød Jwøøg wun, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j gɑ wïj köngø. Ámɑ̈jji keng mɑɑn yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j.

Wu ócuggø kïdhi kömi gïn wïdhi ngɑnpɑth ki ngeti Isrɑil, de gïn-ɑ widh yi ngeti Isrɑil köme ko kïdhi keny-ɑ ócolii; col ɑ́ en ceth. Mïdhu ciggɑni, o jɑmm-ɑ ógøggi yi wun bënn kì piny-ɑ mëgge wun gyëdh yi Jwøøg wun, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j.
Pɑth ki orøg keløg yï pɑ köngi kinni, ‘Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j ógöggɑ gïn-ɑni.’
O keløg yï óköngø, mïdhí köngí ceth.
“Keløg yï ócyɑ̈dhø yï kɑ̈ll-ɑ yij bɑɑg oløg mi wɑɑd wun, cɑ̈mmí yijí ki oløg, de yï ko kïdhi yij gïjø me kɑ̈lli yi yïn.
Kɑ keløg yï kɑ̈ll-ɑ pwödhi gemè mi wɑɑd wun, mööd cinggí ki byel mø nyɑm yi yïn, de yï ko nyɑ̈ɑ̈r ki ɑ́ngön.
keny-ɑ ókedhe kɑ nywøm yi jɑlø megø,
kɑ cigi bɑnyø yi jɑl-ɑ ɑ́nyömi kì cyɑ̈n, kɑ gø gwëde ki wɑ̈nyi tɑ̈ng, kɑ gø tɑ̈nge, wɑlɑ̀ jɑl-ɑ cyɑ̈n ceg-ɑ thøø,
pɑ cigi kwɑnyø yi jɑl-ɑ ɑ́kwøngii ki nywømø kɑ gø tɑ̈nge, mɑ́ e ɑ́göög ɑ́ ɑbwöl, gïn ni menɑni bɑny yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, o piny-ɑ mëggi wun yi Jwøøg wun, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j ko thödhi wun ki ker.
“Keny-ɑ óbëëd dhɑnhø cer-ɑ nywöm, ko wëggi kedhi be liny, wɑlɑ̀ ko göög ki gïg-ɑ nyi gwøg yi yɑy. Wiy bëëde kì gøle ki run ɑ́kyel, o tïïne wɑɑng cyëge.
“Keløg yï wïdh-ɑ dhɑnhø ki gïïpiny, kïti ɑwɑɑj gøle ko mɑɑg ɑ́ men döggii keny-ɑ ócole gïnɑni, kipe gøle ójɑd ki gïn guur ɑwɑj, kɑ ge mɑg yi kɑ̈j.
Nyi pɑr wun gïn-ɑ ɑ́göggi Miryɑm yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kì kö yöö, keny-ɑ ɑ́bëën wun wu kɑ̈ɑ̈l-ɑ Rïp.
de cungí kì wɑ̈g, kɑ wiy gø muuje yïn.
Keløg ɑ́ jɑl me wɑnge cɑn, ógødhe ko nin kì yïí,
nyi döggií kì thyënhø, o ree nyi kume ki gøn. O yï ópøjji yi en, kɑ Jwøgí, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j pyëwe løg-ɑ me med ki yïn.
nyi culí köönge cɑ̈ng nuti buddø, yethi cyɑ̈ng bënn, mɑ́ ge bɑ ji mø nyingi gen cɑn, kipe óywøøg kö Jwøk, kɑ yï cɑy yi Jwøk.
Nyi pɑrru kinni wu ɑ́bëëd wu bɑ bɑ̈ngg kì Rïp, ɑkɑ̈ɑ̈l wun wɑ̈g kì yij bɑ̈ɑ̈ngø yi Jwøøg wun, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, bene ɑ bɑnge cïgɑ wun møgɑni.
Keny-ɑ órum ki lemi nywøli yenh dhetun møgí, yï ko døøg be lemi møg-ɑ ɑ́bodh, wiy ge lem yi wëdhh kí kïjj, geki thwömm.
Keny-ɑ ólem oløgí, ko loor ki lemø këti, wiy møg-ɑ bodh lem yi wëdhh kí kïjj, geki thwömm.
Nyi pɑru kinni wu ɑ́bëëd wu bɑ bɑ̈ngg kì Rïp, bene ɑ bɑnge cïgɑ wun møgɑni.
“Keløg tyëng Isrɑil ɑ́ryew kedh-ɑ burø be gøny, kɑ ɑ́kyel kì kelli gen cwɑg, kɑ ngɑn-ɑ kyeelø cɑy,
keløg ngɑnɑni cɑy kɑ pwödø, köbbi yi jɑgø kinni budde yije rum en piny, kɑ pwöd. Kwɑnni dëll-ɑ pwöödii kyëëw kɑ döngi gïn-ɑ ɑ́bɑj yi en.
Ócuggø pwödø ki dëllì pyɑ̈r ɑ́ngwen, de ko di dhɑnhø me pwöd ki møg pöödh dëllì pyɑ̈r ɑ́ngwen, kipe wɑɑd wun pyëwe ónyönhi kì bøli teedø.
Wɑ̈n-ɑ ókwøng yi gen ki nywølø, cöll-ɑ nyel-ɑ ɑ́thøw kipe wïje ópɑ̈ɑ̈dh kì Isrɑil.
De keløg nyelɑni pɑ dwɑddi lɑgi cï ómen, kedhi nyɑnɑni yï jøgdøngi pɑc, kɑ̀ kööbe kinni, ‘Ómï jɑlgølɑ ɑ́bɑ̈nyi lɑgi yɑn, pɑ dwɑddi nywølø ki wïj ómen kipe wïj ómen ópɑ̈ɑ̈dh kì Isrɑil.’
Codhe kɑ nyelɑni cwööl yi jøgdøngø, kɑ köbbi. O keløg e nudd e óbɑ̈nyø ki lɑgii,
kedhi cï ómen yïe, kɑ wɑri nyelɑni lunye wɑ̈g. Kɑ nyingi nyelɑni ngudde ki lɑ́ɑ̀w kì bøli jøgdøngø ceth, kɑ ngɑnɑni kööbe kinni, ‘Bene gïn-ɑ nyi göggi ngɑn-ɑ bɑ̈nyi ki nyöddi ómen ki wïj ɑnɑn.’
Gøle ócwøllì kì Isrɑil ɑ́ gøl jɑl-ɑ wɑre óluny wɑ̈g.”
“Keløg cwøw ɑ́ryew ónyïɑ̈ggø, kɑ cï jɑl ɑ́kyel kì kelli gen kedh-ɑ be cwɑggi jɑlgøle, kɑ mɑ̈nni jɑl-ɑ kyeelø mɑge,
pëthi wun ko lɑ̈ɑ̈m ki ngɑndhɑjø menɑni, ngølu cinge.
Mïdhí gïg nyi rum gɑ møg-ɑ dyër, møg pɑ ruj, o yï óbëëd ki keny me bɑ̈ɑ̈r kì piny-ɑ mëggi wun yi Jwøøg wun, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j.
Tyëng-ɑ nyi gwëmø mɑɑn yi Jwøøg wun, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j.
A ɑ́cög gen ge nuti böggø’ Jwøk, kɑ ge wïnn-ɑ ngɑ̈thi wun, ɑnɑ̈g gen tyëng-ɑ dhɑ̈rø yi wɑ̈dh kì cyɑ̈ɑ̈n wun.

Codhe cyee, keny-ɑ ówɑ̈dhi wun piny-ɑ mëggi wun yi Jwøøg wun, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, kɑ wu pëgg-ɑ piny kidøøj, kɑ tyëngmɑ̈ɑ̈nø møg-ɑ bɑdhhi wun tyɑm yi wun ge bënn, nɑ̈g wun kwɑrri Amɑlek bënn kinni tweet, o nyingi gen lɑ̈ɑ̈ny gen kì kömi piny. Wɑ̈thi wun ko pɑ̈nyi wïlø ki nɑ̈gi gen.
“Keny-ɑ órum wun ki kwɑnyi piny-ɑ mëggi wun yi Jwøøg wun, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, kɑ wu pëgg-ɑ yije,
nyi kɑ̈bbi dhɑnhø kì ri mwölli jɑmm-ɑ ɑ́cyeg kì yïe, ki dhöngø ɑ́kyel kì ri gïjø ɑ́kyel, kɑ gø kïdhe kej mɑ̈ddø.
Kedhe yï ókwërø men-ɑ nud kì bøli kenyɑni, kɑ gø köbbe kinni, ‘Yɑ ɑ́yïëy dicyɑ̈ngtïn kì bøli Jwøgɑ, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, kinni yɑ ɑ́wɑ̈nhi yij piny-ɑ ɑ́könge kweyyi wøn kinni gø ómëgge wøn.’
“Kwɑɑny dhöngø kì cinge yi ókwërø, kɑ gø cïbe bøli këli lɑm mi Jwøgí, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j.

Kɑ kwøb møg kwøbe kì bøli Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kinni, ‘Kweyi wøn bɑ jɑl Arɑm, o ɑ́bëëd e owïïnø, kɑ gøle kïdhe Rïp kipe kinni o ge bødh gen. Ge ɑ́kedhi kunɑni kwɑnni gen nøg, de ge ɑ́göög ki pödhø me dwøng, me pere teg.
Kɑ wø göggi gïjø me rɑɑj yi tyëng Rïp, kɑ wø cïrri gwøg ki bɑ̈ngg.
Kɑ wø ywøøg-ɑ kö Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j ɑ bɑ Jwøøg kweyyi wøn, kɑ ywøøg wøn lïngi yi en.
Kɑ wø yïëële wɑ̈g ki tegø kì Rïp. Ágöög ki ngïjjì geki gïïngɑ̈ngø mø døngø, kí gïg böggi mø døngø.
Kɑ wø kɑ̈ɑ̈le piny men, piny-ɑ yije mulli yi cɑg geki møøw kïc.
Anɑn yɑ muuj-ɑ Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j mwölli jɑmm-ɑ ɑ́cyeg kì yïɑ, kì ri jɑmm-ɑ ɑ́mëgge yɑn.’
“Codhe kɑ dhöngø cïb piny kì bøli Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, kɑ mɑɑl.
Bëëd yï ópwöjjø kipe gïgdøj møg-ɑ ɑ́mëggi yïn, wuki gølí yi Jwøgí, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, kɑ wiy Kwɑrri Leebì geki tyëngpɑth møg-ɑ bëëdø kì kelli wun tuug gen kyeel ki wun.

kɑ Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j köbbí kinni, ‘Bong ɑ́kyeel pyɑ̈rri jɑmmì, ɑ løg jɑmmi kwër mɑ ɑ́döng kì gølɑ, ge ɑ́mëggɑ Kwɑrri Leebì, kí wëdhh, kí kïjj, kí thwömm ni kɑ ɑ́ceg yɑn yi yïn. Ciggi ɑ́kyeel pyɑ̈rri jɑmmì nuti wïlø kì wïjɑ, wɑlɑ̀ ge nuti pyeem yɑn.

Yɑ nuti kɑ̈bbø kì ri gen keny-ɑ ɑ́ywöngɑ, yɑ nuti nywɑ̈ddø ki gen keny-ɑ ɑ́bëëdɑ yɑ ywëdhø, o yɑ nuti kɑ̈bbø kì ri gen ki men kunyi tyëngthøø, kwøbbí ɑ́mïdhɑ ceth Yïn ɑ Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, møg-ɑ ɑ́ceg yi yïn bënn kipe ɑ́kyeel pyɑ̈rri jɑmmì ɑ́gwøgɑ.
Lïïdh piny, yï ying-ɑ kej kwërí kì mɑl, kɑ Isrɑil jií gyëëdh, kɑ piny-ɑ yije mulli yi cɑg geki møøw kïc; piny kɑ̈r men-ɑ ɑ́mëggí wøn gyëëdh, ni kɑ ɑ́köngí kì bøli kweyyi wøn.’
“Wu ɑ́ceg yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j dicyɑ̈ngtïn kinni mïdhu cigge bënn, mïdhu gen ceth ki pëthi wun bënn.
Wu ɑ́yïëy dicyɑ̈ngtïn kinni, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j bɑ Jwøøg wun. Wu ɑ́rum ki yïëyø kinni, kwøbbe ómïdhi yi wun, o gïg-ɑ ɑ́kwøb yi en bënn ógwøg yi wun.
Wu ɑ́yïëy yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j wun ɑ́ jie, ni kɑ ɑ́köbbe wun, ɑ ɑ́cege wun kinni mïdhu cigge bënn.
Wu ógwøg yi en wu døngø kibøli pödhh-ɑ kyeelø møg-ɑ ɑ́cwɑ̈je bënn, o ówør kɑ nyinge lejji kì bɑng wun. Wu óbëëdø wun ɑ́ dïl jie ni kɑ ɑ́kööbe.”
Codhe kɑ teedø bëne geki pëjji Isrɑil köbbi yi Mosɑ̀ kinni, “Mïdhu cigg-ɑ mëggɑ wun dicyɑ̈ngtïn ge bënn.
Cyɑ̈ng-ɑ óbɑ̈ɑ̈n wun Nɑm Urdun, kɑ wu kedh-ɑ piny-ɑ mëggi wun yi Jwøøg wun, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, cïbu piny ki ópɑ̈nni kït mø lɑjjø, kɑ kömi gen mwøn wun,
codhe kɑ cigg geki pwönyø men gweed wun kömi gen, keny-ɑ ókedhu piny-ɑ yije mulli yi cɑg geki møøw kïc, piny-ɑ ɑ́kwøb yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, ɑ bɑ Jwøøg kweyyi wun kinni gø ómëgge wun,
kɑ wu órumø ki wɑ̈dhi løøng-ɑcɑ̀, cwöödh wun ópɑ̈nni kïttɑni wïj Kïti Ebɑl ni kɑ̀ köbbɑ wun dicyɑ̈ngtïn, kɑ ge mwøn wun.
Kɑ Jwøøg wun, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j gëddi wun ki këli lɑm kì kunɑni, ger ki tuggi kïttì mø tøggi gen nuti twïg wɑ̈g ki ngyënyø dødø,
mɑ́ kël-ɑ gëri Jwøøg wun, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, nyi ger kɑ tuggi kïttì mø nuti twegø. Kömi këlɑni ɑ rɑ̈ɑ̈b wun ki gënh-ɑ nyi rɑ̈b bëne, wu rɑ̈bb-ɑ Jwøøg wun, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j.
Kɑ wu muuj wun ki keni mër, kɑ wu cyɑ̈ɑ̈m wun kì kunɑni pëthi wun omedø kì bøli Jwøøg wun, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j.
Kɑ kwøbbi cigg møg bënn gweed kömi ópɑ̈nni kït møg-ɑ bɑ ɑmwøn ge ónënnø kidøøj.”
Codhe, ɑköbbi teedø geki Kwɑrri Leebì ókwër yi Mosɑ̀ kinni, “Lïngu kwøbbɑ kidøøj wun ɑ tyëng Isrɑil, wu ɑ́göög ki jii Jwøøg wun, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j dicyɑ̈ngtïn.
Kɑ ɑ́rum bëëde kinøw, lïngu kwøbbe, kɑ cigge bënn mïdhi wun, gen ɑ cigg-ɑ ɑ́mëggɑ wun dicyɑ̈ngtïn.”
Codhe, ɑköbbi tyëng Isrɑil yi Mosɑ̀ kinni,
“Keny-ɑ órum wun ki bɑ̈ɑ̈ni Nɑm Urdun, kɑ̈llì møg cungi gen kì wïj Kïti Geridhïm keny-ɑ ókwøøb kwëng, ɑ løg gøl Cimeøn, kí gøl Leebì, kí gøl Yeudɑ̀, kí gøl Isɑkɑr, kí gøl Yosep, kí gøl Ben Yɑmïn.
Keny-ɑ ókwøøb kwøbbi cyën, kɑ gøl Ruben, kí gøl Gɑd, kí gøl Aceer, kí Dhebulun, kí gøl Dɑn, kí gøl Nɑptɑlì, cungi gen kì wïj Kïti Ebɑl.
Kɑ møgɑni kwøb yi Kwɑrri Leebì ki cwɑg mø døngø, ge köbb-ɑ tyëng Isrɑil kinni,
“Kɑ teedø bëne lögge kinni, ‘Amen!’
“Kɑ ji bënn löggi gen kinni ‘Amen!’
“Kɑ ji bënn löggi gen kinni, ‘Amen!’
“Kɑ ji bënn löggi gen kinni ‘Amen!’
“Kɑ ji bënn löggi gen kinni, ‘Amen!’
“Kɑ ji bënn löggi gen kinni, ‘Amen!’
“Kɑ ji bënn löggi gen kinni, ‘Amen!’
“Kɑ ji bënn löggi gen kinni, ‘Amen!’
“Kɑ ji bënn löggi gen kinni, ‘Amen!’
“ ‘Cyënni Jwøk ying-ɑ kömi ngɑn luj dhɑnhø, kɑ gø nɑ̈ge.’
“Kɑ ji bënn löggi gen kinni, ‘Amen!’
“ ‘Cyënni Jwøk ying-ɑ kömi ngɑn kïr ki ngyëny kipe kinni o nɑ̈ge dhɑnhø me yïe bɑ̈r.’
“Kɑ ji bënn löggi gen kinni, ‘Amen!’
“Kɑ ji bënn löggi gen kinni, ‘Amen!’
Gyëdh møgɑni bënn bï-ɑ kömí ke mïdhí kwøbbi Jwøgí, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j.
“Yï ócyɑ̈dhi ki gyëdh kì kɑɑl, o yï ócyɑ̈dhi ki gyëdh keny-ɑ óying yij pwödhø.
“Gyëdh óying kömi nyigí geki pwödhhí, yï ógëdhi dhög kí dyëg.
“Byel geki gïncɑm-ɑ gwøg yi yïn ki byellɑni ógëdhi yïn yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j.
“Gïg-ɑ gøggi yi yïn bënn ógëdhi yïn yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j.
“Tyëngmɑ̈ɑ̈nø ótyɑm yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j keny-ɑ óbëën gen be nyɑɑg ki yïn. Ge ópɑ̈ɑ̈r kömí ge kɑ̈ɑ̈l-ɑ tung ɑ́kyel, de ge órengi ge tɑɑy wɑ̈thi tùng bënn.
“Gwøgí ógyëdh yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, kɑ thebbí pɑ̈ɑ̈nge ki byëlø bëne. Yï ógyëdh yi en kì piny-ɑ mëgge yïn.
“Ke lïngí kwøbbi Jwøøg wun, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, kɑ gïg-ɑ cïge yïn bënn nyi gwøg yi yïn, wu ógwøge wun ɑ́ jie ceth, ni kɑ ɑ́kööbe.
Codhe o lidh yi jurri kömi piny bënn kinni, wun ɑ ɑ́yieny yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j wun ɑ́ jie, kɑ wu böggi yi gen.
Yï ónëngi yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j ki nywøl mø gïïr, kí dhög mø gïïr. Byëlø óceg twɑ̈lø kì piny-ɑ ɑ́köbbe kweyyi wun kinni gø ómëgge wun.
Yï óöde ki kønh-ɑ mïdhe kì mɑl kì bøli kej kødh ceth, o yï ócuggí ki wïdhi pödhh mø ngenyø, de yï koo wïdhi kì yï gen.
Yï ógwøg yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, ɑ bɑ Jwøgí, yïn ɑ́ pëëji mi pödhh mø ngenyø yïn ɑ Isrɑil, de yï koo pyejji, yï ócög yï døøj keløg yïëyí ómïdhi yi yïn, geki cigge bënn møg-ɑ ɑ́mëggɑ yïn dicyɑ̈ngtïn.
De ciggɑni ko pɑ̈nyi wun ki pyemø, wɑlɑ̀ wu ko pɑ̈nyi kedhi be mɑlli jwögg møøgø.
“De keløg dhø Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j ópyem yi yïn, kɑ cigge pyem yi yïn, gen ɑ cigg-ɑ ɑ́mëggɑ wun dicyɑ̈ngtïn, gïgrijjø møg bënn ceg-ɑ pɑ̈dhi kömi wun.
“Kɑ̈ddi wun geki pwödhhi wun ógöjji cyën yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j.
“Pwödhhi wun ki gïgcɑmmi wun ógöjji cyën yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j.
“Wu ógöjji cyën yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, kɑ wu nywøl-ɑ nywøl mø nøg, kɑ pwödhhi wun ocögø ge pɑ ti cyegø, kɑ dhögi wun kí dyëgi wun løg-ɑ mø nøg.
“Gïg-ɑ gøggi yi wun bënn ógöjji cyën yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j.
“Keløg wu ógöögø ki gïnrɑj kɑ Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j bɑny yi wun, wu ógöjje ryɑ̈g, kí muumø, kí ɑkørr kì ri gïg-ɑ ógøggi yi wun bënn, gïti keny-ɑ ójwɑɑn wun ki tyëgø nɑ̈gø.
Ógöjji kömi wun ki rɑ̈ɑ̈m dëllì, kɑ nyi cig-ɑ önø, gïti keny-ɑ óthumi wun kì piny-ɑ yije kedhi yi wun, ɑ́ men kwɑny yi wun.
Wu ógöjji yømø nɑ̈ɑ̈g yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, kí kɑ̈jj-ɑ köddi, kí lëdhi dëllì. Wu ógöjje mel kí ɑtunø me rënyi byelli wun, wu pɑ wiy yi rɑ̈ɑ̈m dëllì møgɑni gïti keny-ɑ óthøw wun.
Bong kødh men-ɑ ódëëm; lɑ̈bø ógöögø ɑ́ gïwi ni ngyënyø dødø.
Bøli keny di dëëm kødh, dëëm ɑ́ tør kí ɑyejø gïti keny-ɑ óthøw wun.

“Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, wu ógöjje tyɑmø yi tyëngmɑ̈ɑ̈nø. Wu ópɑ̈ɑ̈r kömi gen wu kɑ̈ɑ̈l-ɑ tung ɑ́kyel, de wu ócyeddi yi gen, kɑ wu reng-ɑ wɑ̈thi tùng bënn, kɑ ji bënn kì kömi piny obwøgø keny-ɑ ólidh gen gïn-ɑ ɑ́cwöb kiper wun.
Keny-ɑ óthøw wun, wu ócɑm-ɑ yi winy geki lɑ̈yyi pɑ̈l, bong ngɑn-ɑ óryem gen kì kömi wun.
Wu ógöjji köddi dëllì yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, ni men-ɑ ɑ́göjje tyëng Rïp. Dëlli wun ógöjje lolø ki túd. Dëlli wun óbëëdø ge bøllø, kɑ dëlli wun ópëddø yïllø, de bong gïn yïëdø.
Wɑ̈thi wun ówëggi nungø yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, wu ógöjje cøørø kí muumø.
Wu óthɑ̈mmi kì dicɑ̈ng ni cörr, o yuu-ɑ kedhi yi wun pɑ yod yi wun. Wu koo dönyi cɑgg wu göögø ki gwøng teg. Wu ónyøn kɑ jɑmmi wun kɑbbi, bong ngɑn køny wun.
“Yï ócuggø nywöm, de nyɑn-ɑ nywøm ótɑ̈ng yi jɑlø megø. Yï ógëdø ki ød, de yï koo bëëdø kì yije. Yï ógöögø ki bɑg, de nywøli yenhi bɑngɑni koo cɑm-ɑ yi yïn.
Dhögí óngɑlli ge onennø yi yïn, de yï koo cyɑ̈mø ki rïnggi gen. Aderrí ókɑ̈l ge onennø yi yïn, de ge koo döggi yïn. Dyëgí ómëggi tyëngmɑ̈ɑ̈nø, de bong ngɑn køny yïn.
Wɑ̈ddí geki nyigí womɑ̈nn ómëggi tyëngpɑth gɑ bɑ̈ngg. Nyingí ótöd yi nenni yöö yethi cyɑ̈ng kinni nyigí ódwöög, de ge pɑ dwöög,
Byell-ɑ pur yi yïn bënn ki gwøng teg ókɑ̈l-ɑ yi pödhø megø, o bong gïn yod yi yïn den-ɑ́ orɑng kí rɑ̈ji bëëdø.
Wïjí ómuum kì bɑng orɑngí.
Dëlí ógöjji kɑ̈jjiledh mø pɑ nøggi, kɑ̈jji lol ki túd óbëëdø ge pɑ̈ng dëlí, cɑg kì wïjí gïti ri tyellí.
“Wu ókïdhi pödhø megø me pɑth wuki rɑ̈dhí yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, wu ókïdhe keny me nuti pɑ̈nyø’ bëëdø yi wun, wɑlɑ̀ kweyyi wun cøn. Wu ókwɑ̈jji kì kunɑni kì yï jwögg mø ógwøgø kɑ yɑdh geki kït.
Ji óngɑ̈ng kì pödhh-ɑ yethi gen ókedhhi wun yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, kɑ wu gɑggi yi gen kipe gïn-ɑ ɑ́pɑ̈dhi kömi wun.
“Wu ókɑ̈gø ki byel mø gïïr, de wu ókɑj-ɑ mø nøg yøw, mɑ́ byelli wun ócɑm yi bɑ̈nyø.
Wu ópïdhø ki oløg me gïïr, kɑ ge pur yi wun kidøøj, de wu koo lïmø ki oløg, wɑlɑ̀ wu koo mɑ̈dhø ki møgi oløg, mɑ́ nywøli oløg ócɑm yi twöngø.
Ólɑm ótwïy kì yij pinyí bëne, de yï koo lïmø ki nywøle, mɑ́ ge ódyëm ge nuti cyegø.
Yïi wun ódi wɑ̈dd kí nyigi wun womɑ̈nn, de wu koo bëëdø ki gen, mɑ́ ge ókɑ̈l gɑ ɑmɑggi liny.
Nywøli yenhi wun geki byelli wun bënn ócɑm yi twöngø.
“Tyëngpɑth møg-ɑ bëëdø kì piny wun ókedh ge ótëngø, de wu ókedh wu ónyönhø.
Yïi gen ódi ngyëny mø wïdhi gen wun, de yï wun koo di ngyëny mø wïdhi wun gen. Ge ógöögø gɑ jɑggi wun kì cyɑ̈ɑ̈n piny.
“Rɑjjɑni bënn óying kömi wun gïti keny-ɑ óthumi wun bënn, mɑ́ wu ɑ́bɑ̈nyi lïngi kwøbbi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j Jwøøg wun, kɑ wu óbɑ̈nyø ki mïdhi cigg-ɑ ɑ́mëgge wun.
Gen ɑ nyi cɑ̈yyi wun ceth yi Jwøk wuki kwɑrri wun gïti ɑtheer.
Wu ɑ́gëdhhi gïïpiny bëne yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, de Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j nuti göggø yi wun ki medi pëthi wun.

De wu ógögg-ɑ tyëngmɑ̈ɑ̈nø møg-ɑ ókɑ̈ɑ̈l kömi wun yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j. Kɑ rume bëëde kinøw, wu ómɑg yi kɑ̈j kí röödhø, kɑ wu cyɑ̈dh-ɑ nøw, kɑ wu cɑ̈nn-ɑ jɑmmi bënn. Nyingi wun óguud yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j gïti keny-ɑ óthumi wun.
Kömi wun ókɑ̈ni yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kì pödhø me kɑ̈ɑ̈l cögi piny, pödhø me dhøge kwïj yi wun. Ge ócwøøy kömi wun ni cor.
Pëthi gen koo lɑ̈ɑ̈m ki dhɑnhø, ying-ɑ́ yu wɑlɑ̀ othinh.
Dhögi wun kí byelli wun ócɑm yi gen, de wu óywɑj yi kɑ̈j. Jɑmmi wun ókɑ̈l yi gen bënn, ɑ løg byel kí møgi oløg, kí møøw dhetun, kí dhög, kí dyëg, kɑ wu ywɑj yi kɑ̈j.
Kɑ̈dd bënn kì yij piny-ɑ mëggi wun yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j óyɑg yi gen, kɑ dörri kɑ̈dd møg-ɑ ngɑ̈dh yi wun cøør piny.
“Keny-ɑ ótyeeg kɑ̈ddi wun yi tyëngmɑ̈ɑ̈nø, wu ójɑ̈ddi ki gïncɑm, nyigi wun, nyig-ɑ ɑ́mëggi wun yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j ócɑm yi wun.
Cɑgg ɑ́ jöd pyëwe ónyönhi, kɑ dïl nyɑre cɑme, mɑ́ yïe bong gïncɑm. Bong ngɑn-ɑ ónënge ki rïngɑni; ómen pɑ nënge; cyëge cyëng-ɑ ɑ́mɑɑre pɑ nënge; wɑlɑ̀ kwï nyige møg-ɑ ɑ́döng pɑ nënge thyew.

Cɑgg ɑ́ nyɑɑr kɑl me dwøng, mɑ ɑ́ceg tɑ̈bbø kì yij kɑ̈r, ógöögø ni menɑni keny-ɑ ótyeeg kɑɑl gen, nyɑre men-ɑ thinh gø cɑme’ cɑmø. Jɑlgøle jɑl-ɑ mɑɑre geki nyige møg-ɑ kyeelø koo nëngi yi en ki rïngɑni.
“Keløg kwøbbi Jwøk koo mïdhi yi wun kidøøj, kɑ nyingi Jwøøg wun, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, Jwøng-ɑ ceg ki böggø pɑ wør yi wun,
wu göjje’ rɑ̈ɑ̈m dëllì mø pɑ cuggi tuurø wuki nyigi wun. Kɑ wu göjje yømø nɑ̈ɑ̈g, me pɑ cuggi jogø.
Rɑ̈ɑ̈m dëllì mø rijjø ni møg-ɑ ɑ́lidh yi wun kì Rïp göjje’ wun, dëlli wun pɑ pɑ̈nyi yönø.
Óöni thyew ki rɑ̈ɑ̈m dëllì geki yømø nɑ̈ɑ̈g mø nuti gwedø kì yij wɑ̈nyi Ciggi Jwøk men, wu óthøw.
Cɑgg wu ngënyi ni kyelli mɑl, bɑ ji mø nøg ɑ óbodh kì kelli wun, mɑ́ kwøbbi Jwøøg wun, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j nuti lïngi wun.

Ni kɑ ɑ́bëëd Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j pyëwe med keny-ɑ ɑ́gwøge wun, kɑ wu ódönyø, kɑ kwɑnni wun óngënyø, nɑ menɑni ceth, pyëwe óløg me med ki rënyi wun geki nɑ̈gi wun. Wu ódhwööy wɑ̈g kì piny-ɑ kwɑɑny yi wun.

“Wu ókedhhi yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kì kelli pödhh bënn, kì kömi piny; wu ówɑ̈dhi pödhh-ɑ cögi piny, kɑ wu mɑll-ɑ jwögg møg-ɑ ógwøgø kɑ yɑdh geki kït; jwögg mø nuti pɑ̈nyø’ mɑllø yi wun, wɑlɑ̀ yi kweyyi wun.
Bong keny yod wun mër, o bong kej wun, wu ógöjji ywøøg yij, kí olïng pëëth yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j.
Wu óbëëdø wu óböggø ki thøø kì wɑ̈r kí dicɑ̈ng.
Pëthi wun óbëëdø ge opödø yi wɑ̈ɑ̈rø kì wɑ̈r kí dicɑ̈ng. Kì dicɑ̈ng wu cem-ɑ wɑ̈r óbï kì wɑɑng? O kì wɑ̈r wu cem-ɑ wøw óru kì wɑɑng?

Wu ódwøøg Rïp yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j ki yɑ̈thi nɑm, cɑgg ɑ́ kɑ̀ rum en ki kwøb kinni wu koo døøg kunɑni këti. Ri wun ópɑ̈nyi yi wun ki ngeew yï tyëngmɑ̈ɑ̈nø kì kunɑni wu bɑ bɑ̈ngg, de bong ngɑn-ɑ ódwɑddi ngewi wun.”
Menɑni bene lwöbø men-ɑ kɑɑm Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j geki tyëng Isrɑil, lwöm-ɑ ɑ́köbbi Mosɑ̀ yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kinni, nywɑg ge gøn ki tyëng Isrɑil kì Moɑb, reb ki lwöm-ɑ ɑ́lwøb kì Kïti Sinɑy.
Kɑ tyëng Isrɑil cwøøl kej ɑ́kyel yi Mosɑ̀, ɑköbbe gïn kinni, “Álidh yi wun ki ri wun, eni gïn-ɑ ɑ́göggi rɑ̈ɑ̈dh Rïp geki jyɑ̈gge kí pödhe bëne yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j.
Wu ɑ́lïdhi ki ryɑ̈g me dwøng, kí gïïngɑ̈ngø, geki gïgdøngø møg-ɑ ɑ́gwøg yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j.
De wu nuti wëg en yodi tyelli gïg-ɑ ɑ́lidh yi wun.
Wu ɑ́pyejji yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kì yij pɑ̈l ki runn pyɑ̈r ɑ́ngwen, o ógudhi wun geki wɑrri wun nuti rënyø.
Yïi wun ɑ́bong-ɑ ópùn møg cɑm yi wun, wɑlɑ̀ møgi oløg geki møgi byel men mɑdh yi wun, de wu nuti ywɑjø yi kɑ̈j, kipe kinni o yod yi wun kinni, bɑ Jwøøg wun, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, ɑ kor wun.
O keny-ɑ ɑ́wɑ̈nhi wɑ keny, Rɑ̈dh Sïön, rɑ̈nh-ɑ ɑ́jyɑ̈ɑ̈g kì Bɑcɑn geki Rɑ̈dh Og, rɑ̈nh-ɑ ɑ́jyɑ̈ɑ̈g kì Kicbön ge ɑ́tëni kömee ki liny, kɑ ge tyɑm yi wɑ,
ɑkwɑny wɑ piny gen kɑ pɑ̈ngi yi wɑ kì kelli wɑ̈thi kɑ̈lli Ruben ki Gɑd, ki budi gøl Mɑnɑsè.
Mïdhu lwöbø men kidøøj, o gïg-ɑ gøggi yi wun nyi pɑ̈dhi gen kɑ̈jji gen bënn.
“Dicyɑ̈ngtïn wu ɑ́bëëd wu ócungø kì bøli Jwøøg wun, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, wu bënn, pëjji wun geki jɑggi wun, cwøw,
kí mɑ̈nn, kí othønhø, kí wëdhh møg-ɑ bëëdø kì kelli wun, ɑ nyi nguddi wun ki yenh, ɑ nyi tëddi wun ki pï.
Wu ying-ɑ keny wu bënn ɑnɑn kipe kinni o wu lwööb wun ki Jwøøg wun, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, o lwömɑni ómïdhi yi wun ceth,
o wu óyïëy yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, wun ɑ́ jie, ni kɑ ɑ́köbbe wun, wuki kweyyi wun: Abrɑhɑm, kí Isɑɑk, kí Yɑgob.
Pɑth ki wun keti wun ɑ lwöbø wuki Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j ki lwöbø men, ɑ́ men mïdhi yi wun.
Lwömɑni ying-ɑ kɑɑm ji-ɑ cungi kì keny èn bënn geki Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, wɑ kí kwɑrree møg-ɑ nuti nywølø.
“Ngɑ̈nyi yi wun eni bëën-ɑ ɑ́bëëd yi wɑ kì piny Rïp, kí kër-ɑ ɑ́bëën wɑ, wɑ bɑ̈ɑ̈n-ɑ pödhh,
o ngïjji jwögg, gïg lɑ̈mmi pëëth møg-ɑ ógwøgø ki dhɑb, kí ɑ́tegø, kí yɑdh ge ɑ́lidh yi wun.

Ko di dhɑnhø, ying-ɑ́ jɑlø wɑlɑ̀ dhɑjø, wɑlɑ̀ wïj ød, wɑlɑ̀ wïj kɑl kì kelli tyëng-ɑ lïngi møg kì keny èn, men-ɑ ólugi ngɑ̈je Jwøgee, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, kɑ kedh-ɑ be mɑlli jwöggi pödhh-ɑ kyeelø. Menɑni óni gïn pidh kì pwödhø, kɑ ree løge men nɑ̈g ji keny-ɑ ócyege kɑ cɑm.

Ko di dhɑnhø kì kelli tyëng-ɑ keny èn dicyɑ̈ngtïn, tyëng-ɑ lïngi kwøbbi lwöbø men, men-ɑ órumø kinni bong gïjø me rɑj, cɑgg mune tëngi kɑ kedh-ɑ be mɑlli jwöggi pödhhɑni. Ngɑn ni menɑni nɑ̈g-ɑ wun wu bënn, tyëngrijjø kí tyëngdøj.

Pyëw Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j pɑ lɑ̈ɑ̈m ki ngɑn ni menɑni, de rɑ̈ji pyëw Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j óceg lyelø ni mɑc, cyënn-ɑ ɑ́gwed kì yij wɑ̈nyø men ceg-ɑ pɑ̈dhi köme bënn, gïti keny-ɑ ótɑ̈ɑ̈y wïje piny yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j.
Ngɑnɑni ógwøg yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j ɑ́ nyuudhi kipe wɑ̈thi kɑ̈lli Isrɑil bënn, o cyënn-ɑ bɑ ɑgwed kì yij wɑ̈nyi pwönyø men, ceg-ɑ pɑ̈dhi köme bënn, gen ɑ møg-ɑ ɑ́nywɑg.
“Kwɑrri wun kì yethi rïjj-ɑ óbï geki wëdhh-ɑ óbï be bëëdø kì kelli wun, ge kɑ̈ɑ̈l-ɑ pìny mø lɑ̈wi, ryɑ̈g geki rɑ̈ɑ̈m dëllì møg-ɑ ógöjji wun yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, ólidh yi gen.

Pwödh ógöögø ki ryɑng me yije pɑ̈ng yi kïbrït kí omelø, bong gïjø me kɑ̈g kì yethi gen, cɑgg ɑ́ lum pɑ twïy kì yethi gen. Piny wun ógöögø e nɑ Sødømɑ̀ kí Gømørɑ̀, kɑ nɑ Admɑ̀ kí Dheböïm, ɑ ɑ́nɑ̈g yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j keny-ɑ ɑ́rënyi pyëwe.
Lɑ̈bø bëne ópëjji kinni, ‘Á kipe ngø ɑ gwøøg piny men kinøw yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, ɑ́ ngø ɑ ɑ́wëggi pyëwe rënyø kinøw?’
Pyëjjɑni óløøg kinni, ‘Bɑ kipe kɑ ɑ́pɑ̈ɑ̈d lwöbø yi jii Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, eni lwöm-ɑ ɑ́nywɑg yi gen geki Jwøøg kweyyi gen, keny-ɑ ɑ́kɑ̈ɑ̈le gïn wɑ̈g kì piny Rïp.
Ge ɑ́ceg-ɑ kedhi be mɑlli jwögg mø kwïj yi gen cøn, gen ɑ jwögg-ɑ ɑ́kyer yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kinni ge ko mɑlli yi jie.
Bene ɑ ɑ́rënyi pyëw Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, ɑ göjje piny gen ryɑ̈gg-ɑ bɑ ɑgwed kì yij wɑ̈nyø men.
Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j pyëwe ɑ́ceg-ɑ rënyø ki menrɑj, ɑdhööye gïn wɑ̈g kì piny gen, kɑ gï leenge piny me pɑth, keny-ɑ di gen dicyɑ̈ngtïn.’
“Dɑ møøgø mɑ ɑ́mïdhi yi Jwøgee, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j gɑ ɑkɑnn, de cigge ɑ́nyodhe, o ciggɑni di dwɑddø o ge mïdhi yi wɑ, wɑ ki kwɑrree gïti ɑtheer.
“Bølí ɑ́cïbɑ jɑmmì ɑ́ryew ɑnɑn, ɑ løg gyëdh kí cyën. Keny-ɑ óbëën gïgɑni kömí, wu bëëd ɑ yethi pödhh møøgø, kì kun-ɑ ókedhhi wun yi Jwøgí, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, møg-ɑ ɑ́cïbɑ bølí ópɑr yi yïn.
Keløg yï dwöög-ɑ kö Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j wuki nyigí, ki pëthi wun bënn, kɑ cigge møg-ɑ ɑ́mëggɑ wun dicyɑ̈ngtïn mïdhi yi wun,
Jwøøg wun, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, pyëwe ólɑ̈ɑ̈m ki wun. Kɑ wu dwööge kì yethi pödhh-ɑ ɑ́kedhhe wun, kɑ wu dwøøge yij kɑ̈r këti.
Wu ódwöög yi Jwøøg wun, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, cɑgg wu tɑyø, kɑ wu wɑ̈dh-ɑ wɑ̈thi tùngi piny, kun lɑ̈wi.
Wu ódwööge, o wu kwɑny wun piny-ɑ ɑ́bëëd yi kweyyi wun cøn. Wu óthödhe ki kɑ̈r kɑ kwɑnni wun óngënyø kibøli kwɑnni kweyyi wun kɑ̈ge dööng.
Pëthi wun, wuki kwɑrri wun ólug yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, kɑ Jwøøg wun, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j mɑɑr yi wun ki pëthi wun bënn, kí wëyi wun bënn, o wu óyïddi wun ki nënnì.
Kɑ cyën møgɑk bënn gøøj kömi tyëng-ɑ mɑɑn yïn, gen ɑ tyëng-ɑ ɑ́guud wɑngí.
Kɑ yï døøg-ɑ be lïngø ki kwøbbi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, kɑ cigge, cigg-ɑ ɑ́mëggɑ yïn dicyɑ̈ngtïn mïdhi yi yïn.

Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j yï ógëdhe gïg-ɑ gøggi yi yïn bënn, kɑ nyigí óngënyø, kɑ dhögí kí dyëgí óngënyø, kɑ jɑmm-ɑ kɑ̈g yi yïn bënn nyi ceg-ɑ cyegø kidøøj. Pyëwe óløg me med ki gwøgí, o yï dönyí ni döny-ɑ ɑ́dönyi kweyyi wun.
De lïngu kwøbbe, kɑ cigge bënn mïdhi wun, geki pwönye, ɑ løg møg-ɑ bɑ ɑgwed kì yij wɑ̈nyø men.
“Cigg-ɑ mëggɑ wun dicyɑ̈ngtïn pɑ teeg, wɑlɑ̀ pɑ lɑ̈wi ki wun.
Ciggɑni pɑ ying mɑl, o wu koo pëjji kinni, ‘Á men ɑ ókedhi mɑl be muuji wɑ ciggɑni, o ge lïngi yi wøn, o gïn-ɑ kømmi yi gen gwøg yi wɑ?’
O ge pɑ ying løøg nɑɑm omelø. O wu koo pëjji kinni, ‘Á men ɑ ókedhi løøg nɑɑm omelø be muuji gen wøn, o ge lïngi yi wøn, o gïn-ɑ kømmi yi gen gwøg yi wøn?’
Pɑth ki gen, ciggɑni ying-ɑ yïi wun keny, ge nud kì pyëwí, o ge ócuggø kwøbø yi yïn, kɑ gïn-ɑ kømmi yi gen gwøg yi yïn.
“Dicyɑ̈ngtïn bølí cïbɑ’ jɑmmì ɑ́ryew mø kelli gen kɑ̈bbi yi yïn, kɑɑm gïnrɑj kí gïndøj, thøø kí nënnì.

Ke lïngí ciggi Jwøgí, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, cigg-ɑ ɑ́mëggɑ yïn dicyɑ̈ngtïn; ke mɑɑrií kɑ gïn-ɑ kømme gwøg yi yïn, kɑ cigge bënn mïdhí, wu ódönyø, kɑ wu ogöögø ki pödhø me dwøng. Wu ógyëdh yi Jwøøg wun, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kì yij piny-ɑ kwɑɑny yi wun.
De keløg wu ópëmø kɑ wu ódhɑ̈lø lïngø, kɑ wu thɑɑb be kwɑjji jwögg møøgø,
wu órënyi. Wun ɑ mɑ̈ɑ̈g ki kyëddø yi yɑn èn, ke pëëm wun, wu koo bëëdø ki keny me bɑ̈ɑ̈r kì løøg Nɑm Urdun, piny-ɑ kwɑɑny yi wun.
Anɑn yɑ cwööl-ɑ mɑl geki piny, o ge lïng gen dicyɑ̈ngtïn kinni, bøli wun ɑ́cïbɑ’ nënnì geki thøø, kí gyëdh geki cyën. Myeg wun nënnì, o wu ónëën wun, wuki kwɑrri wun!
Mɑɑr Jwøgí, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, kɑ møg-ɑ kømme nyi gwøøg, kɑ yïëyí mïdhí, o yï óbëëd wuki kwɑrrí ki keny me bɑ̈ɑ̈r kì yij piny-ɑ ɑ́kwönge kinni gø ómëgge kweyyi wun Abrɑhɑm, kí Isɑɑk, kí Yɑgob.”
Mosɑ̀ nudd e okööbø ki tyëng Isrɑil,
okööbø kinni, “Runnɑ ɑ́göög ki miyø kí pyɑ̈r ɑ́ryew, yɑ ɑ́yöø, yɑ pɑ cuggi bëëdø yɑn ɑ́ pëëji mi wun këti. Yɑ ɑ́köbbi thyew yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kinni i Nɑm Urdun pɑ bɑ̈ɑ̈n yi yɑn.
Jwøøg wun, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kiree ɑ ócyɑ̈dhi kì bøli wun, kɑ pödhh-ɑ bëëdø kì pinyɑni nɑ̈ge, o piny gen kwɑny yi wun, o bɑ Jöcwø ɑ óbëëd ɑ́ pëëji mi wun ni kɑ ɑ́kööb Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j.
Pödhhɑni ónɑ̈g yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j ceth, ni kɑ ɑ́nɑ̈ge Sïön geki Og, rɑ̈nhi tyëng Amör, kɑ pödhi gen tɑ̈ɑ̈ye piny.
Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j wu ówëgge tyɑmi gen, de gwøgu gen ceth ni møg-ɑ ɑ́köbbɑ wun.
Cwedu pëthi wun, kɑ wu ko böggi. Wu ko bwøg yi gen, Jwøøg wun, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kiree ócyɑ̈dhi ki wun. Wu pɑ wøy yi en, o wu pɑ wiye piny.”

Codhe, ɑcwøøl Jöcwø yi Mosɑ̀ kɑ gø köbbe kì bøli tyëng Isrɑil bënn kinni, “Cwed pyëwí kɑ yï ko böggi, bɑ yïn ɑ ópeej ji møg be kwɑnyi piny-ɑ ɑ́köbbi kweyyi gen yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, kinni gø ómëgge gïn.
Wu ópyejj-ɑ yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kiree. Wu pɑ wøy yi en, o wu pɑ wiye piny, de cwed wun pëthi wun, kɑ wu ko böggi.”
Codhe, kɑ Ciggi Jwøk gwed yi Mosɑ̀, kɑ gï mëgge Kwɑrri Leebì ókwër, jøg-ɑ mïdhi Sɑnduug Ciggi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, geki jɑggi Isrɑil.
Kɑ gï cege kinni, “Kenyi thumi runn ɑ́bïryew, kenyi bëën run-ɑ nyi wiy körr, nyi rɑɑng cigg møg kì kej wööwi Kwëër Akɑnnì.
Nyi rɑ̈ngu ciggɑni tyëng Isrɑil, kenyi bëën gen be mɑlli Jwøøg wun, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kì keny-ɑ ómyeg yi en ɑ́ kej mɑ̈ddø.
Cwööl jøg-ɑ cwøw bënn, kí tyëng-ɑ mɑ̈nn geki othønhø kí wëdhh møg-ɑ bëëdø kì kɑ̈ddi wun, o ciggɑni lïngi yi gen bënn, o Jwøøg wun, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j wør, o cigge geki pwönye mïdhi kidøøj.
O kwɑrri wun, ɑ nuti pɑ̈nyi ciggi Jwøøg wun, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j ki lïngø, lïng gen. O ge dïd gen ki mïdhi kwøbbe kì piny-ɑ ókwɑny yi gen kì løøg Nɑm Urdun.”
Codhe, kɑ Mosɑ̀ köbbi yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kinni, “Kej thøwí ɑ́cyɑ̈ngi. Cwøl Jöcwø kɑ kɑ̈ɑ̈l dhø Kemi Kwër, o ceg yi yɑn.” Kɑ Mosɑ̀ kedh-ɑ dhø Kemi Kwër geki Jöcwø,
Acwöb Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kì bøli gen kì yij lööj pøølø kì dhø Kemɑni.

Kɑ Mosɑ̀ köbbi yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kinni, “Yï ɑ́cyɑ̈ngi ki thøø. Ji ódøøg be pëmø kì bɑng thøwí, kɑ lwöm-ɑ kɑɑm wøn ki gen pɑ̈d yi gen. Yɑ ówiy piny yi gen, kɑ ge kedh-ɑ be mɑlli jwöggi piny-ɑ yije kedhi yi gen.

Keny-ɑ ócwöb gïg ni møgɑni, pyëwɑ órënyi ki gen, kɑ ge wiyɑ piny, o ge rënyi gen, ryɑ̈g me dwøng ópɑ̈dhi kömi gen, o óyod yi gen ceth, kinni rɑjjɑni ɑ́bï kömi gen kì bɑng kɑ̀ bëëdɑ yɑ tøøk kì kelli gen.
O ge koo køny yi yɑn, mɑ́ ge ɑ́göög ki gïnrɑj, kɑ ge kedh-ɑ be mɑlli jwögg møøgø.
“Anɑn gwed wörø men. Kɑ pwönyí tyëng Isrɑil, o ócunge ɑ́ gïn-ɑ köme ócɑ̈yyi gen.

Ge ókïdhɑ piny-ɑ ɑ́köbbɑ kweyyi gen kinni gø ómëggɑ gen, eni piny-ɑ yije mulli yi cɑg geki møøw kïc. Bong gïncɑm men-ɑ ócɑ̈nni gen kì kunɑni, o ge óbëëdø pëthi gen omedø. De wɑ̈thi gen óløg gen be mɑlli jwögg møøgø, yɑ óbɑny yi gen kɑ lwöbø pɑ̈d yi gen,

kɑ ryɑ̈g me dwøng bï-ɑ kömi gen. De wörø men ónudd e owörø ceth, o bɑ wörɑni ɑ ócɑ̈yyi gen. Cɑgg ɑ́ kɑ̀ nuti kïdhi yɑn gen yij piny-ɑ ɑ́kwøbɑ kinni gø ómëggɑ gen ceth, gïn-ɑ rømmi yi gen ngɑ̈nyi yi yɑn.”
Wörɑni ɑ́gwed yi Mosɑ̀ kì cyɑ̈ngɑni ceth, kɑ gø pwönye tyëng Isrɑil.
Kɑ Ciggi Jwøk gweed yij wɑ̈nyø yi Mosɑ̀, bong nyɑ gïjø ɑ́kyel mɑ ɑ́wëgge bodhø.
Keny-ɑ ɑ́rume gwedi gïn, ɑköbbe ókwër Kwɑrri Leebì møg-ɑ nyi kɑ̈lli Sɑnduug Ciggi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kinni,
“Kwɑny wun wɑ̈nyø men, wɑ̈nyi Ciggi Jwøk, kɑ cïb wun buti Sɑnduug Ciggi Jwøøg wun, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, o óbëëde ɑ́ gïn-ɑ köme ócɑ̈yyi jii Jwøk.
Tegi muddi wun ngɑ̈nyi yi yɑn, o wu pëddi pëmø, keløg wu opëmø ki dhø Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, yɑ nud ɑnɑn kì kelli wun, óbëëd ɑ dï keny-ɑ óthøwɑ!
Cungu wɑ̈thi kɑ̈lli wun kí jɑggi gen bølɑ keny, o ge köbbɑ møgɑni, mɑl kí piny ócwöölɑ, o wu köbbɑ kì bøli gen.

Ngɑ̈nyi yi yɑn kinni keny-ɑ órumɑ’ thøø, ji ógöögø ki tyëngrijjø, kɑ møg-ɑ ɑ́pwönyɑ gen bɑny yi gen, kɑ ryɑ̈g me dwøng bï-ɑ kömi gen. Mɑ́ pyëw Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j ówëggi gen rënyø, keny-ɑ ógwøg gen gïg-ɑ ɑ́kyer yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j.”
Kɑ wörø men wör yi Mosɑ̀, e tyëng Isrɑil bënn olïngø.
“Mɑl wuki piny, lïngu kwøbbɑ,
lïngu kwøbbɑ kidøøj.
Kwøbbɑ ódyëm ni kødh,
ge ónënni ge nɑ thöjj kì piny.
Kwøbbɑ ódyëm ni onywiyì kì kömi ɑ́pöjø,
ni onywiyi kødh kì kömi lum me lewø.
Nyingi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j ólenhi,
jie ókööbø ki kwøbbi dönge.
“Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j bene ngɑn teg men-ɑ kor wun,
ying-ɑ keje o pɑ nyi rujø.
Jwøøg wun nyi kømm-ɑ dyër dhøge pɑ nyi wil yi en.
Nyi gøgg-ɑ gïgdøj mø bɑ dyër.
De wu pɑ nyi mïdhi ki yïëyø mi wun;
wu pɑ døøj ki bëëdø wun ɑ́ jie,
wu bɑ pödhi orøg, wu pëddi wëënyø.
Men bene yuu-ɑ mïdhu Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j,
wun ɑ wɑ̈thi wun nøg, pëthi wun bong gïn?
Bɑ wïyi wun, en ɑ ɑ́cwɑ̈j wun,
kɑ wu gwøge wun ɑ́ pödhø.
“Rum wun kì ri møg-ɑ ɑ́pöödh kɑ̈ge dööng,
pyëj wun wëëg wun ki gïn-ɑ ɑ́cwöb cøn,
pyëj wun tyëngdøngø, o wu köbbi gen gïg-ɑ ɑ́pöödh kɑ̈ge dööng.
Keny-ɑ bëëd yi ji kwøb-ɑ yi en.
Kömi pödhø nyi cïbe’ cïbø ki ngeti mɑl.
De Yɑgob geki kwɑrre ɑ́kwɑny yi en gɑ jie.
“Gï ɑ́yode ge wïïn ɑ yij pɑ̈l,
pɑ̈l me yije kwöddi yi ɑtunø.
Gï ɑ́konge kɑ gï korre ki mendwøng,
ni kongg-ɑ di kongge ree.
Isrɑil ɑ́korri yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j,
ni cor ɑ nyi gɑm nyɑre ki obërre kenyi pwönye gøn ki pɑ̈rrø.
Isrɑil ɑ́mɑ̈ɑ̈n pɑ̈ɑ̈dhø yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j.
Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kete ɑ ɑ́pyejji jie,
bong jwøng pɑth mɑ ɑ́kønyii.
“Gï ɑ́wëgge jɑggi myërri kwøømø
ge cɑm-ɑ jɑmm-ɑ cyeg kì yethi pwödh.
Ge ɑ́yïddi ki møøw kïc kì kelli kïttì,
oløøg gen ɑ́pëddi cyegø kì piny-ɑ di kïttì.
Dhögi gen geki dyëgi gen köthi gen dɑ cɑngø bëne,
dhög-ɑ døj kí dyëg römm kí ɑ́tegg ying-ɑ yï gen,
kí gemè men-ɑ lwiy geki møgi oløg men-ɑ med.
“Jii Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j ɑ́kɑ̈ri, de muddi gen teeg,
ge cwiy, o ge yɑ̈ngø yɑ̈ngø.
Jwøng-ɑ ɑ́cwɑ̈j gen ɑ́wiy gen piny,
ngɑn-ɑ ɑ́yiel gen ki tegø ɑ́bɑny gen.
Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j pyëwe ɑ́mɑg yi tyiel, kì bɑng kɑ ɑ́kwɑjji gen jwögg mø bɑ ngïjjì,
pyëwe ɑ́rënyi yi gïnrɑj men-ɑ ɑ́gwøg yi gen.
jwögg mø nyɑ̈n mø kwïj yi kweyyi gen cøn.
jwögg mø kwøbbi gen nuti pɑ̈nyø mïdhø yi Isrɑil.
Wɑ̈thi gen ɑ́wïl ki Jwøøg gen, ngɑn-ɑ ɑ́yiel gen ki tegø,
ɑ ɑ́nëngi gen ki wëy.
“Pyëw Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j ɑ́rënyi keny-ɑ ɑ́lidhe møgɑni,
ɑbɑnye wɑ̈dde kí nyige womɑ̈nn.
Kɑ Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j okööbø kinni, ‘Ge pɑ cigɑ kønyø,
o gïn-ɑ ógwøg yi gen lidhɑ
gen ɑ tyëng-ɑ muddi gen teeg, ɑ pɑ nyi mïdhi yïëyø mi gen.
Yɑ ɑ́mɑg yi tyiel ki gïg-ɑ cwølli gen gɑ jwögg,
gen ɑ jwögg-ɑ pɑth ki jwögg kidyër.
Pëthi gen ówëggɑ rënyø kɑ pödhø megø,
ge ówëggɑ mɑgø yi tyiel ki pödhø me jie bɑ dhëgg.
Linyɑ ólyel ni mɑc,
kɑ gïïpiny bëne rɑ̈be kì kömi piny.
Mɑnyɑni ówɑ̈dhi piny thɑ lɑ̈bø,
kɑ tyelli kïttì rɑ̈be.
Yɑ ógöjji kömi gen ki ryɑ̈ng pɑ thumi,
nywøli wethɑ bënn óthumi ri gen.
Ge ónɑ̈g yi kɑ̈j geki lëdhi dël,
ge ónɑ̈g yi rɑ̈ɑ̈m dëllì mø rijjø.
Ge óödɑ ki lɑ̈yyi pɑ̈l møg cɑm gen,
kí thöll-ɑ bɑ nɑ̈ɑ̈g, møg kɑ̈ɑ̈j gen.
Ge ónɑ̈g yi liny kì yethi yëëth,
bong kɑl men-ɑ ódöng e pɑ ywöngi.
Yɑɑg-ɑ wøbb kí wojur óthøw,
othønh-ɑ dhødh geki ywödhh pɑ wiy yi yɑn.
Ge di ceg kɑ nɑ̈gø yi yɑn ge bënn,
o bëëd e bong ngɑn-ɑ ópɑr gen.
De tyëngmɑ̈ɑ̈nø pɑ wëggɑ pwödi köthi gen
ce jiɑ tyɑɑm gen,
e ceg bëëdø ɑ́ yɑn kiriɑ ɑ ɑ́nɑ̈g gen.
Isrɑil bɑ pödhø me pyëwe bong gøn,
bong peli wïj kì yï gen kinni tek.
Ge ɑ́dhɑ̈li yodi gïn-ɑ pere ɑ́tyɑɑm gen,
gïn-ɑ ɑ́cwöb pɑ gɑm yi wɑ̈thi gen,
Ji ɑ́lïp gede ɑ ɑ́tyɑɑm gen yi nget ɑ́kyel,
kɑ ɑ́lïp pyɑ̈rø tyɑm yi ji ɑ́ryew?
Ge ɑ́wiy piny yi Jwøøg gen, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j,
ge ɑ́weddi yi Jwøøg gen, Jwøng-ɑ teg.
Ngɑ̈nyi yi tyëngmɑ̈ɑ̈nø kinni jwögg-ɑ kyeelø nyødh,
ge pɑ teg ni Jwøøg Isrɑil.
Tyëngmɑ̈ɑ̈nø rijjø ni tyëng Sødømɑ̀ kí Gømørɑ̀,
ge nɑ oløg me nywøl ki nywøl mø keej, mø nɑ̈gø.
Møgi oløg mi gen bɑ kuggi thwöl.
“Gïn-ɑ ɑ́göggi gen yi tyëngmɑ̈ɑ̈nø pɑ wïl kì wïj Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j,
de yïd-ɑ bøli keny-ɑ ócɑye gïn.
bøli keny-ɑ ópɑ̈ɑ̈dh gen obëënø,
cyɑ̈ɑ̈ng ryɑ̈g ɑ́cyɑ̈ngi ki bëën kömi gen.
keny-ɑ ólidhe gïn ge nyönhø.
Pyëwe ólɑ̈ɑ̈m ki tyëng-ɑ göggii
keny-ɑ ólidhe gïn ge dhɑ̈rø.
Codhe, o Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j jie pyëje kinni,
“Jwögg-ɑ teg møg-ɑ ɑ́ngɑ̈dh yi wun ɑ́gøne gen?
Ge ɑ́cɑɑm yi wun kɑ dwɑ̈lli gëdhhi wun,
kɑ ge nyi nëngi wun ki møgi oløg men mɑdh yi gen.
Adɑ́ wiy ge bï gen be kønyi wun ɑnɑn,
wiy ge rïngi gen be yieli wun.
“ ‘Bɑ yɑn, yɑ ketɑ ɑ bɑ Jwøk,
bong jwøg megø mɑ dyër.
Yɑn ɑ nyi nɑ̈gø, ɑ nyi muujø ki wëy, ɑ nyi tuurø.
bong ngɑn jog yɑn kɑ yɑ mɑ̈ɑ̈ne gwøgi gïn dwɑddɑ gwøgø.
Yɑ Jwøng-ɑ Nëënø
cingɑ tïngɑ’ mɑl kɑ yɑ óköngø kinni,
pilɑ, pil-ɑ rɑ̈ɑ̈dø pɑgɑ’ pɑgø,
o yɑ dwɑdd-ɑ kinni gøggi dyër ceth.
Gøølɑ ócolɑ ki tyëngmɑ̈ɑ̈nø,
o tyëng-ɑ mɑɑn yɑn cɑyɑ’ cɑyø.
Nywøli wethɑ ólɑɑj piny ki remmi gen,
tyëng-ɑ mɑɑn yɑn bënn, ónɑ̈g yi pilɑ.
Ngɑn nyïɑ̈ggi ki yɑn pɑ wiy
cɑgg ɑ́ ji mø ri gen di kedd wɑlɑ̀ ɑmɑgg, ge ceg-ɑ thøø.’
tyëng-ɑ nɑ̈g jie nyi cɑye’ cɑyø.
Gøøle nyi cole’ colø ki tyëngmɑ̈ɑ̈nø,
kɑ lɑɑwe nyi dwööge piny kipe orøøg jie.”
Wörɑni ɑ́wör yi Mosɑ̀ geki Jöcwø wɑ̈d Nun, kɑ gø nyi cigi gen göönyø, kipe kinni o dïd yi tyëng Isrɑil.
Keny-ɑ ɑ́rum Mosɑ̀ ki pwönyi teedø ki kwøbbi Jwøk,
ɑkööbe kinni, “Wɑ̈thi wun ko wëggu wïlø ki mïdhi cigg-ɑ ɑ́mëggɑ wun dicyɑ̈ngtïn, nyi cigu gen köbbi nyigi wun, o yïëyø mi gen cöge e pɑ wil yi gen, o ge cög gen ge mïdh-ɑ kwøbbi Jwøk.
Kwøbbɑni pɑth ki kwøb yøw, bene gen wëyi wun. Mïdhu gen ceth, o wu óbëëd wun ki keny me bɑ̈ɑ̈r kì piny-ɑ yije kedhi yi wun ɑnɑn wu kedh-ɑ be kwɑnyii.”
“Kedhí Kïti Abɑrïm kì piny Moɑb, ɑ rwöm ki kɑɑl Yerikö, kɑ yï yedhí wïj Kïti Nebö, kɑ yï lïïdh piny Kɑnɑɑn, piny-ɑ mëggɑ tyëng Isrɑil.
Yï óthøw kì wïj kïnɑni ni ómyëw Aɑron ɑ ɑ́thøw wïj Kïti Ör,
kipe kɑ̀ nuti mïdhu yïëyi wun ki yɑn kì bøli tyëng Isrɑil, yɑ nuti wøør wun kì bøli tyëng Isrɑil kì kömi pïi Merïbɑ̀, kì buti kɑɑl Kɑdic kì pɑ̈ɑ̈l Dhin.
Pinyɑni ólidh yi yïn yï lɑ̈wi ki en, de yï pɑ kedhi yij piny-ɑ mëggɑ tyëng Isrɑil.”
Møg bene kwëngg-ɑ ɑ́kwëëng kɑ̈lli Isrɑil yi Mosɑ̀ jɑlkwøbbi Jwøk.
Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j ɑ́bï e kɑ̈ɑ̈l-ɑ Kïti Sinɑy
ɑ́tuul ni cɑ̈ng kì Edöm
kɑ omënyø kì kömi jie e cɑre kɑ̈ɑ̈l-ɑ Kïti Pɑrɑn.
Ge ɑ́cyɑ̈dhi kɑ wëywödd ɑ́lïp pyɑ̈rø,
kí mɑc me pɑ̈mmø kì wïj kyëje.
Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j jie mɑɑr yi en,
ji-ɑ bɑ møge korre’ korrø.
Bøødh wɑ riee dhøggi tyelle,
kɑ cigge mïdhi wɑ.
Cigg-ɑ ɑ́mëggi wøn yi Mosɑ̀ ómïdhi yi wøn,
gen ɑ cigg-ɑ bɑ kɑ̈r kì yï pödhi wøn.
Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j ɑ́göög ɑ́ rɑ̈ɑ̈dh tyëng Isrɑil
keny-ɑ ɑ́bëëd wɑ̈thi kɑ̈lli gen cugø kì kej ɑ́kyel geki jɑggi gen.
Møg-ɑ ɑ́kwøb yi Mosɑ̀ kipe gøl Ruben ek:
“Wïj Ruben koo pɑ̈ɑ̈dh,
cɑgg ɑ́ kɑ̀ bëëd jie ge nøg.”
Kɑ okööbø kipe gøl Yeudɑ̀ kinni,
“Yïn ɑ Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j,
lïngí ywøøg gen kɑ̀ kwɑ̈jji gen kipe kønyø.
Cigí gen rebø ki kɑ̈ll-ɑ kyeelø.
Nyïɑ̈ggí kiper gen, yïn ɑ Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j.
Kɑ ge køny ki tyɑmi tyëngmɑ̈ɑ̈nø.”
“Yïn ɑ Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j,
nyodh møgí ki Urïm geki Thumïm,
kì cinggi bɑ̈nggí, bɑ̈ngg-ɑ mïdhi kwøbbí; Kwɑrri Leebì.
Ge ɑ́rɑng yi yïn kì Mɑɑsɑ̀,
kɑ ge yod yi yïn ge døøj kì Merïbɑ̀.
Yï ɑ́wør yi gen ki mendwøng,
kɑ yï mɑɑr yi gen kibøli wëëg gen geki mëëg gen,
kí nyiimï gen wɑlɑ̀ nyigi gen.
Kɑ ciggí mïdhi yi gen
Lwöbø mií nuti pɑ̈ɑ̈d gen.
O jií ópwönyi yi gen ki mïdhi ciggí,
gen ɑ nyi muujø ki gëdhhì kì wïj këli lɑm mií.
Yïn ɑ Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, wiy gøl gen tënge.
Med pyëwí ki gïg-ɑ gøggi yi gen.
Mød tyëng-ɑ mɑɑn gen bënn,
tyëngmɑ̈ɑ̈nø ko wëggí dhwödhø këti.”
Kɑ okööbø kipe gøl Ben Yɑmïn kinni,
“Bene gøl-ɑ mɑɑr yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j èn, gøl-ɑ korri yi en.
Gï korre’ korrø kì dicɑ̈ng bëne.
O bëëd ɑ kelli gen.”
Kɑ okööbø kipe gøl Yosep kinni,
“Wiy piny gen gëdhhi kødh yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j
kí pïg-ɑ kɑ̈ɑ̈l thɑ piny.
Wiy nywøli gïn-ɑ pidh yi gen cyeg gen kidøøj,
o nywøli yenh-ɑ døj bëëd ge nud kì yij run bëne kì piny gen.
Wiy wɑ̈thi kwøømmi gen, kwøømm-ɑ weenø bëëd ge pɑ̈ng yi nywøli yenh-ɑ døj.
Wiy piny gen bëëde e pɑ̈ng yi gïg-ɑ døj bënn.
Gyëdhhe kɑ̈ɑ̈l-ɑ ri døøji Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j,
ɑ ɑ́kööb kì ri kïrø me lyel ki mɑc.
Wiy gyëdhhɑni bï gen kömi gøl Yosep.
Mɑ́ en ɑ ɑ́bëëd ɑ́ pëëji kì kelli nyiimen.
Yosep teg ni wɑdh;
men-ɑ́ tegi tùngi ógïg ɑ yïe!
Tùnge bɑ ɑ́lïppi gøl Mɑnɑsè
Kí ɑ́lïp pyɑ̈r mø Eprɑim.
Tùngɑni ɑ cööbe pödhh,
Kɑ gï cøøre cögi piny.”
Kɑ okööbø kipe gøl Dhebulun geki gøl Isɑkɑr kinni,
“Wiy gøl Dhebulun dönye kì bɑng ngyëw-ɑ ngyëwe
kì kömi nɑɑm omelø.
Kɑ wiy kɑ̈ɑ̈r Isɑkɑr dønge kì yethi myërr.
Tyëngpɑth nyi cwööl ge’ wɑ̈thi kïtti gen.
Kɑ ge omuujø ki gëdhh-ɑ dyër kì kunɑni.
Kɑ̈ɑ̈r gen yod yi gen ɑ nɑɑm omelø,
kí ri ɑyejø kì thɑ̈ngi nɑɑm omelø.”
Kɑ okööbø kipe gøl Gɑd kinni,
“Lenhi Jwøk, ɑ ɑ́gwøg piny gen e lɑɑj.
Gɑd lïïbø nɑ ngur,
men nyi cöd bɑd wɑlɑ̀ rɑ̈m.
Piny-ɑ pëddi døøjø, ɑ ɑ́kwɑny yi gen ɑ́ mi gen.
Bun-ɑ nyi bëëdø ɑ́ mi jɑgø ɑ ɑ́mëggi gen.
Ciggi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j geki kwönge ɑ́mïdhi yi gen,
keny-ɑ ɑ́cugi pëjji Isrɑil.”
Kɑ okööbø kipe gøl Dɑn kinni,
“Dɑn bɑ wɑ̈d ngur,
pɑ̈r e kɑ̈ɑ̈l-ɑ Bɑcɑn.”
Kɑ okööbø kì ri gøl Nɑptɑlì kinni,
“Nɑptɑlì bëëd ɑ yij dhwɑ̈ng-ɑ ɑ́gëdhhii yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j.
Pinye wɑ̈dh-ɑ kuni wɑɑng cyɑ̈ɑ̈ng böörø geki kuni wɑɑng wurlwɑl,
e kön-ɑ́ɑ̀ Tɑɑy Gɑlelì.”
Kɑ okööbø kipe gøl Aceer kinni,
“Gøl Aceer bɑ ɑgyëdh kibøli kɑ̈ll-ɑ kyeelø.
Wiy e ómɑɑr yi nyiimen.
Wiy pinye óbëëde e pɑ̈ng yi yenh dhetun.
Wiy dhøggi dörri kɑ̈dde óbëëd gen ge nyi cyëëg kɑ thïggi ngyënyø dødø.
Wiy e óbëëde pyëwe pɑ lïngø.”
Wun ɑ tyëng Isrɑil, bong jwøg me pɑ̈r ki Jwøøg wun,
ɑ cyɑ̈dhi ki dhwɑ̈ng kì yij mɑl,
ɑ cyɑ̈dhi kì yethi pøøl e bï-ɑ be kønyi yïn.
Bɑ Jwøk ɑ nyi korri yïn ceth.
Cingge, cingg-ɑ teg gen ɑ korri yïn ceth.
Tyëngmɑ̈ɑ̈nø ɑ́cyeede wɑ̈g, kedh yï kedh-ɑ bølí,
kɑ yï köbbe kinni nɑ̈g gen bënn.
Bëëd wun ki mër wun ɑ kwɑrri Yɑgob,
pëthi wun koo lïngø kì piny-ɑ pɑ̈ng yi byëlø bëne geki møgi oløg.
Piny-ɑ nyi thïnyi yi thöjj-ɑ kɑ̈ɑ̈l mɑl.
Isrɑil, pyëwí med nɑ ngø!
Bong pödhø me pɑ̈r ki yïn.
Yï pönh-ɑ ɑ́yiel yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j.
Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kiree ɑ bɑ kwödí geki pilí
møg-ɑ korrí rií, o yï tyɑ̈ɑ̈m.
Tyëngmɑ̈ɑ̈nø óbï ge kwɑjj-ɑ lɑ̈mpyëw,
o ge ónyøn yi yïn.

Kɑ Mosɑ̀ odhwödhø kì thwøri Moɑb, kɑ kedh-ɑ Kïti Nebö, kɑ yedh-ɑ oledh Kïti Pisgɑ̀ kì bøli Yerikö, kì wɑɑng cyɑ̈ɑ̈ng mwøl. Kɑ nyudhi pinyɑni bëne yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, ɑ løg piny Gilyɑd, e göjj-ɑ wɑɑng wuudø gïti kɑɑl Dɑn,
kí piny Nɑptɑlì bëne, kí piny Eprɑim geki Mɑnɑsè, kí piny Yeudɑ̀, e gït-ɑ kömi Nɑɑm Omeli Tɑr,
kí piny Yeudɑ̀ kì wɑɑng wurlwɑl, kí thwør-ɑ cɑ̈gi kì Dhoɑr gïti Yerikö, kɑɑl benø.
Codhe, ɑköbbi Mosɑ̀ yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kinni, “Bene piny-ɑ ɑ́köbbɑ Abrɑhɑm, kí Isɑɑk, kí Yɑgob kinni ómëggɑ kwɑrri gen ceth. Áwëggɑ lidhø yi yïn, de yï koo wëggɑ kedhi yije.”
Codhe, ɑthøw Mosɑ̀ bɑ̈ng Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kì piny Moɑb, ni kɑ ɑ́kööb Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kinni óthøw-ɑ kenyɑni.
Kɑ kony yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kì yij tör kì Moɑb, kenyɑni rwöm ki Betpeor, de bong dhɑnhø mɑ ɑ́yod dïl keny-ɑ ɑ́koonyii gïti dicyɑ̈ngtïn.
Mosɑ̀ runne ɑ́bëëd gɑ miyø kí pyɑ̈r ɑ́ryew keny-ɑ ɑ́thøwe, de ɑ́bëëd dële nudd e teeg ni kɑ ɑ́bëëde ceth, o nyinge onëënø kidøøj.
Kɑ ywøg yi tyëng Isrɑil kì piny Moɑb ki cyɑ̈ng pyɑ̈r ɑ́dɑ̈g.
Jöcwø wɑ̈d Nun, ɑ́bëëd yïe dɑ peli wïj me dwøng, mɑ́ Mosɑ̀ ɑ́kwɑny-ɑ en ɑ́ ngɑn mɑg keje. Kwøbbi Jöcwø nyii lïngø yi tyëng Isrɑil. Kɑ Ciggi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j cigg-ɑ ɑ́muuj yi Mosɑ̀ mïdhi gen kidøøj.
Bong jɑltöng mɑ ɑ́göög ki gïïngɑ̈ngø geki ngïjjì mø døngø ni møg-ɑ ɑ́wëggi gøggø yi Mosɑ̀, keny-ɑ ɑ́örii yï rɑ̈ɑ̈dh Rïp geki jyɑ̈gge, kí pödhe bëne yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j.
Bong jɑltöng mɑ ɑ́göög ki gïgdøngø mø böggi ni Mosɑ̀ kì Isrɑil.
Kì bɑng thøwi Mosɑ̀ bɑ̈ng Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, ɑköbbi Jöcwø wɑ̈d Nun, ngɑn-ɑ ɑ́bëëd e nyi køny-ɑ Mosɑ̀, yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kinni,
“Bɑ̈ngɑ Mosɑ̀ ɑ́thøw. De yïn, wuki tyëng Isrɑil bënn, tyenyu ri wun, kɑ Nɑm Urdun bɑ̈ɑ̈n wun, wu kedh-ɑ piny-ɑ mëggɑ wun.
Ni kɑ ɑ́köbbɑ Mosɑ̀ kinni keny-ɑ ókëël wun tyelli wun, ɑ́mëggɑ wun bëne.
Cögi piny wun ówɑ̈dhi ryɑng-ɑ wɑɑng wurlwɑl gïti kïtti Lubnɑn kì wɑɑng wuudø. Cɑg kì Nɑm Porɑt kì wɑɑng cyɑ̈ɑ̈ng mwøl, e cør-ɑ yij pödhi Kit, gïti Nɑɑm Omeli Tɑr kì wɑɑng cyɑ̈ɑ̈ng böörø.
Jöcwø, bong ngɑn tyɑm yïn kinni tek kɑ̈ng-ɑ nëën! Yï ókøny yi yɑn ceth ni kɑ ɑ́kønyɑ Mosɑ̀, yï pɑ wiyɑ piny kinni tek.
Bëëd yï teg, kɑ pyëwí cwed, mɑ́ bene yïn ɑ ópeej ji møg be kwɑnyi piny-ɑ ɑ́köngɑ kweyyi gen.

Bëëd pyëwí teg, pyëwí ko wëggí nyönhø kinni tek, kɑ cigg-ɑ ɑ́mëggi yïn yi Mosɑ̀ bɑ̈ngɑ mïdhí kidøøj, ko di kwï gen mø wøy yi yïn. O gïg-ɑ dwɑddi yi yïn gwøgø nyi lwɑ̈ng yi yïn, kì kɑ̈jj-ɑ ócyɑ̈dhi yi yïn bënn.

Nyi kømmí møg-ɑ yij wɑ̈nyi Cigg yethi cyɑ̈ng bënn. Nyi rømmí møgɑni kì wɑ̈r kí dicɑ̈ng, nyi mïdhí møgɑni per gen teeg cɑrø ki mendwøng, o yï yïddí ki gïgdøj, o gïg-ɑ nyi dwɑddí gwøgø nyi lwɑ̈ng yi wun.
Rømmí møg-ɑ ɑ́köbbɑ yïn cøn kinni bëëd yï teg, kɑ pyëwí cwed, ko di gïn böggi yi yïn, mɑ́ yï ókøny yi yɑn, yɑ Jwøgí, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, kì kun-ɑ ókedhi yi yïn.”
Kɑ pëjjì köbbi yi Jöcwø kinni,

kedhi gen yethi kemmì bënn, o ji köbbi yi gen kinni, “Gwiru gïgcɑmmi wun, kipe wu kedh-ɑ be bɑ̈ɑ̈ni Nɑm Urdun kì bɑng cyɑ̈ng ɑ́dɑ̈g, wu kedh-ɑ be kwɑnyi piny-ɑ ɑ́mëggi wun yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, Jwøøg wun.”
“Pɑru kwøbb-ɑ köbbi wun yi Mosɑ̀ bɑ̈ng Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kinni, piny-ɑ wɑɑng cyɑ̈ɑ̈ng mwøl kì ri Nɑm Urdun ómëggi wun yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, Jwøøg wun, ɑ́ myërri wun.
Wiy wun mɑ̈nni wun, kí nyigi wun, kí dhögi wun, kɑ jøliny mø wun kedhi gen be liny kyeel geki nyiimï gen, tyëng Isrɑil møg-ɑ kedhi løøg Nɑm Urdun.
Gïti keny-ɑ ókwɑny gen piny-ɑ ɑ́muuj yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j. Bene keny-ɑ ódøøg wun myërri wun, myërr-ɑ ɑ́mëggi wun yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, kì løøg Nɑm Urdun kì wɑɑng cyɑ̈ɑ̈ng mwøl.”
Aløøg gen mø Jöcwø kinni, “Gïg-ɑ ɑ́köbbí wøn bënn, ógwøg yi wøn. Wø ókedhi keny-ɑ ör wøn.
Kwøbbí ólïngi yi wøn, ni kɑ ɑ́lïngi wøn kwøbbi Mosɑ̀, yï ókøny yi Jwøgí, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j ni kɑ ɑ́kønye Mosɑ̀!
Ngɑn-ɑ ótyëddi yïn, wɑlɑ̀ ɑ ópyem møg-ɑ ɑ́cïgí wøn, ónɑ̈g. Bëëd pyëwí teeg, kɑ ko di gïn böggi yi yïn!”
Alïng rɑ̈ɑ̈dh Yerikö kinni, i dɑ jø Isrɑil mø bëën kɑɑl kì wɑ̈rɑni, ge bï-ɑ be lyewwi piny.
Aödi rɑ̈ɑ̈dh Yerikö yï Rɑɑ̈b kinni i kɑ̈ɑ̈le jøg-ɑ ɑ́bï gøle wɑ̈g, mɑ́ ge ɑ́bï-ɑ be lyewwi piny.

Alöggi Rɑɑ̈b kinni, “Kidyër ɑ́dɑ jøg mɑ ɑ́bï gølɑ, de kwïj yi yɑn mɑ løg gen jø keny. De ge ɑ́kedh kɑ̈ng-ɑ́ nuti cyëëg dhø döri kɑɑl kì wɑɑng thyënhø, o keny-ɑ ɑ́kedhi yi gen kwïj yi yɑn, jwɑnu bɑng gen, ge ópïïd yi wun.”
(Jøgɑni rumø ki kïdhi mɑl wïj ød
Akedhi jøg-ɑ yɑ̈bø bɑng jø Isrɑil gïti kɑ ɑ́wɑ̈dhi gen keny-ɑ nyi lwøød Nɑm Urdun, kì bɑng gen ceth, ɑcyëëg dhøg kɑɑl.
Kɑ̈ng-ɑ́ nuti buddi jøgɑni, ɑkedhi Rɑɑ̈b yï gen wïj ød,
ɑköbbe gïn kinni, “Ngɑ̈nyi yi yɑn kinni piny men ɑ́rum ki mëggi wun yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, wø ɑ́bwøg yi wun. Jii pönhï bënn ɑ́bwøg ki mendwøng.

Yuu-ɑ ɑ́wëggi Nɑɑm Omeli Kwɑrø thwøwø yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kì bøli wun keny-ɑ ɑ́bëënu wɑ̈g kì Rïp, ɑ́lïngi yi wøn geki kër-ɑ ɑ́nɑ̈g wun rɑ̈nhi tyëng Amör ryeet, ɑ løg Sïön geki Og, møg-ɑ ɑ́bëëd kì wɑɑng cyɑ̈ɑ̈ng mwøl kì løøg Nɑm Urdun.
Pëthi wøn ɑ́nyönhi keny-ɑ ɑ́lïngi wøn møgɑni, mɑ́ Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, Jwøøg wun, bɑ Jwøøg mɑl kí piny.
Anɑn köngi wun ki nyingi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kinni, ni kɑ ɑ́göggɑ wun ki gïndøj, gøl wïyɑ ólony yi wun ki göggø ki gïndøj thyew, kɑ yɑ nëngi wun ki ngïji men nyodh kinni dhøggi wun pɑ wil yi wun.
Köngi wun ɑnɑn kinni, wïyɑ, kí meyɑ kí nyiimïɑ yɑɑg-ɑ cwøw kí mɑ̈nn, kí wɑddi wøn bënn koo wëggi wun nɑ̈gø!”

Aköbbi Rɑɑ̈b yi jøgɑni kinni, “Keløg e bong ngɑn köbbi yi yïn ki gwøøg wøn, wiy wø ónɑ̈g yi Jwøk, keløg köng-ɑ ɑ́köngi wøn koo mïdhi yi wøn. Yï ógöggi yi wøn ki gïndøj, keny-ɑ ómëggi wøn piny men yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j.”
Amiid jøgɑni piny kì ɑwɑj ki thøl yi Rɑɑ̈b, mɑ́ gøle ying-ɑ ri döri kɑɑl.

Aköbbi jøgɑni yi Rɑɑ̈b kinni, “Kɑ̈l wun myërri kelli kïttì, o wu cögu wu pɑ yod yi jø rɑ̈dh møg-ɑ yɑb wun, kɑ ri wun kɑnni wun kì kunɑni ki cyɑ̈ng ɑ́dɑ̈g, gïti keny-ɑ ódwöög jøgɑni, codhe o wu lunyi wun ki kedhi yuu wun.”
Aköbbi Rɑɑ̈b yi jøgɑni kinni, “Köng-ɑ ɑ́wëggi wøn köngø ómïdhi yi wøn ceth.
Keny-ɑ óbëën wøn be mɑgi piny men, twööj thøl-ɑ kwɑrø èn ri ɑwɑny-ɑ ɑ́kïdhí wøn piny. Kɑ wïyí, kí meyí, kí nyiimyëw, kí gøl wïyí bëne cøng gølí.

Keløg e dɑ dhɑnhø ɑ́kyel men-ɑ ókedhi wɑ̈g kì gølí, e kedh-ɑ yij yöö, ngɑnɑni ócyen-ɑ ree kete, o wø koo cɑy kipe thøwe, de keløg e dɑ ngɑn-ɑ ónywɑl dhɑnhø ɑ́kyel kì kelli tyëng-ɑ gølí, cyënni ngɑnɑni óying kömi wøn.
De keløg gwøng-ɑ ɑ́gwøg yi wøn óköbbí ji møøgø, óbong-ɑ cɑ́y kì kömi wøn kipe møg-ɑ ɑ́köbbí wøn kinni köngi wøn.”
Akööb Rɑɑ̈b kinni, “Wiy ge bëëd gen ni møg-ɑ ɑ́kwøb yi wun ceth.” Aöre gïn yöö. Atwööje thølɑni ri ɑwɑj.
Akedhi jøgɑni kelli kïttì, ɑbëëd gen kì kunɑni ki cyɑ̈ng ɑ́dɑ̈g gïti kɑ ɑ́dwöög jøg-ɑ ɑ́yɑb gen kɑɑl, mɑ́ ge ɑ́yɑ̈ɑ̈b kì kɑ̈jj bënn, de gï nuti yood gen.
Ayïnhi jøgɑni ryeet piny kì wïj kït, ɑbɑ̈ɑ̈n gen Nɑm Urdun, ɑbëën gen yï Jöcwø wɑ̈d Nun. Alwöbbi ge gøn gïg-ɑ ɑ́göög bënn.
Kɑ Jöcwø köbbi gen kinni, “Pinyɑni rumø ki cïb cinggee yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kidyër, tyëng pönhɑni ceg-ɑ böggø yi wɑ ki mendwøng.”
Adhwödh Jöcwø geki tyëng Isrɑil bënn kì mwøl e piny nudd e looj, kì Cithïm, ge kedh-ɑ løøg Nɑm Urdun, ɑkɑl gen bëëdø kì kenyɑni e nɑm nuti bɑ̈ɑ̈n gen.
Kì bɑng cyɑ̈ng ɑ́dɑ̈g, ɑkedhi pëjji liny kelli kemmì.
Kɑ ji ceg yi gen kinni “Keny-ɑ ólidhu Sɑnduug Ciggi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, Jwøøg wun e obyellø yi ókwër, Kwɑrri Leebì, kɑ wu dhwödh wun kì kɑ̈jji wun, kɑ wu løgu bɑnge.
Cɑgg ɑ́ kɑ̀ nuti pɑ̈nyi wun kɑ̈l yuuɑni tyelø ɑ́kyel, wu ónyudhi yi gen ki yöö, de cyɑ̈dhi wun kì bɑnge e dɑ kïlomïtïr ɑ́kyel, kì kɑɑm wun ki Sɑnduug Cigg.”
Aköbbi ji yi Jöcwø kinni, “Kwëru ri wun ɑnɑn, kipe dhuki Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j ógöögø ki gïïngɑ̈ngø kì kelli wun.”
Codhe, ɑköbbi ókwër yi Jöcwø, o Sɑnduug Cigg kwɑny yi gen, o gø mwøøl gen bøli ji.
Kɑ Jöcwø köbbi yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kinni, “Gïn-ɑ ógwøg yi yɑn dicyɑ̈ngtïn, bɑ gïn-ɑ per ówøør yïn yi tyëng Isrɑil, o yod kinni yï nyii kønyø yi yɑn ni kɑ ɑ́kønyɑ Mosɑ̀.
Ceg ókwërr-ɑ byelli Sɑnduug Cigg kinni, keny-ɑ ówɑ̈dhi gen tøg Nɑm Urdun, kɑ ge cungi gen kì kenyɑni.”
Kɑ tyëng Isrɑil köbbi yi Jöcwø kinni, “Bïu lïngu møg-ɑ kømmi yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, Jwøøg wun.

O yod yi wun kinni Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, Jwøng-ɑ Nëënø nud kì kelli wun. O tyëng Kɑnɑɑn, kí tyëng Kit, kí tyëng Kib, kí tyëng Perïdh, kí tyëng Girgɑc, kí tyëng Amör, kí tyëng Yebus, gï ócyedde kì bøli wun ceth,
keny-ɑ órum Sɑnduug Ciggi Wïi piny bëne ki bɑ̈ɑ̈ni Nɑm Urdun, e kɑ̈l ɑ bøli wun.
Kɑ wu yïëëny wun ki jøg-ɑ cwøw pyɑ̈rø wïdɑ́ryew kì kɑ̈lli Isrɑil, jɑl ɑ́kyel kì wïj kɑl ɑ́kyel.
Ókwërr-ɑ ɑ́byelli Sɑnduug Ciggi Wïi piny bëne, en ɑ Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, keny-ɑ ókëël gen tyelli gen yethi pï, Nɑm Urdun ócungi; kɑ pïg-ɑ rïngi piny kì mɑl ri gen cøng gen kej ɑ́kyel.”
Ábëëd ɑ́ bøli keny-ɑ nyi kɑɑj byel, o nɑm ɑ́bëëd e pɑ̈ng.
Keny-ɑ ɑ́bɑ̈ɑ̈n Nɑm Urdun yi ji, ókwër ɑ́cyɑ̈dh ɑ bøli gen, ge byell-ɑ Sɑnduug Cigg. Keny-ɑ ɑ́këël gen tyelli gen nɑm,
ɑcungi pïg-ɑ rïngi kì mɑl, ge lɑ̈wi ki keny-ɑ cwøl ɑ́ Adɑm, ɑ cyɑ̈gi ki Dhɑretɑn. Kɑ pïg-ɑ rengi yij Luuy Omelø ceg-ɑ ì lɑɑw. Codhe, ɑbɑ̈ɑ̈n nɑm yi ji kì bøli Yerikö.
Ókwërr-ɑ ɑ́byelli Sɑnduug Cigg ɑ́cungi kì piny me thwøwø kì dyëri Nɑm Urdun, gïti kɑ ɑ́thumi tyëng Isrɑil ki wɑ̈dhi wɑ̈g bënn.
Keny-ɑ ɑ́rum tyëng Isrɑil ki wɑ̈dhi løøg Nɑm Urdun bënn. Aköbbi Jöcwø yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kinni,
“Yïëëny ki ji pyɑ̈rø wïdɑ́ryew kì kelli tyëng Isrɑil, jɑl ɑ́kyel kì wïj kɑl.
Kɑ ge köbbí kinni, ‘Kɑ̈bbi wun ki tuggi kïttì pyɑ̈rø wïdɑ́ryew kì dïdyëri Nɑm Urdun, kì keny-ɑ cungi yi ókwër, kɑ ge tëëru wɑ̈g, kɑ ge cïb wun piny kì keny-ɑ óbuddi yi wun tïn kì wɑ̈r.’ ”
Acwööl jøg-ɑ pyɑ̈rø wïdɑ́ryew møg-ɑ ɑ́yieny yi Jöcwø kì kelli tyëng Isrɑil.
Aköbbe gïn kinni, “Kedhu bøli Sɑnduug Ciggi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, Jwøøng wun, wu kedh-ɑ dïdyëri Nɑm Urdun. Kɑ̈bbi dhɑnhø ɑ́kyel kì kelli wun ki tungi kït ɑ́kyel ɑ́ mi wïj gøl gen, kɑ gø byele.
Tuggi kïttɑni óbëëd gɑ ngïjjì kiper wun, kenyi pyëëj wun yi nyigi wun dhuki megø kinni, ‘Kïttì møg bɑ mø ngø kì yï wun cøn?’

Ge óköbbi yi wun kinni, ‘Pïi Nɑm Urdun ri gen ɑ́pɑ̈ngi gen kì bøli Sɑnduug Ciggi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, keny-ɑ ɑ́kɑ̈ɑ̈lii e bɑ̈ɑ̈n-ɑ Nɑm Urdun.’ Wiy tuggi kïttɑni nyi pɑ̈ddi gen tyëng Isrɑil ki møgɑni gïti ɑtheer.”

Codhe, ɑgwøøg møg-ɑ ɑ́kwøb yi Jöcwø bënn yi tyëng Isrɑil, ɑkwɑnye tuggi kïttì pyɑ̈rø wïdɑ́ryew ni kwɑnni wɑ̈thi kɑ̈lli Isrɑil, kì dïdyëri Nɑm Urdun ni kɑ ɑ́köbbi Jöcwø yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, kɑ gï tëër gen keny-ɑ pëggi yi gen, ɑcïb ge gïn piny kì kenyɑni.
Akɑ̈bbi Jöcwø ki tuggi kïttì pyɑ̈rø wïdɑ́ryew møøgø, kɑ gï cïbe dïdyëri Nɑm Urdun keny-ɑ ɑ́cungi yi ókwërr-ɑ ɑ́byelli Sɑnduug Cigg. Ge nud kì kenyɑni gïti dicyɑ̈ngtïn.
Ókwërr-ɑ ɑ́byelli Sɑnduug Cigg ɑ́cungi kì dïdyëri Nɑm Urdun, gïti kɑ ɑ́thumi møg-ɑ ɑ́köbbi Jöcwø yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j ki gwøgø bënn, ni kɑ ɑ́köbbi gen Jöcwø yi Mosɑ̀ cøn.
Ajwɑn ji ri gen ki gwɑɑr wɑ̈g.
Keny-ɑ ɑ́rum ji ki wɑ̈dhi løøgø bënn, kɑ ókwërr-ɑ byelli Sɑnduug Ciggi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kedh-ɑ bøli gen.
Kɑ jø gøl Ruben, kí jø gøl Gɑd kí budi jø gøl Mɑnɑsè, nɑm bɑ̈ɑ̈n gen ge møøl-ɑ bøli tyëng Isrɑil, ri gen tyeeny gen ceth kipe liny, ni kɑ ɑ́köbbi gen yi Mosɑ̀.
Gïn ni jøliny ɑ́lïp pyɑ̈r ɑ́ngwen ɑ́kedhi bøli Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, kì thwøri Yerikö.
Kì bɑng gïn-ɑ ɑ́gwøg yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j dicyɑ̈ngɑni, Jöcwø ɑ́göög pere teeg kì yï tyëng Isrɑil, kɑ gø gɑ̈nni gen kì yij bëëde bëne, ni kɑ ɑ́gɑ̈nni Mosɑ̀ yi gen.
Aköbbi Jöcwø yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kinni,
“Köbbí ókwërr-ɑ byelli Sɑnduug Cigg, kinni bï gen wɑ̈g kì nɑm.”
Aköbbi ókwër yi Jöcwø kinni, “Bïu wɑ̈g kì nɑm.”
Keny-ɑ ɑ́wɑ̈dhi ókwërr-ɑ byelli Sɑnduug Ciggi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j wɑ̈g ceth, kɑ pï døøg-ɑ be ngwej ni kenyi rïngi gen cøn, kɑ tøggi nɑm opɑ̈ngø ni kɑ ɑ́bëëd gen.
Ji Nɑm Urdun ɑ́bɑ̈ɑ̈n gen kì pyɑ̈ri cyɑ̈nggi dwɑ̈n-ɑ mɑl. Agud gen ki kemmì kì Gilgɑl kì bøli Yerikö, kì wɑɑng cyɑ̈ɑ̈ng mwøl.
Kɑ tuggi kïttì pyɑ̈rø wïdɑ́ryew møg-ɑ ɑ́kɑ̈ɑ̈l gen wɑ̈g kì Nɑm Urdun, cïb Gilgɑl yi Jöcwø.
Aköbbi tyëng Isrɑil yi Jöcwø kinni, “Kenyi pyëj kwɑrri wun wëëg gen, kì bøli keny megø kinni, ‘Á tuggi kïttì mø ngø ek?’
Wiy e óyod yi kwɑrri wun kinni Isrɑil ɑ́kɑ̈l-ɑ keny thwøwø kì Nɑm Urdun.
