Eud thɑ̈dhø ki pilø me bɑ̈re bɑ gïn ni sentimïtïr pyɑ̈r ɑ́bïj, me bedh kì tùnge bënn, ying-ɑ yij bøje gø twööj en rɑ̈me kì tuung kyëj kì thɑ ógødhe.
Codhe, ɑmëgge jɑmmɑni Eglön. Eglön bɑ jɑl me cwiy ki mendwøng.
Keny-ɑ ɑ́rum jɑmmì ki mëggii yi Eud, ɑköbbe jøg-ɑ ɑ́kɑ̈lli jɑmmì kinni, døøg gen pɑc.
De Eud ɑ́dwöög kì buti ngïjjì, kì buti Gilgɑl, ɑköbbe Eglön kinni, “Wuö, yïɑ dɑ wöödø me dwɑddɑ köbbi yïn kì wɑ̈yí.”
Codhe, kɑ rɑ̈dh jøge köbbe kinni, “Kedh wun, wiy wø döng wøn keti wøn!” Kɑ jøgɑni kedh-ɑ wɑ̈g bënn.
Abëën Eud yï rɑ̈dh, e obëëdø kì wɑ̈ye kì øde, øn-ɑ mɑl, øn-ɑ ngij. Akööbe kinni, “Yïɑ dɑ wöödø me muujɑ yïn, e kɑ̈ɑ̈l-ɑ yï Jwøk.” Adhwödhi rɑ̈dh mɑl.
Kɑ Eud pile wöödhe wɑ̈g ki cingi cɑɑme kì ópɑɑb kyëje, kɑ rɑ̈dh cwøbe kì yije.
Apödhi pilø yije ki böle, kɑ cïnne røy-ɑ piny. Pilø nuti puth wɑ̈g yi Eud, mɑ́ e cödhø bëne yi dwɑ̈lø.
Akedhi Eud wɑ̈g kɑ dhøggi ud bënn dijje köme.
Codhe ɑkedhe. Keny-ɑ ɑ́bëën jøg-ɑ bɑ bɑ̈nggi rɑ̈dh, ɑlidh gen dhøggi ud gɑ ɑcyëg bënn, de ge ɑ́rum kinni i rɑ̈dh mɑɑg-ɑ ree piny.
Ayïd gen kɑ ge opïdø yi yïd, de keny-ɑ ɑ́cwönge e ød nuti yieeb en, ɑkwɑny gen muptɑɑ̀, kɑ dhø ød tug gen. Kɑ wïi gen yood gen e obuddø kì piny e thøø.
Eud, kedhø kì wɑ̈ye kɑ̈ng-ɑ ɑ́yïd gen. Kedhø e ójwɑnø kì gøddi kïtt-ɑ ótwegø, kɑ kedh-ɑ Seir.
Keny-ɑ ɑ́wɑ̈nhe myërri kïtti Eprɑim, ɑkodhe tung e cwøl-ɑ tyëng Isrɑil kipe nyɑɑg, ɑpeeje gïn piny thɑ́ kïttì.

Aköbbe gïn kinni, “Bïu bɑngɑ! Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j wu ɑ́thödhe ki tegø men tyɑm wun tyëng-ɑ mɑɑn wun, tyëng Moɑb.” Akedhi gen bɑng Eud, kɑ dhøwɑdh men-ɑ di kɑ̈nhi yi tyëng Moɑb wɑ̈g kì Nɑm Urdun mɑg yi gen, bong dhɑnhø ɑ́kyel mɑ ɑ́wiy yi gen o kɑdhe wɑ̈g.
Isrɑil ɑ́nɑ̈gi ki ji ɑ́lïp pyɑ̈rø, gɑ jøliny mø teg.
Kɑ tyëng Moɑb tyɑm dicyɑ̈ngɑni yi Isrɑil. Kɑ pödhø obëëdø ki mër ki runn pyɑ̈r ɑ́bïdɑ̈g.
Bɑng Eud, ɑ ɑ́bëën yi Cɑmgɑr wɑ̈d Anɑth. Isrɑil ɑ́yiel yi en thyew, kɑ ónɑ̈gø ki tyëng Pelistiyɑ̀ mø kwɑnni gen bɑ miy ɑ́bïkyel, ki lodh kïrø men-ɑ nyi kwølle wɑdhe, wɑɑdh pur.
Keny-ɑ ɑ́rum Eud ki thøø, ɑgöög tyëng Isrɑil ki gïgrijjø këti kì bøli Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j.
Codhe, ɑwëggi gen tyɑmø yi Yɑbïn rɑ̈ɑ̈dh Kɑnɑɑn, ɑ ɑ́jyɑ̈ɑ̈g kì kɑɑl Adhör yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j. Pënyi linye ɑ́bëëd ɑ́ Siserɑ̀, ɑ ɑ́bëëd kì Kɑröceth Pödhh-ɑ kyeelø.

Yɑbïn ɑ́bëëd yïe dɑ yɑ̈thi liny miy ɑ́bïngwen, mø bɑ ngyënyø dødø, kí jøliny mø ngenyø. Kɑ tyëng Isrɑil jɑɑge ki runn pyɑ̈r ɑ́ryew, kɑ nyingi gïn guude. Codhe, ɑywøøg tyëng Isrɑil kö Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j.
Kì bøli kenyɑni, ngetitöng, Debörɑ̀ cï Lɑpidöt, ɑ́bëëd ɑ́ jɑngi burø kì Isrɑil.
Debörɑ̀ nyi bëëd ɑ thɑ benø, kì kɑɑm Rɑmɑ̀ geki Betiil, kì myërri kïtti Eprɑim, kɑ tyëng Isrɑil nyi kedh-ɑ yïe be lidhi gønyyi gen.

Aöde yï Bɑrɑk wɑ̈d Abinoɑm kì kɑɑl Kedec kì Nɑptɑlì ki wöödø kinni, “Jwøøg Isrɑil, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, yï ɑ́cege kinni, ‘Kɑ̈bbí ki ji ɑ́lïp pyɑ̈rø kì kelli jø gøl Nɑptɑlì geki gøl Dhebulun, kɑ wu kedhu Kïti Tɑbör.
Siserɑ̀, pënyi liny Yɑbïn ókɑ̈ɑ̈lɑ be nyɑɑg ki yïn, kì kömi Nɑm Gicön. Óbï ki yɑ̈the geki jølinye, de ge ócïbɑ cingí.’ ”
De Bɑrɑk ɑ́löggi kinni, “Keløg yï ókedhø ki yɑn, yɑ ókedh, de keløg yï pɑ kedh, yɑ pɑ kedh thyew.”
Alöggi Debörɑ̀ kinni, “Døj, wɑ ókedh, de bong pwøj møg-ɑ óyod yi yïn, mɑ́ Siserɑ̀ ócïb-ɑ cingi ngɑndhɑjø yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j.” Codhe, ɑdhwödh Debörɑ̀ geki Bɑrɑk, kɑ ge kedh-ɑ Kɑdic.
Acwøøl gøl Dhebulun geki gøl Nɑptɑlì kì Kɑdic yi Bɑrɑk, kɑ jøg mø kwɑnni gen bɑ ɑ́lïp pyɑ̈rø løg-ɑ bɑnge. Kɑ Debörɑ̀ ókedhø thyew ki gen.
Kì bøli kenyɑni, Keber rum dhwödhø kì buti tyëng Ken møg-ɑ kyeelø, ɑ løg kwɑrri Köbɑb, ørri Mosɑ̀. Kɑ gudd-ɑ buti óthurø kì Dhɑnɑnïm.
Keny-ɑ ɑ́lïng Siserɑ̀ kinni Bɑrɑk wɑ̈d Abinoɑm kedhi Kïti Tɑbör,
kɑ Siserɑ̀ yɑ̈thi linye gɑ miy ɑ́bïngwen, kí jøliny bënn cwööle kì Kɑröceth Pödhh-ɑ kyeelø, kɑ ge kedh-ɑ kömi Nɑm Gicön.

Aköbbi Bɑrɑk yi Debörɑ̀ kinni, “Dhwöödh kedh, wu opejø yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j dicyɑ̈ngtïn! Mɑ́ men bene cyɑ̈ng-ɑ cïb Siserɑ̀ cingí yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j.” Abëën Bɑrɑk piny kì wïj Kïti Tɑbör kí jøge, mø kwɑnni gen bɑ ɑ́lïp pyɑ̈rø.
Keny-ɑ ɑ́pɑ̈ɑ̈r Bɑrɑk kömi Siserɑ̀ kí yɑ̈the, kí jølinye bënn, ɑmuum wɑ̈thi gen yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j. Apɑ̈ɑ̈r Siserɑ̀ piny kì yij yɑ̈ye, kɑ órengø ki tyelle.
Acyeddi Siserɑ̀ kí jøge kí yɑ̈the yi Bɑrɑk gïti Kɑröceth Pödhh-ɑ kyeelø. Anɑ̈ɑ̈g jøliny Siserɑ̀ bënn, bong dhɑnhø ɑ́kyel mɑ ɑ́döng.
Kɑ Siserɑ̀ reng-ɑ kun-ɑ di kemɑ̀ mi Yɑil, cï Keber Kwɑɑr Ken, mɑ́ Yɑbïn rɑ̈ɑ̈dh Kɑnɑɑn, ɑ ɑ́jyɑ̈ɑ̈g kì Kɑdhör, kɑɑm gen ɑ́dɑ mër ki gøl Keber.
Abëën Yɑil wɑ̈g kì yij kemɑ̀, kɑ Siserɑ̀ köbbe kinni, “Bïí jɑldwøng, bïí yij kemɑ̀ miɑ, yï ko böggi.” Codhe, ɑkedhe yij kemɑ̀, kɑ kum ki ógødh dhø kemɑ̀ yi ngɑnɑni.
Aköbbe ngɑnɑni kinni, “Døj, nëngí yɑn ki pïg mɑdhɑ, riɑ dɑ röödhø.” Ayiebe dhøg ɑtheeb cɑg, ɑnënge gøn kɑ omɑ̈dhø, ɑdøøgii ki kumø yi ngɑnɑni.
Aköbbi ngɑnɑni yi en kinni, “Cungí kì dhø kemɑ̀, kɑ keløg e dɑ dhɑnhø men-ɑ óbï, kɑ ópëjjø kinni, ‘Dɑ dhɑnhø me nud kì yij kemɑ̀?’ Kɑ kyëddí kinni bong dhɑnhø.”

Siserɑ̀ ɑ́jwɑn nenø, mɑ́ e pïdø ki mendwøng. Kɑ Yɑil cï Keber ókɑ̈bbø ki piji kemɑ̀, kɑ pyëdh cïbe cinge, kɑ kedh-ɑ köme mɑ̈ɑ̈dh, ɑgure pijø thɑ̈nge, kɑ twïy-ɑ wɑ̈g kì thɑ̈nge tung-ɑ kyeelø, kɑ othøø.

Keny-ɑ ɑ́bëën Bɑrɑk e yɑb-ɑ Siserɑ̀, ɑkedhi Yɑil wɑ̈g be mɑ̈dhii, kɑ okööbø kinni, “Bïí o yï nyudhɑ jɑl-ɑ yɑb yi yïn.” Akedhi gen yij kemɑ̀, ɑlidhe Siserɑ̀ e buud-ɑ piny e thøø, kí piji kemɑ̀ e twïy wɑ̈g kì thɑ̈nge.
Isrɑil ɑ́thödhi yi Jwøk dicyɑ̈ngɑni ki tegø men-ɑ ɑ́tyɑme Yɑbïn rɑ̈ɑ̈dh Kɑnɑɑn.
Tyëng Isrɑil ɑ́kedh ge ótëngø ki mendwøng, kɑ̀ nyïɑ̈ggi gen, gïti kɑ ɑ́tyɑm gen Yɑbïn, kɑ gø nɑ̈g gen.
Debörɑ̀ geki Bɑrɑk wɑ̈d Abinoɑm ɑ́wör ki wörø men kì cyɑ̈ngɑni kinni:
Lenhu Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j!
Liny ɑ́pej yi pëjji Isrɑil,
ji ri gen ɑ́muuj gen keti gen ki medi pëëth,
Lïng wun, wun ɑ rɑ̈nhì!
Kyën wun yïthhi wun, wun ɑ jɑgg.
Yɑ ówör kì bøli Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, yɑ othumø ki thøm,
yɑ otugø kì bøli Jwøøg Isrɑil, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j.
Keny-ɑ ɑ́dhwöödh, yïn ɑ Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kì kïtti Seir,
kɑ yï ókedhø kì piny Edöm,
piny ɑ́nhɑ̈nhi kɑ kødh ódëëmø,
ngee, pï ɑ́ceg ì bɑɑw kì piny ge kɑ̈ɑ̈l-ɑ yethi pøøl.
ge ɑ́nhɑ̈nhi kì bøli Jwøøg Isrɑil, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j.
Kì yethi cyɑ̈nggi Cɑmgɑr wɑ̈d Anɑth,
kí yethi cyɑ̈nggi Yɑil,
yëëth ɑ́wiy ki cɑɑdhø,
wëll ɑ́kɑ̈ll-ɑ pɑ̈l.
Myërri Isrɑil ɑ́wiy,
ge ɑ́bëëd ge lïïwø
gïti kɑ ɑ́dhwödhɑ yɑ Debörɑ̀, yɑn ɑ́ meyi Isrɑil.
Keny-ɑ ɑ́kɑ̈bbi gen ki jwögg mø nyɑ̈n,
liny nuti wɑ̈nhi dhøggi kɑ̈ddi gen?
Ádɑ kwöd wɑlɑ̀ tøng mɑ ɑ́lidh kì yï jø Isrɑil,
ki kwɑnni gen gɑ ɑ́lïp pyɑ̈r ɑ́ngwen?
Pyëwɑ ying-ɑ kömi pëjji Isrɑil
møg-ɑ ɑ́muuj ri gen kì kelli ji.
Lenhu Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j!
Lïng wun, wun ɑ tyëng-ɑ cyɑ̈dhi kì kömi ɑderr-ɑ kïddi gen tɑr,
wun ɑ bëëdø kì kömi ódïïb,
kí wun ɑ cyɑ̈dhi tyelli wun!
Lïngu cwɑggi tyëng-ɑ wör kì kömi yïïthi pï,
ge wör-ɑ wörri tyɑ̈mø men-ɑ ɑ́muuj yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j.
Tyɑ̈m-ɑ ɑ́tyɑ̈ɑ̈m jølinye!
Akedhi jii Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j wɑ̈g kì yethi kɑ̈ddi gen.
Pyëjjí, Pyëjjí, Debörɑ̀,
Pyëjjí! Gönyí ki wörø!
Pödhí bølí Bɑrɑk wɑ̈d Abinoɑm,
køøl ɑmɑggí.
Kɑ ji-ɑ ɑ́mïdhi dhøggi gen, bï-ɑ yï jɑggi gen;
jii Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j ɑ́bï yïe ri gen gwiir gen kipe liny,
Ge ɑ́bï kì Eprɑim ge kedh-ɑ yij tör,
ge kedh-ɑ bɑng gøl Ben Yɑmïn geki jie.
Pëjji liny ɑ́bï ge kɑ̈ɑ̈l-ɑ Mɑkir,
gøl Dhebulun ɑ pyejji liny.
Pëjji Isɑkɑr ɑ́bï geki Debörɑ̀,
Isɑkɑr ɑ́bï kɑ Bɑrɑk obëënø thyew,
ge ɑ́pödhi bɑnge kì yij tör.
De tyëng gøl Ruben ri gen pɑ̈ngi gen,
rummi gen ɑ́dhɑ̈li rëbø kipe kedhi be liny.
Gede ɑ döngi gen cyɑ̈n kí dyëg?
Kipe kinni o ge lïngi gen cwɑggi jøkwɑ̈yø møg-ɑ kwølli dyëg?
Ngee, tyëng gøl Ruben ɑ́bëëd ri gen pɑ̈ngi gen,
rummi gen ɑ́dhɑ̈li rëbø kipe kedhi be liny.
Tyëng gøl Gɑd ɑ́döng ge obëëdø kì løøg Nɑm Urdun kì wɑɑng cyɑ̈ɑ̈ng mwøl,
Adöng tyëng gøl Dɑn kì buti sɑpïnnì.
Tyëng gøl Aceer ɑ́cöög gɑ̈d,
ge ɑ́cög ge bëëd ɑ thɑ̈ngi nɑm.
De gøl Dhebulun geki gøl Nɑptɑlì,
ge ɑ́böyi ki kedhi be liny.
Rɑ̈nhì ɑ́bï kɑ ge ónyïɑ̈ggø kì Tɑɑnɑk,
kì kömi Nɑm Megidø,
Rɑ̈nhi Kɑnɑɑn ɑ́nyïɑ̈ggi,
de bong ngyënyø ɑ́tegø mɑ ɑ́kɑ̈l yi gen.
Kyell ɑ́nyïɑ̈ggi kì mɑl,
keny-ɑ ɑ́kedh gen ge bɑ̈ɑ̈n-ɑ mɑl
ge ɑ́nyïɑ̈ggi ki Siserɑ̀.
Ge ɑ́wøøj Nɑm Kicön yi bɑɑyø,
eni Kicön nɑm-ɑ göjji bøle
Yɑ ópödhi bølɑ ki tegø!
Kɑ kyënyì bï-ɑ köme ge óbeddø,
e piny omɑ̈rrø yi gen.
Wëywöni Wë okööbø kinni,
“Gøøj cyën kömi tyëng-ɑ bëëdø kì Merödh!
Mɑ́ ge nuti bëën be kønyi Wë
ki nyɑɑg ki tyëngmɑ̈ɑ̈nø møg-ɑ teg.”
Ngɑn-ɑ ree di gyëdh mø døngø kì kelli tyëng-ɑ mɑ̈nn,
bɑ Yɑil cï Keber jɑl Ken,
en ɑ gyëdhhe døngø kibøli gyëdhhi tyëng-ɑ mɑ̈nn
møg-ɑ bëëdø kì yethi kemmì.
Siserɑ̀ ɑ́cwøl-ɑ pï, de ɑ́mëgge’ cɑg;
ɑ́mëgge cɑg ɑdïng kì yij lwøøl jɑgg.
Piji kemɑ̀ ɑ́kwɑnye ki cingi cɑɑme,
o pyëdh ying-ɑ cingi kyëje.
Pijø ɑ́gure thɑ̈ngi Siserɑ̀, kɑ wïje ópyëdø,
pijø ɑ́gure kɑ twïy-ɑ wɑ̈g kì thɑ̈nge tung-ɑ kyeelø.
Ápɑ̈ɑ̈dh cønge këële’ piny,
ɑ́pɑ̈dhi dhø tyelli Yɑil;
Cønge ɑ́rume piny kì bøle kɑ ópɑ̈ɑ̈dhø;
ɑ́pɑ̈ɑ̈dh e kegø, kɑ cöög-ɑ kenyɑni.
Meyi Siserɑ̀ nenn-ɑ wɑ̈g kì ɑwɑj;
ɑ́mëddi kì ngɑ̈ɑ̈j wini ɑwɑj, ɑryeere kinni,
“Ede yɑ̈ye ɑ cöge e pɑ jwɑn wɑ̈nhø?
Gede kyënye ɑ dhɑ̈li gen ki dwöögø?”
Alöggi nyɑn-ɑ wïje pel kì kelli bɑ̈ngge,
kɑ löggɑni nyi cigi jølø yi meyi Siserɑ̀ e köbb-ɑ ree kinni,
“Ge nudd ge ócunggø ki jɑmmì møg pɑ̈ngi,
nyɑnɑjur ɑ́kyel wɑlɑ̀ ɑ́ryew ɑ mëggi jɑl-liny ɑ́kyel,
o ógudhi kïdd-ɑ myër ɑ mëggi Siserɑ̀,
ógudhi kïddì møg-ɑ ókwenø kì wɑ̈thi tùngi gen bɑ møgɑ.”
Yïn ɑ Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, wiy tyëngmɑ̈ɑ̈nø bënn thøw gen kinøw,
de wiy tyëng-ɑ mɑɑr yïn mëëny gen ni cɑ̈ng me ceg tuulø!
Abëëd pödhø ki mër ki runn pyɑ̈r ɑ́ngwen.
Kɑ tyëng Isrɑil cig-ɑ gwøg ki gïnrɑj kì bøli Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, ɑcïb gen cinggi tyëng Midyɑn yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, kɑ ge jɑɑg yi gen ki runn ɑ́bïryew.
Tyëng Midyɑn ɑ́bëëd ge teg kibøli tyëng Isrɑil, ɑdøøg tyëng Isrɑil be pɑ̈nnø yi gen kì yethi órøggi kïttì, kí kɑ̈jj-ɑ bɑ gødd.
Kenyi rum tyëng Isrɑil ki kɑ̈g ki byelli gen, tyëng Midyɑn, kí tyëng Amɑlek, kí jurr-ɑ wɑɑng cyɑ̈ɑ̈ng mwøl nyii bëënø kɑ ge pɑ̈ɑ̈r-ɑ köme.
Ge nyii guddø ki kɑɑl kì Isrɑil, kɑ jɑmmì nyi kwɑny yi gen gïti buti Gɑdhɑ̀ kì wɑɑng wurlwɑl. Byel nyii kɑ̈ɑ̈lø yi gen, kí jɑmmì bënn, dyëg kí dhög, kí ɑderr, tyëng Isrɑil nyi wiy yi gen kɑ kɑ̈j.
Ge nyii bëënø kí dhögi gen, kí kemmi gen, ge nɑ bɑ̈nyø. Gen kí ɑmɑlli gen, ge pɑ cuggi kwɑnø. Ge nyii bëënø kɑ pödhø ryɑ̈g yi gen.
Kɑ tyëng Isrɑil nyingi gen guud yi tyëng Midyɑn, ɑywøøg gen kö Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j.
Keny-ɑ ɑ́ywøøg tyëng Isrɑil kö Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, kinni o gï yiele kì cinggi tyëng Midyɑn,
ge ɑ́ödi yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, Jwøøg Isrɑil, ki jɑltöng men köbbi gen kinni, “Yɑn ɑ ɑ́kɑ̈ɑ̈l wun wɑ̈g kì Rïp, kì yij bɑ̈ɑ̈ngø.
Wu ɑ́yielɑ kì cinggi tyëng Rïp, kí cinggi ji-ɑ ɑ́nyïɑ̈ggi ki wun bënn. Tyëngɑni ɑ́cyeddɑ kì bøli wun, kɑ piny gen mëggɑ wun.
Wu ɑ́köbbɑ kinni, ‘Yɑ bɑ Jwøøg wun, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, jwöggi tyëng Amör, ɑ piny gen bëëd yi wun ko mɑlli wun.’ De kwøbbɑ nuti lïngi wun.”

Abëën wëywöni Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, kɑ pëgg-ɑ thɑ óthurø kì Óprɑ̀, yɑnhɑni bɑ mi Yöɑc kì gøl Abiedher. Gideon, wɑ̈de ɑ́bëëd e opödø ki gemè kì bur men-ɑ yije nyi bïïj ki møgi oløg, e kɑnn-ɑ ree kipe ólidh yi tyëng Midyɑn.
Acwöb wëywöni Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kì bøli Gideon, kɑ gø köbbe kinni, “Yï ómïdhi yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, nyelteg!”

Alöggi Gideon kinni, “Keløg Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j nudd wø mïdhe’ mïdhø, ede gïg ni møg bënn ɑ cwöb gen kiper wøn, wuö? Gïïngɑ̈ngø bënn møg-ɑ ɑ́gögge kweyyi wøn, kɑ wø wɑ̈jji yi gen, gïgɑni ying-ɑ keny? Bɑ Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j ɑ ɑ́kɑ̈ɑ̈l kweyyi wøn wɑ̈g kì Rïp kidyër? De ɑnɑn Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j wø ɑ́wiye cinggi tyëng Midyɑn.”
Codhe, ɑköbbii yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kinni, “Kedh ki tegí bëne, kɑ tyëng Isrɑil yieel kì cinggi tyëng Midyɑn. Bɑ yɑn kiriɑ ɑ ör yïn.”
Apyëjii yi Gideon kinni, “Isrɑil óyiel yi yɑn kidï, wuö? Gøl wøn bene gøl-ɑ pëddi nyøødhø kì kelli kɑ̈lli gøl Mɑnɑsè kì Isrɑil, o bɑ yɑn ɑ thinh kì gøl wøn.”
Alöggi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kinni, “Yï ókøny yi yɑn, kɑ tyëng Midyɑn tyɑm yi yïn, ge nɑ dhɑnhø ɑ́kyel yøw.”
Kɑ møge løøg yi Gideon kinni, “Keløg pyëwí med ki yɑn, nëngí yɑn ki ngïji me nyodh kinni yï bɑ Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j.”
Akööbe kinni, “Døj, bëëd yï ko kedh gïti keny-ɑ ódwöögɑ yɑ ókɑ̈ddø ki gëëdhi.”
Kɑ wëywönɑni okööbø kinni, “Yɑ óbëëdø gïti keny-ɑ ódwöög.”

Akedhi Gideon gøle, kɑ otɑ̈dø ki nyɑ ónywøg, kɑ kïllì pyɑ̈rø mø møng-ɑ búr gemè nyöme, kɑ gø bule ɑ́ ópùni olwëny, ɑkïdhe rïngø yij ɑ́ridh kɑ cwɑyø kïdhe yij dɑg, kɑ gï muuje wëywöni Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kì thɑ óthurø, kɑ gï mëgge gøn.
Aköbbii yi wëywödø kinni, “Cïb rïngø geki ópun kömi kït men, kɑ cwɑyø køny kömi gen.” Agwøøg møgɑni ceth yi Gideon.
Kɑ wëywödø, rïngø geki ópun nywɑle ki leeb lonh-ɑ kɑ̈lle kì cinge. Alyel mɑc kì ri kït, kɑ rïngø geki ópun rɑ̈be. Kɑ wëywödø ólɑ̈ɑ̈nyø kì bøle.
Keny-ɑ ɑ́ngijii yi Gideon kinni bɑ wëywöni Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, ɑbwøge kɑ ogɑ̈ɑ̈yø kinni, “Möy! Wuö Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j! Wëywöní ɑ́lidhɑ, kɑ nyingi wøn kyëël wøn ki en!”
De ɑ́köbbi yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kinni, “Bëëd ki mër, yï ko böggi, yï pɑ thøw!”
Codhe, ɑgëddi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j ki këli lɑm yi Gideon, kɑ kenyɑni cɑge ɑ́, “Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j bɑ mër.” (Këlɑni nudd e ócungø kì Óprɑ̀ pɑɑ gøl Abiedher gïti dicyɑ̈ngtïn).

Kì wɑ̈rɑni, ɑköbbi Gideon yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kinni, “Kwɑny wɑɑdh wïyí geki wɑdh megø, me runne bɑ ɑ́bïryew, kɑ këli lɑm mi Bɑɑl, men-ɑ bɑ mi wïyí cøør piny, kɑ ngïjji jwøng-ɑ dhɑjø, Aceerɑ̀ men-ɑ bute toor piny.
Kɑ Jwøgí, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j gëddí ki këli lɑm me myëër kì kömi lɑ̈mɑni. Kɑ wɑnh-ɑ pɑth ki mi wïyí kwɑɑny, kɑ rɑ̈ɑ̈b bëne ɑ́ gëëdhi, gwøg ngïji Aceerɑ̀ men-ɑ ɑ́tor yi yïn ɑ́ yugg.”

Codhe, ɑkɑ̈bbi Gideon ki ji pyɑ̈rø kì kelli bɑ̈ngge, ɑgwøge møg-ɑ ɑ́köbbii yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j. Møg-ɑ ɑ́kwøb yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j ɑ́gwøg yi en kì wɑ̈r, mɑ́ e ɑ́bëëd e óböggø yi tyëng gøl gen, kí tyëng kɑɑl.
Kì mwøl dhuki, keny-ɑ ɑ́dhwödh tyëng kɑɑl, ɑyuud gen këli lɑm mi Bɑɑl geki ngïji Aceerɑ̀ men-ɑ bute ge ótoor piny, o wɑnh-ɑ pɑth ki mi wïye órɑ̈bø ɑ́ gëëdhi kì kömi këli lɑm men-ɑ ɑ́ger.
Kɑ ji ri gen pyënyi gen kinni, “Á men ɑ ɑ́gwøg gïn ni men?” Apëëj gen, kɑ yod yi gen kinni bɑ Gideon wɑ̈d Yöɑc ɑ göögø kinøw.
Aköbbi Yöɑc yi gen kinni, “Kɑ̈ɑ̈l wɑ̈dí wɑ̈g keny, o nɑ̈g yi wøn! Këli lɑm mi Bɑɑl ɑ́cøøre piny, kɑ ngïji Aceerɑ̀ men-ɑ bute toore piny.”

Aköbbi ji bënn møg-ɑ ɑ́dhwödh ki liny kipere, yi Yöɑc kinni, “Wu nyïɑ̈ggi kɑ per Bɑɑl? Wu cwɑg-ɑ en? Ngɑn-ɑ ónyïɑ̈ggi kipere ónɑ̈g kì mwøl dhuki! Keløg Bɑɑl bɑ jwøg, wiy nyɑɑge linye, mɑ́ e bɑ këli lɑme ɑ ɑ́cøøre piny.”
Acɑɑg Gideon yi gen dicyɑ̈ngɑni ɑ́ Yerubɑɑl, mɑ́ Yöɑc ɑ́kööb kinni, “Wiy Bɑɑl nyïɑ̈gge ki Gideon, mɑ́ en ɑ ɑ́cøør kële piny.”
Arëbi tyëng Midyɑn, kí tyëng Amɑlek, kí jurr-ɑ wɑɑng cyɑ̈ɑ̈ng mwøl, kɑ ge kɑdh-ɑ løøg Nɑm Urdun, kɑ ri gen cøng gen kì Töör Yidhriil.
Abëën wëyi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j ri Gideon, kɑ kɑng kodhe e cwøl-ɑ tyëng gøl Abiedher, kinni bï gen bɑnge.
Aöde myërri kɑ̈lli Mɑnɑsè ryeet ki tyëngwöödø e cwøl-ɑ gïn kinni bï gen bɑnge. Kɑ öd-ɑ yï gøl Aceer, kí gøl Dhebulun, kí gøl Nɑptɑlì. Abëën gen kɑ ge órëbø ki gøn.
Codhe, ɑköbbi Jwøk yi Gideon kinni, “Yï okööbø kinni ce yɑ ógwøøg ngɑn yiel Isrɑil,
døj, yɑn ɑ cïb yëyy piny yij rɑri gemè èn; keløg thöjj óying mø nud kì ri yëyy, de piny óbëëd e thwøwø, bene en ɑ óyodɑ en kinni Isrɑil óyiel yi yïn kì riɑ.”
Acwöb gen ceth. Kì mwøl dhuki, ɑbiij yëyy yi Gideon, kɑ lwøl opɑ̈ngø yi pïg-ɑ ɑ́bïïje wɑ̈g kì ri yëyy.
Aköbbi Jwøk yi Gideon kinni, “Yï ko mɑg yi liny ki yɑn. Wiy yɑ cigɑ kwøb kinni, wiy yëyy keti gen bëëd ge thwøwø, kɑ wiy piny bëne bëëde e thij yi thöjj.”
Agwøøg møgɑni ceth yi Jwøk kì wɑ̈rɑni. Dhuki kì mwøl, yëyy thwøwø, dɑ́ piny kete ɑ thij yi thöjj.
Kɑ Yerubɑɑl, ɑ løg Gideon ókedhø kì mwøl geki jøge bënn, kɑ ge pëgg-ɑ kömi wɑɑng pïi Kɑröd. O tyëng Midyɑn ying-ɑ wɑɑng wuudø kì thɑ Kïti Morè kì yij tör.
Aköbbi Gideon yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kinni, “Jií gïïr kì yïɑ kipe tyɑmi tyëng Midyɑn. O Isrɑil cöge e pɑ thwøg kinni ɑ́yiel-ɑ yi tege kete.
Anɑn köbbí ji kinni, ‘Ke di dhɑnhø me yije kïïr yi wɑ̈ɑ̈rø, døøge pɑc, de wø óbëëdø kì Kïti Gilyɑd keny.’ ” Codhe, ɑdøg ji ɑ́lïp pyɑ̈r ɑ́ryew wïdɑ́ryew, kɑ ji ɑ́lïp pyɑ̈rø odöngø kí en.
De Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j Gideon ɑ́köbbe kinni, “Ji nudd ge gïïr, kïdhí gen nɑm, ge óyieny yi yɑn, yï óköbbi yi yɑn kinni, dhɑnhø men kedhe, kɑ men ko kedh. Kɑ ngɑn-ɑ ókyer yi yɑn ko kedh.”
Codhe, ɑkïdhe gïn nɑm. Kɑ köbbi yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kinni, “Dɑ̈ɑ̈ng ji møg-ɑ gɑ̈dø ki lebbi gen ni gwögg, ki ji møg-ɑ órum cøngi gen piny kɑ̀ mɑ̈dhi gen.”
Amɑ̈dhi ji miy ɑ́dɑ̈g ki pï ge tömm-ɑ dhøggi gen ki cinggi gen. Kɑ møg-ɑ kyeelø ómɑ̈dhø ki dhøggi gen, ge ying-ɑ wɑ̈thi cøngi gen.
Aköbbi Gideon yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kinni, “Wu óyiel yi yɑn kì cinggi tyëng Midyɑn kɑ ji miy ɑ́dɑ̈g møg-ɑ ɑ́mɑ̈dhi ki cingi gen, kɑ wiy ji møgɑk bënn døøg gen pɑc.”
Codhe, ɑör tyëng Isrɑil møg-ɑ kyeelø bënn pɑc yi Gideon. Adöng ji miy ɑ́dɑ̈g keti gen, ɑ løg tyëng-ɑ ɑ́mïdhi jɑmmi liny kí kɑ̈ngì kì cinggi gen. Kì bøli kenyɑni kɑɑl tyëng Midyɑn ɑ́ying-ɑ yij tör.
Aköbbi Gideon yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kì wɑ̈rɑni kinni, “Dhwöödh, kedhí be pɑ̈ɑ̈r kömi kɑɑlɑni, mɑ́ e ɑ́cïbɑ cinggi wun.
De keløg yï óböggø, kedhí kɑɑlɑni møti wuki Purɑ̀ bɑ̈ngí.
Yï ólïngø ki møg-ɑ ókømmi yi gen, kɑ pyëwí ótëngø, kɑ yï kedh-ɑ be nyɑɑg ki gen.” Codhe, ɑkedh Gideon geki bɑ̈nge Purɑ̀ tøg kɑɑl tyëngmɑ̈ɑ̈nø.
Tyëng Midyɑn, kí tyëng Amɑlek, kí jurr-ɑ wɑɑng cyɑ̈ɑ̈ng mwøl bënn pëggi yij tör, ge gïïr nɑ bɑ̈nyø. Amɑlli gen gïïr nɑ ɑyejø kì thɑ̈ngi nɑɑm omelø.
Gideon ɑ́wɑ̈dhi ceth, e jɑl megø köbb-ɑ mɑ̈dhe lɑ̈g mø lɑ̈g en kinni, “Yɑ ɑ́lɑ̈g-ɑ ópuun ceir e ngyëël-ɑ ree kɑɑlee, kɑ pɑ̈dh-ɑ kömi kemɑ̀. Kɑ kemɑni ópɑ̈ɑ̈dhø yije reeny en piny.”
Alöggi mɑ̈dhe kinni, “Bong gïjø megø këti, den-ɑ́ pili Gideon wɑ̈d Yöɑc jɑl Isrɑil. Midyɑn geki yɑye bëne ɑ́cïb cinge yi Jwøk!”

Keny-ɑ ɑ́lïngi lɑ̈ggɑni yi Gideon, kí gïn-ɑ wɑngi yi gen, ɑbøødhe ree piny, kɑ Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j mɑle. Adøøge kɑɑl Isrɑil, kɑ jøge köbbe kinni, “Dhwödhu mɑl! Tyëng Midyɑn ɑ́cïb cingge yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j!”
Apɑ̈nge jøge, kwɑnni gen bɑ miy ɑ́dɑ̈g gɑ ɑkudd ɑ́dɑ̈g, ɑcïbe cinggi gen bënn ki kɑ̈ngì, kí puggì mø yethi gen di redhhi mɑc.
Kɑ gï köbbe kinni, “Nennu yɑn, kɑ gïn-ɑ ógwøg yi yɑn keny-ɑ ówɑ̈dhɑ tøg kɑɑlɑni, gwøg wun.
Keny-ɑ ókodh wøn kɑ̈ngi, wøki jøgɑ, kɑ kɑ̈ngi wun lony wun ki kodhø. Kɑ wu ryeer wun ki ngɑ̈ɑ̈j kɑɑl kinni, ‘Kipe Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j geki Gideon!’ ”
Gideon kí jøge, kwɑnni gen bɑ miyø, ɑ́wɑ̈dhi tøg kɑɑlɑni kì dïwɑ̈r bøli keny-ɑ nyi wiil ji-ɑ kurø. Akodh gen kɑ̈ngì, kɑ puggì nɑ̈g gen.

Alunyi ɑkudd-ɑ kyeelø ryeet ki kodhi kɑ̈ngi gen, kɑ puggi gen nɑ̈g gen. Atïng redhhi mɑc mɑl yi gen bënn ki cinggi cyɑ̈mmi gen, o kɑ̈ngì ying-ɑ cinggi këjji gen, ɑryeer gen kinni, “Pili Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j geki Gideon!”
Acungi jø Gideon kì tøggi kɑɑlɑni, ɑrengi tyëng Midyɑn ge okïïwø.
Keny-ɑ ɑ́koodh kɑ̈ngì yi jø Gideon, ɑgöjji kɑɑlɑni kebbi ree ki pil yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j. Arengi liny kuni Dhɑretɑn, kɑ ge gït-ɑ Bet Cïtɑ̀, kí kɑɑl Abel Mekölɑ̀, ɑ cyɑ̈gi ki Tɑbɑth.
Acwøøl tyëng kɑ̈lli Nɑptɑlì, kí gøl Aceer, kí gøl Mɑnɑsè, ɑcyeddi tyëng Midyɑn yi gen.

Aöd Gideon ki tyëngwöödø e öd-ɑ myërri kïtti Eprɑim kinni, “Bïu be nyɑɑg ki tyëng Midyɑn, mɑgu kömi Nɑm Urdun geki nɑ̈mm-ɑ thønhø gïti Bet Bɑrɑ̀, o tyëng Midyɑn cög gen, ge pɑ kɑdhi løøgø.” Acøng jøgi Eprɑim ri gen kej ɑ́kyel kɑ ge pëgg-ɑ kömi Nɑm Urdun, geki nɑ̈mm-ɑ thønhø gïti Bet Bɑrɑ̀.

Acyeddi tyëng Midyɑn kɑ jɑggi gen ryeet Oreb geki Dhiib, mɑg. Anɑ̈ɑ̈g Oreb kì ri Kïti Oreb. Kɑ Dhiib nɑ̈ɑ̈g keny-ɑ nyi biij oløøg Dhiib. Kɑ wïj Oreb geki wïj Dhiib muuj Gideon yi jøge, e ying-ɑ løøg Nɑm Urdun kì kuni wɑɑng cyɑ̈ɑ̈ng mwøl.
Aköbbi Gideon yi jø gøl Eprɑim kinni, “Yïde ɑ göggí wøn ki gïn ni men? Wøde ɑ bɑɑny wøn ki cwølø yi yïn keny-ɑ ɑ́kedhí be nyɑɑg ki tyëng Midyɑn?” Kɑ ge owërø’ en ki menteg.
De kwøbbi gen ɑ́løøg yi en kinni, “Gïn-ɑ ɑ́gwøg yi yɑn pɑ pɑ̈ɑ̈r ki men-ɑ ɑ́gwøg yi wun. Cɑgg ɑ́ gïjø me gwøøg wun e thiinh wu jø Eprɑim, pɑ pɑ̈ɑ̈r ki men-ɑ gwøg yi gøl Abiedher bëne.
Oreb geki Dhiib jɑggi Midyɑn ryeet ɑ́cïb cinggi wun yi Jwøk. Á gïn ɑ ɑ́gwøg yi yɑn ɑ lod gwøøg wun?” Kì bɑng keny-ɑ ɑ́kwøbe møgɑni, ɑkwööj pëthi gen.
Gideon ɑ́bëëd e pïdø geki jøge kwɑnni gen miy ɑ́dɑ̈g, keny-ɑ ɑ́bɑ̈ɑ̈n gen Nɑm Urdun, de ge ɑ́nudd ge ócyëddø ki liny Midyɑn.
Keny-ɑ ɑ́wɑ̈dhe Suköth, ɑköbbe jø kɑɑlɑni kinni, “Thödhu jøgɑ ki gïncɑm. Ge ɑ́dhɑ̈ɑ̈r, o yɑ nudd yɑ cyedd-ɑ rɑ̈nhi Midyɑn; Dhebɑ̀ geki Dhɑlmunɑ̀.”
De ɑ́köbbi yi pëjji Suköth kinni, “Wøde ɑ thödhi wøn jøgí ki gïncɑm, o Dhebɑ̀ nuti mɑɑg yïn geki Dhɑlmunɑ̀?”
Aköbbi gen yi Gideon kinni, “Døj! Keny-ɑ ócïb Dhebɑ̀ geki Dhɑlmunɑ̀ cingɑ yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, wu ópwöd yi yɑn ki koodh kí otwelø.”
Kɑ kedh-ɑ Penuel, ɑcige cwöd ki gïncɑm, de jø Penuel ɑ́kwøb-ɑ møg-ɑ ɑ́köbbii yi jø Suköth.
Codhe, ɑköbbe gïn kinni, “Keny-ɑ ódwöögɑ ki tɑrø, ønbɑ̈r men-ɑ nyi koor kɑɑl wun ódhurɑ piny.”
Kì bøli kenyɑni Dhebɑ̀ geki Dhɑlmunɑ̀ ge ɑ́ying-ɑ Kɑrkör geki jøliny gen mø kwɑnni gen bɑ ɑ́lïp pyɑ̈rø wïdɑ́bïj. Jøg-ɑ ɑ́nɑ̈g, kwɑnni gen bɑ ɑ́lïp miyø kí pyɑ̈r ɑ́ryew.
Akedhi Gideon yï Dhebɑ̀ geki Dhɑlmunɑ̀, e kɑ̈ll-ɑ tøg ryɑng, kì kuni wɑɑng cyɑ̈ɑ̈ng mwøl kì Nöbɑ̀ geki Yogbeɑ̀, ɑpɑ̈ɑ̈ye gïn piny.
Arengi Dhebɑ̀ geki Dhɑlmunɑ̀, rɑ̈nhi Midyɑn ryeet, de ɑ́rengi bɑng gen kɑ gï mɑge, kɑ liny gen kedhhe.
Gideon wɑ̈d Yöɑc ɑ́dwöög kì be nyɑɑg e bï e kɑ̈ll-ɑ yuu Ëres.
Kɑ ómɑ̈gø ki nyelthinh me kɑ̈ɑ̈l Suköth, kɑ gø pyënye, kɑ nyingi pëjjì geki jøgdøngi Suköth gwëdii yi nyelɑni, kwɑnni gen bɑ pyɑ̈r ɑ́bïryew wïdɑ́bïryew.
Kɑ Gideon obëënø, ɑköbbe jø Suköth kinni, “Dhebɑ̀ geki Dhɑlmunɑ̀ ɑ keny èn, tyëng-ɑ́ per gen ɑ́yɑnyu yɑn wu okööbø kinni, ‘Wøde ɑ thödhi wøn jøgí ki gïncɑm, e Dhebɑ̀ geki Dhɑlmunɑ̀ nuti mɑɑg yïn?’ ”
Amɑɑg jøgdøngi Suköth yi Gideon, kɑ gï pwöde ki koodh kí otwelø.
Adhure ønbɑ̈r men-ɑ koor Penuel piny, kɑ jø kɑɑlɑni nɑ̈ge.
Kɑ Dhebɑ̀ geki Dhɑlmunɑ̀ pyëj yi en kinni, “Á jøg mø bëëdø kidï ɑ ɑ́nɑ̈g yi wun kì Tɑbör?”
Alöggi gen kinni, “Jøg mø pɑ̈r ki yïn, ge nɑ nyiirɑ̈dhh.”
Alöggi Gideon kinni, “Jøgɑni bɑ nyiimïɑ, meyi wøn ɑ́kyel. Yɑn ɑ köngi èn ki nyingi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, Jwøng-ɑ Nëënø kinni, keløg ge pɑ di nɑ̈g yi wun, wu pɑ di nɑ̈g yi yɑn.”
Aluge ree Yether, wɑ̈de nyel-ɑ kɑyø, ɑköbbe gøn kinni, “Kedh, nɑ̈g gen!” De Yether pile nuti wöödh en wɑ̈g kì yij bøj, mɑ́ e ɑ́bëëd e óböggø yi kɑ̀ nudd e thiinh.
Aköbbii yi Dhebɑ̀ geki Dhɑlmunɑ̀ kinni, “Bïí nɑ̈g wøn, yïn kirií, lɑ̈w nɑ̈gi wøn yi nyelteg ni wøn.” Codhe, ɑnɑ̈ɑ̈g gen yi Gideon, kɑ gïg-ɑ ódhyɑɑw muddi ɑmɑlli gen gï kwɑnye.
Aköbbi Gideon yi tyëng Isrɑil kinni, “Jɑɑg wøn, yïn kí wɑ̈dí kí kwɑrí, mɑ́ wø ɑ́yiel yi yïn kì cinggi tyëng Midyɑn.”
De ge ɑ́köbbi yi Gideon kinni, “Wu pɑ jɑɑg yi yɑn, wɑlɑ̀ wu pɑ jɑɑg yi wɑ̈dɑ. Wu jɑɑg-ɑ yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j.”

Aköbbe gïn kinni, “Dɑ gïjø ɑ́kyel me dwɑddɑ kì yï dhɑnhø bëne kì kelli wun kinni mëggu yɑn dhɑbbi yïthh møg-ɑ ɑ́kɑ̈ɑ̈l yi wun.” (Ábëëd ɑ́ kwöng kì yï tyëng kuni wɑɑng cyɑ̈ɑ̈ng mwøl eni rug ki dhɑbbi yïthh).
Alöggi gen kinni, “Pëthi wøn omedø ki mëggi gen yïn.” Codhe, ɑpëdhi gen piny ki ógødh, kɑ dhɑbbi yïthh møg-ɑ ɑ́kɑ̈ɑ̈l yi gen, leeng gen yij ógønhɑni.

Agöög dhɑbbi yïthh møg-ɑ ɑ́yod yi Gideon ki gïn ni kïllì pyɑ̈r ɑ́ryew, o jɑmm-ɑ kyeelø; ɑ́cwecwelli yedh, kí yëll ɑ́tegg, kí ógudh-ɑ nyi rug yi rɑ̈nhi Midyɑn, kí jɑmm-ɑ nyi dhyɑɑw muddi ɑmɑl, ge nuti kwɑnø.

Agöög dhɑmɑni ki ngïji yi Gideon, kɑ gø cïbe Óprɑ̀ kɑɑl gen. Awiy Jwøk yi tyëng Isrɑil bënn, kɑ ge døøg-ɑ be mɑlli ngïji menɑni kì kunɑni, kɑ ngïji menɑni ogöögø ki ɑ́kɑ̈lli kì cwɑggi Gideon kí gøl gen.
Tyëng Midyɑn ɑ́tyɑm yi Isrɑil, ɑcög gen wɑ̈thi gen nuti tïng gen këti. Abëëd pödhø ki mër ki runn pyɑ̈r ɑ́ngwen gïti kɑ ɑ́thøw Gideon.
Gideon wɑ̈d Yöɑc ɑ́døøg pɑɑ gen be bëëdø.
Gideon wɑ̈dde ɑ́bëëd gɑ pyɑ̈r ɑ́bïryew, mɑ́ mɑ̈nne ɑ́bëëd ge gïïr.
Ányöddi thyew ki wɑ̈d yi nyɑn-ɑ ɑ́kwɑnye kì Cekïm, ɑcɑge gøn ɑ́ Abimelek.
Gideon wɑ̈d Yöɑc ɑ́thøw e yöø ki mendwøng, kɑ koony buti wïye Yöɑc kì Óprɑ̀, kɑɑl gøl Abiedher.
Keny-ɑ ɑ́rum Gideon ki thøø, ɑwiy Jwøk yi tyëng Isrɑil, kɑ ge døøg-ɑ be mɑlli Bɑɑl. Agwøg gen Bɑɑl Berit ɑ́ jwøøg gen.
Kɑ Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j Jwøøg gen, ɑ ɑ́yiel gen kì cinggi tyëngmɑ̈ɑ̈nø møg-ɑ ɑ́ying bɑdhhi gen, owïlø kì wɑ̈thi gen.
Bong gïndøj mɑ ɑ́göggi gøl Gideon yi tyëng Isrɑil, kipe gïgdøj bënn møg-ɑ ɑ́gwøge kiper gen.
Abimelek wɑ̈d Yerubɑɑl ɑ́kedhi yï nɑ̈yye kì kɑɑl Cekïm, ɑköbbe gïn bënn kinni,
i pyëj gen tyëng Cekïm bënn kinni, “Á men ɑ́ lɑ̈w ki jɑɑgi wun, wɑ̈ddi Yerubɑɑl gɑ pyɑ̈r ɑ́bïryew, wɑlɑ̀ lɑ̈w jɑɑgi wun yi dhɑnhø ɑ́kyel kì kelli gen? Rum wun kinni yɑ bɑ wɑɑd wun, wɑɑd nyöödø.”
Aköbbi tyëng Cekïm bënn kipere yi nɑ̈yye, ɑkedhi pëthi gen kömi Abimelek, mɑ́ e bɑ ókɑ̈ɑ̈y gen.
Anëngii yi gen ki ngyëny ɑ́tegg pyɑ̈r ɑ́bïryew kì kengi Bɑɑl Berit, kɑ ngyëny ɑ́teggɑni ngëëwe ki jøg mø bong per gen, jøgöj. Akedhi gen bɑnge.
Kɑ kedh-ɑ gøl wïye kì Óprɑ̀, ɑnɑ̈ge nyiiwɑ̈n pyɑ̈r ɑ́bïryew, wɑ̈ddi Yerubɑɑl kì kömi kït ɑ́kyel. Kɑ bødh ɑ́ Yöthɑm wɑ̈d Yerubɑɑl nyel-ɑ thinh kete, mɑ́ e ɑ́pɑ̈ni.
Kɑ tyëng Cekïm órëbø kí tyëng Bet Milö bënn, kɑ ge kedh-ɑ thɑ óthuri kwër kì Cekïm, ɑrøny gen Abimelek ɑ́ rɑ̈dh.
Keny-ɑ ɑ́köbbi Yöthɑm møgɑni, ɑyedhe oledh Kïti Geridhïm ɑryeere kinni, “Lïngu møgɑ, wun ɑ tyëng Cekïm, o mø wun ólony ki lïngø yi Jwøk thyew!
Cyɑ̈ng ɑ́kyel yenh ɑ́cugi kipe rönyi ri gen ki rɑ̈dh me jɑɑg gen. Aköbbi gen dhetun kinni, ‘Bëëd yï bɑ rɑ̈ɑ̈dh wøn.’
Alöggi dhetun kinni, ‘Keløg yɑ orønyø yi wun, yɑ ceg-ɑ wïyø ki gwøg ki møwɑ; eni møw-ɑ nyi kwëër jwögg geki ji.’
Aköbbi ólɑm yi yenh kinni, ‘Bïí göög ki rɑ̈ɑ̈dh wøn.’
De ólɑm ɑ́löggi kinni, ‘Keløg wu ójɑɑg yi yɑn, yɑ ceg-ɑ wïyø ki nywølø ki nyigɑ nyig-ɑ med.’
Codhe, ɑköbbi oløg yi yenh kinni, ‘Bïí o yï bëëd yïn ɑ́ rɑ̈ɑ̈dh wøn.’
De oløg ɑ́löggi kinni, ‘Keløg wu ójɑɑg yi yɑn, yɑ ceg-ɑ wïyø ki gwøg ki møgø miɑ; eni møng-ɑ nyi mïni pëthi jwögg geki ji.’
Codhe cyee, ɑköbbi but yi yenh bënn kinni, ‘Bïí o yï bëëd yïn ɑ́ rɑ̈ɑ̈dh wøn.’

Alöggi but kinni, ‘Keløg wu dwɑdd-ɑ yɑn kidyër, o yɑ røny yi wun, yɑn ɑ́ rɑ̈ɑ̈dh wun, bïu tïbɑ. De keløg wu óbɑ̈nyø, bɑ̈ddɑ, bɑ̈dd-ɑ pɑ̈ng yi koodh óceg ì pɑɑt ki mɑc, kɑ yenh sɑndɑl mø Lubnɑn rɑ̈be.’ ”
Kɑ Yöthɑm cig-ɑ kwøb kinni, “Anɑn dɑ gɑ̈nø, kí tɑri pëëth kì yï wun, kɑ̀ røny wun Abimelek ɑ́ rɑ̈dh? Gideon ɑ́di wørø yi wun, kɑ pɑrri wun, kɑ gøle göggi wun ki gïndøj men-ɑ myër ki en?
Nyi rum wun kinni wïyɑ ɑ́nyïɑ̈ggi kɑ per wun. Thøø ɑ́bøye kipe yieli wun kì cinggi tyëng Midyɑn.
De wu ɑ́yöd wu töng-ɑ ri gøl wïyɑ dicyɑ̈ngtïn. Anɑ̈g wun wɑ̈dde gɑ pyɑ̈r ɑ́bïryew kì kömi kït ɑ́kyel kipe Abimelek wɑ̈de, ɑ meye bɑ ɑkwɑny, mɑ́ e bɑ ókɑ̈ɑ̈y wun, ɑgwøgii yi wun ɑ́ rɑ̈ɑ̈dh Cekïm.
De ɑnɑn, keløg gïn-ɑ ɑ́göggi Gideon kí gøle yi wun dicyɑ̈ngtïn, gwøøg wun kɑ tɑri pëëth, wu óbëëdø ki medi pëëth wuki Abimelek.
De keløg e pɑth ki tɑri pëëth ɑ göög wun, mɑc óceg ì pɑɑt kì ri Abimelek, kɑ jø Cekïm geki jø Bet Milö rɑ̈be. O mɑc óceg ì pɑɑt kì ri jø Cekïm geki jø Bet Milö, kɑ Abimelek rɑ̈be.”
Arengi Yöthɑm kɑ kedh-ɑ be bëëdø kì Biir, mɑ́ e ɑ́bëëd e óböggø yi Abimelek ówɑ̈n.
Ajɑɑg Isrɑil yi Abimelek ki runn ɑ́dɑ̈g.
Aör wëy mø rijjø kɑɑm Abimelek geki jø Cekïm yi Jwøk, kɑ ge ómɑ̈nø ki ri gen, kɑ ge ogöögø liny ki gøn.
Gïnɑni ɑ́cwöb kì kɑɑm Abimelek geki pëjji Cekïm møg-ɑ ɑ́cïïjii ki gwøgi orøng-ɑ ɑ́nɑ̈ge nyiiwɑ̈n, wɑ̈ddi Yerubɑɑl gɑ pyɑ̈r ɑ́bïryew kipe kinni o kɑ̈jji cu gen col.
Acïb jøg mø kurø wïj kït mɑl yi pëjji Cekïm, kɑ jɑmmi tyëng-ɑ kɑ̈lli yöö nyi kɑb yi gen. Kɑ møgɑni köbbi Abimelek.
Awɑ̈dhi Gɑɑl wɑ̈d Ebed bëënø e bï-ɑ Cekïm geki nyiimen, kɑ kwøbbe yïëy yi pëjji Cekïm.

Akedhi gen wɑ̈g bënn yethi bɑ̈ggi gen, kɑ ge opunø ki nywøli oløg, ɑgöggi gen ri gen ki møgø kɑ ge otugø. Akedhi gen be cɑm kí mɑdh kì yij kengi jwøøg gen, ɑkööb gen kì kenyɑni kì ri Abimelek, e obenyø yi gen.

Kɑ Gɑɑl wɑ̈d Ebed okööbø kinni, “Abimelek ɑ́ men? O wɑ tyëng Cekïm, wɑ ceg bëëd ɑ dï, ɑ jɑɑge wɑ? Pɑth ki wɑ̈d Yerubɑɑl, o pɑth ki Dhebul ɑ bɑ ókwøme? Wɑde ɑ göög wɑ kipere? Gɑ̈nni wɑ kweyee Amör, ɑ ree ɑ́kɑ̈ɑ̈l yi gølee!
Keløg ji møg di pyejj-ɑ yi yɑn, Abimelek di nɑ̈g yi yɑn. Abimelek di köbbɑ kinni, ‘Cwööl linyí bëne, kɑ yï bïí be nyɑɑg!’ ”
Møg-ɑ ɑ́kwøb yi Gɑɑl wɑ̈d Ebed, keny-ɑ ɑ́lïngi gen yi Dhebul jɑngi kɑɑlɑni, kɑ pyëwe ceg-ɑ rënyø ki menrɑj.
Aöde yï Abimelek kì Arumɑ̀ ki wöödø kinni, “Gɑɑl wɑ̈d Ebed geki nyiimen ɑ́bï Cekïm, o yï pɑ wëggi bëën kɑɑl yi gen.
De bïí wuki jøgí kì wɑ̈r, kɑ wu pɑ̈ni wun kì yethi pwödh.
Kɑ wu dhwönhi wun kì mwøl ri tuuli cɑ̈ng, kɑ wu pɑ̈ɑ̈r wun kömi kɑɑl. Keny-ɑ óbëën Gɑɑl geki jøge be nyɑɑg ki yïn, kɑ ge pwööd piny.”
Codhe, kɑ Abimelek geki jøge bënn ódhwönhø kì wɑ̈r, ɑpɑ̈ni gen kì pɑ̈l kì buti Cekïm gɑ dhøg ɑ́ngwen.
Kɑ Gɑɑl wɑ̈d Ebed obëënø, kɑ ócungø kì dhø döri kɑɑl. Keny-ɑ ɑ́lidhii yi Abimelek geki jøge, ɑdhwödhi gen mɑl kì kɑ̈jj-ɑ ɑ́pɑ̈ni yi gen.
Keny-ɑ ɑ́liidh gen yi Gɑɑl, ɑköbbe Dhebul kinni, “Lïdhí, dɑ ji mø bï ge kɑ̈ɑ̈l-ɑ wɑ̈thi kïttì.”
Alöggi Dhebul kinni, “Tïbbi kïttì ɑ nenni yi yïn ge nɑ ji.”
Acigi Gɑɑl kwøb kinni, “Lïdhí, ji ɑ bï ɑcɑ̀ ge kɑ̈ɑ̈l-ɑ wɑ̈thi kïttì. O ɑkud megø kɑ̈ɑ̈l-ɑ ri óthur-ɑ thɑre nyi rɑ̈ɑ̈ng yi ɑ́jwöggì.”
Kɑ köbbi yi Dhebul kinni, “Athwøgí ɑ́gøn en ɑnɑn? Pɑth ki yïn ɑ ɑ́kööb kinni, Abimelek bɑ men ɑ jɑɑge wɑ? Bene liny-ɑ ɑ́benyi yi yïn ɑnɑn. Kedh nyïɑ̈ggí ki en!”
Codhe, ɑpeej tyëng Cekïm yi Gɑɑl, kɑ ge ónyïɑ̈ggø ki Abimelek.
Kɑ Gɑɑl cyeddi gïti dhø pöör yi Abimelek, kɑ ji mø gïïr ri gen kedhi yi kedd.
Abëëd Abimelek kì Arumɑ̀, kɑ Gɑɑl geki nyiimen cyeed wɑ̈g yi Dhebul kì Cekïm.
Dhuki, ɑlïng Abimelek kinni i tyëng Cekïm dwɑdd-ɑ kedhi wɑ̈g yethi pwödh.
Codhe, ɑkɑ̈ɑ̈le jøge gï pɑ̈ng en gɑ dhøg ɑ́dɑ̈g. Abuddi gen kì yethi pwödh. Keny-ɑ ɑ́lidhe ji ge bï-ɑ wɑ̈g kì kɑɑl, ɑpɑ̈ɑ̈r gen kömi gïn kɑ gï nɑ̈g gen.
Kɑ Abimelek geki jøge reng-ɑ be mɑgi dhø döri kɑɑl, kedh ɑkudd ɑ́ryew reng-ɑ yethi pwödh be nɑ̈g ki ji.
Kɑ liny tyëg-ɑ cɑ̈ng bëne e ónyïɑ̈ggø. Amɑɑg kɑɑl yi Abimelek, ɑnɑ̈ge jii kɑɑlɑni bënn. Atoore kɑɑl piny, kɑ piny wïwe ki omelø, (e lɑm-ɑ gøn kinni o cöge ɑ́ ryɑng).
Keny-ɑ ɑ́lïngi møgɑni yi jøg-ɑ bɑ pëjji kì Cekïm, ɑrengi gen be yieeli wëyi gen yij kengi Bɑɑl Berit, ønteg.
Aköbbi Abimelek kinni ri gen cøng gen kì kunɑni.
Codhe, ɑkedhe wïj Kïti Dhɑlmön geki jøge. Kɑ ókɑ̈bbø ki dørø, ɑngude ki yungø, kɑ gø cïbe wïj tøge. Aköbbe jøge kinni pyew gen, göög gen ki gïn ni men-ɑ ɑ́gwøge.

Codhe, ɑngud dhɑnhø bëne ki yungø, ɑløg gen bɑng Abimelek kɑ yuggɑni röör gen kömi ønteg menɑni. Acwiny kenyɑni yi gen kí ji kì yije, kɑ ji othøø bënn kwɑnni gen bɑ ɑ́lïp ɑ́kyel, jøg-ɑ cwøw kí tyëng-ɑ mɑ̈nn.
Akedhi Abimelek Tebedh, kɑ kɑɑlɑni tyege, ɑmɑge gøn.
Kunɑni ɑ́dɑ ønbɑ̈r me teg, o tyëng kɑɑlɑni bënn kí jɑggi gen, rengi yij ønɑni. Kɑ gø cyëëg gen kömi gen, kɑ kwï gen yedh-ɑ wïje.
Keny-ɑ ɑ́kedhi Abimelek, be mɑgi ønbɑ̈r menɑni, ɑ́ceg-ɑ yedhi mɑl be cwinyii ki mɑc kì dhøge.
De ngɑndhɑjø megø, kïn-ɑ nyi gur ɑ́kwɑnye kɑ gø leenge wïj Abimelek, kɑ wïje ópyëdø.
Acwøle nyel-ɑ kɑ̈lli jɑmmi linye kinni, “Kɑ̈ɑ̈l pilø mi wɑ̈g kɑ yɑ nɑ̈ɑ̈g. Yɑ pɑ dwɑddi kinni, o yɑ kømmi kinni yɑ ɑ́nɑ̈g-ɑ yi ngɑndhɑjø.” Codhe, ɑcwøbii yi nyelɑni kɑ othøø.
Keny-ɑ ɑ́lidhii yi tyëng Isrɑil kinni Abimelek ɑ́thøw, ɑdøøg gen yethi myërri gen.
Bɑ Jwøk ɑ ɑ́cɑy Abimelek kipe orøng-ɑ ɑ́gögge gøl wïye, ɑ ɑ́nɑ̈ge nyiiwɑ̈n gɑ pyɑ̈r ɑ́bïryew.
Tyëng Cekïm ɑ́göjji orɑng yi Jwøk kipe gïgrijjø møg-ɑ ɑ́gwøg yi gen, ni kɑ ɑ́lɑ̈mmi gen cyën yi Yöthɑm wɑ̈d Yerubɑɑl.
Kì bɑng thøwi Abimelek, ɑdhwödh Tölɑ̀ wɑ̈d Puɑ̀ kwɑɑr Dödö, wɑ̈d gøl Isɑkɑr, e bï-ɑ be yieli Isrɑil. Ábëëd ɑ Cɑmïr kì myërri kïtti Eprɑim.
Isrɑil ɑ́jɑɑg yi en ki runn pyɑ̈r ɑ́ryew wïdɑ́dɑ̈g. Kɑ othøø, ɑkonyii kì Cɑmïr.
Bɑng Tölɑ̀, ɑdhwödh Yɑir kì Gilyɑd, ɑjɑɑge Isrɑil ki runn pyɑ̈r ɑ́ryew wïdɑ́ryew.
Yïe ɑ́dɑ wɑ̈dd pyɑ̈r ɑ́dɑ̈g, ge nyi cyɑ̈dh-ɑ́ɑ̀ kömi ɑderr pyɑ̈r ɑ́dɑ̈g, o yï gen ɑ́dɑ kɑ̈dd pyɑ̈r ɑ́dɑ̈g, møg-ɑ nudd ge ocwøllø gɑ kɑ̈ddi Yɑir gïti dicyɑ̈ngtïn kì myërri Gilyɑd.
Athøw Yɑir, kɑ kony kì Kɑmön.

Agöög tyëng Isrɑil këti ki gïnrɑj kì bøli Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, kɑ Bɑɑl geki Actɑröth mɑlli gen, kí jwöggi tyëng Acuur, kí jwöggi Sïdön, kí jwöggi Moɑb, kí jwöggi Amön, kí jwöggi Pelistiyɑ̀. Aweddi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j yi gen kɑ ge ówïyø mɑllii.
Codhe, ɑrënyi pyëw Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j ki menteg ki Isrɑil, kɑ gï göjje tyɑmø yi tyëng Pelistiyɑ̀ geki tyëng Amön.
Aguud gen nyingi tyëng Isrɑil møg-ɑ bëëdø kì løøg Nɑm Urdun kì wɑɑng cyɑ̈ɑ̈ng mwøl, kì piny Amör kì Gilyɑd, ki runn pyɑ̈rø wïdɑ́bïdɑ̈g.
Kɑ tyëng Amön kɑdh-ɑ løøg Nɑm Urdun be nyɑɑg ki gøl Yeudɑ̀, kí gøl Ben Yɑmïn thyew, kí gøl Eprɑim, kɑ Isrɑil yije obɑɑrø ki mendwøng.
Aywøøg tyëng Isrɑil kö Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j ge okööbø kinni, “Wø ɑ́røngi kì bølí, mɑ́ yï ɑ́weddi yi wøn, yïn ɑ Jwøøg wøn, kɑ Bɑɑl mɑlli wøn.”
Aköbbi tyëng Isrɑil yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kinni, “Yɑn ɑ ɑ́yiel wun kɑ̈ge dööng kì cinggi tyëng Rïp, kí tyëng Amör, kí tyëng Amön, kí tyëng Pelistiyɑ̀,
kí tyëng Sïdön, kí tyëng Amɑlek, kí tyëng Moɑb, kɑ ɑ́guud gen nyingi wun, kɑ wu ywöög-ɑ köörɑ. Wu nuti yieel yɑn kì cinggi gen?
De yɑ ɑ́wiyu piny, kɑ wu kedh-ɑ be mɑlli jwögg møøgø, kɑ ɑ́rum bëëde kinøw, wu pɑ yiel yi yɑn këti.
Kedh wun, kɑ wu ywøøg wun yï jwögg-ɑ mɑlli yi wun, wiy wu nyi yiel yi gen kenyi yïddi wun ki rɑj.”
De tyëng Isrɑil Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j ɑ́köbbi gen kinni, “Wø ɑ́røngi, de gwøg gïn-ɑ nenni yi yïn e døøj. Wø ókwɑ̈jjø kinni yiel wøn dicyɑ̈ngtïn.”
Codhe, ɑweddi gen jwögg-ɑ pɑth, kɑ Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j mɑlli gen, kɑ yije óywöngø kipe bɑɑri nyingi tyëng Isrɑil.
Kɑ liny tyëng Amön ree gwire kipe nyɑɑg, ɑcøng gen ri gen kì Gilyɑd. Kɑ tyëng Isrɑil ri gen cøng gen, kɑ liny cïb gen Midhpɑ̀ kì Gilyɑd.
Kɑ jøgdøngø geki teedø bëne ri gen pyënyi gen kì kenyɑni kinni, “Á men-ɑ ópej liny kɑ̀ kedhi wɑ be nyɑɑg ki tyëng Amön? Ngɑn-ɑ ópej liny óbëëd ɑ́ jɑngi dhɑnhø bëne kì Gilyɑd!”
Yeptɑɑ̀ ɑ́bëëd ɑ́ jɑl-liny me teg kì Gilyɑd, bɑ wɑ̈d ngɑn mɑ ɑ́bëëd ɑ́ ngɑn nyi niin ki köögi. Wïyi Yeptɑɑ̀ cwøl ɑ́ Gilyɑd.
De Gilyɑd yïe ɑ́dɑ wɑ̈dde thyew ki cyëge, keny-ɑ ɑ́døngi wɑ̈dde, ɑcyeed gen Yeptɑɑ̀ wɑ̈g kì pɑc, kɑ gø köbbi gen kinni, “Bong gïn-ɑ ólɑg yi yïn kì ri jɑmmi wïyi wøn, mɑ́ yï bɑ wɑ̈d dhɑjø megø.”
Codhe, ɑpɑ̈r Yeptɑɑ̀ kì buti nyiiwɑ̈n, kɑ kedh-ɑ be bëëdø kì piny Töb. Acøng jøg-ɑ bong per gen ri gen bɑng Yeptɑɑ̀, kɑ ge nyi kedh-ɑ be mɑ̈nyø ki gïn.
Kì bɑng keny megø, ɑkedhi tyëng Amön be nyɑɑg ki Isrɑil.
Keny-ɑ ɑ́pɑ̈ɑ̈r tyëng Amön kömi Isrɑil, ɑkedhi jøgdøngi Gilyɑd piny Töb be dwöögi Yeptɑɑ̀.
Kɑ Yeptɑɑ̀ köbbi yi gen kinni, “Bïí o yï bëëd yïn ɑ́ pënyi liny wøn, o wɑ kedhi wɑ be nyɑɑg ki tyëng Amön.”
Aløøg kwøbbi jøgdøngi Gilyɑd yi Yeptɑɑ̀ kinni, “Bɑ wun kì ri wun ɑ ɑ́mɑɑn yɑn, kɑ yɑ cyeed wɑ̈g yi wun kì gøl wïyɑ, wude ɑ bëën wun yïɑ ɑnɑn kɑ̀ ying wun yethi rɑj?”
Aköbbi Yeptɑɑ̀ yi jøgdøngi Gilyɑd kinni, “Kidyër ceth, wø ɑ́dwöög köörí ɑnɑn, keløg yï ókedhø ki wøn, o wɑ nyïɑ̈ggi wɑ ki tyëng Amön, yï óbëëdø yïn ɑ́ pënyi liny Gilyɑd bëne.”
Aköbbi jøgdøngi Gilyɑd yi Yeptɑɑ̀ kinni, “Døj, yɑ dwøøg yi wun kɑ per nyɑɑg ki tyëng Amön, de keløg ge ócïb cingɑ yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, yɑ ceg-ɑ gwøg ki jɑngi wun.”
Aløøg kwøbbi Yeptɑɑ̀ yi jøgdøngi Gilyɑd kinni, “Wø ɑ́yïëy, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kiree ɑ́ bøle ɑ́lwööb wɑ.”
Codhe, ɑkedh Yeptɑɑ̀ geki jøgdøngi Gilyɑd, ɑgwøgii yi gen ɑ́ pënyi liny, o bɑ jɑgø. Kɑ møgɑni bënn døøg ki kwøbø yi Yeptɑɑ̀ kì bøli Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kì Midhpɑ̀.
Aödi Yeptɑɑ̀ yï rɑ̈ɑ̈dh Amön ki tyëngwöödø, o gø köbbi gen kinni, “Yïde ki wøn? Yïde ɑ bëën be mɑnyi pödhi wøn?”
Aløøg kwøbbi tyëngwöödø mø Yeptɑɑ̀ yi rɑ̈ɑ̈dh Amön kinni, “Keny-ɑ ɑ́bëën Isrɑil kì Rïp, pinyɑ ɑ́kwɑny yi gen, cɑg kì ri Nɑm Arnön gïti Nɑm Yɑbok, kí Nɑm Urdun. Anɑn döggu yɑn kɑ̈jjɑni ki mër.”
Acigi Yeptɑɑ̀ ödi yï rɑ̈ɑ̈dh Amön ki tyëngwöödø,
e løøg-ɑ kinni, “Isrɑil bong piny Moɑb, wɑlɑ̀ piny tyëng Amön mɑ ɑ́kwɑnye.
Keny-ɑ ɑ́dhwödh Isrɑil kì Rïp, ɑ́kɑ̈ll-ɑ yij pɑ̈l, ɑkedhe dhø Gøøli Agɑbɑ̀, kɑ ge kedh-ɑ Kɑdic.

Kɑ ge öd-ɑ yi rɑ̈ɑ̈dh Edöm kinni o ge wiy ge kedh gen, ge kɑ̈l-ɑ yij pödhe. De ge nuti wiyø yi rɑ̈ɑ̈dh Edöm o ge kɑ̈l gen yij pödhe. Angɑ̈j gen rɑ̈ɑ̈dh Moɑb, de ɑ́bɑ̈nyi thyew. Codhe, ɑbëëd tyëng Isrɑil kì Kɑdic.

Kɑ ge ócyɑ̈dhø ge owïïnø kì yij pɑ̈l, ge kɑ̈ll-ɑ tøggi piny Edöm geki Moɑb gïti kɑ ɑ́wɑ̈nhi gen Moɑb kì kuni wɑɑng cyɑ̈ɑ̈ng mwøl, kì tøg Nɑm Arnön løøng-ɑ kyeelø. Agur gen kemmi gen piny kì kunɑni, de ge nuti kɑdhi løøg Nɑm Arnön mɑ́ e bɑ keew Moɑb.
Kɑ tyëng Isrɑil öd-ɑ yï Sïön rɑ̈ɑ̈dh Amör kì Kicbön ki wöödø kinni o ge wiy ge kedh gen, ge bɑ̈ɑ̈n-ɑ yij pödhe, ge kedh-ɑ pödhø men-ɑ bɑ mi gen.
De Sïön ɑ́bɑ̈nyi. Kɑ linye bëne cønge kì Yɑɑdh, kɑ pɑ̈ɑ̈r-ɑ kömi Isrɑil.
De Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, Jwøøg Isrɑil, Isrɑil ɑ́thödhe ki tegø, kɑ Sïön tyɑm kí linye bëne. Codhe, ɑkwɑɑny piny tyëng Amör møg-ɑ ɑ́bëëd kì pönhɑni yi tyëng Isrɑil.
Apëggi gen piny Amör bëne, cɑg kì Arnön gïti Yɑbok, o cɑg kì ryɑng gïti Nɑm Urdun.
De bɑ Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, Jwøøg Isrɑil ɑ ɑ́cyeddi tyëng Amör kipe jie tyëng Isrɑil.
Dwɑddií døøgø ki kwɑnyø? Yï ócuggø kwɑnyi gïg-ɑ ɑ́mëggi yïn yi jwøgí Kemöc. De gïg-ɑ ɑ́mëggi wøn yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, Jwøøg wøn ómïdhi bënn yi wøn.
Yï orumø kinni Bɑlɑk wɑ̈d Dhipor rɑ̈ɑ̈dh Moɑb lod yi yïn? Ádi wërø ki tyëng Isrɑil, wɑlɑ̀ ɑ́di kedhi be nyɑɑg ki gen?
Isrɑil ɑ́bëëd kì Kicbön kí Aröeer, kí myërr-ɑ buti gen, kí kɑ̈dd-ɑ thɑ̈ngi Nɑm Arnön bënn kì runn miy ɑ́dɑ̈g, gede ɑ nuti kwɑɑny gen yi yïn ki kɑɑm-ɑn bëne?
Pɑth, bong gïnrɑj mɑ ɑ́göggɑ yïn. De mií bɑ bɑ̈jjø kɑ̀ göög ki liny kí yɑn. Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j bɑ en ɑ ólidh møgɑni. Gïn-ɑ kɑɑm tyëng Isrɑil geki kwɑrri Amön ótyëg yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j dicyɑ̈ngtïn.”
De rɑ̈ɑ̈dh Amön wööni Yeptɑɑ̀ ɑ́bɑny yi en ki lïngø.
Kɑ wëyi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j bï-ɑ kömi Yeptɑɑ̀, ɑkedhe myërri Gilyɑd kí Mɑnɑsè kɑ dwöög-ɑ Midhpɑ̀ kì Gilyɑd, kɑ pödh-ɑ Amön.
Aköngi Yeptɑɑ̀ kì bøli Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kinni, “Keløg tyëng Amön ócïb yi yïn cingɑ,
dhɑnhø men-ɑ ókwöngi ki bëën wɑ̈g, kì gølɑ e kedh-ɑ be pɑɑri yɑn keny-ɑ ódwöögɑ ki tɑrø, kì be nyɑɑg ki tyëng Amön, mëggɑ’ Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j ɑ́ gënh-ɑ nyi rɑ̈b bëne.”
Akɑdhi Yeptɑɑ̀ løøgø, be nyɑɑg ki tyëng Amön, kɑ ge cïb cinge yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j.
Akedhhe gïn, cɑg kì Aröeer gïti Minith, gɑ kɑ̈dd pyɑ̈r ɑ́ryew bënn, pïd kö yuu Abel Kerɑmïm. Ji mø gïïr ɑ́nɑ̈g kɑ tyëng Amön tyɑm yi tyëng Isrɑil.
Keny-ɑ ɑ́wɑ̈nhi Yeptɑɑ̀ pɑɑre kì Midhpɑ̀, bɑ nyɑre ɑ ɑ́bï wɑ̈g be pɑɑrii, e ocöngø e opödø ki nyɑ bul! Bɑ nyɑn me thinh, o yïe bong nyiimen.

Keny-ɑ ɑ́lïdhe, ɑkɑge ógødhe, e yije ceg-ɑ ywøg, ɑkööbe kinni, “Pöy nyɑrɑ! Minɑ ɑ́cöd yi yïn! Ede ɑ bëëde ɑ́ yïn ɑ thödhi yɑn ki orɑng? Yɑ ɑ́rum ki köngø kì bøli Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, o yɑ pɑ cuggi døøg cyɑ̈n!”
Akööbe kinni, “Wïyø, göggí yɑn gïn-ɑ ɑ́kwöng yi yïn kì bøli Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, mɑ́ yï ɑ́wëgge tyɑmi tyëngmɑ̈ɑ̈nø, ɑ løg tyëng Amön.”

De wïye ɑ́köbbe kinni, “Göggí yɑn gïjø ɑ́kyel men, wiy yɑn, o yɑ bëëdɑ ki dwɑ̈tt ɑ́ryew, kipe kinni, o yɑ kedhɑ wɑ̈thi kïttì be wïïnø, wøki mɑ̈dhhɑ, o wø kïïm wøn kipe thøwɑ yɑn ɑ́ jùr me nuti nywɑlø yi jɑlø.”
Aköbbii yi wïye kinni kedhe, e ör-ɑ gøn wɑ̈g ki dwɑ̈tt ɑ́ryew. Akedhe geki mɑ̈dhhe kelli kïttì, kipe kɑ̀ thøwe e nuti nywɑlø yi jɑlø, kí kɑ̀ bong yïe nyɑre.
Kì bɑng dwɑ̈tt ɑ́ryew ɑdwööge yï wïye, ɑgwøøg gïn-ɑ ɑ́kwöng yi wïye kì bøli Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, kɑ othøø ɑ́ jùr me nuti nywɑlø yi jɑlø.
Bene cɑ̈gi kwöngɑni kì Isrɑil,
men-ɑ nyi kedhi womɑ̈nn, wɑ̈g ki cyɑ̈ng ɑ́ngwen kì yij run, o ge kïïm gen kipe nyɑɑr Yeptɑɑ̀ jɑl Gilyɑd.

Kɑ jø gøl Eprɑim ri gen cwøl gen, ɑkedhi gen løøg Nɑm Urdun ge kedh-ɑ yï Yeptɑɑ̀ kì Dhɑpön, kɑ gø köbbi gen kinni, “Á kipe ngø ɑ bɑ̈ɑ̈n nɑm, kɑ yï kedh-ɑ be nyɑɑg ki tyëng Amön, o wø nuti cwøøl yïn? Ød rɑ̈ɑ̈b wø’ kömí.”
Aköbbi gen yi Yeptɑɑ̀ kinni, “Yɑn wøki jøgɑ, wø ɑ́wër ki tyëng Amön ki wëërø me teeg, kɑ wu cwølɑ, de wu nuti bëën be cwɑgi yɑn.
Keny-ɑ ɑ́lidhɑ en kinni yɑ pɑ cwɑg yi wun, ɑböyyɑ kɑ yɑ kedh-ɑ be nyɑɑg ki tyëng Amön, ɑcïb gen cingɑ yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j. De wude ɑ bëën wun be nyɑɑg ki yɑn ɑnɑn?”

Acøng jø Gilyɑd bënn yi Yeptɑɑ̀ kɑ ónyïɑ̈ggø ki gøl Eprɑim, ɑtyɑɑm gøl Eprɑim yi jø Gilyɑd, mɑ́ gøl Eprɑim ɑ́kööb kinni, “Wun, wu tyëng Gilyɑd, wu bɑ ji mø kɑrri tyelli wun kì kɑɑm Eprɑim geki Mɑnɑsè.”
Amɑɑg dhøøwɑ̈dhh-ɑ nyi kɑ̈dhhi kì Nɑm Urdun yi jø Gilyɑd, kɑ ngeti Eprɑim men-ɑ nyi bodh ree kinni o kɑdhe nyi pyëj yi jø Gilyɑd kinni, “Yï bɑ jɑl Eprɑim?”

Keløg e okyëdø kinni, “Pɑth.” Nyii köbbø kinni, kööbe kinni, “Cibolet” de nyi kwøb-ɑ, “Sibolet,” mɑ́ e nyii dhɑlø yi kwøbii kidøøj. Kɑ nyi mɑg kɑ nɑ̈g yi gen kì kömi Nɑm Urdun, tyëng gøl Eprɑim møg-ɑ ɑ́nɑ̈g yi gen ki yuuɑni bɑ ɑ́lïp pyɑ̈r ɑ́ngwen wïdɑ́ryew.
Kɑ Isrɑil jɑɑg yi Yeptɑɑ̀ ki runn ɑ́bïkyel, ɑthøwe kɑ kony kì pɑɑre kì Gilyɑd.
Kì bɑng Yeptɑɑ̀, ɑjɑɑg Isrɑil yi Ibdhɑn, kì Betleem.

Yïe ɑ́dɑ wɑ̈dde pyɑ̈r ɑ́dɑ̈g, kí nyige womɑ̈nn pyɑ̈r ɑ́dɑ̈g. Nyige ɑ́muuje o ge nywøm yi ji mø pɑth ki tyëng gøl gen, kɑ ókɑ̈nø ki womɑ̈nn mø bɑ nyigi jurrì møøgø gɑ pyɑ̈r ɑ́dɑ̈g gɑ mɑ̈nni wɑ̈dde. Isrɑil ɑ́jɑɑg yi Ibdhɑn ki runn ɑ́bïryew.
Kɑ othøø, ɑkonyii kì Betleem.
Kì bɑng Ibdhɑn, ɑjɑɑg Isrɑil yi Elön kwɑɑr Dhebulun ki runn pyɑ̈rø.
Kɑ Elön othøø, ɑkonyii kì Ayɑlön kì piny Dhebulun.
Kì bɑng Elön, ɑjɑɑg Isrɑil yi Abdön wɑ̈d Yilel kì Pirɑthön.
Yïe ɑ́dɑ wɑ̈dd pyɑ̈r ɑ́ngwen, kí kwɑrre wɑ̈ddi wɑ̈dde pyɑ̈r ɑ́dɑ̈g møg-ɑ nyi cyɑ̈dhi kì kömi ɑderr pyɑ̈r ɑ́bïryew. Isrɑil ɑ́jɑɑg yi en ki runn ɑ́bïdɑ̈g.
Kɑ Abdön wɑ̈d Yilel othøø, ɑkonyii kì Pirɑthön kì piny Eprɑim kì myërri kïtti Amɑlek.
Adøøg tyëng Isrɑil ki gwøg ki gïnrɑj kì bøli Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, ɑcïb gen cinggi tyëng Pelistiyɑ̀ yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, kɑ ge jɑɑg yi gen ki runn pyɑ̈r ɑ́ngwen.
Ádɑ jɑl megø kì kɑɑl Dhorɑ̀ kì gøl Dɑn me cwøl ɑ́ Mɑnowɑ̀, o cyëge bɑ bwøj, nuti wöl nywølø ki dhɑnhø.
Kɑ wëywöni Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j ocwöbø kì bøli ngɑnɑni, kɑ gø köbbe kinni, “Yï bɑ bwøj, yï nuti wöl nywølø ki dhɑnhø; de yï óyɑɑj, kɑ yï pɑ̈dh-ɑ piny ki wɑ̈d.
Yï ko pɑ̈nyi mɑ̈dhø ki møgi oløg kí møgi byel, wɑlɑ̀ ki gïn ree di thɑbø, wɑlɑ̀ yï ko pɑ̈nyi cɑm ki gïgcɑmm møg-ɑ ywëdhø.
Keny-ɑ órum wɑ̈dí ki pɑ̈dhi piny yi yïn, yëyyi wïje ko pɑ̈nyi ki lyelø, mɑ́ nyelthinh menɑni óbëëd ɑ́ ɑthyeey Jwøk kër-ɑ ónywøølii. En ɑ óyiel Isrɑil kì cinggi tyëng Pelistiyɑ̀.”
Akedh ngɑnɑni kɑ jɑlgøle köbbe kinni, “Jɑlkwøbbi Jwøk ɑ́bï yïɑ, nënni e nɑ wëywöni Jwøk. Dhɑnhø ceg-ɑ böggø yi en. Nuti pyëëj yɑn ki kun-ɑ ɑ́kɑ̈ɑ̈le, o nyinge nuti köbbi yɑn yi en.

De yɑ ɑ́köbbe kinni, i yɑ óyɑɑj kɑ yɑ pɑ̈dh-ɑ piny ki wɑ̈d. Aköbbe yɑn kinni cɑg ɑnɑn, yɑ ko mɑ̈ɑ̈dh ki møgi oløg wɑlɑ̀ møgi byel, kɑ yɑ ko cyɑ̈ɑ̈m ki gïg-ɑ ywëdhø, mɑ́ nyelthinh óbëëd ɑ́ ɑthyeey Jwøk kì yethi cyɑ̈ngg-ɑ ónëëne bënn.”
Kɑ Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kwɑjji yi Mɑnowɑ̀ kinni, “Yïn ɑ Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, yɑ kwɑjj-ɑ yïn, wiy dhɑnhø mií men-ɑ ɑ́ör yi yïn dwööge be nyudhi wøn ki gïn-ɑ ógöggi wøn nyelthinh men-ɑ ónywøl.”
Alïngi kwɑ̈jji Mɑnowɑ̀ yi Jwøk, kɑ wëywöni Jwøk dwöög-ɑ yï ngɑnɑni e ying-ɑ yij pwödhø, de jɑlgøle Mɑnowɑ̀ ɑ́bëëd e tøøk kì bute.
Arengi ngɑnɑni yï jɑlgøle, kɑ gø köbbe kinni, “Lïdhí, jɑl-ɑ ɑ́cwöb kì bølɑ cyɑ̈ng-ɑcɑ̀ èn!”
Adhwödh Mɑnowɑ̀, kɑ løg-ɑ bɑng cyëge. Keny-ɑ ɑ́wɑ̈nhe buti jɑlɑni, ɑkööbe kinni, “Bɑ yïn ɑ ɑ́kööb ki cyëgɑ?”
Kɑ oyïëyø kinni, “Yɑn.”
Codhe, ɑpëjji Mɑnowɑ̀ kinni, “Keny-ɑ ópɑ̈dhi kwøbbí, nyelthinh ócïg-ɑ ngø, o ógwøg-ɑ ngø kì yij bëëde?”
Alöggi wëywöni Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kinni, “Cyëgí gwøge møg-ɑ ɑ́cïgɑ en bënn ceth;
ngɑnɑni ko cyɑ̈ɑ̈m ki gïn kɑ̈ɑ̈l ri oløg, kɑ ko mɑ̈ɑ̈dh ki møgi oløg, wɑlɑ̀ møgi byel, wɑlɑ̀ ko cyɑ̈ɑ̈m ki gïg-ɑ ywëdhø. Gwøge møg-ɑ ɑ́köbbɑ en bënn.”
Ábëëd e kwïj yi Mɑnowɑ̀ kinni menɑni bɑ wëywöni Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j. Aköbbe gøn kinni, “Døj, kɑl bëëdø kì keny, kɑ wiy yï tɑ̈ddi ki nyɑ ónywøg.”
De Mɑnowɑ̀ ɑ́köbbi yi wëywöni Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kinni, “Keløg yɑ obëëdø kì keny, yɑ pɑ cuggi cɑm ki gïncɑɑm wun. De ke dwɑddií, cɑɑg ki rɑ̈bbi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j ɑ́ gënh-ɑ nyi rɑ̈b bëne.”
Apyëëj wëywöni Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j yi Mɑnowɑ̀, kinni, “Nyingí ɑ́ men, o yï ótheg yi wøn keny-ɑ ópɑ̈dhi kwøbbí kɑ̈jji gen?”

Codhe, ɑkwɑɑny nyɑ ónywøg yi Mɑnowɑ̀ geki byëlø, kɑ gï mëgge Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j gɑ gënh-ɑ nyi rɑ̈b bëne kì kömi nyɑ kït me thiinh. Acwöb gïïngɑ̈ngø men-ɑ ɑ́gwøg yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, e onennø yi Mɑnowɑ̀ geki cyëge.

Keny-ɑ ɑ́kedhi leeb mɑc mɑl kì wïj këli lɑm, kɑ wëywöni Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j lidh yi Mɑnowɑ̀ geki cyëge e kedh-ɑ mɑl kì yij leeb mɑc. Angijii yi Mɑnowɑ̀ cyee kinni jɑlɑni ce ying-ɑ wëywöni Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, kɑ ri gen bøødh gen piny, wɑ̈thi gen kuul gen piny. Wëywöni Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j nuti lidhø yi gen këti.
Kɑ Mɑnowɑ̀ cyëge köbbe kinni, “Wɑ bɑ møg thøw ceth, kipe kɑ ɑ́liidh Jwøk yi wɑ.”
Alöggi cyëge kinni, “Keløg Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j di dwɑddi nɑ̈gi wɑ, ti gënh-ɑ nyi rɑ̈b bëne geki byëlø pɑ di yïëy yi en kì cinggee, wɑlɑ̀ wɑ pɑ di nyudhe gïg-ɑk bënn, wɑlɑ̀ bong gïn di köbbe wɑ.”
Kɑ ngɑnɑni pɑ̈dh-ɑ piny ki wɑ̈d, kɑ nyinge cɑge ɑ́ Cimcön. Kɑ nyelthinh ódøngø, kɑ gyëdh yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j.
Kɑ wëyi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j ócɑ̈gø’ gwøg kì ree keny-ɑ ɑ́bëëde e ying-ɑ Dɑn, kì kɑɑm Dhorɑ̀ geki Ectɑol.
Kɑ Cimcön kedh-ɑ Timnɑ̀, kɑ ólïdhø ki dhɑjø kì kelli nyigi Pelistiyɑ̀.
Kɑ ódwöögø, ɑköbbe wïye geki meye kinni, “Dɑ nyɑɑr Pelistiyɑ̀ mɑ ɑ́lidhɑ kì Timnɑ̀, nyömmu en yɑn.”
Aköbbii yi wïye geki meye kinni, “Bong dhɑjø kì kelli nyigi wɑddee, wɑlɑ̀ kì kelli nyigi tyëng pödhee bënn, ɑ pere tiir kedhi be nywöm ki nyɑɑr Pelistiyɑ̀ tyëng-ɑ pɑ nyi ngøl?”
De Cimcön wïye ɑ́köbbe kinni, “Nyömmu en yɑn, bɑ en e kete ɑ dir yɑn.”

Wïye geki meye ɑ́bëëd ge kwïj wøw kinni møgɑni kɑ̈ɑ̈l-ɑ yï Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, kinni o bëëde ɑ́ møg-ɑ ócwɑ̈ɑ̈g tyëng Pelistiyɑ̀ geki tyëng Isrɑil, mɑ́ Isrɑil ɑ́bëëd e jɑɑg-ɑ yi Pelistiyɑ̀ kì bøli kenyɑni.
Akedhi Cimcön Timnɑ̀ geki wïye kí meye. Keny-ɑ ɑ́wɑ̈dhi gen ri bɑ̈ggi oløg, kɑ ngur ówöb lïnge e óngɑ̈rrø.
Ajwɑn tegi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j bëën köme, kɑ ngur pyëëde ki cingge keti gen, ɑ́ bud ɑ́ryew, e ce pyëëd-ɑ nyɑ ónywøg. De wïye geki meye nuti köbbø yi en ki gïn-ɑ ɑ́gwøge.
Akedhi Cimcön yï nyɑnɑni kɑ ge okööbø, ɑyïëëy Cimcön yi en.
Kɑ ódwöögø kì bɑng cyɑ̈ng e bï-ɑ be nywømi nyɑnɑni. Kɑ kej ngur men-ɑ ɑ́nɑ̈ge lyeewe, kɑ ongɑ̈ngø kɑ ɑ́yode kïc geki møøw kïc kì yij kwɑ̈ɑ̈l ngur.

Kɑ kɑ̈n-ɑ wɑ̈g ki møøw kïc ki cinge, kɑ ókedhø e ocyɑ̈mø. Keny-ɑ ɑ́pïïde wïye geki meye, ɑnënge gïn ki møøw kïc, kɑ gø cɑm gen. De ge nuti köbbø yi Cimcön kinni, bɑ ri kwɑ̈ɑ̈l ngur ɑ ɑ́kɑ̈ɑ̈le møøw kïc menɑni.
Akedhi wïye gøl nyɑnɑni, kɑ Cimcön ogöögø ki ryëj men-ɑ nyi gwøg yi yɑɑg-ɑ wøbb.
Keny-ɑ ɑ́lidhii yi tyëng Pelistiyɑ̀, ɑödi gen yïe ki yɑɑg-ɑ wøbb pyɑ̈r ɑ́dɑ̈g møg bëëdø kì bute.

Aköbbi gen yi Cimcön kinni, “Wiy wu nëngi yi yɑn ki wïjkyeny men-ɑ óbɑgii yi wun, cyɑ̈nggi nywöm gɑ ɑ́bïryew nuti thumø. Keløg e óbɑg yi wun, wu ónëngɑ ki ógudh-ɑ yöm pyɑ̈r ɑ́dɑ̈g, kí møg-ɑ nyi wiil gen.
De keløg e pɑ bɑg yi wun, yɑ ceg kɑ nëngø yi wun ki ógudh-ɑ yöm pyɑ̈r ɑ́dɑ̈g, kí møg-ɑ ówiil gen.”
Akööb gen kinni, “Köbbí wøn wïjkyenyí.”
Akööb Cimcön kinni,
“Ri gïn nyi cyɑ̈mø ɑ́bëën yi gïncɑm;
ri gïn teg ɑ́bëën yi gïn lwïy.”
Kɑ ge ómɑ̈gø ki cyɑ̈ng ɑ́dɑ̈g e wïjkyenyɑni dhɑ̈li bɑgø yi gen.

Kì ngween cyɑ̈ng, ɑbëën gen yï cï Cimcön, kɑ gø köbbi gen kinni, “Thɑbbí jɑlgølí, o wø nyudhe wïjkyenye. Keløg yï óbɑ̈nyø, gøl wïyí rɑ̈ɑ̈b wø’ kömi wun. Wø ɑ́ryej yi wun kɑ per kinni o jɑmmi wøn kwɑny yi wun? Pɑ cuggi.”
Akedhi cï Cimcön yïe kɑ óywöngø kì bøle e okööbø kinni, “Yɑ mɑɑn yi yïn ceth kidyër, yɑ pɑ mɑɑr yi yïn. Wɑ̈ddi pödhi wøn ɑ́nëngi yi yïn ki wïjkyeny, o men-ɑ́ yɑn, yɑ nuti nyudhø yi yïn.”
Aköbbe gøn kinni, “Men-ɑ́ wïyɑ geki meyɑ nuti nyudhø yi yɑn. Yïde ɑ köbbɑ yïn?”
Atyëge cyɑ̈ng ɑ́bïryew bënn mø ryëj e óywöngø. Kɑ wïjkyenyɑni köbbii yi Cimcön kì bïryeew cyɑ̈ng, mɑ́ kööre ɑ́buudh yi nyɑnɑni. Kɑ tyëng pödhi gen köbbe wïjkyenyɑni.
Codhe, kì bïryeew cyɑ̈ng, ɑbëën yɑɑgɑni e Cimcön nuti kedhi øn-ɑ nyi buude, kɑ gø köbbi gen kinni,
“Á gïn ɑ lod møøw kïc ki lwïyø?
Á gïn ɑ lod ngur ki tegø?”
Alöggi Cimcön kinni,
“Keløg wu pɑ di köbb-ɑ yi røjø miɑ,
wïjkyenyɑ pɑ di bɑg yi wun.”
Kɑ wëyi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j bï-ɑ köme, kɑ ogöögø ki me teeg, ɑkedhe Ackelön kɑ ónɑ̈ggø ki ji pyɑ̈r ɑ́dɑ̈g, kɑ ógudhi gen lunye wɑ̈g, ɑmuuje gïn yɑɑg-ɑ ɑ́bɑg wïjkyenye. Codhe, ɑkedhe pɑc pyëwe rɑɑj.
Kɑ cyëge mëggi nyel-ɑ ɑ́bëëd ɑ́ mɑ̈dhe kì cyɑ̈ɑ̈ng nywöme.
Kì bɑng keny megø, kì bøli keny-ɑ nyi nyɑɑr gemè, ɑ ɑ́kɑ̈bbi Cimcön ki nyɑ ónywøg, kɑ kedh-ɑ be këëmi cyëge. Aköbbe wïyi cyëge kinni, “Yɑ dwɑdd-ɑ kedhi ød wøki cyëgɑ.”
De jɑlɑni, Cimcön nuti wiy en, o kedhe ød.
Kɑ Cimcön köbbe kinni, “Yɑ ɑ́ceg-ɑ rumø kinni nyɑnɑni mɑɑn yi yïn, ɑmëggɑ en mɑ̈dhí. Nyimen nyɑn-ɑ thinh bëëd ɑ dï, pɑ myëër kibøle? Kwɑɑny ɑ́ keje.”
Kɑ Cimcön okööbø kinni, “Wɑngtïn bong gïn-ɑ ócɑ̈yyi yɑn yi tyëng Pelistiyɑ̀ keny-ɑ ógöggɑ gen ki gïnrɑj.”
Codhe ɑkedhe, kɑ ómɑ̈gø ki ógwøgg miy ɑ́dɑ̈g, ɑgööge ki redhhì, kɑ yëbbi ógwøgg ɑ́ryew nyi twööje kej ɑ́kyel, kɑ redhø nyi twööje ri gen.
Kɑ mɑc gweele ri redhhì, kɑ ógwøgg wiye rengi gen yethi pwödhhi tyëng Pelistiyɑ̀, ɑrɑ̈b gen byell-ɑ rumø kɑjø, kí møg-ɑ nudd ge ócungø, kí bɑ̈ggi oløg geki yenh dhetun.

Apëjji tyëng Pelistiyɑ̀ kinni, “Á men ɑ ɑ́gwøg gïn ni men?” Aköbbi gen kinni, “Bɑ Cimcön, øri jɑl Timnɑ̀, kipe kɑ ɑ́mëgge cï Cimcön mɑ̈ɑ̈dh Cimcön.” Akedh tyëng Pelistiyɑ̀ kɑ nyɑnɑni geki wïye rɑ̈b yi gen ki mɑc.
Aköbbi gen yi Cimcön kinni, “Keløg wu göög ɑ nøw! Yɑ pɑ wïyi gïti keny-ɑ ócolɑ kejɑ.”
Anyïɑ̈gge ki nyɑɑg me teg ki gen, kɑ ónɑ̈gø ki ji mø gïïr kì kelli gen. Kɑ kedh-ɑ be bëëdø kì órøngi Kïti Atɑm.
Abëën tyëng Pelistiyɑ̀ kɑ ge ogudø kì Yeudiyɑ̀, kɑ ge pɑ̈ɑ̈r-ɑ kömi kɑɑl Lekì.
Apyëëj gen yi jø Yeudiyɑ̀ kinni, “Wude ɑ bëënu be nyɑɑg ki wøn?”
Alöggi gen kinni, “Wø ɑ́bï-ɑ be dwɑ̈ɑ̈yi Cimcön, o kɑ̈l yi wøn ɑ́ ɑmɑg, o göggi yi wøn gïn-ɑ ɑ́gögge wøn.”
Kɑ jø Yeudiyɑ̀ mø kwɑnni gen bɑ ɑ́lïp ɑ́dɑ̈g kedh-ɑ mɑl yij órøngi Kïti Atɑm, kɑ Cimcön köbbi gen kinni, “Ngɑ̈nyi yi yïn kinni wɑ jɑɑg-ɑ yi tyëng Pelistiyɑ̀, yïde ɑ göggí wøn ki gïn ni men?”
Alögge kinni, “Ge ɑ́göggɑ’ gïn-ɑ ɑ́göggi yɑn yi gen.”
Aköbbii yi gen kinni, “Wø ɑ́bï-ɑ be twöji yïn o yï mëggi gen yi wøn.”
Akööb Cimcön kinni, “Köngi wun kinni yɑ pɑ nɑ̈g yi wun.”
Alöggi gen kinni, “Pɑth, yï pɑ nɑ̈g yi wøn de yï ótwöj yi wøn yøw, kɑ yï cïb wøn cinggi gen.” Codhe, ɑtwöjii yi gen ki thøll ɑ́ryew mø nyɑ̈n kɑ gø kɑ̈ɑ̈l gen wɑ̈g kì yij órøngi kït.
Keny-ɑ ɑ́wɑ̈nhe Lekì, ɑbëën tyëng Pelistiyɑ̀ yïe ge óryeerø kipere. Ajwɑn wëyi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j bëën köme kɑ ótëngø, ɑcödde thøll-ɑ ótwöjii kì bɑ̈dde geki cingge e dhɑ̈y ge nɑ kor mø rɑ̈bbø.
Kɑ óyïddø ki lëmi ɑderø me cer thøø. Akuunge piny kɑ gø kwɑnye, kɑ ji ɑ́lïp nɑ̈ge ki gøn.
Codhe, ɑwör Cimcön kinni,
“Yɑ ɑ́nɑ̈gi ki ji ɑ́lïp ki lëmi ɑderø,
kɑ ge röörɑ piny gɑ börr.”
Keny-ɑ ɑ́rume wör, ɑleenge lëmi ɑderø piny kì kenyɑni, bene ɑ cwølli kenyɑni ɑ́ Rɑmɑth Lekì.
Amɑgii yi röödhø, kɑ Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j cwøle kinni, “Tyɑ̈mø men-ɑ dwøng cɑrø èn, ɑ́cïb-ɑ yi yïn cingi bɑ̈ngí, yɑ ceg kɑ nɑ̈gø yi röödhø o yɑ pɑ̈dh-ɑ cinggi tyëng-ɑ nuti ngølø?”
Kɑ keny megø yieb yi Jwøk kì piny kì Lekì, ɑbëën pï wɑ̈g. Amɑ̈dhi Cimcön kɑ dële ókwöjø. Codhe ɑcɑɑg wɑngɑni ɑ́ Akor,
Ajɑɑg Isrɑil yi Cimcön ki runn pyɑ̈r ɑ́ryew ɑ́ tyëng Pelistiyɑ̀ ɑ mïdhi pödhø.
Akedhi Cimcön Gɑdhɑ̀, kɑ ólïdhø ki ngɑn nyi niin ki köögi kì kunɑni, ɑkedhe ød ki gøn.

Ayood pere yi tyëng Gɑdhɑ̀ kinni nud kì kɑɑlɑni, ɑcøng gen ri gen kej ɑ́kyel, kɑ kenyɑni tyeg gen. Akor gen dhø döri kɑɑl kì wɑ̈r bëne, ge okudø, kɑ ge nyii möngø kinni, “Yïd wɑ gïti keny-ɑ ótɑ̈ri piny, o nɑ̈g yi wɑ.”
De Cimcön nuti wɑ̈dhi mwøl kì kenyɑni, ɑ́dhwödh kì dïwɑ̈r, kɑ thïgi döri kɑɑl mɑge, kí rïwwe gɑ ɑ́ryew, kɑ gï puthe wɑ̈g, ɑkɑ̈ɑ̈le gïn ki winni gen bënn. Kɑ gï byeele mɑl wïj kït men-ɑ buti Kibrön.
Codhe, ɑmɑɑre ngɑndhɑjø me cwøl ɑ́ Delïlɑ̀, me bëëdø kì Töör Sörek.

Akedhi rɑ̈nhi Pelistiyɑ̀ yï ngɑnɑni, kɑ köbbi yi gen kinni, “Thɑb Cimcön, o yï köbbe gïn-ɑ mëggii teng-ɑ dwøng cɑrø, kí gïn-ɑ cuggi göggii o nyönhe, o twöj yi wɑ. Yï ónëngi yi wøn bënn ki ngyëny ɑ́tegg, e dhɑnhø ɑ́kyel muuj-ɑ ɑ́lïp kí miyø.”
Codhe, kɑ Cimcön köbbi yi Delïlɑ̀ kinni, “Köbbí yɑn, ɑ́ gïn ɑ mëggi yïn teng-ɑ dwøng cɑrø? Keløg dhɑnhø dwɑdd-ɑ twöji yïn o yï nyönhí, ɑ́ ngø ógwøg yi en?”
Aköbbii yi Cimcön, “Keløg yɑ otwöjø ki pujji weth ɑ́bïryew møg-ɑ nyɑ̈n ge nuti thwøwø, yɑ ceg-ɑ gwøg yɑ nyøødh ni dhɑnhø yøw.”
Codhe, ɑkɑ̈ni rɑ̈nhi Pelistiyɑ̀ ki pujji weth ɑ́bïryew mø nyɑ̈n ge nuti thwøwø kɑ gï muuj gen Delïlɑ̀, ɑtwöje Cimcön.

Ádɑ jøg møøgø mø lïïbø, o ge pɑ̈n-ɑ øn-ɑ kyeelø, ɑryeere kinni, “Cimcön! Tyëng Pelistiyɑ̀ ɑ́bï kömí!” De Cimcön pujji weth ɑ́cödde, ni kenyi ngølli kor yi mɑc. Codhe, ɑcög gïn-ɑ mëggii teng-ɑ dwøng nuti yodø yi gen.
Aköbbi Cimcön yi Delïlɑ̀ kinni, “Yïde ɑ tuug yɑn, kɑ yɑ köbbí kwøbbi pyed? Köbbí yɑn ɑnɑn, yï cuggi twöjø kɑ ngø?”
Aköbbii yi en kinni, “Keløg yɑ otwöjø ki thøll møg-ɑ nyɑ̈n, ɑ nuti pɑ̈nyø ki twöj, yɑ ceg-ɑ gwøg yɑ nyøødh ni dhɑnhø yøw.”
Codhe, ɑkɑ̈ni Delïlɑ̀ ki thøll mø nyɑ̈n, kɑ twöj yi en ki gïn, jøg-ɑ lïïbø nud kì øn-ɑ kyeelø. Aryeere kinni, “Cimcön! Tyëng Pelistiyɑ̀ ɑ́bï kömí!” De Cimcön thøll ɑ́cödde kì bɑ̈dde de ce cödd-ɑ kor.
Aköbbii yi Delïlɑ̀ kinni, “Yɑ nudd yɑ ceg kɑ tugø yi yïn, yïde ɑ pɑ köbbí yɑn gïn-ɑ bɑ dyër. Köbbí yɑn gïn-ɑ cuggi twöji yïn.”
Alögge kinni, “Keløg ɑkɑ̈ddi yëyyɑ ɑ́bïryew ódøg yi yïn kej ɑ́kyel, kɑ ge mɑɑg ri loodh lɑ̈nhi korø, kɑ gur piny ki pijø, yɑ ceg-ɑ gwøg yɑ nyøødh ni dhɑnhø yøw.”

Codhe, kɑ thɑb yi Delïlɑ̀, ɑnene. Kɑ ɑkɑ̈ddi yëyye ɑ́bïryew døge ri loodh lɑ̈nhi korø, kɑ gø gure piny ki pijø. Aryeere kinni, “Cimcön! Tyëng Pelistiyɑ̀ ɑ́bï kömí!” Acyëwe, kɑ yëyye tëële wɑ̈g kì ri pijø,
Kɑ köbbi yi en kinni, “Yï ókööbø kinni yɑ mɑɑr yi yïn kidï, keløg yɑ pɑ gɑ̈n yi yïn? Ágöög ki tyel ɑ́dɑ̈g yi men, yɑ pɑ nyudhí gïn-ɑ mëggi yïn teng-ɑ dwøng cɑrø.”
Kɑ nyi pyënyi yi en yethi cyɑ̈ng e okøørø yi en. Anyönhi pyëwe yi køørɑni.
Kì cyɑ̈n cyee, ɑköbbii yi en ki dyër kinni, “Yëyyɑ nuti pɑ̈nyø lyelø, mɑ́ yɑ bɑ ɑthyeey Jwøk kër-ɑ ɑ́nywøøl yɑn. Keløg yëyyɑ olyelø, tegø men-ɑ riɑ ceg-ɑ kedhø, kɑ yɑ ogöögø yɑ nyøødh ni dhɑnhø yøw.”
Keny-ɑ ɑ́lidhii yi Delïlɑ̀ kinni møg-ɑ pyëwe ɑ́kwøbe bënn, ɑöde yï rɑ̈nhi Pelistiyɑ̀ kinni, “Bïu cyee, mɑ́ yɑ ɑ́köbbe møg-ɑ pyëwe bënn.” Abëën rɑ̈nhi Pelistiyɑ̀ yïe ki ngyëny kì cinggi gen.
Kɑ Cimcön thɑb yi Delïlɑ̀, ɑnene wïje thɑ̈ɑ̈nh en kömi tyelli nyɑnɑni. Acwödde ki jɑl me lyëël ɑkɑ̈ddi yëyye wɑ̈g gɑ ɑ́bïryew kì wïje. Alɑ̈ɑ̈ny tege kɑ ónyönhø.
Codhe, ɑryeer Delïlɑ̀ kinni, “Cimcön! Tyëng Pelistiyɑ̀ ɑ́bï kömí!” Acyëwe, e orumø i nɑ cyɑ̈ɑ̈ng. De kwïj yi en kinni ówiy piny yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j.
Amɑgii yi tyëng Pelistiyɑ̀, kɑ nyinge lööl wɑ̈g, ɑkïdhii Gɑdhɑ̀, kɑ twöj ki ɑ́cwecwelli dilɑl. Amëggii gwøøg gur ki byel kì ød mɑg.
De yëyyi wïje ɑ́kedh ge ócɑ̈gø ki twïyø, kì bɑng kɑ ɑ́rum gen ki lyelø.
Acugi rɑ̈nhi Pelistiyɑ̀ kipe tugø, kí nëngi Dɑgön jwøøg gen ki gëdhh-ɑ døngø, ge owörø kinni, “Jwøgee wɑ ɑ́thödhe ki tegø men-ɑ ɑ́tyɑm wɑ Cimcön ngetimɑ̈ɑ̈nø.”
Keny-ɑ ɑ́lidhii yi teenɑni, ɑmɑlli gen jwøøg gen ge okööbø kinni, “Jwøgee ngetimɑ̈ɑ̈nø ɑ́cïbe cinggee, eni ngetimɑ̈ɑ̈nø men-ɑ ɑ́ryɑ̈g pödhee, kɑ ónɑ̈gø kì kellee ki ji mø gïïr.”
Keny-ɑ ɑ́mïni pëthi gen, ɑkööb gen kinni, “Kɑ̈ɑ̈lu Cimcön keny, o cönge kì bølee.” Codhe, kɑ Cimcön pëëj kì ød mɑg, kɑ ocöngø kì bøli gen.
Keny-ɑ ɑ́cuungii kì kɑɑm mënhhì, ɑköbbe nyelthinh men-ɑ ɑ́pyejjii kì cinge kinni, “Cïb yɑn keny-ɑ di mënhh-ɑ mïdhi kengø, o ge nywɑlɑ, o riɑ jyɑ̈ɑ̈ngɑ ri gen.”

Yij kengø ɑ́bëëd e pɑ̈ng yi dhɑnhø bëne, jøg-ɑ cwøw kí tyëng-ɑ mɑ̈nn. Rɑ̈nhi Pelistiyɑ̀ bënn gɑ ɑ́bïj ɑ́bëëd ge nud kì kenyɑni, wïj óthɑɑng kengø mɑl ɑ́dɑ ji mø kwɑnni gen bɑ ɑ́lïp ɑ́dɑ̈g, jøg-ɑ cwøw kí tyëng-ɑ mɑ̈nn, ge nenn-ɑ Cimcön kɑ̀ cöönge.
Kɑ Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kwɑjji yi Cimcön kinni, “Wuö Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, pɑr yɑn, yïn ɑ Jwøk, yɑ kwɑjj-ɑ yïn, thödhí yɑn ki tegø tyelø ɑ́kyel yøw, o kej nyingɑ colɑ ki tyëng Pelistiyɑ̀.”
Amɑge mënhì ɑ́ryew møg-ɑ dïkengø, ɑ ri gen cungi yi kengø, ɑ́kyel ɑ́mɑge ki cingi kyëje, kɑ men-ɑ kyeelø mɑge ki cingi cɑɑme, ɑdhure gïn,

kɑ óryeerø kinni, “Wiy yɑ thøwɑ wøki tyëng Pelistiyɑ̀!” Kɑ gï dhure ki tege bëne, kɑ kengø pɑ̈dh-ɑ kömi rɑ̈nhi Pelistiyɑ̀ geki ji bënn møg-ɑ ɑ́ying yije. Ji-ɑ ɑ́nɑ̈g yi Cimcön kì ri thøwe gïïr kibøli møg-ɑ ɑ́nɑ̈g yi en keny-ɑ ɑ́bëëde e onëënø.
Abëën nyiimen geki tyëng gøl gen, ɑkɑ̈l ge gøn, kɑ gø kony gen kì kɑɑm Dhorɑ̀ geki Ectɑol kì buti röri wïye Mɑnowɑ̀. Isrɑil ɑ́jɑɑg yi en kɑ runn pyɑ̈r ɑ́ryew.
Ádɑ jɑl megø me cwøl ɑ́ Miikɑ̀, jɑlɑni ɑ́bëëd ɑ myërri kïtti Eprɑim.

Kɑ meye köbbe kinni, “Átuggi ɑ́tegg møgí gɑ miyø kí pyɑ̈rø wïdɑ́kyel møg-ɑ ɑ́kwɑl kì yïí, kɑ yï olɑ̈mø, kinni ngɑn-ɑ kwɑɑl gen óyïddi ki cyën, yɑ ɑ́bëëd yɑ olïngø keny-ɑ ɑ́lɑ̈ɑ̈m. Yɑn ɑ ɑ́kwɑny gen, ge nud kì yïɑ!”
Akööb meye kinni, “Yï ógyëdh yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, wɑ̈dɑ!”

Adögge ɑ́teggɑni meye, kɑ meye okööbø kinni, “Áteggɑni bënn ɑ́thyëyɑ Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, kipe kinni o cyënnɑni cög ge pɑ pɑ̈dhi kömi wɑ̈dɑ. Ógöög ki ngïji mɑ yɑdh, o mwøn ki ɑ́tegø. De ɑnɑn ɑ́tuggi ɑ́teggɑni döggɑ’ yïn.”
Kɑ gï dögge meye. Akɑ̈bbi meye ki ɑ́tuggi ɑ́tegg miy ɑ́ryew, kɑ gï mëgge bødhø, kɑ ogöögø ki ngïji mɑ yɑdh, ɑmwønii ki ɑ́tegø. Acïbii ød kì gøl Miikɑ̀.
Miikɑ̀, yïe ɑ́dɑ ød Jwøk. Kɑ ogöögø ki ngïjji geki pɑri kwër, kɑ ɑ́kyel kì kelli wɑ̈dde gwøge ɑ́ ókwërø.
Ábëëd e bong rɑ̈dh kì Isrɑil kì bøli kenyɑni, dhɑnhø bëne ɑ́göög-ɑ wïje ni kɑ̀ dwɑdde gøn.
Kì bøli kenyɑni, ɑ́dɑ nyelɑwøb me bɑ Kwɑɑr Leebì, me bëëdø kì Betleem kì Yeudiyɑ̀.
Adhwödh nyelɑni kì Betleem, kɑ kedh-ɑ be yɑb ki kej bëëdø megø. Kɑ töng-ɑ gøl Miikɑ̀ kì myërri kïtti Eprɑim.
Apyëjii yi Miikɑ̀ kinni, “Yï kɑ̈ɑ̈l-ɑ kun?”
Alögge kinni, “Yɑ bɑ wɑ̈d gøl Leebì kì Betleem kì Yeudiyɑ̀, yɑ ceg-ɑ yɑb ki kej bëëdø.”
Aköbbii yi Miikɑ̀ kinni, “Bëëd kì butɑ, o yɑ nyi cïj yi yïn, o yï bëëd yïn ɑ́ ókwërɑ, o yï nyi thödhɑ ki ngyëny ɑ́tegg pyɑ̈rø kì yij run, kí ógudh geki gïgcɑmmí.”
Ayïëy wɑ̈d gøl Leebì menɑni ki bëëdø kì buti Miikɑ̀, kɑ ogöögø e nɑ dhɑnhø ɑ́kyel kì kelli wɑ̈dde.
Akwëër wɑ̈d gøl Leebì yi Miikɑ̀, kɑ ogöögø ki ókwërø kipere, ɑbëëde kì gøl Miikɑ̀.
Akööb Miikɑ̀ kinni, “Anɑn Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j yɑ ɑ́gögge ki gïndøj, mɑ́ ókwërɑ bɑ wɑ̈d gøl Leebì.”
Kì bøli kenyɑni, ɑ́bëëd e bong rɑ̈dh kì Isrɑil. Tyëng gøl Dɑn, ɑ́bëëd kì kenyɑni ge oyɑ̈bø ki piny me yije pëggi yi gen, mɑ́ yï gen ɑ́bong-ɑ piny mɑ ɑ́yod yi gen ni kɑ̈lli Isrɑil møg-ɑ kyeelø.

Aödi gøl Dɑn wɑ̈g ki jøg ɑ́bïj møg-ɑ teg kì dhøggi kɑ̈lli gen bënn kì Dhorɑ̀ geki Ectɑol, kipe kinni o ge kedhi gen be lyewwi piny. Aköbbi jøgɑni kinni, “Kedh wun, lyeewu piny!” Keny-ɑ ɑ́kedh gen, ɑwɑ̈dhi gen myërri kïtti Eprɑim ɑpëggi gen gøl Miikɑ̀.
Keny-ɑ ɑ́ying gen kenyɑni, ɑngij gen nyelɑwøb men-ɑ bɑ Kwɑɑr Leebì kì ri kwøbbe. Apyëjii yi gen kinni, “Á men ɑ ɑ́kɑ̈ɑ̈l yïn keny? Á gïn ɑ gwøg yi yïn kì keny?”
Alögge kinni, “Yɑ ɑ́kïr yi Miikɑ̀ ki ngyëny o yɑ bëëdɑ yɑn ɑ́ ókwëre.”
Aköbbii yi gen kinni, “Døj, pyëj Jwøk o yod yi wøn, men-ɑ óyod wøn gïn-ɑ pere cɑɑdh yi wøn.”
Alöggi ókwërø kinni, “Kedh wun ki mër, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j ócyɑ̈dhø kì bøli wun.”

Codhe, ɑdhwödh jøgɑni gɑ ɑ́bïj, kɑ ge kedh-ɑ Lɑic. Alidh gen ji-ɑ bëëdø kì kunɑni kinni ge bëëdø wɑ̈thi gen kïïdhø, ni bëën-ɑ ɑ́bëëd yi tyëng Sïdön. Ge bɑ tyëngmër; ji mø ngɑ̈ny bëëdø, yï gen bong wëërø ki ngɑn megø. Yï gen dɑ jɑmmì bënn møg-ɑ dwɑddi kipe bëëdi gen. Ge bëëd ge lɑ̈wi ki tyëng Sïdön. Bong gïjø me reb gen ki ji møøgø.
Keny-ɑ ɑ́dwöög jøg ɑ́bïj Dhorɑ̀ geki Ectɑol, ɑpyëëj gen yi tyëng pödhi gen kinni, “Wu ɑ́yod-ɑ ngø?”
Alöggi gen kinni, “Bïu, kedhi wɑ be pɑ̈ɑ̈r kömi Lɑic! Piny ɑ́rum ki lidhø yi wøn kinni døøj cɑrø. Wu ko wɑ̈dhi bëëdø yøw! Pyew wun, kedhu be kwɑnyi pinyɑni.
Keny-ɑ ówɑ̈dhi wun kunɑni, ji óyuud yi wun wɑ̈thi gen kïïdhø. Bɑ pödhø me dwøng; me bong gïn cɑn kì yije.”
Codhe, kɑ jøliny miy ɑ́bïkyel kì gøl Dɑn, kì Dhorɑ̀ geki Ectɑol kedh-ɑ be nyɑɑg.
Agur gen kemmi gen piny kì kö yöö kì buti Kiriɑt Yeɑrïm kì Yeudiyɑ̀. Bene ɑ pere cwølli kenyɑni ɑ́ Dɑn gïti dicyɑ̈ngtïn.
Apöödh gen ge wɑ̈dh-ɑ gøl Miikɑ̀, kì myërri kïtti Eprɑim.

Kɑ jøg-ɑ bɑ ɑ́bïj møg-ɑ ɑ́kedhi be lyeewi piny Lɑic, nyiimï gen köbbi gen kinni, “Ngɑ̈nyi yi wun kinni dɑ ød ɑ́kyel kì kelli udd-ɑcɑ̀ me yije di ngïji yɑdh men-ɑ ómwønø ki ɑ́tegø? Thyew dɑ ngïjjì møøgø kí pɑri kwër. Á ngø ɑ ceg ki gwøgø yi wɑ?”
Kɑ ri gen løg gen ge töng-ɑ gøl Miikɑ̀ keny-ɑ yije bëëd yi nyelɑwøb men-ɑ bɑ Kwɑɑr Leebì, kɑ mɑ̈dh gen ki mër.
Kɑ jøliny miy ɑ́bïkyel, jø gøl Dɑn ócungø ki jɑmmi nyɑɑg mø gen kì dhøg kɑl.
Akedhi jøg-ɑ bɑ ɑ́bïj møg-ɑ ɑ́lyeew piny ød, kɑ ngïjji yɑdh men-ɑ ómwønø ki ɑ́tegø, kí ngïjji jwögg-ɑ kyeelø kwɑny yi gen, kí pɑri kwër, e ókwërø geki jøliny miy ɑ́bïkyel, ge ócungø kì dhøg kɑl.
Keny-ɑ ɑ́kedhi jøgɑni ød Miikɑ̀, kɑ jɑmmi kwër kwɑny gen, kɑ ge ɑ́pyëj yi ókwërø kinni, “Á gïn ɑ gwøg yi wun ni men?”

Alöggi gen kinni, “Kud! Mij dhøgí, yï ko pɑ̈nyi kwøb. Bïí kedh wɑ, o yï bëëd yïn ɑ́ ókwëri wøn, o wø nyi cïj yi yïn. Pɑ lɑ̈w keløg yï di gögg-ɑ kɑl ɑ́kyel kì kelli kɑ̈lli Isrɑil yïn ɑ́ ókwërø, kibøli bëëdí yïn ɑ́ ókwëri dhɑnhø ɑ́kyel?”
Kɑ ókwërø pyëwe ómïnø. Akwɑnye jɑmmi kwër kɑ ókedhø ki gen.
Aløg gen ri gen, kɑ ge ókedhø kí nyigi gen, kí jɑmmi gen, kí dhögi gen ge okwøllø kì bøli gen.
Keny-ɑ ɑ́wɑ̈dhi gen kun me lɑ̈wi ki gøl Miikɑ̀, kɑ jøg-ɑ myërr-ɑ buti gøl Miikɑ̀ ri gen cwøøl gen kej ɑ́kyel, kɑ ge reng-ɑ bɑng jø gøl Dɑn.
Aryeer gen ge ócwöddø kì bɑng gen, ɑlug jø gøl Dɑn ri gen, kɑ Miikɑ̀ pyëj gen kinni, “Yɑy men ɑ́ mi ngø?”
Alöggi Miikɑ̀ kinni, “Jwögg-ɑ ɑ́gwøgɑ ɑ́kwɑny yi wun, kí ókwërɑ, kɑ wu ókedhø! Á gïn ɑ ɑ́döng kì yïɑ?”
De jø gøl Dɑn ɑ́löggi kinni, “Yï ko cigi ryeerø këti, kipe ji-ɑ pëthi gen kej ótöngi rií, kɑ wëyí kí wëyi tyëng gølí bënn lɑ̈ɑ̈ny yi gen.”
Codhe, ɑkedh jø gøl Dɑn kì wɑ̈yi gen, kɑ Miikɑ̀ dwöög-ɑ pɑc keny-ɑ ɑ́lidhe gïn kinni ge teg kibøle.
Kì bɑng kɑ ɑ́rum jwøøg Miikɑ̀ ki kwɑnyø yi jø gøl Dɑn, ɑpödhi gen kömi tyëng Lɑic, ji møg-ɑ lebbi gen bong orøg, ɑ kwïj pyed. Anɑ̈g gen ji, kɑ kɑɑl rɑ̈b gen.

Ge nuti yielø, mɑ́ ge bëëdø ge lɑ̈wi ki tyëng Sïdön, o kɑɑm gen bong gïjø me reb gen ki dhɑnhø megø, mɑ́ ge ying-ɑ yij tör kì Betreköb. Kɑ kɑɑlɑni døøg ki gerø yi tyëng gøl Dɑn, kɑ ge pëgg-ɑ piny kì kunɑni.
Kɑ kɑɑlɑni cɑg yi gen ki nyingi kweyi gen Dɑn, ɑ bɑ wɑ̈d Yɑgob. Kɑɑlɑni ɑ́bëëd cøn e cwøl ɑ́ Lɑic.
Kɑ ngïji cïb piny yi gøl Dɑn, kɑ nyi mɑlli gen, kɑ Yönɑthɑn wɑ̈d Gercöm wɑ̈d Mosɑ̀ ogöögø ɑ ókwëri gøl Dɑn, kɑ kwɑrre ogöögø gɑ ókwër gïti bøli keny-ɑ ɑ́kïdhi ji yïnø.
Abëëd ngïji men-ɑ ɑ́gwøg yi Miikɑ̀ ki kɑɑmɑni bëne, de kemi Jwøk ɑ́cung ɑ Cilø.
Kì bøli keny-ɑ ɑ́bëëd e bong rɑ̈dh kì Isrɑil, ɑ́dɑ jɑl megø mɑ Kwɑɑr Leebì mɑ ɑ́bëëd kì ngɑ̈thi myërri kïtti Eprɑim. Kɑ ókɑ̈bbø ki dhɑjø kì Betleem kì myërri Yeudiyɑ̀,
de nyɑnɑni pyëwe ɑ́rënyi ki en, ɑdhwödhe kɑ kedh-ɑ gøl wïye kì Betleem, kɑ obëëdø kì kunɑni ki dwɑ̈tt ɑ́ngwen.
Adhwödh jɑlgøle kɑ kedh-ɑ bɑnge be lugii, kinni o dwööge yïe. Ákedh geki bɑ̈nge ki ɑderr ɑ́ryew. Kɑ ge kïdhi ød yi nyɑnɑni kì gøl wïye. Keny-ɑ ɑ́bëën wïyi nyɑnɑni, ɑmɑ̈dhii kidøøj yi wïyi nyɑnɑni.
Ajogii yi wïyi cyëge kɑ obëëdø ki cyɑ̈ng ɑ́dɑ̈g. Ge ɑ́bëëd, o ge ocyɑ̈mø.
Kɑ jwɑn-ɑ dhwödhø kì mwøl ceth kì ngween cyɑ̈ng, e dwɑdd-ɑ kedhø. De ɑ́köbbi yi wïyi cyëge kinni, “Cyɑ̈ɑ̈m wun møti ki gïncɑm men mɑg wun pëthi wun, o wu ókedh wun cyee.”
Codhe, ɑpëggi jøgɑni piny gɑ ɑ́ryew, ɑcyɑ̈ɑ̈m gen kɑ ge omɑ̈dhø kì kej ɑ́kyel. Kɑ köbbi yi wïyi nyɑnɑni kinni, “Buddí kì keny, kɑ ko di gïn böggi yi wun.”
Keny-ɑ ɑ́dhwödh Kwɑɑr Leebì kinni o kedhe, ɑjogii yi wïyi cyëge, ɑbëëde kɑ onenø kì wɑ̈rɑni.

Kì mwøl ceth, kì ri bïïj cyɑ̈ng, ɑcɑ̈ge ki dhwödhø kinni o di kedhe, ɑköbbii yi wïyi cyëge kinni, “Cyɑ̈ɑ̈m ki gïncɑm. Bëëd gïti keny-ɑ ówɑ̈dhi cɑ̈ng dïmɑl.” Codhe, ɑcyɑ̈ɑ̈m gen gɑ ɑ́ryew kì kej ɑ́kyel.

Keny-ɑ ɑ́dhwödh jɑlɑni kɑ cyëge kwɑnye geki bɑ̈nge, kinni o ge di kedh gen, ɑkööb wïyi cyëge kinni, “Lidh piny ɑ́göög ɑ́ böörø. Nin wun, wøw ɑ́yuudh. Mïdhu ri wun ki medi pëthi wun. Wu ódhwödh dhuki kì mwøl piny nuti tɑ̈rø, o wu kedhu pödhi wun.”
De jɑlɑni ɑ́bɑ̈nyi nïnni kɑɑlɑni, ɑdhwödhe kɑ ókedhø, ɑwɑ̈dhe bøli Yebus ɑ løg Yerusɑlem, ki ɑderre gɑ ɑ́ryew kömi gen dɑ sïrïj kí jɑmmì, kí cyëge nyɑn-ɑ bɑ ɑkwɑny.
Ge ɑ́wɑ̈dhi bøli Yebus, wøw kedh e óyuudhø, kɑ bɑ̈ng wɑ̈n köbbe kinni, “Töngi wɑ kɑɑl tyëng Yebus, o wɑ buddi wɑ gïti mwøl?”
Alöggi wɑ̈n kinni, “Wɑ pɑ töngi kɑɑl tyëngpɑth, pödhi wɑ bølee, wɑ óbuddi kì Gibeɑ̀, wɑlɑ̀ Rɑmɑ̀.”
Codhe, ɑpöödh gen, ɑbuddi cɑ̈ng ge ying-ɑ bøli Gibeɑ̀ kì myërri gøl Ben Yɑmïn.
Atöngi gen Gibeɑ̀ kinni, o ge buddi gen gïti mwøl, ɑpëggi gen ódɑ̈ri kɑɑl, de bong dhɑnhø mɑ ɑ́kïdhi gen gøle.
Kì thyënhø, ɑbëën jɑldwøng mɑ yu, e kɑ̈ɑ̈l-ɑ pwödhe. Jɑlɑni bɑ jɑl myërri kïtti Eprɑim, de ying-ɑ Gibeɑ̀, o tyëng kɑɑlɑni bɑ tyëng gøl Ben Yɑmïn.
Keny-ɑ ɑ́lidhe wëll kì ódɑ̈ri kɑɑl, ɑpëjje kinni, “Yï kedh-ɑ keny? O yï bï yï kɑ̈ɑ̈l-ɑ kun?”
Alöggi Kwɑɑr Leebì kinni, “Wø ɑ́ying-ɑ Betleem kì Yeudiyɑ̀, de ɑnɑn wø kedh-ɑ ngɑ̈thi myërri kïtti Eprɑim kun-ɑ bëëdɑ, de bong ngɑn mɑ ɑ́cwøøl wøn gøle.
Yï wøn dɑ ópun kí møgi oløg kiperɑ wøki cyëgɑ kí bɑ̈ngɑ, o dɑ luum ɑderri wøn. Bong gïn dwɑddi yi wøn, jɑldwøng.”
Aköbbi gen yi jɑldwøngɑni kinni, “Bïu gølɑ, wu ónëngi yi yɑn ki gïn-ɑ ódwɑddi yi wun. Wu pɑ cuggi buddø kì ódɑ̈ri kɑɑl kì wɑ̈r.”
Codhe, ɑkïdhe gïn gøle, kɑ ɑderri gen nënge ki lum. Keny-ɑ ɑ́rum gen ki lwøgi tyelli gen, ɑcyɑ̈ɑ̈m gen ki gïncɑm kɑ ge omɑ̈dhø.
Akedhi jɑldwøøng kɑl wɑ̈g yï gen, kɑ okööbø kinni, “Pɑth, køkødh nyiimïɑ, wu ko göög ki gïnrɑj ni men, wëlø menɑni bëëd ɑ tïbɑ. Ayɑ̈r ni men ko gwøg wun.
Lïdhi wun, nyɑrɑ èn bɑ jùr geki cyëge. Ge ókɑ̈ɑ̈lɑ wɑ̈g yï wun, o ge ócuggø göggø yi wun ki gïn-ɑ dwɑddi yi wun. De jɑɑl ko göggi wun ki ɑyɑ̈r ni menɑni.”
De kwøbbe ɑ́dhɑ̈li lïngø yi jøgɑni. Codhe, kɑ jɑlɑni ɑkwɑnye öre wɑ̈g yï jøgɑni, kɑ mød yi gen, ɑtyëg gen wɑ̈r e oniin yi gen, kɑ gø wiy gen kì bɑ̈ɑ̈rø.
Kì mwøl cɑ̈ng nuti tuulø, ɑbëën nyɑnɑni, kɑ ópɑ̈ɑ̈dhø kì dhø tëëd øn-ɑ di jɑlgøle kì gøl jɑldwøngɑni. Abuude kì kenyɑni gïti kɑ ɑ́tɑ̈ri piny.
Keny-ɑ ɑ́dhwödh jɑlgøle kì mwøl, kɑ ød yiebe kinni o di cïme yuue, ɑyode cyëge e obuddø kì dhøg ød, cingge rïïj en kì wïj tëd.
Aköbbe gøn kinni, “Dhwödhí mɑl, o wɑ kedh wɑ.” De nuti pɑ̈nyi löggø, ɑcïbe gøn kömi ɑdere, kɑ kedh-ɑ pödhi gen.
Keny-ɑ ɑ́wɑ̈dhe gøle, ɑkɑ̈bbe ki pɑlø, kɑ ɑkwɑnye ngølle ki cue bënn, ɑ́ ɑ́tug pyɑ̈rø wïdɑ́ryew. Kɑ kɑ̈lli Isrɑil, kì myërri gen gɑ pyɑ̈rø wïdɑ́ryew öde, gøl öre’ ɑ́tunge.

Kɑ tyëng-ɑ ɑ́lidhii bënn, okööbø kinni, “Gïn ni men nuti pɑ̈nyø’ lidhø, wɑlɑ̀ nuti pɑ̈nyø’ gwøgø kì Isrɑil, kër-ɑ ɑ́dhwönhi Isrɑil wɑ̈g kì Rïp.” Akööb gen kinni, “Kwøbbɑni ceg kɑ lidhø yi wɑ, dɑ́ ngø ɑ gwøg?”
Tyëng Isrɑil, ɑ́bï wɑ̈g, cɑg kì Dɑn gïti Bircebɑ̀, kí myërri Gilyɑd, ɑrëbi gen bënn, kɑ ri gen cøng gen kì bøli Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kì Midhpɑ̀.
Jɑggi wɑ̈thi kɑ̈lli Isrɑil bënn, ɑ́bëëd ge nud kì keny-ɑ ɑ́cugi jii Jwøk, ɑ́dɑ jøliny tyel mø kwɑnni gen bɑ ɑ́lïp miy ɑ́ngwen.
Alïng tyëng gøl Ben Yɑmïn, kinni tyëng Isrɑil ri gen cøng gen Midhpɑ̀.
Apëjji tyëng Isrɑil kinni, “Köbbu wøn, orøng-ɑ rɑɑj cɑrø èn, ɑ́cwöb-ɑ dï?”
Akööb Kwɑɑr Leebì, jɑlgøl nyɑn-ɑ ɑ́nɑ̈g kinni, “Yɑn wøki cyëgɑ, wø ɑ́töngi Gibeɑ̀ kì myërri Ben Yɑmïn, kinni o wø nïnni wøn yije.
Adhwönhi jø Gibeɑ̀ bɑngɑ kì wɑ̈r, ɑtyeg gen gøl-ɑ́ yije ɑ́di yɑn, ge dwɑdd-ɑ nɑ̈gi yɑn, kɑ cyëgɑ mød yi gen, kɑ othøø.
Akwɑnyɑ cyëgɑ kɑ ngøllɑ ɑ́ ɑ́tug, kɑ ɑ́tuug ɑ́kyel ör-ɑ kɑl ɑ́kyel kì kelli kɑ̈lli Isrɑil bënn gɑ pyɑ̈rø wïdɑ́ryew, kipe kinni o yod kinni, jiɑni ɑ́göög ki gïnrɑj ki mendwøng kì Isrɑil.
Anɑn, wun ɑ tyëng Isrɑil løøgu kwøbbɑni.”
Adhwödhi tyëng Isrɑil mɑl bënn, kɑ ge ólöggø ki dhøg ɑ́kyel kinni, “Bong ngɑn kedhi gøle kì kellee.
De gïn-ɑ nud, ɑ ógöggi wɑ tyëng Gibeɑ̀ bɑ kinni, wɑ ólëngø ki wél, kipe yienyi ji-ɑ ókedhi be liny.

Ji pyɑ̈rø ókwɑny yi wɑ kì ri miyø kì wɑ̈thi kɑ̈lli Isrɑil, kipe kinni o ge thödhi gen yɑy ki gïgcɑmm, o ji-ɑ kyeelø ókedhi be nyɑɑg Gibeɑ̀ ki gøl Ben Yɑmïn, o ge göggi ki gïnrɑj, kipe gïnrɑj men-ɑ ɑ́gwøg yi gen kì Isrɑil.”
Codhe, ɑcøng Isrɑil ree bëne, kɑ ge órëbø kipe nyɑɑg ki kɑɑlɑni.
Aödi tyëng Isrɑil myërri Ben Yɑmïn bëne ki ji, mø pyëj gen kinni, “Wude ɑ göög wun ki gïnrɑj ni men?
Mëggu wøn jø Gibeɑ̀ o ge nɑ̈g yi wøn, kipe kinni o gïnrɑj men-ɑ kömi Isrɑil lɑ̈ɑ̈nye.” De kwøbbi tyëng Isrɑil nuti lïngø yi tyëng gøl Ben Yɑmïn.
Codhe, kɑ tyëng gøl Ben Yɑmïn ri gen cøng gen, kì kɑ̈ddi gen, ɑbëën gen Gibeɑ̀ kipe kinni o ge nyïɑ̈ggi gen ki tyëng Isrɑil møg-ɑ kyeelø.

Ge ɑ́yïëëny kì cyɑ̈ngɑni ki jøliny mø kwɑnni gen bɑ ɑ́lïp pyɑ̈r ɑ́ryew wïdɑ́bïkyel kì kɑ̈ddi gøl Ben Yɑmïn. Tyëng Gibeɑ̀ ɑ́yïëëny thyew ki jøg mø kwɑnni gen bɑ miy ɑ́bïryew, ge bɑ cyɑ̈mm bënn. Jøgɑni pɑ nyi bɑ̈ɑ̈jø ki lelli bɑ̈ɑ̈di, gïn-ɑ bɑ̈l yi gen cɑgg ɑ́ yëyø, pɑ nyi bɑj yi gen.
Tyëng Isrɑil kì wɑ̈yi gen e gøl Ben Yɑmïn tøøk, ɑ́cung ki jøliny ɑ́lïp miy ɑ́ngwen, ge bɑ jöddi liny bënn.
Akedhi tyëng Isrɑil Betiil, kɑ Jwøk pyëj yi gen, ge okööbø kinni, “Á gøl-ɑ́ kì kelli kɑ̈lli wøn, ɑ ókwöngi ki kedhi be nyɑɑg ki tyëng gøl Ben Yɑmïn?”
Alöggi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kinni, “Gøl Yeudɑ̀ ɑ ókwöngi ki kedhø.”
Dhuki kì mwøl, ɑdhwödh tyëng Isrɑil, kɑ kɑɑl gen gur gen buti Gibeɑ̀.
Akedhi tyëng Isrɑil be nyɑɑg ki gøl Ben Yɑmïn, kɑ liny cïmmi gen ge nenn-ɑ kɑɑlɑni.
Abëën gøl Ben Yɑmïn wɑ̈g kì Gibeɑ̀, kɑ ji ɑ́lïp pyɑ̈r ɑ́ryew wïdɑ́ryew odöngø kì piny ge thøø kì kelli tyëng Isrɑil dicyɑ̈ngɑni.
Akedhi tyëng Isrɑil kej mɑ̈ddø, kɑ ge óywöngø kì bøli Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j gïti böörø. Apyëëj Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j yi gen kinni, “Kedhi wøn be nyɑɑg këti ki nyiimï wøn, gøl Ben Yɑmïn?”
Alöggi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kinni, “Kedh wun, nyïɑ̈ggi wun ki gen.”
Atëngi pëthi tyëng Isrɑil, kɑ liny gen kedh-ɑ wïj këër tyeli mɑl.
Kɑ tyëng Isrɑil liny gen kedh-ɑ be nyɑɑg ki gøl Ben Yɑmïn kì ryeew cyɑ̈ng.
Kì ryeew cyɑ̈ng menɑni, ɑdøøg liny gøl Ben Yɑmïn ki bëën wɑ̈g kì Gibeɑ̀, kɑ ge ónɑ̈ggø këti ki jii Isrɑil mø kwɑnni gen bɑ ɑ́lïp pyɑ̈rø wïdɑ́bïdɑ̈g, ge bɑ jöddi liny bënn.

Akedhi tyëng Isrɑil bënn Betiil, ɑpëggi gen be ywøg kì bøli Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, kɑ ri gen twöön gen ki gïncɑm dicyɑ̈ngɑni, gïti böörø. Anëngi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j yi gen ki gënhi mër, geki gënh-ɑ nyi rɑ̈b bëne.
Kì bøli kenyɑni, Sɑnduug Ciggi Jwøk ɑ́bëëd e ying-ɑ kenyɑni. Apyëëj Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j yi tyëng Isrɑil,
kinni, “Kedhi wøn be nyɑɑg këti ki nyiimï wøn, gøl Ben Yɑmïn, wɑlɑ̀ wø ko kedh?” Pineɑs wɑ̈d Eliɑdhɑr Kwɑɑr Aɑron, en ɑ ɑ́bëëd e bɑ ókwërø.
Alöggi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kinni, “Kedh wun! Mɑ́ dhuki kì mwøl ge ócïb yi yɑn cinggi wun.”
Codhe, kɑ jø Isrɑil ókɑ̈bbø ki jøg mø lïïbø kì tøggi Gibeɑ̀ bëne.
Akedhi tyëng Isrɑil be nyɑɑg ki gøl Ben Yɑmïn kì dɑ̈ɑ̈g cyɑ̈ng, kɑ ge ogudø ge rwöm ki Gibeɑ̀ ni tyeli mɑl.

Kɑ gøl Ben Yɑmïn bï-ɑ wɑ̈g be liny. Acɑ̈gi gen ki nɑ̈g ki jii Isrɑil ni tyeli mɑl kì yij thwørø, kí kö yuu-ɑ kedhi Betiil geki kö yuu-ɑ kyeelø men-ɑ kedhi Gibeɑ̀. Ji gïn ni pyɑ̈r ɑ́dɑ̈g ɑ́nɑ̈g yi gen kì kelli tyëng Isrɑil.
Tyëng gøl Ben Yɑmïn ɑ́bëëd ge rømm-ɑ kinni, ge ótyɑ̈mø, ni tyeli mɑl.
De tyëng Isrɑil rummi gen ɑ́reb gen kinni, “Rengi wɑ liny wɑ̈g kì buti kɑɑl, o ge pönhi gen wɑ̈g kì kɑɑl, ge rïng-ɑ́ɑ̀ bɑngee.”
Kɑ liny wøøg cyɑ̈n yi tyëng Isrɑil bënn, ɑreb liny ree kì Bɑɑl Tɑmɑr, kɑ jøg-ɑ lïïbø kì tøggi Gibeɑ̀ pönh-ɑ wɑ̈g kì kɑ̈jj-ɑ ɑ́pɑ̈ni yi gen.
Kɑ jø Isrɑil ɑ́lïp pyɑ̈rø møg-ɑ ɑ́yieny kì kelli Isrɑil bëne pɑ̈ɑ̈r-ɑ kömi Gibeɑ̀. Anyïɑ̈ggi liny ki nyɑɑg me teeg. Tyëng gøl Ben Yɑmïn ɑ́bëëd ge kwïj wøw kinni ryɑ̈g pɑ̈dhi kömi gen.

Isrɑil ɑ́thödhi ki tegø yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, kɑ gøl Ben Yɑmïn cyedde. Anɑ̈ggi tyëng Isrɑil ki ji mø kwɑnni gen bɑ ɑ́lïp pyɑ̈r ɑ́ryew wïdɑ́bïj kí miyø ɑ́kyel, kì kelli tyëng gøl Ben Yɑmïn, ge bɑ jöddi liny bënn.
Alidhii yi gøl Ben Yɑmïn kinni ge ɑ́tyɑm.
Liny Isrɑil bëne ree ɑ́wøøge cyɑ̈n kì myërri gøl Ben Yɑmïn, mɑ́ ge ɑ́bëëd ge gɑ̈nn-ɑ lïbbi gen møg-ɑ tøggi Gibeɑ̀.
Apɑ̈ɑ̈r lïbbɑni kömi Gibeɑ̀, kɑ ge jwɑn-ɑ tɑɑy kelli Gibeɑ̀, kɑ ji bënn, nɑ̈g yi gen kì kɑɑl.
Liny Isrɑil ɑ́bëëd e rum nywɑ̈g ki kwøbbi ngïji. Kinni keny-ɑ óliidh yïrø me dwøng me töngi mɑl ɑ́ pøølø kì kɑɑl,
liny Isrɑil bëne men-ɑ wïj kër ree óluge. Tyëng gøl Ben Yɑmïn ɑ ɑ́kwöngi ki nɑ̈ggø ki ji mø kwɑnni gen bɑ pyɑ̈r ɑ́dɑ̈g kì kelli tyëng Isrɑil, ɑrum gen kinni, ge ótyɑ̈mø ni liny tyeli mɑl.
De ngïji ɑ́cwöb; yïrø mɑ pøølø ɑ́töngi mɑl kì kɑɑl. Alïïdh tyëng gøl Ben Yɑmïn ngɑ̈thi gen, kɑ ge ongɑ̈ngø kɑ̀ kɑ̈ɑ̈l lebbi mɑc mɑl kì kɑɑl bëne.
Alug tyëng Isrɑil ri gen, kɑ tyëng gøl Ben Yɑmïn mɑg yi wɑ̈ɑ̈rø, mɑ́ e ɑ́yod yi gen kinni ryɑ̈g ɑ́pɑ̈dhi kömi gen.
Arengi gen kì bøli Isrɑil, ge reng-ɑ yij piny mɑ ryɑng, de ge nuti bodhø. Ge ɑ́tum kej ɑ́kyel yi liny Isrɑil men-ɑ ɑ́dwöög kì wïj kër, kí men-ɑ ɑ́bï e dwöög ɑ kɑɑl, kɑ ge nɑ̈g.
Tyëng Isrɑil, gøl Ben Yɑmïn ɑ́tyeeg gen kej ɑ́kyel, kɑ ge ódhɑ̈lø wïyø ki cyeddi gen, gïti Gibeɑ̀ kì kuni wɑɑng cyɑ̈ɑ̈ng mwøl, mø gïïr kì kelli gen ɑ́nɑ̈g yi tyëng Isrɑil.
Jø gøl Ben Yɑmïn møg-ɑ teg, mø kwɑnni gen bɑ ɑ́lïp pyɑ̈rø wïdɑ́bïdɑ̈g ɑ́nɑ̈g yi tyëng Isrɑil.

Aløg kwï gen ri gen kɑ ge reng-ɑ piny-ɑ bɑ ryɑng kì kuni Kïti Rimön. Anɑ̈ɑ̈g ji mø kwɑnni gen bɑ ɑ́lïp ɑ́bïj kì kelli gen. Adhɑ̈li tyëng Isrɑil ki wïyø cyeddi gen, ɑwɑ̈dhi gen Gïdöm, kɑ ge ónɑ̈gø ki ji mø kwɑnni gen bɑ ɑ́lïp ɑ́ryew.
Kwɑnni tyëng gøl Ben Yɑmïn bënn møg-ɑ ɑ́nɑ̈g dicyɑ̈ngɑni, bɑ ɑ́lïp pyɑ̈r ɑ́ryew wïdɑ́bïj, ge bënn ge bɑ jønyɑɑg mø teg.
De jøg mø kwɑnni gen bɑ miy ɑ́bïkyel ɑ́bodh; ge ɑ́rengi myërri yij ryɑng men-ɑ kuni Kïti Rimön, kɑ ge obëëdø ki dwɑ̈tt ɑ́ngwen kì kunɑni.
Adøøg tyëng Isrɑil yï tyëng gøl Ben Yɑmïn, kɑ kwï møg-ɑ ɑ́döng nɑ̈g yi gen, gen ɑ jøg-ɑ cwøw, kí tyëng-ɑ mɑ̈nn, kí othønhø, kí dhög, kí gïg-ɑ ɑ́yod yi gen. Kɑ jɑmmì bënn rɑ̈b gen geki kɑ̈dd bënn.
Jø Isrɑil ɑ́köngi kì Midhpɑ̀ kinni, “Bong dhɑnhø kì kellee men-ɑ ówëggi nyɑre nywømø yi jɑl gøl Ben Yɑmïn.”
Akedhi ji Betiil, ɑbëëd gen kì kunɑni kì bøli Jwøk gïti böörø.
Aryeer gen, ge óywöngø kinni, “Yïn ɑ Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, Jwøøg Isrɑil, ede gïn ni men ɑ cwöbe kì Isrɑil? Ede kɑl ɑ́kyel ɑ pɑ̈ɑ̈dh wïje dicyɑ̈ngtïn kì kelli kɑ̈lli Isrɑil?”
Dhuki kì mwøl, ɑgeer këli lɑm kenyɑni yi ji, ɑmuuj gen ki gënhi mër, kí gënh-ɑ nyi rɑ̈b bëne.
Apëjji tyëng Isrɑil kinni, “Dɑ kɑl ɑ́kyel kì kelli kɑ̈llì me nuti bëën bøli Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kì Midhpɑ̀ keny?” (Mɑ́ ge ɑ́köngi kinni dhɑnhø men-ɑ pɑ kedhi Midhpɑ̀ bøli Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j ceg kɑ nɑ̈gø.)
Kì kenyɑni ceth, kɑ tyëng Isrɑil yethi gen óywöngø kipe nyiimï gen, tyëng gøl Ben Yɑmïn, ɑkööb gen kinni, “Kɑl ɑ́kyel wïje ɑ́pɑ̈ɑ̈dh kì Isrɑil dicyɑ̈ngtïn.
Á gïn ɑ ógwøg o ge yïddi gen ki mɑ̈nn? Wɑ ɑ́rum ki köngø kì bøli Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kinni, bong nyigee møg-ɑ ówëggi wɑ nywømø yi gøl Ben Yɑmïn.”
Keny-ɑ ɑ́pëjji gen mɑ di kɑl ɑ́kyel kì kelli kɑ̈lli Isrɑil me nuti bëën kej buri Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kì Midhpɑ̀, ɑyodii yi gen kì kej burø kinni bong dhɑnhø me nud ɑ́ ngeti Yɑbic kì Gilyɑd.
Keny-ɑ ɑ́mɑɑm liny, ɑyodii yi gen kinni bong jɑl Yɑbic kì Gilyɑd me nud kì yij burø kì kenyɑni.
Codhe, kɑ jønyɑɑg mø teg mø kwɑnni gen bɑ ɑ́lïp pyɑ̈rø wïdɑ́ryew ör yi burø, kɑ ge ceg yi burɑni kinni, “Kedh wun, nɑ̈gu tyëng Yɑbic bënn jøg-ɑ cwøw kí mɑ̈nn, kí othønhø.
Nɑ̈gu jøg-ɑ cwøw bënn kí mɑ̈nn-ɑ rumø niin yi cwøw.”
Kɑ ge óyïddø ki wojur mø nuti nywɑlø yi cwøw, mø kwɑnni gen bɑ miy ɑ́ngwen kì kelli tyëng Yɑbic, ɑkɑ̈ɑ̈l gen Cilø kì piny Kɑnɑɑn.
Kɑ burø bëne oödø ki wöödø mi mër, e öd-ɑ yï jø gøl Ben Yɑmïn kì Kïti Rimön, kinni liny ɑ́rum.
Codhe, ɑdwöög jø gøl Ben Yɑmïn pɑc, ɑmëggi gen wojurri Yɑbic kì Gilyɑd møg-ɑ ɑ́wiy ge nuti nɑ̈gø. De kwɑnni wojurɑni nuti rømi ri gen, mɑ́ ge nøg.
Aywöngi yethi ji kipe gøl Ben Yɑmïn, mɑ́ Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kelli kɑ̈lli Isrɑil ɑ́cïbe ki kew.
Akööb jøgdøngi burø kinni, “Göög wɑ kidï kipe kinni o ji møg-ɑ ɑ́döng ge nuti yïddø ki mɑ̈nn kì gøl Ben Yɑmïn yïddi gen? Mɑ́ mɑ̈nni gen bënn ɑ́nɑ̈g.
Kipe kinni o wïj kɑl ɑ́kyel kì kelli kɑ̈llì pyɑ̈rø wïdɑ́ryew cöge e pɑ pɑ̈ɑ̈dh, yɑ̈ɑ̈b wɑ ki yöö me tïng wïj gøl Ben Yɑmïn,
de wɑ pɑ cuggi yïëyø kinni, o nyigee nywøm yi gen, mɑ́ wɑ ɑ́rum ki köngø kinni cyën óying kömi dhɑnhø men-ɑ ómëggi nyɑre jɑlø kì gøl Ben Yɑmïn.”

Arum gen kinni “Kwëër cɑ̈gi run ɑ́cyɑ̈ngi ki gwøgø kì Cilø.” (Cilø ying-ɑ wɑɑng wuudø kì bøli Betiil, o ying-ɑ wɑɑng wurlwɑl kì bøli Libnɑ̀, o ying-ɑ kuni wɑɑng cyɑ̈ɑ̈ng mwøl kì yuu-ɑ kɑɑm Betiil geki Cekïm).
Aköbbi jø gøl Ben Yɑmïn yi gen kinni, “Kedh wun kɑ wu pɑ̈ni wun kì yethi bɑ̈ggi oløg.
Kɑ wu nëën wun. Keny-ɑ óbëën womɑ̈nn Cilø kej kwër be cøng, kɑ wu bïu wɑ̈g kì kelli oløg. Kɑ dhɑnhø nyi pödhe be mɑ̈gø ki dhɑjø ki tege, kɑ wu døøgu myërri Ben Yɑmïn.
Keløg wëëg gen wɑlɑ̀ nyiimï gen óbï yï wun be gøny, köbbu gen kinni, ‘Wïyu gen wøn, mɑ́ ge nuti kɑbø yi wøn kɑ liny, o yï wun bɑ̈r, mɑ́ nyigi wun nuti cɑɑg wun kɑ mëggi gen.’ ”

Kɑ møgɑni gwøg yi gøl Ben Yɑmïn, ge ɑ́mɑ̈ɑ̈g kì kelli womɑ̈nn møg-ɑ ɑ́bï ge kedh-ɑ be cøng, ngɑn mɑg-ɑ dhɑjø men-ɑ dwɑdde, kɑ gø kɑ̈ɑ̈le gøn ɑ́ cyëge. Codhe, ɑdøøg gen yethi myërri gen, kɑ kɑ̈ddi gen døøg yi gen ki gerø, ɑpëggi gen piny.
Codhe, ɑdhwödh tyëng Isrɑil, kɑ ge døøg-ɑ yethi myërri gen.
Ábëëd e bong rɑ̈dh kì Isrɑil kì bøli kenyɑni, de dhɑnhø bëne ɑ́göög-ɑ wïje.
Kɑ̈ge dööng kì bøli keny-ɑ ɑ́bëëd Isrɑil jɑɑg-ɑ yi jɑgg, ɑ́dɑ kɑ̈j me dwøng kì pönhɑni. Kɑ jɑl megø kì Betleem kì Yeudiyɑ̀, odhwödhø geki cyëge kí wɑ̈dde ɑ́ryew,

kɑ ge dɑ̈g-ɑ pödhi Moɑb. Nyingi jɑlɑni cwøl ɑ́ Elimelek, cyëge cwøl ɑ́ Nɑomì, o wɑ̈dde ryeet cwølli gɑ Mɑklön kí Kilyön. Ge bɑ tyëng gøl Eprɑtɑ̀ kì Betleem, kì Yeudiyɑ̀. Ge ɑ́wɑ̈dhi Moɑb, kɑ ge obëëdø kì Moɑb.
Athøw Elimelek, kɑ Nɑomì odöngø ki wɑ̈dde ryeet.
Kɑ yɑɑgɑni ónyömø ki nyigi Moɑb, ɑ́kyel cwøl ɑ́ Órpɑ̀, o nyɑn-ɑ kyeelø cwøl ɑ́ Ruth. Kɑ ge obëëdø kì pönhɑni ki gïn ni runn pyɑ̈rø.
Codhe, kɑ jøgɑni ryeet Mɑklön ki Kilyön othøø thyew. Adöng ngɑnɑni ɑ́ thwöm kì bɑng kɑ ɑ́thøw jɑlgøle kí wɑ̈dde ɑ́ryew bënn.
Kɑ Nɑomì olïngø, e ying-ɑ Moɑb, i Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j jie pɑɑr en, kɑ gï thödhe ki gïncɑm. Arume ki kwøbbi døøgø.
Adhwödhe geki kwɑrre kì keny-ɑ ɑ́bëëd gen, kɑ ge døøg-ɑ Yeudiyɑ̀.

De kɑ̈ng-ɑ ɑ́nudd ge ócyɑ̈dhø kì kö pönhɑni, Nɑomì kwɑrre ɑ́köbbe kinni, “Døg wun; døøg ngɑɑn gøl meye. Wu ókøny yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kipe bëëndøj men-ɑ ɑ́bëëd wun kì bøli cwøwi wun, kí kɑ ɑ́döng wɑ ketee.
Yɑ kwɑjj-ɑ Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, o wu nywøm kì kɑ̈llì mø døøj!”
Kɑ okööbø kinni, “Døj kedh wun.” Aywöngi mɑ̈nni wɑ̈dde.
Kɑ köbbi yi gen kinni, “Pɑth, wø dwɑdd-ɑ kedhi pödhi wun ceth ki yïn.”
Alöggi Nɑomì kinni, “Døg wun nyigɑ! Á kipe ngø, ɑ kedh wun ki yɑn? Yɑ ócuggø nywølø ki wɑ̈dd møg døngi, kɑ ge ogöögø ki cwøwi wun?
Døg wun nyigɑ; mɑ́ yɑ ɑ́yöø, yɑ pɑ cuggi nywømø këti. Cɑgg yɑ kööbø kinni, yɑ ócuggø nywømø, wɑlɑ̀ cɑgg yɑ nywøm tïn kì wɑ̈r, kɑ yɑ onywølø ki wɑ̈dd,
ge ócuggø yïdø yi wun o ge døngi gen? Ri wun mɑ̈ɑ̈n wu nywømø kiper gen? Pöy! Pɑth en, nyigɑ! Pyëwɑ orɑ̈mø ki mendwøng kiper wun, mɑ́ yɑ ɑ́ryɑ̈g yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j.”
Adøøg gen ki ywøg. Kɑ Órpɑ̀ wønge mɑ̈dhe, ɑdøøge gøl gen. De Ruth ɑ́mɑ̈gi kì ri wønge.
Akööb Nɑomì kinni, “Liidh, nyɑ̈gí ɑ́døøg yï gøl gen, ɑ́døøg yï jwögge. Kedhí bɑng nyɑ̈gí.”

De Ruth ɑ́löggi kinni, “Yɑ ko kwɑjjí kipe wiyi yïn, kinni o yɑ døøgɑ, o yɑ cögɑ yɑ pɑ kedh ki yïn. Mɑ́ yɑ dwɑdd-ɑ kinni, keny-ɑ ókedhi yi yïn, en ɑ kedhɑ, o keny-ɑ óbëëd yi yïn, en ɑ bëëdɑ, wɑddí bɑ wɑddɑ, o Jwøgí bɑ Jwøgɑ.
Wɑ thøw-ɑ kej ɑ́kyel, o wɑ koony-ɑ kej ɑ́kyel ceth. Yɑ lɑm-ɑ riɑ ɑnɑn kinni, wiy yɑ ócɑy yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j keløg dhøgɑ ódi wilø yi yɑn. Bong gïn dɑ̈ɑ̈ng wɑ den-ɑ́ thøø kete.”
Keny-ɑ ɑ́lidhii yi Nɑomì kinni Ruth pɑ yïëy døøgø, ɑwiye møgɑni.
Codhe, ɑkedh gen. Kɑ ge wɑ̈dh-ɑ Betleem. Keny-ɑ ɑ́wɑ̈dhi gen Betleem, kɑ tyëng kɑɑlɑni yïthhi gen otyegø bënn; tyëng-ɑ mɑ̈nn okööbø kinni, “Men bɑ Nɑomì kidyër?”
Akööb Nɑomì kinni, “Yɑ ko cwølli wun yɑn ɑ́ Nɑomì, cwøllu yɑn, yɑn ɑ́ Mɑrɑ̀,
Yɑ ɑ́kedh köörɑ pɑ̈ng, ɑdwöög yɑn yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j èn, ki cinggɑ. Yɑ ócwølli yi wun yɑn ɑ́ Nɑomì kidï, yɑ ɑ́ryɑ̈g yi Áyïmø!”
Bene dwöng-ɑ ɑ́dwöög Nɑomì ɑnɑn kì piny Moɑb, ge ɑ́dwöög kɑ kwɑre, Ruth nyɑɑr Moɑb. Ge ɑ́wɑ̈nhi Betleem kì ri cɑ̈gi nyɑri ceir.
Nɑomì yïe ɑ́dɑ ywöre, ówï Elimelek, mɑ jɑlkɑ̈r me pere teg kì yij pödhi gen, nyinge cwøl ɑ́ Boɑdh.
Cyɑ̈ng ɑ́kyel, Ruth nyɑɑr Moɑb, Nɑomì ɑ́köbbe kinni, “Yɑ dwɑdd-ɑ kedhi yethi pwödh, men-ɑ óyïddɑ ki ngɑn me døj, me wiy yɑn o yɑ gwënɑ kì yij pwödhe ki byel møg-ɑ nyi dyëm kì bɑng jøgwøg.”
Alöggi Nɑomì kinni, “Kedh, nyɑrɑ.”
Codhe, ɑkedhi Ruth yethi pwödh. Kɑ Ruth ogwënø kì yij pwödhø megø, kì bɑng tyëng-ɑ nyɑ̈rø. Áwɑ̈dh-ɑ töngø yøw, de pwödhø ce ying-ɑ pwödhi Boɑdh, jɑl-ɑ bɑ wɑd ki Elimelek.
Abëën Boɑdh, e kɑ̈ɑ̈l-ɑ Betleem. Kɑ tyëng-ɑ göögø mɑ̈dhe kinni, “Wu ómïdhi yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j.”
Alöggi gen kinni, “Yï ógyëdh yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j.”
Apyëëj jɑngi jøgwøg yi Boɑdh, kinni, “Á nyɑɑr men ɑnɑn?”
Alöggi jɑngi jøgwøg kinni, “Bɑ nyɑɑr Moɑb men-ɑ ɑ́bï geki Nɑomì keny-ɑ ɑ́dwööge kì Moɑb.
Ákööb kinni, ‘Yɑ kwɑjj-ɑ yïn, wiy yɑ gwënɑ kì kɑɑm dhøggi ceir, kì bɑng tyëng-ɑ nyɑ̈rø.’ Ying-ɑ kömi tyelle kër-ɑ ɑ́bëëne ɑ́cøøn. Bene kɑle ree ki ywömø ɑnɑn kì tïbø.”
Aköbbi Ruth yi Boɑdh kinni, “Lïng nyɑrɑ, yï ko kedhi be gwen yij pwödhø megø. Ko di keny kedhi yi yïn, de bëëd kì kelli wo-ɑ gwënø kì pwödhɑ.
Nenní pwönh-ɑ kɑ̈ɑ̈j yi yɑɑg ceth, kɑ yï lugí kì bɑng gen; mɑ́ ge ɑ́rum ki kyëddø yi yɑn kinni yï ko nyi dhɑ̈ɑ̈l yi gen. Kenyi mɑɑg yïn yi röödhø, nyi mɑ̈dhí kì yethi pugg-ɑ nyi tömmi yi gen ki pï.”
Kɑ Ruth ree bøødhe wïje kuule’ piny kì bøli Boɑdh, ɑkööbe kinni, “Á kipe ngø ɑ køny yɑn kinøw, yɑn ɑ́ nyɑɑr jur megø yøw?”
Alöggi Boɑdh kinni, “Yɑ ɑ́köbbi ki gïgdøj møg-ɑ ɑ́göggí wøngí, kër-ɑ ɑ́thøw jɑlgølí, kí kër-ɑ ɑ́wiy wïyí piny geki meyí, kì keny-ɑ yije ɑ́nywøøl yïn, kɑ yï bï-ɑ yï ji mø kwïj yi yïn.
Yï ókøøg yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kipe gwøng-ɑ døj ni men. Yï óyïddi ki köögi kì yï Jwøøg Isrɑil, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, ngɑn-ɑ́ tïbe ɑ́yömmi yi yïn!”
Alögge kinni, “Bɑ̈ngí ɑ́køny yi yïn kidøøj jɑldwøng, cɑgg ɑ́ kɑ̀ bëëdɑ yɑ pɑth ki dhɑnhø ɑ́kyel kì kelli bɑ̈nggí kidyër yøw!”

Keny-ɑ ɑ́wɑ̈nhi bøli kej cɑm, ɑköbbii yi Boɑdh kinni, “Bïí keny, o yï cyɑ̈ɑ̈m. Kɑ ópun nyi jwɑ̈ɑ̈g yij mulø.” Codhe, ɑpëgge buti jøgwøg. Kɑ nëngi yi Boɑdh ki ópuun jirɑyø. Kɑ Ruth ocyɑ̈mø, gïti kɑ ɑ́yɑ̈nge, kɑ kwï ópune odöngø.
Keny-ɑ ɑ́døøge be gwen këti, kɑ Boɑdh, jøgwøge cege kinni, “Pɑth ki kinni, o nyɑnɑni wiy yi wun gwëne kì bɑng wun kì kɑɑm dhøggi ceir kete,
de nyi rönhu wɑ̈g kì ri dhøg møg-ɑ töjji yi wun, ki kwï thyɑng mø wɑ̈thi gen di byel, kɑ ge nyi wiyu piny, o gï gwene. Kɑ ko nyi cyɑ̈r wun.”
