Kɑ Elicɑ̀ okööbø kinni, “Köbbí bëe!” Kɑ cwøl yi Gïëdhì. Codhe, ɑbëëne kɑ ócungø kì dhø ød.
Aköbbii yi Elicɑ̀ kinni, “Run-ɑ bï piny nɑ men, yï óbëëdø yï ómïdhø ki wɑ̈d kì köörí.”
Agɑ̈ye kinni, “Möy! Yï bɑ jɑltöng, yɑ ko köbbí ki kwøbbi pyed!”
De ngɑnɑni ɑ́yɑɑj, ɑnywøle ki wɑ̈d kì bøli keny-ɑ ɑ́köbbii yi Elicɑ̀ ceth.
Kɑ nyelthinh ódøngø. Kɑ kedh-ɑ pwödhø yï wïye cyɑ̈ng ɑ́kyel byel okɑjø.
Kɑ wïye köbbe kinni, “Wïjɑ orɑ̈mø! Wïjɑ orɑ̈mø!”
Kɑ bɑ̈ng köbbi yi wïye kinni, “Kɑ̈ɑ̈l, muuj meye.” Codhe kɑ nyelthinh byeel yï meye yi bɑ̈ngɑni, kɑ mïdhi kì kɑ̈w yi meye gïti kɑ ɑ́wɑ̈dhi cɑ̈ng dïmɑl. Codhe, ɑmije wɑnge.
Kɑ gø kïdhe ød mɑl, kɑ gø pyëële yij pyëën Elicɑ̀ jɑlkwøbbi Jwøk, kɑ ød cyëëge köme.
Acwøle jɑlgøle kɑ gø köbbe kinni, “Ödí yɑn ki bɑ̈ng kí ɑderø, o yɑ jwɑnɑ yï jɑltöng, yɑ ójwɑn dwöögø.”
Kɑ jɑlgøle okööbø kinni, “Yïde ɑ kedh dicyɑ̈ɑ̈ng, e pɑth ki cyɑ̈ng kwëër Sɑbɑth, wɑlɑ̀ pɑth ki cyɑ̈ɑ̈ng kwër cɑ̈gi dwɑ̈y?”
Kɑ ngɑnɑni okööbø kinni, “Wiy yɑ kedhɑ yøw.”
Codhe kɑ ɑderø muujii kí jɑmme kì köme, ɑköbbe bɑ̈ngɑni kinni, “Pwööd ɑderø yöö, kɑ ko wëggí cyɑ̈dhø mɑ̈ɑ̈dh, keløg e pɑth ki yɑn ɑ kööbø kinni nwöngí wɑ̈dh.”
Codhe, ɑdhwödhe kɑ kedh-ɑ Kɑrmel yï jɑltöng.
Kɑ lidh yi Elicɑ̀ e obëënø e nudd e lɑ̈wi, ɑköbbe bɑ̈nge Gïëdhì kinni, “Lidh ngeti Cunem ɑ bï ɑcinee.
Jwɑní yïe kɑ pyëëj mɑ yöd dële geki jɑlgøle kí wɑ̈de.”
Kɑ Gïëdhì köbbi yi ngɑnɑni kinni, “Bong gïnrɑj.”

De keny-ɑ ɑ́wɑ̈nhe wïj kït yï Elicɑ̀, ɑbøødhe ree piny kì bøle, kɑ tyelli Elicɑ̀ mɑge. Kɑ Gïëdhì kedh-ɑ be teelii cyɑ̈n, de ɑ́kyëddi yi jɑltöng kinni, “Wiy! Pɑ nenni yi yïn pyëwe cödø? O bong gïjø mɑ ɑ́köbbi yɑn yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kì ri møgɑni.”
Kɑ ngɑnɑni okööbø kinni, “Yɑ ɑ́di cwöd ki wɑ̈d kì yïí, wuö? Yï nuti köbbø yi yɑn kinni yɑ ko wëëny?”
Kɑ Elicɑ̀ ree luge Gïëdhì, kɑ gø köbbe kinni, “Pyeew, kwɑny lodhɑ kɑ yï kedh. Yï ko pɑ̈nyi cung yï mɑ̈dh-ɑ dhɑnhø, omɑ̈ɑ̈dh yïn kɑ yï ko löggi, kedh pödhí ød, kɑ lodhɑ cïb wïj nyelthinh kì bøle.”
Kɑ Elicɑ̀ köbbi yi ngɑnɑni kinni, “Yɑn ɑ köngi èn ki nyingi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, Jwøng-ɑ Nëënø, yï pɑ wiy yi yɑn kinni tek!” Codhe ɑkedh Elicɑ̀ geki ngɑnɑni.
Gïëdhì ɑ́møøl bøli gen, kɑ lodh bøødhe wïj nyelthinh, de nyelthinh ɑ́cög e ì lek, o pɑ pɑ̈nyi onywen. Adwööge yï Elicɑ̀ kɑ gø köbbe kinni, “Nyelthinh nuti dhwödhø.”
Keny-ɑ ɑ́wɑ̈nhi Elicɑ̀, ɑkedhe ød, ɑlidhe nyelthinh e obuddø kì yij pyën e thøø.
Acyëge ød kömi gen, gɑ ɑ́ryew, kɑ Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kwɑjje.
Codhe, ɑbudde ree rïïj en kì kömi nyelɑni, dhøge rwööm en ki dhøg gøn, o nyinge rwööm en ki nyingi gøn, o cingge rwööm en ki cinggi gøn. Kɑ dëël nyelthinh ócɑ̈gø ki lënhø.
Adhwödhi Elicɑ̀ mɑl, kɑ ócyɑ̈dhø e owïïnø kì yij ød, ɑdøøge ree ki rïïj kömi nyelthinh, ɑjerri nyelthinh tyel ɑ́bïryew, codhe kɑ nyinge yiebe.
Acwøøl Gïëdhì yi Elicɑ̀, ɑköbbe gøn kinni, cwøle meyi nyelɑni. Keny-ɑ ɑ́bëëne yïe, ɑköbbe gøn kinni, “Kwɑny wɑ̈dí ɑnɑn.”
Kɑ ngɑnɑni ree bøødhe wïje këële’ piny kì bøli Elicɑ̀, codhe ɑkwɑnye wɑ̈de, ɑkedhe.
Kɑ Elicɑ̀ døøg-ɑ Gilgɑl. Piny ɑ́bëëd e dɑ kɑ̈j kì bøli kenyɑni. Elicɑ̀ ɑ́bëëd e pwöny-ɑ jøtöng, ɑköbbe bɑ̈nge kinni tɑ̈ɑ̈de ki gïjø me cɑm yi gen kì yij dɑg me dwøng.
Akedhi nget ɑ́kyel kì kelli gen yij pwödhø be pøn ki lum, ɑyïdde ki lum me mulli, kɑ opunø ki nywøli gøn. Akɑ̈ɑ̈le gïn, kɑ gï ngøle dɑg, de gï kwïje, mɑ bëëd gɑ ngø.
Atööge gïncɑm wɑ̈g kinni o jøgɑni cyɑ̈ɑ̈m gen. De keny-ɑ ɑ́bel gen gïncɑmɑni, ɑryeer gen, ge göny-ɑ Elicɑ̀, kinni, “Gïncɑmɑni bɑ men nɑ̈g ji!” Kɑ ódhɑ̈lø cɑmø yi gen.
Acwöddi Elicɑ̀ ki møng-ɑ búr, kɑ gø leenge dɑg, ɑkööbe kinni, “Töggí gen ki gïncɑm.” Kɑ gïncɑmɑni ogöögø e bong gïnrɑj kì ree.
Kɑ jɑl megø obëënø e kɑ̈ɑ̈l-ɑ Bɑɑl Cɑlicɑ̀, e muuj-ɑ Elicɑ̀ ki ópùn pyɑ̈r ɑ́ryew mø mwölli ceir, kí wɑ̈thi byel mø mɑr. Kɑ Elicɑ̀ bɑ̈nge köbbe kinni, nënge jøtöng ki gïncɑm yi gen kì ri jɑmmɑni.
Alögge kinni, “Yï orumø kinni gïgcɑmmɑni órømmi ri ji miyø?”
Alöggi Elicɑ̀ kinni, “Nëngí gen, o ge cyɑ̈ɑ̈m gen, mɑ́ Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j okööbø kinni, i ge ócyɑ̈mø, kɑ kwï gïncɑmɑni odöngø.”
Codhe ɑmuuje gïncɑm, ɑcyɑ̈ɑ̈m gen, kɑ kwï gïncɑm odöngø, ni møg-ɑ ɑ́kwøb yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j ceth.
Kì bøli keny megø, tyëng Arɑm mɑ̈nyi Isrɑil, kɑ nyɑnthinh megø kɑ̈l yi gen kì pödhi Isrɑil. Kɑ gwøg ɑ́ bɑ̈ng yi cï Nɑɑmɑn.
Kɑ wɑ̈n köbbe cyɑ̈ng ɑ́kyel kinni, “Wɑ̈ɑ ce di ceg-ɑ kedhi yï jɑltöng men-ɑ bëëdø kì Sɑmɑriyɑ̀. Di yiel yi jɑltöngɑni ki wɑɑny men-ɑ ree.”
Keny-ɑ ɑ́lïngi møgɑni yi Nɑɑmɑn. Akedhe, kɑ rɑ̈dh köbbe møg-ɑ ɑ́kwøb yi nyɑnthinh.
Kɑ rɑ̈dh okööbø kinni, “Kedhí yï rɑ̈ɑ̈dh Isrɑil. Yï ógwëdɑ ki wɑ̈nyø men muujií.”
Codhe, ɑkedh Nɑɑmɑn e ókɑ̈ddø ki ngyëny ɑ́tegg gɑ ɑ́lïp pyɑ̈r ɑ́dɑ̈g, kí ngyëny dhɑb gɑ ɑ́lïp ɑ́bïkyel, kí ógudh mø myëër gɑ pyɑ̈rø.
Wɑ̈ny-ɑ ɑ́kɑ̈l yi en ógwedø kinni, “Wɑ̈nyø men örɑ’ yïn kí Nɑɑmɑn bɑ̈ngɑ; örɑ’ yïí kipe kinni o yiel yi yïn ki wɑɑny men-ɑ ree.”

Keny-ɑ ɑ́rɑɑng wɑ̈nyɑni yi rɑ̈ɑ̈dh Isrɑil, kɑ ógødhe pyëde, mɑ́ pyëwe ɑ́rɑ̈ɑ̈m yi møgɑni, ɑkööbe kinni, “Rɑ̈ɑ̈dh Arɑm kɑ̈n-ɑ́ɑ̀ keny ki rumm-ɑ ni møg, kinni jɑɑl ócuggø yielø yi yɑn ki wɑɑny men-ɑ ree? Ceg-ɑ rumø kinni yɑ bɑ Jwøk me cuggi nɑ̈ggø, wɑlɑ̀ me cuggi muujø ki wëy? Nënni e yɑb-ɑ wëërø ki yɑn!”
Keny-ɑ ɑ́lïngi møgɑni yi Elicɑ̀ jɑlkwøbbi Jwøk, ɑöde yï rɑ̈dh kinni, “Yïde ɑ rɑ̈ɑ̈m pyëwí, kɑ ógudhí pyëëd? Wiy bëe yïɑ, o nyudhɑ kinni dɑ jɑltöng kì Isrɑil!”
Codhe, ɑkedh Nɑɑmɑn kí kyënye geki yɑ̈the, kɑ ócungø kì dhø gøl Elicɑ̀.
Kɑ Elicɑ̀ öd-ɑ yïe ki bɑ̈ng men köbbii kinni i kedhe be lwøggø kì Nɑm Urdun, kɑ rønye ki tyel ɑ́bïryew, o dële døøge keje, o wɑɑny lɑ̈ɑ̈nye kì ree.

De Nɑɑmɑn pyëwe ɑ́yöd e ceg-ɑ rënyø, kɑ ókedhø e okööbø kinni, “Yɑ ɑ́rømm-ɑ kinni di ceg-ɑ bëën wɑ̈g yïɑ, o Jwøge, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j di kwɑjje, o cinge di winne kì mɑl kömi kɑ̈jj-ɑ ledh, o gïn-ɑ riɑ lɑ̈ɑ̈nye.
O thyew cøn, Abɑnɑ̀ geki Pɑrpɑr nɑ̈mmi Dimɑceg pɑ lɑ̈w kibøli nɑ̈mmi Isrɑil? Yɑ pɑ di lwøg kì yethi gen kɑ dëlɑ di dönyi?”
Akedhi bɑ̈nge yïe, kɑ gø köbbe kinni, “Wuö, keløg yï di köbb-ɑ gïjø me gwøge teeg yi jɑltöng, pɑ di gwøg yi yïn? De ɑnɑn yï ɑ́köbbe’ lwøggø yøw, yïde ɑ pɑ lwøøg ceth, o dëlí dönye?”
Akedhi Nɑɑmɑn Nɑm Urdun, kɑ røny-ɑ nɑm ki tyel ɑ́bïryew ni kɑ ɑ́köbbii yi jɑlkwøbbi Jwøk, kɑ dële ceg-ɑ dönyø bëne. Kɑ dële døøg-ɑ keje e dhïw ni dëël othinh.
Codhe, ɑdwööge geki jøge, ɑköbbe jɑlkwøbbi Jwøk kinni, “Áyod yi yɑn, ɑnɑn cyee, kinni bong jwøg me nud, den-ɑ́ Jwøøg Isrɑil kete! De yɑ kwɑjj-ɑ yïn wuö, yïëy gïn-ɑ mëggɑ yïn èn.”
Alöggi Elicɑ̀ kinni, “Yɑn ɑ köngi èn, ki nyingi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, Jwøng-ɑ Nëënø, ɑ bøle göögɑ yɑ bɑ bɑ̈nge, yɑ pɑ pɑ̈nyi kɑ̈bbø ki gïïpiny.”
Elicɑ̀ ɑ́dyej yi Nɑɑmɑn kinni o di yïëye, de nuti yïëyø kinni tek.

Codhe, ɑkööb Nɑɑmɑn kinni, “Keløg gïn-ɑ mëggɑ yïn pɑ yïëy yi yïn, yɑ kwɑjj-ɑ yïn, thödhí yɑn ki lɑ̈bø men cuggi tërø yi ɑderr ɑ́ryew, men kïdhɑ pödhi wøn, kipe kinni cɑg ɑnɑn, bong jwøg men nëngi yi yɑn ki jwödhø, wɑlɑ̀ gënh-ɑ nyi rɑ̈b bëne den-ɑ́ Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kete.
Wiy pyëw Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j nyi lɑ̈ɑ̈me ki yɑn kenyi lwøøgɑ rɑ̈dh kengi Rimön jwøøg Arɑm, kí kenyi bøødhɑ riɑ piny kyeel ki en, mɑ́ e nyi døm-ɑ yi yɑn ki cingɑ.”
Akööb Elicɑ̀ kinni, “Kedh ki mër.” Akedh Nɑɑmɑn.
Nɑɑmɑn ɑ́bëëd e nuti wɑ̈dhi keny me lɑ̈wi,
Kɑ Gïëdhì bɑ̈ng Elicɑ̀ jɑltöng, ree köbbe kinni, “Wɑ̈ɑ ɑ́bɑ̈nyi kɑ̈bbø kì ri gïg-ɑ ɑ́muuj yi Nɑɑmɑn jɑl Arɑm, ki nyingi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, yɑ ceg-ɑ rengi bɑnge, o yɑ kɑ̈bbɑ ki gïïpiny kì yïe.”
Codhe, ɑløge bɑng Nɑɑmɑn. Keny-ɑ ɑ́lïdhi Nɑɑmɑn kinni dɑ dhɑnhø me rïngi kì bɑnge, ɑyïnhe piny kì yij yɑ̈ye, kɑ døøg-ɑ be pɑɑri ngɑnɑni. Apyëje gøn kinni, “Dɑ gïjø mɑ ɑ́bɑ̈jji?”
Kɑ Gïëdhì okööbø kinni, “Bong gøn! De yɑ ɑ́ör-ɑ yi wɑ̈ɑ i köbbɑ yïn kinni dɑ jøtöng ɑ́ryew møg kɑ̈ɑ̈l myërri kïtti Eprɑim, i nëngí gen ki ngyëny ɑ́tegg ɑ́lïp ɑ́dɑ̈g, ki ógudh ɑ́ryew møg myër.”

Adyejii yi Nɑɑmɑn kinni, “Kɑ̈bbí ki ngyëny ɑ́tegg ɑ́lïp ɑ́bïkyel.” Kɑ ngyënyyɑni twööj yethi kidhhì ɑ́ryew yi Nɑɑmɑn, kí ógudh ɑ́ryew kí møg nyi wiil gen thyew. Kɑ gï mëgge bɑ̈ngge ɑ́ryew, o gï tyëddi gen kì bøli Gïëdhì.
Keny-ɑ ɑ́wɑ̈nhi gen buti kït, keny-ɑ bëëd yi Elicɑ̀, ɑkwɑɑny kidhhɑni ryeet yi Gïëdhì, ɑkïdhe gïn kɑl. Codhe ɑköbbe bɑ̈nggi Nɑɑmɑn kinni døg gen.
Akedhe kɑ ócungø kì bøli wɑ̈n, kɑ pyëj yi Elicɑ̀ kinni, “Yï kɑ̈ɑ̈l-ɑ keny, Gïëdhì?”
Alöggi Gïëdhì kinni, “Bong keny mɑ ɑ́kedhɑ.”

Alöggi Elicɑ̀ kinni, “Yï orumø tïbɑ nuti ying-ɑ kunɑni ɑ́tïni, keny-ɑ ɑ́yïnhi jɑlɑni piny kì yij yɑ̈ye, e bï-ɑ yïí? Men bɑ bøli keny kɑ̈bbi ki ngyëny møg ngëëw ki pwödh, kí bɑ̈ggi yenh dhetun, kí dyëg geki dhög, kí bɑ̈ngg-ɑ cwøw geki bɑ̈ngg-ɑ mɑ̈nn?
De ɑnɑn wɑɑny Nɑɑmɑn ceg-ɑ mɑ̈gø kì rií, wuki kwɑrrí gïti ɑtheer.”
Akedhe kì buti Elicɑ̀ e tɑr ni ɑ́piy yi wɑɑny.
Cyɑ̈ng ɑ́kyel, e ɑkuud jøtöng obëëdø kì buti Elicɑ̀, kɑ gönyi yi gen kinni, “Keny-ɑ bëëd yi wøn twij!
Wiy wø kedhi wøn kömi Nɑm Urdun be ngøl ki yenh, o wø gëëd wøn ki keny bëëd yi wøn.”
Alöggi Elicɑ̀ kinni, “Døj, kedh wun.”
Kɑ jɑl ɑ́kyel kì kelli gen Elicɑ̀ kwɑjje, kinni kedhe ki gen, ɑyïëye.
Kɑ ge ókedhø kyeel. Keny-ɑ ɑ́wɑ̈dhi gen kömi Nɑm Urdun, ɑcɑ̈gi gen ki ngøl ki yenh.
De cem jɑl ɑ́kyel kì kelli jøgɑni ngøl-ɑ yɑdh, ɑör dørø, kɑ dëëm-ɑ yethi pï. Aywøøg jɑlɑni kö Elicɑ̀ kinni, “Kɑ yɑ göög ɑ dï cyee, wuö? E dørɑni ɑ́ceg yi yɑn kɑ widhø!”
Apyëjii yi Elicɑ̀ kinni, “Ádëëm ɑ keny?”
Anyudhii kenyɑni yi jɑlɑni. Angud Elicɑ̀ ki okewi yɑdh, kɑ gø leenge kenyɑni, kɑ dørø othwørø.
Aköbbi jɑlɑni yi Elicɑ̀ kinni, “Kwɑɑny, kɑ̈ɑ̈l wɑ̈g!” Arïïj jɑlɑni cinge, kɑ dørø kwɑnye.
Kì bøli kenyɑni rɑ̈ɑ̈dh Arɑm ɑ́bëëd e ceg-ɑ nyɑɑg ki Isrɑil, kɑ pëjji linye pyëje kinni, “Wɑ gudd-ɑ keny ki kɑɑl?” Codhe ɑmyeg gen kej kɑɑl gen.
De rɑ̈ɑ̈dh Isrɑil ɑ́kyëddi yi Elicɑ̀ kinni, ko kɑ̈l buti kenyɑni, mɑ́ yöö óbuddø yi tyëng Arɑm.
Codhe, kɑ tyëng myërr-ɑ cyɑ̈gi ki kenyɑni köbbi yi rɑ̈ɑ̈dh Isrɑil kinni bëëd gen ge tid-ɑ yuuɑni. Kɑ ogöögø ki tyel mø gïïr, e nyi köbb-ɑ kɑ̈jj-ɑ ni møgɑni yi jɑltöng.
Kɑ rɑ̈ɑ̈dh Arɑm pyëwe órënyø yi møgɑni, ɑcwøle pëjji linye, kɑ gï pyëje kinni, “Á men kì kelli wun ɑ nyi töddi rɑ̈ɑ̈dh Isrɑil?”

Alöggi jɑl ɑ́kyel kì kelli gen kinni, “Bong ngɑn nyi töddii kì kelli wøn wuö, den-ɑ́ Elicɑ̀ jɑltöng men-ɑ bëëdø kì Isrɑil, ɑ nyi köbbi rɑ̈ɑ̈dh Isrɑil ki gïg-ɑ nyi kømmi yi yïn, cɑgg ɑ́ kwøbb-ɑ kømmi yi yïn kì ødí.”
Kɑ rɑ̈ɑ̈dh Arɑm okööbø kinni, “Yɑbu keny-ɑ bëëde, o mɑg yi yɑn.”
Keny-ɑ ɑ́köbbii kinni i Elicɑ̀ ying-ɑ Döthɑn,
ɑöde ki kyënyì geki yɑ̈ɑ̈th, kí yɑy me dwøng. Kɑ ge ókedhø, ɑwɑ̈dhi gen kɑɑlɑni kì wɑ̈r, kɑ gø tyeg gen.
Keny-ɑ ɑ́dhwödh bɑ̈ng Elicɑ̀, dhuki kì mwøl, kɑ bï-ɑ wɑ̈g kì ød, ɑlidhe kɑɑl e bɑ ɑtyeg yi yɑy, kí kyënyi gen geki yɑ̈thi gen. Kɑ døøg-ɑ yï Elicɑ̀, ɑkööbe kinni, “Wɑ ɑ́gɑ̈g! Wɑ göög ɑ dï wuö?”
Alöggi Elicɑ̀ kinni, “Yï ko böggi. Linyee dwøng kibøli liny gen!”

Codhe, ɑkwɑ̈jji Elicɑ̀ kinni, “Yïn ɑ Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, yieb nyinge, o lïdhe!” Kɑ nyingi bɑ̈ng Elicɑ̀ yieb yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, ɑtïnge wïje kɑ tøggi kït lidhe ge pɑ̈ng yi kyënyì geki yɑ̈thi mɑc, Elicɑ̀ ówenø yi gen kì wɑ̈thi tùng bënn.
Keny-ɑ ɑ́bëën jø Arɑm ge dwɑdd-ɑ pɑ̈ɑ̈r kömi Elicɑ̀, ɑkwɑ̈jji Elicɑ̀ kinni, “Yïn ɑ Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, göjjí gen cøørø!” Kɑ ge göjji cøørø yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j.
Akedhi Elicɑ̀ yï gen, kɑ gï köbbe kinni, “Wu ɑ́wɑ̈ɑ̈ny ki yöö, men pɑth ki kɑɑl-ɑ yɑb yi wun. Lug wun bɑngɑ o wu nyudhɑ jɑl-ɑ yɑb yi wun.” Apeeje gïn Sɑmɑriyɑ̀.

Keny-ɑ ɑ́wɑ̈dhi gen dïdyëri Sɑmɑriyɑ̀ ceth, ɑkwɑjji Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j yi Elicɑ̀ kinni, “Yieb nyingi gen, Yïn ɑ Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, kɑ wiy ge lïdhi gen.” Kɑ nyingi gen yieb yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, ɑlïdhi gen kinni ge ying-ɑ dïdyëri Sɑmɑriyɑ̀.
Keny-ɑ ɑ́liidh gen yi rɑ̈ɑ̈dh Isrɑil, ɑpyëje Elicɑ̀ kinni, “Nɑ̈gɑ gen wuö? Nɑ̈gɑ gen wuö?”
Alöggi Elicɑ̀ kinni, “Ge ko nɑ̈ɑ̈g. Gede ɑ dwɑddí gen nɑ̈gø, e pɑth ki yïn ɑ ɑ́mɑg gen ki tegí? Ceg gen ki nëngø ki gïncɑm, kí pï, kɑ wiy ge døøg gen yï rɑ̈ɑ̈dh gen.”
Codhe, ɑmuuj gen yi rɑ̈ɑ̈dh Isrɑil ki gïgcɑmm mø ngenyø. Keny-ɑ ɑ́rum gen ki cɑm, ɑwiy gen døøg gen yï rɑ̈ɑ̈dh Arɑm. Kì bɑng kenyɑni, kɑ liny Arɑm ówïyø bëën be mɑ̈nyø pödhi Isrɑil.
Kì bɑng keny megø, kɑ Benɑdɑd rɑ̈ɑ̈dh Arɑm, jølinye cønge bënn, ɑbëëne kɑ Sɑmɑriyɑ̀ tyege.

Atëngi kɑ̈j ki mendwøng kì Sɑmɑriyɑ̀, kì bɑng kɑ ɑ́tyegii ki keny me bɑ̈ɑ̈r, kɑ ngewi wïj ɑderø wɑ̈dh-ɑ ri ngyëny ɑ́tegg pyɑ̈r ɑ́bïdɑ̈g. Kɑ ngewi yij cingø ɑ́kyel mi cyedhhi ɑkur wɑ̈dh-ɑ ri ngyëny ɑ́tegg ɑ́bïj.
Rɑ̈ɑ̈dh Isrɑil ɑ́bëëd e ócyɑ̈dhø kì wïj döri kɑɑl, ɑryeer ngɑndhɑjø megø e cwøl-ɑ gøn kinni, “Køny yɑn wuö rɑ̈dhɑ!”
Alöggi rɑ̈dh kinni, “Keløg yï nuti kønyø yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, yɑ yïd-ɑ́ɑ̀ keny ki gïn kønyɑ yïn? Dɑ gemè wɑlɑ̀ møgi oløg me nud kì yïɑ?”
Apyëjii yi rɑ̈dh kinni, “Á gïn ɑ rɑj cøn?”
Alögge kinni, “Cyɑ̈ng-ɑcɑ̀ yɑ ɑ́köbbi yi ngɑɑn, i cɑm wøn wɑ̈dɑ, o wɑ̈de ólony yi wøn ki cɑmø dhuki.
Codhe, ɑthɑl wøn wɑ̈dɑ, kɑ cɑm yi wøn. Dhuki keny-ɑ ɑ́köbbɑ en kinni, kɑ̈ɑ̈le wɑ̈de o cɑm yi wøn, wɑ̈de gø kɑɑn en.”
Keny-ɑ ɑ́lïngi møgɑni yi rɑ̈dh, ɑkɑge ógødhe, mɑ́ pyëwe ɑ́rɑ̈ɑ̈m yi kwøbbɑni. Kɑ lidh yi tyëng-ɑ cyɑ̈gi kì ri dörø e rug-ɑ ocwɑ̈lø kì thɑ ógødhe.
Akönge kinni, “Wiy yɑ nɑ̈g yi Jwøk, keløg wïj Elicɑ̀ pɑ ngulɑ wɑ̈g dicyɑ̈ngtïn!”
Aöde ki ngɑn dwɑɑy Elicɑ̀.

Elicɑ̀ ɑ́bëëd e ying-ɑ gøle geki kwï jøgdøngø møg këëmii. Aköbbi jøgɑni yi Elicɑ̀, e ngɑn-ɑ ɑ́ör yi rɑ̈dh nuti wɑ̈nhø, kinni, “Wɑ̈d jɑlnɑ̈g ki ji menɑni ɑ́öni ki ngɑn bï be nɑ̈gi yɑn. De keny-ɑ ówɑ̈nhe, kɑ ød cyëëg wun, o cöge e pɑ cuggi bëën ød. Rɑ̈dh kiree ɑ bï kì bɑnge.”
Kɑ̈ng-ɑ́ nudd Elicɑ̀ okööbø ki gen, ɑwɑ̈nhi jɑl-ɑ ɑ́ör, kedh rɑ̈dh ówɑ̈nhø kì bɑnge ceth. Akööb rɑ̈dh kinni, “Bɑ Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j ɑ ɑ́kɑ̈ɑ̈l ryɑ̈g men kömee! Dɑ́ ngø ɑ gɑ̈nni yi yɑn kì yïe?”

Alöggi Elicɑ̀ kinni, “Lïng wun ki møg-ɑ kwøb yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j! Dhuki piny nɑ men, kïllì ɑ́dɑ̈g mø gemè me døøj óngew kɑ ngyënyø ɑ́tegø ɑ́kyel, o kïllì ɑ́bïkyel mø ceir óngew kɑ ngyënyø ɑ́tegø ɑ́kyel thyew kì Sɑmɑriyɑ̀!”
Alöggi pënyi liny men-ɑ cyɑ̈dhi ki rɑ̈dh kinni, “Gïn ni menɑni pɑ cuggi kinni tek, cɑgg mɑl ceg ki yiebø yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, kɑ byel kunye piny!”
Kɑ Elicɑ̀ okööbø kinni, “Ólidh yi yïn ki wɑngí keny-ɑ ópɑ̈dhi møgɑni kɑ̈jji gen, de yï koo cyɑ̈mø ki gïgcɑmmɑni.”
Ádɑ jøg ɑ́ngwen mø ri gen di wɑɑny, mø nyi bëëdø kì dhø döri Sɑmɑriyɑ̀. Kɑ jøgɑni ri gen köbbi gen kinni, “Wɑ pïd-ɑ wɑɑng wɑ obëëdø kì keny?

Bong gïjø me pere kedhi wɑ kɑɑl, mɑ́ wɑ bɑ møg nɑ̈g yi kɑ̈j kì kɑɑlɑni. De ke bëëd wɑ kì keny thyew, wɑ bɑ møg thøw. Ceg wɑ kedhi kɑɑl Arɑm. Keløg wɑ owiyø yi gen, døøj. De keløg wɑ onɑ̈gø yi gen wɑ óthøw.”
Codhe ɑdhwödh gen, kedh piny ólunyø, ge kedh-ɑ kɑɑl Arɑm. De keny-ɑ ɑ́wɑ̈dhi gen wïj tuung kɑɑlɑni, bong dhɑnhø mɑ ɑ́yod yi gen.

Jøliny Arɑm ógöjji lïngø yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j ki cwɑg mø ni cwɑggi yɑ̈thi liny, geki cwɑggi kyënyì, kí ɑwøw me ni ɑwøøw yɑy me dwøng, me bï kömi gen. Arum gen kinni i rɑ̈ɑ̈dh Isrɑil, rɑ̈ɑ̈dh Edöm geki rɑ̈ɑ̈dh Rïp gï kïr en, o ge bï-ɑ be nyɑɑg ki gen.
Amwöj gen ki ngwej kì wɑɑng thyënh ge yiel-ɑ ri gen. Kɑ kyënyì geki ɑderr wiy gen ge ómɑɑg piny, kɑ kemmì odöngø ge ócungø kì kɑ̈jji gen.

Keny-ɑ ɑ́wɑ̈dhi jøgɑni tøg kɑɑlɑni, gɑ ɑ́ngwen, ɑkedhi gen yij kemɑ̀ megø, kɑ ge ocyɑ̈mø ki gïgcɑmm møg döngø kì kenyɑni. Kɑ ge ókɑ̈bbø ki ógudh, kí dhɑb, geki ngyëny ɑ́tegg møg-ɑ ɑ́yod yi gen kì kenyɑni. Kɑ ge kedh-ɑ yij kem-ɑ kyeelø, ɑyïddi gen ki gïg ni møg-ɑ ɑ́tïni.

Aköbbi gen ri gen kinni, “Gïn-ɑ gwøg yi wɑ èn pɑ døøj! Yïee dɑ wöödø me med dicyɑ̈ngtïn, de ede ɑ kɑn wɑ en? Keløg wöönɑni ómïdhi yi wɑ gïti mwøl, wɑ bɑ møg cɑy ceth. Kedh wɑ, kɑ pëjji liny rɑ̈dh köbbi wɑ!”

Codhe ɑdhwödh gen kì kɑɑl Arɑm, kɑ ge døøg-ɑ Sɑmɑriyɑ̀. Aryeer gen ge cwøll-ɑ jøg-ɑ kor kɑɑl kinni, “Wø ɑ́kedhi kɑɑl Arɑm de bong dhɑnhø mɑ ɑ́lidh yi wøn, bong cwɑggi dhɑnhø mɑ ɑ́lïngi yi wøn thyew. Kyënyì geki ɑderr nudd ge ómɑɑg piny, o kemmì nudd ge ying-ɑ kɑ̈jji gen.”
Acwöddi jøkor ki tyëng kïdhi wöönɑni gøldwøng.

Keny-ɑ ɑ́lïngi møgɑni yi rɑ̈dh, ɑdhwödhe kì wɑ̈rɑni, ɑköbbe jøge kinni, “Wiy wu köbbi yi yɑn ki gïn-ɑ rømmi yi tyëng Arɑm, kí gïn-ɑ dwɑddi göggi wɑ yi gen! Ngɑ̈nyi yi gen kinni pödhee dɑ kɑ̈j, bene ɑ kedhi gen ngɑ̈ɑ̈j kɑɑl gen be pɑ̈nø. Ge ɑ́ceg-ɑ rumø kinni wɑ óbï wɑ̈g kì kɑɑlee, kɑ wɑ kedh-ɑ be yɑb ki gïgcɑmm, codhe o ge bï gen, o wɑ kɑ̈l yi gen wɑ bɑ ɑmɑgg. Codhe, o kɑɑlee mɑg yi gen.”

Alöggi jɑl ɑ́kyel kì kelli jøge kinni, “Wiy jøg kɑ̈bbi gen ki kyënyì ɑ́bïj kì kelli kyëny-ɑ ɑ́döng, o ge kedhi gen be lidhi gïn-ɑ cwöbø. Tyëng-ɑ keny pɑ̈r ki tyëng Isrɑil møg-ɑ ɑ́thøw? O ge pɑ nudd gɑ møg-ɑ ɑ́thøw thyew?”
Akɑ̈bbi gen ki jøg mø kwɑnni gen nøg. Aör gen yi rɑ̈dh kì yethi yɑ̈thi liny ɑ́ryew. Kɑ gï cege kinni, “Kedh wun, kɑ gïn-ɑ cwöbø kì kɑɑl Arɑm lidh wun.”
Akedh gen, kɑ ge wɑ̈dh-ɑ kömi Nɑm Urdun, kɑ yöö yuud gen e pɑ̈ng yi ógudh kí jɑmm-ɑ dyëmø kì yï liny Arɑm kɑ̀ rïngi gen. Adwöög gen kɑ møgɑni köbbi rɑ̈dh yi gen.

Arïngi tyëng Sɑmɑriyɑ̀ wɑ̈g, kɑ ge reng-ɑ kɑɑl Arɑm. Kɑ jɑmmi kɑɑlɑni kɑ̈l yi gen. Kɑ kïllì gemè ɑ́dɑ̈g ngew ki ngyënyø ɑ́tegø ɑ́kyel, kɑ kïlli ceir ɑ́bïkyel ngew ki ngyënyø ɑ́tegø ɑ́kyel thyew ni møg-ɑ ɑ́kwøb yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j ceth.
Pënyi liny men-ɑ ɑ́cyɑ̈dhi ki rɑ̈dh, keny-ɑ ɑ́kedhi gen yï Elicɑ̀, ókwɑnyø yi rɑ̈dh o kore dhø döri kɑɑl. Kɑ nyøn yi ji kɑ othøø, ni møg-ɑ ɑ́kwøb yi Elicɑ̀.
Rɑ̈dh ɑ́köbbi yi Elicɑ̀ cøn kinni, “Dhuki piny nɑ men, kïllì ɑ́dɑ̈g mø gemè me døøj, óngew kɑ ngyënyø ɑ́tegø ɑ́kyel, o kïllì ɑ́bïkyel mø ceir, óngew kɑ ngyënyø ɑ́tegø ɑ́kyel thyew kì Sɑmɑriyɑ̀.”

Kenyɑni ɑ ɑ́kööb pënyɑni kinni, “Gïn ni menɑni pɑ cuggi kinni tek. Cɑgg mɑl ceg ki yiebø yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, kɑ byel kunye piny!” Alöggi Elicɑ̀ kinni, “Ólidh yi yïn ki wɑngí keny-ɑ ópɑ̈dhi møgɑni kɑ̈jji gen, de yï koo cyɑ̈mø ki gïgcɑmmɑni.”
Gïn ni menɑni ɑ́cwöb ceth; pënyɑni ɑ́nyøn yi ji kì dhø döri kɑɑlɑni, kɑ othøø.
Alïngi kwøbbi Elicɑ̀ yi ngɑnɑni. Kɑ odhwödhø geki gøle, kɑ ge kedh-ɑ be bëëdø kì Pelistiyɑ̀ ki runn ɑ́bïryew.
Keny-ɑ ɑ́dwöög ngɑnɑni Isrɑil, kì bɑng runn ɑ́bïryew møgɑni, ɑkedhe yï rɑ̈dh kipe kinni o kej øde kí pinye döggii.
Ayuude rɑ̈dh e okööbø geki Gïëdhì, bɑ̈ng Elicɑ̀, e dwɑdd-ɑ yodi gïïngɑ̈ngø møg-ɑ ɑ́gwøg yi Elicɑ̀ kì yï Gïëdhì.

De kɑ̈ng-ɑ ɑ́nudd Gïëdhì löbb-ɑ rɑ̈dh, ki kwøbbi dhɑnhø men-ɑ ótugø kì yij thøø yi Elicɑ̀, ɑ ɑ́bëën ngɑnɑni yï rɑ̈dh be gøny. Akööb Gïëdhì kinni, “Wuö rɑ̈dh, ngɑnɑni èn, geki wɑ̈de wɑ̈n-ɑ ɑ́tug kì yij thøø yi Elicɑ̀!”

Keny-ɑ ɑ́pyëëj ngɑnɑni yi rɑ̈dh ki møgɑni, ɑløøge gïn kinni i ge bɑ dyër ceth. Acwöddi rɑ̈dh ki jɑgø, kɑ gø köbbe kinni i döggi ngɑnɑni jɑmme bënn, ki kwɑnni ngyënyy-ɑ ɑ́kɑ̈ɑ̈l yi jɑmm-ɑ ɑ́cyeg kì yethi pwödhhe, cɑg kì bøli keny-ɑ ɑ́kedhe gïti ɑnɑn.
Akedhi Elicɑ̀ Dimɑceg. Benɑdɑd rɑ̈ɑ̈dh Arɑm dële ɑ́bëëd e orɑ̈mø kì bøli kenyɑni. Keny-ɑ ɑ́lïnge kinni Elicɑ̀ nud,
ɑöre Adhɑil, jɑl ɑ́kyel kì kelli jyɑ̈ge, ɑköbbe gøn kinni, “Kɑ̈ɑ̈d ki gïïpiny men mëggí jɑltöng, kɑ köbbí kinni pyëje Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, men-ɑ óyöni dëlɑ.”

Akïdhi kömi ɑmɑl pyɑ̈r ɑ́ngwen yi Adhɑil ki jɑmm-ɑ døj kì Dimɑceg, e kömi ɑmɑlø dɑ møg-ɑ lwɑ̈ng yi en ki tërø. Akedhe yï Elicɑ̀. Keny-ɑ ɑ́yïddi gen, ɑköbbe gøn kinni, “Yɑ ɑ́ör-ɑ be pyëji yïn yi bɑ̈ngí, Rɑ̈dh Benɑdɑd, ki men-ɑ óyöni dële.”
Alöggi Elicɑ̀ kinni, “Yɑ ɑ́nyudhi yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kinni ceg-ɑ thøø, de kedh kɑ köbbí kinni dële óyöni.”
Codhe, ɑti Elicɑ̀ nenni yï Adhɑil, kɑ Adhɑil wïje ólɑ̈ɑ̈yø yi nënnɑni. Kɑ jɑlkwøbbi Jwøk ceg-ɑ ì túl ki ywøg.
Apyëëj Elicɑ̀ yi Adhɑil kinni, “Yïde ɑ ywöngí, wuö?”

Alöggi Elicɑ̀ kinni, “Kipe ngɑ̈nyi yi yɑn kinni tyëng Isrɑil bɑ møg-ɑ ógöggi yi yïn ki gïgrijjø. Myërri gen møg-ɑ ógerø kidøøj órɑ̈b yi yïn, kɑ wøbbi gen nɑ̈g yi yïn, kɑ nyigi gen pwöd yi yïn pïd keny-ɑ óthøw gen, kɑ yethi ɑ́yɑjji gen kɑg yi yïn.”
Alöggi Elicɑ̀ kinni, “Yɑ ɑ́nyudhi yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, kinni yï órøny yïn-ɑ́ rɑ̈ɑ̈dh Arɑm.”
Adøøg Adhɑil yï Benɑdɑd, ɑpyëje gøn kinni, “Á ngø ɑ ɑ́köbbi yïn yi Elicɑ̀?”
Alöggi Adhɑil kinni, “Yɑ ɑ́köbbi yi en, i dëlí óyöni.”
Dhuki kì mwøl ɑkɑ̈bbi Adhɑil ki ógødh me bɑ dhïl, kɑ gø bïle ki pï, ɑpeedhe gøn bøli rɑ̈dh, órømme kí dhøge kum en, ɑthøwe.
Kɑ Adhɑil røøny kej Benɑdɑd ɑ́ rɑ̈ɑ̈dh Arɑm.
Kì bïïj runni Yörɑm wɑ̈d Akɑɑb rɑ̈ɑ̈dh Isrɑil kì yij lɑwø, ɑ ɑ́jɑ̈ggi Yeörɑm wɑ̈d Yöcɑpɑt kì Yeudiyɑ̀
Ájɑ̈ggi e runne bɑ pyɑ̈r ɑ́dɑ̈g wïdɑ́ryew. Kɑ ojyɑ̈gø ki runn ɑ́bïdɑ̈g kì Yerusɑlem.
Cyëge bɑ nyɑɑr Akɑɑb. Kɑ pɑ̈dh-ɑ yij orøøg gøl Akɑɑb ni rɑ̈nhi Isrɑil møg-ɑ kyeelø. Árøngi kì bøli Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j,
de Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j nuti dwɑddi ryɑ̈gi Yeudiyɑ̀, mɑ́ Debïd bɑ̈nge ɑ́köbbe kinni, kwɑrre ójyɑ̈ɑ̈gø ceth kì yethi runn bënn.

Codhe, ɑdhwödh Yeörɑm ki yɑ̈the bënn e kedh-ɑ Dhɑir. Kɑ ge tyeeg kunɑni yi liny Edöm. Kɑ ge turr-ɑ wɑ̈g kì kelli liny Edöm kì wɑ̈r, codhe ɑpɑ̈r gen ki yɑ̈thi gen, kɑ yɑɑy rɑ̈ɑ̈dh Isrɑil tɑɑy-ɑ yethi myërre.
Acög Edöm ɑ́ pödhø kì wɑ̈ye, këër kenyɑni. Kɑ kɑɑl Libnɑ̀ ngɑ̈ny-ɑ wɑ̈ye thyew kì bøli kenyɑni.
Gïg-ɑ kyeelø møg-ɑ ɑ́gwøg yi Yeörɑm bɑ ɑgwed kì yij
Akedhi Yeörɑm kun-ɑ di kweyye, kɑ kony kì kɑɑl Debïd. Kɑ Akɑdhiyɑ̀ wɑ̈de røøny keje ɑ́ rɑ̈dh.
Kì ri pyɑ̈rø wïdɑ́ryeew runni jyɑ̈gi Yörɑm wɑ̈d Akɑɑb ɑ́ rɑ̈ɑ̈dh Isrɑil, ɑ ɑ́göög Akɑdhiyɑ̀ wɑ̈d Yeörɑm ki rɑ̈ɑ̈dh Yeudiyɑ̀,
e runne bɑ pyɑ̈r ɑ́ryew wïdɑ́ryew, kɑ ojyɑ̈gø kì Yerusɑlem ki run ɑ́kyel. Meye cwøl ɑ́ Athɑliyɑ̀, nyɑɑr Rɑ̈dh Akɑɑb, kwɑɑr Ómrì rɑ̈ɑ̈dh Isrɑil.
Kipe kɑ ɑ́bëëd Akɑdhiyɑ̀ gɑ ør geki Rɑ̈dh Akɑɑb, ɑ́røngi kì bøli Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j ni orøng-ɑ ɑ́gwøg yi gøl Akɑɑb.
Rɑ̈dh Akɑdhiyɑ̀ ɑ́kedh geki Yörɑm rɑ̈ɑ̈dh Isrɑil be nyïɑ̈ggø ki Adhɑil rɑ̈ɑ̈dh Arɑm. Atuum liny kì Rɑmöth Gilyɑd, kɑ Yörɑm ree kedhi yi kedø kì yij liny.
Adøøge kɑɑl Yidhriil be tuuri kede. Akedhi Akɑdhiyɑ̀, rɑ̈ɑ̈dh Yeudiyɑ̀ Yidhriil be këëmii.
Acwöddi Elicɑ̀ jɑltöng ki ɑ́kyel kì kelli jøtöng-ɑ thønhø, kɑ gø köbbe kinni, “Dhwöödh, kedhí Rɑmöth Gilyɑd. Kɑ̈l tuung møw men.
Keny-ɑ ówɑ̈dhí kunɑni, yɑb Yeeu wɑ̈d Yöcɑpɑt, wɑ̈d Nimcì. Cwøøl wɑ̈ye kì buti jø gen kɑ wu kedhu ød megø wu keti wun.
Kɑ møw men køny wïje. Kɑ köbbí kinni, ‘Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j okööbø kinni ce yï røøny en yïn ɑ́ rɑ̈ɑ̈dh Isrɑil.’ Kɑ ød yieeb kɑ yï jwɑn kedhø kì kenyɑni.”
Akedhi jɑltöngɑni Rɑmöth Gilyɑd,
Ayuude pëjji liny ge bëëd ɑ kej ɑ́kyel. Kɑ Yeeu köbbe kinni, “Dɑ gïn köbbɑ yïn jɑldwøng!”
Apëjji Yeeu kinni, “Yï kööbø kɑ men kì kelli wøn?”
Kɑ jɑltöng okööbø kinni, “Yɑ kööbø kɑ yïn jɑldwøng!”
Codhe ɑkedhi gen ød gɑ ɑ́ryew, ɑkønye møw wïj Yeeu, kɑ gø köbbe kinni, “Jwøøg Isrɑil, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j okööbø ce yï røøny en yïn ɑ́ rɑ̈ɑ̈dh jie, tyëng Isrɑil.
Yïn ɑ ódhur gøl wöw Akɑɑb piny. O gøølɑ colɑ ki Yidhɑbel ngɑn-ɑ ɑ́nɑ̈g jøtöng møgɑ, geki bɑ̈nggɑ møg-ɑ kyeelø.
Wïj gøl Akɑɑb ceg-ɑ pɑ̈ɑ̈dhø. Yɑɑg-ɑ cwøw bënn kì gølɑni nɑ̈gɑ’ nɑ̈gø.
Gøl Akɑɑb ógöggɑ gïn-ɑ ɑ́göggɑ gøl Yeroboɑm wɑ̈d Nebɑt, geki gøl Rɑ̈dh Bɑcɑ̀ wɑ̈d Akiyɑ̀ kì Isrɑil.
Yidhɑbel ócɑm yi gwögg kì Yidhriil, bong ngɑn-ɑ ókonyii kinni tek.” Keny-ɑ ɑ́rume kwøbi møgɑni, ɑyiebe ød kɑ órengø.
Keny-ɑ ɑ́dwöög Yeeu, ɑ pyëjii yi jø gen kinni, “Dɑ gïnrɑj? Jɑɑl ɑ́nɑ̈ngɑni ɑ́bï-ɑ be ngø?”
Alöggi Yeeu kinni, “Jɑlɑni ngɑ̈nyi yi wun, o gïn-ɑ kømme ngɑ̈nyi yi wun.”
Alöggi gen kinni, “Kwïj yi wøn, köbbí wøn gïn-ɑ ɑ́kwøb yi en!”
Kɑ Yeeu okööbø kinni, “Yɑ ɑ́köbbe kinni i Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j okööbø kinni, ‘Yï ɑ́røny yi yɑn, yïn ɑ́ rɑ̈ɑ̈dh Isrɑil.’ ”
Kɑ ógudhi gen jwɑn gen ki peedh wïj tëd, o Yeeu cunge kì kömi gen. Akoodh kɑng, kɑ ge óryeerø kinni, “Yeeu bɑ rɑ̈dh!”
Kɑ Yörɑm göggi ki ɑmolpiny yi Yeeu wɑ̈d Yöcɑpɑt,

e Yörɑm ying-ɑ Yidhriil kun-ɑ ɑ́kedhe be tuuri keddi liny-ɑ ɑ́nyɑg yi en geki Adhɑil rɑ̈ɑ̈dh Arɑm kì Rɑmöth Gilyɑd. Yeeu jølinye ɑ́köbbe kinni, “Keløg wu ying-ɑ kömɑ, ko di ngɑn dhwödh, kɑ kedh-ɑ Yidhriil be töddi jiɑni.”
Codhe ɑkɑdhi Yeeu yij yɑ̈ye, kɑ kedh-ɑ Yidhriil kun-ɑ buud yi Yörɑm, e Akɑdhiyɑ̀ rɑ̈ɑ̈dh Yeudiyɑ̀ bëën Yidhriil be këëmi Yörɑm, o nudd e nud kì Yidhriil.
Jɑl-ɑ kurø kì ønbɑ̈r men-ɑ koor kɑɑl Yidhriil, Yeeu ɑ́lidhe geki jøge ge obëënø, ɑkööbe kinni, “Dɑ jøg mø nenni yi yɑn ge cyɑ̈dh-ɑ kyënyì.”
Alöggi Yörɑm kinni, “Öd ki ngɑn kedhi yï gen ki kyeny, kɑ renge be lidhi gen, ying gɑ wɑdd wɑlɑ̀ tyëngmɑ̈ɑ̈nø.”
Kɑ jɑl-ɑ ɑ́ör kedh-ɑ yï Yeeu ki kyeny, kɑ gø pyëje kinni, “Rɑ̈dh okööbø i yï cyɑ̈dhi kɑ mër?”
Alöggi Yeeu kinni, “Cwɑggí ɑ́ ngø? Wir kyenyí kɑ yï døøg ngɑ̈jɑ!”
Kɑ jɑlkor men-ɑ nëënø kì øn-ɑ koor kɑɑl okööbø kinni, “Jɑl-ɑ ɑ́ör ɑ́wɑ̈dhi yï gen, de nuti dwöögø.”
Kɑ ge cig-ɑ ör ki jɑl megø. Akedhe yï gen, ɑkööbe kinni, “Rɑ̈dh okööbø i yï cyɑ̈dhi kɑ mër?” Acigi Yeeu löggø kinni, “Cwɑggí ɑ́ ngø? Wir kyenyí kɑ yï døøg ngɑ̈jɑ!”
Kɑ jɑlkor cig-ɑ kwøb kinni, “Jɑl-ɑ ɑ́ör ɑ́wɑ̈dhi yï gen, de nuti dwöögø.” Kedh dhøge olengø yi en kinni, “Jɑl-ɑ pyejji jøgɑni, yɑ̈y kyewe kɑ ɑ́nɑ̈gø, nënni e nɑ Yeeu ceth!”

Kɑ Rɑ̈dh Yörɑm okööbø kinni, “Gwir wun yɑ̈yɑ.” Keny-ɑ ɑ́rume gwirø ɑkɑdhe yij yɑ̈y. Kɑ Rɑ̈dh Akɑdhiyɑ̀ kɑdh-ɑ yij yɑ̈ye thyew, ɑkedhi gen be pɑɑri Yeeu, men kì yij yɑ̈ye. Kɑ ge røøm-ɑ buti pwönh-ɑ ɑ́bëëd ɑ́ mi Nɑboth.
Apyëëj Yeeu yi Yörɑm, kinni, “Yï cyɑ̈dhi kɑ mër?”
Alöggi Yeeu kinni, “Mër óying me nud kidï, e meyí Yidhɑbel nudd e mɑll-ɑ jwögg-ɑ pɑth, o nudd e ceg-ɑ cyɑ̈dhø kì yï ɑ́jwöggì?”
Aryeer Yörɑm kinni, “Men bɑ rënyi pödhø, Akɑdhiyɑ̀!” Kedh yɑ̈ye oløgø yi en e órengø.
Kɑ Yeeu wethe kwɑnye, kɑ gø tënne ki tege bëne, kɑ weth pɑ̈dh-ɑ kömi Yörɑm kì kelli bɑ̈dde, kɑ twïy-ɑ wɑ̈g mine pyëde’ pyëdø. Kɑ Yörɑm pɑ̈dh-ɑ yij yɑ̈ye e kegø.
Kɑ Bidkɑr pënyi liny köbbi yi Yeeu kinni, “Kwɑnyu en kɑ leeng wun yij pwönh-ɑ ɑ́bëëd ɑ́ mi Nɑboth. Pɑr cyɑ̈ng-ɑ ɑ́cyɑ̈dhi wɑ kì bɑng Rɑ̈dh Akɑɑb wïyi Yörɑm, ɑ ɑ́köbbii yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kinni,

‘Nɑ̈gi Nɑboth geki wɑ̈dde ɑ́lidh yi yɑn ɑ́wɑ̈ɑ̈, Yɑn ɑ kööbø èn, yï ónɑ̈g-ɑ yij pwödhø men ceth.’ Kwɑnyu Yörɑm kɑ leeng wun yij pwönh-ɑ ɑ́bëëd ɑ́ mi Nɑboth, o møg-ɑ ɑ́kwøb yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j pɑ̈dhi gen kɑ̈jji gen.”

Akɑdhiyɑ̀ keny-ɑ ɑ́lidhe gïn-ɑ ɑ́cwöb, ɑrenge e kɑ̈l-ɑ kuni kɑɑl Bet Agɑn. Kɑ Yeeu løg-ɑ bɑnge, ɑköbbe jøge kinni, “Gøju en thyew!” Kɑ ree kïdhi gen ki kedø, e kedh-ɑ yuu Gur kì buti Iblïm. De ɑ́dyëëj ki wɑ̈dh pïd kɑ ɑ́wɑ̈dhe Megidø, ɑthøwe kì kunɑni.
Akïdhii Yerusɑlem yi jøge ki yɑ̈y, kɑ koony buti kweyye kì kɑɑl Debïd.
Akɑdhiyɑ̀ ɑ́røny ɑ́ rɑ̈ɑ̈dh Yeudiyɑ̀ e runni Yörɑm wɑ̈d Akɑɑb rɑ̈ɑ̈dh Isrɑil bɑ pyɑ̈rø wïdɑ́kyel kì yij lɑwø.
Yeeu ɑ́wɑ̈dhi Yidhriil. Kɑ gïn-ɑ ɑ́cwöb lïngi yi Yidhɑbel, ɑgide nyinge, kɑ yëyye pyële kidøøj. Kɑ ócungø e nenn-ɑ wɑ̈g kì ɑwɑj,
kedh Yeeu bï-ɑ kɑl. Akööb Yidhɑbel kinni, “Dɑ mër ki yïn, yï ɑ́nɑ̈g-ɑ wöw ni Dhimrì?”
Kɑ Yeeu wïje tïnge e lïïdh-ɑ yï Yidhɑbel. Alïïdh jøg ɑ́ryew wɑlɑ̀ ɑ́dɑ̈g kì kelli bɑ̈ngg-ɑ bɑ órøj piny kì ɑwɑj, kɑ ge lidh yi Yeeu.
Kɑ Yeeu okööbø kinni, “Cøøru en piny!” Kɑ gø leeng gen piny. Kɑ reme ceg-ɑ ì thiidh kì ri dörø geki kyënyì. Kɑ yɑ̈y kɑ̈ɑ̈l köme yi Yeeu.
Codhe, ɑkedhi Yeeu ød kɑ ocyɑ̈mø. Keny-ɑ ɑ́rume, ɑkööbe kinni, “Kwɑnyu nyɑdhey cyën menɑni, kɑ kony wun. Mɑ́ e bɑ nyirɑ̈dh.”
De keny-ɑ ɑ́kedh gen, ge ɑ́yod-ɑ tɑngdɑre geki cu tyelle kí cingge.
Adøøg gen be köbbi Yeeu ki møgɑni. Kɑ Yeeu okööbø kinni, “Bene gïn-ɑ ɑ́kwøb yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j ɑnɑn kinni i ócwöb, ɑ́kööb kinni, ‘Yidhɑbel ócɑm yi gwögg kì Yidhriil.
Yidhɑbel ódhong kì piny ni cyëdhø kì Yidhriil, bong ngɑn-ɑ óngijii kinni men bɑ Yidhɑbel.’ ”
Ádɑ yɑɑg gøl Akɑɑb pyɑ̈r ɑ́bïryew, mɑ ɑ́bëëd kì Sɑmɑriyɑ̀. Agwëëd Yeeu ki wɑ̈j møg ör Sɑmɑriyɑ̀, e gwëd-ɑ jɑgg geki jøgdøngø, kí tyëng-ɑ cinggi gen di yɑɑg gøl Akɑɑb kinni,
“Keny-ɑ ówɑ̈nhi wɑ̈nyø men yï wun, mɑ́ yɑɑg gøl Akɑɑb ying-ɑ yï wun, o yï wun dɑ yɑ̈thi liny, kí kyënyì kí myërr-ɑ thøø yi gerø, kí jɑmmi liny,
yïëëny wun ki dhɑnhø ɑ́kyel men-ɑ døj kì kelli wɑ̈ddi wïi wun, kɑ cïb wun wïj kwøøm wïye, kɑ wu nyïɑ̈ggi wun kipe gøl wïi wun.”
Abwøg jɑggi Sɑmɑriyɑ̀, ɑkööb gen kinni, “Dhø Yeeu pyem-ɑ dï yi wɑ, e ɑ́dhɑ̈li lwɑ̈ngø yi Rɑ̈dh Yörɑm geki Rɑ̈dh Akɑdhiyɑ̀?”

Codhe kɑ jɑngi gøl rɑ̈dh, kí jɑngi kɑɑl, kí jøgdøngø, kí tyëng-ɑ cinggi gen di yɑɑg gøl Akɑɑb öd-ɑ yï Yeeu kinni, “Wø bɑ bɑ̈nggí, gïn-ɑ köbbí wøn, ógwøg yi wøn. De wø pɑ pɑ̈nyi røny ki rɑ̈dh. Gwøg gïn-ɑ rømmi yi yïn e døøj.”
Agwëde gïn ki ryeew wɑ̈j kinni, “Keløg wu ying-ɑ tungɑ, keløg kwøbbɑ ólïngi yi wun, ngul wun wɑ̈thi yɑɑg gøl Akɑɑb wɑ̈g, kɑ ge muuj wun yɑn kì Yidhriil dhuki piny nɑ men.”
Yɑɑg gøl Akɑɑb gɑ pyɑ̈r ɑ́bïryew ɑ́bëëd ɑ buti jøg-ɑ mïdhi gen.
Keny-ɑ ɑ́wɑ̈nhi wɑ̈nyø yï gen, ɑnɑ̈ɑ̈g yɑɑg gøl rɑ̈dh bënn gɑ pyɑ̈r ɑ́bïryew. Kɑ wɑ̈thi gen cïb yethi dhöng, ɑöri gen Yeeu kì Yidhriil.
Keny-ɑ ɑ́muuj wöödø Yeeu kinni wɑ̈thi yɑɑg gøl Akɑɑb ɑ́rum ki kɑ̈ɑ̈lø, ɑkööbe kinni i cøng gen piny gɑ börr ɑ́ryew kì dhø döri kɑɑl, kɑ ge wiy bëëd gen kì kenyɑni gïti dhuki kì mwøl.
Kì mwøl, ɑkedhi Yeeu dhø döri kɑɑl, ɑköbbe tyëng-ɑ ying kenyɑni kinni, “Yï wun bɑ̈r, yɑn ɑ ɑ́wen Rɑ̈dh Yörɑm, kɑ nɑ̈gɑ. Dɑ́ men ɑ ɑ́nɑ̈g ji møg bënn?
Men nyodh-ɑ kinni møg-ɑ ɑ́kwøb yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kipe gøl Akɑɑb ɑ́pɑ̈dhi kɑ̈jji gen. Møg-ɑ ɑ́kwöng yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j ki dhøg jɑltönge Eliyɑ̀ ɑ́gwøg yi en.”
Codhe, ɑnɑ̈ɑ̈g wɑddi Akɑɑb bënn møg-ɑ ɑ́ying Yidhriil, kí pëjji linye, kí mɑ̈dhhe, kí ókwërre yi Yeeu. Bong dhɑnhø ɑ́kyel mɑ ɑ́wiy yi en kì kelli gen.
Adhwödh Yeeu kì Yidhriil, e kedh-ɑ Sɑmɑriyɑ̀. Keny-ɑ ɑ́wɑ̈dhe Bet Eked, ɑ wɑngi kɑɑl kwɑ̈yyi dyëg,
ɑrwööm gen ki kwï wɑddi Akɑdhiyɑ̀ rɑ̈ɑ̈dh Yeudiyɑ̀, ɑpyëje gïn kinni, “Wun-ɑ́ møg?”
Alöggi gen kinni, “Wø bɑ wɑddi Akɑdhiyɑ̀, wø kedh-ɑ Yidhriil be këëmi nyigi Yidhɑbel, kí tyëng gøl rɑ̈dh møg-ɑ kyeelø.”
Kɑ Yeeu jøge köbbe kinni, “Mɑgu gen!” Amɑg ge gïn, kɑ gï ngɑl gen kì buti wɑɑng pï, gɑ pyɑ̈r ɑ́ngwen wïdɑ́ryew, bong ɑ́kyel mɑ ɑ́wiy yi gen.
Adhwödh Yeeu kì kenyɑni, kɑ ge órwömø ki Yönɑdɑb wɑ̈d Rekɑb, e bï-ɑ yïe. Amɑ̈dhe Yönɑdɑb kɑ gø pyëje kinni, “Yijí bong ɑ́dud ki yɑn ni kɑ̀ bong yijɑ ɑ́dud ki yïn?”
Ayïëy Yönɑdɑb kinni, “Ngee, yijɑ bong ɑ́dud ki yïn.”
Aköbbii yi Yeeu kinni, “Kɑ̈ɑ̈l cingí.” Amɑɑg cinge yi Yeeu, kɑ gø kønye ki yedhi yij yɑ̈y.
Aköbbii yi Yeeu kinni, “Kedh wɑ, o tyiel-ɑ yijɑ kipe Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j lidh yi yïn.” Akedhi gen Sɑmɑriyɑ̀ kyeel
Keny-ɑ ɑ́wɑ̈dhi gen, ɑnɑ̈ɑ̈g wɑddi Akɑɑb bënn yi Yeeu, bong ɑ́kyel mɑ ɑ́wiy yi en, ɑpɑ̈dhi møg-ɑ ɑ́kwøb yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j ki dhøg Eliyɑ̀ kɑ̈jji gen ceth.
Tyëng Sɑmɑriyɑ̀ ɑ́cwøøl kej ɑ́kyel yi Yeeu, kɑ gï köbbe kinni, “Bɑɑl jwøg ɑ́mɑlli yi Akɑɑb kɑ mɑllø me nøg, de ómɑlli yi yɑn ki mɑllø me dwøng.

Cwööl wun jøtööng Bɑɑl bënn, kí tyëng-ɑ nyi mɑllii bënn, kí ókwërre bënn. Ko di ngɑn wiy, mɑ́ yïɑ dɑ gëëdhi me dwøng men mëggɑ Bɑɑl, o ngɑn-ɑ óbëëd e tøøk ceg kɑ nɑ̈gø.” (Menɑni ɑ́gwøg ɑ́ wëënyø yi Yeeu kipe kinni o nɑ̈ge jii Bɑɑl.)
Codhe, ɑkööb Yeeu kinni, “Kwøbu cyɑ̈ng-ɑ ówøøw Bɑɑl!” Kɑ cyɑ̈ngɑni kwøb.
Kɑ öd-ɑ myërri Isrɑil bënn ki wööni wööwø. Kɑ tyëng-ɑ nyi mɑlli Bɑɑl obëënø bënn, bong dhɑnhø kì kelli gen mɑ ɑ́cög e nuti bëënø. Akedhi gen kengi Bɑɑl, kɑ kengɑni opɑ̈ngø kinni dhij.
Kɑ Ókwër-ɑ Dwøng köbbi yi Yeeu kinni, kɑ̈ɑ̈le ógudhi kwër wɑ̈g, kɑ gï mëgge bɑ̈nggi Bɑɑl. Kɑ ógudhɑni muuje gïn.

Kɑ Yeeu geki Yönɑdɑb wɑ̈d Rekɑb kedh-ɑ yij kengi Bɑɑl. Aköbbi bɑ̈nggi Bɑɑl yi Yeeu kinni, “Nennu kelli wun kidøøj, ying e dɑ bɑ̈nggi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j mø nud, wiy bëëde ɑ́ bɑ̈nggi Bɑɑl keti gen ɑ nud.”

Codhe ɑkedhe be muuji gëëdhi geki gënh-ɑ nyi rɑ̈b bëne kì kengi Bɑɑl. Yeeu cïbi ngɑ̈ɑ̈j kengɑni ki jøg mø kwɑnni gen bɑ pyɑ̈r ɑ́bïdɑ̈g, o ge óköbbø yi en kinni, “Kɑ ge nɑ̈g wun bënn, ngɑn-ɑ ówëggi dhɑnhø bodhø, nɑ̈ɑ̈g-ɑ kej ngɑnɑni!”

Keny-ɑ ɑ́rum Yeeu ki muuji gëëdhi ceth, ɑköbbe jøg-ɑ kurø geki pëjji liny kinni, “Kedhu ød kɑ ge nɑ̈g wun bënn, ko di ngɑn wëggu bodhø!” Akedhi gen ød ki pilli gen kì cinggi gen, kɑ gï nɑ̈g gen bënn, kɑ gï ywɑ̈ɑ̈j gen wɑ̈g. Codhe, ɑkedhi gen yij gëëng Kengø,
kɑ lööj kwër kɑ̈ɑ̈l gen wɑ̈g, kɑ gø rɑ̈b gen.
Lööj kwër ɑ́rɑ̈b, kɑ kengø cøør piny, kɑ gwøg ɑ́ kej pyellø gïti dicyɑ̈ngtïn.
Bene kër-ɑ ɑ́kɑ̈ɑ̈l nyingi Bɑɑl wɑ̈g kì Isrɑil ɑnɑn yi Yeeu.
De Yeeu ɑ́göög ki orøøg Yeroboɑm, ngɑn-ɑ ɑ́göjji Isrɑil orøg, kɑ cïb-ɑ Betiil geki Dɑn ki røjø dhɑb ɑ́ men mɑlli.
Kɑ Yeeu köbbi yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kinni, “Kipe kɑ ɑ́göggí gøl Akɑɑb ki gïn-ɑ ɑ́tyer yi pyëwɑ, gølí ójyɑ̈ɑ̈gø kì Isrɑil kì yethi rïjj ɑ́ngwen.”
De Yeeu nuti cyɑ̈dhø kì bøli Jwøøg Isrɑil, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j ki pyëwe bëne, ɑ́yöd e ngøy-ɑ bëëdi Yeroboɑm ngɑn-ɑ ɑ́göjji Isrɑil orøg.
Kì bøli kenyɑni, piny Isrɑil kwëe ɑ́cööd wɑ̈g yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, Adhɑil rɑ̈ɑ̈dh Arɑm kwï piny Isrɑil ɑ́kɑbe.
Cɑg kì kuni wɑɑng cyɑ̈ɑ̈ng mwøl kì kömi Nɑm Urdun, gïti kɑɑl Aröeer kì wɑɑng wurlwɑl kì kömi Nɑm Arnön, menɑni reb-ɑ myërri Gilyɑd kí Bɑcɑn, piny-ɑ bëëd yi gøl Gɑd, kí gøl Ruben, kí budi gøl Mɑnɑsè.
Gïg-ɑ kyeelø møg-ɑ ɑ́gwøg yi Yeeu, ki tege bɑ ɑgwed kì yij
Akedhi Yeeu kun-ɑ di kweyye, kɑ kony kì Sɑmɑriyɑ̀, ɑrøøny Yöɑkɑdh wɑ̈de keje ɑ́ rɑ̈dh.
Yeeu ɑ́jyɑ̈ɑ̈g ɑ́ rɑ̈ɑ̈dh Isrɑil ki runn pyɑ̈r ɑ́ryew wïdɑ́bïdɑ̈g kì Sɑmɑriyɑ̀.
Keny-ɑ ɑ́lïng Athɑliyɑ̀ meyi Rɑ̈dh Akɑdhiyɑ̀ kinni wɑ̈de ónɑ̈gø, ɑkööbe kinni i nɑ̈ɑ̈g yɑɑg gøl rɑ̈dh bënn.

Yöcebɑ̀ nyɑɑr Rɑ̈dh Yeörɑm, nyiwï Akɑdhiyɑ̀ wïyi gen ɑ́kyel, Yöɑc wɑ̈d Akɑdhiyɑ̀ ɑ́kwɑɑle wɑ̈g kì kelli nyiirɑ̈dh møg-ɑ dwɑddi nɑ̈gø. Akwɑnye gøn geki 'mïnhe, kɑ gï kɑɑne yij ød megø kì yij Kengø kipe Athɑliyɑ̀.
Kɑ Yöɑc kɑnni kì yij Kengø yi Yöcebɑ̀ ki runn ɑ́bïkyel møg-ɑ jyɑ̈ɑ̈g Athɑliyɑ̀.

De kì ri bïryeew runn, ɑödi ókwërø Yöyɑdɑ̀ yï pëjji liny møg-ɑ nyi kor gøldwøng, ɑcwööle gïn yij Kengi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, ɑköbbe gïn kinni köngi gen kinni ge óyïëy ki gïn-ɑ dwɑddi gwøgø yi en, ɑnyudhe gïn nyirɑ̈ɑ̈dh gen.
Aköbbi jøgɑni yi Yöyɑdɑ̀ kinni, “Keny-ɑ óbëënu be kwëri cyɑ̈ɑ̈ng Sɑbɑth, wiy kyeel ɑ́dɑ̈ɑ̈g wun kor gen gøldwøng,
Kɑ kyeel ɑ́dɑ̈ɑ̈g wun men-ɑ kyeelø kore Dhøg Sur, kɑ kyeel ɑ́dɑ̈ɑ̈g wun men-ɑ döng, kore dhøng-ɑ pwödhø.
Kɑ ɑkudd ɑ́ryew mø jøkor, møg-ɑ di kedhi kɑ̈lli gen kì cyɑ̈ɑ̈ng ywömø, kor gen Kengø, ge kor-ɑ rɑ̈dh.
Kor gen rɑ̈dh e jɑmmi liny mø gen ying-ɑ cinggi gen ceth. Kɑ ngɑn-ɑ ócyɑ̈ngi nɑ̈g. Koru rɑ̈dh wu cyɑ̈dhi kɑ en, kenyi kedhe wɑ̈g, kí kenyi døøge ød.”
Alïngi kwøbbi Yöyɑdɑ̀ yi pëjjɑni, kɑ jø gen kɑ̈ɑ̈l gen yïe, jøg-ɑ ɑ́bï be gwøg, ki møg-ɑ di kedhi kɑ̈lli gen.
Kɑ tøngg kí ködd møg-ɑ ɑ́bëëd gɑ mø Rɑ̈dh Debïd mëggi gen yi Yöyɑdɑ̀, ókwëri Kengi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j.
Kɑ jøkor cung, ngɑn ki jɑmme kì cinge kì bɑdhhi Kengø, ge kor-ɑ rɑ̈dh.
Akɑ̈ɑ̈l nyirɑ̈dh wɑ̈g yi Yöyɑdɑ̀, kɑ yɑ̈ɑ̈r rɑ̈ɑ̈dhø cïbe wïje, ɑrønyii ɑ́ rɑ̈dh, kɑ mëggi wɑ̈nyi ciggi jyɑ̈gø. Ateng ji cinggi gen, kɑ ge óryeerø kinni, “Rɑ̈dh ómïdhi yi Jwøk!”
Kɑ cwɑggi ji geki jøkor lïngi yi Rɑ̈dh Athɑliyɑ̀, ɑjwɑne Kengø kun-ɑ cugi teedø.

Alidhe rɑ̈nh-ɑ nyɑ̈n e ócungø kì buti lööj dhø Kengø, ni kenyi cungi rɑ̈dh, kí jøg-ɑ jɑgg kì bɑdhhe, ji óryeerø ki medi pëëth, kɑ̈ngì okodhø. Kɑ Athɑliyɑ̀ ógødhe kɑge e óryeerø kinni, “Amolpiny! Amolpiny!”
Yöyɑdɑ̀ nuti dwɑddi kinni o Athɑliyɑ̀ nɑ̈g kì buti Kengø, ɑköbbe pëjji liny kinni, “Kïdhu en wɑ̈g e bɑ ɑtyeg yi liny, kɑ ngɑn-ɑ ódwɑddi yielii nɑ̈g wun.”
Kɑ gø mɑg gen, ɑkïdhii gøldwøng, kɑ nɑ̈g kì Dhøg Kyënyì.
Kɑ kwøb thuunh yi Yöyɑdɑ̀ kì kɑɑm ji geki Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j. Kinni ge óbëëdø gɑ jii Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j. Kɑ Rɑ̈dh köbbe nywɑ̈g ki kwøb geki ji thyew.
Codhe, ɑkedhi teedø kengi Bɑɑl, kɑ gø cøør gen piny, këlli lɑm ɑ́dhur gen piny geki ngïji Bɑɑl. Anɑ̈g gen Mɑtɑn, ókwëri Bɑɑl kì bøli këlli Bɑɑl.
Kɑ Yöyɑdɑ̀ ókɑ̈bbø ki jøg-ɑ kor Kengø.
Kɑ rɑ̈dh lwøøg gøldwøng yi en geki jyɑ̈ggì, kí liny-ɑ kor gøldwøng, ge ɑ́dhwödh-ɑ Kengø kɑ ge wɑ̈dh-ɑ gøldwøng, o teedø ócyɑ̈dhø kì bɑng gen. Kɑ Yöɑc kɑ̈l-ɑ Dhøg Jøkor, kɑ pëgg-ɑ wïj kwøm.
Kɑ pëthi ji ómïnø bënn, kɑ kɑɑl ókwöjø, mɑ́ Athɑliyɑ̀ rumø ki nɑ̈gø kì gøldwøng.
Yöɑc ɑ́røny ɑ́ rɑ̈ɑ̈dh Yeudiyɑ̀, e runne bɑ ɑ́bïryew.
Kì bïryeew runni jyɑ̈gi Yeeu rɑ̈ɑ̈dh Isrɑil, ɑ ɑ́jɑ̈ggi Yöɑc rɑ̈ɑ̈dh Yeudiyɑ̀. Yöɑc ɑ́jyɑ̈ɑ̈g ki runn pyɑ̈r ɑ́ngwen kì Yerusɑlem. Meye cwøl ɑ́ Dhibiyɑ̀ kì Bircebɑ̀.
Yöɑc ɑ́göög ki gïgdøj kì bøli Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kì yij bëëde bëne, mɑ́ e nyi köbb-ɑ yi ókwërø Yöyɑdɑ̀.
Kɑ̈jji mɑ̈ddø nuti dhur en piny, tyëngɑni nudd ge nyii muujø ki gëdhhì, o ge orɑ̈bø ki bɑkur.
nyi mïdhi gen bënn yi ókwërø, o ge nyi thïg Kengø, kenyi di keny me rɑj kì ree.
De gïti ri runn pyɑ̈r ɑ́ryew wïdɑ́dɑ̈g ri jɑ̈ggi Yöɑc, bong keny mɑ ɑ́thïg yi ókwër kì ri Kengø.

Acwøøl Yöyɑdɑ̀ geki ókwër yi Yöɑc, ɑpyëje gïn kinni, “Á kipe ngø ɑ bëëd e bong keny mɑ ɑ́thïg yi wun kì ri Kengø? Cɑg ɑnɑn ngyëny pɑ mëggi wun këti, kinni o ge mïdhi wun, muuj wun gen, o kɑ̈jj-ɑ ódwɑddi gwøgø gwøg.”
Ayïëy ókwër ki møgɑni, kí kinni kɑ̈jj-ɑ rijjø koo gwøg-ɑ yi gen.

Akɑ̈bbi ókwërø Yöyɑdɑ̀ ki sɑndug, kɑ kömi gøn twïye, ɑcïbe gøn buti këli lɑm kì tuung kyëj kì yij Kengi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j e dhɑnhø kedh-ɑ wɑ̈g. Codhe kɑ ngyënyy-ɑ nyi muuj yi ji, nyi cïb yije yi ókwërr-ɑ nyi göögø.
Kenyi lidh ge gøn kinni ngyëny ɑ́ngënyi kì yij sɑdungɑni, o jɑngi gøldwøng geki Ókwër-ɑ Dwøng nyi kedhi gen be kwɑni ngyëny, o gï twööj gen yethi kidhhì kì Kengi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j.
Ngyënyy-ɑ rum ki kwɑnø nyi mëgg-ɑ jøg-ɑ cinggi gen di gwøøg Kengø, o gï lony gen ki mëggi tyëng-ɑ gëdø.
O jøg-ɑ nyi twïgø ki ópɑddi kïttì, kí pɑ̈m nyi ngëëw gen ki jɑmmɑni bënn.
Bong kwï ngyënyyɑni mɑ ɑ́muuj gɑ møg ngëëw ki ɑ́tegø men thɑ̈ɑ̈dh ki óthɑ̈ggì, kí tɑ̈mmì, kí kɑ̈ngì, kí jɑmm-ɑ nyi gwøøg mɑny-ɑ nyi lyel, wɑlɑ̀ jɑmmi ɑ́tegø kí dhɑb møøgø.
Ngyënyyɑni bënn nyi cul-ɑ jøg-ɑ nyi gwøg Kengi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j.
Jøg-ɑ mïdhi gwøngɑni ɑ́bëëd cinggi gen tɑr, bene ɑ bɑnge ɑ́bëëd e bong ngɑn nyi pïd gen ki kwøbbi kwɑnni ngyëny.
Ngyënyyi gënhi bɑ̈jjø, kí gënhi orøg pɑ nyi kɑ̈ɑ̈l yij Kengi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, ge nyi mëgg-ɑ ókwër.
Keny-ɑ ɑ́pɑ̈ɑ̈r Adhɑil rɑ̈ɑ̈dh Arɑm kömi kɑɑl Gɑth, kɑ gø mɑge. Ádwɑdd-ɑ bëën be nyïɑ̈ggø ki Yerusɑlem,

Akwɑɑny gëdhhì bënn yi Yöɑc rɑ̈ɑ̈dh Yeudiyɑ̀, gen ɑ gëdhhi Yöcɑpɑt, kí Yeörɑm ɑ bɑnge ɑ́jɑ̈gge, kí gëdhhi Akɑdhiyɑ̀ wïye, rɑ̈ɑ̈dh Yeudiyɑ̀ møg-ɑ ɑ́thyey yi en. Kí gëdhhe, kí dhɑb men-ɑ ɑ́yod yi en kì yij Sɑndug kì yij Kengi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, kɑ gï mëgge Adhɑil. Adøg Adhɑil, ɑcöge e pɑ bï Yerusɑlem.
Gïg-ɑ kyeelø møg-ɑ ɑ́gwøg yi Yöɑc rɑ̈ɑ̈dh Yeudiyɑ̀, bɑ ɑgwed kì yij

Anywɑ̈ggi Yöɑc dhøg yi bɑ̈ngge, kɑ nɑ̈g yi ɑ́ryew kì kelli gen, ɑ løg Yödhɑker wɑ̈d Cimeɑth geki Yödhɑbɑd wɑ̈d Cömer kì yij øn-ɑ ɑ́ying wɑɑng cyɑ̈ɑ̈ng mwøl kì Yerusɑlem, kì yuu-ɑ kedhi Silɑ̀. Akoony Yöɑc kì kɑɑl Debïd, ɑrøøny Amɑdhiyɑ̀ wɑ̈de keje ɑ́ rɑ̈dh.
Kì pyɑ̈r ɑ́ryew wïdɑ́dɑ̈ɑ̈g runni Yöɑc wɑ̈d Akɑdhiyɑ̀ ɑ́ rɑ̈ɑ̈dh Yeudiyɑ̀, ɑ ɑ́røøny Yöɑkɑdh wɑ̈d Yeeu ɑ́ rɑ̈ɑ̈dh Isrɑil. Ajyɑ̈ɑ̈ge ki runn pyɑ̈rø wïdɑ́bïryew kì Sɑmɑriyɑ̀.
Rɑ̈dh Yöɑkɑdh ɑ́göög ki orøg kì bøli Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, kɑ Isrɑil peeje yij orøg, kɑ ódhɑ̈lø wïyø ki orøg ni Rɑ̈dh Yeroboɑm wɑ̈d Nebɑt.
Codhe, ɑrënyi pyëw Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j ki Isrɑil, kɑ gø wëgge tyɑmø yi Adhɑil rɑ̈ɑ̈dh Arɑm geki wɑ̈de Benɑdɑd tyel mø gïïr.
Akwɑjji Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j yi Yöɑkɑdh, ɑløøg kwɑ̈jje yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, mɑ́ rɑjj-ɑ ɑ́göggi tyëng Isrɑil yi Adhɑil rɑ̈ɑ̈dh Arɑm ɑ́lidh yi en.
Anëngi Isrɑil yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j ki pëëji men yielii ki orɑnge kì cinggi tyëng Arɑm, kɑ tyëng Isrɑil døøg-ɑ be bëëdø kì yethi myërri gen ki mër ni kɑ ɑ́bëëd gen cøn.
De tyëng Isrɑil nuti wïyø ki orøng-ɑ́ yije ɑ́peej gen yi Yeroboɑm, de ge nudd ge ceg-ɑ orøg ceth, ngïji Aceerɑ̀ nudd e nud kì Sɑmɑriyɑ̀.
Bong jøliny mɑ ɑ́döng kì yï Yöɑkɑdh, den-ɑ́ jøkyënyì pyɑ̈r ɑ́bïj kí yɑ̈thi liny pyɑ̈rø, kí jøliny tyel gɑ ɑ́lïp pyɑ̈rø, mɑ́ ge ɑ́tyëg ki nɑ̈gø yi rɑ̈ɑ̈dh Arɑm, gï ɑ́nyøne ni ɑyejø kì piny.
Gïg-ɑ kyeelø møg-ɑ ɑ́gwøg yi Yöɑkɑdh, kí tege bëne bɑ ɑgwed kì yij
Akedhi Yöɑkɑdh kun-ɑ di kweyye, kɑ kony kì Sɑmɑriyɑ̀, ɑrøøny wɑ̈de Yeöɑc keje ɑ rɑ̈dh.
Kì pyɑ̈r ɑ́dɑ̈g wïdɑ́bïryeew runni Yöɑc wɑ̈d Yöɑkɑdh, rɑ̈ɑ̈dh Yeudiyɑ̀ kì yij lɑwø, ɑ ɑ́jɑ̈ggi Yeöɑc wɑ̈d Yöɑkɑdh rɑ̈ɑ̈dh Isrɑil, kɑ ojyɑ̈gø ki runn pyɑ̈rø wïdɑ́bïkyel kì Sɑmɑriyɑ̀.
Ágöög ki gïgrijjø thyew kì bøli Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, ni orøøg Yeroboɑm wɑ̈d Nebɑt, ngɑn-ɑ ɑ́peej Isrɑil yij orøg.
Gïg-ɑ kyeelø møg-ɑ gwøg yi Yeöɑc, kí tege kí linye geki Amɑdhiyɑ̀ rɑ̈ɑ̈dh Yeudiyɑ̀ bɑ ɑgwed kì yij
Akedhi Yeöɑc kun-ɑ di kweyye, kɑ kony kì rörri gøl rɑ̈ɑ̈dhø kì Sɑmɑriyɑ̀, ɑrøøny wɑ̈de Ryeew Yeroboɑm keje ɑ́ rɑ̈dh.
Akööb Elicɑ̀ kinni, “Kɑ̈ní ki weth kí nywøle.” Akɑ̈ni Yeöɑc.
Aköbbi rɑ̈ɑ̈dh Isrɑil yi Elicɑ̀ kinni, tënní weth, kɑ gø tënne; kɑ Elicɑ̀ cingge cïbe köme cinggi rɑ̈dh.

Akööb Elicɑ̀ kinni, “Yieb ɑwɑj kì tung-ɑ kuni Arɑm.” Ayiebe gøn. Codhe, ɑkööb Elicɑ̀ kinni, “Gøj weth!” Agöjje. Akööb Elicɑ̀ kinni, “Weth Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j men-ɑ ótyɑɑm Arɑm. Wu ónyïɑ̈ggi ki tyëng Arɑm kì Ápek pïd keny-ɑ ótyɑɑm gen.”
Aköbbi rɑ̈dh yi Elicɑ̀ kinni, “Kwɑny nywøli weth møg-ɑ ɑ́döng kɑ ge gøøj piny!” Kɑ göjj-ɑ piny ki tyel ɑ́dɑ̈g, kɑ ówïyø.
Amɑɑg jɑltöng yi liny ki gøn, kɑ gø köbbe kinni, “Yï di göjji kɑ tyel ɑ́bïj wɑlɑ̀ ɑ́bïkyel, bene ɑ di tyɑɑm Arɑm ki tyɑmi dwøng, de ɑnɑn ge ótyɑm yi yïn kɑ tyel ɑ́dɑ̈g kete.”
Athøw Elicɑ̀, kɑ kony.
Ádɑ jø Moɑb møg nyi bï be mɑ̈nyø Isrɑil kì ri cɑ̈gi run.
Jøgɑni ɑ́bï cyɑ̈ng megø ji ceg-ɑ kony ki jɑl me thøø, ɑleengii yij buur Elicɑ̀ yi jøg-ɑ kunyø, kɑ ge órengø. Kɑ ɑ́nywɑɑl cu Elicɑ̀ yi jɑl-ɑ thøø, ɑcyɑ̈re, kɑ dhwödh-ɑ kömi tyelle.
Kì ri jyɑ̈gi Yöɑkɑdh bëne, nyingi tyëng Isrɑil ɑ́guud yi Adhɑil rɑ̈ɑ̈dh Arɑm.
De Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j ɑ́bëëd pyëwe nyii lɑ̈ɑ̈mø ki tyëng Isrɑil, kɑ gï nyi kønye kipe møg-ɑ ɑ́könge Abrɑhɑm, kí Isɑɑk, kí Yɑgob, ɑcöge gï nuti wiy en piny gïti dicyɑ̈ngtïn.
Keny-ɑ ɑ́thøw Adhɑil rɑ̈ɑ̈dh Arɑm, ɑrøøny Benɑdɑd wɑ̈de keje ɑ́ rɑ̈dh.

Codhe, ɑdøøg myërr-ɑ ɑ́kɑb yi Adhɑil ki dwöögø yi Yeöɑc wɑ̈d Yöɑkɑdh kì cingi Benɑdɑd ki liny. Benɑdɑd ɑ́tyɑm yi Yeöɑc ki tyel ɑ́dɑ̈g, kɑ myërri Isrɑil bënn, møg-ɑ ɑ́mɑg yi Benɑdɑd kì ri jyɑ̈gi Yöɑkɑdh wïye dwööge.
Kì ryeew runni Yeöɑc wɑ̈d Yöɑkɑdh ɑ́ rɑ̈ɑ̈dh Isrɑil kì yij lɑwø, ɑ ɑ́göög Amɑdhiyɑ̀ wɑ̈d Yöɑc ɑ́ rɑ̈ɑ̈dh Yeudiyɑ̀,
ɑ́göög ki rɑ̈dh e runne bɑ pyɑ̈r ɑ́ryew wïdɑ́bïj, kɑ ojyɑ̈gø kì Yerusɑlem ki runn pyɑ̈r ɑ́ryew wïdɑ́bïngwen. Meye cwøl ɑ́ Yöɑdïn kì Yerusɑlem.
Ágöög ki gïgdøj kì bøli Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j de pɑ pɑ̈ɑ̈r ki kwɑn Debïd, mɑ́ e ɑ́gwøg-ɑ gïg ni møg-ɑ ɑ́gøggi yi Yöɑc wïye.
Kɑ̈jji mɑ̈ddø nuti cøør en piny, o ji ɑ́bëëd ge nyi kedh-ɑ kɑ̈jjɑni be muujø ki gëdhhì kí be rɑ̈b ki bɑkur.
Amɑdhiyɑ̀ keny-ɑ ɑ́rume cïbi lɑwø piny ceth, ɑnɑ̈ge jøg-ɑ ɑ́nɑ̈g wïye,

De nyigi jøgɑni nuti nɑ̈ɑ̈g en, mɑ́ e bɑ ɑkerø kì yij Wɑ̈nyi Ciggi Mosɑ̀ kinni, “Wëëg ko nyi nɑ̈g kipe gïn bɑj yi nyigi gen. Kɑ othønhø ko nyi nɑ̈g kipe gïn bɑj yi wëëg gen. Dhɑnhø nɑ̈g kɑ per gïn-ɑ bɑj yi en kiree.”
Amɑdhiyɑ̀ ɑ́nɑ̈gi kì kelli liny Edöm ki ji ɑ́lïp pyɑ̈rø kì yij töör Luuy Omelø. Kɑ kɑɑl Selɑ̀ mɑge kì yij linyɑni, kɑ gø cɑge ɑ́ Yoktheel, nudd e cwølli kɑ nyingɑni gïti dicyɑ̈ngtïn.
Codhe, kɑ Amɑdhiyɑ̀ öd-ɑ yï Rɑ̈dh Yeöɑc wɑ̈d Yöɑkɑdh ki ji mø köbbii kinni, “Bïí pɑ̈nyi wɑ riee!”

De ɑ́lony ki ödø ki wöödø yi Rɑ̈dh Yeöɑc kinni, “Tyelø ɑ́kyel kì wɑ̈thi Kïti Lubnɑn, otwelø ɑ́ödi yi óthurø ki wöödø kinni, ‘Mëggí nyɑrí wɑ̈dɑ ɑ́ dhɑjø.’ Kɑ lɑ̈y me dwøng obëënø e ócyɑ̈dhø kɑ otwelɑni nyøøne piny.
Amɑdhiyɑ̀, yï ɑ́tɑ̈d kì bɑng kɑ ɑ́tyɑɑm tyëng Edöm. Cöög ki dhwɑ̈ng-ɑ yïí, kɑ yï pëggí pɑɑrí, yïde ɑ yɑ̈ɑ̈b ki göny rënyi yïn, wuki jií.”
De Amɑdhiyɑ̀ ɑ́dhɑ̈li lïngø. Codhe, ɑdhwödhi Rɑ̈dh Yeöɑc, rɑ̈ɑ̈dh Isrɑil be nyɑɑg ki en, kì Bet Cemec kì myërri Yeudiyɑ̀.
Kɑ Amɑdhiyɑ̀ tyɑm, kɑ jølinye otɑyø men reng-ɑ pɑɑ gen.
Amɑdhiyɑ̀ ɑ́mɑg yi Yeöɑc kì yij linyɑni kì Bet Cemec kɑ gø køøle Yerusɑlem. Kɑ döri kɑɑl cøøre piny, cɑg kì Dhøg Eprɑim gïti Dhøg Wïj Tung, kɑɑmɑni bɑ̈ri kööre bɑ mïtïr miy ɑ́ryew.
Kɑ dhɑb kí ɑ́tegø bëne men-ɑ ɑ́yode kwɑnye, jɑmmi Kengø geki mø gøldwøng ɑ́kwɑny en, kɑ gï kïdhe Sɑmɑriyɑ̀. Kɑ oköödø ki ɑmɑgg thyew.
Gïg-ɑ kyeelø møg-ɑ ɑ́gwøg yi Yeöɑc, kí tegi linye, kí liny gen ki Amɑdhiyɑ̀ rɑ̈ɑ̈dh Yeudiyɑ̀, ge bɑ ɑgwed kì yij
Kɑ Yeöɑc kedh-ɑ kun-ɑ di kweyye, kɑ kony ki rörri gøl rɑ̈ɑ̈dhø kì Sɑmɑriyɑ̀. Kɑ wɑ̈de, Ryeew Yeroboɑm røøny keje.
Rɑ̈dh Amɑdhiyɑ̀ ɑ́döng e onëënø keny-ɑ ɑ́thøw Rɑ̈dh Yeöɑc, rɑ̈ɑ̈dh Isrɑil, ɑ lunye ki thøø kì bɑng runn pyɑ̈rø wïdɑ́bïj.
Gïg-ɑ kyeelø bënn møg-ɑ ɑ́gwøg yi Rɑ̈dh Amɑdhiyɑ̀ bɑ ɑgwed kì yij
Ádɑ ɑmolpiny mɑ ɑ́göggi Amɑdhiyɑ̀ kinni o di nɑ̈g, codhe ɑpɑ̈ɑ̈re Lɑkic, de tyëngmɑ̈ɑ̈nø ɑ́løg bɑnge kɑ gø nɑ̈g gen kì kunɑni.
Kɑ kïdhi Yerusɑlem e thøø, gø okɑ̈llø yi gen kì kömi kyeny. Kɑ koony rörri gøl rɑ̈ɑ̈dhø kì kɑɑl Debïd.
Kɑ Udhiyɑ̀ wɑ̈d Amɑdhiyɑ̀ røøny kej wïye ɑ rɑ̈dh yi tyëng Yeudiyɑ̀, e runne bɑ pyɑ̈rø wïdɑ́bïkyel.
Kɑ Elɑth døøg ki mɑgø yi Udhiyɑ̀ e wïye rum thøø, kɑ gø cige gerø.
Kì pyɑ̈rø wïdɑ́bïïj runni Amɑdhiyɑ̀ wɑ̈d Yöɑc ɑ́ rɑ̈ɑ̈dh Yeudiyɑ̀, ɑ ɑ́jɑ̈ggi Yeroboɑm wɑ̈d Yeöɑc ɑ́ rɑ̈ɑ̈dh Isrɑil, ɑjyɑ̈ɑ̈ge kì Sɑmɑriyɑ̀ ki runn pyɑ̈r ɑ́ngwen wïdɑ́kyel.
Yeroboɑm wɑ̈d Yeöɑc ɑ́røngi kì bøli Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j ni orøng-ɑ ɑ́gwøg yi Yeroboɑm wɑ̈d Nebɑt cøn, ngɑn-ɑ ɑ́peej Isrɑil yij orøg.

Pìny-ɑ ɑ́bëëd gɑ mø Isrɑil ɑ́dwööge bënn, cɑg kì Amɑth kì wɑɑng wuudø gïti Luuy Omelø kì wɑɑng wurlwɑl ni kwøbb-ɑ ɑ́kwøb yi Jwøøg Isrɑil, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, ki dhø bɑ̈nge Yönɑ̀, wɑ̈d Amitɑy, jɑltööng Gɑth Ëper.
Orɑng-ɑ ɑ́rɑngi tyëng Isrɑil e bong ngɑn køny gen ɑ́lidh yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j.
De ɑ́bëëd e pɑth ki gïn-ɑ ɑ́dwɑddi yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, kinni o Isrɑil nyinge lɑ̈ɑ̈nye kì kömi piny. Bene ɑ yiele gïn kì ri Ryeew Yeroboɑm.
Gïg-ɑ kyeelø møg-ɑ ɑ́gwøg yi Ryeew Yeroboɑm, ɑ løg tege, kí yëth-ɑ ɑ́nyïɑ̈gge, kí kɑ ɑ́dwööge Dimɑceg geki Amɑth, bɑ ɑgwed kì yij
Akedhi Yeroboɑm kun-ɑ di kweyye, kɑ kony kì rörri gøl rɑ̈ɑ̈dhø, ɑrøøny Dhekɑriyɑ̀ wɑ̈de keje ɑ́ rɑ̈dh.
Kì pyɑ̈r ɑ́ryew wïdɑ́bïryeew runni Ryeew Yeroboɑm rɑ̈ɑ̈dh Isrɑil kì yij lɑwø, ɑ ɑ́røøny Udhiyɑ̀ wɑ̈d Amɑdhiyɑ̀ ɑ́ rɑ̈ɑ̈dh Yeudiyɑ̀.
Ájɑ̈ggi e runne bɑ pyɑ̈rø wïdɑ́bïkyel, kɑ ojyɑ̈gø ki runn pyɑ̈r ɑ́bïj wïdɑ́ryew kì Yerusɑlem.
Ágöög ki gïgdøj kì bøli Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, ni wïye Amɑdhiyɑ̀.
De kɑ̈jji mɑ̈ddø nuti dhur en piny, o ji ɑ́nudd ge nyii muujø ki gëëdhi, o ge orɑ̈bø ki bɑkur kì kɑ̈jjɑni.
Agöjji Rɑ̈dh Udhiyɑ̀ wɑɑny yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, kɑ dële ocögø ɑ́ wɑɑny gïti cyɑ̈ng-ɑ ɑ́thøwe. Ábëëd ɑ øde kì wɑ̈ye. Pödhø ɑ́jɑɑg-ɑ yi Yöthɑm wɑ̈de.
Gïg-ɑ kyeelø bënn møg-ɑ ɑ́gwøg yi Udhiyɑ̀, bɑ ɑgwed kì yij
Akedhi Udhiyɑ̀ kun-ɑ di kweyye, kɑ koony buti kweyye kì kɑɑl Debïd. Arøøny Yöthɑm wɑ̈de keje ɑ́ rɑ̈dh.
Kì pyɑ̈r ɑ́dɑ̈g wïdɑ́bïdɑ̈ɑ̈g runni Udhiyɑ̀ rɑ̈ɑ̈dh Yeudiyɑ̀ kì yij lɑwø, ɑ ɑ́røøny Dhekɑriyɑ̀ wɑ̈d Ryeew Yeroboɑm ɑ́ rɑ̈ɑ̈dh Isrɑil. Kɑ ojyɑ̈gø ki dwɑ̈tt ɑ́bïkyel kì Sɑmɑriyɑ̀.
Ágöög ki gïgrijjø kì bøli Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j ni wïye, ɑ́røngi ni Yeroboɑm wɑ̈d Nebɑt, ngɑn-ɑ ɑ́peej Isrɑil yij orøg.
Kɑ Rɑ̈dh Dhekɑriyɑ̀ göggi ki ɑmolpiny yi Cɑlum wɑ̈d Yɑbic, ɑgøøje gøn piny kì Iblïm kɑ gø nɑ̈ge, kɑ ójɑ̈ggø kì keje.
Gïg-ɑ kyeelø møg-ɑ ɑ́gwøg yi Dhekɑriyɑ̀ bɑ ɑgwed kì yij
Kì pyɑ̈r ɑ́dɑ̈g wïdɑ́bïngween runni Udhiyɑ̀ rɑ̈ɑ̈dh Yeudiyɑ̀ kì yij lɑwø, ɑ ɑ́røøny Cɑlum wɑ̈d Yɑbic ɑ́ rɑ̈ɑ̈dh Isrɑil, ɑjyɑ̈ɑ̈ge ki dwɑ̈y ɑ́kyel kì Sɑmɑriyɑ̀.
Codhe ɑbëën Menɑim wɑ̈d Gɑdì e kɑ̈ɑ̈l-ɑ Tirdhɑ̀, ɑnɑ̈ge Cɑlum wɑ̈d Yɑbic kì Sɑmɑriyɑ̀, ɑjɑ̈gge kì keje.
Gïg-ɑ kyeelø møg-ɑ ɑ́gwøg yi Cɑlum wɑ̈d Yɑbic, kí ɑ́wenɑwenø men-ɑ ɑ́gwøge, bɑ ɑgwed kì yij
Keny-ɑ ɑ́bëën Menɑim e kɑ̈ɑ̈l-ɑ Tirdhɑ̀, ɑrënye kɑɑl Tɑpuɑ̀ ki rënyi teg, tyëng kɑɑlɑni, kí myërr-ɑ bute ɑ́nɑ̈ge bënn, mɑ́ tyëng kɑɑlɑni ɑ́bɑ̈nyi yömmi yïe, kɑ yethi ɑ́yɑjj kɑge thyew.
Kì pyɑ̈r ɑ́dɑ̈g wïdɑ́bïngwen runni Udhiyɑ̀ rɑ̈ɑ̈dh Yeudiyɑ̀ kì yij lɑwø, ɑ ɑ́røøny Menɑim wɑ̈d Gɑdì ɑ́ rɑ̈ɑ̈dh Isrɑil, ɑjyɑ̈ɑ̈ge ki runn pyɑ̈rø kì Sɑmɑriyɑ̀.
Menɑim ɑ́røngi kì bøli Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kì yij bëëde bëne, ki orøng ni orøøg Yeroboɑm wɑ̈d Nebɑt, ngɑn-ɑ ɑ́peej Isrɑil yij orøg.
Abëën Tiglɑth Pileser, rɑ̈nhdwøøng Acuur be pɑ̈ɑ̈r kömi Isrɑil, ɑnëngii yi Menɑim ki ɑ́tegø ɑ́ kïllì ɑ́lïp pyɑ̈r ɑ́dɑ̈g wïdɑ́ngwen, kipe kinni o Menɑim køny yi en, o nëngi ki tegø men jɑɑge pödhø.
Jøkɑ̈rì kì Isrɑil ɑ́gwɑj yi Menɑim, jɑl ɑ́kyel yïe ɑ́kɑ̈bbe ki ngyëny ɑ́tegg pyɑ̈r ɑ́bïj mø mëgge rɑ̈nhdwøøng Acuur, codhe ɑdøøg rɑ̈nhdwøøng Acuur pödhe.
Gïg-ɑ kyeelø møg-ɑ ɑ́gwøg yi Menɑim bɑ ɑgwed kì yij
Akedhi Menɑim kun-ɑ di kweyye, kɑ koony buti kweyye, ɑrøøny Pekɑiyɑ̀ wɑ̈de keje ɑ́ rɑ̈dh.
Kì pyɑ̈r ɑ́bïïj runni Udhiyɑ̀ rɑ̈ɑ̈dh Yeudiyɑ̀ kì yij lɑwø, ɑ ɑ́røøny Pekɑiyɑ̀ wɑ̈d Menɑim ɑ́ rɑ̈ɑ̈dh Isrɑil, ɑjyɑ̈ɑ̈ge ki runn ɑ́ryew kì Sɑmɑriyɑ̀.
Pekɑiyɑ̀ ɑ́røngi kì bøli Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, ni orøng-ɑ ɑ́gwøg yi Yeroboɑm wɑ̈d Nebɑt, ngɑn-ɑ ɑ́peej Isrɑil yij orøg.

Pënyi liny me cwøl ɑ́ Pekɑ̀ wɑ̈d Remɑliyɑ̀, ɑ́göög ki ɑmolpiny geki jøliny mø kwɑnni gen bɑ pyɑ̈r ɑ́bïj kì Gilyɑd, kɑ Pekɑiyɑ̀ nɑ̈g yi gen, kì øn-ɑ teg kì gøldwøng kì Sɑmɑriyɑ̀, ɑkwɑɑny kej Pekɑiyɑ̀ yi Pekɑ̀ kɑ ree gwøge ɑ́ rɑ̈ɑ̈dh Isrɑil.
Gïg-ɑ kyeelø møg-ɑ ɑ́gwøg yi Pekɑiyɑ̀ bɑ ɑgwed kì yij
Kì pyɑ̈r ɑ́bïj wïdɑ́ryeew runni Udhiyɑ̀ rɑ̈ɑ̈dh Yeudiyɑ̀ kì yij lɑwø, ɑ ɑ́røøny Pekɑ̀ wɑ̈d Remɑliyɑ̀ ɑ́ rɑ̈ɑ̈dh Isrɑil, ɑjyɑ̈ɑ̈ge ki runn pyɑ̈r ɑ́ryew kì Sɑmɑriyɑ̀.
Pekɑ̀ ɑ́røngi kì bøli Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j ni orøng-ɑ ɑ́gwøg yi Yeroboɑm wɑ̈d Nebɑt, ɑ ɑ́peej Isrɑil yij orøg.

Kì yethi cyɑ̈nggi jyɑ̈gi Pekɑ̀ rɑ̈ɑ̈dh Isrɑil ɑ ɑ́bëën Tiglɑth Pileser rɑ̈nhdwøøng Acuur, kɑ Iyön kí Abel Bet Mɑɑkɑ̀, kí Yɑnoɑ̀, kí Kedec, kí Adhör, kí Gilyɑd, kí Gɑlelì, kí myërri Nɑptɑlì gï mɑge bënn, kɑ jii myërrɑni kïdhe Acuur gɑ ɑmɑgg.
Kì pyɑ̈r ɑ́ngween runni Yöthɑm wɑ̈d Udhiyɑ̀, rɑ̈ɑ̈dh Yeudiyɑ̀ kì yij lɑwø, ɑ ɑ́thuub Pekɑ̀ wɑ̈d Remɑliyɑ̀ yi Öciyɑ̀ wɑ̈d Elɑ̀, kɑ gø nɑ̈ge, ɑjɑ̈gge kì keje.
Gïg-ɑ kyeelø møg-ɑ ɑ́gwøg yi Pekɑ̀ bɑ ɑgwed kì yij
Kì ryeew runni Pekɑ̀ wɑ̈d Remɑliyɑ̀ kì yij lɑwø, ɑ ɑ́røøny Yöthɑm wɑ̈d Udhiyɑ̀ ɑ́ rɑ̈ɑ̈dh Yeudiyɑ̀.
Árøny runne bɑ pyɑ̈r ɑ́ryew wïdɑ́bïj, kɑ ojyɑ̈gø ki runn pyɑ̈rø wïdɑ́bïkyel kì Yerusɑlem. Meye cwøl ɑ́ Yerucɑ̀ nyɑɑr Dhɑdök.
Yöthɑm ɑ́göög ki gïgdøj kì bøli Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j ni wïye Udhiyɑ̀.
De kɑ̈jji mɑ̈ddø nuti dhur en piny, ɑ́bëëd ji nudd ge nyii muujø ki gëdhhì kì kɑ̈jjɑni, kɑ ge nyii rɑ̈bø ki bɑkur. Yöthɑm en ɑ ɑ́ger Dhøg Wɑɑng Wuudø, men-ɑ yïëbbi Kengi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j.
Gïg-ɑ kyeelø møg-ɑ ɑ́gwøg yi Yöthɑm bɑ ɑgwed kì yij
Kì yethi cyɑ̈nggɑni ɑ ɑ́ör Redhïn rɑ̈ɑ̈dh Arɑm geki Pekɑiyɑ̀ rɑ̈ɑ̈dh Isrɑil yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j be nyïɑ̈ggø ki Yeudiyɑ̀.
Akedhi Yöthɑm kun-ɑ di kweyye, kɑ koony buti kweyye kì kɑɑl Debïd, ɑrøøny Akɑɑdh wɑ̈de keje ɑ́ rɑ̈dh.
Kì bïryeew runni Pekɑ̀ wɑ̈d Remɑliyɑ̀ kì yij lɑwø, ɑ ɑ́göög Akɑɑdh wɑ̈d Yöthɑm ki rɑ̈ɑ̈dh Yeudiyɑ̀.
Akɑɑdh ɑ́göög ki rɑ̈dh e runne bɑ pyɑ̈r ɑ́ryew, kɑ ojyɑ̈gø kì Yerusɑlem ki runn pyɑ̈rø wïdɑ́bïkyel. Nuti göögø ki gïgdøj kì bøli Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j ni kwɑn Debïd,
de ɑ́ngøy-ɑ bëëdi rɑ̈nhi Isrɑil. Wɑ̈de ɑ́rɑ̈be thyew ɑ́ gëëdhi, e ngøy-ɑ kwööng jurr-ɑ ɑ́cyeed wɑ̈g yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, kì bøli tyëng Isrɑil.
Kɑ nyii rɑ̈bø ki gëdhhì, kí bɑkur kì kɑ̈jji mɑ̈ddø, geki wɑ̈thi kïttì kí thɑ̈thi yenh-ɑ tïbbi gen døngø.
Kɑ Elɑth døøg-ɑ yï rɑ̈ɑ̈dh Edöm kì bøli kenyɑni, kɑ tyëng Yeudiyɑ̀ møg-ɑ ɑ́bëëd kì yije cyeede wɑ̈g. Kɑ tyëng Edöm pëgg-ɑ yije, o ge nudd ge bëëd ɑ yije dicyɑ̈ngtïn.
Akɑɑdh ɑ́ödi yï Tiglɑth Pileser rɑ̈nhdwøøng Acuur, ki ji møg köbbii kinni, “Yɑ bɑ bɑ̈ngí ceth. Bïí yiel yɑn ki rɑ̈ɑ̈dh Arɑm geki rɑ̈ɑ̈dh Isrɑil; wɑngɑ ɑ́guud yi gen.”
Dhɑb geki ɑ́tegø ɑ́kwɑny yi Akɑɑdh kì Kengø geki gøldwøng, kɑ gï öre rɑ̈nhdwøøng Acuur, gɑ møg kwɑjjii.
Kɑ rɑ̈nhdwøøng Acuur oyïëyø. Aöde Dimɑceg ki liny, kɑ döre cøør piny, kɑ Rɑ̈dh Redhïn nɑ̈g.
Kɑ Akɑɑdh kedh-ɑ Dimɑceg be yïddø ki Rɑ̈nhdwøng Tiglɑth Pileser. Kɑ ólïdhø ki këli lɑm kì kɑɑlɑni, ɑöre ngïje Yerusɑlem yï ókwërø Uriyɑ̀, ki kër-ɑ ógerii.
Codhe, kɑ Uriyɑ̀ ogëdø ki këli lɑm me ni menɑni. Kɑ órumø ki gerø e Akɑɑdh nudd e tøøk, ɑ́ger en e pɑ̈r ki ngïny-ɑ ɑ́örii kinni tïp.
Keny-ɑ ɑ́dwöög Rɑ̈dh Akɑɑdh kì Dimɑceg, ɑyuude këli lɑm e rumø ki gerø.
Kɑ ongɑ̈dø ki gënh-ɑ nyi rɑ̈b bëne kì köme, kɑ orɑ̈bø ki byëlø thyew. Kɑ köme kunye ki remi gënhi mër geki møgi oløg.
Këli lɑm mi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j men-ɑ bɑ dilɑl ɑ́ying-ɑ kɑɑm këli lɑm men-ɑ nyɑ̈n geki Kengø, kɑ nyiig yi Akɑɑdh gø dwøøge’ kuni wɑɑng wuudø kì buti këli lɑm men-ɑ mee.

Codhe, ɑ köbbe Uriyɑ̀ kinni, “Nyi rɑ̈ɑ̈b kì wïj këli lɑmɑ, men-ɑ lɑɑj èn ki gëdhhi mwøl geki byëli böörø, kɑ yï nyi ngɑ̈ɑ̈d kì wïje ki gënh-ɑ nyi rɑ̈b bëne mi rɑ̈dh, kí mø ji, kɑ byël-ɑ muuj yi rɑ̈dh nyi rɑ̈ɑ̈b kì wïje, kɑ wïje nyi kunyí ki møgi oløg geki remi gënhi mër, kɑ nyi kunyí ki remmi gëdhhì bënn. De mïdhí këli lɑm men-ɑ bɑ dilɑl ɑ́ men nyi rɑ̈ɑ̈b yi rɑ̈dh ki gëdhhì kenyi di gïn pyëj yi en kì yï Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j.”
Kɑ møg-ɑ ɑ́kwøb yi Rɑ̈dh Akɑɑdh gwøg yi Uriyɑ̀ ceth.
Kɑ óthør-ɑ wïje nyi cïb kwøøm rɑ̈dh kì yij Kengø pööge wɑ̈g, kɑ dhøng-ɑ nyi bëën rɑ̈dh Kengø cyëge, kipe kinni o pyëw rɑ̈nhdwøøng Acuur mïne.
Gïg-ɑ kyeelø møg-ɑ ɑ́gwøg yi Rɑ̈dh Akɑɑdh bɑ ɑgwed kì yij
Akedhi Akɑɑdh kun-ɑ di kweyye, kɑ koony rörri gøl rɑ̈ɑ̈dhø kì kɑɑl Debïd, kɑ wɑ̈de Kedhekiyɑ̀ røøny keje ɑ rɑ̈dh.
Kì pyɑ̈rø wïdɑ́ryeew runni Akɑɑdh rɑ̈ɑ̈dh Yeudiyɑ̀ kì yij lɑwø, ɑ ɑ́røøny Öciyɑ̀ wɑ̈d Elɑ̀ ɑ́ rɑ̈ɑ̈dh Isrɑil, ɑjyɑ̈ɑ̈ge ki runn ɑ́bïngwen kì Sɑmɑriyɑ̀.
Öciyɑ̀ ɑ́røngi kì bøli Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, de orøge nuti pɑ̈ɑ̈rø ki orøøg rɑ̈nhi Isrɑil møg-ɑ ɑ́jyɑ̈ɑ̈g kì bøle.
Cɑlmɑneser, rɑ̈nhdwøøng Acuur ɑ́nyïɑ̈ggi geki Öciyɑ̀, ɑyömmi Öciyɑ̀ yïe, kɑ gø nyi cude ki gwɑ̈j yethi runn bënn.
De kì yij run megø, Öciyɑ̀ ɑ́ödi yi Sö rɑ̈ɑ̈dh Rïp ki ji kipe kinni o køny, kɑ Öciyɑ̀ ocögø e rɑ̈nhdwøøng Acuur pɑ cude ki gwɑ̈j. Keny-ɑ ɑ́yood møgɑni yi Cɑlmɑneser, ɑleenge Öciyɑ̀ ød mɑg.
Amɑɑny Isrɑil yi Cɑlmɑneser, kɑ Sɑmɑriyɑ̀ tyege. Kɑ Sɑmɑriyɑ̀ mɑge kì dɑ̈ɑ̈g runni tyëg menɑni.

Kì bïngween runni Öciyɑ̀ kì yij lɑwø, ɑ ɑ́mɑɑg Sɑmɑriyɑ̀ yi rɑ̈nhdwøøng Acuur, kɑ tyëng Isrɑil kïdhe Acuur gɑ ɑmɑgg. Acïbe kwï gïn kɑɑl Alɑ̀, kɑ møøgø cïbe kömi Nɑm Abör kì myërri Gödhɑn, kɑ møøgø cïbe kɑ̈ddi Mɑdɑy.
Sɑmɑriyɑ̀ ɑ́mɑg kì bɑng kɑ ɑ́røngi tyëng Isrɑil kì bøli Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, eni Jwøøg gen Jwøng-ɑ ɑ́kɑ̈ɑ̈l gen wɑ̈g kì cingi rɑ̈ɑ̈dh Rïp, kɑ ge døøg-ɑ be mɑlli jwögg mø pɑth.
Tyëng Isrɑil ɑ́døøg be cyɑ̈dhø kì bɑng kwööng jurr-ɑ ɑ́cyeddi yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kì bøli gen, kɑ ge oyïëyø ki gïg-ɑ ɑ́gøggi yi rɑ̈nhi Isrɑil.
Tyëng Isrɑil ɑ́göög ki gïg mø pɑth ki dyër, mø pɑ dwɑddi yi Jwøøg gen, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j. Ge ɑ́gëëd ki kɑ̈jji mɑ̈ddø kì yethi myërri gen bënn, cɑg kì myërr-ɑ thønhø gïti kɑ̈dd-ɑ døngø bënn.
Tyëng Isrɑil ri gen ɑ́göggi gen ki löjj geki ngïjji Aceerɑ̀ kì wɑ̈thi ótøng, kí thɑ̈thi yenh-ɑ di tïbbì bënn.
Kɑ ge nyii rɑ̈bø ki bɑkur kì kɑ̈jji mɑ̈ddø møgɑni, ni jurr-ɑ ɑ́cyeddi yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, kɑ ge ogöögø ki gïgrijjø mɑ ɑ́rënyi gen pyëw Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j.
Kwøbbi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j ɑ́pyem yi gen. Kɑ ge kedh-ɑ be mɑlli jwögg-ɑ pɑth møg-ɑ ɑ́kërri gen yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, kinni gï ko mɑlli gen.

Isrɑil geki Yeudiyɑ̀ ɑ́rum ki kyëddø yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, kì ri tyëng-ɑ ɑ́ör yi en geki tyëng tyëngtöng kinni, “Wiyu yëthi orøg, kɑ ciggɑ mïdhi wun, gen ɑ cigg-ɑ ɑ́mëggɑ kweyyi wun, kɑ ge nyi örɑ wun ki bɑ̈nggɑ, jøtöng.”
De ge pɑ lïngø, muddi gen teeg ni kweyyi gen, tyëng-ɑ bɑ̈nyi ki lïngi dhø Jwøøg gen, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j.

Cigge ɑ́bɑny yi gen, köng-ɑ ɑ́könge kweyyi gïn nuti mïdhø yi gen. Kyën-ɑ ɑ́kyëde nuti lïngi gen. Ge ɑ́kedhi be mɑlli ngïjji jwögg-ɑ bong per gen, kɑ ge ogöögø ge bong per gen, kɑ ge óngöyø ki bëëdi jurr-ɑ buti gen, jurr-ɑ ɑ́kyëddi gen yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kinni ge ko ngöyi ki bëëdi gïn.

Ciggi Jwøøg gen, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j ɑ́pyem yi gen, kɑ ri gen thɑ̈dhhi gen ki røjji ngyënyø ɑ́ryew, gɑ møg mɑlli yi gen, kɑ ge ogöögø thyew ki ngïji Aceerɑ̀, jwøng-ɑ dhɑjø, kɑ kyell mɑlli yi gen, kɑ Bɑɑl mɑlli gen.
Wɑ̈ddi gen geki nyigi gen ɑ́rɑ̈bbi gen jwögg-ɑ pɑth gɑ gëdhhì, kɑ ge kedh-ɑ be rɑng yï ɑ́jwöggì, kɑ ge ogöögø ki gïgrijjø ki mendwøng kì bøli Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j. Arënyi pyëw Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j ki gen.
Kì bɑng kɑ ɑ́rënyi pyëw Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j ki tyëng Isrɑil, ɑcyeede gïn yïnø, ɑdönge ɑ́ gøl Yeudɑ̀ kete.
De tyëng gøl Yeudɑ̀ ciggi jwøøg gen, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j nuti mïdhi gen thyew, de ge ɑ́ngøy-ɑ kwöng-ɑ ɑ́kwɑny yi tyëng Isrɑil.
Abɑɑny tyëng Isrɑil yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, kɑ gï cɑye, kɑ gï cïbe cinggi tyëngrijjø pïd kɑ ɑ́wɑ̈ɑ̈ny gen kì bøle.

Keny-ɑ ɑ́rum Isrɑil ki dɑ̈ngø yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j geki gøl Debïd, ɑrønye Yeroboɑm wɑ̈d Nebɑt ɑ́ rɑ̈dh, ɑpeej Isrɑil wɑ̈g kì yuu Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j yi Yeroboɑm wɑ̈d Nebɑt, kɑ ji göjje gwøg ki orøg me dwøng.
Aløg tyëng Isrɑil bɑng orøøg Yeroboɑm, kɑ ódhɑ̈lø wiyø yi gen.
Pïd kɑ ɑ́nyiig tyëng Isrɑil yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kì bøle, ni kɑ ɑ́kwøbe møgɑni cøn ki dhøggi bɑ̈ngge, jøtöng. Codhe, ɑtööng Isrɑil yïnø; ɑ́kïdhi Acuur, kun-ɑ bëëd yi gen dicyɑ̈ngtïn.
Akɑ̈ni rɑ̈nhdwøøng Acuur ki ji kì Bɑbïl, kí Cuth, kí Abɑ̀, kí Amɑth, kí Sepɑrbɑim, kɑ gï cïbe Sɑmɑriyɑ̀, kɑ̈jji tyëng Isrɑil. Akwɑny gen Sɑmɑriyɑ̀, geki myërre.
Kì yij cɑ̈gi gen ki bëëdø, ge ɑ́bëëd Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j pɑ nyi mɑlli yi gen. Codhe kɑ kelli gen ödi yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j ki ngurrì, kɑ kwï gen nɑ̈g yi ngurrɑni.
Aödi yï rɑ̈nhdwøøng Acuur kinni, “Tyëng-ɑ ɑ́cïb yi yïn myërri Sɑmɑriyɑ̀ ciggi jwøøg pönhɑni kwïj yi gen, bene ɑ bɑnge öde gïn ki ngurrì mø nɑ̈g gen.”
Codhe, ɑkööb rɑ̈nhdwøøng Acuur kinni, “Öd wun ki ókwërø ɑ́kyel kì kelli ókwër møg-ɑ ɑ́kɑ̈ɑ̈l kì kunɑni gɑ ɑmɑgg, o døøge be bëëdø kì kunɑni, o tyëngɑni pwönye ki ciggi jwøøg pönhɑni.”
Abëën ókwërø ɑ́kyel mɑ ɑ́kɑ̈ɑ̈l kì Sɑmɑriyɑ̀ be bëëdø kì Betiil, ɑpwönye tyëngɑni ki yuu-ɑ nyi mɑlli Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j.
De tyëng-ɑ bëëdø ki Sɑmɑriyɑ̀ ɑ́bëëd ge nudd ge ogöögø ki jwöggi cwɑggi gen. Kɑ gï cïb gen yethi kengg-ɑ ɑ́ger yi tyëng Isrɑil. Tyëng kɑɑl nyi gögg-ɑ ri gen ki jwøøg gen kì kɑɑl-ɑ bëëd gen.
Tyëng Bɑbïl ɑ́gwøg-ɑ ngïji Suköth Benöth, tyëng Cuth ɑ́gwøg-ɑ ngïji Nergɑl geki Acïmɑ̀, jwöggi tyëng Amɑth.
Tyëng Abɑ̀ ɑ́gwøg-ɑ ngïjji Nibɑdh geki Tɑrtɑk, tyëng Sepɑrbɑim nyigi gen nyi rɑ̈bbi ge’ jwöggi gen, Adrɑmelek geki Anɑmelek gɑ gëdhhì.
Jiɑni Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j ɑ́bëëd gø nyii mɑllø yi gen thyew, kɑ ge ókɑ̈bbø ki ji kì kelli gen mø bëëdø gɑ ókwër møg nyi muuj gëdhhì kì kɑ̈jji mɑ̈ddø.
Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j ɑ́bëëd e nyii mɑllø yi gen, de jwöggi gen di mɑllø yi gen thyew, ni kwööng pönh-ɑ ɑ́kɑ̈ɑ̈l yi gen.

Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j ɑ́nywɑ̈ɑ̈g ki kwøb geki tyëng-ɑ Isrɑil, kɑ ge köbbe kinni, “Wu ko kwɑ̈jji ki jwögg mø pɑth, ri wun ko nyi bøødh wun piny kì bøli gen, ge ko göggi wun wɑlɑ̀ ge ko nyi nëngi wun ki gëdhhì.
De ngɑ̈dhu yɑn, yɑ Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, ɑ ɑ́kɑ̈ɑ̈l wun wɑ̈g kì Rïp ki tengi dwøng, nyi bøødh wun ri wun piny kì bølɑ, kɑ yɑ nyi nëngi wun ki gëdhhì.
Kɑ ciggɑ geki kwöngɑ møg-ɑ ɑ́gwëdɑ wun mïdhi wun yethi cyɑ̈ng bënn. Wu ko nyi ngɑ̈dh jwögg-ɑ pɑth.
Kɑ wɑ̈thi wun ko wïl ki møg-ɑ ɑ́nywɑg yi wɑ.
Nyi lïngu kwøbbɑ, yɑ Jwøøg wun, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, o wu óyiel yi yɑn kì cinggi tyëngmɑ̈ɑ̈nø.”
De tyëngɑni nuti lïngø, ge nudd ge mïdh-ɑ kwööng pönh-ɑ ɑ́kɑ̈ɑ̈l yi gen.
Tyëngɑni ɑ́bëëd Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j nyii mɑllø yi gen, de ge kedh ge mɑll-ɑ ngïjji jwöggi gen thyew, o gïn ni menɑni nudd e ogwøgø yi kwɑrri gen pïd dicyɑ̈ngtïn.
Kì dɑ̈ɑ̈g runni Öciyɑ̀ wɑ̈d Elɑ̀, rɑ̈ɑ̈dh Isrɑil kì yij lɑwø, ɑ ɑ́göög Kedhekiyɑ̀ wɑ̈d Akɑɑdh ki rɑ̈ɑ̈dh Yeudiyɑ̀.
Ágöög ki rɑ̈dh e runne bɑ pyɑ̈r ɑ́ryew wïdɑ́bïj, kɑ ojyɑ̈gø kì Yerusɑlem ki runn pyɑ̈r ɑ́ryew wïdɑ́bïngwen. Meye cwøl ɑ́ Abì nyɑɑr Dhekɑriyɑ̀.
Ágöög ki dyër kì bøli Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j ni kwɑn Debïd.

Kɑ̈jji mɑ̈ddø ɑ́cøøre piny, kɑ yïkk cøøre piny, kɑ ngïjji Aceerɑ̀ ngøle piny. Ngïji thwöl men-ɑ ɑ́køny yi Mosɑ̀ ki dilɑl ɑ́tørre thyew, thwölɑni ɑ́bëëd e cwøl ɑ́ Nekuctɑn. Thwölɑni ɑ́bëëd e nudd e omɑllø yi tyëng Isrɑil, kɑ nyi rɑ̈bbi gen ki bɑkur.
Kedhekiyɑ̀ ɑ́gɑ̈nn-ɑ Jwøøg Isrɑil, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j. Yeudiyɑ̀ nuti pɑ̈nyi yïddø ki rɑ̈dh me ni en, o pɑth ki men-ɑ óyïddi këti ki rɑ̈nh ni en.
Ábëëd e wør-ɑ Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, o dhø Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j nuti pɑ̈nyø en ki pyemø. Cigg-ɑ ɑ́muuj yi Mosɑ̀ ɑ́mïdhe bënn.
Akønyii yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, kɑ gïg-ɑ gwøg yi en nyi pɑ̈dh-ɑ kɑ̈jji gen bënn. Ángɑ̈nyi wɑ̈ye kɑ óbɑ̈nyø ki lïngi kwøbbi rɑ̈nhdwøøng Acuur.
Tyëng Pelistiyɑ̀ ɑ́tyɑme kɑ myërri gen yɑge, cɑg kì pɑn-ɑ thinh gïti kɑɑl-ɑ dwøng, reb ki Gɑdhɑ̀ geki myërre bënn.
Kì ngween runni Kedhekiyɑ̀ kì yij lɑwø, ɑ bɑ bïryeew runni Rɑ̈dh Öciyɑ̀ rɑ̈ɑ̈dh Isrɑil kì yij lɑwø, ɑ ɑ́bëën Cɑlmɑneser rɑ̈nhdwøøng Acuur Isrɑil ki liny, kɑ Sɑmɑriyɑ̀ tyege.
Kɑ Sɑmɑriyɑ̀ ópɑ̈ɑ̈dhø kì dɑ̈ɑ̈g runni tyëngɑni, e Rɑ̈dh Kedhekiyɑ̀ yïe dɑ runn ɑ́bïkyel kì yij lɑwø, o bɑ bïngween runni Öciyɑ̀ kì yij lɑwø.
Tyëng Isrɑil ɑ́kɑ̈l gɑ ɑmɑgg yi rɑ̈nhdwøøng Acuur, kɑ kwï gïn cïbe Alɑ̀, kɑ kwï gïn cïbe kömi Nɑm Abör kì myërri Gödhɑn, kɑ kwï gïn cïbe Mɑdɑy.

Sɑmɑriyɑ̀ ɑ́pɑ̈ɑ̈dh, mɑ́ tyëng Isrɑil Jwøøg gen, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j nuti wørø yi gen, kɑ lwöbø men-ɑ ɑ́ying kɑɑm gen ki Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j pɑ̈d yi gen, kɑ cigg-ɑ ɑ́muuj yi Mosɑ̀ bënn pyem gen, eni Mosɑ̀ bɑ̈ng Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j. Ge ɑ́dhɑ̈li lïngø, o ge ɑ́bɑ̈nyi gwøgi møg-ɑ ɑ́cïgi gen.
Senɑkerib, rɑ̈nhdwøøng Acuur ɑ́pɑ̈ɑ̈r kömi kɑ̈ddi dörri Yeudiyɑ̀, kɑ gï mɑge kì pyɑ̈rø wïdɑ́bïngween runni Rɑ̈dh Kedhekiyɑ̀ kì yij lɑwø.

Kɑ Kedhekiyɑ̀ rɑ̈ɑ̈dh Yeudiyɑ̀ öd-ɑ yï rɑ̈nhdwøøng Acuur ki wöödø kinni, “Yɑ ɑ́bɑ̈jji, døøg kɑ yɑ wiy. Yï ómëggɑ gïn-ɑ cwøl yi yïn kì yïɑ.” Kɑ Kedhekiyɑ̀ köbbi yi rɑ̈nhdwøøng Acuur kinni cude ki ngyëny ɑ́tegg gɑ kïllì ɑ́lïp pyɑ̈rø, kí kïllì ɑ́lïp mø dhɑb.
Kɑ ɑ́teng-ɑ Kengi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j bëne geki men-ɑ kɑ̈nni gøldwøng kwɑny yi Kedhekiyɑ̀ kɑ gø muuje.
Dhɑm-ɑ ódhyɑɑw Kengø ɑ́yööde wɑ̈g thyew, geki dhɑb men-ɑ ɑ́mwøøn dëddi dhø Kengø yi en kiree, kɑ gï öre Senɑkerib bënn.
Rɑ̈nhdwøøng Acuur ɑ́öd kì Lɑkic ki yɑy me dwøng me bï Yerusɑlem be nyɑɑg ki Kedhekiyɑ̀, linyɑni ɑ́pyejj-ɑ yi pëjj-ɑ døngø ɑ́dɑ̈g. Kɑ ge pëgg-ɑ yuu-ɑ nyi löög ki ógudh, kì kömi wøl-ɑ kɑ̈ni kɑɑl ki pï.
Kɑ rɑ̈dh cwøl yi gen, ɑöri gen Eliɑkim wɑ̈d Kilkiyɑ̀, jɑngi gøldwøng, geki Cebnɑ̀, jɑlgwed, kí 'mïdhi wɑ̈j, Yöɑ̀ wɑ̈d Asɑp.
Kɑ pëny-ɑ mɑl kì kelli pëjji liny Acuur okööbø kinni, “Köbbu Kedhekiyɑ̀ kinni, ‘Rɑ̈nhdwøøng Acuur okööbø i yï gɑ̈nn-ɑ ngø?
Yï orumø kinni kwøbbi dhøg ócuggø pɑ̈ɑ̈rø ki nyɑɑg, kɑ gïn gwøg ki tegø lwɑ̈ng yi kwøb yøw? Yï orumø ce yïn ɑ́ men, ɑ pyeem kwøbbi Acuur?
Yï orumø ce yï ókøny yi Rïp? De menɑni ko ni kwɑnyi okewi obej ɑ́ kemø. Ke kwömmí ki en, ree møde’ mødø kɑ cingí rodhe. Bene kenyi bëëd rɑ̈ɑ̈dh Rïp, ke cöllii kunyø yi ngɑn gɑ̈nnii.”

Kɑ pënyi liny Acuur cig-ɑ kwøb kinni, “Wɑlɑ̀ wu dwɑdd-ɑ köbbi yɑn kinni wu gɑ̈nn-ɑ Jwøøg wun, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j? Pɑth ki Kenge geki këlli lɑm møge ɑ ɑ́cøør piny yi Kedhekiyɑ̀ keny-ɑ ɑ́köbbe tyëng Yeudiyɑ̀ kí Yerusɑlem kinni nyi kwɑ̈jji wun kì wïj këli lɑm men kete kì Yerusɑlem?
Nywɑ̈ɑ̈g wɑ ki kwøb ki nyingi rɑ̈nhdwøng, yï ónëngɑ ki kyënyì ɑ́lïp ɑ́ryew men-ɑ óyïddí ki ji møg kɑdhi kömi gen!
Wu pɑ kyëëw ki ngɑn-ɑ thinh kì kelli pëjji liny Acuur, o yï yöd yï ngɑ̈dh-ɑ Rïp kinni yï óöde ki yɑ̈thi liny geki jøkyënyì!
Wu orumø kinni yɑ nuti køny-ɑ yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j keny-ɑ ɑ́pɑ̈ɑ̈rɑ kömi myërri wun kɑ ge rënyɑ? Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kiree ɑ ɑ́köbbi yɑn i pɑ̈ɑ̈rɑ kömi gen kɑ ge rënyɑ.”
Codhe, ɑköbbi pënyi linyɑni yi Eliɑkim, geki Cebnɑ̀ kí Yöɑ̀ kinni, “Kööb ki dhøg Arɑm wuö, yï ko 'kööb dhøg Ibru, mɑ́ dhøg Arɑm olïngø yi wøn, o tyëng-ɑ kömi dörø olïngø ki dhøngɑni thyew.”

Alögge kinni, “Wu orumø kinni yɑ ɑ́ör-ɑ yï wun yi rɑ̈nhdwøng, o bɑ wuki rɑ̈dh keti wun ɑ köbbi møgɑni bënn? Pɑth, yɑ kööbø thyew kɑ teen-ɑ kömi dörø ɑnɑn, mɑ́ cyedhhi gen bɑ møg cɑm yi gen, kɑ lɑ́ji gen mɑdh gen kyeel ki wun.”
Codhe, kɑ pënyi linyɑni dhwödh-ɑ mɑl kɑ óryeerø ki dhøg Ibru kinni, “Lïng wun ki møg-ɑ köbbi wun yi rɑ̈nhdwøøng Acuur!
Kyëdd-ɑ wun kinni ri wun ko wëggu wënyø yi Kedhekiyɑ̀, mɑ́ wu pɑ lwɑ̈ng yi en ki yielø kì cinge.
Kɑ wu ko yïëy ki köbbø yi Kedhekiyɑ̀ kinni ngɑ̈dhu Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, kí kinni wɑ óyiel yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kì cingi rɑ̈nhdwøøng Acuur.

Kwøbbi Kedhekiyɑ̀ ko lïngi wun. Rɑ̈nhdwøøng Acuur okööbø i bï wun wɑ̈g kì kɑɑl, ko wu yömmi wun. Wu ówiy yi en, o wu cyɑ̈ɑ̈m wun ki nywøli oløøg wun geki nywøli yenhi bɑ̈ggi wun, o wu mɑ̈ɑ̈dh wun ki pï kì yethi yïïthi wun,

gïti keny-ɑ ócïb wun pödhø me ni pödhi wun yi rɑ̈nhdwøng, kun di oløg me göög ki møgø, kí byel mø cɑm, bɑ piny me pɑ̈ng yi oløg, kí dhetun, kí møøw kïc. Lïngu kwøbbe o wu bødh wun, ri wun ko wëggu wënyø yi Kedhekiyɑ̀ kinni wu óyiel yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j.
Dɑ pödhø mɑ ɑ́pɑ̈nyi ki yielø yi jwögge kì cingi rɑ̈nhdwøøng Acuur?
Jwöggi Amɑth geki Arpɑd ying-ɑ keny ɑnɑn? Jwöggi Sepɑrbɑim, Ënɑ̀ geki Ibɑ̀ ge ying-ɑ keny? Sɑmɑriyɑ̀ ɑ́di yielø yi gen kì cingi rɑ̈nhdwøng?
Á men kì kelli jwöggi pödhhɑni, ɑ ɑ́yiel pödhe kì cingi rɑ̈nhdwøøng wøn, ɑ rum wun kinni Yerusɑlem óyiel yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j?”
Teedø ɑ́cög ge okudø, bong ngɑn mɑ ɑ́løøg kwøbbe, mɑ́ ji rumø ki kyëddø yi rɑ̈dh kinni ko di ngɑn löggi.
Kɑ Eliɑkim, kí Cebɑ̀ geki Yöɑ̀ ógudhi gen pyëëd gen, codhe ɑkedh gen, kɑ møg-ɑ ɑ́kwøb yi pënyi liny Acuur löbbi rɑ̈dh yi gen.
Keny-ɑ ɑ́lïngi møgɑni yi Rɑ̈dh Kedhekiyɑ̀, ɑkɑge ógødhe yi rɑ̈ji pyëwe, kɑ orugø ki ocwɑ̈lø, ɑkedhe yij Kengi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j.
Aöre Eliɑkim jɑngi gøldwøng geki Cebɑ̀ jɑlgwed, kí ókwërr-ɑ døngø yï Icɑyɑ̀ wɑ̈d Amodh, jɑltöng ge rug-ɑ ocwɑ̈llì thyew.
Aköbbi ge gøn i rɑ̈dh okööbø kinni, “Cyɑ̈ɑ̈ng bɑ cyɑ̈ɑ̈ng orɑng, wɑ ceg kɑ cɑyø, o wɑ yɑ̈rø, wɑ nɑ ngɑn kømi pɑ̈dhi piny, de nyøødh, cøli dhɑnhø pɑ cuggi yïe.
Rɑ̈nhdwøøng Acuur pëny-ɑ dwøng mi linye ɑ́öre be gwɑddi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, Jwøng-ɑ Nëënø, wiy yɑ̈ddɑni lïngi yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, codhe o tyëng-ɑ yɑ̈dø cɑye. Kwɑjjí Jwøk kipe tyëng-ɑ döngø møg-ɑ nud.”
Keny-ɑ ɑ́wɑ̈dhi bɑ̈nggi Rɑ̈dh Kedhekiyɑ̀ yï Icɑyɑ̀,
ɑköbbe gïn kinni, “Köbbu wïi wun kinni, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j okööbø kinni, ‘Yï ko böggi yi rɑ̈nhdwøøng Acuur kí møg-ɑ kømme kinni yï pɑ yiel yi yɑn.
Óödɑ ki wëy me wëggii lïngi kwøbbi pyed, o døøge pödhi gen, o óköllɑ nɑ̈gø kì kunɑni.’ ”
Alïng pënyi liny Acuur kinni i rɑ̈nhdwøøng gen dhwödhø kì Lɑkic, o ceg-ɑ nyïɑ̈ggø ki kɑɑl Libnɑ̀, kɑɑl-ɑ cyɑ̈gi ki Lɑkic. Codhe, ɑdhwödhe e døøg-ɑ be pyëji rɑ̈nhɑni.
Keny-ɑ ɑ́lïng rɑ̈nhdwøøng Acuur kinni Terɑ̈kɑ̀ rɑ̈ɑ̈dh Kuc bï-ɑ be nyɑɑg ki en, ɑöde Rɑ̈dh Kedhekiyɑ̀ ki ji këti kinni,
“Jwøng-ɑ gɑ̈nni yi yïn yï ɑ́köbbe kinni Yerusɑlem koo cïbe cingɑ, de rií ko wëggí wënyø yi møgɑni.
Gïg-ɑ ɑ́göggi pödhh-ɑ kyeelø yi rɑ̈nhdwøøng Acuur ɑ́lïngi yi yïn, kí kɑ ɑ́rënye gïn ki rënyi dwøng, dɑ́ yïn ɑ óbodh?
Kɑ̈ddi Gödhɑn, kí Arɑn, kí Redhep ɑ́rënyi yi kweyyɑ, kɑ tyëng Bet Eden møg-ɑ ying Telɑsɑr nɑ̈g gen. Ge ɑ́di yielø yi jwöggi gen?
Ágøne rɑ̈nhi kɑ̈ddi Amɑth, kí Arpɑd, kí Sepɑrbɑim, kí Ënɑ̀, kí Ibɑ̀?”
Akwɑɑny wɑ̈nyɑni yi Rɑ̈dh Kedhekiyɑ̀ kì yï tyëng-ɑ ɑ́kɑ̈ɑ̈lii, kɑ gø rɑnge. Akedhe yij Kengi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, ɑcïbe wɑ̈nyɑni bøli Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j.
Akwɑ̈jji Kedhekiyɑ̀ kì bøli Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kinni, “Yïn ɑ Jwøøg Isrɑil, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, ɑ kwömø kì kɑɑm kerobb. Bene yï ketí ɑ bɑ Jwøk, yïn ɑ jɑɑg piny bëne. Yïn ɑ ɑ́cwɑ̈j mɑl kí piny.
Kyën pɑ̈ddí, Yïn ɑ Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, kɑ yï lïng. Kɑ nyingí yieeb, Yïn ɑ Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, o yï nëën. Kɑ kwøbbi Senɑkerib møg-ɑ gwɑdde yïn, yï Jwøng-ɑ Nëënø lïngí.
Kidyër, Yïn ɑ Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, rɑ̈nhdwøøng Acuur jurrì mø gïïr ɑ́rënye, geki pödhhi gen.
Kɑ jwöggi gïn rɑ̈be, mɑ́ ge pɑth ki jwögg, de bɑ ngïjjì møg-ɑ ógwøgø ki yenh geki kïttì yøw, ge ɑ́gwøg-ɑ yi dhɑnhø ki cingge.
Anɑn Yïn ɑ Jwøøg wøn, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, yiel wøn kì cinggi tyëng Acuur, o yod yi kömi piny bëne kinni Yï Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, bene yï ketí ɑ bɑ Jwøk.”
Codhe, ɑödi Icɑyɑ̀ wɑ̈d Amodh yï Rɑ̈dh Kedhekiyɑ̀, ki wöödø e løøg-ɑ kwɑ̈jji rɑ̈dh, kinni
Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j ɑ́kööb kinni, “Yï ceg kɑ gɑggø yi kɑɑldwøng Yerusɑlem, Senɑkerib, o yï ceg kɑ dhɑ̈ɑ̈lø yi en.
Á men ɑ ɑ́gɑggi yi yïn, kɑ yɑnyyí? Yɑ Jwøøg Isrɑil, ɑ bɑ Kwërø, yɑ nuti wøør yïn!

Kɑ yï tir-ɑ önø ki ji møg kööbø kinni, i yï kedhø ki yɑ̈thi linyí møg-ɑ gïïr, kɑ yï wɑ̈dh-ɑ wɑ̈thi kïtti Lubnɑn, kïtt-ɑ bɑ̈rrø. Kɑ köörí pwööd ce yenh-ɑ bɑ̈rrø, sɑndɑl geki ɑmedh ngøl yïn piny, kɑ yij thïmɑni tyëëg bëne;
yï pwöd-ɑ köörí ce yï kunyø ki yïïth, kɑ yï omɑ̈dhø ki pïi pìny mø pɑth, kɑ pïi Kiir othwøwø yi tyelli yɑyí.
“Yï nuti lïngø cøn, kinni yɑn ɑ ɑ́pyël møgɑni kɑ̈ge dööng? O møgɑni ɑ́gwøgɑ ɑnɑn cyee. Kɑ yï thödhɑ ki tegø men gwøøg kɑ̈dd-ɑ døngø gɑ thur.

Tyëng kɑ̈ddɑni ɑ́bëëd yï gen bong tegø, ge ceg-ɑ böggø o ge yɑ̈rø. Ge ɑ́bëëd ge nɑ lum me twïyø kì wïj óthɑɑng ød, o keny-ɑ ɑ́köddi kömi gen yi yømi wɑɑng cyɑ̈ɑ̈ng mwøl, yøm-ɑ lyëdh kɑ ceg-ɑ thwøwø e nuti døngø.
“De bëëdí ngɑ̈nyi yi yɑn, kí gïn-ɑ gwøg yi yïn, kí keny-ɑ kedhi yi yïn. O linyí ki yɑn ngɑ̈nyɑ.
Kwøbbi linyí ki yɑn, ɑ́muuj yɑn, kɑ kwøbbi tɑ̈dí wɑ̈nh-ɑ yïɑ. Abɑdhɑ ngöönɑ’ órømí, kɑ ɑcebɑ gøødɑ dhøgí, o yï dwøøgɑ ki yuu-ɑ ɑ́bëën yi yïn.”

Aköbbi Rɑ̈dh Akɑdhiyɑ̀ yi Icɑyɑ̀ kinni, “Men bene ngïji gïn-ɑ ócwöb kipere. Run men kí men-ɑ óbï, wu ócɑm-ɑ jɑmm-ɑ nyi twïy keti gen, de runn-ɑ óbï kì bɑng gen, wu ókɑ̈gø ki gemè, kɑ kɑj yi wun, o wu ópïdhø ki oløg kɑ nywøle cɑm yi wun.
Tyëng-ɑ óbodh kì gøl Yeudɑ̀, ge ónyog ni yɑnh byerre niyeeng piny, o ree dɑ nywøl.
Ódi ji kì Yerusɑlem, kí Kïti Dhɑyøn, møgɑni ópɑ̈dhi kɑ̈jji gen, mɑ́ e dwɑdd-ɑ yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j.
“Møg-ɑ ɑ́kwøb yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j ek: ‘Rɑ̈nhdwøøng Acuur, pɑ pɑ̈nyi bëën kɑɑl, wɑlɑ̀ pɑ göjji yije ki weth, koo kɑ̈ni ki jølinye mø kɑ̈ddi ki ködd, wɑlɑ̀ kɑɑlɑni koo gëdde ki kɑ̈jji tyege gøn.
Ódøøg ki yuu-ɑ ɑ́kɑ̈ɑ̈le, e pɑ kedhi kɑɑlɑni.
Kɑɑlɑni ócwɑg yi yɑn kipe nyingɑ geki nyingi bɑ̈ngɑ Debïd.’ ”
Kɑ wëywöni Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kedh-ɑ kɑɑl jøliny Acuur, ɑnɑ̈gge ki ɑ́lïp miyø kí pyɑ̈r ɑ́bïdɑ̈g wïdɑ́bïj kì kelli gen. Keny-ɑ ɑ́cyëëw gen kì mwøl, ji buud-ɑ piny ge thøø.
Codhe, ɑdøg Senɑkerib rɑ̈nhdwøøng Acuur, kɑ kedh-ɑ Ninɑwɑ̀.
Kɑ Senɑkerib nɑ̈g yi wɑ̈dde ɑ́ryew, Adrɑmelek geki Cɑredher ki pil, cyɑ̈ng megø e mɑll-ɑ Nisrök jwøge kì yij kenge. Kɑ ge pɑ̈ɑ̈r-ɑ piny Arɑrɑt. Arøøny Esɑrɑdön wɑ̈de keje ɑ́ rɑ̈nhdwøng.

Kɑ Rɑ̈dh Kedhekiyɑ̀ dële orɑ̈mø ki menrɑj, e nënni ɑ́ thøø ɑ bï köme, kì yethi cyɑ̈nggɑni. Kɑ jɑltöng Icɑyɑ̀ wɑ̈d Amodh kedh-ɑ yïe, ɑköbbe gøn kinni, “Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j okööbø i ceg gølí, mɑ́ yï ceg-ɑ thøø, yï pɑ bødh.”
Kɑ Kedhekiyɑ̀ wïje løge ri dörø, ɑkwɑjje Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kinni,

“Ngɑ̈nyi yi yïn, Yïn ɑ Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, kinni yɑ ɑ́bëëd ceth yɑ wør-ɑ yïn, o yɑ gɑ̈nn-ɑ yïn, o kwøbbí mïdhɑ’ mïdhø kì pyëwɑ, dhøgí nuti pyeem yɑn kinni tek, o yɑ nyi gwøg-ɑ gïn-ɑ dwɑddi yi yïn.” Kɑ óywöngø ki rɑ̈ɑ̈m pyëwe.
Icɑyɑ̀ ɑ́dhwödh kì buti rɑ̈dh, de cem e bɑ̈ɑ̈n-ɑ ódɑ̈ri gøldwøng, ɑköbbii yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j

kinni, i døøge yï Kedhekiyɑ̀, jɑngi jii Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, kɑ gø köbbe kinni, “Kwɑ̈jjí ɑ́lïngɑ, o pïi nyingí ɑ́lidh yi yɑn, yɑ Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, Jwøøg Debïd kweyí. Yï óyiel yi yɑn ki rɑ̈ɑ̈m dëlí. Yï ókedhi Kengø kì bɑng cyɑ̈ng ɑ́dɑ̈g.
Yï óbëëdø ki runn pyɑ̈rø wïdɑ́bïj. Yï óyiel yi yɑn, wuki kɑɑl men kì cingi rɑ̈nhdwøøng Acuur. Kɑɑl men ókor yi yɑn kipe wøri nyingɑ geki per Debïd bɑ̈ngɑ, kí møg-ɑ ɑ́köbbɑ en.”
Kɑ tyëng-ɑ tuur rɑ̈dh köbbi yi Icɑyɑ̀ kinni, kɑ̈bbi gen ki ópuun nywøli ólɑm kɑ gø nyøng gen kɑ̈jj-ɑ twɑgø, o ge nøgi gen.
Apëjji Rɑ̈dh Kedhekiyɑ̀ kinni, “Á ngø ɑ muuj ɑ́ ngïji men-ɑ nyodh kinni yɑ óyiel yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j ceth ki rɑ̈ɑ̈m dëlɑ, kɑ yɑ kedh-ɑ Kengø kì dɑ̈ɑ̈g cyɑ̈ng?”
Alöggi Icɑyɑ̀ kinni, “Yï ónyudhi yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j ki ngïji me nyodh kinni dhøge ómïdhe. Yï dwɑdd-ɑ kinni tïbø men døøge cyɑ̈n, wɑlɑ̀ kedhe mɑl ki pɑ̈ltyel pyɑ̈rø?”
Alöggi Kedhekiyɑ̀ kinni, “Cøøri tïbø mɑl ki pɑ̈ltyel pyɑ̈rø yööd! Wiy døøge cyɑ̈n ki pɑ̈ltyel pyɑ̈rø.”
Akwɑjji Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j yi Icɑyɑ̀, kɑ tïbø dwøøg cyɑ̈n yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j ki pɑ̈ltyel pyɑ̈rø, kì kömi yïdhi men-ɑ ɑ́ger yi Rɑ̈dh Akɑɑdh ɑ́ men nyi røm cyɑ̈dhi cɑ̈ng.
Wɑɑngɑni ɑ ɑ́öni rɑ̈ɑ̈dh Bɑbïlöniyɑ̀, Merodɑk Bɑlɑdɑn, wɑ̈d Bɑlɑdɑn ki jøg këëm Kedhekiyɑ̀ ki rɑ̈ɑ̈m dële, ge ókɑ̈ddø ki wɑ̈nyø geki gïn muujii.

Kɑ Kedhekiyɑ̀ jøgɑni cwøøle gøle, kɑ gï nyudhe kɑ̈re bëne; gï ɑ́nyudhe ngyënyyi dhɑb kí ɑ́tegø, kí yenh geki mɑ̈th-ɑ yømi gen med bënn, kí jɑmmi liny bënn. Bong gïjø mɑ ɑ́döng gø nuti nyudh en gïn kì kɑ̈jj-ɑ mïdhi jɑmme bënn, kí gøldwøng, geki yij pödhe bëne.
Codhe, ɑkedhi Icɑyɑ̀ jɑltöng yï Rɑ̈dh Kedhekiyɑ̀ kɑ gø pyëje kinni, “Jøgɑni ɑ́kɑ̈ɑ̈l-ɑ keny, o bɑ ngø ɑ ɑ́köbbí gen?”
Alöggi Kedhekiyɑ̀ kinni, “Ge kɑ̈ɑ̈l-ɑ pödhø me lɑ̈wi, ge kɑ̈ɑ̈l-ɑ Bɑbïlöniyɑ̀.”
Kɑ Icɑyɑ̀ ópëjjø kinni, “Á ngø ɑ ɑ́lidh yi gen kì gøldwøng?”
Kɑ Kedhekiyɑ̀ ólöggø kinni, “Jɑmmì bënn ɑ́lidh yi gen, bong gïjø mɑ ɑ́döng e nuti nyudhi gen yi yɑn kì kɑ̈jj-ɑ kɑnni jɑmmì, kí gøldwøng.”
Kɑ Kedhekiyɑ̀ köbbi yi Icɑyɑ̀ kinni, “Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j ɑ́kööb kinni,
Bøli keny megø óbï, obëën bøli kenyɑni, jɑmm-ɑ gølí bënn ótëër Bɑbïlöniyɑ̀, geki gïg-ɑ ɑ́congi yi kweyyí bënn gïti dicyɑ̈ngtïn. Bong gïjø me döng e pɑ kɑ̈l.
Kwï kwɑrrí ókïdhi be gwøg gɑ órøj møg göögø kì gøl rɑ̈ɑ̈dh Bɑbïlöniyɑ̀.”
Kɑ yod yi Rɑ̈dh Kedhekiyɑ̀ kinni møgɑni wɑng-ɑ kinni, ódi mër kì yethi runn-ɑ ónëëne, ɑlögge kinni, “Wöön-ɑ ɑ́muuj yɑn kì yï Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j døøj.”
Gïg-ɑ kyeelø møg-ɑ ɑ́gwøg yi Kedhekiyɑ̀ bënn, kí kwøbbi tegi pyëwe, kí kër-ɑ ɑ́gööge ki luy, kí kër-ɑ ɑ́kunye ki wøl me kɑ̈ɑ̈l pï kɑɑl, bɑ ɑgwed kì yij
Kɑ Kedhekiyɑ̀ kedh-ɑ kun-ɑ di kweyye, ɑrøøny wɑ̈de Mɑnɑsè keje ɑ́ rɑ̈dh.
Mɑnɑsè ɑ́røny ɑ́ rɑ̈ɑ̈dh Yeudiyɑ̀ e runne bɑ pyɑ̈rø wïdɑ́ryew, kɑ ojyɑ̈gø ki runn pyɑ̈r ɑ́bïj wïdɑ́bïj kì Yerusɑlem. Meye cwøl ɑ́ Ëpdhibɑ̀.
Mɑnɑsè ɑ́røngi kì bøli Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j ki orøng ni men-ɑ ɑ́gwøg yi jurr-ɑ ɑ́cyeddi yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kì bøli tyëng Isrɑil.
Kɑ̈jji mɑ̈ddø møg-ɑ ɑ́dhur piny yi Kedhekiyɑ̀ wïye ɑ́døøge ki gerø, kɑ ogëdø ki kɑ̈jj-ɑ nyi lɑɑm Bɑɑl, kí ngïjji Aceerɑ̀. Ni gïn-ɑ ɑ́gwøg yi Akɑɑb rɑ̈ɑ̈dh Isrɑil, Mɑnɑsè kyelli mɑl ɑ́mɑlle.
Mɑnɑsè ɑ́gëëd kì yij Kengi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, ki kɑ̈jji mɑ̈ddø, eni keny-ɑ ɑ́kwøb yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kinni, “Nyingɑ ócïbɑ Yerusɑlem.”
Kɑ ogëdø ki kɑ̈jji mɑ̈ddø mø jwöggɑni bënn kì yethi ódɑ̈rri Kengi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j ryeet.
Wɑ̈de ɑ́rɑ̈be ɑ́ gëëdhi, kɑ nyii rɑ̈ngø ki ɑ́jwöggì, kɑ nyii pëëjø ki yɑdh. Mɑnɑsè ɑ́göög ki orøg me dwøng kì bøli Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, kɑ pyëw Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j wëgge rënyø.

Ngïji Aceerɑ̀ men-ɑ ɑ́gwøg yi Mɑnɑsè, gø ɑ́cïbe yij Kengi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, Keng-ɑ ɑ́köbbi Debïd geki wɑ̈de Sølømøn yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kinni, “Kengø men, kì Yerusɑlem, en ɑ ɑ́myeg yi yɑn kì kelli pìnyi wɑ̈thi kɑ̈lli Isrɑil gɑ pyɑ̈rø wïdɑ́ryew, ɑ́ keny nyi mɑlli nyingɑ gïti ɑtheer.
Tyëng Isrɑil pɑ wëggɑ cyeed wɑ̈g kì yij piny-ɑ ɑ́mëggɑ kweyyi gen, keløg ciggɑ ómïdhi yi gen kidøøj, kɑ cigg bënn møg-ɑ ɑ́mëggi gen yi Mosɑ̀ bɑ̈ngɑ mïdhi yi gen.”
De tyëng Yeudiyɑ̀ Ciggi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j nuti mïdhi gen, kɑ ge peej yij orøg me dwøng yi Mɑnɑsè, orøg me lod orøng-ɑ ɑ́gwøg yi jurr-ɑ ɑ́cyeddi yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kì bøli tyëng Isrɑil.
Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j ɑ́kööb ki dhøggi bɑ̈ngge jøtöng kinni,
“Mɑnɑsè rɑ̈ɑ̈dh Yeudiyɑ̀ ɑ́røngi ki orøng dwøng, kɑ ogöögø ki gïgrijjø mø lod møg-ɑ ɑ́gwøg yi tyëng Amör, kɑ tyëng Yeudiyɑ̀ peeje yij orøg, be mɑlli ngïjji jwögg-ɑ pɑth.”
Codhe ɑkööb Jwøøg Isrɑil, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kinni, “Yɑ ceg-ɑ kɑ̈ni kömi Yeudiyɑ̀ geki Yerusɑlem ki ryɑ̈g men-ɑ óbëëd ngɑn lïngi kwøbbɑni wïje cem-ɑ dïïng.
Yerusɑlem cɑyɑ’ cɑyø ni kɑ ɑ́cɑyɑ Isrɑil kí Rɑ̈dh Akɑɑb geki gøle. Tyëng Yerusɑlem ókïdhɑ yïnø, Yerusɑlem óced yi yɑn ni kenyi ced tɑbø, kɑ döng-ɑ nøw, kɑ rum piny.
Kwï tyëng-ɑ óbodh kì kelli jiɑ, óweddi yi yɑn, ge ócïbɑ cinggi tyëngmɑ̈ɑ̈nø, o ge yɑg, o ge rënyi yi tyëngɑni.
Møgɑni ógöggɑ jiɑ, mɑ́ ge ɑ́göög ki gïgrijjø kì bølɑ, kɑ nyingɑ rënyi yi gen, cɑg kì bøli keny-ɑ ɑ́bëën kweyyi gen wɑ̈g kì Rïp pïd dicyɑ̈ngtïn.”
Mɑnɑsè ɑ́nɑ̈ɑ̈g ki ji mø yï gen bɑ̈r, kɑ remø ómølø kì Yerusɑlem, kedh e peej-ɑ tyëng Yeudiyɑ̀ yij orøg, ɑdøøg gen be mɑlli jwögg mø pɑth.
Gïg-ɑ kyeelø møg-ɑ ɑ́gwøg yi Mɑnɑsè, ki orøng-ɑ ɑ́gwøge, bɑ ɑgwed kì yij
Akedhi Mɑnɑsè kun-ɑ di kweyye, kɑ koony yij bɑɑg gøldwøng, bɑɑg Udhɑ̀. Arøøny Amön wɑ̈de keje ɑ́ rɑ̈dh.
Amön ɑ́røny runne bɑ pyɑ̈r ɑ́ryew wïdɑ́ryew, kɑ ojyɑ̈gø ki runn ɑ́ryew kì Yerusɑlem. Meye cwøl ɑ́ Meculemeth nyɑɑr Aɑrudh kì kɑɑl Yotbɑ̀.
Amön ɑ́røngi kì bøli Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j ki orøng ni men-ɑ ɑ́gwøg yi wïye Mɑnɑsè.
Amön ɑ́cyɑ̈dh ɑ yij yuu-ɑ ɑ́cyɑ̈dhi yi wïye, jwögg-ɑ pɑth møg-ɑ ɑ́mɑlli yi wïye ɑ́mɑlle thyew, kɑ ree bøødhe piny kì bøli gïn.
Amön Jwøøg kweyye, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j ɑ́wiye piny, kɑ ocögø e pɑ cyɑ̈dhi kì yuu Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j.
Kɑ Amön mol yi bɑ̈ngge, kɑ gø nɑ̈g gen kì gøldwøng.
Codhe, ɑloony jøg-ɑ ɑ́nɑ̈g Amön ki nɑ̈gø yi tyëng Yeudiyɑ̀, kɑ Yöciyɑ̀ wɑ̈de røøny keje ɑ́ rɑ̈dh.
Gïg-ɑ kyeelø møg-ɑ ɑ́gwøg yi Amön bɑ ɑgwed kì yij
Akoony Amön kì yij bɑɑg Udhɑ̀, ɑkwɑɑny keje yi Yöciyɑ̀ wɑ̈de.
Yöciyɑ̀ ɑ́göög ki gïgdøj kì bøli Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, nuti pɑ̈nyi ruudø, o dhø Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j nuti pɑ̈ny en ki pyemø, ɑ́bëëd ceth e nɑ kwɑn Debïd.
Kì pyɑ̈rø wïdɑ́bïdɑ̈ɑ̈g runni Rɑ̈dh Yöciyɑ̀ kì yij lɑwø, ɑ ɑ́öre jɑlgwed, Cɑpɑn wɑ̈d Adhɑliyɑ̀, o bɑ kwɑɑr Meculɑm, gø öre’ Kengø, kɑ gø köbbe kinni,
“Kedhí yï Kilkiyɑ̀, Ókwër-ɑ Dwøng. Kɑ pyëëj kiper ngyëny møg-ɑ nyi cøng yi ókwër-ɑ dhø Kengø kì yï teedø.
Kɑ köbbí mëgge ngyënyyɑni jøg-ɑ kwølli tyëng-ɑ thïg Kengø. Wiy ri gïn nyi cudi gen,
bödhhi yiedh ki yenh, kí bödhhi gyer geki bödhhi mön, kɑ ri gïn ngëëw gen ki pɑ̈m geki kïtt-ɑ thïg Kengø.
Jøg-ɑ kwølli jøgwøg yethi gen bong ɑ́dud, ge pɑth ki møg pyëj ki kër-ɑ mïdhi ngyëny yi gen.”
Kɑ Cɑpɑn jɑlgwed köbbi yi Kilkiyɑ̀ Ókwër-ɑ Dwøng kinni, “Wɑ̈nyi Cigg ɑ́yod yi yɑn kì Kengi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j.” Kɑ wɑ̈nyɑni mëgge Cɑpɑn, ɑrɑngii yi Cɑpɑn.
Codhe, kɑ døøg-ɑ yï rɑ̈dh, ɑkööbe kinni, “Ngyëny møg-ɑ ying Kengø ɑ́kwɑny yi bɑ̈ngí, kɑ gï mëgge jøg-ɑ thïg Kengø.”
Codhe ɑköbbe rɑ̈dh kinni, “Yïɑ dɑ wɑ̈nyø mɑ ɑ́mëggi yɑn yi Kilkiyɑ̀, wɑ̈nyɑni nud kì yïɑ kì keny.” Kɑ wɑ̈nyɑni rɑng yi Cɑpɑn kì bøli rɑ̈dh.
Keny-ɑ ɑ́lïngi kwøbbi Wɑ̈nyi Cigg yi rɑ̈dh, ɑkɑge ógødhe yi rɑ̈ɑ̈m pyëwe,
ɑköbbe ókwërø Kilkiyɑ̀, kí Akikɑm wɑ̈d Cɑpɑn, kí Akbör wɑ̈d Mikɑiyɑ̀, kí Cɑpɑn jɑlgwed, kí Asɑiyɑ̀ jɑngi gøldwøng kinni,
“Kedhu Yeudiyɑ̀ bënn kipe gïg-ɑ pwönyi yi wɑ̈nyø men. Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j pyëwe rɑɑj ki wɑ, mɑ́ gïg-ɑ kømmi yi wɑ̈nyø men nuti gwøgø yi kweyyee. Cigg-ɑ ɑ́cïb kömee nuti mïdhø yi wɑ.”

Kɑ ókwërø Kilkiyɑ̀, kí Akikɑm, kí Akbör, kí Cɑpɑn, kí Asɑiyɑ̀ ge kedh-ɑ yï Kuldɑ̀ ngetitöng, cï Cɑlum wɑ̈d Tikbɑ̀ wɑ̈d Arkɑs jɑl-ɑ mïdhi ógudhi kwër. Ngɑnɑni ɑ́bëëd ɑ Yerusɑlem kì byëng-ɑ ɑ́cer gerø. Kɑ gø löbbi gen gïn-ɑ ɑ́cwöb.
Kɑ gï köbbe kinni døøg gen yï rɑ̈dh, kɑ gø köbbi gen kinni,
bene wöön-ɑ kɑ̈ɑ̈l yï Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j èn: “Yerusɑlem óryɑ̈g yi yɑn geki jie bënn, ni kër-ɑ ógwedii kì yij wɑ̈nyø men-ɑ ɑ́rɑ̈ngi rɑ̈dh.
Yɑ ɑ́bɑny yi gen, kɑ ge nëng-ɑ jwögg mø pɑth ki gëdhhì, kɑ pyëwɑ rënyi yi gen, kɑ yɑ mɑg yi liny kì bɑng gïg-ɑ ɑ́gwøg yi gen. Yɑ ɑ́mɑg yi liny ki Yerusɑlem, linyɑni pɑ cög.
Kɑ rɑ̈ɑ̈dh Yeudiyɑ̀ ngɑn-ɑ ɑ́ör wun köbbu kinni, Jwøøg Isrɑil, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j okööbø kinni, ‘Yï ɑ́lïng ki møg-ɑ ɑ́rɑng kì yij wɑ̈nyø,

kì bɑng kɑ ɑ́yewí, kɑ rií gwøøg mölø kì bølɑ, kɑ ógudhí pyëëd wɑ̈g yi rɑ̈ɑ̈m pyëwí, kɑ yï óywöngø, keny-ɑ ɑ́lïng kinni, kɑɑl Yerusɑlem óryɑ̈g yi yɑn geki jie, kɑ köme pɑ̈dhi yi cyën kɑ rënyi. De kwɑ̈jjí ɑ́lïngɑ.
Cɑ́y-ɑ ɑ́kømmɑ pɑ kɑ̈ɑ̈lɑ kömi gen, gïti keny-ɑ óthøw. Yï ówiy yi yɑn, o yï thøw ki mër.”
Kɑ kwøbbɑni muuj Rɑ̈dh Yöciyɑ̀ yi jøgɑni.
Aöd Rɑ̈dh Yöciyɑ̀ kinni cöllii jøgdøngi Yeudiyɑ̀ kí Yerusɑlem bënn.

Akedh rɑ̈dh geki jø Yeudiyɑ̀, kí ókwër, kí jøtöng, kí ji bënn, othønhø kí tyëngdøngø kí tyëngkɑ̈rì kí ɑbuur, ge ɑ́kedhi yij Kengi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j. Arɑ̈nggi gen kwøbb-ɑ yij Wɑ̈nyi Cigg bënn, eni wɑ̈ny-ɑ ɑ́yod kì yij Kengi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j yi rɑ̈dh, ge olïngø kidøøj.

Kɑ rɑ̈dh ócungø kì ri lööj rɑ̈ɑ̈dhø, ɑkönge kì bøli Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kinni ócyɑ̈dhi kì bɑng Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, kɑ cigge geki kwönge mïdhe ki pyëwe, kí tege bëne. Kí kinni kwöng-ɑ ógwedø kì yij wɑ̈nyɑni ómïdhi yi en, kɑ ji oyïëyø ki mïdhi kwöngɑni.

Apɑ̈de ókwërri jwögg-ɑ pɑth møg-ɑ ɑ́røny yi rɑ̈nhi Yeudiyɑ̀, gen ɑ jøg-ɑ nyi rɑ̈bø ki bɑkur kì kɑ̈jji mɑ̈ddø møg-ɑ kɑ̈ddi Yeudiyɑ̀, kí myërr-ɑ cyɑ̈gi ki Yerusɑlem. Ókwërr-ɑ nyi rɑ̈bbi Bɑɑl, kí cɑ̈ng, kí dwɑ̈y, kí kyell, kí jɑmmi mɑl møg-ɑ kyeelø ki bɑkur bënn, ge ɑ́pɑ̈d yi Yöciyɑ̀.
Akɑ̈ɑ̈le ngïji Aceerɑ̀ wɑ̈g kì yij Kengi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, kɑ gø kïdhe wɑ̈g kì Yerusɑlem, ɑkïdhe gøn yij töör Kidrön, kɑ gø rɑ̈be kì kunɑni, ɑtøgii kɑ ogöögø ki búr, ɑweddi búrɑni wɑ̈thi rörri ji.
Adhure uddi ɑ́mɑ̈jji keng møg-ɑ bɑdhhi Kengø piny.

Ókwërr-ɑ ɑ́ying yethi kɑ̈ddi Yeudiyɑ̀ bënn ɑ́kɑ̈ɑ̈le Yerusɑlem, ɑdhure kɑ̈jji mɑ̈ddø møg-ɑ nyi rɑ̈ɑ̈b ki gëdhhì geki bɑkur piny bënn, kì yij pödhø bëne. Kɑ këlli lɑm møg-ɑ ɑ́gërri wɑ̈li dyel kì dhø döri kɑɑl, dhøng-ɑ ɑ́ger yi Jöcwø, ɑ ɑ́bëëd ɑ́ jɑngi kɑɑlɑni, dhur piny yi Yöciyɑ̀. Këllɑni ɑ́ying-ɑ wïj kyëj kì dhøngɑni, e dhɑnhø kedh-ɑ kɑɑl.
Ókwërrɑni pɑ nyi wɑ̈dhi buti këli Kengi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kì Yerusɑlem, de ge nyii cyɑ̈mø ki ópùni kwër kì kelli ókwër, wɑddi gen.
Kɑ kyëny-ɑ ɑ́thyëyi jwøøg cɑ̈ng yi rɑ̈nhi Yeudiyɑ̀ nyiig yi Yöciyɑ̀, kɑ yɑ̈thi kyënyɑni rɑ̈be. (Ge ɑ ɑ́ying-ɑ dhø döri kɑɑl, dhøng-ɑ kedhi Kengi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, kì buti ød jɑgø Nɑthɑn Melek.)

Kɑ këli lɑm men-ɑ ɑ́ger yi rɑ̈nhi Yeudiyɑ̀ kì wïj óthɑɑng øn-ɑ ɑ́ger yi Akɑɑdh, geki këlli lɑm ɑ́ryew møg-ɑ ɑ́gwøg yi Mɑnɑsè kì ódɑ̈r-ɑ ri Kengi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, dhur piny yi Yöciyɑ̀, kɑ gï tørre, kɑ lɑ̈bbi gïn wedde yij töör Kidrön.

Kɑ këlli lɑm møg-ɑ ɑ́ger yi Sølømøn kì wɑɑng cyɑ̈ɑ̈ng mwøl kì Yerusɑlem, kì kuni wɑɑng wurlwɑl kì ri Kïti Dhetun, møg-ɑ ɑ́gërri jwögg-ɑ rijjø, ɑ løg Actöreth jwøøg tyëng Sïdön, kí Kemöc jwøøg tyëng Moɑb, kí Milköm jwøøg tyëng Amön, ge ɑ́bwöl yi Yöciyɑ̀.
Kɑ löjji Aceerɑ̀ toore piny, kɑ kɑ̈jj-ɑ ɑ́di gen pɑ̈ɑ̈nge ki cu ji.
Aløg Yöciyɑ̀ ree, kɑ ólïdhø ki rörri ji kì wïj kït, ɑöde kɑ cu kɑ̈ɑ̈l wɑ̈g kì yethi rörrɑni, ɑrɑ̈be gïn kì wïj këli lɑm e bwöl-ɑ gøn, ni møg-ɑ ɑ́kwøb yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j ki dhøg jɑltöng cøn.
Codhe, ɑpëjji Yöciyɑ̀ kinni, “Á röri men ɑ nennɑ ɑcɑ̀?”
Aköbbii yi jø Betiil kinni, “Bɑ röri jɑltöng-ɑ ɑ́kɑ̈ɑ̈l Yeudiyɑ̀, ɑ ɑ́töng møg-ɑ ɑ́göggí këlli lɑm men.”
Akööb Yöciyɑ̀ kinni, “Wiyu en, cu jɑlɑni ko kɑ̈ɑ̈lu wɑ̈g.”
Codhe ɑwiy gen cue, geki cu jɑltöng men-ɑ ɑ́kɑ̈ɑ̈l Sɑmɑriyɑ̀.
Kɑ keng geki kɑ̈jji mɑ̈ddø bënn møg-ɑ ɑ́ying myërri Sɑmɑriyɑ̀, ɑ ɑ́ger yi rɑ̈nhi Isrɑil, ɑ bɑnge ɑ́rënyi pyëw Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, dhur piny yi Yöciyɑ̀. Gï ɑ́gögge gïn-ɑ ɑ́gwøge kì Betiil.
Kɑ ókwërri jwögg-ɑ pɑth nɑ̈ge kì wɑ̈thi këlli lɑm. Kɑ këlli lɑm møgɑni, wɑ̈thi gïn rɑ̈be ki cu ji. Codhe ɑdwööge Yerusɑlem.
Kɑ ji ceg yi Rɑ̈dh Yöciyɑ̀ kiper gwøgi Kwëër Ákɑɑdh, geki wøri Jwøøg gen, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j ni kɑ ógwedii kì yij wɑ̈nyi lwöbø.
Bong Kwëër Ákɑɑdh mɑ ɑ́pɑ̈nyi ki gwøgø ni menɑni yi rɑ̈nhi Yeudiyɑ̀, kër-ɑ ɑ́jɑɑg pödhø yi Jɑgg.
Anɑn kì cyɑ̈ɑ̈n piny cyee, ɑ ɑ́gwøøg Kwëër Ákɑɑdh yi Yöciyɑ̀ kì Yerusɑlem.

Kɑ tyëdd geki ɑ́jwöggì, kí jwöggi kɑ̈llì, kí ngïjji jwögg geki ngïjji jwögg-ɑ pɑth bënn, kì Yerusɑlem geki Yeudiyɑ̀ bëne nyiig; gïgrijjø møgɑni bënn ɑ́weddi yi Yöciyɑ̀. Kipe kinni o kwøbbi Wɑ̈nyi Cigg men-ɑ ɑ́yod yi Kilkiyɑ̀ Ókwër-ɑ Dwøng kì Kengø, cïb kɑ̈jji gen.
