Bong rɑ̈dh mɑ ɑ́bëëd ni en cøn, mɑ ɑ́døøg kö Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j ki pyëwe bëne, geki rumme kí tege bëne, e mïdh-ɑ Ciggi Mosɑ̀ bënn, o bong rɑ̈dh mɑ ɑ́göög ni en kì bɑnge.
De pyëw Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j ɑ́bëëd e nudd e rɑɑj ceth ki Yeudiyɑ̀, kì bɑng gööj orøng-ɑ ɑ́gwøg yi Rɑ̈dh Mɑnɑsè.

Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j okööbø kinni, “Yeudiyɑ̀ ógöggɑ gïn-ɑ ɑ́göggɑ Isrɑil. Tyëng Yeudiyɑ̀ ónyiigɑ kì bølɑ, Yerusɑlem óbɑny yi yɑn, eni men-ɑ́ kɑɑl-ɑ ɑ́myegɑ geki Kengø men-ɑ ɑ́kwøbɑ kinni yɑ ómɑlli kì yije.”
Gïg-ɑ kyeelø bënn møg-ɑ ɑ́gwøg yi Rɑ̈dh Yöciyɑ̀, bɑ ɑgwed kì yij
Kɑ Rɑ̈dh Nekö, rɑ̈ɑ̈dh Rïp bï-ɑ kömi Nɑm Porɑt e bï-ɑ be kønyi rɑ̈nhdwøøng Acuur, kɑ rødh yi Rɑ̈dh Yöciyɑ̀ kì Megidø. Kɑ Yöciyɑ̀ nɑ̈g kì kenyɑni.
Acïbii yij yɑ̈y yi pëjji linye, kɑ kɑ̈ɑ̈l Yerusɑlem, ɑkonyii kì kej rörri gøl rɑ̈ɑ̈dhø.
Kɑ Yöɑkɑdh wɑ̈de røny yi tyëng Yeudiyɑ̀ ɑ́ rɑ̈dh kì keje.
Yöɑkɑdh ɑ́bëëd runne bɑ pyɑ̈r ɑ́ryew wïdɑ́dɑ̈g keny-ɑ ɑ́gööge ɑ́ rɑ̈dh, kɑ ojyɑ̈gø kì Yerusɑlem ki dwɑ̈tt ɑ́dɑ̈g. Meye cwøl ɑ́ Amutɑl nyɑɑr Jermɑyɑ̀ kì Libnɑ̀.
Árøngi kì bøli Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j ni orøng-ɑ ɑ́gwøg yi kweyye.
Lɑwe ɑ́cög-ɑ keny-ɑ ɑ́mɑgii yi Nekö rɑ̈ɑ̈dh Rïp kì Riblɑ̀, kì piny Amɑth, kɑ Yeudiyɑ̀ köbbe col ki kïlli ngyëny ɑ́tegg ɑ́lïp ɑ́dɑ̈g, kí miy ɑ́ngwen, geki kïlli dhɑb pyɑ̈r ɑ́dɑ̈g wïdɑ́ngwen, gɑ gwɑ̈j.
Kɑ Eliɑkim wɑ̈d Yöciyɑ̀ røny ɑ́ rɑ̈ɑ̈dh Yeudiyɑ̀ yi Rɑ̈dh Nekö, kì kej Yöɑkɑdh. Kɑ nyingi Eliɑkim wil yi Nekö ɑ́ Yöyɑkim. Kɑ Yöɑkɑdh kïdhi Rïp yi Rɑ̈dh Nekö ɑ́ ɑmɑg, kɑ othøø kì kunɑni.
Rɑ̈dh Yöyɑkim gwɑ̈j nyi cøng yi en kì yï ji e bɑ̈ɑ̈n, gø nyi køøle kömi jɑmm-ɑ yï dhɑnhø, o gwɑ̈nyɑni bɑ men nyi culi Rïp.
Yöyɑkim ɑ́røngi kì bøli Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j ni kweyye.
Kɑ liny Bɑbïlöniyɑ̀, kí liny Arɑm, kí liny Moɑb, kí liny Amön ör kömi Yöyɑkim yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, be rënyi Yeudiyɑ̀, ni møg-ɑ ɑ́kwøb yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j ki dhøggi bɑ̈ngge, jøtöng kinni gø ógwøge.
Ryɑ̈ngɑni ɑ́bï kömi Yeudiyɑ̀ e ɑ́kwøb-ɑ yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kipe kinni o nyiige tyëng Yeudiyɑ̀ kì bøle, kiper orøng-ɑ ɑ́gwøg yi Rɑ̈dh Mɑnɑsè,
kí per remmi tyëng-ɑ yï gen bɑ̈r møg-ɑ ɑ́nɑ̈ge thyew. Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j pyëwe pɑ cuggi lɑ̈ɑ̈mø ki Mɑnɑsè kì bɑng orøngɑni.
Gïg-ɑ kyeelø bënn møg-ɑ ɑ́gwøg yi Yöyɑkim bɑ ɑgwed kì yij
Kɑ Yöyɑkim kedh-ɑ kun-ɑ di kweyye, ɑrøøny Yöyɑkin wɑ̈de keje ɑ́ rɑ̈dh.
Yɑɑy Rïp nuti cigi bëën wɑ̈g kì pödhe, mɑ́ piny-ɑ ɑ́bëëd e jɑɑg-ɑ yi Rïp bëne, jɑɑg-ɑ yi rɑ̈ɑ̈dh Bɑbïlöniyɑ̀, cɑg kì Nɑm Porɑt gïti tøg Rïp.
Yöyɑkin ɑ́bëëd runne bɑ pyɑ̈rø wïdɑ́bïdɑ̈g, keny-ɑ ɑ́gööge ɑ́ rɑ̈ɑ̈dh Yeudiyɑ̀. Kɑ ojyɑ̈gø ki dwɑ̈tt ɑ́dɑ̈g kì Yerusɑlem. Meye cwøl ɑ́ Nekuctɑ̀, nyɑɑr Elnɑthɑn kì Yerusɑlem.
Kɑ Yöyɑkin ogöögø ki gïnrɑj kì bøli Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j ni gïg-ɑ ɑ́gøggi yi wïye.
Bøli keny-ɑ ɑ́jyɑ̈ɑ̈ge ɑ ɑ́bëën liny Bɑbïlöniyɑ̀ e kwøll-ɑ yi pëjji liny Nebukɑdnesɑr, kɑ kɑɑl Yerusɑlem tyeg yi linyɑni.
Kɑ Rɑ̈dh Nebukɑdnesɑr bï-ɑ Yerusɑlem e kɑɑl bɑ ɑtyeg yi linye.
Kì bïdɑ̈ɑ̈g runni Nebukɑdnesɑr kì yij lɑwø, ɑ ɑ́kɑ̈ɑ̈l Rɑ̈dh Yöyɑkin ɑ́ ɑmɑg. Kɑ Rɑ̈dh Yöyɑkin geki meye, kí wɑ̈dde, kí jyɑ̈gge, kí jɑggi gøldwøng, ge kïdhi Bɑbïl ge rum yömmi yï rɑ̈ɑ̈dh Bɑbïlöniyɑ̀.
Kɑ kɑ̈r-ɑ ɑ́ying Kengø geki gøldwøng kïdhi Bɑbïl yi Nebukɑdnesɑr. Gïg-ɑ ɑ́gwøg yi Sølømøn ki dhɑb gɑ mø Kengø, ɑ́kɑ̈ɑ̈l wɑ̈g yi Rɑ̈dh Nebukɑdnesɑr kɑ gï kɑ̈ɑ̈le, ni møg-ɑ ɑ́kwøb yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j.

Kɑ tyëng Yerusɑlem kɑ̈l gɑ ɑmɑgg yi Nebukɑdnesɑr, kí nyiirɑ̈dh, kí jøg-ɑ bɑ pëjji bënn, kwɑnni ji-ɑ ɑ́køøl bɑ ɑ́lïp pyɑ̈rø. Bödhh-ɑ cinggi gen døj ɑ́kɑ̈ɑ̈le bënn, geki bödhhi thɑ̈dh. Tyëng-ɑ nyingi gen pëddi cɑnø ɑ ɑ́wiy kì Yeudiyɑ̀.

Jöddi liny mø kwɑnni gen bɑ ɑ́lïp ɑ́bïryew, ɑ́kïdhi Bɑbïlöniyɑ̀ yi Rɑ̈dh Nebukɑdnesɑr. Kɑ bödhh-ɑ cinggi gen døj gɑ ɑ́lïp ɑ́kyel kɑ̈ɑ̈le, kí bödhhi thɑ̈dh kì kelli gen, ge bɑ jøg teg bënn, møg cuggi nyïɑ̈ggø ki liny.
Dhedekiyɑ̀ ɑ́røngi kì bøli Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j ni Yöyɑkim.
Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j pyëwe ɑ́ceg-ɑ rënyø ki tyëng Yerusɑlem geki Yeudiyɑ̀, ɑ nyiige gïn kì bøle.
Kɑ kɑɑl obëëdø ɑ́ ɑtyeg kinøw gïti pyɑ̈rø wïdɑ́kyeel runni Dhedekiyɑ̀ kì yij lɑwø.
Kì bïngween cyɑ̈nggi ngween dwɑ̈tt, keny-ɑ ɑ́tëngi kɑ̈j kɑ bong-ɑ gïncɑm,
kɑ jøliny turr-ɑ wɑ̈g, ɑpɑ̈r gen bënn kì wɑ̈rɑni, ngö kɑɑl bɑ ɑtyeg yi yɑɑy Bɑbïlöniyɑ̀. Ge ɑ́kɑ̈l yuu bɑɑg rɑ̈dh, ge kɑ̈ll-ɑ kɑɑm dör, ge kedh-ɑ kuni Töör Urdun.
De liny Bɑbïlöniyɑ̀ ɑ́rengi bɑng Rɑ̈dh Dhedekiyɑ̀, kɑ gø mɑɑg gen thwøri Yerikö, kɑ wɑ̈ɑ̈y yi jølinye.
Kɑ Dhedekiyɑ̀ mɑg kɑ kïdhi yï Nebukɑdnesɑr, rɑ̈ɑ̈dh Bɑbïlöniyɑ̀ kì kɑɑl Riblɑ̀, kɑ gønye lidh kì kunɑni.
Codhe, kɑ wɑ̈ddi Dhedekiyɑ̀ nɑ̈g gï nenne’ nennø, kɑ nyingi Dhedekiyɑ̀ tøy, kɑ mɑg ki ɑ́cwecwel, ɑkïdhii Bɑbïl.
Kì bïryeew cyɑ̈nggi bïïj dwɑ̈tt, kì pyɑ̈rø wïdɑ́bïngween runni Nebukɑdnesɑr, rɑ̈ɑ̈dh Bɑbïlöniyɑ̀ kì yij lɑwø, ɑ ɑ́bëën Nebudhɑrɑdɑn jɑngi liny-ɑ kor gøldwøng, ɑ bɑ jɑngi tøg burø. Ábï Yerusɑlem,
kɑ Kengø rɑ̈be geki gøldwøng, kí kɑ̈ll-ɑ døngø bënn kì Yerusɑlem.
Kɑ döri Yerusɑlem cøør piny yi yɑye.
Kɑ tyëng-ɑ ɑ́döng kì Yerusɑlem cøn, geki tyëng-ɑ ɑ́yömmi yï rɑ̈ɑ̈dh Bɑbïlöniyɑ̀, kí tyëng-ɑ kyeelø bënn, mɑg yi Nebudhɑrɑdɑn jɑngi liny-ɑ kor gøldwøng, kɑ gï køøle Bɑbïl.
De kwï tyëng-ɑ nyingi gen pëddi cɑnø, kì yij pödhø, ɑ́wiye o ge pur gen bɑ̈ggi oløg geki pwödh.
Atöggi mɑc, kí ópɑ̈nni búr, kí dikɑ̈bbì, kí gïg-ɑ nyi nɑ̈ɑ̈g mɑc, kí óthɑ̈ggì, kí ópɑ̈nni bɑkur, geki gïg-ɑ kyeelø møg-ɑ ɑ́køny ki dilɑl, ɑ nyi göög bënn kì Kengø, ge ɑ́kɑ̈l bënn.
Gïg-ɑ bɑ dhɑb kí ɑ́tegø bënn ɑ́kɑ̈l yi gen, cɑg kì ri óthɑ̈gg-ɑ thønhø geki ópɑ̈nn-ɑ nyi kɑ̈lli lelli mɑc.
Gïg-ɑ ɑ́göggi Kengø yi Sølømøn ki dilɑl, ɑ løg löjji dilɑl ryeet, kí yɑ̈ɑ̈th geki luuy pï ge ɑ́dhɑ̈li rømø, mɑ́ ge peeg cɑrø.

Löjjɑni ryeet ɑ́bëëd ge pɑ̈r, ɑ́kyel bɑ̈re bɑ mïtïr ɑ́bïdɑ̈g, kí yɑ̈ɑ̈r dilɑl kì wïje, e bɑ mïtïr ɑ́kyel kí sentimïtïr pyɑ̈r ɑ́dɑ̈g. Tøggi yɑ̈ɑ̈r dilɑl menɑni bɑ ɑwen ki nywøli yɑdh romɑn mø ógwøgø gɑ dilɑl.
Kɑ Ókwër-ɑ Dwøng Serɑiyɑ̀, kí ókwër-ɑ bɑnge, Dhepɑniyɑ̀ geki jyɑ̈ggi Kengø ɑ́dɑ̈g, kɑ̈l yi Nebudhɑrɑdɑn pënyi liny Bɑbïl.
Jɑl-ɑ ɑ́bëëd ɑ́ pënyi liny kì kɑɑl ɑ́kɑ̈ɑ̈le, kí jø tøg buri rɑ̈dh gɑ ɑ́bïj, kí jɑl-ɑ bɑng pënyi liny, ɑ ɑ́mïdhi wɑ̈jji nyingi jøliny, kí jöddi kɑɑlɑni gɑ pyɑ̈r ɑ́bïkyel.
Ge ɑ́kɑ̈l yi Nebudhɑrɑdɑn, kɑ gï muuje rɑ̈ɑ̈dh Bɑbïlöniyɑ̀ kì Riblɑ̀,
kì piny Amɑth, kɑ ge nɑ̈g yi rɑ̈ɑ̈dh Bɑbïlöniyɑ̀ kì Riblɑ̀.
Codhe, kɑ tyëng Yeudiyɑ̀ óthumø ki kïdhi yïnø kinøw kì piny gen.
Kɑ Gedɑliyɑ̀ wɑ̈d Akikɑm wɑ̈d Cɑpɑn gwøg ɑ́ jɑngi Yeudiyɑ̀ yi Nebukɑdnesɑr rɑ̈ɑ̈dh Bɑbïlöniyɑ̀, o jɑɑge ji-ɑ ɑ́döng ge nuti kïdhi yïnø kì Yeudiyɑ̀.

Keny-ɑ ɑ́lïng pëjji liny geki jøliny møg-ɑ ɑ́cög ge nuti yömmø, kinni i Gedɑliyɑ̀ órønyø, ɑkedhi gen be rëbø ki Gedɑliyɑ̀ kì Midhpɑ̀. Pëjjì møgɑni bɑ, Icmɑil wɑ̈d Nethɑniyɑ̀, kí Yöɑnɑn wɑ̈d Kɑreɑ̀, kí Serɑiyɑ̀ wɑ̈d Tɑnumet kì Netöpɑ̀, kí Yedhɑniyɑ̀ jɑl Mɑɑkɑ̀.
Kɑ ge köbbi yi Gedɑliyɑ̀ kinni, “Wu ko böggi yi pëjji liny Bɑbïlöniyɑ̀, pëggu pönhï, kɑ wu göggu rɑ̈ɑ̈dh Bɑbïlöniyɑ̀, yɑn ɑ köngi èn, bong gïjø me nywɑl wun.”

De kì bïryeew dwɑ̈tt kì runɑni, Icmɑil wɑ̈d Nethɑniyɑ̀ wɑ̈d Elicɑmɑ̀, o bɑ wɑ̈d gøl rɑ̈ɑ̈dhø, ɑ́dhwödh kɑ kedh-ɑ Midhpɑ̀ geki jøg mø kwɑnni gen bɑ pyɑ̈rø. Kɑ Gedɑliyɑ̀ nɑ̈g gen. Tyëng Yeudiyɑ̀ kí tyëng Bɑbïl møg-ɑ ɑ́bëëd kì Midhpɑ̀ ɑ́nɑ̈g yi gen thyew.
Codhe, kɑ ji odhwödhø bënn, tyëngkɑ̈rì kí tyëng-ɑ nyingi gen cɑn, kɑ ge kedh-ɑ Rïp, geki pëjji liny, mɑ́ ge ɑ́bwøg yi tyëng Bɑbïl.

Kì bɑng keny me bɑ̈ɑ̈r, kì run-ɑ ɑ́göög Ebilmerodɑk ki rɑ̈ɑ̈dh Bɑbïlöniyɑ̀, pyëwe ɑ́lɑ̈ɑ̈m ki Yöyɑkin rɑ̈ɑ̈dh Yeudiyɑ̀ kɑ gø göönye wɑ̈g kì ød mɑg. Gø ɑ́gønye kì pyɑ̈rø wïdɑ́ryeew dwɑ̈tt, kì cyɑ̈nggi dwɑ̈y pyɑ̈r ɑ́ryew wïdɑ́bïryew, e runni Yöyɑkin göögø ki pyɑ̈r ɑ́dɑ̈g wïdɑ́bïryew ɑ́ ɑmɑg.
Aköbbii yi Ebilmerodɑk ki kwøb mø døøj, kɑ gø cïbe mɑl kibøli rɑ̈nhh-ɑ ɑ́mɑɑg Bɑbïlöniyɑ̀ bënn.
Kɑ ógudh-ɑ ɑ́rug yi Yöyɑkin kì ød mɑg wil, ɑruugii kɑ cwøøl be cɑm kì tɑɑw rɑ̈dh. Nyi cyɑ̈ɑ̈m ɑ tɑɑw rɑ̈dh ceth kɑ̈ng-ɑ nëëne.
Gïg-ɑ dwɑddi yi en ɑ́bëëd ge nyi mëgg-ɑ en ceth gïti cyɑ̈ng-ɑ ɑ́thøwe.
Adɑm bɑ wïyi Ceeth, Ceeth bɑ wïyi Enöc, Enöc bɑ wïyi Kenɑn,
Kenɑn bɑ wïyi Mɑɑ̈lɑlel, Mɑɑ̈lɑlel bɑ wïyi Yɑred.
Yɑred bɑ wïyi Enök, en ɑ bɑ wïyi Metucelɑ̀. Metucelɑ̀ bɑ wïyi Lɑmek,
Lɑmek bɑ wïyi Nöö, Nöö yïe ɑ́dɑ wɑ̈dd ɑ́dɑ̈g: Cem, kí Kɑm, kí Yɑpeth.
Wɑ̈ddi Yɑpeth bɑ Gömer, kí Mɑgög kí Mɑdɑy, kí Yɑbɑn, kí Tubɑl, kí Mecek, kí Tirɑs, ge bɑ kweyyi jurr-ɑ cwølli ki nyingi gen.
Kwɑrri Gömer bɑ tyëng Ackenɑdh, kí Rïpɑth, kí Tögɑrmɑ̀.
Kwɑrri Yɑbɑn bɑ tyëng gøl Elicɑɑ̀, kí Tɑrcic, kí Kïtïm, kí Dödɑnïm,
Wɑ̈ddi Kɑm bɑ Kuc, kí Misrɑim, kí Put, kí Kɑnɑɑn, ge bɑ kweyyi tyëng-ɑ cwølli ki nyingi gen.
Kwɑrri Kuc bɑ tyëng Sebɑ̀, kí Abïlɑ̀, kí Sɑbtɑ̀, kí Rɑmɑ̀ kí Sɑbtekɑ̀. Kwɑrri Rɑmɑ̀ ɑ bɑ tyëng Sebɑ̀ kí Dedɑn.
(Kuc yïe ɑ́dɑ wɑ̈de me cwøl ɑ́ Nimröd, bɑ dhɑnhø mɑ ɑ́ying mɑɑl tyëng-ɑ ɑ́tyɑ̈ɑ̈m kì kömi piny bëne).
Kwɑrri Misrɑim bɑ tyëng Lud, kí Anɑm, kí Leɑb, kí Nɑptu,
kí Pɑthrus, kí Kɑslu, kí Kɑptör, (ɑ ri gen kɑ̈ɑ̈l yi tyëng Pelistiyɑ̀).
Wɑ̈ddi Kɑnɑɑn, nyel-ɑ kɑyø bɑ Sïdön, kí Keth, ge bɑ kweyyi tyëng-ɑ cwølli ki nyingi gen.
Kɑnɑɑn thyew bɑ kweyi tyëng Yebus, kí Amör, kí Girgɑc,
kí Kib, kí Arkì, kí Sin,
kí tyëng Arbɑd, kí tyëng Dhemɑr, kí tyëng Amɑth.
Wɑ̈ddi Cem bɑ Elɑm, kí Acuur, kí Arpɑkcɑd, kí Lud, kí Arɑm, kí Udh, kí Uul, kí Gether, kí Mecek, ge bɑ kweyyi tyëng-ɑ cwølli ki nyingi gen.
Arpɑkcɑd bɑ wïyi Celɑ̀, ɑ bɑ wïyi Eber.
Eber yïe dɑ wɑ̈dd ɑ́ryew; ɑ́kyel bɑ Peleg, mɑ́ jii kömi piny ɑ́bëëd ri gen pɑ̈ngi gen kì bøli kenyɑni, o nyel-ɑ kyeelø bɑ Yoktɑn.
Kwɑrri Yoktɑn bɑ tyëng Almödɑd, kí Celep, kí Adhɑrmɑbeth, kí Yerɑ̀,
kí Adörɑm, kí Udhɑl, kí Diklɑ̀,
kí Ebɑl, kí Abimɑil, kí Cebɑ̀,
kí Opir, kí Abïlɑ̀, kí Yöbɑb. Jiɑni bënn bɑ kwɑrri Yoktɑn.
Gøl Cem e køøl-ɑ mɑl ri Abrɑhɑm bɑ, Cem, Arpɑkcɑd, Celɑ̀,
Eber, Peleg, Reu,
Serug, Nɑor, Terɑ̀,
kí Abrɑm (ɑ cwølli thyew ɑ́ Abrɑhɑm).
Abrɑhɑm yïe ɑ́dɑ wɑ̈dd ɑ́ryew: Isɑɑk, kí Icmɑil.
Wɑ̈ddi Icmɑil ɑ́göög ki wɑ̈thi kɑ̈llì pyɑ̈rø wïdɑ́ryew, (cɑg kì ri nyel-ɑ dwøng), Nebɑyoth, Kedɑr, Adbeel, Mibsɑm,
Micmɑ̀, Dumɑ̀, Mɑsɑ̀, Adɑd, Temɑ̀,
Yetur, Nɑpic kí Kedemɑ̀.
Abrɑhɑm yïe ɑ́dɑ ɑkwɑny, me cwøl ɑ́ Keturɑ̀. Abrɑhɑm ɑ́nyöddi yi ngɑnɑni ki wɑ̈dd ɑ́bïkyel, nyingi gen bɑ: Dhimrɑn, Yokcɑn, Medɑn, Midyɑn, Icbɑk, kí Cuɑ̀. Yokcɑn yïe ɑ́dɑ wɑ̈dd ɑ́ryew: Cebɑ̀ kí Dedɑn
O wɑ̈ddi Midyɑn bɑ ɑ́bïj: Epɑ̀, Eper, Aɑnök, Abïdɑ̀, kí Eldɑ̀. Møgɑni bënn bɑ kwɑrri Keturɑ̀.
Isɑɑk wɑ̈d Abrɑhɑm yïe ɑ́dɑ wɑ̈dd ɑ́ryew: Isøø kí Yɑgob.
Wɑ̈ddi Isøø bɑ Elipɑdh, kí Reuel, kí Yeuc, kí Yɑlɑm, kí Körɑ̀.
Elipɑdh ɑ bɑ kweyi ji møg: Temɑn, Omɑr, Dhepì, Gɑtɑm, Kenɑdh, Timnɑ̀ kí Amɑlek,
O Reuel, en ɑ bɑ kweyi tyëng Nɑɑ̈th, kí Dherɑ̀, kí Cɑmɑ̀, kí Midhɑ̀
Tyeli tyëng-ɑ ɑ́bëëd kì Edöm kɑ̈ɑ̈l-ɑ ri wɑ̈ddi Seir.
Lötɑn ɑ bɑ kweyi Örì kí Ömɑm. (Lötɑn yïe ɑ́dɑ nyimen me cwøl ɑ́ Timnɑ̀.)
Cöbɑl, ɑ bɑ kweyi tyëng Albɑn, Mɑnɑɑth, Ebɑl, Cepì kí Onɑm.
Dhibeon, yïe ɑ́dɑ wɑ̈dd ɑ́ryew: Aiyɑ̀, kí Anɑ̀. Anɑ̀ ɑ bɑ wïyi Dïcön, o Dïcön bɑ kweyi tyëng Amrɑn, Ecbɑn, Ithrɑn, kí Kerɑn.
Edher, ɑ bɑ kweyi tyëng Bilɑn, kí Dhɑɑpɑn kí Yɑɑkɑn.
Dïcɑn ɑ bɑ kweyi tyëng Udh kí Arɑn.
Keny-ɑ ɑ́bëëd e bong rɑ̈nhì kì Isrɑil, Edöm ɑ́jɑɑg-ɑ yi rɑ̈nhì møg:
Belɑ̀ wɑ̈d Beor, kì Dinɑbɑ̀.
Yöɑb wɑ̈d Dherɑ̀, kì Bodhrɑ̀.
Ucɑm kì myërri Temɑn.
Adɑd wɑ̈d Bedɑd, kì Abith (en ɑ ɑ́tyɑm tyëng Moɑb).
Sɑmlɑ̀ kì Mɑsrekɑ̀.
Cɑul kì Reöböth kì kömi nɑm.
Bɑɑl Anɑn wɑ̈d Akbör.
Adɑd jɑl Pɑu, (cyëge bɑ Meëtɑbel nyɑɑr Mɑtred wɑ̈d Medhɑɑb).
Tyëng Edöm ɑ́bëëd ri gen pɑ̈ngi gen gɑ jurrì møg: Timnɑ̀, Albɑ̀, Yetheth,
Olibɑmɑ̀, Elɑ̀, Pïnön,
Kenɑdh, Temɑn, Mibdhɑr,
Mɑgdiel, kí Irɑm.
Yɑgob yïe ɑ́dɑ wɑ̈dd pyɑ̈rø wïdɑ́ryew: Ruben, Cimeøn, Leebì, Yeudɑ̀, Isɑkɑr, Dhebulun,
Dɑn, Yosep, Ben Yɑmïn, Nɑptɑlì, Gɑd kí Aceer.
Yeudɑ̀ yïe ɑ́dɑ wɑ̈dd ɑ́bïj møg-ɑ ɑ́nyöllii yi cyëge Bɑtcuɑ̀ nyɑɑr Kɑnɑɑn. Yïe ɑ́dɑ wɑ̈dd ɑ́dɑ̈g: Er, Onɑ̈n, kí Celɑ̀. Er, Wɑ̈d Yeudɑ̀ nyel-ɑ dwøng ɑ́bëëd e rɑj, kɑ nɑ̈g yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j.
Yeudɑ̀ ɑ́nyöddi ki wɑ̈dd ɑ́ryew, yi Tɑmɑr kwɑre, cï wɑ̈de: Peredh kí Dherɑ̀.
Peredh yïe ɑ́dɑ wɑ̈dd ɑ́ryew: Ëdhrön kí Amul
Dherɑ̀ ómï Peredh, yïe ɑ́dɑ wɑ̈dd ɑ́bïj: Dhimrì, Ethɑn, Ëmɑn, Kɑlköl, kí Dɑrdɑ̀.
Akɑn wɑ̈d Kɑrmì,
Ethɑn yïe ɑ́dɑ wɑ̈d ɑ́kyel, me cwøl ɑ́ Adhɑriyɑ̀.
Ëdhrön yïe ɑ́dɑ wɑ̈dd ɑ́dɑ̈g: Yerɑmel, Rɑm, kí Kɑlib.
Gølɑni cɑ̈g-ɑ́ɑ̀ ri Rɑm gïti ri Yesì kinnï: Rɑm, Aminɑdɑb, Nɑkcön (jɑldwøøng wïj gøl Yeudɑ̀),
Sɑlmön, Boɑdh,
Obed, kí Yesì.
Yesì yïe ɑ́dɑ wɑ̈dd ɑ́bïryew, ge lwøøb-ɑ ri döng, ge bɑ Eliɑb, Abinɑdɑb, Cɑmɑ̀,
Nethɑnel, Rɑdɑy,
Odhem, kí Debïd.
Yesì thyew yïe ɑ́dɑ nywøle ɑ́ryew: Dheruyɑ̀ kí Abigɑil.
Nyɑɑr Yesì, Dheruyɑ̀ yïe ɑ́dɑ wɑ̈dd ɑ́dɑ̈g: Abicɑy, Yöɑb, kí Asɑiil.
Nyɑre, Abigɑil ɑ́nywøm-ɑ yi Yether, kwɑɑr Icmɑil, kɑ ge onywølø wɑ̈d me cwøl ɑ́ Amɑsɑ̀.
Ëdhrön yïe ɑ́dɑ wɑ̈d, me cwøl ɑ́ Kɑlib, ɑ ɑ́nywøm Adhubɑ̀, kɑ onywølø ki nyɑre me cwøl ɑ́ Yeriöth. Anywøl Yeriöth ki wɑ̈dd ɑ́dɑ̈g, ɑ løg Yecer, Cöbɑb kí Ardön.
Kì bɑng thøwi Adhubɑ̀, ɑnywøøm Eprɑtɑ̀ yi Kɑlib, ɑnywøl gen ki wɑ̈d me cwøl ɑ́ Ur
Urì bɑ wɑ̈d Ur, o kwɑre bɑ Bedhɑlel.
Keny-ɑ ɑ́göög runni Ëdhrön ki pyɑ̈r ɑ́bïkyel, ɑnywøme nyɑɑr Mɑkir, nyimï Gilyɑd. Anywøl gen ki wɑ̈d me cwøl ɑ́ Segub.
O Segub yïe ɑ́dɑ wɑ̈d me cwøl ɑ́ Yɑir. Yɑir ɑ́jɑɑg-ɑ kɑ̈dd pyɑ̈r ɑ́ryew wïdɑ́dɑ̈g kì myërri Gilyɑd.
De rɑ̈nhi Gecur kí Arɑm ge ɑ́mɑ̈gi ki kɑ̈dd pyɑ̈r ɑ́bïkyel kì kunɑni, e reb-ɑ myërri Yɑir kí Kenɑth, kí kɑ̈dd-ɑ cyɑ̈gi ki gen. Ji-ɑ ɑ́bëëd kì kenyɑni bënn, bɑ kwɑrri Mɑkir wïyi Gilyɑd.
Keny-ɑ ɑ́rum Ëdhrön ki thøø, ɑlɑɑg cyëge Abiyɑ̀ yi wɑ̈de Kɑlib. Ayïddi gen ki wɑ̈d me cwøl ɑ́ Ackur, en ɑ ɑ́cöb kɑɑl Tekoɑ̀.
Yerɑmel, wɑ̈d Ëdhrön nyel-ɑ dwøng, yïe ɑ́dɑ wɑ̈dd ɑ́bïj: Rɑm ɑ dwøng, kí Bunɑ̀, Oren, Odhem kí Akiyɑ̀
Rɑm yïe ɑ́dɑ wɑ̈dd ɑ́dɑ̈g: Mɑɑdh, Yɑmïn, kí Eker. Yerɑmel yïe ɑ́dɑ cyëge nyɑnthinh, nyɑnɑni cwøl ɑ́ Atɑrɑ̀, o yïe ɑ́dɑ wɑ̈d me cwøl ɑ́ Onɑm.
Onɑm yïe ɑ́dɑ wɑ̈dd ɑ́ryew: Nɑdɑb ki Abicur.
Abicur ɑ́nyömi ki ngɑn me cwøl ɑ́ Abikɑil, o yï gen ɑ́dɑ wɑ̈dd ɑ́ryew, Akbɑn, kí Mölïd.
Nɑdɑb ómï Abicur yïe ɑ́dɑ wɑ̈dd ɑ́ryew: Seled kí Apɑim, de Seled ɑ́thøw e bong wɑ̈dde.
Apɑim bɑ wïyi Icì, o Icì bɑ wïyi Cecɑn, o Cecɑn bɑ wïyi Alɑy.
Yɑdɑ̀ ómï Cɑmɑ̀ yïe ɑ́dɑ wɑ̈dd ɑ́ryew: Yether kí Yönɑthɑn, de Yether ɑ́thøw e bong wɑ̈dde.
Yönɑthɑn yïe ɑ́dɑ wɑ̈dd ɑ́ryew: Peleth kí Dhɑdhɑ̀. Ge bɑ kwɑrri Yerɑmel bënn.
Cecɑn yïe bong wɑ̈dde, de ɑ́nywøl-ɑ mɑ̈nn keti gen. Yïe ɑ́dɑ wɑ̈d Rïp me bɑ bɑ̈ng nyinge cwøl ɑ́ Yɑrɑ̀.
Cecɑn nyɑre ɑ́mëgge bɑ̈nge Yɑrɑ̀ ɑ́ dhɑjø, kɑ nyöddi yi nyɑnɑni ki wɑ̈d me cwøl ɑ́ Atɑy.
Cɑ̈gi kɑl kì ri Atɑy gïti ri Elicɑmɑ̀ bɑ Atɑy, Nɑthɑn, Dhɑbɑd,
Eplɑl, Obed,
Yeeu, Adhɑriyɑ̀
Keledh, Eleɑsɑ̀,
Sismɑy, Cɑlum,
Yekɑmiyɑ̀, kí Elicɑmɑ̀.
Wɑ̈d Kɑlib nyel-ɑ dwøng bɑ Yerɑmel, o yïe dɑ ómen me cwøl ɑ́ Mecɑ̀. Mecɑ̀ bɑ wïyi Dhïp ɑ bɑ wïyi Mɑrecɑ̀, ɑ bɑ wïyi Kibrön.
Kibrön yïe ɑ́dɑ wɑ̈dd ɑ́ngwen: Körɑ̀, Tɑpuɑ̀, Rekem, kí Cemɑ̀.
Cemɑ̀ ɑ ɑ́nywøl Rɑɑm, wïyi Yorkeɑm. Rekem bɑ ómï Cemɑ̀ ɑ løg wïyi Cɑmɑy,
ɑ bɑ wïyi Mɑon, ɑ bɑ wïyi Betdhur.
Kɑlib yïe ɑ́dɑ dhɑjø mɑ ɑ́kwɑnye, nyinge bɑ Epɑ̀, kɑ nyöddi yi ngɑnɑni ki wɑ̈dd ɑ́dɑ̈g: Arɑn, Mödhɑ̀ kí Gɑdhedh. Arɑn yïe ɑ́dɑ wɑ̈d me cwøl ɑ́ Gɑdhedh thyew.
(Jɑl megø me cwøl ɑ́ Yɑdɑy yïe ɑ́dɑ wɑ̈dd ɑ́bïkyel: Regem, Yöthɑm, Gecɑn, Pelet, Epɑ̀, kí Cɑɑp.)
Kɑlib yïe ɑ́dɑ ɑkwɑny megø me cwøl ɑ́ Mɑɑkɑ̀, mɑ ɑ́nyöddii ki wɑ̈dd ɑ́ryew: Ceber kí Tirɑnɑ̀.
Kɑ cig-ɑ nywølø ki wɑ̈dd ɑ́ryew: Cɑɑp, ɑ ɑ́cöb Mɑdmɑnɑ̀, kí Cebɑ̀ ɑ ɑ́cöb Mɑcbenɑ̀ kí kɑɑl Gibeɑ̀.
Thyew, Kɑlib yïe ɑ́dɑ nyɑre me cwøl ɑ́ Aksɑ̀.
Møg bɑ kwɑrri Kɑlib:
Ur bɑ wɑ̈d Kɑlib nyel-ɑ dwøng, o meye bɑ Eprɑtɑ̀. Cöbɑl wɑ̈d Ur bɑ en ɑ ɑ́cöb Kiriɑt Yeɑrïm.
Sɑlmɑ̀ wɑ̈de, ɑ bɑng nyeldwøng ɑ ɑ́cöb Betleem, o Arep dɑ̈ɑ̈g wɑ̈dde ɑ ɑ́cöb Betgɑder.
Cöbɑl, ɑ ɑ́cöb Kiriɑt Yeɑrïm, en ɑ bɑ kweyi tyëng Aroè, ɑ bɑ budi tyëng-ɑ bëëdø kì Menuöth,
ge bɑ kwï kɑ̈ll-ɑ bëëdø kì Kiriɑt Yeɑrïm, ɑ løg tyëng Ithrì, Puthit, Cumɑth kí Micrɑit. (Tyëng Kɑ̈ddi Dhörɑ̀ kí Ectɑol ɑ́kɑ̈ɑ̈l-ɑ ri kɑ̈llɑni).
Sɑlmɑ̀, ɑ ɑ́cöb Betleem bɑ kweyi tyëng Netöpɑ̀ mø Atröth Bet Yöɑb, kí tyëng Dhör ɑ ɑ́bëëd gɑ kɑl ɑ́kyel kì kelli kɑ̈llɑni ryeet kì Mɑnɑɑth.
(Wɑ̈thi kɑ̈ll-ɑ bɑ bödhhi gwed ɑ́bëëd ɑ kɑɑl Yɑbedh, ɑ løg gøl Tirɑs, Cimeɑth, kí Sukɑth. Ge bɑ tyëng Ken møg-ɑ ɑ́nywøm ri gen ki tyëng Rekɑb).
Møg bɑ tyëng gøl Debïd, ge bɑ wɑ̈dde møg-ɑ ɑ́nywøl kɑ̈ng-ɑ ɑ́ying gen Kibrön.
Amnön, ɑ meye bɑ Akinoɑm kì Yidhriil
Dɑniel, ɑ meye bɑ Abigɑil kì Kɑrmel,
Abcɑlöm, ɑ meye bɑ Mɑɑkɑ̀, nyɑɑr Rɑ̈dh Tɑlmɑy kì Gecur
Adöniyɑ̀, ɑ meye bɑ Agith
Cepɑtiyɑ̀, ɑ meye bɑ Abitɑl
Ithreɑm, ɑ meye bɑ Eglɑ̀.
Debïd ɑ́jyɑ̈ɑ̈g ɑ́ Rɑ̈dh kì Yerusɑlem ki runn pyɑ̈r ɑ́dɑ̈g wïdɑ́dɑ̈g,
wɑ̈dde møg-ɑ ngenyø ɑ́nywøl-ɑ kunɑni.
Debïd ɑ́nyöddi yi cyëge, Bɑtcebɑ̀ nyɑɑr Amiel, ki wɑ̈dd ɑ́ngwen, ɑ løg. Cimeɑ̀, Cöbɑb, Nɑthɑn, kí Sølømøn.
Debïd yïe ɑ́dɑ wɑ̈dd møøgø gɑ ɑ́bïngwen, ɑ løg: Ibɑɑr, Elicuɑ̀, Elpelet,
Nögɑ̀, Nepeg, Yɑpiyɑ̀,
Elicɑmɑ̀, Eliɑdɑ̀, kí Elipelet.
Debïd yïe ɑ́dɑ wɑ̈dd mɑ ɑ́nyöllii yi ɑkwɑnyye. Yïe ɑ́dɑ nyɑre thyew me cwøl ɑ́ Tɑmɑr.
Men bɑ gøl Sølømøn, e myer ɑ́ dhɑnhø kí wɑ̈de: Sølømøn, Reöboɑm, Abiyɑ̀, Asɑ̀, Yöcɑpɑt,
Yeörɑm, Akɑdhiyɑ̀, Yöɑc,
Amɑdhiyɑ̀, Udhiyɑ̀, Yöthɑm,
Akɑɑdh, Kedhekiyɑ̀, Mɑnɑsè.
Amön kí Yöciyɑ̀.
Yöciyɑ̀ yïe ɑ́dɑ wɑ̈dd ɑ́ngwen: Yöɑnɑn, Yöyɑkim, Dhedekiyɑ̀, kí Yöɑkɑdh.
Yöyɑkim yïe ɑ́dɑ wɑ̈dd ɑ́ryew: Yöyɑkin kí Dhedekiyɑ̀.
Møg bɑ kwɑrri Rɑ̈dh Yöyɑkin, ɑ ɑ́kɑ̈l ɑ́ ɑmɑg yi tyëng Bɑbïl. Yöyɑkin yïe ɑ́dɑ wɑ̈dd ɑ́bïryew: Ceɑltiel,
Mɑlkirɑm, Pedɑiyɑ̀, Cenɑdhɑr, Yekɑmiyɑ̀, Öcɑmɑ̀, kí Nedɑbiyɑ̀,
Pedɑiyɑ̀ yïe ɑ́dɑ wɑ̈dd ɑ́ryew: Dherubɑbïl, kí Cimeì. Dherubɑbïl bɑ wïyi yɑɑg ɑ́ryew: Meculɑm kí Anɑniyɑ̀ kí nyɑre ɑ́kyel me cwøl ɑ́ Celömith.
Dherubɑbïl yïe ɑ́dɑ wɑ̈dd ɑ́bïj møøgø: Acubɑ̀, Oel, Berekiyɑ̀, Aɑsɑdiyɑ̀, kí Yucɑb Ësed.
Anɑniyɑ̀ yïe ɑ́dɑ wɑ̈dd ɑ́ryew: Pelɑtiyɑ̀, kí Yecɑiyɑ̀. Yecɑiyɑ̀ bɑ wïyi Repɑiyɑ̀, ɑ bɑ wïyi Arnɑn, wïyi Obɑdiyɑ̀ wïyi Cekɑniyɑ̀.
Cekɑniyɑ̀ yïe ɑ́dɑ wɑ̈d ɑ́kyel: Cemɑiyɑ̀, kí kwɑrre ɑ́bïj: Atuc, Igɑl, Bɑriyɑ̀, Neɑriyɑ̀, kí Cɑpɑt.
Neɑriyɑ̀ yïe ɑ́dɑ wɑ̈dd ɑ́dɑ̈g: Eliönɑy, Kedhekiyɑ̀ kí Adhrikɑm.
Eliönɑy yïe ɑ́dɑ wɑ̈dd ɑ́bïryew: Ödɑbiyɑ̀, Eliɑcïb, Pelɑiyɑ̀, Akkub, Yöɑnɑn, Delɑiyɑ̀, kí Anɑnì.
Møg bɑ kwï kwɑrri Yeudɑ̀: Peredh, Ëdhrön, Kɑrmì, Ur, kí Cöbɑl.
Cöbɑl bɑ wïyi Reɑiyɑ̀; en ɑ bɑ wïyi Yɑɑth, wïyi Akumɑy geki Lɑɑd; gen ɑ bɑ kweyyi tyëng-ɑ bëëdø kì Dhörɑ̀.

Ur bɑ wɑ̈d Kɑlib nyel-ɑ dwøng, wɑ̈d cyëge Eprɑtɑ̀, o bene kwɑrre ɑ ɑ́cöb Betleem kɑɑldwøng. Ur yïe ɑ́dɑ wɑ̈dd ɑ́dɑ̈g: Etɑm, Penuel, kí Edher. Etɑm yïe ɑ́dɑ wɑ̈dd ɑ́dɑ̈g thyew: Yidhriil, Icmɑ̀, kí Idbɑc, kí nyɑre me cwøl ɑ́ Adhelelpönì. Penuel en ɑ ɑ́cöb Gedör, o Edher ɑ ɑ́cöb Ucɑ̀.
Ackur, ɑ ɑ́cöb kɑɑl Tekoɑ̀, yïe ɑ́dɑ mɑ̈nn ɑ́ryew: Kelɑ̀, kí Nɑɑrɑ̀.
Ackur geki Nɑɑrɑ̀ yï gen ɑ́dɑ wɑ̈dd ɑ́ngwen: Akudhɑm, Ëper, Temenì, ki Akɑctɑrì,
O Ackur geki Kelɑ̀ yï gen ɑ́dɑ wɑ̈dd ɑ́dɑ̈g: Dhereth, Idhɑr, kí Ethnɑn.
Ködh bɑ wïyi Anub kí Dhöbebɑ̀, gølɑni ɑ ree kɑ̈ɑ̈l yi Aɑrel wɑ̈d Aɑrum.
Ádɑ jɑl me cwøl ɑ́ Yɑbedh, mɑ ɑ́bëëd e ceg kɑ wørø ki mendwøng yi tyëng gøl gen. Ácɑg-ɑ yi meye ɑ́ Yɑbedh, nyingɑni kɑ̈ɑ̈l-ɑ ri bɑng kɑ ɑ́bëëd pɑ̈dhe piny teeg.
De Yɑbedh Jwøøg Isrɑil ɑ́kwɑjje kinni, “Gyëdh yɑn, yïn ɑ Jwøk, kɑ yɑ nëngí ki piny me lɑɑj. Korrí yɑn ki gïgrijjø møg-ɑ nyi kɑ̈ni ki orɑng.” Kɑ gïg-ɑ ɑ́kwɑjje mëggii yi Jwøk.
Kɑlib ómï Cuɑ̀, yïe ɑ́dɑ wɑ̈d me cwøl ɑ́ Meir, Meir ɑ bɑ wïyi Ectön,
Ectön yïe ɑ́dɑ wɑ̈dd ɑ́dɑ̈g: Betrɑpɑ̀, Pɑseɑ̀ kí Teinɑ̀. Teinɑ̀ ɑ ɑ́cöb Nɑkɑc. Kwɑrri jiɑni ɑ́bëëd ɑ Rekɑ̀.
Kenɑdh yïe dɑ wɑ̈dd ɑ́ryew: Othniel kí Serɑiyɑ̀. Othniel thyew yïe ɑ́dɑ wɑ̈dd ɑ́ryew: Athɑth kí Meonöthɑy.
Meonöthɑy ɑ bɑ wïyi Óprɑ̀.
Serɑiyɑ̀ bɑ wïyi Yöɑb, ɑ ɑ́cöb Töör Bödhhì, kun-ɑ di bödhhi gïg nyi gøggi kí møg-ɑ thɑ̈dhhi bënn.
Kɑlib wɑ̈d Yepunɑ̀ yïe ɑ́dɑ wɑ̈dd ɑ́dɑ̈g: Iru, Elɑ̀ kí Nɑɑm. Elɑ̀ ɑ bɑ wïyi Kenɑdh.
Yeɑlelel yïe ɑ́dɑ wɑ̈dd ɑ́ngwen: Dhïp, Dhïpɑ̀, Tiriyɑ̀, kí Asɑrel.

Edhrɑ̀ yïe ɑ́dɑ wɑ̈dd ɑ́ngwen: Yether, Mered, Eper, kí Yɑlön. Mered ɑ́nywøm-ɑ Bithiyɑ̀, nyɑɑr rɑ̈ɑ̈dh Rïp, o yï gen ɑ́dɑ nyɑɑr gen, me cwøl ɑ́ Miryɑm, kí wɑ̈dd ɑ́ryew: Cɑmɑy, kí Icbɑ̀. Icbɑ̀ ɑ ɑ́cöb Ictemoɑ̀. Mered ɑ́nyömi thyew ki dhɑjø kì gøl Yeudɑ̀, o yïe ɑ́dɑ wɑ̈dd ɑ́dɑ̈g: Yered, ɑ ɑ́cöb Gedör; kí Keber ɑ ɑ́cöb Sökö; kí Yekuthiel ɑ ɑ́cöb Dhɑnoɑ̀.
Ödiyɑ̀ ɑ́nywøm-ɑ nyimï Nɑɑm. Kwɑrri gen ɑ bɑ gøl Gɑrm, ɑ ɑ́bëëd kì Keilɑ̀, kí gøl Mɑɑkɑth ɑ ɑ́bëëd kì Ectemoɑ̀.
Cimön yïe ɑ́dɑ wɑ̈dd ɑ́ngwen: Amnön, Rinɑ̀, Benɑnɑn kí Tïlön.
Icì yïe ɑ́dɑ wɑ̈dd ɑ́ryew: Dhöketh kí Bendhöketh.
Celɑ̀ bɑ ɑ́kyel kì kelli wɑ̈ddi Yeudɑ̀, kwɑrre bɑ Er ɑ ɑ́cöb Lekɑ̀, kí Lɑɑdɑ̀ ɑ ɑ́cöb Mɑrecɑ̀; kwɑrre ɑ bɑ bödhhi cwɑ̈j ki ógudhi kor-ɑ yöm, o ge ɑ́bëëd ɑ kɑɑl Bet Acbeɑ̀.
Yökim kí ji-ɑ ɑ́bëëd kì kɑɑl Ködhebɑ̀, kí Yöɑc geki Sɑrɑp ɑ́nyömi ki nyɑɑr Moɑb, ge ɑ́pëggi Betleem. (Menɑni bɑ kwöng me kɑ̈ge dööng.)
Ge ɑ́bëëd gɑ bödhhi lɑ̈b møg-ɑ nyi cwɑ̈jji rɑ̈dh, o ge ɑ́bëëd ɑ kɑ̈ddi Netɑim kí Gederɑ̀.
Cimeøn yïe ɑ́dɑ wɑ̈dd ɑ́bïj: Nemuel, Yɑmïn, Yɑrïb, Dherɑ̀, kí Cɑul.
Wɑ̈d Cɑul bɑ Cɑlum, kwɑre bɑ Mibsɑm, o wɑ̈d kwɑre bɑ Micmɑ̀.
Kì bɑng møgɑni gøl Micmɑ̀ kɑ̈ɑ̈l-ɑ ri wɑ̈dde. Amuel, Dhɑkur kí Cimeì.
Cimeì yïe ɑ́dɑ wɑ̈dd pyɑ̈rø wïdɑ́bïkyel, kí nyige womɑ̈nn ɑ́bïkyel. De tyëng gøl gen yï gen bong nywøl mø ngenyø, o gøl Cimeøn nuti døngø ni gøl Yeudɑ̀.
Bilɑ̀, Edhem, Tölɑd.
Bethuel, Órmɑ̀, Dhiklɑg,
Bet Mɑrkɑböt, Adhɑr Susïm, Bet Birì, kí Cɑɑrɑim.
Ge ɑ́bëëd thyew kì yethi kɑ̈dd ɑ́bïj møøgø: Etɑm, Ain, Rimön, Töcen, kí Acɑn.
Kí myërr-ɑ cyɑ̈gi kì buti gen gïti kɑɑl Bɑɑlɑth. Møgɑk bene møg-ɑ ɑ́gweed piny kipe mïdhi lwömi kɑ̈lli gen kí kɑ̈jj-ɑ́ yethi gïn ɑ́bëëd yi gen.
Jøg bene gen ɑ bɑ jyɑ̈ggi wɑ̈thi kɑ̈lli gen:
Mecöbɑb, Yɑmlek, Yöcɑ̀ wɑ̈d Amɑdhiyɑ̀. Yöiil,
Yeeu (wɑ̈d Yöcibiyɑ̀ wɑ̈d Serɑiyɑ̀, wɑ̈d Asiel),
Eliönɑy, Yɑɑköbɑ̀, Yecöɑiyɑ̀, Asɑiyɑ̀, Adiel, Yesimiel, Benɑiyɑ̀.
Dhidhɑ̀, (wɑ̈d Cipì, wɑ̈d Alön, ɑ bɑ wɑ̈d Yedɑiyɑ̀, wɑ̈d Cimrì, wɑ̈d Cemɑiyɑ̀).
Kì bɑng kɑ ɑ́kedh kɑ̈lli gen ge ódøngø,
ɑtɑɑy gen kuni wɑɑng cyɑ̈ɑ̈ng böörø kɑ ge ócyɑ̈ngø ki Gerɑr, kɑ dyëgi gen kwɑɑy gen yij töör-ɑ tøge ógeer kɑɑlɑni kì kuni wɑɑng cyɑ̈ɑ̈ng mwøl.
Ge ɑ́yïddi ki piny me lɑ̈be med, o lɑɑj. Kì yij pödhø me bëëdø ki mër. Bɑ kwɑrri Kɑm ɑ ɑ́kwöngi ki bëëdø kì pinyɑni.

Kì bøli keny-ɑ ɑ́jyɑ̈ɑ̈g Kedhekiyɑ̀, kɑ̈ll-ɑ nyingi gen bɑ ɑgwed ɑ́kedhi Gerɑr, kɑ kemmì geki uddi tyëng-ɑ bëëdø kì pinyɑni rënyi yi gen. Kɑ ji cyeed gen wɑ̈g kì yije, codhe ɑpëggi gen kenyɑni, mɑ́ yije ɑ́dɑ lum me gïïr me cɑm yi dyëgi gen.
Ji miy ɑ́bïj møøgø kì gøl Cimeøn ɑ́kedhi wɑɑng cyɑ̈ɑ̈ng mwøl kì Edöm. Ge ɑ́pej-ɑ yi wɑ̈ddi Icì: Pelɑtiyɑ̀, Neɑriyɑ̀, Repɑiyɑ̀ kí Udhiel.
Kɑ tyëng Amɑlek møg-ɑ ɑ́ying pinyɑni nɑ̈g yi gen, kɑ ge obëëdø kì kenyɑni gïti dicyɑ̈ngtïn.
cɑgg ɑ́ kɑ ɑ́kedhi nyingi Yeudɑ̀ mɑl kì bɑng kɑ ɑ́ying lɑwø gøle, bɑ Yosep ɑ ɑ́cungi ceth ɑ́ wïj kɑl),
Ruben, wɑ̈d Yɑgob, nyel-ɑ kɑyø, yïe ɑ́dɑ wɑ̈dd ɑ́ngwen: Aɑnök, Pɑlu, Ëdhrön kí Kɑrmì.
Pëjji gøl Ruben møg ógwedø kì yij wɑ̈nyi lwøbi kɑl bɑ: Yeiel, Dhekɑriyɑ̀,
kí Belɑ̀ wɑ̈d Adhɑdh, wɑ̈d Cemɑ̀, wɑ̈d Yöiil. Gølɑni ɑ́bëëd ɑ Aröeer kí Nebö kí Bɑɑl Meon kì wɑɑng wuudø.
Yï gen ɑ́dɑ dhög mø gïïr kì piny Gilyɑd, kɑ pinyɑni kwɑny yi gen gïti yij ryɑng kì wɑɑng cyɑ̈ɑ̈ng mwøl, e ködd-ɑ kömi Nɑm Porɑt.
Keny-ɑ ɑ́bëëd ɑ́ Cɑul ɑ jyɑ̈gø, gøl Ruben ɑ́pɑ̈ɑ̈r kömi Ägerïm kɑ gï nɑ̈g gen, ɑkwɑny gen piny gen, eni piny-ɑ buti Gilyɑd kì wɑɑng cyɑ̈ɑ̈ng mwøl.
Gøl Gɑd ɑ́bëëd ɑ buti piny gøl Ruben kì wɑɑng wuudø, kì piny Bɑcɑn, e wɑ̈dh-ɑ Sɑlekɑ̀ kì wɑɑng cyɑ̈ɑ̈ng mwøl.
Kì piny Bɑcɑn, Yöiil ɑ ɑ́bëëd ɑ́ jɑngi kɑl, o Cɑpɑm bɑ jɑngi kɑl megø, o Yɑnɑy bɑ jɑngi wïj gøl-ɑ kyeelø.
Kɑ̈llì ɑ́bïryew møg, bɑ kwï wïj gølɑni, ɑ løg gøl: Mikɑil, Meculɑm, Cebɑ̀, Yörɑy, Yɑkɑn, Dhiyɑ̀, kí Eber.
Ge bɑ kwɑrri Abikɑil wɑ̈d Urì, kweyi gen døøg-ɑ cyɑ̈n ri ji møg: Abikɑil, Urì, Yɑroɑ̀, Gilyɑd, Mikɑil, Yecicɑy, Yɑɑdö kí Budh.
Akì wɑ̈d Abdiel, wɑ̈d Gunì, en ɑ ɑ́bëëd ɑ́ jɑng-ɑ jɑɑg kɑ̈llɑni bënn.
Ge ɑ́bëëd ɑ myërri Bɑcɑn geki Gilyɑd kí kɑ̈ddi gen, kí cɑ̈mmi dhög bëne kì piny Cɑrön.
Lwöbø menɑni ɑ́gwed-ɑ ri Rɑ̈dh Yöthɑm, rɑ̈ɑ̈dh Yeudiyɑ̀ geki Rɑ̈dh Yeroboɑm wɑ̈d Yöɑc, rɑ̈ɑ̈dh Isrɑil.
Gøl Ruben, kí gøl Gɑd, kí gøl Mɑnɑsè kì wɑɑng cyɑ̈ɑ̈ng mwøl, yï gen ɑ́dɑ jøliny ɑ́lïp pyɑ̈r ɑ́ngwen wïdɑ́ngwen, kí miy ɑ́bïryew kí pyɑ̈r ɑ́bïkyel, mø ngɑ̈ny nyɑɑg ki liny ködd, kí pil, kí wethh.
Ge ɑ́nyïɑ̈ggi ki Kwɑrri Äjer ɑ løg tyëng Yetur, kí tyëng Nɑpic, kí tyëng Nödɑb.
Ägerïm geki jurr-ɑ ɑ́køny gen ɑ́tyɑm yi gen, mɑ́ ge ɑ́gɑ̈nn-ɑ Jwøk kɑ gø kwɑjji gen kipe kønyø.
Jɑmmi jurrɑni ɑ́kɑb: ɑmɑl ɑ́lïp pyɑ̈r ɑ́bïj; kí dyëg ɑ́lïp miy ɑ́ryew kí pyɑ̈r ɑ́bïj; kí ɑderr ɑ́lïp ɑ́ryew; kɑ ge ómɑ̈gø ki ji ɑ́lïp miyø.
Ge ɑ́nɑ̈ɑ̈g ki ji mø gïïr kì kelli jølinyɑni. Kɑ ge pëgg-ɑ be bëëdø kì pinyɑni gïti kɑ ɑ́køøl gen yïnø.
Tyëng gøl Mɑnɑsè kì wɑɑng cyɑ̈ɑ̈ng mwøl ɑ́bëëd ɑ piny Bɑcɑn e ködd-ɑ wɑɑng wuudø gïti Bɑɑl Kermön, kí Senïr, kí Kïti Kermön, kɑ kwɑnni gen óngënyø ki mendwøng.
Møg bene jɑggi wɑ̈thi kɑ̈lli gen: Eper, Icì, Eliel, Adhriel, Jermɑyɑ̀, Ödɑbiyɑ̀, kí Yɑdiel. Jøgɑni ɑ́bëëd gɑ jɑgg mø teg, o ge wør yi kɑ̈lli gen.
De tyëngɑni Jwøøg kweyyi gen ɑ́wiy yi gen, kì bɑng kɑ̀ bëëde e bong yïëyø, kɑ ge døøg-ɑ be kwɑjji jwöggi jurr-ɑ ɑ́cyeddi yi Jwøk kì pinyɑni.

Codhe, ɑrënyi pyëw Jwøk, kɑ Pul rɑ̈nhdwøøng Acuur, ɑ cwøl ɑ́ Tiglɑth Pileser wiye o tyëng gøl Ruben, kí Gɑd, kí budi gøl Mɑnɑsè cyeede wɑ̈g kì pödhe, kɑ gï kïdhe Alɑ̀, kí Abör, kí Arɑ̀, geki myërr-ɑ kömi Nɑm Gödhɑn, kunɑni ɑ bëëd yi gen gïti dicyɑ̈ngtïn.
Leebì yïe ɑ́dɑ wɑ̈dd ɑ́dɑ̈g: Gercön, Kɑ̈ɑ̈th kí Merɑrì.
Kɑ̈ɑ̈th yïe ɑ́dɑ wɑ̈dd ɑ́ngwen: Amrɑm, Idhɑr, Kibrön kí Udhiel.
Amrɑm yïe ɑ́dɑ wɑ̈dd ɑ́ryew: Aɑron, kí Mosɑ̀, kí nyɑre ɑ́kyel, Miryɑm.
Aɑron yïe ɑ́dɑ wɑ̈dd ɑ́ngwen: Nɑdɑb, Abiu, Eliɑdhɑr, kí Ithɑmɑr.
Møg bɑ kwɑrri Eliɑdhɑr cɑ̈gi kì ri rïny kí rïny: Pineɑs, Abicuɑ̀,
Bukì, Udhì,
Dherɑiyɑ̀, Merɑyöth,
Amɑriyɑ̀, Akitub,
Dhɑdök, Akimɑɑdh,
Adhɑriyɑ̀, Yöɑnɑn
Adhɑriyɑ̀, (ɑ ɑ́göög kì Keng-ɑ ɑ́ger yi Sølømøn kì Yerusɑlem).
Amɑriyɑ̀, Akitub,
Dhɑdök, Cɑlum,
Kilkiyɑ̀, Adhɑriyɑ̀,
Serɑiyɑ̀, Yödhɑdɑk.
Rɑ̈dh Nebukɑdnesɑr, Yödhɑdɑk ɑ́køøle geki kwï ji-ɑ ɑ́kïdhi yïnø yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kì Yeudiyɑ̀ kí Yerusɑlem.
Yï gen ɑ́dɑ wɑ̈dd: Gercön bɑ wïyi Libnì kí Cimeì.
Kɑ̈ɑ̈th bɑ wïyi Amrɑm, Idhɑr, Kibrön, kí Udhiel.
O Merɑrì bɑ wïyi Mɑklì kí Mucì.
Møg bɑ kwɑrri Gercön, cɑ̈gi kì ri rïny gïti rïny: Libnì, Yɑɑth kí Dhimɑ̀,
Yöɑ̀, Idö, Dherɑ̀, kí Yeɑtherɑy.
Møg bɑ kwɑrri Kɑ̈ɑ̈th, cɑ̈gi kì ri rïny gïti rïny: Aminɑdɑb, Körɑ̀, Asïïr,
Elkɑnɑ̀, Abiyɑsɑp, Asïïr,
Tɑɑth, Uriel, Udhiyɑ̀, Cɑul.
Elkɑnɑ̀ yïe ɑ́dɑ wɑ̈dd ɑ́ryew: Amɑsɑy kí Akimöth.
Møg bɑ kwɑrri Akimöth, cɑ̈gi kì ri rïny gïti rïny: Elkɑnɑ̀, Dhöpɑy, Nɑɑ̈th,
Eliɑb, Yeroɑm kí Elkɑnɑ̀.
Sɑmwel yïe ɑ́dɑ wɑ̈dd ɑ́ryew: Yöiil nyel-ɑ dwøng, kí Abiyɑ̀ ɑ thinh.
Møg bɑ kwɑrri Merɑrì cɑ̈gi kì ri rïny gïti rïny: Mɑklì, Libnì, Cimeì, Udhɑ̀,
Cimeɑ̀, Agiyɑ̀ kí Asɑiyɑ̀.
Keny-ɑ ɑ́rum Sɑnduug Cigg ki kïdhi Yerusɑlem, ɑkɑ̈bbi Rɑ̈dh Debïd ki bödhhi thømi kej mɑ̈ddø.
Ge nyi göögø ge luny-ɑ gwøg kì Kemi Kwër, kɑ̈ng-ɑ ɑ́bëëd Kengø nuti gerø yi Sølømøn.
Tyëng-ɑ ɑ́jɑɑg jøgɑni bɑ:
Kì gøl Kɑ̈ɑ̈th: Ëmɑn wɑ̈d Yöiil, wɑ̈d Sɑmwel, ɑ bɑ pënyi ɑkun-ɑ mɑl. Gøl gen kɑ̀ lwøbii e wɑ̈dh-ɑ ri Yɑgob èn: Ëmɑn, Yöiil, Sɑmwel,
Elkɑnɑ̀, Yeroɑm, Eliel, Toɑ̀,
Dhup, Elkɑnɑ̀, Mɑɑ̈th, Amɑsɑy,
Elkɑnɑ̀, Yöiil, Adhɑriyɑ̀, Dhepɑniyɑ̀,
Tɑɑth, Asïïr, Abiyɑsɑp, Körɑ̀,
Idhɑr, Kɑ̈ɑ̈th, Leebì, kí Yɑgob.
Asɑp ɑ ɑ́bëëd ɑ́ ryeew pëjji jøwör. Gøl gen kɑ̀ lwøbii e wɑ̈dh-ɑ ri Leebì èn: Asɑp, Berekiyɑ̀, Cimeɑ̀,
Mikɑil, Bɑɑseiyɑ̀, Mɑlkiyɑ̀,
Ethnì, Dherɑ̀, Adɑiyɑ̀,
Ethɑn, Dhimɑ̀, Cimeì,
Yɑɑth, Gercön kí Leebì.
Ethɑn kɑ̈ɑ̈l-ɑ ri gøl Merɑrì, en ɑ ɑ́bëëd ɑ́ dɑ̈ɑ̈g pëjji jøwör. Gøl gen kɑ̀ lwøbii e wɑ̈dh-ɑ ri Leebì èn: Ethɑn, Kïcì, Abdì, Mɑluk,
Acɑbiyɑ̀, Amɑdhiyɑ̀, Kilkiyɑ̀,
Amdhì, Bɑnì, Cemer,
Mɑklì, Mucì, Merɑrì, kí Leebì.
Kwɑrri Leebì møg-ɑ kyeelø bënn ɑ́nëngi ki gwøg kì kej mɑ̈ddø.

Gøl Aɑron ɑ nyi muuj gëdhhi bɑkur kí gëdhh-ɑ nyi rɑ̈b kì wïj këli lɑm. Gen ɑ mïdhi gëdhh-ɑ nyi muuj kì Kej Kwërdwøng, kí gëdhh-ɑ nyi muuj gɑ møg gøøm bøli tyëng Isrɑil. Møgɑni nyi gwøg yi gen ceth ge ködd-ɑ kömi cigg-ɑ ɑ́muuj yi Mosɑ̀, bɑ̈ng Jwøk.
Møg bɑ jø gøl Aɑron gɑ ɑlwøb: Eliɑdhɑr, Pineɑs, Abicuɑ̀,
Bukì, Udhì, Dhekɑriyɑ̀,
Merɑyöth, Amɑriyɑ̀, Akitub,
Dhɑdök, Akimɑɑdh.
Men bɑ piny-ɑ ɑ́mëggi gøl Aɑron, møg-ɑ kɑ̈ɑ̈l ri Kɑ̈ɑ̈th. Gen ɑ ɑ́kwøng ki nëngø ki piny, kì gøl Leebì.
Pinyɑni reb-ɑ Kibrön kì yij piny Yeudiyɑ̀, kí cɑ̈mmi dhög men-ɑ bɑdhhe.
Kɑlib wɑ̈d Yepunɑ̀ ɑ́mëggi pwödh geki myërr-ɑ bɑdhhi kɑɑlɑni.
Kɑ̈dd-ɑ ɑ́mëggi kwɑrri Aɑron ek: Kibrön, ɑ bɑ ɑ́kyel kì kelli kɑ̈ddi yömmø, kí Yɑtir, kí myërri Libnɑ̀, kí Ectemoɑ̀, kí Kilen, kí Debir, kí Acɑn, kí Bet Cemec kí cɑ̈mmi dhög men-ɑ bödhhi gen.
Gøl Ben Yɑmïn ɑ́mëgg-ɑ kɑ̈dd møg kí cɑ̈mmi dhög møg-ɑ bɑdhhi gen: Gebɑ̀, Alemeth, kí Anɑthöth. Kɑ̈ddɑni bënn bɑ pyɑ̈rø wïdɑ́dɑ̈g, gɑ møg bëëd yi kɑ̈lli gen bënn.
Kɑ̈dd pyɑ̈rø kì myërri Mɑnɑsè, kì kuni wɑɑng cyɑ̈ɑ̈ng mwøl, ɑ ɑ́mëggi gøl Kɑ̈ɑ̈th, e leng kɑ wél.
Gøl Gercön, ɑ́mëgg-ɑ kɑ̈dd pyɑ̈rø wïdɑ́dɑ̈g, ge leng kɑ wél, kì piny Isɑkɑr, kí Aceer, kí Nɑptɑlì, kí ri piny gøl Mɑnɑsè kì myërri Bɑcɑn kì wɑɑng cyɑ̈ɑ̈ng mwøl.
Gøl Merɑrì, ɑ́mëgg-ɑ kɑ̈dd pyɑ̈rø wïdɑ́ryew kì piny gøl Ruben, kí Gɑd, kí Dhebulun.
Bene kër-ɑ ɑ́nëngi Kwɑrri Leebì yi tyëng Isrɑil ki piny men bëëd yi gen ɑnɑn. Reb ki cɑ̈mmi dhög møg-ɑ bɑdhhi kɑ̈ddɑni.
(Kɑ̈dd-ɑ ɑ́muuj kì piny gøl Yeudɑ̀, kí gøl Cimeøn, kí gøl Ben Yɑmïn, ge ɑ́leng kɑ wél thyew).
Kwï gøl Kɑ̈ɑ̈th ɑ́nëng ɑ ri piny gøl Eprɑim ki kɑ̈dd geki cɑ̈mmi dhög men-ɑ bɑdhhi gen, ɑ løg:
Cekïm, ɑ bɑ ɑ́kyel kì kelli kɑ̈ddi yömmø, kì myërri kïtti Eprɑim, kí Gedher,
Yokmeɑm kí cɑ̈mmi dhöge, Bet Örøn kí cɑ̈mmi dhöge,
Ayɑlön kí cɑ̈mmi dhöge, Gɑth Rimön kí cɑ̈mmi dhöge.
Kì piny Mɑnɑsè kì wɑɑng cyɑ̈ɑ̈ng böörø ge ɑ́mëgg-ɑ kɑ̈ddi Aner, kí Bileɑm, kí cɑ̈mmi dhög møg-ɑ bɑdhhi gen.
Gøl Gercön ɑ́mëgg-ɑ kɑ̈dd møg, kí cɑ̈mmi dhög møg-ɑ bɑdhhi gen:
Kì piny Mɑnɑsè kì wɑɑng cyɑ̈ɑ̈ng mwøl: Gölɑn kí Bɑcɑn, kí Actɑröth.
Kì piny Isɑkɑr: Kedec, kí Dɑberɑth,
Rɑmöth, kí Anem.
Kì piny Aceer: Mɑcɑl, Abdön,
Ukök, kí Reköb.
Kì piny Nɑptɑlì: Kedec kì Gɑlelì, Amön, kí Kiriɑtɑim.
Tyëng-ɑ ɑ́döng kì gøl Merɑrì ge ɑ́mëgg-ɑ kɑ̈dd møg geki cɑ̈mmi dhög møg-ɑ bɑdhhi gen:
Kì piny gøl Dhebulun: Rimönö kí Tɑbör.
Kì piny gøl Ruben kì løøg Nɑm Urdun kì wɑɑng cyɑ̈ɑ̈ng mwøl kì ngɑ̈ɑ̈j Yerikö, ge ɑ́mëgg-ɑ Bedher kì wïj kwøømø, kí Yɑɑdhɑ̀,
kí Kedemöth kí Mepɑɑth.
Kì piny gøl Gɑd: Rɑmöth kì Gilyɑd, kí Mɑɑ̈nɑim,
kí Kicbön kí Yɑdher.
Isɑkɑr yïe ɑ́dɑ wɑ̈dd ɑ́ngwen: Tölɑ̀, Puɑ̀, Yɑcub, kí Cimrön.

Tölɑ̀ yïe ɑ́dɑ wɑ̈dd ɑ́bïkyel: Udhì, Repɑiyɑ̀, Yeriel, Yɑmɑy, Ibsɑm, kí Cemuel. Ge ɑ́bëëd gɑ jyɑ̈ggi wɑ̈thi kɑ̈lli gøl Tölɑ̀ møg-ɑ ngɑ̈nyi gɑ jøliny. Kwɑnni kwɑrri gen ɑ́wɑ̈dhi ri ɑ́lïp pyɑ̈r ɑ́ryew wïdɑ́ryew kí miy ɑ́bïkyel, e Debïd bɑ Rɑ̈dh.
Udhì yïe ɑ́dɑ wɑ̈de ɑ́kyel: Idhrɑiyɑ̀. O Idhrɑiyɑ̀ yïe ɑ́dɑ wɑ̈dd ɑ́ngwen: Mikɑil, kí Obɑdiyɑ̀, kí Yöiil, kí Iciyɑ̀. O ge ɑ́bëëd gɑ jɑggi wɑ̈thi kɑ̈lli gen.
Yï gen ɑ́dɑ mɑ̈nn mø gïïr, kí nywøl mø gïïr, kwɑnni jøg-ɑ cwøw møg-ɑ ɑ́göög gɑ jøliny, wɑ̈dh-ɑ ri ɑ́lïp pyɑ̈r ɑ́dɑ̈g wïdɑ́bïkyel.
Kwɑnni jøliny møg-ɑ bɑ ɑgwedd kì gøl Isɑkɑr bɑ ɑ́lïp pyɑ̈r ɑ́bïdɑ̈g wïdɑ́bïryew.
Ben Yɑmïn yïe ɑ́dɑ wɑ̈dd ɑ́dɑ̈g: Belɑ̀, Becer kí Yediyɑil.

Belɑ̀ yïe ɑ́dɑ wɑ̈dd ɑ́bïj: Edhbön, Udhì, Udhiel, Yerimöth kí Irì. Ge bɑ jyɑ̈ggi wɑ̈thi kɑ̈lli gen, o ge bɑ jøliny mø teg. Kwɑnni kwɑrri gen ɑ́wɑ̈dhi ri ɑ́lïp pyɑ̈r ɑ́ryew wïdɑ́ryew kí pyɑ̈r ɑ́dɑ̈g wïdɑ́ngwen.
Becer yïe ɑ́dɑ wɑ̈dd ɑ́bïngwen: Dhemirɑ̀, Yöɑc, Eliedher, Eliönɑy, Omrì, Yeremöth, Abiyɑ̀, Anɑthöth, kí Alemeth.
Kwɑnni jø kɑ̈llɑni møg-ɑ bɑ ɑgwed gɑ jøliny bɑ ɑ́lïp pyɑ̈r ɑ́ryew kí miy ɑ́ryew.
Yediyɑil yïe ɑ́dɑ wɑ̈d ɑ́kyel: Bilɑɑn. Bilɑɑn yïe ɑ́dɑ wɑ̈dd ɑ́bïryew: Yeuc, Ben Yɑmïn, Eud, Kenɑɑnɑ̀, Dhethɑn, Tɑrcic, kí Akicɑ̈ɑ̈r.
Ge ɑ́bëëd gɑ jɑggi wɑ̈thi kɑ̈lli gen. Kwɑnni kwɑrri gen møg-ɑ bɑ ɑgwed gɑ jøliny bɑ ɑ́lïp pyɑ̈rø wïdɑ́bïryew kí miy ɑ́ryew.
Cupïm kí Upïm kɑ̈ɑ̈l-ɑ ri gølɑni thyew.
Dɑn yïe ɑ́dɑ wɑ̈d ɑ́kyel me cwøl ɑ́ Upïm.
Nɑptɑlì yïe ɑ́dɑ wɑ̈dd ɑ́ngwen: Yɑdhiel, Gunì, Yedher kí Cɑlum. (Ge bɑ kwɑrri Bilɑ̀)
Mɑnɑsè yïe ɑ́dɑ wɑ̈dd ɑ́ryew: Asriel, kí Mɑkir, ge ɑ́nywøl-ɑ yi ɑkwɑnye, ngeti Arɑm. Mɑkir ɑ bɑ wïyi Gilyɑd.
Upïm geki Cupïm ɑ́nyömi yi Mɑkir. Nyimen nyinge bɑ Mɑɑkɑ̀. Dhelopekɑd wɑ̈d Mɑkir ɑ́nywøl-ɑ womɑ̈nn keti gen.
Perec geki Cerec bɑ wɑ̈ddi Mɑkir møg-ɑ ɑ́nyöllii yi cyëge Mɑɑkɑ̀. Perec yïe ɑ́dɑ wɑ̈dd ɑ́ryew: Ulɑm kí Rɑkem.
Ulɑm yïe ɑ́dɑ wɑ̈d me cwøl ɑ́ Bedɑn. Møg bënn, bɑ kwɑrri Gilyɑd, wɑ̈d Mɑkir wɑ̈d Mɑnɑsè:
Amöleceth nyimï Gilyɑd yïe ɑ́dɑ wɑ̈dd ɑ́dɑ̈g: Icöd, Abiedher kí Mɑklɑ̀.
(Cemïdɑ̀ yïe ɑ́dɑ wɑ̈dd ɑ́ngwen: Akiyɑn, Cekem, Lïkì kí Aniyɑm.)
Møg bɑ kwɑrri Eprɑim cɑg kì ri rïny gïti rïny: Cuthelɑ̀, Bered, Tɑɑth, Eleɑdɑ̀, Tɑɑth,
Dhɑbɑd, Cuthelɑ̀. Eprɑim yïe ɑ́dɑ wɑ̈dd ɑ́ryew: Edher kí Eleɑd. Ge ɑ́nɑ̈g keny-ɑ ɑ́kedhi gen be kwɑli dhögi tyëng Gɑth.
Kɑ ge ywøg yi Eprɑim wïyi gen ki cyɑ̈ng mø gïïr, kɑ wɑdde kedh-ɑ be lugii.
Codhe, ɑdøøge ød ki cyëge kɑ ngɑnɑni ongølø ki dhɑnhø, ɑnywøle ki wɑ̈d, kɑ gø cɑge ɑ́ Beriyɑ̀, kipe rɑjj-ɑ ɑ́bï kömi gøl gen.
Eprɑim yïe ɑ́dɑ nyɑre me cwøl ɑ́ Cerɑ̀. En ɑ ɑ́ger myërri Bet Örøn møg-ɑ wïj kwøømø kí møg-ɑ yij tör, kí Udhen Cerɑ̀.
Eprɑim yïe ɑ́dɑ wɑ̈d me cwøl ɑ́ Repɑ̀, møg bɑ kwɑrre: Recep, Telɑ̀, Tɑɑn,
Lɑdɑn, Amiud, Elicɑmɑ̀,
Nun, Jöcwø.
Kɑ Betiil kí myërr-ɑ bute kwɑny yi gen gïti Nɑɑrɑn kì wɑɑng cyɑ̈ɑ̈ng mwøl, kɑ gït-ɑ Gedher kì wɑɑng cyɑ̈ɑ̈ng böörø geki myërr-ɑ bute. Cekem, kí Ayɑ̀ kí myërr-ɑ buti gen, ɑ́kwɑny yi gen thyew.
Betcɑn, Tɑɑnɑk, Megidø, kì Dör kí myërr-ɑ buti gen, ge ɑ́kwɑny yi gøl Mɑnɑsè.
Gøl Yosep wɑ̈d Yɑgob ɑ bëëdø kì kɑ̈ddɑni bënn.
Møg bɑ kwɑrri Aceer. Yïe ɑ́dɑ wɑ̈dd ɑ́ngwen: Imnɑ̀, Icbɑ̀, Icbì, Beriyɑ̀, kí nyɑre ɑ́kyel, Serɑ̀.
Beriyɑ̀ yïe ɑ́dɑ wɑ̈dd ɑ́ryew: Keber, kí Mɑlkiel (ɑ ɑ́cöb kɑɑl Birdhɑit.)
Keber yïe ɑ́dɑ wɑ̈dd ɑ́dɑ̈g: Yɑplet, Cömer, Othɑm, kí nyɑre ɑ́kyel Cuɑ̀.
Yɑplet yïe ɑ́dɑ wɑ̈dd ɑ́dɑ̈g thyew: Pɑsɑk, Bimɑ̈l, kí Acbɑth.
Cömer ómen yïe ɑ́dɑ wɑ̈dd ɑ́dɑ̈g: Rögɑ̀, Yeubɑ̀, kí Arɑm.
Othɑm ómen yïe ɑ́dɑ wɑ̈dd ɑ́ngwen: Dhöpɑ̀, Imnɑ̀, Celec, kí Amɑl.
Kwɑrri Dhöpɑ̀ bɑ: Suɑ̀, Arneper, Cuɑɑl, Berì, Imrɑ̀
Bedher, Öd, Cɑmɑ̀, Cilcɑ̀, Ithrɑn, kí Beerɑ̀.
Kwɑrri Yether bɑ: Yepunɑ̀, Pispɑ̀, kí Arɑ̀,
o kwɑrri Ulɑ̀ bɑ Arɑ̀, Aniel, kí Ridhiyɑ̀.
Jiɑni bënn bɑ kwɑrri Aceer. Ge ɑ́bëëd gɑ jɑggi wɑ̈thi kɑ̈lli gen, jɑgg mø teg, kwɑnni kwɑrri Aceer møg-ɑ bɑ jøliny bɑ 26,000.
Ben Yɑmïn yïe ɑ́dɑ wɑ̈dd ɑ́bïj: Belɑ̀, Acbel, Akrɑk,
Nöö, kí Rɑpɑ̀.
Kwɑrri Belɑ̀ bɑ: Adɑr, Gerɑ̀, Abiud,
Abicuɑ̀, Nɑɑmɑn, Akoɑ̀,
Gerɑ̀, Cepupɑn, kí Urɑm.
O kwɑrri Eud bɑ Nɑɑmɑn, kí Akiyɑ̀, kí Gerɑ̀. Ge bɑ jɑggi wɑ̈thi kɑ̈lli gen kì Gebɑ̀. De keny-ɑ ɑ́cyeddi gen kì Gebɑ̀, ge ɑ́bëëd kì Mɑnɑɑth. Gerɑ̀ wïyi Udhɑ̀ kí Akiud ɑ ɑ́pyejji gen.
Cɑɑrɑim mɑ̈nne ɑ́ryew ɑ́tɑ̈nge, Ucim kí Bɑɑrɑ̀. De kì cyɑ̈n keny-ɑ ɑ́bëëde kì Moɑb, ɑnywøme cyëge Ödec, kɑ nyöddi yi ngɑnɑni ki wɑ̈dd ɑ́bïryew. Yöbɑb, Dhibiyɑ̀, Mecɑ̀, Mɑlkɑm,
Yeudh, Sɑkiyɑ̀, kí Mirmɑ̀. Wɑ̈ddɑni bënn ɑ́bëëd gɑ wɑ̈thi kɑ̈lli gen.
Yïe ɑ́dɑ wɑ̈dd ɑ́ryew møøgø mɑ ɑ́nyöllii yi Ucim: Abitub kí Elpɑɑl.
Elpɑɑl yïe ɑ́dɑ wɑ̈dd ɑ́dɑ̈g: Eber, Micɑm, kí Cemed. Bɑ Cemed ɑ ɑ́cöb kɑɑl Önö kí Lod kí myërr-ɑ buti gen.
Beriyɑ̀ kí Cemɑ̀ ge bɑ jø wɑ̈thi kɑ̈lli gen kì kɑɑl Ayɑlön. Gen ɑ ɑ́cyeddi tyëng-ɑ ɑ́bëëd kì Gɑth.
Møg bɑ kwɑrri Beriyɑ̀ thyew: Akiyö, Cɑcɑk, Yeremöth,
Dhebɑdiyɑ̀, Arɑd, Eder,
Mikɑil, Icpɑ̀, kí Yöɑ̀.
Kwɑrri Elpɑɑl bɑ Dhebɑdiyɑ̀, Meculɑm, Idhkì, Keber,
Icmerɑy, Idhliyɑ̀, kí Yöbɑb.
Kwɑrri Cimeì bɑ Yɑkim, Dhikrì, Dhɑbdì,
Elienɑy, Dhilethɑy, Eliel,
Adɑiyɑ̀, Berɑiyɑ̀, kí Cimrɑth.
Kwɑrri Cɑcɑk bɑ Icpɑn, Eber, Eliel,
Abdön, Dhikrì, Aɑnɑn,
Anɑniyɑ̀, Elɑm, Anthöthiyɑ̀,
Ipdeiyɑ̀, kí Penuel.
Kwɑrri Yeroɑm bɑ Cɑmcerɑy, Ceɑriyɑ̀, kí Athɑliyɑ̀,
Yɑɑreciyɑ̀, Eliyɑ̀, kí Dhikrì.
Ge bɑ wɑ̈thi kɑ̈lli gen møg-ɑ ɑ́bëëd kì Yerusɑlem.
Gibeon ɑ́cöb-ɑ yi Yeiel, kɑ pëgg-ɑ yije. Cyëge cwøl ɑ́ Mɑɑkɑ̀.
Wɑ̈de nyel-ɑ kɑyø cwøl ɑ́ Abdön. Wɑ̈dde møg-ɑ kyeelø bɑ Dhur, Kïc, Bɑɑl, Ner, Nɑdɑb,
Gedör, Akiyö, Dheker,
kí Miklöth wïyi Cimeɑ̀. Kwɑrri gen ɑ́bëëd kì Yerusɑlem kì buti wɑddi gen.
Ner wïyi Kïc. O Kïc bɑ wïyi Rɑ̈dh Cɑul. Cɑul yïe ɑ́dɑ wɑ̈dd ɑ́ngwen: Yönɑthɑn, Mɑlkicuɑ̀, Abinɑdɑb, kí Icböceth.
Yönɑthɑn bɑ wïyi Mepiböceth, o Mepiböceth bɑ wïyi Miikɑ̀.
Miikɑ̀ yïe ɑ́dɑ wɑ̈dd ɑ́ngwen: Pithön, Melek, Tɑreɑ̀, kí Akɑɑdh.
Akɑɑdh bɑ wïyi Yeöɑdɑ̀. Yeöɑdɑ̀ yïe ɑ́dɑ wɑ̈dd ɑ́dɑ̈g: Alemeth, Adhmɑbeth, kí Dhimrì. Dhimrì bɑ wïyi Mödhɑ̀.
Mödhɑ̀ bɑ wïyi Bineɑ̀. Kí wɑ̈de Rɑpɑ̀, kí wɑ̈de Eleɑsɑ̀, kí wɑ̈de Adhel.
Adhel yïe ɑ́dɑ wɑ̈dd ɑ́bïkyel: Adhrikɑm, Bökeru, Icmɑil, Ceɑriyɑ̀, Obɑdiyɑ̀, kí Aɑnɑn.
Ecek ómï Adhel yïe ɑ́dɑ wɑ̈dd ɑ́dɑ̈g: Ulɑm, Yeuc, kí Elipelet.
Wɑ̈ddi Ulɑm ɑ́bëëd gɑ jøliny mø teg. Kwɑrri Ulɑm bënn bɑ miyø kí pyɑ̈r ɑ́bïj. Ji møgɑk bënn bɑ kwɑrri Ben Yɑmïn.
Tyëng Yeudiyɑ̀ ɑ́cɑy yi Jwøk, kɑ ge kïdhi Bɑbïl, kì bɑng orøøg gen.
Tyëng-ɑ ɑ́kwöngi ki dwöög pödhi Isrɑil, bɑ ókwër, kí Kwɑrri Leebì, kí ji-ɑ nyi göögø kì yij Kengø.
Tyëng-ɑ ɑ́kedhi be bëëdø kì Yerusɑlem bɑ kɑ̈lli Yeudɑ̀, Ben Yɑmïn, kí Eprɑim, kí Mɑnɑsè.
Gøl Yeudɑ̀ ɑ́dɑ ji miy ɑ́bïkyel kí pyɑ̈r ɑ́bïngwen mɑ ɑ́bëëd kì Yerusɑlem.
Uthɑy wɑ̈d Amiud wɑ̈d Omrì, ɑ ɑ́bëëd ɑ́ jɑngi gøl Peredh wɑ̈d Yeudɑ̀. Imrì geki Bɑnì bɑ kweyye møg-ɑ kyeelø.
Asɑiyɑ̀ ɑ ɑ́bëëd ɑ́ jɑngi gøl Celɑ̀ wɑ̈d Yeudɑ̀.
Yöiil ɑ ɑ́bëëd ɑ́ jɑngi gøl Dherɑ̀ wɑ̈d Yeudɑ̀.
Møg bɑ tyëng gøl Ben Yɑmïn møg-ɑ ɑ́bëëd kì Yerusɑlem:
Sɑlu wɑ̈d Meculɑm, Meculɑm wɑ̈d Ödɑbiyɑ̀, Ödɑbiyɑ̀ wɑ̈d Asenuɑ̀,
Ibneiyɑ̀ wɑ̈d Yeroɑm.
Elɑ̀ wɑ̈d Udhì, wɑ̈d Mikrì,
Meculɑm wɑ̈d Cepɑtiyɑ̀, wɑ̈d Reuel, wɑ̈d Ibneiyɑ̀.
Wɑ̈thi ud 956 mø gølɑni ɑ ɑ́bëëd kì kunɑni, jøg-ɑ nyingi gen bɑ ɑgwed ɑnɑn bɑ jɑggi wɑ̈thi kɑ̈lli gen.
Møg bɑ ókwërr-ɑ ɑ́bëëd kì Yerusɑlem.
Yedɑiyɑ̀, Yöyɑrïb, Yɑkin
Adhɑriyɑ̀ wɑ̈d Kilkiyɑ̀ (jɑngi Kengi Jwøk) kweyye bɑ Meculɑm, Dhɑdök, Merɑyöth, kí Akitub.
Adɑiyɑ̀ wɑ̈d Yeroɑm, wɑ̈d Pɑcur, wɑ̈d Mɑlkiyɑ̀
Mɑɑsɑy wɑ̈d Adiel, ɑ kweyye bɑ Yɑdherɑ̀, Meculɑm, Mecilemith, kí Imer.
Ókwërr-ɑ ɑ́bëëd gɑ wɑ̈thi kɑ̈lli gen, kwɑnni gen bɑ ɑ́lïp kí miy ɑ́bïryew kí pyɑ̈r ɑ́bïkyel. Gïg-ɑ gøggi kì Kengø bënn, ɑ́bëëd gwøgi gïn ngɑ̈nyi yi gen bënn.
Kwɑrri Leebì møg-ɑ ɑ́bëëd kì Yerusɑlem.
Cemɑiyɑ̀ wɑ̈d Acub, wɑ̈d Adhrikɑm, wɑ̈d Acɑbiyɑ̀, kì gøl Merɑrì,
Bɑkbɑkɑr, Ërec, kí Gɑlɑl,
Mɑtɑniyɑ̀, wɑ̈d Miikɑ̀, wɑ̈d Dhikrì, wɑ̈d Asɑp,
Obɑdiyɑ̀ wɑ̈d Cemɑiyɑ̀, ɑ kweyye bɑ Gɑlɑl, kí Yeduthun.
Berekiyɑ̀ wɑ̈d Asɑ̀, wɑ̈d Elkɑnɑ̀, ɑ ɑ́bëëd kì Netöpɑ̀.
Møg bɑ nyingi jøkori Kengø møg-ɑ ɑ́bëëd kì Yerusɑlem: Cɑlum, Akub, Tɑlmön, kí Akimɑn. Cɑlum ɑ ɑ́bëëd ɑ́ jɑngi gen.
Cɑ̈gi kì bøli kenyɑni gïti ɑnɑn, tyëng kɑ̈lli gen ɑ́bëëd ɑ Dhøg Rɑ̈dh, kì wɑɑng cyɑ̈ɑ̈ng mwøl. Gen ɑ ɑ́bëëd cøn ge kor-ɑ byëëg Kwɑrri Leebì, keny-ɑ ɑ́nudd ge bëëd ɑ yethi kemmì.
Cɑlum wɑ̈d Körè, wɑ̈d Abiyɑsɑp, geki wɑdde tyëng gøl Körɑ̀, ɑ ɑ́bëëd ge kor-ɑ dhø Kemi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, ni kɑ ɑ́bëëd kweyyi gen, ge kor-ɑ Kemi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j ceth.
Pineɑs wɑ̈d Eliɑdhɑr, gøle ókorri yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j! En ɑ ɑ́bëëd ɑ́ jɑngi gen cøn.
Dhekɑriyɑ̀ wɑ̈d Mecelemiyɑ̀ ɑ́bëëd thyew e kor-ɑ dhø Kemi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j.

Ji bënn møg-ɑ ɑ́kwɑny o ge korri gen dhøggi dörø bɑ miy ɑ́ryew kí pyɑ̈rø wïdɑ́ryew. Ge bɑ ɑgwedd kí myërr-ɑ bëëd yi gen. Ábëëd ɑ́ Rɑ̈dh Debïd geki jɑltöng Sɑmwel ɑ ɑ́kwɑny kweyyi gen gɑ jɑggi kɑ̈jjɑni.
Gen kí kwɑrri gen, ge ɑ́cög gɑ tyëng dhø Kengø.
Ádɑ dhøg møg nenni wɑ̈thi tùng bënn, dɑ men yïëbbi wɑɑng wuudø, kí wɑɑng wurlwɑl, kí wɑɑng cyɑ̈ɑ̈ng mwøl, kí wɑɑng cyɑ̈ɑ̈ng böörø, dhøggɑni bënn dɑ jɑggi jøkor.
Jøkor møgɑni nyii kønyø yi tyëng kɑ̈lli gen, møg-ɑ bëëdø kì myërri gen. Kɑ ge nyii kurø ki cyɑ̈ng ɑ́bïryew, e ceg kɑ lunyø.
Jɑggi jøkor ɑ́ngwen møgɑni bɑ Kwɑrri Leebì, yï gen ɑ́dɑ tegø. O yï gen ɑ́dɑ tegø kì kömi udd-ɑ yij Kengø kí jɑmmì bënn.
Gøl Leebì nyi bëëd ɑ buti Kengø mɑ́ gwøøg gen bɑ kori Kengø kí yiebi dhøge kì mwøl yethi cyɑ̈ng.
Gøl Leebì gwøøg gen bɑ mïdhi jɑmmi kej kwër. Kí rɑngi jɑmmɑni, kí kïdhi gen yij Kengø, kí dwøøgi gen kɑ̈jji gen kenyi rum gwøg.
Kwï gen ɑ́bëëd gwøøg gen bɑ mïdhi jɑmmi kwër, ni møng-ɑ búr, kí byëlø, kí møgi oløg, kí bɑkur, kí yenh-ɑ yømi gen med.
De ókwër gwøøg gen bɑ yöli yenh-ɑ yømi gen med.
Kwɑɑr Leebì me cwøl ɑ́ Mɑtithiyɑ̀ wɑ̈d Cɑlum nyel-ɑ dwøng kì gøl Körɑ̀, en ɑ ɑ́mïdhi byël-ɑ bɑ ɑbulø.
O ópùni kwër nyi pyël-ɑ yi gøl Kɑ̈ɑ̈th kì yethi cyɑ̈nggi Sɑbɑth bënn.
Kwï tyëng gøl Leebì bɑ bödhhi thøm kì yij Kengø. O jɑggi kɑ̈llɑni nyi bëëd ɑ yethi udd-ɑ bɑdhhi Kengø, o yï gen bong gwøg megø, mɑ́ ge ceg-ɑ gwøg kì yij Kengø kì dicɑ̈ng kí wɑ̈r.
Jøg-ɑ nyingi gen bɑ ɑgwed ɑgɑk, bɑ jɑggi kɑ̈lli Kwɑrri Leebì, ge ɑ́bëëd ɑ Yerusɑlem.
Yeiel bene en ɑ ɑ́cöb Gibeon kɑ pëgg-ɑ yije. Cyëge cwøl ɑ́ Mɑɑkɑ̀.
Wɑ̈de nyel-ɑ kɑyø, cwøl ɑ́ Abdön, o wɑ̈dde yɑɑg-ɑ kyeelø bɑ Dhur, Kïc, Bɑɑl, Ner, Nɑdɑb,
Gedör, Akiyö, Dhekɑriyɑ̀, kí Miklöth,
wïyi Cimeɑ̀. Gølɑni ɑ́bëëd ɑ Yerusɑlem kì buti wɑddi gen Kwɑrri Leebì møg-ɑ kyeelø.
Ner bɑ wïyi Kïc, o Kïc bɑ wïyi Cɑul. Cɑul yïe ɑ́dɑ wɑ̈dd ɑ́ngwen. Yönɑthɑn, Mɑlkicuɑ̀, Abinɑdɑb, kí Icböceth.
Yönɑthɑn bɑ wïyi Mepiböceth, o Mepiböceth bɑ wïyi Miikɑ̀.
Miikɑ̀ yïe ɑ́dɑ wɑ̈dd ɑ́ngwen: Pithön, Melek, Tɑreɑ̀ kí Akɑɑdh.
Akɑɑdh ɑ bɑ wïyi Yɑrɑ̀, o Yɑrɑ̀ yïe ɑ́dɑ wɑ̈dd ɑ́dɑ̈g: Alemeth, Adhmɑbeth, kí Dhimrì. Dhimrì bɑ wïyi Mödhɑ̀,
Mödhɑ̀ bɑ wïyi Bineɑ̀, kí wɑ̈de Repɑiyɑ̀, kí wɑ̈de Eleɑsɑ̀, kí wɑ̈de Adhel.
Adhel yïe ɑ́dɑ wɑ̈dd ɑ́bïkyel: Adhrikɑm, Bökeru, Icmɑil, Ceɑriyɑ̀, Obɑdiyɑ̀, kí Aɑnɑn.
Tyëng Pelistiyɑ̀ ɑ́nyïɑ̈ggi ki tyëng Isrɑil kì wïj Kïti Gilboɑ̀. Kɑ tyëng Isrɑil mø gïïr nɑ̈g, kɑ Rɑ̈dh Cɑul cyeddi geki wɑ̈dde ki kwï yɑye.
De ge ɑ́pïïd yi tyëng Pelistiyɑ̀, kɑ wɑ̈ddi Cɑul ɑ́dɑ̈g: Yönɑthɑn, Abinɑdɑb, kí Mɑlkicuɑ̀ nɑ̈g.
Cɑul ɑ́tyeg yi liny, kɑ ree pɑ̈dhi yi nyɑɑr weth. Kedø menɑni ɑ́bëëd e teeg cɑrø kì ri Cɑul.

Kɑ nyelɑwøb men-ɑ kɑ̈lli jɑmmi liny mø Cɑul, köbbe kinni, “Wöödh pilí wɑ̈g kì yij bøje, kɑ yɑ nɑ̈ɑ̈g, kipe yɑ ótuug yi tyëng Pelistiyɑ̀ møg-ɑ kwïj Jwøk.” De nyelɑni ɑ́bwøg ki nɑ̈ge. Codhe, kɑ Cɑul pile kwɑnye, kɑ ree møøde köme, ɑthøwe.
Keny-ɑ ɑ́lïdhi wømɑni kinni Cɑul ɑ́thøw, ɑlonye ree ki møød kömi pile thyew, ɑthøwe.
Cɑul ɑ́thøw geki wɑ̈dde gɑ ɑ́dɑ̈g bënn, o bong wɑ̈de mɑ ɑ́jɑ̈ggi kì bɑnge.
Keny-ɑ ɑ́lïng tyëng Isrɑil møg-ɑ bëëdø kì Töör Yidhriil kinni i liny ócyeddø, kɑ Cɑul geki wɑ̈dde nɑ̈g bënn, ɑwiy gen kɑ̈ddi gen piny, kɑ ge órengø. Kɑ tyëng Pelistiyɑ̀ obëënø, ɑpëggi gen kɑ̈ddɑni.
Dhuki, ɑkedhi tyëng Pelistiyɑ̀ be yɑgi ji-ɑ ɑ́thøw, kɑ Cɑul geki wɑ̈dde yod gen kì wïj Kïti Gilboɑ̀.
Kɑ wïj Cɑul ngul wɑ̈g yi gen, kɑ ɑ́dhedheg linye luny gen wɑ̈g thyew kì ree, kɑ tyëng Pelistiyɑ̀ öd-ɑ myërri gen ki wööni tyɑ̈mø, ge ngɑ̈j-ɑ jwöggi gen geki jii gen.
Kɑ jɑmmi liny mø Cɑul cïb gen yij kengi jwøøg gen, kɑ wïje ngɑɑb gen dhø kengi Dɑgön, jwøøg gen.
Keny-ɑ ɑ́lïng tyëng Yɑbic kì Gilyɑd ki gïn-ɑ ɑ́göggi Cɑul yi tyëng Pelistiyɑ̀,
ɑdhwödh yɑɑg-ɑ teg, kɑ ge kedh-ɑ be dwɑɑyii geki wɑ̈dde, kɑ gï kɑ̈ɑ̈l gen Yɑbic. Akoony gen thɑ óthurø, kɑ ge othuumø ki cyɑ̈ng ɑ́bïryew.
Nuti pyëj-ɑ Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, de ɑ́öd-ɑ yï ɑ́jwöggì. Kɑ nɑ̈g yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, kɑ lɑwe mëgge Debïd wɑ̈d Yesì.
Kɑ tyëng Isrɑil bënn kedh-ɑ yï Debïd kì Kibrön, kɑ köbbi yi gen kinni, “Wø bɑ dëlí geki remí.
Kɑ̈ge dööng cɑgg ɑ́ kɑ ɑ́bëëd Cɑul ɑ́ rɑ̈dh, bɑ yïn ɑ ɑ́pyejji Isrɑil kì yij liny, kɑ yï köbbi yi Jwøgí, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kinni jie ópyejj-ɑ yi yïn, yï óbëëdø yïn ɑ́ jɑngi gen.”
Kɑ jɑggi Isrɑil kedh-ɑ yï Rɑ̈dh Debïd kì Kibrön. Areb gen kwøb kí Debïd, kɑ gø røny gen ɑ́ rɑ̈ɑ̈dh Isrɑil, ni kɑ ɑ́kwøbii yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j ki dhøg Sɑmwel.
Kɑ Debïd köbbi yi tyëng Yebus kinni pɑ cuggi wɑ̈dhi kɑɑl dörɑni kinni tek; de döri Dhɑyøn ɑ́mɑg yi Debïd, kɑ døøg-ɑ be cwøllø ɑ́ “Kɑɑl Debïd”.
Debïd ɑ́ceg-ɑ kwøb kinni, “Ngɑn-ɑ ókwöngi ki nɑ̈ggø kì kelli tyëng Yebus, ógwøg ɑ́ pënyi liny!” Kɑ liny pej yi Yöɑb wɑ̈d Dheruyɑ̀, kɑ gwøg ɑ́ pënyi liny.
Dörɑni ɑ́døøg be cwøllø ɑ́ Kɑɑl Debïd, kipe kɑ ɑ́pëggi Debïd be bëëdø kì yije.
Kɑ kɑɑlɑni døøg ki gerø yi Debïd, cɑg kì ri tung-ɑ bɑ ɑthør kì ri kït, kì tung-ɑ wɑɑng cyɑ̈ɑ̈ng mwøl, kɑ bun-ɑ ɑ́döng tyëg ki gerø yi Yöɑb.
Debïd ɑ́kedh e ótëngø mɑ́ e ɑ́køny yi Wïlɑ̈bø, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j.
Møg bɑ nyingi jøliny Debïd yɑɑg-ɑ ti ki ngɑ̈nyø. Bɑ gen geki tyëng Isrɑil møg-ɑ kyeelø ɑ ɑ́gwøg Debïd ɑ́ rɑ̈dh ni kɑ ɑ́kwøbii yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, kɑ pödhø cïb gen piny kidøøj.
Yɑcobeɑm kì gøl Acmön bɑ en ɑ mɑl, o en ɑ bɑ jɑngi pëjj-ɑ mɑl gɑ ɑ́dɑ̈g, møg-ɑ pëddi tegø. En ɑ ɑ́nyïɑ̈ggi ki ji miy ɑ́dɑ̈g kɑ gï nɑ̈ge ki ɑkebïdhe.
Ryeew pëjj-ɑ mɑl gɑ ɑ́dɑ̈g, bɑ Eliɑdhɑr wɑ̈d Dödö kì gøl Ákö.
En geki Debïd ɑ ɑ́nyïɑ̈ggi ki tyëng Pelistiyɑ̀ kì Pɑs Dɑmïm. O ɑ́bëëd e ying-ɑ yij pwödhi ceir keny-ɑ ɑ́cyeddi Isrɑil yi tyëng Pelistiyɑ̀,
codhe, ɑcunge geki jøge kì dïpwödhø, ɑnyïɑ̈ggi gen ki tyëng Pelistiyɑ̀. Kɑ wëggi tyɑ̈mø yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j.

Cyɑ̈ng ɑ́kyel jøg ɑ́dɑ̈g kì kelli pëjji liny møg-ɑ mɑl gɑ pyɑ̈r ɑ́dɑ̈g, ɑ́kedhi keny-ɑ di nyɑ kït kun-ɑ bëëd yi Debïd kì buti órøngi kït kì Adulɑm, e jøliny tyëng Pelistiyɑ̀ nudd ge ying-ɑ Töör Repɑim.
Betleem ɑ́mɑg yi liny Pelistiyɑ̀ kì bøli keny-ɑ ɑ́bëëd Debïd ying-ɑ be ywömi ree wïj nyɑ kït.
Kɑ Debïd mɑg yi rummi døøg pɑc, ɑkööbe kinni, “Yɑ dwɑdd-ɑ mɑ̈dhø ki pïi yith men-ɑ ying dhø döri Betleem, dɑ́ men ɑ ómuuj yɑn!”
Codhe, ɑbëën jøg teg ɑ́dɑ̈g wɑ̈g, kɑ ge cør-ɑ kɑɑl liny Pelistiyɑ̀, kɑ ge mïdd-ɑ wɑ̈g ki pï kì yij yith, kɑ pïgɑni muuj gen Debïd. De gï nuti mɑɑdh en, gï ɑ́kunye Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j gɑ gëëdhi.
Akööbe kinni, “Pïg pɑ mɑdh yi yɑn kinni tek, mɑ́ mɑdhi pïgɑni nɑ mɑdhi remmi jøg-ɑ ɑ́muuj wëyi gen!” Codhe, ɑbɑ̈nye ki mɑdhi pïgɑni. Møgɑni nyodh-ɑ tegi jøliny ɑ́dɑ̈g møg-ɑ ti ki ngɑ̈nyø.
Abicɑy ómï Yöɑb ɑ ɑ́bëëd ɑ́ jɑngi jøliny møg-ɑ mɑl gɑ pyɑ̈r ɑ́dɑ̈g. Ányïɑ̈ggi e kete ki ji miy ɑ́dɑ̈g, kɑ gï cööbe ki ɑkebïdhe, kɑ gï nɑ̈ge bënn.
Ngɑ̈nyi kì bɑng tege kì kelli jøliny pyɑ̈r ɑ́dɑ̈g møg-ɑ mɑl, kɑ ogöögø ɑ́ jɑngi gen, de pɑ ti ki ngɑ̈nyø kibøli ɑ́dɑ̈g-ɑ mɑl.
Benɑiyɑ̀ wɑ̈d Yöyɑdɑ̀ kì Kɑbdhiil ɑ́bëëd e ngɑ̈nyi ki tegø, ɑ́göög ki jɑmmì mø teeg, jöddi liny ɑ́ryew kì kelli liny tyëng Moɑb ɑ́nɑ̈g yi en. Kɑ kedh-ɑ ød ngur cyɑ̈ng megø kì yij ɑ́piy, ɑnɑ̈ge ngur.

Kɑ jɑl Rïp me bɑ̈ɑ̈r cɑrø, bɑ̈re pöödh-ɑ mïtïr ɑ́ryew, o ngëde dwøng gø nɑ̈ge, o yïe ɑ́dɑ ɑkebïdh me dwøng eni jɑl Rïp menɑni. Köme ɑ́pɑ̈ɑ̈r yi Benɑiyɑ̀ ki lodhe kɑ ɑkebïdhe gwɑre, kɑ gø nɑ̈ge ki ɑkebïnhɑni.
Benɑiyɑ̀ bɑ dhɑnhø ɑ́kyel kì kelli jøliny pyɑ̈r ɑ́dɑ̈g. Møgɑk bënn bɑ gïg teg møg-ɑ ɑ́gwøg yi en.
Ákwɑny yi Debïd ɑ́ jɑngi jøg-ɑ korii. Ábëëd nyinge ying-ɑ mɑl kì kelli jøliny møg-ɑ mɑl gɑ pyɑ̈r ɑ́dɑ̈g, de pɑ pɑ̈ɑ̈r ki ɑ́dɑ̈g-ɑ mɑl.
Møg bɑ jøliny møg-ɑ per gen teg:
Asɑiil ómï Yöɑb,
Elɑɑnɑn wɑ̈d Dödö kì Betleem
Cɑmöth kì Aröd,
Ëledh kì Pelet,
Irɑ̀ wɑ̈d Ikec kì Tekoɑ̀,
Abiedher kì Anɑthöth
Sibekɑy kì Ucɑ̀
Ilɑy kì Ákö
Mɑɑ̈rɑy kì Netöpɑ̀
Ëled wɑ̈d Bɑɑnɑ̀ kì Netöpɑ̀
Itɑy wɑ̈d Ribɑy kì Gibeɑ̀ kì piny gøl Ben Yɑmïn.
Benɑiyɑ̀ kì Pirɑthön
Urɑy kì törr-ɑ cɑ̈gi kì Gɑɑc
Abiel kì Arbɑ̀
Adhmɑbeth kì Bekurum
Eliɑbɑ̀ kì Cɑɑlbön
Acem kì Gïdhön
Yönɑthɑn wɑ̈d Cɑgeè kì Arɑr
Akiyɑm wɑ̈d Sɑkɑr kì Arɑr
Elipɑl wɑ̈d Ur
Ëper kì Mekerɑ̀
Akiyɑ̀ kì Pelön
Ëdhrö kì Kɑrmel
Nɑɑrɑy wɑ̈d Edhbɑy
Yöiil ómï Nɑthɑn
Mibɑɑr wɑ̈d Agrì
Dhelek jɑl Amön
Nɑɑ̈rɑy Jɑl Beeröth ɑ nyi kɑ̈lli ɑ́dhedheg Yöɑb.
Irɑ̀ kí Gɑreb kì Yɑtir
Uriyɑ̀ wɑ̈d Kit
Dhɑbɑd wɑ̈d Alɑy
Adinɑ̀ wɑ̈d Cidhɑ̀ (bɑ pëëji kì gøl Ruben, kí jöddi liny møg-ɑ kwølle gɑ pyɑ̈r ɑ́dɑ̈g).
Aɑnɑn wɑ̈d Mɑɑkɑ̀
Yöcɑpɑt kì Mithɑn
Udhiyɑ̀ kì Acterɑ̀
Cɑmɑ̀ geki Yeiel wɑ̈ddi Othɑm kì Aröeer
Yediyɑil kí Yöɑ̀ wɑ̈ddi Cimrì kì Tidh
Eliel kì Mɑɑ̈bɑ̀
Yeribɑy kí Yöcɑbiyɑ̀ wɑ̈ddi Elnɑɑm
Ithmɑ̀ jɑl Moɑb
Eliel, kí Obed, kí Yɑɑsiel kì Dhöbɑ̀.
Debïd ɑ́bëëd ɑ Dhiglɑg keny-ɑ ɑ́pɑ̈ɑ̈re yïnø kɑ ɑ́dwɑddii nɑ̈gø yi Cɑul wɑ̈d Kïc, dɑ jøliny mø ngɑ̈nyi yëthi liny, o ge pɑ nyi døøg cyɑ̈n mɑ ɑ́rëbi ki en.
Jøgɑni bɑ yɑɑg gøl Ben Yɑmïn, ɑ ying gøl yɑɑ Cɑul. Ge pɑ nyi bɑ̈ɑ̈jø ki tøngg wɑlɑ̀ ki wethh, wɑlɑ̀ ki bɑ̈ddì, o ge bɑ nywɑnyy bënn.
Ge ɑ́bëëd ge pyejj-ɑ yi wɑ̈ddi Cemɑ̀ kì Gibeɑ̀, ɑ løg Akiedher geki Yöɑc.
Jøliny møgɑni ek:
Yedhiel kí Pelet, wɑ̈ddi Adhmɑbeth
Berɑkɑ̀ kí Yeeu kì Anɑthöth.
Icmɑiyɑ̀ kì Gibeon. Bɑ jɑl-liny mɑ ɑ́bëëd e ngɑ̈nyi, o ɑ́bëëd ɑ́ ɑ́kyel kì kelli pëjji liny møg-ɑ mɑl gɑ pyɑ̈r ɑ́dɑ̈g.
Jermɑyɑ̀, kí Yɑɑdhiel, kí Yöɑnɑn, kí Yödhɑbɑd kì Gederɑ̀.
Eludhɑy, kí Yerimöth, kí Beɑliyɑ̀, kí Cemɑriyɑ̀, kí Cepɑtiyɑ̀ jɑl Arïp.
Elkɑnɑ̀, kí Iciyɑ̀, kí Adhɑrel, kí Yöedher, kí Yɑcobeɑm, kì gøl Körɑ̀.
Kí wɑ̈ddi Yeroɑm kì Gedör, ɑ løg Yöilɑ̀ kí Dhebɑdiyɑ̀.

Møg bɑ nyingi jøliny møg-ɑ ɑ́ngɑ̈nyi yëthi liny kì gøl Gɑd, gen ɑ jøg-ɑ ɑ́kedhi kömi yɑɑy Debïd keny-ɑ ɑ́bëëde kì yij ønteg kì yij pɑ̈l. Ge ɑ́bëëd ge ngɑ̈ny nyɑɑg ki ködd kí tøngg, ge teg ni ngurrì kɑ̀ nënni gen, o ge yöd ni ɑ́køøny wïj kït, kɑ̀ rïngi gen.
Ge ómyeerø, o ge ópyëlø ni men: Edher, Obɑdiyɑ̀, Eliɑb, Micmɑnɑ̀, Jermɑyɑ̀, Atɑy, Eliel, Yöɑnɑn, Eldhɑbɑd, Jermɑyɑ̀, kí Mɑkbɑnɑy.
Kwï jø gøl Gɑd møgɑni ɑ́pyejj-ɑ ji ɑ́lïp, møøgø ɑ́pyejj-ɑ miyø.
Kì dwɑ̈y Abib, e Nɑm Urdun pɑ̈ngø kɑ obeedhø, nɑmɑni ɑ́bɑ̈ɑ̈n gen, kɑ tyëng-ɑ ɑ́bëëd kì yij tör kedhhi gen kì wɑɑng cyɑ̈ɑ̈ng mwøl kí wɑɑng cyɑ̈ɑ̈ng böörø.
Cyɑ̈ng ɑ́kyel Debïd yïe ɑ́bëën kì ønteg keny-ɑ ɑ́bëëde, yi jøg mø kɑ̈ɑ̈l gøl Ben Yɑmïn kí gøl Yeudɑ̀.

Kɑ Debïd bï-ɑ wɑ̈g kì ød, be yïddø ki jøgɑni, kɑ gï köbbe kinni, “Keløg wu bï kɑ mër, wu dwɑdd-ɑ kønyi yɑn, døøj! De keløg wu dwɑdd-ɑ twɑ̈nyi yɑn tyëngmɑ̈ɑ̈nø, e bong gïnrɑj mɑ ɑ́göggɑ wun, møgɑni óbëëd ge ngɑ̈nyi yi Jwøøg kweyyee, o wu cɑye’ cɑyø.”
Codhe, kɑ Amɑsɑy, ɑ ɑ́gwøg ɑ́ jɑngi jøliny møg-ɑ pyɑ̈r ɑ́dɑ̈g, köme bëën yi wëyi Jwøk, ɑkööbe kinni,
“Debïd wɑ̈d Yesì, wø bɑ jií!
Yï óbëëdø ki mër, wuki ji-ɑ køny yïn!
Yï bɑ ɑkøny yi Jwøk.”
Kɑ jøgɑni cwøl yi Debïd, kɑ gï gwøge gɑ pëjji linye.

Kwï jøliny kì gøl Mɑnɑsè møg-ɑ ɑ́kedhi kömi Debïd keny-ɑ ɑ́rëbe ki tyëng Pelistiyɑ̀, kì bøli keny-ɑ ɑ́bëëd ge ónyïɑ̈ggø ki Cɑul. De Debïd ɑ́bɑny yi rɑ̈nhi Pelistiyɑ̀, kɑ köbbi kinni døøge pɑc, mɑ́ rɑ̈nhi Pelistiyɑ̀ ɑ́bëëd ge óböggø kinni Debïd ódøøg kömi Rɑ̈dh Cɑul, ɑdøøg Debïd Dhiglɑg.
Møg bɑ jøliny kì gøl Mɑnɑsè møg-ɑ ɑ́kedhi kömi Debïd, keny-ɑ ɑ́kedhe Dhiglɑg: Adnɑɑ̀, Yödhɑbɑd, Yediyɑil, Mikɑil, Yödhɑbɑd, Elïu, kí Dhilethɑy. Ge ɑ́bëëd gɑ pëjji ɑ́lïp kì gøl Mɑnɑsè.
Debïd ɑ́køny yi gen ki nyɑɑg ki tyëng-ɑ nyi röödhø, mɑ́ ge ɑ́bëëd gɑ pëjji liny mø teg.
Jøliny Debïd ɑ́kedh ge óngënyø, mɑ́ e dɑ ji møg nyi bï kömi gen yethi cyɑ̈ng. Kɑ yɑyɑni ódøngø ki mendwøng.
Keny-ɑ ɑ́ying Debïd Kibrön, jøliny mø gïïr ɑ́kedhi köme be kønyii, o bëëde ɑ́ rɑ̈dh kì kej Cɑul, ni kɑ ɑ́kööb Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j. Kwɑnni gen ek:
Gøl Yeudɑ̀. 6,800, jøg mø ngɑ̈ny liny ködd kí tøngg.
Gøl Cimeøn. 7,100 jøg mø dïdø ki liny.
Gøl Leebì. 4,600 jøliny.
Jøbɑng Yöyɑdɑ̀, ɑ løg kwɑrri Aɑron, ge bɑ 3,700
Jøg-ɑ teg møg-ɑ ɑ́cyɑ̈dhi ki Dhɑdök, bɑ 22.
Gøl Ben Yɑmïn, ɑ bɑ gøl yɑɑ Cɑul bɑ 3,000, ji mø ngenyø kì kelli gen ɑ́cög yethi gen bong ɑ́dud ki gøl Cɑul.
Gøl Eprɑim bɑ 20,800, o ge bɑ jøg mø ngɑ̈ny liny kì wɑ̈thi kɑ̈lli gen.
Kì gøl Mɑnɑsè men-ɑ wɑɑng cyɑ̈ɑ̈ng böörø, yije ɑ́kɑ̈bbi ki jøliny 18,000 gɑ møg kedhi be gwøgi Debïd ɑ́ Rɑ̈dh.
Gøl Isɑkɑr bɑ 200, ge bɑ pëjji liny ge bënn, kí jøg-ɑ pyejji yi gen, pëjjɑni ngɑ̈ny wøw ki gïn-ɑ cuggi gwøgø yi tyëng Isrɑil kì bøli keny-ɑ døj ki gwøgii.
Gøl Dhebulun bɑ 50,000, jøg mø yethi gen bong ɑ́dud, o ge ngɑ̈nyi yëthi liny.
Gøl Nɑptɑlì bɑ 1,000 pëjji liny, kí 37,000 jøliny ködd kí tøngg.
Gøl Dɑn bɑ 28,600, jøliny mø rumø ki pwönyø.
Gøl Aceer bɑ 40,000, jøg mø cuggi nyɑɑg ki liny.
Tyëng løøg Nɑm Urdun kì wɑɑng cyɑ̈ɑ̈ng mwøl, bɑ gøl Ruben kí Gɑd, kí budi gøl Mɑnɑsè, jöddi liny kwɑnni gen bɑ ɑ́lïp miyø kí pyɑ̈r ɑ́ryew (120,000).
Jøliny møgɑni bënn ɑ́kedhi Kibrön be gwøgi Debïd ɑ́ rɑ̈ɑ̈dh Isrɑil bëne. Tyëng Isrɑil møg-ɑ kyeelø ɑ́dwɑdd-ɑ møgɑni ceth.
Ge ɑ́bëëd ki cyɑ̈ng ɑ́dɑ̈g kì buti Debïd, ge cɑm-ɑ gïgcɑmm kí gïg mɑdh møg-ɑ ɑ́gwir yi tyëng Isrɑil kipe gen.

Gøl Isɑkɑr, kí Dhebulun, kí Nɑptɑlì møg-ɑ ɑ́kɑ̈ɑ̈l wɑɑng wuudø kun lɑ̈wi, ge ɑ́kɑ̈ni ki gïgcɑmm, kí møng-ɑ búr, kí nywøli ólɑm møg thij, kí møg thwøwø, kí møgi oløg, kí møøw dhetun. Gï ɑ́kɑ̈ɑ̈l gen ɑ kömi ɑderr, kí ɑmɑl, kí ógɑll, kí wɑ̈dhh. Ge ɑ́kɑ̈ni thyew ki dhög kí dyëg. O ge nɑ̈g gɑ møg cɑm. Møg bënn nyodh-ɑ medi pëëth kì yij pödhø bëne.
Rɑ̈dh Debïd ɑ́kööb ki pëjji liny bënn møg-ɑ ɑ́jɑɑg jøliny ɑ́lïp, kí pëjji miy.

Codhe, kɑ tyëng Isrɑil bënn köbbe kinni, “Keløg wu oyïëyø, o bɑ gïn dwɑddi yi Jwøgee, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, ödi wɑ yï wɑddee geki ókwër kí Kwɑrri Leebì kì kɑ̈dd-ɑ bëëd yi gen ki wöödø kinni bï gen, o wɑ cugi wɑ kì keny.
Codhe, o wɑ kedhi wɑ be yɑɑbi Sɑnduug Ciggi Jwøk, ɑ ɑ́bëëd e ówøyø kɑ ɑ́jyɑ̈ɑ̈g Cɑul.”
Kɑ ji pëthi gen ómïnø yi møgɑni, ɑyïëy gen.
Codhe, kɑ Debïd kedh-ɑ Bɑɑlɑ̀ geki teedø bëne, o Bɑɑlɑ̀ bene Kiriɑt Yeɑrïm, kì Yeudiyɑ̀, ge kedh-ɑ be dwɑɑyi Sɑnduug Ciggi Jwøk, ɑ cungi ɑ́ nyingi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, ɑ kwömø kì kɑɑm kerobb.
Akɑ̈ɑ̈l gen Sɑnduug Cigg wɑ̈g kì gøl Abinɑdɑb, kɑ gø cïb gen yij yɑ̈y me nyɑ̈n. Kɑ yɑ̈yɑni køøl yi Udhɑ̀ geki Akiyö.
Debïd ɑ́bëëd e ceg-ɑ yëggø geki teedø ge lenh-ɑ Jwøk, ge owörø ki thøm kí kɑ̈ngì.
Keny-ɑ ɑ́wɑ̈dhi gen rɑri pwödhi Kïdön, kɑ wɑ̈dhh ocyerø, Kɑ Udhɑ̀ cinge rïïje, kɑ Sɑnduug Cigg mɑge.
Kɑ Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j pyëwe órënyø, ɑnɑ̈ge Udhɑ̀ kipe kɑ ɑ́nywɑle Sɑnduug Cigg. Áthøw kì kenyɑni kì bøli Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j,
ɑcɑɑg kenyɑni ɑ́ Peredh Udhɑ̀, nyingɑni wɑng-ɑ “Cɑ́yi Udhɑ̀.” Kwøbbi nɑ̈gi Udhɑ̀ yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j ɑ́bëëd e ledh kì yï Debïd.
Codhe, ɑbwøg Debïd yi Jwøk, kɑ okööbø kinni, “Sɑnduug Cigg ókɑ̈l yi yɑn kidï ɑnɑn?”
Acöge e nuti kïdhi Yerusɑlem yi Debïd. De ɑ́yöd gø cïbe’ gøl jɑl me cwøl ɑ́ Obed Edöm, jɑl Gɑth.
Kɑ obëëdø kì gølɑni ki dwɑ̈tt ɑ́dɑ̈g, ɑgyëëdh gøl Obed Edöm yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kí jɑmme bënn.
Kirɑm rɑ̈ɑ̈dh Suur ɑ́ödi yï Debïd ki jøngyew, kɑ ödi yi en ki yenh sɑndɑl, kí bödhhi tweg ki kïddi geki bödhhi pɑ̈mmì, møg gëddi Debïd ki ød.
Kɑ yod yi Debïd kinni ɑ́rum ki kwɑnyø yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j ɑ́ rɑ̈ɑ̈dh Isrɑil, kɑ lɑ̈ge gwøge e dwøng kipe jie.
Kɑ Debïd ónyömø ki mɑ̈nn mø gïïr kì Yerusɑlem, kɑ nyöddi yi mɑ̈nnɑni ki wɑ̈dd geki womɑ̈nn mø gïïr.
Møg bɑ nywøl møg-ɑ ɑ́nyöddii keny-ɑ ɑ́yinge Yerusɑlem: Cɑmuɑ̀, Cöbɑb, Nɑthɑn, Sølømøn,
Ibɑɑr, Elicuɑ̀, kí Elpelet,
Nögɑ̀, Nepeg, Yɑpiyɑ̀
Elicɑmɑ̀, Beelyɑdɑ̀,
Keny-ɑ ɑ́lïng tyëng Pelistiyɑ̀ kinni Debïd ógwøgø ɑ́ rɑ̈ɑ̈dh Isrɑil bëne, ɑkedhi jøliny be mɑgii. Kɑ Debïd kedh-ɑ be tuumø ki gen.
Keny-ɑ ɑ́wɑ̈nhi tyëng Pelistiyɑ̀ Töör Repɑim, ɑcɑ̈gi gen ki yɑg.
Apyëëj Jwøk yi Debïd kinni, “Pɑ̈ɑ̈rɑ kömi tyëng Pelistiyɑ̀? Ge ówëggí tyɑmø yi yɑn?”
Alöggi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kinni, “Ngee, pɑ̈ɑ̈r kömi gen! Ge ówëggɑ tyɑmø yi yïn!”
Codhe, ɑpɑ̈ɑ̈r Debïd kömi gen kì Bɑɑl Perɑdhïm, ɑtyɑme gïn. Kɑ Debïd okööbø kinni, “Yɑ ɑ́wëggi tyɑ̈mø yi Jwøk kɑ yɑ mödd-ɑ kelli tyëngmɑ̈ɑ̈nø ni bɑɑyø.” Acwølli kenyɑni ɑ́ Bɑɑl Perɑdhïm.
De keny-ɑ ɑ́rengi tyëng Pelistiyɑ̀, ngïjji jwöggi gen ɑ́wiy gen piny, ɑkööb Debïd kinni i rɑ̈ɑ̈b ngïjji jwöggɑni.
Acigi tyëng Pelistiyɑ̀ dwöög yij törɑni be yɑg.
Apyëëj Jwøk yi Debïd, kɑ Jwøk ólöggø kinni, “Wu ko pɑ̈ɑ̈r kömi gen wu ying-ɑ tuung, de kɑ̈l wun ngɑ̈thi gen, kɑ wu pɑ̈ɑ̈r wun kömi gen wu kɑ̈ɑ̈l-ɑ tung-ɑ kyeelø, wu rwööm ki yenh bɑlsɑm.
Keny-ɑ ólïng ki ywøøg tyel kì mɑl wɑ̈thi yenh, kɑ wu pɑ̈ɑ̈r wun kömi gen, mɑ́ yɑ ómøøl mɑl bøli wun, be nyɑɑg ki tyëng Pelistiyɑ̀, o ge tyɑm.”
Kɑ Debïd møg-ɑ ɑ́köbbii yi Jwøk gwøge, ɑcyedde tyëng Pelistiyɑ̀, cɑg kì Gibeon gïti Gedher.
Atɑɑy nyingi Debïd kömi piny bëne, kɑ pödhh bënn göjji böggi Debïd yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j.
Debïd ree ɑ́gëdde ki ød kì Yerusɑlem, kɑɑl-ɑ ɑ́mɑge kì yï tyëng Yebus, ɑ løg tyëngpinyɑni, ɑtyenye kej Sɑnduug Ciggi Jwøk thyew, kɑ gudd-ɑ piny ki kemɑ̀.
Codhe, ɑkööbe kinni, “Sɑnduug Cigg óbyell-ɑ yi Kwɑrri Leebì keti gen, mɑ́ gen ɑ ɑ́yieny yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, o gø nyi byelli gen, o keje nyi tyeny yi gen, gïti ɑtheer.”
Kɑ Debïd tyëng Isrɑil bënn cwøøle Yerusɑlem, o Sɑnduug Cigg kɑ̈ɑ̈l gen keny-ɑ ɑ́rum keje ki tyenyø yi en, kipere.
Codhe, ɑöde yï Kwɑrri Aɑron geki Kwɑrri Leebì.
Ji miyø kí pyɑ̈r ɑ́ryew ɑ ɑ́bï kì gøl Kɑ̈ɑ̈th, ge pyejj-ɑ yi Uriel.
Ji miy ɑ́ryew kí pyɑ̈r ɑ́ryew ɑ ɑ́bï kì gøl Merɑrì, ge pyejj-ɑ yi Asɑiyɑ̀.
Ji miyø kí pyɑ̈r ɑ́dɑ̈g ɑ ɑ́bï kì gøl Gercön, ge pyejj-ɑ yi Yöiil.
Gøl Elidhɑpɑn ɑ́bï gɑ miy ɑ́ryew, ge pyejj-ɑ yi Cemɑiyɑ̀.
Gøl Kibrön ɑ́bï gɑ pyɑ̈r ɑ́bïdɑ̈g, ge pyejj-ɑ yi Eliel.
Gøl Udhiel ɑ́bï gɑ miyø kí pyɑ̈rø wïdɑ́ryew, ge pyejj-ɑ yi Aminɑdɑb.
Kɑ ókwër ryeet, Dhɑdök kí Abiyɑthɑr cwøl yi Debïd, geki Kwɑrri Leebì ɑ́bïkyel, ɑ løg Uriel, Asɑiyɑ̀, Yöiil, Cemɑiyɑ̀, Eliel kí Aminɑdɑb.

Aköbbe pëjji Kwɑrri Leebì kinni, “Wun ɑ bɑ jɑggi gøl Leebì. Kwëru ri wun, wuki Kwɑrri Leebì møg-ɑ kyeelø, o Sɑnduug Ciggi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, Jwøøg Isrɑil kɑ̈ɑ̈l yi wun, o cïb keny-ɑ ɑ́gwir yi yɑn kipere.
Wɑ ɑ́cɑy yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kɑ per kɑ ɑ́bëëd e pɑth ki wun ɑ ɑ́kɑ̈ɑ̈lii, o nuti kwërø kidøøj.”
Codhe, kɑ ókwër geki Kwɑrri Leebì ri gen kwër gen kipe kɑ̈ɑ̈li Sɑnduug Ciggi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, Jwøøg Isrɑil.
Kɑ byëël yi Kwɑrri Leebì ki lødh, ni kɑ ɑ́ceg Mosɑ̀ yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j.
Kɑ jɑggi gøl Leebì köbbi yi Debïd kinni kɑ̈bbi gen ki Kwɑrri Leebì møg wör ki thøm, ki medi pëëth.

Kì kelli tyëng gøl Merɑrì, ge ɑ́kwɑny-ɑ Ëmɑn wɑ̈d Yöiil, kí Asɑp wɑ̈d Berekiyɑ̀, kí Ethɑn wɑ̈d Kucɑiyɑ̀. O kì kelli jøg-ɑ thom thøm-ɑ cwɑggi gen ying mɑl, ge ɑ́kwɑny-ɑ Dhekɑriyɑ̀, Yɑɑdhiel, Cemirɑmöth, Yekiel, Unì, Eliɑb, Mɑɑseiyɑ̀ kí Benɑiyɑ̀.
O kì kelli jøg-ɑ thom thøm-ɑ cwɑggi gen ying piny, ge ɑ́kwɑny-ɑ Mɑtithiyɑ̀, Elipeleu, Mikneiyɑ̀, Adhɑdhiyɑ̀. O kì kelli jøg-ɑ nyi kor Kengø, ge ɑ́kwɑny-ɑ Obed Edöm kí Yeiel.
Kɑ Kenɑniyɑ̀ kwɑny ɑ́ jɑngi jø gøl Leebì møg-ɑ bɑ bödhhi thøm, mɑ́ en ɑ luudø kì kelli gen.

Berekiyɑ̀, kí Elkɑnɑ̀, kí Obed Edöm, kí Yekiyɑ̀, bɑ gen ɑ ɑ́kwɑny o ge kor gen Sɑnduug Cigg. Cebɑniyɑ̀, Yöcɑpɑt, Nethɑnel, Amɑsɑy, Dhekɑriyɑ̀, Benɑiyɑ̀, kí Eliedher, bene gen ókwërr-ɑ ɑ́kwɑny o ge nyi kodh gen kɑ̈ngì kì bøli Sɑnduug Cigg.
Adhwödh Rɑ̈dh Debïd geki jɑggi Isrɑil, kí pëjji liny, kɑ ge kedh-ɑ gøl Obed Edöm be kɑ̈ɑ̈li Sɑnduug Cigg, kɑ ge otugø ki mendwøng.
Kɑ ge ongɑ̈dø ki wɑ̈dhh ɑ́bïryew kí órömm ɑ́bïryew gɑ gëdhhì, kipe kinni o Kwɑrri Leebì møg-ɑ byelli Sɑnduug Cigg ókøny yi Jwøk.

Debïd ɑ́bëëd e rug-ɑ ógødh men-ɑ ócwɑ̈jø ki kor-ɑ yöm geki bödhhi thøm, kí Kenɑniyɑ̀ jɑngi gen, geki Kwɑrri Leebì møg-ɑ byelli Sɑnduug Cigg. Debïd ɑ́bëëd e orugø thyew ki pɑri kwër men-ɑ ócwɑ̈jø ki kor-ɑ yöm.
Akɑ̈ɑ̈l Sɑnduug Ciggi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j Yerusɑlem yi tyëng Isrɑil, ge óryeerø ki medi pëthi gen, kɑ̈ngì okodhø, bullì opwödø, o thøm othomø.
Keny-ɑ ɑ́wɑ̈nhi Sɑnduug Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kɑɑl, kɑ Mikɑl nyɑɑr Cɑul ómëddø kì ɑwɑj, ɑlidhe Rɑ̈dh Debïd, e óyëggø pyëwe omedø, kɑ gø byenye ki pyëwe.
Akïdhi gen Sɑnduug Cigg yij kem-ɑ ɑ́gurrii yi Debïd. Codhe ɑgeedh Jwøk ki gëdhh-ɑ nyi rɑ̈b geki gëdhhi mër.
Keny-ɑ ɑ́rum Debïd ki muuji gëdhhì, ɑkwënge ji ki nyingi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j.
Anënge teen-ɑ ɑ́ying kenyɑni; cwøw kí mɑ̈nn; ngɑn mëgg-ɑ ópun kí nyɑ ɑ́tungi rïngø ɑ́kyel, kí ópùni benø.
Akɑ̈bbi Debïd ki kwï Kwɑrri Leebì møg nyi mɑlli Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, Jwøøg Isrɑil, kì bøli Sɑnduug Cigg ki wör, o gø nyi lejji gen.
Akwɑɑny Asɑp ɑ́ jɑgø, kí Dhekɑriyɑ̀ ɑ́ ókwøme. O Yeiel, kí Cemirɑmöth, kí Yekiel, kí Mɑtithiyɑ̀, kí Eliɑb, kí Benɑiyɑ̀, kí Obed Edöm, kí Yeiel gen ɑ thom thøm, O kɑng-ɑ kwɑ̈ɑ̈n nyi kodh-ɑ yi Asɑp.
O kɑ̈ngì nyi kodh-ɑ yi ókwër ɑ́ryew, ɑ løg Benɑiyɑ̀ geki Yɑɑdhiel kì bøli Sɑnduug Cigg.
Cyɑ̈ngɑni ɑ ɑ́kwɑɑny Asɑp geki Kwɑrri Leebì møg-ɑ kyeelø, o ge nyi lenhi gen Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j.
Pøjju Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, kɑ dönge lejji wun
köbbu pödhh bënn ki gïg-ɑ ɑ́gøgge.
Wör wun wu lejj-ɑ en
kwøbu gïïngɑ̈ngø møg-ɑ ɑ́gøgge.
Med pëthi wun mɑ́ wɑ bɑ møge
wiy pëthi tyëng-ɑ mɑllii mïni gen.
Kedhu yï Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j o wu kønye,
kɑ nyi mɑlli wun ceth.
Wu kwɑrri Yɑgob bɑ̈ng Jwøk,
wu kwɑrri Isrɑil, jɑl-ɑ ɑ́myeg yi Jwøk,
pɑru gïïngɑ̈ngø møg-ɑ ɑ́gøggi yi Jwøk,
geki cigg-ɑ ɑ́muuje.
Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j bɑ Jwøgee,
Cigge bɑ kipe kömi piny bëne.
Wɑ̈thi wun ko wïl ki lwömi Jwøk,
eni lwöm-ɑ ɑ́gwøge ɑ́ men gïti ɑtheer.
gen ɑ møg-ɑ ɑ́könge Isɑɑk.
ge ɑ́lwööb ki Isrɑil ki lwöm-ɑ gïti ɑtheer,
Gø ɑ́köbbe kinni, “Yï ómëggɑ piny Kɑnɑɑn,
pinyɑni óbëëd ɑ́ mií.”
Kwɑnni jii Jwøk ɑ́bëëd ge nøg,
ge ɑ́bëëd gɑ tyëngpɑth kì piny Kɑnɑɑn.
Ge ɑ́wïïn kì yethi pödhh,
ge nyii dhwödhø kì pönhï kí pönhï.
kɑ rɑ̈nhì nyi ceg kinni kor ge gïn:
“Tyëng-ɑ ɑ́yienyɑ gɑ bɑ̈nggɑ ko göggi wun ki gïgrijjø,
tyëngtöng møgɑ ko nywɑl wun.”
Lejjí Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j ki wör, yïn ɑ kömi piny bëne!
Kømmu kwøbbi yïëne yethi cyɑ̈ng bënn.
Köbbu pödhh kwøbbi dhwɑ̈nge,
kí gïgdøngø møg-ɑ ɑ́gögge jie!
Mɑ́ Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j dwøng, o ceg kɑ lenhø,
o ceg kɑ wørø kibøli jwögg bënn.
Jwöggi pödhh-ɑ kyeelø bënn bɑ ngïjji yøw,
dɑ́ Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j ɑ ɑ́gwøg mɑl.
Dhwɑ̈ng geki döng ying-ɑ bɑdhhe,
Kenge pɑ̈ngø yi tegø geki medi pyëw.
Lejju Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, wun ɑ tyëng kömi piny bënn,
lejju dönge geki tege.
Lejju dhwɑ̈ɑ̈ng Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j,
kɑ̈ni wun ki gëdhhì, kɑ wu bïu bøle.
Dwöög wun köthi wun piny, kì bøli Ákyel-ɑ bɑ Kwërø keny-ɑ ócwöbe.
Kömi piny bëne, okïïrø kì bøle!
Piny ɑ́cïbe keje e pɑ nhɑ̈nhø, o pɑ cuggi ki nyigø.
Mïni pëthi wun, wun ɑ mɑl kí piny!
Köbbu pödhh bënn kinni, “Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j bɑ rɑ̈dh.”
Wiy nɑɑm omelø ngɑ̈rre geki lɑ̈yy-ɑ yije bënn,
mïni pyëw thïm geki gïg-ɑ yije bënn!
Codhe o yenh kïïw gen kì yij thïm ki medi pëthi gen,
keny-ɑ óbëën Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j be jɑɑgi kömi piny.
mɑ̈ɑ̈dø mee gït-ɑ ɑtheer.
Köbbu en kinni, “Yiel wøn, yïn ɑ Jwøk yïëni wøn,
cøng wøn kej ɑ́kyel, kɑ wø yieel kì cinggi pödhh-ɑ kyeelø,
o yï pwøj yi wøn,
o nyingí kwërø lejji.”
Lejju Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, Jwøøg Isrɑil!
Lejju en ɑnɑn gïti ɑtheer!
Kɑ ji bënn okööbø kinni, “Amen” kɑ Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j lenhi gen.
Acïb Asɑp geki wɑdde Kwɑrri Leebì yi Debïd gɑ tyëng-ɑ nyi lɑ̈mø kì bøli Sɑnduug Lwömi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kì keny-ɑ ɑ́mïdhii. O gwøøg gen nyi gwøg yi gen yethi cyɑ̈ng.
Ge nyi køny-ɑ yi Obed Edöm wɑ̈d Yeduthun geki jø gøl gen mø kwɑnni gen bɑ pyɑ̈r ɑ́bïkyel wïdɑ́bïdɑ̈g. Ösɑ̀ geki Obed Edöm ɑ ɑ́jɑɑg tyëng-ɑ kor dhøggi döri kɑɑl.
Dhɑdök geki wɑdde ókwër ɑ nyi mɑlli Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kì kej mɑ̈ddø kì Gibeon.
Kì yethi cyɑ̈ng kì mwøl kí böörø, ɑ nyi rɑ̈ɑ̈b gëdhhì bënn kì wïj këli lɑm ni kɑ ógwedii kì yethi cigg-ɑ ɑ́mëggi tyëng Isrɑil yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j.
Ëmɑn geki Yeduthun ɑ́bëëd ge nud geki ji-ɑ ɑ́kwɑny o ge nyi lejji gen Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j ki wör, kipe mɑ̈ɑ̈dø mee men-ɑ gïti ɑtheer.
Thyew Ëmɑn geki Yeduthun ɑ ɑ́jɑɑg thømi wörri lejji Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j. Tyëng gøl yɑɑ Yeduthun ɑ ɑ́jɑɑg tyëng-ɑ korri dhøggi döri kɑɑl.
Rɑ̈dh Debïd ɑ́bëëd e ying-ɑ gøle, ɑöde yï jɑltöng Nɑthɑn. Keny-ɑ ɑ́bëëne ɑköbbe gøn kinni, “Yɑ bëëd ɑ ød mɑ ɑger ki sɑndɑl, yɑnh-ɑ myëër kì keny, de Sɑnduug Ciggi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j mïdh ɑ yij kemɑ̀!”
Alöggi Nɑthɑn kinni, “Gwøg gïn-ɑ rømmi yi yïn, mɑ́ yï ókøny yi Jwøk.”
De Nɑthɑn ɑ́köbbi yi Jwøk kì wɑ̈rɑni kinni,
“Kedh kɑ kwøbbɑ köbbí Debïd bɑ̈ngɑ kinni, ‘Pɑth ki en ɑ ger Kengø men-ɑ yije bëëdɑ.
Yɑ nuti bëëdø kì yij Kengø kinni tek, kër-ɑ ɑ́kɑ̈ɑ̈lɑ tyëng Isrɑil wɑ̈g kì Rïp gïti ɑnɑn. Yɑ nyi bëëd ɑ yethi kemmì, kɑ yɑ nyi cyɑ̈g-ɑ keny kí keny.
Kì yij wɑ̈nh-ɑ ɑ́cɑɑdhɑ bëne kí tyëng Isrɑil, bong dhɑnhø mɑ ɑ́pɑ̈nyɑ pyëjø, kì kelli jɑgg-ɑ ɑ́kwɑny yi yɑn kinni, ɑ́ kipe ngø ɑ pɑ gëddí yɑn ki Kengø men-ɑ ógerø ki sɑndɑl yɑnh-ɑ myëër.’
“De köbbí bɑ̈ngɑ Debïd kinni, ‘Yɑn yɑ Wïlɑ̈bø, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, bong gïn dhɑl yɑn kinni tek. Yï ɑ́kwɑny yi yɑn, yï kwɑy-ɑ dyëg kì pɑ̈l, kɑ yï kwɑnyɑ yïn ɑ́ jɑngi tyëng Isrɑil.
Yɑ ɑ́bëëd yɑ nud kì butí, kì kɑ̈jj-ɑ ɑ́kedhí, kɑ tyëngmɑ̈ɑ̈nø bënn tyɑmɑ. Nyingí ɑ́tïngɑ mɑl ni nyingi tyëng-ɑ per gen teg, kí jɑgg-ɑ døngø kì kömi piny.

Yɑ ɑ́mëggi ki keny cïbɑ jiɑ, tyëng Isrɑil, kí keny-ɑ óbëëd gen nyingi gen pɑ guud këti. Kömi gen ɑ́bëëd e nyi ceg kɑ pɑ̈ɑ̈rø yi tyëngrijjø kër-ɑ ɑ́bëën gen piny men, de gïn ni menɑni koo cwöb këti, yɑ ɑ́kööb kinni tyëngmɑ̈ɑ̈nø ótyɑm yi yɑn, kɑ wu nëngɑ ki kwɑrr.
Keny-ɑ óthumi cyɑ̈nggí kɑ yï kedh-ɑ kun-ɑ di kweyyí, dhɑnhø ɑ́kyel kì kelli wɑ̈ddí ógwøgɑ ɑ́ rɑ̈dh, o pödhø ómïdhi yi en e teeg.
Bene en ɑ ógëddi yɑn ki Kengø, o rɑ̈ɑ̈dhø mee ómïdhi yi yɑn gïti ɑtheer.
Yɑ óbëëd yɑn ɑ́ wïye, o óbëëd ɑ́ wɑ̈dɑ, pɑ wiy yi yɑn ki kønyø ni kɑ ɑ́wiyɑ Cɑul, ngɑn-ɑ ɑ́bɑny yi yɑn kɑ yï cïbɑ keje.
Ócïb yi yɑn ɑ́ jɑngi jiɑ geki pödhɑ gïti ɑtheer, rɑ̈ɑ̈dhø mee óbong cöge gïti ɑtheer.’ ”
Kɑ Debïd köbbi yi Nɑthɑn ki gïg-ɑ ɑ́köbbii yi Jwøk bënn.
Codhe, ɑkedhi Rɑ̈dh Debïd yij Kemi Wë, ɑpëgge piny kì bøli Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, kɑ ókwɑ̈jjø kinni, “Yɑn ɑ́ men Yïn ɑ Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j? O gøl wøn ɑ́ ngø, ɑ göggí yɑn ki gïndøj ni men?
Anɑn yï nudd yï ogöögø ki mø gïïr, yï ɑ́kööb kipe kwɑrrɑ kì yethi runn møøgø møg-ɑ óbï, o yïn ɑ Jwøk, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, yɑ ɑ́mïdhi yi yïn ni dhɑnhø me dwøng.
Á ngø këti ɑ cuggi köbbi yïn yi yɑn! Yɑ ngɑ̈nyi yi yïn kidøøj, de yɑ ɑ́theg yi yïn ceth yɑn ɑ bɑ̈ngí.
Bɑ gïn-ɑ ɑ́dwɑddi yi yïn ɑ ɑ́göggí yɑn, kɑ yɑ nyudhí møg-ɑ ócwöb kipe gølɑ dhuki megø.
Yïn ɑ Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, bong ngɑn ni yïn, ngɑ̈nyi yi wøn kinni yï ketí ɑ bɑ Jwøk.
Bong pödhø me ni Isrɑil kì kömi piny, mɑ́ ge ɑ́yiel yi yïn kì yij bɑ̈ɑ̈ngø kì Rïp, kɑ ge gwøg yi yïn gɑ jií. Kɑ nyingí tɑɑy-ɑ kömi piny bëne, kiper gïgdøngø kí gïïngɑ̈ngø møg-ɑ ɑ́göggí gen.
Tyëng Isrɑil ɑ́gwøg yi yïn gɑ jií gïti ɑtheer, o yïn, yï Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j ɑ bɑ Jwøøg gen.
“Anɑn yïn ɑ Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, gwøg møg-ɑ ɑ́köbbí yɑn bënn kinni, ge ógöggí yɑn wøki kwɑrrɑ, kɑ wiy møg-ɑ ɑ́kwøb yi yïn pɑ̈dhi gen kɑ̈jji gen.
Perí ólïngi, kɑ ji nyii kööbø kinni, ‘Áyïmø, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j bene Jwøøg Isrɑil.’ O lɑ̈gi gøl bɑ̈ngí Debïd ómïdhi yi yïn gïti ɑtheer.
Pyëwɑ ɑ́ceg yi yɑn kɑ cwedø, ɑkwɑjjɑ møg kì bølí, yïn ɑ Jwøgɑ, mɑ́ yɑ ɑ́yɑ̈llí møgɑni bënn, yɑn ɑ bɑ̈ngí. Kɑ yɑ köbbí kinni kwɑrrɑ óbëëd gɑ rɑ̈nhì.
Yïn ɑ Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, yï bɑ Jwøk kidyër, mɑ́ gïgdøj møgɑni ɑ́köbbí yɑn.
Yɑ kwɑjj-ɑ yïn, gyëdh gølɑ, o ócöge e døj ceth. Ge ɑ́gyëdh yi yïn, yïn ɑ Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, o gyëdhhí møgɑni óbëëdø kì kömi gen ceth gïti ɑtheer.”
Kì bɑng keny me nøg, kɑ Rɑ̈dh Debïd pɑ̈ɑ̈r-ɑ kömi tyëng Pelistiyɑ̀, kɑ gï tyɑme. Akwɑnye Gɑth geki myërr-ɑ bute kì cinggi tyëng Pelistiyɑ̀.
Thyew, kɑ tyëng Moɑb tyɑme, kɑ gï jɑɑge, kɑ nyi cudi yi gen ki gwɑ̈j.
Kɑ Debïd pɑ̈ɑ̈r-ɑ kömi Rɑ̈dh Adɑdedher rɑ̈ɑ̈dh Dhöbɑ̀ kì buti Amɑth, mɑ́ Adɑdedher ɑ́dwɑdd-ɑ mɑgi myërri kwøøm-ɑ kömi Nɑm Porɑt.
Kɑ Debïd ómɑ̈gø ki yɑ̈thi liny gɑ ɑ́lïp, kí jøkyënyì gɑ ɑ́lïp ɑ́bïryew, kí jøliny tyel ɑ́lïp pyɑ̈r ɑ́ryew. Akɑ̈bbe ki kyënyì møg pyëjji ki yɑ̈ɑ̈th miyø, kɑ rɑ̈rri tyelli kyëny-ɑ ɑ́döng bënn kebbe.
Keny-ɑ ɑ́öni tyëng Arɑm kì Dimɑceg ki jøliny mø køny Rɑ̈dh Adɑdedher, ɑpɑ̈ɑ̈r Debïd kömi linyɑni, kɑ ɑ́lïp pyɑ̈r ɑ́ryew wïdɑ́ryew nɑ̈ge,
Codhe, ɑgud Debïd ki kɑɑl kì yij piny gen, kɑ gï jɑɑge kɑ cudi ki gwɑ̈j yi gen. Debïd ɑ́wëggi tyɑ̈mø yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kì kɑ̈jj-ɑ ɑ́nyïɑ̈gge bënn.
Kɑ köddi dhɑb møg-ɑ ɑ́kɑ̈lli yi jøliny Adɑdedher mɑg yi Debïd, kɑ gï kïdhe Yerusɑlem.

Thyew ɑ́kɑ̈bbi ki ngyënyø dilɑl me gïïr cɑrø kì Tibɑ̈ɑ̈th kí Kun, gen ɑ kɑ̈dd-ɑ døngø møg-ɑ ɑ́jɑɑg yi Adɑdedher. (Dilɑlɑni ɑ ɑ́göög yi Sølømøn ki luy dilɑl, kí löjj, kí jɑmm-ɑ ɑ́gwøg ki dilɑl gɑ mø Kengø.)
Keny-ɑ ɑ́lïng Töì rɑ̈ɑ̈dh Amɑth kinni liny Adɑdedher bëne ótyɑmø yi Debïd,

ɑöre wɑ̈de Yörɑm be mɑ̈dhi Rɑ̈dh Debïd, o gø pwøje kipe kɑ ɑ́tyɑme Adɑdedher. Adɑdedher ɑ́bëëd ge nyi ceg-ɑ nyïɑ̈ggø ki Töì tyel mø gïïr. Kɑ Debïd muuj yi Töì ki gïg møg-ɑ ógwøgø ki ɑ́tegø, kí dilɑl, kí dhɑb gɑ møg pwøje Debïd.
Kɑ jɑmmɑni thyey yi Debïd gɑ mø kwër, geki ngyëny ɑ́tegg, kí dhɑb men-ɑ ɑ́kɑ̈ɑ̈le kì pödhh-ɑ ɑ́mɑge, ɑ løg Edöm, kí Moɑb, kí Amön, kí Pelistiyɑ̀, kí Amɑlek.
Tyëng Edöm gɑ ɑ́lïp pyɑ̈rø wïdɑ́bïdɑ̈g ɑ́nɑ̈g yi Abicɑy wɑ̈d Dheruyɑ̀ kì Töör Omelø.
Agudde yij piny Edöm, kɑ tyëng-ɑ pönhɑni ogöögø ki bɑ̈nggi Rɑ̈dh Debïd. Kɑ Debïd nyi wëggi tyɑ̈mø yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kì kɑ̈jj-ɑ nyi kedhe bënn.
Codhe, kɑ Isrɑil bëne jɑɑg yi Debïd, jie ɑ́jɑɑge kidøøj.
Yöɑb ómï Abicɑy ɑ bɑ pënyi liny, Yöcɑpɑt wɑ̈d Akilud ɑ bɑ 'mïdhi wɑ̈j,
Dhɑdök wɑ̈d Akitub geki Akimelek wɑ̈d Abiyɑthɑr ɑ bɑ ókwër, Serɑiyɑ̀ ɑ́bëëd ɑ́ sikriter.
Benɑiyɑ̀ wɑ̈d Yöyɑdɑ̀ ɑ ɑ́jɑɑg jøg-ɑ kor Debïd, o wɑ̈ddi Rɑ̈dh Debïd ɑ́mïdh-ɑ lɑ̈ww-ɑ døngø kì yij pödhø.
Kì bɑng keny megø piny kɑ̈ɑ̈l kun, ɑthøw Nɑkɑc rɑ̈ɑ̈dh Amön, ɑrøøny Anun wɑ̈de ɑ́ rɑ̈dh.
Akööb Rɑ̈dh Debïd kinni, “Yɑ dwɑdd-ɑ göggi Anun ki gïndøj ni kɑ ɑ́göggi yɑn yi wïye Nɑkɑc ki gïndøj.” Codhe, kɑ Debïd oödø ki tyëngwöödø møg kedhi be këëmii ki thøwi wïye.
Kɑ tyëng-ɑ ɑ́ör yi Debïd wɑ̈dh-ɑ yï Rɑ̈dh Anun kì pödhi Amön,
Aköbbi rɑ̈dh yi jɑggi tyëng Amön kinni, “Yï orumø kinni bɑ kipe wøri wïyí, ɑ ɑ́ör jøg be këëmi yïn yi Debïd? Pɑth! Gï ɑ́öre gɑ lyëwwì møg lyewwi piny, kipe kinni, o gø mɑge ki liny.”
Kɑ tyëngwöödø mø Debïd mɑg yi Anun, kɑ yëyyi tïggi gïn lyele, kɑ ógudhi gïn ruude kì thɑ̈thi gen, kɑ gï öre yöö.
Wɑ̈thi jøgɑni ɑ́lɑ̈ɑ̈y ki mendwøng, kɑ ge ódhɑ̈lø døøg myërri gen. Keny-ɑ ɑ́lïngi møgɑni yi Debïd, ɑöde yï gen kinni, bëëd gen kì Yerikö, kɑ ge ko dwöög gïti keny-ɑ ódøøg yëyyi tïggi gen ki døngø.

Kɑ yod yi Rɑ̈dh Anun geki tyëng Amön kinni, Debïd ɑ́gwøge ɑ́ ngetimɑ̈ɑ̈nø. Codhe, kɑ ge ocudø ki ngyëny ɑ́tegg gɑ kïllì ɑ́lïp pyɑ̈r ɑ́dɑ̈g wïdɑ́ngwen, møg kïr yɑ̈ɑ̈th kí tyëng-ɑ kwølli gen kì Mesøpøtɑmiyɑ̀. Kí myërri Arɑm, ɑ løg Mɑɑkɑ̀, kí Dhöbɑ̀.
Ge ɑ́kïr ki yɑ̈ɑ̈th ɑ́lïp pyɑ̈r ɑ́dɑ̈g wïdɑ́ryew, kɑ rɑ̈ɑ̈dh Mɑɑkɑ̀ kïr yi gen geki jølinye, kɑ ge obëënø, ɑguddi gen bøli Medebɑ̀. Kɑ tyëng Amön bï-ɑ wɑ̈g kì yethi kɑ̈ddi gen, kɑ ge kedh-ɑ be liny.
Keny-ɑ ɑ́lïngi møgɑni yi Debïd, ɑöre Yöɑb geki linye bëne.
Tyëng Amön ɑ́kedhi wɑ̈g, kɑ ge pëgg-ɑ dhø döri Rɑbɑ̀ kɑɑl gen, kɑ rɑ̈nhh-ɑ ɑ́bï be kunyø ki liny pëgg-ɑ kuni pɑ̈l.
Keny-ɑ ɑ́lidhii yi Yöɑb kinni tyëngmɑ̈ɑ̈nø nud kì bøle kí ngɑ̈je, ɑyïënye ki jödd mø teg, kɑ gï cïbe tung-ɑ rwöm ki tyëng Arɑm.
Kɑ jølinye møg-ɑ kyeelø mëgge ómen Abicɑy o gï pyejje, ɑcïbe gïn ge rwöm ki tyëng Amön.
Aköbbii yi Yöɑb kinni, “Keløg e ólidh yi yïn kinni yɑ køm-ɑ tyɑmø yi tyëng Arɑm, kɑ yï bïí be kønyi yɑn, de keløg ɑ́ yïn ɑ ótyɑm yi tyëng Amön, yɑ óbï be kønyi yïn.
Bëëd yï teeg kɑ yï ko böggi! Ti wɑ nyɑɑg ki menteg, kipe jiee, kí kɑ̈ddi Jwøgee. Kɑ wiy Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j gwøge gïn-ɑ døj kì yïe.”
Codhe, kɑ Yöɑb geki jøge kedh-ɑ be pɑ̈ɑ̈r kömi tyëng Arɑm. Kɑ tyëngɑni órengø
Keny-ɑ ɑ́liidh tyëng Arɑm ge órengø yi tyëng Amön, ɑbwøg gen yi Abicɑy, kɑ ge reng-ɑ yij kɑɑl gen. Codhe kɑ Yöɑb døøg-ɑ Yerusɑlem.

Áyod yi tyëng Arɑm kinni ge bɑ møg tyɑm yi tyëng Isrɑil. Codhe, ɑkɑ̈ni gen ki jøliny kì kɑ̈ddi tyëng Arɑm møg-ɑ wɑɑng cyɑ̈ɑ̈ng mwøl kì løøg Nɑm Porɑt, o ge pyejji yi Cöbɑk pënyi liny Adɑdedher rɑ̈ɑ̈dh Dhöbɑ̀.
Keny-ɑ ɑ́lïngi møgɑni yi Debïd, ɑcønge jøliny Isrɑil, kɑ Nɑm Urdun bɑ̈ɑ̈n gen, ɑcïbe gïn ge rwöm ki tyëng Arɑm. Kɑ liny ócɑ̈gø,
ɑnyɑɑn liny Arɑm cyɑ̈n yi liny Isrɑil, kɑ Debïd geki jøge ónɑ̈ggø ki jøliny yɑ̈ɑ̈th gɑ ɑ́lïp ɑ́bïryew, kí jøliny tyel gɑ ɑ́lïp pyɑ̈r ɑ́ngwen. Cöbɑk pënyi liny Arɑm, ɑ́nɑ̈g yi gen thyew.
Keny-ɑ ɑ́lïdhi pödhh-ɑ jɑɑg yi Rɑ̈dh Adɑdedher, kinni ge ɑ́tyɑm yi Isrɑil, ɑgöög gen ge mër ki Debïd, kɑ ge ogöögø gɑ jie. Kɑ tyëng Arɑm døøg-ɑ be bɑ̈nyø ki kønyi tyëng Amön ki liny.

Ngïji Mölek, jwøøg tyëng Amön yïe ɑ́dɑ yɑ̈ɑ̈r dhɑb, me pege bɑ gïn ni kïllì pyɑ̈r ɑ́dɑ̈g wïdɑ́ngwen, ree ɑ́dɑ tigø me pere teeg, ɑkwɑɑny tingɑni yi Debïd kɑ gø kïdhe ri yɑ̈ɑ̈r wïje. Ákɑ̈bbi thyew ki jɑmm-ɑ ɑ́kɑb mø gïïr kì kɑɑldwøng.
Tyëng kɑɑldwøng ɑ́kwɑnye, kɑ gï mëgge gwøøg mocɑrr, kí kwërrì, kí dørrì. Gïg ni møgɑni ɑ́gögge tyëng kɑ̈ddi Amön møg-ɑ kyeelø bënn. Codhe, ɑdøøge Yerusɑlem geki jøge.
Kì bɑng keny megø, kɑ liny døøg-ɑ mɑl ki tyëng Pelistiyɑ̀ kì Gedher. Kenyɑni ɑ ɑ́nɑ̈ɑ̈g jöd me cwøl ɑ́ Sipɑy yi Sibekɑy jɑl Ucɑ̀. Kɑ tyëng Pelistiyɑ̀ tyɑm.
Liny-ɑ kyeelø ɑ́nyïɑ̈g ɑ Gɑth, ɑ́dɑ jöd me lweddi cingge bɑ ɑ́bïkyel, ɑ cingï kí cingï. O lweddi tyelle bɑ ɑ́bïkyel ɑ tyelï kí tyelï. Jɑlɑni bɑ kwɑɑr jödd-ɑ ócyɑ̈ɑ̈ngi.
Tyëng Isrɑil ɑ́lɑrre, kɑ nɑ̈g yi Yönɑthɑn wɑ̈d Cɑmɑ̀ ómï Debïd.
Jøg-ɑ ɑ́nɑ̈g gɑ ɑ́dɑ̈g yi Debïd geki jøge, ɑ́bëëd gɑ kwɑrri jödd kì Gɑth.
Cethɑn ɑ́dwɑdd-ɑ kɑ̈ni kömi Isrɑil ki rɑj. Codhe, kɑ Debïd wëgge kwɑni tyëng Isrɑil.
Amëggi cigg Yöɑb geki pëjji liny møg-ɑ kyeelø yi Debïd kinni, “Kedhu kelli Isrɑil, cɑg kì wïj tuung pödhø gïti wïj tung-ɑ kyeelø, kɑ ji kwɑn wun. Yɑ dwɑdd-ɑ yodi kwɑnni gen.”

Alöggi Yöɑb kinni, “Wiy kwɑnni tyëng Isrɑil med yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j ki tyel miy mø ngenyø, kibøli kwɑnni gen møg-ɑ nud ɑnɑn! Ge bɑ bɑ̈nggí bënn wuö. Á kipe ngø ɑ dwɑddí gwøg ki gïn ni men, o pödhø bëne wëggí bɑ̈jjø?”
De rɑ̈dh ɑ́kööb ce lïngi cigge yi Yöɑb, ɑkedhe kɑ ócyɑ̈dhø e kwɑn-ɑ ji kì yij pödhi Isrɑil bëne. Codhe, ɑdwööge Yerusɑlem.
Adwöggi møgɑni Rɑ̈dh Debïd kinni kwɑnni jøg-ɑ cuggi nyɑɑg ki liny kì Isrɑil bɑ mïlyön ɑ́kyel kí ɑ́lïp miyø (1,100,000). Kí ɑ́lïp miy ɑ́ngwen kí pyɑ̈r ɑ́bïryew (470,000) kì Yeudiyɑ̀.
Mɑ́ ciggi rɑ̈dh nuti yïëyø yi Yöɑb, gøl Leebì geki gøl Ben Yɑmïn nuti kwɑɑn en.
Jwøk ɑ́bëëd pyëwe pɑ med ki gïn-ɑ ɑ́gwøg. Codhe, ɑcɑye Isrɑil.
Aköbbi Jwøk yi Debïd kinni, “Yɑ ɑ́bɑ̈jji ki bɑ̈jjø me dwøng kɑ ɑ́göögɑ ki gïn ni men! Wuö dwöög lɑɑwí piny kiperɑ, mɑ́ yɑ ɑ́göög-ɑ nøgi wïjɑ.”
Aköbbi Gɑd jɑltööng Debïd yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kinni,
“Kedh kɑ Debïd köbbí kinni ödɑ’ ödø ki jɑmmì ɑ́dɑ̈g møg kelli gen kɑ̈bbi yi en, men-ɑ ókwɑny yi en, ɑ ógöggɑ en.”
Akedhi Gɑd yï Debïd, kɑ gø köbbe møg-ɑ ɑ́kwøb yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j. Apëjje kinni, “Yï kwɑny-ɑ men-ɑ́?

Runn ɑ́dɑ̈g mø kɑ̈j? Wɑlɑ̀ dwɑ̈tt ɑ́dɑ̈g wu ocyeddø yi liny tyëng-ɑ mɑ̈n ki wun? Wɑlɑ̀ cyɑ̈ng ɑ́dɑ̈g møg-ɑ pɑ̈ɑ̈r kömi wun yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, o yømø nɑ̈ɑ̈g gøøje kömi pödhi wun, keny-ɑ óöre wëywöne be kɑ̈ɑ̈li thøø kömi Isrɑil? Á ngø ɑ kwɑny yi yïn, o wöödø döggɑ Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j?”
Aløøg mø Gɑd yi Debïd kinni, “Yɑ ying-ɑ yij orɑng me teg! De yɑ pɑ dwɑddi cɑyø yi dhɑnhø, wiy bëëde ɑ́ Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kete ɑ cɑy yɑn, mɑ́ pyëwe nyii lɑ̈ɑ̈mø.”
Codhe, kɑ Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j yømø nɑ̈ɑ̈g gøøje kömi tyëng Isrɑil, ɑthøw ji ɑ́lïp pyɑ̈r ɑ́bïryew kì kelli gen.

Kɑ Jwøk óönø ki wëywödø me nɑ̈g Yerusɑlem, de rumme ɑ́wile, ɑköbbe wëywönɑni kinni, “Árum! Møg gïïr!” Wëywöni Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j ɑ́bëëd e ócungø kì buti rɑr-ɑ nyi pwööd gemè kì pwödhi Arɑunɑ̀, wɑ̈d Yebus.
Wëywödø ɑ́lidh yi Debïd kì yij yømø, e ómïdhø ki pilø kì cinge, gø tiim en kipe nɑ̈gi Yerusɑlem. Codhe, kɑ Debïd geki jøgdøngø ge rug-ɑ ocwɑ̈llì, wɑ̈thi gen kuul gen piny e bøli gen nywɑll-ɑ lɑ̈bø.
Akwɑ̈jji Debïd kinni, “Wuö Jwøk, bɑ yɑn ɑ ɑ́bɑ̈jji. Yɑn ɑ ɑ́kööb kinni kwɑɑn ji. Á ngø ɑ ɑ́gwøg yi tyëng-ɑ yï gen bɑ̈r ek? Yïn ɑ Jwøgɑ, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, cɑy yɑn wøki gølɑ, kɑ jií wiy.”
Aköbbi Gɑd yi wëywöni Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kinni, “Köbbí Debïd kinni, kedhe kɑ Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j gëdde ki këli lɑm kì pwödhi Arɑunɑ̀ kì yij rɑr-ɑ nyi pwööd gemè.”
Kwøbbi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j ɑ́lïngi yi Debïd, ɑkedhe ni kɑ ɑ́köbbii yi Gɑd.
Arɑunɑ̀ ɑ́bëëd e opödø ki gemè geki wɑ̈dde ɑ́ngwen, kì rɑri pwödi gemè, keny-ɑ ɑ́lidh gen wëywödø, ɑrengi wɑ̈dde kɑ ge ópɑ̈nø.
Keny-ɑ ɑ́liidh Rɑ̈dh Debïd e ócyɑ̈ngø yi Arɑunɑ̀, ɑnyege kì yij rɑrø, kɑ óbuddø yije rum en piny, e bøle nywɑll-ɑ lɑ̈bø.
Aköbbii yi Debïd kinni, “Ngëwwí yɑn rɑrí, o Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j gëddɑ ki këli lɑm kì yije, o yømø nɑ̈ɑ̈g cuunge. Gïn-ɑ ngeewii ómëggɑ yïn bëne.”

Kɑ Arɑunɑ̀ okööbø kinni, “Kwɑɑny! Kɑ yï göög ki gïn-ɑ dwɑddi yi yïn. Kwɑny wɑ̈dhh thyew, kɑ ge ngɑɑl gɑ gëdhhì møg rɑ̈b kì wïj këli Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, kɑ lødhi pöd møg cwɑɑg gɑ yugg. Kɑ gemè men muuj ɑ́ gëëdhi, ge ɑ́mëggɑ yïn bënn.”
Codhe, ɑlöggi rɑ̈dh kinni, “Pɑth, yï ómëggɑ gïn-ɑ ngeewii bëne. Gïí pɑ cuggi mëggi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j yi yɑn ɑ́ gëëdhi, mɑ́ keløg ɑ́ gïi ngɑn megø ɑ mëggɑ Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, ɑ́ ngø ɑ ɑ́muujɑ!”
Acude Arɑunɑ̀ ki ngyënyyi dhɑb miy ɑ́bïkyel, gɑ møg ngeew rɑri gemè mee.

Agëddi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j yi Debïd ki këli lɑm kì kenyɑni, ɑmuuje ki gënh-ɑ nyi rɑ̈b bëne, kí gënhi mër. Akwɑ̈jje, kɑ kwɑ̈jje yïëy yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, ɑöni Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j ki mɑc kì mɑl, men rɑ̈b gëdhhì kì wïj këli lɑm.
Aköbbi wëywödø yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kinni dwøøge pilø yij bøj. Kɑ gø dwøøge.
Kɑ yod yi Debïd kinni kwɑ̈jje ɑ́løøg yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j. Codhe, ɑmuuje ki gëdhhì kì wïj këli Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, kì rɑri gemè mi Arɑunɑ̀ jɑl Yebus.
Kì bøli kenyɑni Kemi Kwër men-ɑ ɑ́gur yi Mosɑ̀ kì yij ryɑng, kí kël-ɑ wïje nyi rɑ̈ɑ̈b gëdhhì, ge ɑ́bëëd ge nudd ge ying-ɑ Gibeon.
De Debïd nuti kedhi kunɑni be lɑm, mɑ́ e óböggø yi pili wëywöni Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j.
Codhe, ɑkööb Debïd kinni, “Kengi Jwøk, Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j óying-ɑ keny. Men bene këlø men-ɑ wïje ómuuj gënh-ɑ nyi rɑ̈b bëne yi tyëng Isrɑil.”
Kɑ tyëng-ɑ bɑ wëdhh kì Yerusɑlem köbbi yi Debïd kinni, cøng gen ri gen. Kɑ gï nënge ki gwøg. Kwï gen ɑ́tweg-ɑ ópɑddi kïttì møg geer Kengø.
Amuuje ki ngyënyø dødø me thɑ̈ɑ̈dh ki gedd kí mɑ̈gi møg gur thïg, kí ngyënyø dilɑl me ngenyø, me bong ngɑn cuggi rømii.
Tyëng Suur geki tyëng Sïdön ɑ́köbbe kinni kɑ̈ni gen ki yenh sɑndɑl mø ngenyø.

Arum Debïd kinni, “Kengø men-ɑ ógërri Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j yi wɑ̈dɑ Sølømøn óceg bëëdø e dwøng, o bɑ̈r. De bɑ othinh, o nuti dïdø, de yɑ ceg-ɑ jɑmm-ɑ gëëd ki gwirø.” Codhe, kɑ Debïd ocungø ki jɑmmì mø gïïr kɑ̈ng-ɑ́ nuti thøw en.
Acwööle wɑ̈de Sølømøn, kɑ gø köbbe kinni, gëdde Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, Jwøøg Isrɑil ki kengø.
Áköbbi yi Debïd kinni, “Wɑ̈dɑ, yɑ ɑ́dwɑdd-ɑ gyer ki kengø men pwøøj-ɑ Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, Jwøgɑ.
De yɑ ɑ́köbbi yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kinni yɑ ɑ́nɑ̈ɑ̈g ki ji mø gïïr cɑrø, kɑ yɑ ónyïɑ̈ggø ki liny mø døngø. Bene bɑnge mɑ̈ɑ̈ne yɑn gyer ki kengø, mɑ́ cingɑ dɑ rem mø gïïr.
Yɑ ɑ́köbbe kinni, ‘Yïí ódi wɑ̈d men-ɑ ójyɑ̈ɑ̈gø ki mër, mɑ́ e óthödhɑ ki mër ki tyëngmɑ̈ɑ̈nø bënn. Nyinge ócwøl ɑ́ Sølømøn,
Yɑ ógëdde ki kengø. Óbëëd ɑ́ wɑ̈dɑ, o yɑ óbëëdø yɑn ɑ́ wïye. Isrɑil ójɑɑg yi kwɑrre gïti ɑtheer.’ ”
Kɑ Debïd okööbø kinni, “Wɑ̈dɑ, yï ókøny yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, Jwøgí, dhøge ómïdhe o yï cuggi ki gëddii ki kengø.
O yï óthödhi yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, Jwøgí ki ngɑ̈nyi bëëdø, kí peli wïj men-ɑ ójɑɑg Isrɑil kì kömi cigge.
Møgɑni ócuggi, keløg cigg-ɑ ɑ́mëggi Mosɑ̀ yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j bënn ómïdhi yi yïn. Dyëëj, kɑ pyëwí bëëd e teeg, kɑ ko di gïn böggi yi yïn.

De keløg ɑ́ per geri Kengø, yɑ ɑ́cïbi piny ki dhɑb me wɑ̈dhi ri tøn ɑ́lïp ɑ́dɑ̈g kí miy ɑ́ngwen, kí ɑ́tegø me wɑ̈dhi ri tøn ɑ́lïp pyɑ̈r ɑ́dɑ̈g wïdɑ́ngwen, reb ki dilɑl geki ngyënyø dødø mø bong cögi gen. Yïɑ dɑ pɑ̈mmi gyer kí kïttì, de yï ceg-ɑ yɑ̈bbi kömi gen ceth.
Yïí dɑ jøgwøg mø gïïr, dɑ jøg mø twïgø ki kïtti gyer, kí bödhhi gyer, kí bödhhi yiedh ki pɑ̈mmì, kí bödhhi thɑ̈dh ki jɑmmì bënn,
kí dhɑb, kí ɑ́tegø, kí dilɑl, kí dødø. Cɑ̈gí ki gwøg, yï ókøny yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j.”
Kɑ jyɑ̈ggi Isrɑil bënn ceg yi Debïd kinni køny gen Sølømøn.
Gï ɑ́köbbe kinni, “Wu ókøny yi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, Jwøøg wun, kɑ wu thödhe ki mër kì wɑ̈thi tùng bënn. Yɑ ɑ́wëgge mɑgi tyëng-ɑ ɑ́bëëd kì piny men bënn, ɑnɑn ge bɑ jii wun, o ge bɑ jii Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j.
Anɑn göggu Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, Jwøøg wun ki pëthi wun, kí wëyi wun. Kɑ wu cɑ̈gi wun ki geri Kengø, kipe kinni, o Sɑnduug Ciggi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, kí jɑmmi kwër cïb yije.”
Acøng jɑggi Isrɑil bënn, kí ókwër bënn, kí Kwɑrri Leebì yi Rɑ̈dh Debïd
Akwɑne Kwɑrri Leebì møg-ɑ runni gen bɑ pyɑ̈r ɑ́dɑ̈g. Kwɑnni gen bɑ ɑ́lïp pyɑ̈r ɑ́dɑ̈g wïdɑ́bïdɑ̈g.
Kɑ gwøøg kori kengø mëggi ji ɑ́lïp pyɑ̈r ɑ́ryew wïdɑ́ngwen yi rɑ̈dh, o ɑ́lïp ɑ́bïkyel nyi mïdhi gen wɑ̈j geki nenni gønyy.
Kí ɑ́lïp ɑ́ngwen mø gwøøg gen bɑ kur, o ɑ́lïp ɑ́ngwen nyi lenhi gen Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j ki wör ki thøm møg-ɑ ɑ́muuj yi rɑ̈dh kipe gwøngɑni.
Kɑ Kwɑrri Leebì pɑ̈ngi yi Debïd gɑ ɑkudd ɑ́dɑ̈g, gɑ wɑ̈thi kɑ̈llì, gøl Gercön, kí gøl Kɑ̈ɑ̈th, kí gøl Merɑrì.
Gercön wɑ̈dde ɑ́ryew, ɑ løg Lɑdɑn, kí Cimeì.
Lɑdɑn wɑ̈dde bɑ ɑ́dɑ̈g, ɑ løg Yekiel, kí Dhethɑm, kí Yöiil,
gen ɑ ɑ́bëëd gɑ jɑggi gøl Lɑdɑn. (Cimeì wɑ̈dde ɑ́dɑ̈g, ɑ løg Celömöth, kí Adhiel, kí Arɑn.)
Wɑ̈ddi Cimeì bɑ ɑ́ngwen, ɑ løg Yɑɑth, kí Dhinɑ̀, kí Yeuc, kí Beriyɑ̀. Yeuc geki Beriyɑ̀ ɑ́bëëd kwɑrri gen nøg, bene ɑ reb gen gɑ kɑl ɑ́kyel.
Wɑ̈ddi Kɑ̈ɑ̈th bɑ ɑ́ngwen, ɑ løg Amrɑm, kí Idhɑr, kí Kibrön, kí Udhiel.

Wɑ̈de Amrɑm nyel-ɑ kɑyø ɑ bɑ wïyi Aɑron geki Mosɑ̀. (Aɑron geki kwɑrre ɑ́cïb wɑ̈yi gen gɑ jɑggi kwër, o ge nyi rɑ̈b gen bɑkur kenyi mɑlli Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, o ge göggi gen en, o ji nyi kwëng yi gen ki nyinge.
De kwɑrri Mosɑ̀ jɑlkwøbbi Jwøk ɑ́kwɑɑn-ɑ kelli Kwɑrri Leebì.)
Wɑ̈ddi Mosɑ̀ bɑ ɑ́ryew; Gercöm kí Eliedher.
Nyel-ɑ bɑ jɑgø kì kelli wɑ̈ddi Gercöm bɑ Cebuel.
Eliedher yïe ɑ́dɑ wɑ̈de ɑ́kyel me cwøl ɑ́ Reɑbiyɑ̀, de Reɑbiyɑ̀ kwɑrre gïïr.
Kɑ̈ɑ̈th wɑ̈de nyel-ɑ bɑng kɑyø, Idhɑr yïe ɑ́dɑ wɑ̈de me cwøl ɑ́ Celömith, en bɑ jɑngi kɑl.
Dɑ̈ɑ̈g wɑ̈ddi Kɑ̈ɑ̈th, ɑ cwøl ɑ́ Kibrön, yïe ɑ́dɑ wɑ̈dd ɑ́ngwen: Yeriyɑ̀, kí Amɑriyɑ̀, kí Yɑɑdhiel, kí Yekɑmeɑm,
Ngween wɑ̈ddi Kɑ̈ɑ̈th bɑ Udhiel, o yïe ɑ́dɑ wɑ̈dd ɑ́ryew: Miikɑ̀ geki Iciyɑ̀.
Wɑ̈ddi Merɑrì bɑ ɑ́ryew: Mɑklì kí Mucì. Thyew Mɑklì wɑ̈dde bɑ ɑ́ryew: Eliɑdhɑr kí Kïc,
de Eliɑdhɑr ɑ́thøw e yïe bong wɑ̈dde, dɑ́ nywøle womɑ̈nn keti gen ɑ nud. Nywøle møgɑni ɑ́nywøm-ɑ yi nyiiwï gen, wɑ̈ddi Kïc.
Ryeew wɑ̈ddi Merɑrì, Mucì, wɑ̈dde bɑ ɑ́dɑ̈g, ɑ løg Mɑklì, kí Eder, kí Yeremöth.

Møgɑk bɑ Kwɑrri Leebì kí kɑ̈lli gen, gɑ wɑ̈thi kɑ̈llì, kí tyëng-ɑ ɑ́gwed nyingi gen, e ngɑn gwëëd-ɑ cwɑgge, ngɑn-ɑ wɑ̈dhi ri runn pyɑ̈r ɑ́ryew gïti mɑl, yïe dɑ gwøg me gwøg yi en kì yij Kengi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j.
Akööb Debïd kinni, “Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, Jwøøg Isrɑil mër ɑ́mëgge jie, o en kiree óbëëdø kì Yerusɑlem gïti ɑtheer.
De bong gïn pere ótyëddi Kemi Kwër geki jɑmm-ɑ nyi göög ki kwër bënn yi Kwɑrri Leebì.”
Kì bɑng møg-ɑ ɑ́ceg yi Debïd, Kwɑrri Leebì bënn møg-ɑ runni gen wɑ̈dhi ri pyɑ̈r ɑ́ryew ɑ nyi gwed kipe gwøg.
O gwøng-ɑ nyi mëggi gen bɑ, kønyi ókwër møg-ɑ kɑ̈ɑ̈l ri Aɑron ki gwøøg kwër kì Kengø, kí korri ódɑ̈rri Kengø geki udde, kí korri jɑmmi kwër bënn, o ge cög ge pɑ bwöl,

o ge mïdhi gen ópùn-ɑ nyi mëggi Jwøk, kí møg-ɑ búr men-ɑ nyi muuj kí gëdhhì, kí ópùn-ɑ ri gen bong kɑmïrɑ̀, kí ópùn-ɑ bɑ ɑbul, kí møg-ɑ búr men-ɑ nyi nyöm ki møøw dhetun, o jɑmm-ɑ nyi kɑ̈ɑ̈l Kengø nyi røm yi gen,
o ge nyi lenhi gen Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, o nyi lejji yi gen, o nyi pøjji yi gen yethi cyɑ̈ng kì mwøl kí böörø,

o kenyi rɑ̈ɑ̈b gëdhhi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kì cyɑ̈ɑ̈ng Sɑbɑth, kí cɑ̈gi dwɑ̈n-ɑ nyɑ̈n geki wööwø møg-ɑ kyeelø. Kɑ ge thödhi ki ciggi gwøngɑni, ki kwɑnni Kwɑrri Leebì møg-ɑ nyi cïb kipe gwøgi gwøngɑni, kí bøli keny-ɑ nyi gwøgii. Kwɑrri Leebì ɑ́mëggi gwøøg mɑlli Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j kì yethi cyɑ̈ng bënn.
Ge ɑ́mëggi gwøøg korri kemɑ̀ geki Kengi Jwøng-ɑ Ácwɑ̈ɑ̈j, kí kønyi wɑddi gen geki ókwër kwɑrri Aɑron ki gwøg kì Kengø.
Møg bɑ ɑkuddi kwɑrri Aɑron: wɑ̈ddi Aɑron bɑ ɑ́ngwen, ɑ løg Nɑdɑb, kí Abiu, kí Eliɑdhɑr, kí Ithɑmɑr
Nɑdɑb geki Abiu ɑ́kwöngi ki thøø kibøli wïyi gen, o ɑ́bong-ɑ kwɑrri gen mɑ ɑ́wiy yi gen. Codhe, ɑgöög nyiimï gen, Eliɑdhɑr geki Ithɑmɑr gɑ ókwër.
